Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, Andrea Leadsom, avuga ko ico cegeranyo cerekana ko "amakompanyi agifise igikorwa kitari gito" kugira ngo ashobore guhimiriza abakozi b'abirabure, Abanya Aziya hamwe n'inkehwa.

headline: Akazi: Woshika gute ku bintu vyinshi ukoresheje umwanya muto?
text: Ukivyumva, bishobora kuba ata nsiguro bifise. Wokora gute umwanya muto kugira uronke umwimbu mwinshi? Aha turabasigurira ingene ivyo bishoboka n'ingene bishobora kubafasha mu migambi imwe imwe. Cal Newport, ikigo c'ubuhinga mu kugwiza umwimbu, kiratanga impanuro ku kungene ushobora akazi ku rwenge. Izo mpanuro harimwo ikintu citwa "gukora udakebaguzwa". Mu gutahura ico ari co gukora udakebaguzwa, birakenewe kumenya ico ari co akazi kadashemeye. Kusoma ubutumwa bwa mail, kuraba imbuga hwaniro, gukoresha amanama ku bintu bitihuta cane, ivyo vyose bishobora gufatwa nk'akazi kadashemeye. Ushobora kutavyirengagiza gose, ariko ushobora kubikura ku rutonde rw'ibintu vyo gukora mu mwanya umwe, kugira wihatire ku kandi kazi udakebaguzwa. N'ukwihatira cane ku bikorwa bikenewe cane no kuvyitondera cane. Ushobora no kwiherera kugira ntusamare. Ni vyo umwanditsi Maya Angelou yakunda gukora, mu gihe umugwizatunga Bill Gates azwi nk'umuntu yakunda kwiyugarana ahantu hiherereye kugira akore. Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gushika ku ntumbero mu buzima. Umugwizatunga Warren Buffet ahanura kugira urutonde rw'ibintu 20 nkenerwa vyo gukora mu buzima, hanyuma ugaca akarongo musi y'ikigira gatanu. Hanyuma, ibindi 15 biri kuri urwo rutonde ivyihoze, gushika ubonye uhejeje ivyo bitanu vya mbere. Umwarimu wa kaminuza Angela Duckworth n'umuhinga muvyo inyifato yateguye indinganizoy'intumbero umuntu yipfuza gushikako. N'ukubigaburamwo ibice vyinshi, ikija hejuru kikaba ari co gekenewe cane (nko kuba umuganga canke gutwara umudari wa olempike). Intera ikurikira irimwo intumbero zito zito zikenewe kugira ushike ku ntumbero nyamukuru. Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bukenewe kugira ukore ibibazo vyotuma uba umunyeshure wa kaminuza muvyo amagara y'abantu, canke imyimenyerezo ikenewe kugira wirukw imetero 100 kugira uronke umudari w'inzahabu. Intera yo hasi irimwo ibikorwa bishigikira ibiri mu ntera yo hejuru, gutyo gutyo gutyo. Mu gihe akazi kamwe katagushikana ku ntumbero nyamukuru, intera iyo ari yo yose kariko, ntugakore. Gukora umusi wose akazi ku muvuduko wa 100km/h si ikintu ciza. Akaruhuko karakenewe, kandi nawe karashobora kugufasha. Francesco Cirillo, umuhinga mu gukoresha neza umwanya, yaratoye igipimo c'akaruhuko ku cuma giharura iminota gifise iforoma y'urutomati yasanze mu gikoni ciwe. Ubwo buhinga buzwi kw'izina rya pomodoro (kivuye mw'izina urutomati mu gitaliyano), bukora mu kugabura akazi kawe mi bice vy'iminota 25. Ugakurikizako iminota 5 y'akaruhuko ifasha mu mwimbu. Sohoka hanze gutembera gato hakuguma uraba imbuga hwaniro - ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko utwo turuhuko dushobora umererwa neza gusumba mu kwitegurira iyindi minota 25 y'akazi. Cal Newport arafise uko afata akazi umuntu adakebaguzwa, ariko arazi kandi kugahagarika no kugira umwanya wiwe. Kugira aheraheze umusi w'akazi, yari afise akamenyero ko guhagarika. N'ukuvuga kumenya ko umusi uheze, kwihweza akazi katashoboye kurangira, gutegura ibizokorwa bukeye, no kugara inyabwonko ngendanwa canke ikaye y'imyimenyerezo no kuvuga ijambo nka "ndaheje kugara burundu". Uko wobivuga kose bikuvako, ariko ayo majambo ategerezwa kwerekana ko uhejeje akazi k'uyo musi n'intango y'akaruhuko, ko widegemvya ushobora kwinezereza. Ako kanya utegerezwa kukaronka! Inkuru yo kuri  BBC Bitesize

headline: UK: Abarongoye amakompanyi bemeye kwongereza abakozi b'abirabure
text: Amakompanyi Barclays na Deloitte hamwe n'ayandi atari make mu Bwongereza yiyemeje kwongereza igitigiri c'abakozi b'abirabure, ni mu ntumbero yo kurwanya akarenganyo gakorerwa abirabure. Mw'ikete ryateweko umukono n'abarongoye amakompanyi 40, basavye n'ayandi makompanyi gukora gutyo. Umukuru w'umurwi witaho Uburinganire n'Uburenganzira bwa Muntu mu Bwongereza yabwiye BBC  ko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwiha intumbero yo kwongereza abakozi batari abazungu mu nzego zo hejuru. David Isaac avuga ko amakompanyi akeneye "kugira uruhara rukomeye" mu guha ikibanza gikomeye abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Avuga ko urupfu rwa George Floyd muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rwashize ahabona akarenganyo gakorerwa abantu atari abazungu. Icegeranyo ciswe Colour of Power 2020, cakozwe n'ikigo Green Park gitanga ubuhanuzi ku bijanye n'ubutandukane, kivuga ko mu nzego zo hejuru mu makompanyi atari make mu Bwongereza, muri leta no mu bundi butegetsi bw'igihugu, inkehwa zingana n'ibice bidashika 5%. Kivuga ko ibiharuro bisa n'ivyagumye uko muri ino myaka mike iheze. Umukuru wa kompanyi E.On UK, Michael Lewis, yagize ico avuga ku vyo ayo makompanyi yiyemeje akavuga ati: "Tuzokwama duharanira ivyo twemera kandi twerekane ko dushize hamwe mu kurwanya ivanguramoko, kwigisha abandi no kwishimira ubudasa, ivyo bikazoduha inguvu zo guhindura isi ". Mu gutera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko, abarongoye amakompanyi biyemeje gufata ingingo ziboneka mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c'abirabure mu bakozi bayo. Zimwe muri izo ngingo harimwo: Suki Sandhu, uwatanguje akaba ari nawe arongoye ishirahamwe Imvolve ryishinze guhimiriza ubutandukane mu buzi, ni umwe mu bari muri iryo sekeza, avuga ko yatewe intege n'igitigiri c'abemeye gushira igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko. Avuga ati: "Akamo katewe n'isekeza Black Lives Matter ntikagiye uko, kandi amakompanyi akeneye guhaguruka agafata iya mbere mu mpinduka zigamije kwongereza abirabure mu buzi". "Ndafise icizere ko, mu gihe abayobozi benshi bateye igikumu kuri iri kete, dushobora gufatira ku ngingo biyemeje tukazana impinduka mu kazi kandi tukaguma dukurikirana ingene biguma bigenda, kuko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwama atanga ivyageranyo  buri mwaka ". Hagati aho, amakenga ntabura mu bakozi bamwe bamwe b'abirabure. Umwe mu bakozi ba Barclays atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nzovyemera ndabibonye". Icegeranyo Colour of Power 2020 kivuga ko mu bantu 1,097 barongoye inzego nkuru nkuru mu Bwongereza, 1,046 bose ari abazungu.

headline: Burundi: Inyuma y'indwi imwe ibitungwa bizosubira kubagwa
text: Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n'umutekano bumenyesha ko ibitungwa bigiye gusubira kubagwa kuva ku musi wa gatatu w'indwi iza. Ivyo vyashikirijwe n'umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa Martin Niteretse mu nama yagiranye n'abarongoye intara, abarongoye uturere mu gipolisi hamwe n'abajejwe uburimyi n'ubworozi mu ntara. Ingingo yo guhagarika kubaga ibitungwa yari yafashwe kubera iyaduka ry'ingwara y'inyonko yo mu kiyaya ca Rift (Fièvre de la vallée du Rift) Kugira ivyo bishoboke ngo ibitungwa vyo kubagwa bitegerezwa kwegeranirizwa hamwe. Agira ati:"Abayangayanga  bakeneye kuzobaga mubatunganirize aho begeraniriza ibitungwa bashaka kuzobaga mu ndwi iza. "Nta nka izobagwa itavuye aho muri ico kibanza. Kuko ntayizova mu muhana ica ija kubagwa ubwo nyene." Ivyo bitungwa kugira bije kubagwa, bitegerezwa kumara imisi indwi biri mu kibanza categekanijwe mu makomine yose, bigenzurwa ko bitagwaye. Martin Niteretse kandi avuga ko ata nyama izova mw'ikomine zija mu yindi. Nta n'inka zirekuriwe kuvanwa mu ntara zija mu yindi, kiretse ngo izijanywe kubagirwa mu gisagara c'ubutunzi ca Bujumbura. Ariko ngo nko mu ntara zitagira inka nyinshi, abayangayanga baho barashobora kuja kuzigura ahandi, ariko abategetsi b'aho baziguze bategerezwa kubaha urupapuro ruziherekeza. Kandi ico gihe zizoca ziherekezwa n'igipolisi kugira ntihagire izururukira mu nzira canke izuririra mu nzira  zitagenzuwe neza. Icipfuzo ngo n'uko mu ndwi iza hatangura kubagwa inka, hamwe n'impene n'intamaba 'bishobotse'. Abadandaza basabwe kandi kudaca bikika mu kiza ngo baduze ibiciro. Ku bijanye n'urucanco, Martin Niteretse yabasavye kuja gutegura abajejwe ako kazi kugira incanco zishitse bace baja ku kivi. Haraheze amezi arenga abiri hatanzwe itegeko ko kizira kikaziririza kubaga inka, impene n'intama, mu ntumbero yo gukumira inyono yo mu kiyaya ca Rift.

headline: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
text: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.

headline: Burundi -Kenya: Jules Ndayishimiye yakora ijoro n'umutaga mu kurondera umutahe wiwe
text: Umusore Jules Ndayishimiye adandaza amandazi, ibiyoba n'ikawa muri Kenya, umutahe akaba yawukuye mu kazi ko kudandaza ifi ku murango n'ubuzamu mw'ijoro. Yavuye mu Burundi arangije kaminuza mu gisata c'uburunzi. Avuga ko yatahuye kare ko ata kazi reta igifise itanga, afata ingingo hakiri kare kukironderera. Agira ati:"Kuva ndi muri kaminuza, nari namaze gutahura ko akazi ari jewe ntegerezwa kukironderera. "Narabona abahejeje imbere yanje ko ata kazi baronka." Jules Ndayishimiye avuga kandi ko kuva aheza amashure yisumbuye yari yaciye atangura kurondera ico akora. Avuga ati:"Nahejeje amashure yisumbuye nca ntangura gukorera abantu. Narabadandariza. "Mu nyuma naramanutse i Bujumbura nsaba akazi ko gukora ijoro nkaca niga kaminuza ku murango. "Vyari bigoye, kuko nataha nk'isaha icenda z'ijoro, isaha zibiri nkaba ntonze kw'ishure." Uwo musore avuga ko yagerageje no kworora inkoko biranga, araonka umutahe wo kudandaza ntivyagenda neza ariko ko atacitse intege. Jules Ndayishimye avuga ko umugenzi wiwe asanzwe aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, ari we yamuriye akara ko ashobora kuronka akazi kotuma aronka umutahe kuko amahera yo muri ico gihugu ari hejuru gusumba amarundi. Avuga ati:"Naraje uwo mugenzi aranyakira. Nca ndonka akazi ko gukora mw'ishirahamwe rihingura amafi. "Kubera iwacu twakuze batigisha ibintu vy'imyuga, narafasha gusa ababizi bakabikora, ku mugoroba bagaca bampemba. "Sinaca ntaha, ahubwo naca ntonda ku kandi kazi k'izamu iwacu bita akazi k''ubu city'." "Inyuma y'amezi atatu, naciye mfata ingingo yo kwikorera ivyanje ndi kumwe n'uwundi mugenzi wanje. "Tudandaza ibintu bitandukanye harimwo ikawa, amandazi n'ibiyoba. Kandi bigenda neza turashima." Jules Ndayishimiye ahanura urundi rwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu bagakora akazi kose kabonetse, kuko kuri we, ngo n'aho wobura, uba warondeye ntuheza ngo witeko umwikomo. Urwaruka rwinshi ruturuka mu Burundi rwaje muri kenya kurondera ubuzi, benshi bakora muvyo kwubaka, abandi mu kudandaza amandazi n'ibiyoba mu mabarabara. Hari n'abakora akazi k'izamu kazwi nk''igi city'. "

headline: U﻿kraine ibandanya gushora intete n'aho Uburusiya bwikuye mu masezerano
text: Ikigo gihagarariwe na UN/ONU kigenzura ingene intete zishorwa ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura ki vuga ko u﻿bundi bwato butatu bwahagurutse muri Ukraine ku musi wa kabiri, n'aho uburusiya bwafashe ingingo yo kwivana muri ayo amasezerano. I﻿co kigo kivuga ko ubwo bwato 'bwemerewe kugenda na Ukraine, Turkia na Onu, mu gihe uburusiya na bwo "bwabimenyeshejwe". K﻿u musi wa mbere, amato 12 atwaye amatone 354.500 y'ibifungurwa yarahagurutse muri Ukraine. U﻿burusiya bwahagaritse gushigikira ayo masezerano ku musi wa gatandatu, bwagiriza Ukraine gukoresha inzira ubwato bucamwo mu gutera  amato yabwo y'intambara. O﻿nu ivuga ko ata bwato na bumwe bwariko buraca muri iyo nzira muri iryo joro. U﻿kraine ntiyigeze yemanga kugira uruhara muri ico gitero ca Crimme  - izinga rya Ukraine riri mu bumanuko ryigaruriwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya "gukangisha inzara amakungu" - ivyo Uburusiya buhakana. I﻿co kigo gifise icicaro I Istanbul ntikiramenyesha ivyo ubwo bwato butatu bwavuye muri Ukraine ku wa kabiri bwikoreye. U﻿burusiya nta co buravuga kuri ivyo. U﻿muzigo wo kuri uyu wa mbere ni wo wambere munini utwaye ku musi umwe kuva ayo masezerano yo gutwara intete atanguye gushirwa mu bikorwa, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi w'ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Odesa aho yasubiwemwo na Reuters. Ubwo butegetsi bwongeyeko ko bumwe mu bwato butwaye amatoni 40.000 y'intete bwari bugenewe igihugu ca Ethiopia, aho "hashobora gutera amapfa." I﻿nyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine mu kwezi kwa kabiri, amato yabwo yaciye yugariza ibivuko vya Ukraine vyo ku kiyaga cirabura, bwugaranirayo imiliyoni 20 z'intete zigenewe gutwarwa hagati mu gihugu, harimwo n'ibindi bifungurwa nk'ibigori n'amavuta y'ibihoke. A﻿riko mu kwezi kw'indwi harabonetse amasezerano hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine bafashijwe na Turkia na Onu, bituma hashobora gusubira gushorwa intete ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura. A﻿riko ku musi wa mbere, prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yavuze ko ayo masezerano yahagaritswe , avuga ko ari kubera ibitero "vyinshi" vy'indege zitagira umudereva ku mato yabwo ku bivuko vya Sevastopol aho yavuze ko Ukraine ibifisemwo uruhara. Y﻿avuze ko hategerezwa kubanza kubaho umutekano wo mu mazi, ko kwubahiriza amasezerano yo gushora intete bikimeze uko koba ari ukwigerezako. M﻿w'ijambo ryiwe ku mboneshakure, prezida Putin yagize ati:"Ukraine itegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ko ubwato butwara abantu butazogeramigwa." U﻿kraine ntiyemeje ko yagize uruhara muri ivyo bitero, ikavuga ko Uburusiya bwateguye kuva kera kwivana muri ayo masezerano mpuzamakungu, mu kugira icitwazo ivyo bitero. U﻿muvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida w'Uburusiya, Dmitry Peskov yagize ati:"Mu gihe Uburusiya buvuga ko bidashoka kwemanga umutekano wo muri ako karere, ayo masezerano aragoye gushirwa mu bikorwa, yafashe iyindi ntumbero - harimwo ukwigerezako kurengeje. U﻿kwikura muri ayo masezerano kw'Uburusiya kwatewe ivyatsi na Amerika, yavuze ko ico ico gihugu "kiriko kirakoresha imfungurwa nk'ikigwanisho". J﻿oseph Borrell ajejwe imigenderanire y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya EU n'amakungu, yateye akamo Uburusiya kwisubirako, avuga ko kubuza urudandazwa rw'intete n'umwavu bishobora gutera ikibazo c'inzara kw'isi. U﻿wuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika yamiriye kure ivyo vyagiriji ko igihugu ciwe kiriko kiratuma haba inzara kw'isi, yemeza ko ari akarenganyo kunebagura igihugu ciwe. U﻿burusiya bwafashe iyo ngingo mu gihe bwemeza ko bwaguye igikorwa co gukura abantu mu karere bwigaruriye ka Kherson, n'aho bwari bwavuze, mu mpera z'iyinga, bwari bwarangije ico gikorwa.

headline: Africa-Urudandazwa ku buryo bwa none: Abagore bahevye iduka bakaja kuri terefone zigezweho
text: BBC yibanze ku bagore batatu b'abanya-Afrika - uwahora afise iduka, umwigisha n'umushoferi wa taxi - bongereje amafaranga binjiza kuva batanguye gukora urundadazwa ku buryo bwa terefone zigezweho (smartphones na digital platforms). Ikiza ca coronavirus catumye benshi basubira kwiyumvira ingene boronka ikibabeshaho. Ikigo cigenga gikora ubushakashatsi  Caribou Digital catoye ko abagore muri Kenya, Nigeria na Ghana bariko baravyaza umusaruro uburyo bwo gukora urudandazwa uciye ku buhinga bwa none bwo gutumatumanako (smartphones na digital platforms) kuko bwo bworoshe gushikira  no gukora ibitandukanye -gutyo bagashobora kwinjiza amafaranga kandi bakabandanya n'amabanga yo kwitaho abana babo. Madame Tarit  (mubona kw'ifoto aho hejuru) ntiyibaza ko yoshoboye  kugwiza na kabiri amafaranga yinjiza mu kiringo c'amezi icenda. Ikiza ca Covid cari catumye yugara iduka ryiwe ry'impuzu z'abana muri Eldoret mu burengero bwa Kenya, none gukotesha ibibanza aciye ku bigo bikorera kuri internet nka Airbnb bisa n'ibiriko birazibira igihengeri cari catewe no kwugara urudandazwa rwiwe. Ariko, Madame Tarit w'imyaka 29, ari mu bandi bagore benshi bariko baratera imbere mu gukoresha imbuga nka Facebook, Whatsapp, Instagram na apps z'ama taxi nka Uber na Bolt. Yatanguye urundadazwa rwiwe n'ikibanza kimwe haraheze amezi icenda none ubu afise indwi -ubu akaba akotesha ku gihe kirekire hanyuma nawe agapangisha aciye kuri Airbnb. "Ubu ninjiza amafaranga menshi kurusha ayo nakura mu rudandazwa imbere y'ikiza [ca Covid]," niko yabwiye BBC Daily. Abakoresha urwo rudandazwa ahanini n'abakerarugendo babikisha aho bazorara hamwe n'abagwizatunga bashima kurara muri  Airbnb aho kurara mw'ihoteri. "Mu gihe ca Covid benshi mu  bagenzi banje baratakaje ubuzi baca batangura gukorera ku materefone kugira binjize amafaranga. Ubu bagurisha ivyo kurya baciye kuri internet hanyuma bagakora nk'abashoferi bo kubishira abakiriya", nk'uko Madame  Tarit avuga. Umunsi usanzwe kuri Madame  Adzogble w'imyaka 32, utangurwa no gushira ubutumwa bwo kwamamaza ivyo acuruza kuri Whatsapp no kuri Facebook yibereye i muhira i Acra, umurwa mukuru wa Ghana. Ari mu bariko baravyaza umusaruro zimwe mu mpinduka zikomeye cane mu butunzi muri Afrika -ukwiyongera kw'ibibanza vyo gukoreramwo ubucuruzi kw'isoko ryo kuri internet. Agurisha amaterefone ngendanwa, ivyuma vyo kuzana akayaga mu nzu hamwe n'ama-television, ivyo vyose akavyamamaza aciye ku migwi yashinze kuri Whatsapp na Facebook, hamwe no mu yo asanzwemwo, nk'uwo ahuriramwo n'abo basenga hamwe. Madame Adzogble  yahevye akazi ko kwigisha igifaransa kugira aronke umwanya ukwiye wo gukora urudandazwa rwiwe kuri internet. "Bivamwo amafaranga menshi kurusha kwigisha. Ndashobora kugurisha ikintu kimwe nkinjiza ayaruta ayo mara ukwezi nkorera mu kwigisha. Mfise abana. Nkeneye guha abana banje indero nziza ishoboka,  akaba aribo bampa umwete wo kurondera kwigenga mu bijanye n'amafaranga", niko avuga. Ku bwa Madame Adzogble, kwubaka imigenderanire myiza n'abakiriya n'ikintu nyamukuru ushaka guca amafaranga uciye kuri internet. "Aho baraheza bakakugurira hanyuma bakakuvuga neza." Madame Lawal, w'imyaka 34, akorera  ibigo vy'amataxi uhamagara uciye ku buhinga bwa none Uber na Bolt mu gisagara ca mbere kinini muri Nigeria, Lagos. Ariko, ntibimworohera - uyo mugore areze abana bane wenyene avuga ko hari abagabo banka gutwarwa n'umugore. Lawa avuga ati: "Igihe natangura gutwara taxi muri Lagos, abagabo bose baca bafuta urugendo maze gushika kubajana." "Lagos haragoye , bisaba kuba ukomeye cane kugira ushobore  gutwara imodoka mu gisagara. Abagabo bibaza ko izo nguvu atazo mfise, mbanza kubajijura kugira bemere kwinjira mu modoka." Icigwa ca  Caribou Digital cerekana kandi ko abagore benshi barondera ikibabeshaho baciye ku buhinga bwa digital bafise impungene ku mutekano wabo. Umukuru w'abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi Grace Natabaalo yabwiye BBC ati: "Abagore benshi twavuganye bavuze ko baburagijwe bishingiye ku gitsina iyo bitavye ababa  bafatishije ingendo." Ati: "Mu gihe reta ihimiriza abagore bakiri bato gufata bene aka kazi bakeneye no kumenya urundi ruhande rwako - ko hari ingeramizi kandi zitegerezwa gufatwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye n'inzego z'igiporisi na reta." Ariko Lawal avuga ko ivyiza birimwo biruta cane ibibi. Ati: "Ni vyiza cane kuba ushobora kwironkera ikikubeshaho ariko kandi nshaka no kugira ico ntereye mu butunzi muri rusangi mu gutanga amakori (imisoro). Nsaka ko ubwanje ntera imbere, na Nigeria igatera imbere."

headline: Burundi: Hilaire Manirakiza afasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi'
text: Hilaire Manirakiza yize bimugoye kubera uburyo aho yagiye arahagarika ubu akaba akora akazi katamenyerewe rwose ko gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro na YouTube kwongereza ababakurikirana (Views). Uwo musore avuga ko yize ivyerekeye ubuhinga bwa none bw'itumatumanako mu mashure yisumbuye, avuga ko yize bimugoye bituma atabandanya kaminuza. Avuga ati:"Nahagaritse imyaka itanu ntiga kubera ubukene, ngaruka kubandanya umwaka w'icenda abo twigana bahejeje. "Narasubiriye ndamara umwaka ntiga banyirukanye kuko nari maze imyaka ibiri ntariha amahera y'ishure." YouTube, iriha abafise 'accounts' bivanye n'igitigiri c'abaraba video bashirako n'igihe bazimarako. Mu Burundi hari benshi bamaze gushinga YouTube channels bashirako videos bafise intumbero yo gukorera ayo mafaranga, vyuzi rero ni wo mukate wabo. Kuri Manirakiza n'abafise ubuhinga nk'ubwiwe n'abo guha vyuzi abo bafise. Ni ubuhinga bushasha bwo kurondera amahera n'aho hari abanebagura uko bukora, hamwe  n'ubwoko bw'amakuru ashirwa kuri izo mbuga mu kurondera vyuzi. Hilaire Manirakiza avuga ko agiheza ishure yaciye aronka akazi ko gufata amasanamu ku mboneshakure yo ku mbuga hwaniro, ariko mu nyuma amasezerano bari bafitaniye aza guhagara. Avuga ko yaciye yigira inama yo kwiga uko yobaho mu gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi' (views). Agira ati:"Abafise imbuga hwaniro bampemba hakurikijwe igikorwa bantumye ico ari co. "Uwo mfashije kuronka nk'ama vyuzi 1000 ku musi, ampa ibihumbi 15 vy'amarundi. "Birantunze kuko kuva bampagaritse ku kazi, inzu nguma ndayiriha uko nahora, gufungura canke kwambara ni kwa kundi." Mu kwezi kumwe amaze atanguye ico gikorwa, Manirakiza Hilaire amaze gufasha abantu barenga cumi kuduza ama vyuzi. N'akazi akorera aho ari ho hose, kuri telefone ngendanwa canke ku nyabwonko, ariko akavuga ko afise umugambi wo kwugurura ibiro vyo gukoreramwo. Ahanura urundi rwaruka kwicara rufise ikintu ruzi gukora ku buryo n'aho bokwirukana mu kazi k'ivyo wigiye, ushobora guca wikorera ivyawe.

headline: Inama ya G7 yemeje integuro yo gusohora amafaranga kugira ihangane na China
text: Abategetsi b'ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bihurikiye mu citwa G7 bemeje integuro yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye n'ibiri mu nzira y'amajambere mu bikorwa vy'iterambere, ni mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko ashaka ko umugambi wo gufasha ibihugu bikenye ushigikiwe na Amerika, wiswe Build Back Better World (B3W), uba uwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ugasubirira umugambi nk'uwo w'Ubushinwa. Umugambi w'Ubushinwa uzwi nka Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), uramaze gufasha ibihugu bitari bike mu kubironsa amagari ya moshi, kwubaka amabarabara n'ibivuko. Ariko ni umugambi unegurwa cane, uvugwa ko winjije ibihugu mu madeni y'umurengera. Mw'itangazo basohoye inyuma y'inama yariko ibera mu karere ka Cornwall mu Bwongereza, abategetsi ba G7 bavuga ko bazoshira imbere ubucuti bushingiye ku "kwubahiriza indangagaciro, bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru hamwe no gukorera mu muco". Hagati aho, ntibatomora iyo amafaranga azova mu gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel avuga ko batari bwagere ku gihe co gusohora amafaranga. Amerika iranegura cane Ubushinwa ku nteguro yabwo y'ugukomeza igifatwa nk'imigenderanire "ishingiye ku madeni". Abategetsi ba G7, umurwi w'ibihugu indwi bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bivuga ko bishira imbere intwaro rusangi, bavuga kandi ko biyemeje gushiraho iyindi nteguro y'ingingo zo kurwanya ibindi biza bishobora kwiyadukiza muri kazoza. Muri izi ngingo harimwo kugabanya ikiringo co gukora no kwemeza incanco n'imiti yo kurwanya Covid-19 kikaja musi y'imisi ijana. Kuri uyu wa Mungu niho bategekanya gutangaza iyi nteguro, hampande y'itangazo rirangiza iyi nama barimwo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson niwe arongoye iyi nama y'imisi itatu iriko ibera mu karere ka Carbis Bay. Ni ibiki ibihugu vy'uburengero bw'isi vyoba bimaze gukorera Ubushinwa gushika ubu ? Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Amerika, Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Ubwongereza hamwe na Canada vyafatiye ibihano Ubushinwa. Ibi bihano vyafatiwe abategetsi bo hejuru mu ntara ya Xinjiang bagirizwa ihonyanga ry'agateka ka zina muntu bakorera aba Islam  bo mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur, muri vyo hakaba harimwo ukubuza ingendo muri ivyo bihugu hamwe no gufata amatungo yabo. Abantu barenga umuriyoni bo  mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur z'izindi nkehwa nibo bazwi ko bapfungiwe mu makambi ari muyi iyo ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Reta y'Ubushinwa yagirizwa gutera ubugumba abagore b'aba Uyghur no gusambura imiryango, mu gutandukanya abana n'abavyeyi babo. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryashizwe ahabona mu kwa kabiri ririmwo amakuru yemeza ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'iyicarubozo bikorerwa abapfungiwe muri ayo makambi. Ubushinwa bwaciye bwihora mu gufatira ibihano abategetsi b'aba nya Burayi.

headline: Burundi: BRB yugaye amashirahamwe agurisha amafaranga
text: Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yaraye ifashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro yari asanzwe yemewe. Mwitangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'iyo banki, Ciza Jean, avuga ko iyo ngingo izotangura kuja mu ngiro mu ndwi iza, igenekerezo rya 15 z'uku kwa kabiri. Yagiriza ayo mashirahamwe ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyo ngo bikaba vyaragize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Muri iryo tangazo, Bwana Ciza ategeka abafise amazu yo kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga y'agaciro gukuraho vuba na bwango ivyapa n'ibindi bimenyetso biyaranga. Amenyesha ko kuva ubu, amazu yemerewe kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga mvamakungu ari ayegukira amabanki. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe ku wa 15 z'ukw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2019, buri shirahamwe ryategerezwa kuvunja amafaranga ryisunze igiciro cashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu "ritarengeje inyungu y'ibice 15%". Iyo ngingo isa n'iyagoranye gushira mu ngiro, ari co catumye mu kwezi kwa 11 umwaka uheze, BRB isohora itangazo, aho yagabisha ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

headline: Burundi: Kwugara ububare 21h 'birababaje kubura ico ukeneye mu mwanya wipfuza'
text: Inyuma y'igisagara ca Bujumbura, ubu na Gitega eka no mu ntara ya Muyinga - ihana urubibe n'u Rwanda -  ububare bwose butegerezwa gupfunga isaha zitatu z'ijoro, abanyagihugu bamwe barabishimye abandi bavuga ko ari ihohoterwa. Buramatari w'intara ya Muyinga na musitanteri wa komine Gitega intara ya Gitega ubu nabo nyene batangaje izi ngingo bavuga ko ari izo kubungabunga umutekano. Abo bategetsi bompi batangaza ko "amasaha yo kwugurura ubunywero ku minsi y'ikirimo ari kuva isaha cumi n'imwe z'umuhingamo gushika isaha zitatu z'ijoro". Izo ngingo ziriko zirafatwa mu gihe ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi bubandanya bumenyesha ko igihugu cose kirangwa mwo umutekano. Izo ngingo zifashwe inyuma y'igitero mu ntara ya Cibitoke, abategetsi bavuze ko cagizwe n'abavuye mu Rwanda bateye ikirindiro c'abasirikare bagasubira muri ico gihugu. Abo bategetsi ntibavuga nimba izo ngingo zifitaniye isano n'ico gitero co mu ntara ya Cibitoke. Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura wewe, Freddy Mbonimpa, avuga ko ata sano rihari, ahubwo izo ngingo zatangajwe bahejeje ukwisuzuma bagasanga harabayeho ukudebukirwa mu gucungera umutekano. Ku biraba ivyo kwugara akabare vyovyo, Bwana Mbonimpa yavuze ko yafashe izo ngingo kubera ko hari abantu bata akazi, bakigira mu kabare aho kuba bari ku kazi. Muri Komine Gitega bamwe bishimira izo ngingo mu gihe abandi babona ko bahotowe. Ntibipfuje gutangazwa amazina yabo. Umunyagihugu umwe avuga ko izo ngingo zari zaratevye, akabona ko zigiye gushira ku murongo ibitari bike, hampande y'umutekano. Agira ati: "Ubu nta muntu azokwiraza ahantu atamvo iboneka ihari, nta n'uwuzoraza umuntu mukinyegero, ahubwo lmana yakoze gukoresha izo ndongozi kugira bagire ico ciyumviro ". Uwundi abona ko gufata izo ngingo bifise imvo, ariko kwugara akabare isaha zitatu hakiri kare cane. Ati: "Ntivyumvikana ukungene isaha zitatu ubunywero bwose buzoba bwugaye. Izo ni ingorane kandi abantu benshi bagiye guherera mu gasho". Eka n'abadandaza inzoga babona ko bagiye kuhahombera, na rirya ngo isaha betegekwako kwugara ariho abakiriya baba batanguye kunywa. Uwundi munyagihigu abona ko abafashe iyo ngingo bibagiye ko hari vyinshi bituma umuntu aja mukabare, atari uko aba agira ate umwanya gusa. Ati: "Murashobora kuba muri no kwi'jambo ryofasha benshi, canke uvuye ahantu. "Ubundi twizera abarongozi bacu ko ingingo badufatira baba babona ko ari zo zikwiriye, ariko si ukuvuga ko bihimbaye kubura ico ufata wari ugikeneye mu mwanya wipfuza".

headline: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
text: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

headline: Ku bakunzi b’amavuta y’amamesa, ibikuru vyo kumenya
text: Ni imfunguro itoroshe kwimbura, ariko kandi ubu ibangamiwe, nk'ibindi bidandazwa vyinshi, kubera intambara za Russia - Ukraine.

headline: Burundi : 17 bapfunzwe bikekwa gushaka kunyaga abanyagihugu mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga
text: Abantu 17 bo mw'ishirahamwe Crowd1 ricuruza amafaranga ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi bari mu minwe y'igipolisi bagirizwa gukora inama y'ishirahamwe ritazwi n'amategeko. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano yabwiye Radio Isanganiro ko abo barobowe mu bandi barenga 300 bari bafashwe bari muri iyo nama ejo ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba n'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Pierre Nkurikiye avugira ubwo bushikiranganji avuga y'uko abo bantu bafashwe n'igipolisi bari mu nama muri zone Rohero mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ko abari mu minwe y'igipolisi ari abariko bakorwako amatohoza kubijanye n'uko  ishirahamwe Crowd1 ryoba rifise intumbero yo kwiba abanyagihugu. Haciye amezi make ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, igabishije Abarundi kwirinda urudandazwa rw'amafaranga rukorwa biciye mu mihora ngurukanabumenyi bita 'monnaies virtuelles' canke crypto-monnaies. Mw'itangazo yasohoye mu kw'umunani umwaka uheze, BRB yavuze ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga yo kuri iyo mihora nka Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Onecoin,  Fahari Cash Coin, Ello Cash Coin rutemewe. Jean Ciza, umukuru w'iyo banki, yavuze ko ayo mafaranga akoreshwa mu buryo butagira amategeko bwisunga ahantu na hamwe kw'isi, kuko ngo nta banki n'imwe y'igihugu kw'isi yose irayemera. Ati: "Ivyo bituma ibikorwa muri ayo mafaranga bisa n'ivyo ubusuma…" Abatari bacye muri iki gihe barinjira mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga mu buryo butandukanye leta z'ibihugu zimwe zivuga ko rutemewe.

headline: Ubuhindi bwategetse Google kuriha irindi hadabu ry’imiliyoni $113
text: Ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko caciye Google ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 113 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera ibikorwa biteye kubiri n’amategeko ajanye n’ihiganwa mu gisata c’itumatumanako, igihano kigira kabiri mu kiringo kiri munsi y’indwi imwe. Ico kigo cagiriza Google gukoresha ubwiganze ifise mu bubiko bwayo bw’ama Apps (applications)  mu guhatira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje app yayo. Iki kigo gisaba iyi kompanyi rutura y’ubuhinga kutazibira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje ubundi buryo canke baciye mu zindi nzira. Google yavuzeko iriko irihweza ivyo birego. Umuvugizi wa Google avuga ati: “Mu kugumiza ku giciro gito,  vyatumye ubuhinga bwa digital (numérique) bukomera mbere bwugururira imiryango amamiriyoni amajana n’amajana y’Abahindi”. Uyo muvugizi yagize ati: “Tubandanya kwitaho abakoresha n’abahingura ama Apps, tukaba turiko turihweza iyi ngingo kugira ngo turabe intambwe zikurikira”. Muri iki cemezo canditse ku mpapuro 199 casohowe ku wa kabiri, ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko, (Competition Commission of India, CCI) kivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amategeko amwe amwe mu bubiko bwayo bwa Play Store ategeka abahingura ama Apps “gukoresha gusa” ubuhinga bwayo mu gutanga canke kugurisha ama Apps. Ikinyamakuru Reuters kivugako ico kigo kijejwe ubugenzuzi gisaba Google gufata ingingo umunani zikosora ibi bintu mu mezi atatu, harimwo kutazibira abahingura ama Apps gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kuriha, haba mu kugura ikibanza muri Apps zisanzwe zirimwo canke kugura ama Apps. CCI  ivuga kandi iti: “Google itegerezwa gukorera mu muco iyo ivugana n’abahingura ama Apps kandi igatanga insiguro ku mafaranga basabwa”. Iyi ni ingingo y’incamugongo ya vuba kuri Google isanzwe ihanzwe n’ibirego bituma itakaza icizere mu Buhindi. Mu ndwi iheze iyi kompanyi yatangishijwe ihadabu ry’imiliyoni 161 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera yakoresheje urubuga rwa Android kugira yiganzire isoko. CCI  ivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amasezerano y’agahato ku bakoresha ububiko bwayo kugira ngo imbuga zayo – nka Google Chrome, YouTube, Google Maps  n’izindi – zikoreshwe. Itohoza rijanye na Android ryaratangujwe mu 2019, inyuma y’imyidogo y’abakoresha Telefone zo mu buhinga bwa Android.

headline: Boeing na Airbus zigabisha US ku ngorane zishobora guterwa na 5G
text: Abakuru b'ikompanyi zibiri za mbere rutura mu gukora indege basavye reta ya Amerika gutevya gutangura gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bw'ama terefone bwa 5G. Mw'ikete, abategetsi ba Boeing na Airbus bagabisha ko ubwo buhinga bushobora kugira "ingaruka mbi ku bikorwa vy'indege." Amakenga yari amaze gushikirizwa ko ubuhinga bwa 5G bushobora guhungabanya ivyuma vy'ubuhinga bwa electronic vyo mu ndege. Ibihangange vya telecoms (ubuhinga bwo gutumatumanako)  muri Amerika AT&T na Verizon  vyitezwe gutanguza ikoreshwa rya 5G itariki 5 za Nzero (ukwezi kwa  mbere). Abakuru ba Boeing na Airbus Dave Calhoun na Jeffrey Knittel, mw'ikete barungikiye hamwe uwujejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu muri reta ya Amerika Pete Buttigieg, bamubwiye bati: "Uguhungabanya kwa 5G gushobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bw'indege bwo gukora mu mutekano". Iryo kete ryishingiye ku bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umugwi w'ubucuruzi Airlines for Amerika rwatoye ko iyo amategeko y'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe indege (FAA)  aba yagiye mu ngiro mu 2019, hafi ingendo 345.000 z'indege z'ingenzi  na 5.400 zitwara imizigo ziba zaracerewe, zarahinduriwe inzira canke zitabaye zikiba. Igisata c'indege n'urwego rwa Amerika rw'indege (FAA) barashikirije amakenga ko 5G ishobora guhungabanya ivyuma  vyo mu ndege nk'amaradiyo y'ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere. Itangazo rya Airbus rivuga ko "Airbus na Boeing bakoranye n'abandi bafise uruhara mu gisata c'indege muri Amerika kugira batahure ihungabana rishobora guterwa na 5G ku vyuma bifata ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere (altmeters)". "Iinteguro y'ingene ingorane zishoboka zoba nke cane ku ndege yarashikirijwe igisata ca Amerika kijejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu kugira yigwe." Uku kwezi, urwego FAA rwaragabishije ko uguhungabanya ibindi vyuma guturutse kuri 5G gushobora gutuma indege zihushishwa inzira, ruvuga ko ruzotanga amakuru menshi imbere y'uko ubwo buhinga butangura gukoreshwa itariki 5 Nzero. Muri Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), kompanyi za AT&T na Verizon  zarasibije gutanguza urudandazwa rwa 5G ikiringo c'ukwexzi gushika itariki 5 Nzero zica zifata ingingo zo kwiyubara zo kugabanya ko haba ihungabanya. Amakompanyi yo mu gisata c'indege avuga ko izo ngingo zidahagije, Boeing na Airbus zikavuga ko zaciye zitanga integuro yazo yo kugabanya imishwarara iturutse ku bikoresho vyo gutumatumanako imbere no mu micungararo y'ibibuga vy'indege no mu bindi bibanza nkoramutima. Ku ndwi iheze, umukuru wa United Airlines Scott Kirby yavuze ko ingingo za FAA zerekeye 5G zizobuza ikoreshwa z'ibipimo z'aho indege igeze mu kirere ku bibuga bishika 40 mu vya mbere binini muri Amerika. Kompanyi ya Amerika y'ubuhinga budaciye mu ntsinga CTIA ivuga ko 5G ata ngorane n'imwe iteye akagiriza igisata c'indege gutera ubwoba no kwerekana ukutariko uko ibintu  bimeze. Umukuru wa CTIA  Meredith Attwell Baker yavuze mu kwezi guheze ati: "Kuducereza bizogira ingaruka mbi ikomeye. Kurindira uwundi mwaka bizotuma habura miriyaridi 500 z'amadorari mw'izamuka ry'ubutunzi, mu gihe igihugu cacu kiriko kirivyukiranya  congera ciyubaka inyuma y'ingaruka za Covid".

headline: Kenya: Evariste Ndayishimiye asaba abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe mu Burundi
text: Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye atera akamo abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe yabo mu Burundi  kuko ngo mu myaka ibiri canke itatu iri imbere bashobora kuzoba bacerewe. Agishika muri Kenya, yaciye aca mu burengero bw'ico gihugu mu gisagara ca Kisumu, aho prezida n'abagize reta ya Kenya bari, bitegurira guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Madaraka Day kuri uyu wa kabiri. Mu kiganiro bahaye abamenyeshamakuru, abakuru b'ibihugu Uhuru Kenyatta na Evariste Ndayishimiye bashimagije umubano mwiza, gufashanya muri politike, ubutunzi, gutsimbataza amahoro n'ishaka bafise ryo kubitsimbataza. Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amaze kuza muri Kenya kenshi, ariko ko ari ubwa mbere ashitse mu gisagara ca Kisumu. Yagize ati:"...Ntangajwe n'ubwiza hamwe n'iterambere nsanze muri kino gisagara." Yavuze ko Uburundi bumaze gutera intambwe mu mahoro n'umutekano, ko butakiri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitarangwamwo amahoro muri Onu, ashimira prezida Kenyatta ko "we ubwiwe yabigizemwo uruhara." Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ubu, Uburundi buriko burashira inguvu cane mu guteza imbere ubutunzi, aranashima ko uguhanahana ibidandazwa hagati ya Kenya n'Uburundi bigenda vyiyongera. Yvuze ati:"Ndateye akamo abagwizatunga bo muri Kenya kuza mu Burundi kukoni co gihe ciza, kurindira imyaka ibiri canke itatu, mushobora gusanga mwacerewe." Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi kandi yatumiye mugenzi we wa Kneya Uhuru Kenyatta kugendera Uburundi.

headline: Africa-Ukraine: Ingaruka z'intambara ziguma zigaragaza uko bukeye uko bwije
text: Gaz (umwuka)  yo gutekesha (Liquified Petroleum  Gas, LPG)  yaduze igiciro muri Kenya  gushika kuri 11 kw'ijana mu ndwi imwe gusa, mu gihe intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine iriko iragira ingaruka ku biciro v'ibitoro kw'isi. Ubu igiciro ca gaz yo gutekesha muri Kenya kimaze kuduga gushika kuri 50 kw'ijana mu kiringo c'umwaka, ubu kikaba congeye umuzigo ku banyagihugu bari bahanzwe  n'uburyo bwagabanutse kubera ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ubu igiciro co kwuzuza icupa rya gaz ry'ibiro 13 ciyongeyeko 11 kw'ijana muri iyi ndwi n'ukuvuga ko bica bisaba amafaranga angana n'ama dorari ($) 29.30 (hafi 60.000 mu marundi canke 30.000 mu manyarwanda) rivuye ku ma dorari 26.26 ku ndwi iheze. Ubu icupa ry'ibiro 6 ryuzuzwa kuri $13.68 kare ryari kuri $12.43. Ni  ikimenyetso ko ibihe biri imbere bitagiye kworoha ku bantu b'uburyo bubayabaye basanzwe bari bahanzwe n'ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya vyaduze cane. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bikomoka ku bitoro  nka essence, amazutu na kerosene, muri Kenya ibiciro vya gaz yo gutekesha ntibishingwa na reta, bisigura ko abaguzi baca bahura n'ingaruka uko ibiciro bihindutse kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Kuri uyu wa mbere igiciro c'ibitoro bitayunguruye caduze gushika ku $140 ku kagunguru (barril)  kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biramaze kuduza ibiciro vy'ibitoro. Mu Rwanda havugwa kuduga kw'igiciro c'ibitoro... No mu Rwanda kuva kuri uyu wa mungu hari ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro. Mazutu yavuye kuri 1.140Frw ija kuri 1.201Frw, essence iva kuri 1.225Frw ija kuri 1.256Frw. Itangazo ry'ubuyobozi bubijejwe rivuga ko n'aho ryirinze kuduza igiciro uko vyategerezwa kugenda kugirango ibiciro  muri rusangi ntibice biduga cane ngo vyonone umurindi wo kwivyukiranya ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko  ibintu bishobora kwunyuka hamwe ihererekanywa ry'ivyo bitoro ryohungabana. Rolake  Akingube-Filani wo muri  Africa Energy Chamber avuga ati: "Amaherezo ingaruka zizova i Buraya zishike muri Afrika  aho ibiciro bishobora kuduga kurusha aho bigeze ubu." Yongerako ati: "Dukeneye kurondera uburyo bwo kwikwiza ku bitoro muri Afrika. Aho niho dushobora kwihagararako habaye ihungrana nk'iryo muri kazoza."

headline: 'Umukuru wa Twitter Elon Musk 'ntari hejuru y’amategeko'' - Umugenzuzi wa US
text: Kimwe mu bigo vy’ubugenzuzi vya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kivuga ko kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi ingene ibintu biriko biragenda muri Twitter "n’impungenge nyinshi". Ni inyuma y’aho hari abakozi bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bajejwe amabanga hamwe no kwubahiriza amategeko bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Umurwi w’igihugu ujejwe ubucuruzi (Federal Trade Commission,FTC) uvuga ko umukuru w'urwo rubuga mushasha Elon Musk atari  "hejuru y’amategeko ". Mu yandi makuru, Musk avugwa ko yoba yarabwiye abakozi ko n’ivyo kwugara bishoboka. Iyi kompanyi iri mu mayira abiri kuva aho Musk atanguriye kwirukana ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abakozi mu ndwi iheze. Ubushobozi bwo kugura 'status' ku bakoresha uru rubuga mu gihe ari uwiyandikishije gushasha bwongereje impungenge ko Twitter ishobora kwuzura ama konte y’ibinyoma. Ejo ku wa kane, Yoel Roth, yari arongoye igisata ca Twitter kijejwe umutekano yashize umwidondoro mushasha kuri runo rubuga hwaniro amenyesha ko atakiri muri ico kibanza. Amakuru avuga ko umukuru w’igisata kijejwe amakuru y’ibanga Damien Kieran be n’umukuru w’igisata kijejwe ivyo kwubahiriza amategeko Marianne Fogarty batanze imihoho. N’uwujejwe umutekano muri iyo kompanyi Lea Kissner na we nyene yaratanze imihoho. Kubona aba bantu baragiye bishobora kwongereza ivyago vya Twitter vyo guhonyanga amabwirizwa y’ubugenzuzi. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu, iyi kompanyi yaraciwe ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 150 kubera kugurisha amakuru y’abayikoresha, bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko yemera ko hashingwa ayandi mabwirizwa mashasha ajanye no gucungera amakuru y’ibanga. Douglas Farrar, umukuru w’igisata kijejwe imigenderanire muri FTC, avuga ati: "Turiko turakurikirana ibiherutse kuba kuri Twitter n’impungenge nyinshi”. "Nta muyobozi canke ikompanyi iri hejuru y’amategeko, kandi amakompanyi ategerezwa gukurikiza ivyo twemeranije”. Farrer avuga ko FTC ifise “ibikoresho bishasha biyiha ubushobozi bwo kugenzura ko kompanyi iriko ikurikiza ivyo yiyemeje kandi turiteguye kubikoresha”. Twitter yarishe ihadabu mu kwezi kwa gatanu inyuma yo kwagirizwa ko yari yagurishije mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko amakuru y’ibanga y’abayikoresha kugira biyifashe kugurisha amatanganzo yo kwamamaza. Iruhande y’iri hadabu, yategerejwe kwemera amabwirizwa mashasha, kandi ikemera gushiraho umugambi  ukomeye wo gucungera amabanga n’umutekano vy’abayikoresha – bigenzurwa n’aba bategetsi bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Kuva afashe mu minwe Twitter, Musk yarirukanye uwahoze ari umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa Parag Agrawal hamwe n’abandi bategetsi bo hejuru, mbere n’abajejwe ibikorwa vyo kwamamaza n’amasoko na bo nyene baragiye. Ibi vyose biza kwongereza amakenga kuba Twitter idafise abantu bakwiye bashobora gucungera nimba ibandanya igendera ku mategeko ngenderwako. Vyongeye, amwe mu makompanyi makuru makuru yamamaza yaratewe ubwoba n'inzira Musk ariko atwaramwo iyi kompanyi y’urubuga hwaniro. Twitter yinjiza amafaranga yayo hafi yose biciye mu kwamamaza, ariko amakompanyi amwe amwe yabaye arabangira kurekura amahera yayo, mu gihe acihweza impinduka Musk ariko arazana. Amakompanyi amwe amwe avugwa ko afise amakenga ko Musk azodegura mu mategeko yo kugenzura ibica ku rubuga rwiwe mbere anahindure ingingo zo kwugara imbuga z’abantu bamwe bamwe bateje ibibazo, harimwo na Donald Trump yahoze arongoye Amerika. Bivugwa ko Musk yoba yarabwiye abakozi bari mu nama ko atabona neza kazoza k’ingene ubutunzi bwiyongera muri iyo kompanyi, kandi ko atawoshira kure guhomba burundu. Twitter yarasabwe kugira ico ishikirije. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi The Verge ari na rwo rwasohoye ijambo ryose Musk yashikirije abakozi, ruvuga ko Twitter itagifise igisata c’ukumenyesha amakuru.

headline: Spice Diana ati 'Nsaba Imana ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza'
text: Igisata c'umuziki muri Uganda kiriko kiratera imbere, kandi kirimwo abacuraranzi batari bake b'abagore bamaze gutera imbere. Spice Diana afise indirimbo zitari nke amaze gusohora ubu akaba ariko aritegurira urukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere. Aherutse kandi no gushirwa ku rutonde rw'abahiganira agashimwe kitiriwe MTV Africa Music Awards  (MAMA). "Iri genwa ryantumye mbona ko nkwiye gukora ntagoheka kubera vyanyeretse ko umuziki wanje ushimwa ku mbuga mpuzamakungu hamwe no muri Afrika". "Numva umengo bambwiye bati: 'Hey, Spicey. Usanzwe ukora ibikomeye, rero utegerezwa kwihata gusumba'." Spice Diana avuga ko ibihe bigoye Uganda yari imazemwo iminsi vyagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki, akipfuza ko ibintu vyosubira mu buryo kugira ngo ibikorwa vyabo bibandanya ukuri kwamye. Spice Diana yabwiye ikiganiro This Is Africa (Iyi Ni Afrika)  ko umurwi w'abana batamba wiyise Triplets Ghetto Kids ari wo watumye ashobora gushika aho ageze. Yarabakunda cane, bimutuma abona ko akwiye kuza arabandikira indirimbo, ariko bobo bamubonyemwo ubushobozi: Ati: "Muri jewe nibwira nti: 'Oya, kuririmba ntavyo nshoboye', ariko bobo muri bo bavuga bati 'Urashobora kuririmba!' Si niyemera, ariko abo bana baranteye intege nyinshi, ku buryo nabona ntobahemukira". Umwaka uheze ntiworoheye abanyamuziki muri Uganda. Mu bitandukanye n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi byo muri Afrika, Uganda yarafashe amategeko yo kubabuza ibikorwa vyabo. Igihe abanyamuziki ba Nijeriya, Omar Ley na Tems bakora igiteramo cabo, birengagije amategeko ya Covid-19, abanyamuziki benshi ba Uganda barashavuye cane. Spice Diana ati: "Twarashavuye cane, ariko mu nyuma twamenye ko ari umunya Uganda yari yateguye ico giteramo, maze twifatanya n'aba banyanijeriya kubera twabonye ko igiporisi cakoze nabi kubahagarika mu gihe atari bo bari bagiteguye". Spice Diana  avuga kandi ko imigumuko yagiye yibonekeza mu gihugu igihe cariko citegurira amatora yagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki ba Uganda. Ati: "Abantu benshi baratakaje ubuzima bwabo, abandi baratakaza ubuzi bwabo, hanyuma igihe cose ivyo bibaye, abakunzi bacu baba biteze ko hagira ico tuvuze". Ati: "Rimwe na rimwe, usanga ata vyinshi uzi muri poritike - ugaca usanga iyo ubuze ico ushikiriza, abantu baraguhevye mbere n'umuziki wawe bakawuheba". "Rero nsaba ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza inyuma y'ibi vyose".

headline: Bob Marley: Kwibuka imyaka 40 iheze iyo mboneza ipfuye
text: Imyaka 40 iraheze kuva umuririmvyi wa reggae yasize izina Bob Marley yishwe na cancer i Miami, ku myaka 36, hari ku wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 1981. Uwo munyamuziki n'umwe mu bakundwa kandi bemewe cane muri kahise k'umuziki, ku ndirimbo nyinshi zabiciye bigacika nka No Woman No Cry, One Love, na Redemption Song. Indirimbo yiwe Buffalo Soldier niyo yabaye rurangiranwa kurusha izindi mu Bwongereza, aho yagiye mu kibanza ca kane mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 1983. Album [urukurikirane rw'indirimbo] yo mu 1977 Exodus yiswe Album y'Ikinjana n'ikinyamakuru Time Magazine. Marley yavutse mu 1945, kuri se w'umuzungu na nyina w'umwirabure, muri Jamaica. Nk'umwana yakuriye mu bukene kandi nta migenderanire myinshi bari bafitaniye na se, uwo akaba yari asanzwe ari umusirikare wo mu mazi yakorera reta y'Ubwongereza. Yavuye iwabo ku myaka 14 aja gutangura umwuga w'umuziki i Kingston. Mu  1972, Marley yashitse mu Bwongereza n'umugwi wiwe The Wailers kuremesha ibiteramo na Johnny Nash mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kumenyekana ku rubuga mpuzamakungu. Mu mwaka ukurikira, The Wailers basohoye album yabo Catch a Fire baca bakora igiteramo cabo ca mbere kuri television kuri BBC. Ico giteramo cagize ingaruka nini cane gica kibazanira abakunzi benshi ku bo bari basanganywe. Inyuma y'urundi rugendo rw'ibiteramo mu 1975, yafashe amajwi ikibiriraho indirimbo No Woman No Cry kuri The Lyceum, i Londres, ica isohoka yonyene (single) ibera Bob Marley indirimbo yiwe mbere yagiye ku rutonde rw'izikundwa cane mu Bwongereza. Uwo muririmvyi yaciye aja mu murongo w'abaririmvyi bakomeye kw'isi aca aba izina rizwi mu aho uciye hose. Marley yari azwi ku kwemera kwiwe gushingiye kuri  Rastafarism, hamwe n'umugore wiwe, Rita, idini rikaba ryaragaragara mu ndirimbo ziwe. Uwo muririmvyi yarakunda kandi cane umupira w'amaguru, vyari bizwi ko acishamwo akaja gukina iyo afashe akaruhuko mu gihe co gutegura indirimbo (muri studio) canke imbere yo kuremesha igiteramo. Mu kiganiro mu 1980 yavuze ati: "Nkunda umuziki imbere yo gukunda umupira." "Gukina umupira w'amaguru no kuririmba n'ibintu bibangamye kuko umupira urimwo kubabazanya. Ndirimba amahoro, urukundo n'ibindi nk'ivyo, urabona uriko urakina ntawuzi igishobora gushika, "Umuntu aguteze akakubabaza umenga ibaye intambara." Igiteramo c'ikibiriraho ca nyuma ca Bob Marley mu Bwongereza cabaye itariki 13 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 1980 muri New Bingley Hall, Stafford. Marley yaciye apfa mu mwaka ukurikira ahitanywe n'indwara ya melanone acral-lentigineux yari yatowe mu 1977. Yashinguwe aho yavukiye muri Jamaica mu kigwati ca Nine Mile. Amafoto yose n'aya nyeneyo.

headline: Burundi: Girumuco Téline atambukira inzu y'imideli Yves St Laurent ati: 'Nakunze umudeli kubera dawe'
text: Umurundikazi Girumuco Téline Féerie afitaniye amasezerano y'umudeli n'inzu rurangiranwa yo mu Bufaransa Yves Saint Laurent, avuga ko yabikunda kuva akiri umwana. Uwo mwigeme avuga ko yatanguye umwuga w'umudeli mu 2016 mu nzu [agence] yitwa Winners' fashion. Agira ati:" Nabikunze nkiri umwana. Ngira aho nabirabira cane hari ku muvyeyi wanje, dawe; yakora mu bintu vy'impuzu." Indoto za Téline ngo zari izo kwambika abantu, agakora impuzu mu Burundi abantu ntibabe bakizikura mu mahanga. Uwo mwigeme yiga mu gisata co gutumatumanako amakuru ngo afise umugambi wo kuva muri ico gisata aje gutangura kwiga gushona imideli. Agitangura ivyerekeye imideli mu Burundi ngo abantu ntibabibona neza. Agira ati:" Abantu babona umenga ndiko ndata akaranga. Abavyeyi banje naragize Imana barantahura bakaza baranshigikira, ariko nk'abandi babibona mu mibano, ntibabibona neza, ariko ubu bariko barabitahura kubera babona urwego maze gushikako." Abandanya avuga ko akiri mu Burundi yagize ivyigwa nkarisha bwenge vyo gushona impuzu, abantu bakabifata nabi, kuko ntibatahura ingene yari azi ubwenge mw'ishure ariko akaja mu vyo gushona impuzu. Yaragira kandi n'ibindi vyigwa bijanye no gushona ku buhinga bwa internet, abamwigisha bakaba bari mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. Téline afise uburebure bwa metero 1.76, akaba apima ibiro 48. Atera akamo urwaruka na cane cane abigeme gukora cane kuko kenshi mu Burundi imyuga itamenyerewe badakunze kuyishigikira, bigasaba kugira inguvu nyinshi. Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro c'uruhererekane (Series) kizajya gihita kuri radio buri wa gatatu, no ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuzamiryango. BBC Gahuzamiryango ihaye ikaze ibitekerezo vyanyu kuri iki kiganiro.

headline: Charles agiye kuba Umwami bwoko ki?
text: Charles, umuntu wa mbere amaze igihe kirekire ari samuragwa muri kahise k'Ubwongereza, ubu ni umwami. Imyaka 70 amaze yiga nka samuragwa, yamutumye aba umwami wa mbere yimitswe yiteguye kandi akaba ari we mwami wa mbere  yimitswe afise imyaka myinshi. Uyu mwami w'imyaka 73 yamanye na nyina wiwe mu kiringo cose yari amaze ari ku ngoma, abategetsi b'isi baza bakagenda, harimwo abashikiranganji ba mbere b'Ubwongereza 15 hamwe n'apaperezida 14 ba Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Inyuma y'ingoma y'akaroruhore, rurangiranwa, ya Elizabeth II, dushobora kuba twiteze umwami w'ubwoko ki? Ni gute kandi umuganwa azwi ko atarya umunwa ku bibazo bimubakiye azomenyera kuvuga ataho yegamiye nk'Umwami? Nk'umwami, Charles ntazoba agifise igitabo c'inzira canke uruhusha rwo kugendesha imodoka vyiwe bwite -  canke ngo ashikirize ku mugaragaro ivyiyumviro vyiwe bikomeye. Kuba umwami birasumba umuntu ku giti ciwe. Ni amabanga atandukanye, intwaro zitandukanye, nk'uko umuhinga mu bijanye n'amategeko ajanye n'ibwirizwashingiro akaba umwigisha wa kaminuza Vernon Bogdanor abisigura. Prof Bogdanor ati: "Azwi kuva kera cane ko ingendo yiwe itegerezwa guhinduka. Abanyagihugu ntibakeneye umwami aza kwiyamamaza". Umwami Charles arazi neza ko ari ngombwa kwinengesera. Mu kiganiro na BBC mu 2018, yavuze ati: "Si ndi ikijuju. Ndazi ko kuba umwami ari igikorwa gitandukanye. Kwibaza ko nzokora nk'uko nkora ni uguhuba cane". Igihugu Umwami Charles  agiye kurongora kiratandukanye cane n'ico nyina wiwe yarazwe, mbere Prof  Bogdanor abona ko umwami mushasha azoyobora Ubwongereza burangwamwo imico n'imigenzo bitandukanye, abanyagihugu bari mu madini atandukanye. Amubonamwo nk'umuntu azogerageza kuba umuhuza, azokora uko ashoboye kwose kugira ngo yiyegereze inkehwa hamwe na ba ntahonikora. Prof Bogdanor amubonamwo kandi nk'uwuzoshigikira abanyamyuga, umuziki n'imicokama - abe cane nka Shakespeare ha kwishinga gusiganwa ku mafarasi. Ariko Sir Lloyd Dorfman yakoranye n'umwami Charles mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike mw'ishirahamwe ryiwe Prince's Trust, ntabona ko azohava yirengangiza ibibazo nkoramutima nk'ivyerekeye ihindagurika ry'ikirere n'uburimyi bukingira isi (Agriculture biologique/Organic farming). Sir Lloyd ati: "Abifisemwo ubumenyi bwinshi, kandi abikora neza cane. Biragoye kwiyumvira ko yoca abiheba ubwo nyene ku musi azoba abaye Umwami". Havugwa vyinshi ku bijanye n'uko Umwami yoba yipfuza ingoma ya cami "iciriritse". Ibi bisa n'uko yokwitaho kugira ab'ingoma y'ibwami bake bazezwa amabanga, aho Charles na Camilla, umuganwa William na Catherine ari bo boba inkingi. Umusiguzi ku vyerekeye amakuru y'i bwami,  Victoria Murphy, avuga ko n'aho bimeze uko, ubutumwa nyamukuru buzoba gukomeza amahoro n'ituze. Ati: "Ntimwitege ubudasa bunini kandi buteye ubwoba. Azokwinengesera cane". Umwanditsi Robert Hardman na we ati: "Twamye twiyumvira ko Umwamikazi ari umuntu azokwama ari mu bintu biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu vyose, ariko uretse we, uyu mwami yamye aseruka gusumba umuntu uwo ari we wese mu buzima bw'igihugu, gusumba umunyaporitike uwo ari we wese". Umwanditsi akaba n'umuhinga mu vya kahise, Sir Anthony Seldon abona ko Umwami Charles aterwa intege n'uko yabonetse ko afise ukuri ku bibazo nyamukuru, nk'igihe agabisha ku bijanye n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere. Nk'akarorero, mw'ikoraniro ry'i Glasgow ryari ryarekeye ibidukikije mu 2021, Charles yarashimagijwe cane n'abategetsi bakomeye nka Perezida  Joe Biden wa Amerika aho,  nk'uko bivugwa na  Hardman, yavuze ko igihagararo afise kw'isi kizomufasha cane nk'Umwami. Ati: "Ntivyari inkuru gusa. Aba bategetsi babiri baricaranye ahantu, hanyuma biden avuga ati: 'Watumye ibi vyose biba',". Ariko ni igiki witeze kubona muri uno mwami mushasha ? Abamuzi bavuga ko muri we afise agasoni, kandi avuga make. "Umutima wumva" ni kimwe c'ukungene bamudondora. Hariho ikimenyetso nk'umuhungu yahoze yidoga ko bamutyekeza kandi bamukumira kw'ishure. Igihe kimwe yanditse ikete rija muhira ari kw'ishure avuga ingene atuntuzwa mu buraro bw'ishire, avuga ati: "Bama bantera ikandambiri ijoro ryose canke bakankubita n'imisego canke bakanterera hanze, bakankubita cane uko bashoboye kwose". Umugore wiwe Camilla, amuvuga nk'umuntu "atihangana. Ashaka ko ibintu vyose birara bikozwe. Uko niko akora ibintu". Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure kw'isabukuru igira 70 ya Charles, yavuze ko hejuru y'ubwitonzi abantu bamubonamwo, arimwo akantu ko gukina. Camilla ati: "Bamubona nk'umuntu atafyinata, kandi nivyo. Ariko nagomba kwereka abantu ikintu c'ukwiyorosha kiri muri we. Arashira amavi hasi agakina n'abana, akabasomera udukuru wa Harry Potter mbere akaganira nabo". Charles arisanzura kandi akiyorosha iyo ari mu bantu, akiyegereza abantu mu kubatera udukuru dutwenza. Kumbure ibi bizohinduka nk'umwami, ariko igihe yri umuganwa wa Wales, yaritwaye nk'umugenzi wa bose, nka sekuru, kandi ataco yisigarije. Nk'umugabo ari mu myaka ya 70, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko Umwami azohava ahinduka. Chris Pope yakoranye na  Charles ku kigo Prince's Teaching Institute, asigura uyu mwami mushasha nk'umuntu yama afise akazi kenshi, afise umwete kandi akora cane. Pope ati: "Ni umuntu yitaho cane kazoza keza k'abari imbere. Ibi uzobibonera mu bikorwa vyinshi akora". Mu bikorwa vy'ubugiraneza nk'umuganwa harimwo gukingira iragi no kubungabunga ubuhinga kama - ariko kandi agahimiriza impinduka n'iterambere". Pope ati: "Yama afise umwitwarariko ko akaranga katotakara, ariko ibi ntibisigura ko avuga ko dukwiye gusubira ku vya kera". Inyifato y'uyu Mwami mushasha  isa n'iyishaka gufatira ibi vyose hamwe , ikintu gishobora kuboneka nko kutagira aho ahagaze, gushaka ihinduka mu gihe ashaka kubungabunga akaranga. Rimwe na rimwe, asa n'umuntu yahoze ari umurimyi wo mu kinjana ca 18. Ikindi gihe, akumvikana nk'umuntu ashavuriye ihinduka, ababajwe n'ukungene abantu bamwe bamwe batitaweho kandi bibagiwe. Hari vyinshi azokora yarazwe na nyina wiwe mu gukunda ibikorwa, ariko kandi Umwami Charles  yaratoranye ukwemera n'uburwaneza vya nyina wiwe. Hitan Mehta yarakoranye nawe kuva igihe amufasha gushinga ishirahamwe British Asian Trust  mu 2007. Mehta avuga ati: "Umutima wiwe wuzuye ubugiraneza. Nibaza ko abantu batazi urugero rw'ukungene yitaho abantu. Igihe cose yama ariko aravuga ku vyerekeye isi ashaka gusigira abuzukuru  biwe. Ni ikibazo kimuhagaritse umutima". Ibi bishobora kubonekera ku kungene ahamagarira abantu kugira ico bakoze. Mehta ati:  "Hategerezwa kuba hari nk'isaha zitatu umusi umwe, hari ku wa gatanu mw'ijoro, aho naza numva terefone yiwe akambwira ati: 'Mpejeje kwumva imyuzurira yateye muri Pakistan. None turiko dukora iki'?  Ibi ntibisigura ko ata kintu yari afise akora. Ariko yumvise ikibazo kandi ariko aragikorerako. Ni ukuri ni umuntu yitaho abandi". Avuga kuri se wiwe, umuganwa Harry avuga ati: "Uyu ni umugabo ashobora gufungura ijoro ryitereye, yaheza agaca asubira ku meza kwandika, akavamwo asinzirira kw'ikaye". Charles Philip Arthur George yavukiye ku kirimba ca  Buckingham ku wa 14 z'ukwa 11 mu 1948. Igihe BBC imenyesha ivuka ryiwe, inkuru ntiyari iy'uko Umwamikazi yavyaye umwana w'umuhungu, ahubwo yari iy'uko nyina wiwe "yibarutse umuganwa". Haciye imyaka ine, yaciye aba samuragwa. Mu kiganiro co mu 2005, Charles yavuze ati: "Nisanze navutse mfise iki kibanza. Rero ni ngombwa ko ndagikamisha. Kandi ngakora ico nshoboye cose kugira mfashe". Arongoye amashirahamwe arenga 400, hanyuma mu 1976 yatanguje ishirahamwe ryiwe bwite, Prince's Trust, akoresheje amafaranga yatekerewe avuye mu gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi (Royal Navy). Rimaze gufasha ba ntahonikora bakiri bato bababa 900.000 bava mu bice bimwe bimwe bikenye cane mu gihugu, rikaba kandi ryamutumye ashobora kubona ingorane zitari nke zijanye n'imibereho y'abantu. Imigambi yari afitiye ishirahamwe Prince's Trust kugira rishobore gushikira ico yise "abagoye gushikirwa" ntiyaguye neza abategetsi. Mu 2018, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ntibwabona ko ari iciyumviro ciza. Vyaragoranye gutangura". Igikorwa ciwe catumye yagirizwa gutoba no kwivanga muri poritike, ibi birego bikaba vyari bishingiye cane cane  ku ciswe "black spider memos" (twogereranya mu kirundi nka Inzandiko zirabura z'igitangurirwa ). Iri zina barifatiye ku nyadiko ya Charles y'igitangurigwa, aya akaba yari amakete Charles yandikira abashikiranganji bari muri reta kuva mu 2004 no kubandanya. Aya makete yinuba inzira reta yakoresha mu guhangana n'ibibazo nk'uburimi, gutunganya ibisagara, inyubako,  indero n'ibindi. Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji yarungikiwe aya makete ya Charles avuga ko atumva ko atewe igitsure cinshi, ariko abona ko umwami mushasha ari umuntu afise ivyiyumviro ntabanduka. Abona ko aje afise ivyiyumviro vyiwe ashaka kubandanya, aho kwemera kwakira ivyiyumviro bidasa n'ivyiwe. Ati: "Si numva ko mbangamiwe. Yarashikiriza ivyiyumviro vyiwe hanyuma ukaronka amakete. Si wa muntu yategeka canke yakara, ni umuntu yubaha". Ku vyo yagirizwa ko yariko aratoba, mu kiganiro yatanze mu 2006,  Charles yavuze ati: "Nimba uko ari ko kwivanga mu bintu, aho rero ndavyishimiye". Ariko aremeza ko yari mu bintu atabona "amaherezo yavyo". Ati: "Iyo ata kintu na kimwe ukoze, ata kintu na kimwe, bazokwidogera. Uhagurutse ukagerageza kugira ico ukoze kugira ngo ufashe, naho nyene barakwidogera". Mu kiganiro cakurikiye, yavuze ko yagerageje kwirinda imigambwe, ariko ko hageze aho bimubera ngombwa ko aterera ijwi hejuru ku vyerekeye "ingene abantu bari babayeho". None abanyagihugu bazoshigikira umwami Charles ku rugero rungana gute? Charles  avuga ati: "Ikintu nk'ingoma ya cami ntigishobora kumara kabiri mu gihe utokwishimikiza ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu. Erega abanyagihugu batagishatse, ntaco bazobona". Nk'uko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ikigo YouGov muri Kigarama (12) 2021 kivyerekana, abantu baramukunze cane, aho hafi bibiri vya bitagu vy'abanyagihugu bamubonamwo umuco mwiza. Ariko amatora ngereranyo abandanya amwerekana ko adakunzwe nk'uko nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi Elizabeth II, canke umuhungu wiwe umuganwa William, bakunzwe, rero haracari benshi ategerezwa kwiyegereza. Cane cane, abakiri bato ntibamwiyumvamwo cane. Victoria Murphy avuga ko ibi bishobora kuba vyerekana ingaruka y'amashusho mabi ya Charles mu mareresi no mu biganiro vy'imboneshakure ku vyerekeye umubano wiwe n'umugore wiwe wa mbere , Diana, Umuganwakazi wa Wales, yapfiriye mw'isanganya ry'imodoka mu kwa munani 1997. Aya mashusho afise kuba ari uruvangatirane rw'ay'ukuri hamwe n'amakorano, ariko afise ingaruka zikomeye. Umupfasoni Murphy ati: "Ikintu gitangaje kuva mu myaka mike iheze ni ukungene Diana abandanya agaruka mu biyago vyerekeye umuryango w'i bwami". Mu gihe Charles yariko atera yegereza ingoma, habaye ukugerageza guhindura ivyiyumviro biri mu mitwe y'abantu, nk'uko umwigisha wa kaminuza, Pauline Maclaran, abivuga. Kuva batanguye kumucisha mu dukino dutandukanye nk'akitwa Spitting Image, bukebuke yagiye yerekanwa nk'umunyacubahiro, "umushingantahe" afise ibintu ngirakamaro avuga ku vyerekeye ibidukikije, nk'uko Prof Maclaran abivuga. Kumbure ivyo abanyagihugu bipfuza na vyo nyene si ukuvuga ko vyera. Hanyuma we nk'umukuru w'umuryango w'i bwami, azotegerezwa guhangana n'ikibazo giteye inambu isi ku bivugwa ku Muganwa Harry, na Meghan, umgore wiwe, hamwe n'iimgenderanire yabo n'umuryango w'i bwami. Umwami Charles azohangana n'ibindi bibazo vyo mu muryango, nk'ivyerekeye ikibazo c'uko Umuganwa Andrew ashobora guhabwa amabanga canke ntayahabwe, ni inyuma y'umwumvikano wabaye inyuma y'ibirego vyo gufata ku nguvu vyatanzwe na Virginia Giuffre. Hanze y'Ubwongereza, ikibazo nyamukuru kizoba ugutunganya gushasha imigenderanire igezweho n'ishirahamwe Commonwealth. Nk'umukuru mushasha waryo,  ni gute mu ngendo ziwe mu bihugu vya Commonwealth azoshobora guhangana n'ibibazo vy'umurage ugoye w'ubukoloni canke ibibazo nk'ubucakara? Umwami Charles abaye umukuru w'ibihugu 14 hamwe kandi n'Ubwongereza. Bimwe muri ibi bifise kurondera ubwigenge ariko biri muri Commonwealth, mbere umwami Charles aramaze gusigura neza ko yiteguriye ibiganiro nk'abantu bakuze ku bijanye n'ivyohinduka. Hari ingingo zimaze gufatwa zoroheje inzira y'ingoma yiwe nshasha. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, yaranezerewe cane igihe nyina wiwe yafata ijambo akavuga ko Camilla akwiye kwitwa Umutambukanyi w'umwami, hakwitwa umuganwakazi. Camilla azoba kirumara cane mu gihe Charles atanguye amwe mu mabanga akomeye cane kw'isi, ku myaka y'aho hafi abantu bose baba bakukurutse. Iki ni igihe camye kimurindiriye ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Ku Mwami Charles, ik ini igihe ciwe.

headline: Thérèse Miburo, umwe mu Barundikazi bake bakora ivyo gutwenza aba muri Australia
text: Aho  igiteramo co gutwenza yariko araremesha muri Australia caboneka ku rubuga rwa Youtube, benshi ntibashobora kwemera ko ari umurundikazi ariko arakora ivyo bariko bararaba. Muri ico giteramo Thérèse Miburo agaragara ariko aratwenza abantu benshi bagizwe ahanini n'abazungu, abatera inkuru zimwerekeye we nyene canke zo mu buzima busanzwe. Avuga mu congereza cumvikana ko atari ic'uwavukiye muri Australia, ariko biboneka ko abo abwira ataco bibabwiye ahubwo bahimbawe. Mu nkuru ababwira zitwenza hari nk'aho agira ati: "... ndi uwo mu Burundi mu buseruko bwa Afrika. Mu Burundi usanga kenshi twishura ikibaza n'ikindi kibazo. Nk'akarorero ushobora kumbaza uti 'urashonje?' Nanje ngaca ngusubiza  nti 'ushaka kumpa ivyo kurya?'..." Abantu bagaca batwenga cane! Mu karere haba mu Rwanda canke mu Burundi, abakora umwuga wo gutwenza, bita stand up comedy mu congereza, baramaze kuba benshi. Nta nkeka ko no mu yandi makungu Abarundi n'Abanyarwanda bakora ivyo gutwenza bariyo, ariko ata gukekeranya abagore muri bo ni bake cane. Nico gituma BBC yashatse kumenya neza Therese Miburo uwo ariwe n'icatumye akunda ivyo gutwenza, tuvugana nawe tugirana ikiganiro gikurikira mu nyandiko: BBC Gahuza: Twibwire uwo uri we? Therese Miburo: NitwaThérèse Miburo, mfise imyaka 33, ndi Umurundikazi nkaba mba muri Australia. Amazina y'ubuhizi na yo ni Mukundabantu na Mutimukeye. Ndi umumararungu n'umuremesha kiyago. Nkunda abantu n'ubuntu mu bantu. BG: Washitse muri Australia ryari/gute? TM: Nashitse muri Australia muri 2007. Naje nk'impuzi mvuye mw'ikambi y'impunzi muri Tanzania. BG: Ufise umuryango? TM: Egome. Ndubatse mfise n'abana bane bakiri bato. BG: Ukora iki? TM: Mu buzima busanzwe ndi umwigisha w'ubuhinga bwa none (Information Technology) mu mashule yisumbuye ya hano muri Queensland, Australia aho nsanzwe mba. Ndi kandi umusiguzi w'indimi (Ikirundi, Igiswahili n'Icongereza). BG: Gutwenza abantu wabitanguye ryari? TM: Namye ntwenza ariko nkabikora mu muryango, sinari bwabishire ahabona. Mu 2019 ni ho natanguye kubishira ahabona; ntangura gusetsa abantu benshi no kubishira kuri Youtube na Facebook. BG: Ni iki catumye utangura kugira ivyo gutwenza ? TM: Ndakunda iyo mbona abantu banezerewe. Ndabikora kubera binezereza kubona nokora ibintu bigatuma abandi banezerwa. BG: Ubifata nk'umwuga canke ni uburyo bwo kwinezereza? TM: Muri uyu mwanya biracari ivyo kwinezereza ariko bishobora kuzoba n'umwuga muri kazoza ka hafi. BG: Ni abahe bakora umwuga wo gutwenza ufatariko urugero, yaba abo mu Burundi canke ayandi mahanga? TM: Buri muntu wese ndafise ico ndamwigirako ariko novuga nka Kigingi mu Burundi na Trevor Noah muri Afrika y'Epfo hari vyinshi ndabafatirako urugero, kimwe muri vyo ni uko atakidashoboka mu gihe ukora ivyo ukunda. BG: Muri iki gihe ca Covid-19 birakworohera kugira ivyo gutwenza? TM: Oya ntivyoroshe kuko abantu ntibemerewe gukoranira hamwe ari benshi. Ariko umwanya nokoresheje mu gutwenza abantu ndawukoresha mu kwandika ivyese nkabisangiza abandi kuri Youtube (Tereza Mukundabantu). BG: Ni iki wipfuza muri kazoza? TM: Muri kazoza ndipfuza kubandanya ibi vyo gutwenza abantu nshimikira cane cane mu ntumbero yo gukeburana. Ndipfuza kuzokoresha ibiteramo abantu bakaza bakanezerwa. Ndipfuza kandi no kuzofasha abakenyezi haba mu buryo no mu kubahimiriza gukoresha ingabirano zabo izo ari zo zose. Kanda ngaha urabe kimwe mu biteramo vya Tereza Mukundabantu kuri Youtube

headline: Britney Spears yagiriza nyina "gutabagaza ubuzima bwiwe"mu kubushira mu minwe y'uwundi muntu
text: Britney Spears avuga ko nyina ariwe yatumye ubuzima bw'uwo muririmvyi buja mu minwe y'uwundi muntu mu kiringo c'imyaka 13. Jamie, se w'ico camamare, niwe yamaze iyo myaka yose ariwe ajejwe mu mategeko ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe, bisigura ko ico gihe cose yari afise ijambo rito  cane ku biraba ubuzima bwiwe bwite n'amafaranga yiwe. Ariko ku vyo yanditse ku mbuga hwaniro, uwo muririmvyi avuga ko ico ciyumviro cazanywe na nyina wiwe, Lynne. Ati: "Ico abantu batazi `n'uko mama ariwe yamuhaye ico ciyumviro. Iyo myaka sinzokwigera nsubira kuyironka ... yaratabagaje ubuzima bwanje mu mpisho." Muri ivyo yari yanditse kuri Instagram ariko ubu vyafuswe, abandanya ati: "Urazi neza ivyo wakoze. Data nta bwenge afise bwo gupfa yariyumviriye ibintu nk'ivyo vyo gushira ubuzima bwanje mu minwe y'uwundi muntu, ariko muri iri joro, ndaja kumwenyura kuko nzi ko nimirije ubuzima bushasha." Ivyo Spears yanditse bisa n'uko vyoba vyatewe n'uko se yasavye ko hahagarara "ubwo nyene" kandi "ata gisabwe" ivy'uko ariwe abazwa ivy'ubuzima bwiwe. Uko vyari bitunganijwe  kwari nk'uguhabwa uwukujejwe mu mategeko ku bisanzwe bikorerwa abantu badashoboye kwifatira ingingo, nk'ababa bafise indwara zo mu mutwe. Mu nyandiko zo muri sentare BBC yaronse, abashingwamanza biwe bavuze bati:  "Jamie arakunda  kandi arashigikira umukobwa wiwe ata gisabwe. Nta kindi." "Icabaye n'uko mu myaka 13 iheze, ugushira ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe y'uwundi muntu vyari bikenewe kugira Britney akingirwe  mu nsiguro zose iryo jambo rishobora kugira. Ubuzima bwiwe bwari  mu rudubi kandi yari yugarijwe n'ibibazo bikomeye ku mubiri, mu mutwe, mu kibabarwe no mu mafaranga". "Hamaze kujaho uwubazwa ubuzima bwiwe, Britney yarashoboye kugaruka mu nzira yo kugira amaragamo muri ivyo bisata vyose vy'ubuzima. Ico gikorwa cagenze neza cane, ubu rero hakaba hageze ko Britney asubira gufata ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe." Abunganizi ba Spears bavuga ko ivyo yabisavye atawe abanje kubimenyesha kandi ko azotanga inyandiko zose zijanye n'ivyo yahora akora vyo  kubazwa ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe, avuga ko ata "na kimwe" afise "co kunyegeza". Mu vyo yanditse kuri Instagram ku wa kabiri, Britney yanadomye urutoke ku wahora atunganya imirimo yiwe Lou Taylor avuga ko yagize uruhara mu vyo gushira ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe  y'uwundi muntu. Yaba we yaba na Lynne Spears nta n'umwe aragira ico abivuzeko. Ubuzima bwa Britney Spears  bwabazwa se wiwe kuva mu 2008 igihe ibibazo vy'amagara yiwe yo mu mutwe vyatuma se asaba sentare ububasha bw'amategeko bwo kugenzura ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe. Inyuma y'imyaka y'agacerre , uwo muririmyi amaherezo  yahavuye ashira ku mugaragaro ico avyibazako mu majambo akomeye cane yavuze mu minota 23 imbere ya sentare y'i Los Angeles mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 39 yavuze ko  ubwo buzima bwo kugenzurwa bwabaye "ihohotera" kuko ngo yahawe ibiyayuramutwe, akanahatirwa  kuririmba atabishaka kandi akankirwa kuvyara abana. Yabwiye umucamanza Brenda Penny kuri terefone ati : "Ubu nshaka gusubizwa ubuzima bwanje". Se wiwe mu kwezi kw'icenda niho yashikiriza inyandiko zisaba ko ivy'uko abazwa  ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe bihagarara, ariko ntiyavuze umwanya  vyofata kugira ivyo bikorwe intambwe ku yundi. Uko kwezi,  umucamanza Penny yaciye aba aramuhagaritse vy'igihe  mu kuba ariwe abazwa ubutunzi bwa Britney (nta bintu vyiwe yabazwa kuva mu 2019). Intahe ikurikira muri urwo rubanza itegekanijwe kuba ku wa 12 uku kwezi kwa 11. Ariko n'aho uwo muririmvyi w'icamamare yokurwako ivy'uko ubuzima bwiwe bubazwa uwundi muntu, ibibazo vyiwe n'ubucamanza bishobora kutazoba birangiye. Umushingwamanza wiwe  Mathew Rosengart yagirije se wiwe  ko yitwaye nabi ku bijanye n'amafaranga kandi ko "yononye miriyoni z'ama dorari z'ubutunzi bw'umukobwa wiwe." Mu kwezi kw'icenda yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko afise "ibibazo bikomeye" ku "bishobora kuba vyarabaye ukwitwara nabi , hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'inyungu zidashbora kubangabanganwa, gukoresha nabi ububasha bwo kubazwa ubuzima bw'uwundi hamwe no kwonona bigaragara ubutunzi bwa Britney Spears" aca arahira ko " azokwihweza gushika mu mizi" inyandiko zose zijanye n'ico kibazo. Mu nyandiko yashikirije sentare muri iyi ndwi,  Rosengart yagirije kandi se wa Britney kugerageza kwirengagiza kwishura ibibazo ku bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yacungwa gushika no mu nzu iwe imbere mu buryo bwo kumufata amajwi canke kumwumviriza. Uwo mushingwamanza asaba ivyoba vyarafashwe vyose n'ibikoresho vyakoreshejwe. Jamie Spears  arahakana ivyo yagirizwa vyose, akavuga ko yamye akora mu nyungu z'umukobwa wiwe. Ivyo we nyene yashikirije sentare  vyerekana ko azotanga inyandiko zose zijanye n'ico kobazo.

headline: Burundi: BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu ico gihugu
text: Radiyo BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, nk'uko bihejeje gutangazwa n'urwego rw'Uburundi rujejwe gucungera ibimenyeshamakuru, Conseil National de la Communication (CNC). Uwurongoye urwego CNC, Madame Vestine  Nahimana, yabimenyesheje mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'inama y'abagize urwo rwego. BBC yari imaze neza na neza imyaka itatu yafatiwe ingingo yo guhagarikwa mu Burundi. Ingingo yari yafashwe itariki 29 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2019. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko mu rwego CNC baronse ikete rya BBC isaba gusubira gukorera mu Burundi  baca basanga "nta kindi gisigaye atari ukuyakira kugira ngo isubire gushira ahabona ibiganiro vyayo". CNC yari yatse BBC uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi iyagiriza kurenga amategeko agenga umwuga  wo kumenyesha amakuru muri ico gihugu  hamwe n'inyafato itajanye n'umwuga. Nta biganiro yari irekuriwe gushikiriza mu Burundi, nta n'umunyamakuru yari yemerewe kuyikorera canke kuyiha inkuru mu buryo ubwaribwo bwose muri ico gihugu kuva ico gihe. BBC yari yatswe uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi yagirizwa  gutosekaza izina rya reta yari irongowe ico gihe na prezida Pierre Nkurunziza. Na cane cane inyanduruko yavuye ku matohoza ku vyavugwa ko ari ibibanza abantu bapfungirwamwo mu kinyegero  kandi bakaborezwamwo igufa mu ntumbero yo gucecekesha abatavuga rumwe na reta, ivyo reta yiyamirije nk'"inkuru z'ibinyoma". Ico gihe BBC yumvirizwa n'abantu bangana na miriyoni 1.3 mu Burundi. Hemerewe ibinyamakuru bishasha vyinshi Ibinyamakuru bitari bike birimwo n'Ijwi rya Amerika (VOA),  Iwacu, radiyo Bonesha FM, Ikiriho n'ibindi vyarafatiwe ibihano mu bihe n'imvo bitandukanye vy'inyuma y'intureka za poritike zo mu 2015. Ivyo bihano vyari vyiyamirijwe n'amashirahamwe haranira uburenganzira bwa zina muntu nka Amnesty International yavuze ko vyari ingingo "zeruye z'abategetsi b'Uburundi mu gucecekesha ibimenyeshamakuru". Kuva presida Evariste Ndaishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi inyuma y'amatora yo mu 2020,  imwe mu ntumbero yashize imbere n'ukunagura imigendeneranire myiza n'ibihugu canke amashirahamwe atarabana ryiza na reta y'Uburundi kuva mu 2015. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ishirahamwe rya  Buraya biherutse gufuta ingingo z'ibihano  vyari vyarafatiye Uburundi. Bimwe bimwe nka Iwacu, Ikiriho na Bonesha FM  haheze igihe vyarahawe uruhusha rwo gusubira gukora. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko CNC yumviye akamo k'umukuru w'igihugu yasavye urwo rwego kuvugana n'ibinyamakuru vyari vyarafatiwe ibihano kugirango bisubire guhabwa impusha zo gukora. Muri iyo nama yemereye BBC gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, CNC yemereye kandi ama radiyo n'ama television mashasha: Dosiye y'iyindi radiyo, Radio Voix de Developpement Communautaire de Bubanza yasubijwe inyuma  kugira ije guhinyanyura ivyo  CNC yayisavye. Atangaza ko BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, umukuru wa CNC yagize ati:  "Twizeye ko tugiye kubandanya dukorana n'iyo radiyo mu ntumbero yo kubandanya twubahiriza umwuga w'abamenyeshamakuru n'ibimenyeshamakuru."
