headline: New York 'yubatswe n'ukuboko kw'Imana' - indirimbo nshasha ya Cinjire
text: Ni umuvugizi w'Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi, ariko kandi abatari bake bamuzi kw'izina rya CINJIRE, uyu si uwundi ni Pierre Nkurukiye, yahawe iryo ritazirano kubera ururirimbo n'urukurikirane rw'indirimbo yise CINJIRE rwasohotse mu 2019. Cinjire aherutse gusohora ururirimbo yise New York Chante Dieu (twovuga mu kirundi tuti New York, ririmba Imana), akavuga ko yaruririmvye ari muri ico gisagara gikomeye co muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nkurikiye alias Cinjire yabwiye BBC ko mu kuririmba iyo ndirimbo yakozweko n'ukuntu New York yubatse vy'igitangaza, ariko asanga ibibanza vyo guhimbaziramwo Imana vyariyumanganijwe. Ati: "Nshitseyo naritegereje New York ndabona ko ari igisagara cubakitse koko, n'amazu maremare cane, mugabo ngiye kurondera ibibanza canke ingoro z'Imana, nasanze ari utuzu dutoduto, umengo ntaco tumaze, ari naho naciye ngira iciyumviro co kubabwira nti baririmbe Imana. "Nahisemwo New York kuko ari bwo bwa mbere nari ngiyeyo, nabonye ibintu bitangaje, na rirya ari ikirimba c'isi yose kuko ari ho hari icicaro c'ishirahamwe ONU. "Naririmvye ivyo mbona kuko vyarantangaje kubona mu gisagara nka kiriya ata ngoro z'Imana nininini zihari kugira ngo biboneke ko nabo bayihaye ikibanza. "Rero nashimye kuhatangira ubwo butumwa kugira ngo nabo koko bahe Imana ikibanza kiyibereye kuko yabahaye ivyo vyiza bagashobora gushika kuri biriya bashoboye kwubaka". Pierre Nkurikiye alias Cinjire avuga ko yatanguye kwandika indirimbo yiga mu mwaka wa kane w'amashure y'intango. Ati: "Niho natanguriye buke buke kuririmba". Yabandanije aririmba mw'isengero kubera yari mu mihari ya Gatorika, akaba yari mu muhari w'aba Scout. Ivy'umuziki ugezweho yagiye kubitangura ageze muri kaminuza y'inyamiramabi, ari ho yatanguye gukora ururirimbo rwa mbere rukozwe muri studio, asanzwe ari intwazangabo mu gipolisi c'Uburundi. Ati: "Kuririmba n'amabanga nsanzwe njejwe biranyorohera kuko ni ubutumwa bumwe. "Mu ndirimbo zanje nsaba abantu gushira imbere ineza bakarwanya ikibi, urwego ndimwo rw'inyamiramabi narwo rujejwe kurwanya ikibi, urumva rero ko ari ibintu bijanye". Yagiye gusohora urukurikirane rw'indirimbo (album) rwa mbere mu 2019 yise CINJIRE, izina rizwi cane yahavuye yitirirwa gushika ubu. Pierre Nkurikiye alias Cinjire avuga ko mu Burundi hakiri ikibazo nyamukuru ku banyamuziki kuko umuziki utaratangura guhemba neza canke kubeshaho abawukora nk'uko bimeze mu bindi bihugu. "Abumviriza imiziki ntibaturiha, haracariho ikibazo", niko avuga, akizera ariko y'uko mu misi iri imbere ibintu bishobora guhinduka kuko hari "amategeko ariko arahinyanyurwa". Hagati aho, avuga ko akarusho gakomeye ari uko ashoboye gushikiriza ubutumwa bwiwe uko abona ibintu, "hanyuma abantu bakabwakira bakagira ico babuvuzeko, kandi bukanagira ico bubahinduyeko". Ati: "Utanze ubutumwa ntihabura n'umwe buhindura. Ururirimbo rwanje ndarutanze ntirubura n'umwe ruryohera rukamunezera, kubwanje iyo niyo nyungu ihambaye". Nkurikiye aranegura ukungene abarundi bahurumbira umuziki wo hanze, ariko akavuga ko ahanini biva ku nzira uzananamwo, inzira avuga ko ari iz'abazungu bafise intumbero zabo n'uburyo bwo gukundisha ibintu vyabo. Ati: "Abarundi barakunda ivy'iwabo ariko baraneshwa n'ibiba bivuye hanze kuko akenshi biza mu nzira z'itangazamakuru atari iz'abarundi". Abona ko amaradiyo n'imboneshakure bidaha umwanya ukwiye indirimbo n'utugenegene vy'Uburundi nk'uko biri mu bindi bihugu avuga ko amaze kujamwo, aho usanga "indirimbo n'imico kama babiha 80%", akabona ko ari ukutamenya. Ati: "Uburundi burikwije haba mu mvyino, mu ntambo, mu ngoma n'ibindi bijanye n'imico n'imigenzo vy'Uburundi". Atera akamo ibimenyeshamakuru guha ikibanza kinini ivyo "ng'aha iwacu mu Burundi", akavuga ko bifise akanovera kuko biba ari ibintu bitarononwa.

headline: Astro azwi mu ndirimbo nka Kingston Town, Red Red Wine ari muri UB40 yashengeye
text: Umunyamuziki w'umwongereza akongera akaba n'umwe mu batanguje umurwi UB40 Terence Wilson, azwi cane kw'izina rya Astro, yapfuye ku myaka 64. Astro umuririmvyi yaririmbanye n'uyu murwi wo mu mudiho wa reggae mu kiringo c'imyaka irenga 30 yahitanywe n'indwara y'igihe gito, nk'uko vyemezwa n'umurwi yari asanzwe aririmbamwo. Itangazo ryacishijwe ku rubuga n'umurwi Ali Campbell and Astro rivuga riti:  "Turababaye cane. Isi yose irabuze intwari". Astro yasezeye mu murwi UB40 mu 2013 akaba yagiye kubandanya n'umurwi wiyonkoye UB40 featuring Ali Campbell and Astro, ukaba wari umaze kuremesha ibiteramo bitari bike muri uno mwaka. Wari witeze kuzunguruka ugenda uremesha ibiteramo mu mwaka uza wa 2022. Umurwi wiwe wa mbere watangujwe mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1980 n'umudiho wa reggae wisangije kamere, ukaba waramenyekanye cane mu miziki itari mike harimwo nka Red Red Wine na Can't Help Falling In Love. Uyu murwi wa Birmingham wagurishije ama casettes arenga imiriyoni 70 kandi imiziki yawo iraba iya mbere mu Bwongereza ku ncuro zitatu zose. Itangazo ry'abagize umurwi UB40 wa kino gihe wanditse kuri twitter uti: "Wiruhukire mu mahoro Astro. "Muri iri joro twumvise inkuru y'umubabaro ko uwahoze mu murwi UB40, Terence Wilson, azwi kw'izina rya  Astro, yasandavye inyuma y'indwaya y'igihe gito. Turahojeje umuryango wiwe". Muri rusangi, UB40 yasohoye indirimbo 39 muri 40 za mbere mu Bwongereza, yongera isohora album 28 muri 40 za mbere mu gihugu, na Astro akaba ari we yari umuririmvyi mukuru mu ndirimbo Rat In Mi Kitchen yabaye iya 12 mu 1987. Uyu murwi kandi waramenyekanye cane kw'isi yose, harimwo no muri Amerika, aho indirimbo Red Red Wine yabaye iya mbere, nk'uko vyagenze no ku yindi yitwa, Can't Help Falling in Love with You, yamaze amayinga indwi yose ari yo yiganje mu 1993. Aba mbere mu bagize uyu murwi baramaze imyaka 30 yose baririmbira hamwe imbere y'uko Ali Campbell  awusezera mu 2008. Mu kiganiro Astro yagiranye na The Guardian mu kwa gatanu, yavuze ko uyu murwi umaze gushingwa mu 1978 wahindutse ijwi ry'abanyagihugu batishimiye ibijanye na poritike hamwe n'ibibazo bihanze isi. Yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko nawe yabonye "amabwa nk'ayo abandi birabure bose bahuye nayo mu mpera z'imyaka ya 1970", aha akaba yashaka kuvuga itegeko ryaha uburenganzira igipolisi guhagarika no gusaka abantu bafatwa ko bateye amakenga - ivyo Astro avuga ko vyama biba buri ndwi. Ati: "Twabonye vyari bigoye kwandika indirimbo z'urukundo gusumba indirimbo z'abarwanira agateka kabo, kubera vyari vyoroshe cane kwandika ku bintu wewe nyene wiboneye canke wasomye ahantu. Yari kamere yacu". Mu 2016, uyu munyamuziki yabwiye urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'Ubwongereza UK Music Reviews ko iri ritazirano yarironse akiri umwana kubera yambara ibirato vya Dr Martens vyari bizwi nka "Astronaut". Yongeyeko ati: "Ku gihamana ciza, nta muntu yigeze anyita astronaut kuko ari ijambo rirerire, ari naco gituma baciye barigabanya bafata Astro, kandi kuva ubwo ryaciye ringumako". Abajijwe ingene yiyumva iyo ariko arazunguruka aremesha ibiteramo, Astro yavuze ati: "Nta kazi kuri iyi si koguha umunezero nk'uwo ndonka. Jewe ndiho kugira ngo ndirime". Mu kw'umunani, uwundi mugenzi bakoranye muri UB40 batangranye uyu murwi Brian Travers yarapfuye ahitanywe na kanseri ku myaka 62.

headline: 'Bavuga ko ngiye kwiga ububoyi' - Nzitonda Steve Berger
text: Nzitonda Steve Berger aramaze kugira inzu yiwe y'uburiro (restaurant) mu gisagara ca Bujumbura  kandi yatanguye kwiga guteka bamutwenga ngo ariko ariga ububoyi. Uwo musore w'imyaka 32 avuga ko yatanguye gukunda guteka akiri muto, akaba yabigize umwuga afise imyaka 17. Ubu akoresha abakozi indwi. Ariko uwo musore avuga ko kwiga uwo mwuga mu gisagara bitari vyoroshe kuko benshi bamuca intege. Agira ati:"Guteka mu gisagara uri umuhungu, ntivyoroshe. Bamwe mu bagenzi bavuga ko ndiko ndiga umwuga w'ikiboyi". Nzitonda Steve avuga ko abavyeyi bamushigikiye kuko babona ariko akora ivyo akunda. Ati:"Barababwira amajambo ariko kubera babona ndabikunda barandetse. Aranyuzamwo akavuga ko " nkeka na bo nyene hari aho bashika bagakekeranya n'aho batabivuga". Mu bakiriya ba Steve Berger harimwo abamubona baje kugura imfungurwa bagakanguka babonye ari we ariko arabiteka. Darlene Nahayo ati:"Vyari bitangaje uje kugura ikintu ukabona wakiriwe n'umuhungu  hanyuma ukabona niwe ariko aranagitegura. Ubwa mbere twarakanguka." Ariko avuga ko ari ingendo nziza n'abandi bakwiye gukurikiza, bakabona ko ata mwuga udakiza kandi ata mwuga ugenewe abahungu canke abakobwa gusa.

headline: China: Uwakoze urukino rwa video 'Game of Thrones' yishwe ahawe ishano
text: Igipolisi ca Shanghai kivuga ko umugwizatunga w'umushinwa yapfuye kuri Noheli yahawe ishano. Lin Qi w'imyaka 39 yari arongoye akaba n'umunyamabanga mukuru wa kompanyi ikora inkino zo kuri video Yoozoo izwi cane ku rukino rwa Game of Thrones: Winter is Coming. Itangazo ry'igipolisi ca Shanghai ritunga agatoke uwo bakorana na Lin - azwi kw'izina rimwe gusa rya Xu- ko ari we yikekwa. Lin yoba yarafise ubutunzi bwa miriyaridi 6.8 z'ama Yuan (imiliyoni 980 z'ama pawundi) nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo ca Hurun China Rich List. Kuri uyu wa gatanu, abakozi benshi hamwe n'abahoze bakora muri kompanyi Yoozoo bakoraniye hanze y'ibiro vyayo mu kumugandarira. Uwo mugwizatunga yari rurangiranwa kw'isoko ry'ubushinwa rigurisha inkino za video akaba yari yanatanguye urudandazwa rwo gusohora filime. Yashinze Yoozoo mu 2009, arongora neza iyo kompanyi mu gihe hariko haraba impinduka nyinshi ziganisha ku nkino zo kuri telephone ngendanwa. N'iyo kompanyi yasohoye itangazo ribabaje ku rubuga rwayo rwa Weibo Microblog. Rivuga riti:"Turikebanuye ugiye ukiri muto. Tuzokwama turi kumwe. Tuzogumana ubwitonzi, tubandanye kwemera ubugwaneza kandi tuzokwamirira kure ikintu cose kibi." Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bagize ico bavuze kuri urwo rwandiko, rwarabwe n'abantu incuro zirenga imiliyoni 290 kuri Weibo.

headline: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ku rutonde rwa Forbes
text: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ari ku rutonde rw'ikinyamakuru co muri Amerika, gitanga udushimwe, Forbes. Ni urutonde rw'abagore 8 ba mbere muri Afrika, baranzwe n'ibikorwa bihindura ubuzima bw'abandi cane cane abari mu bibazo bakeneye gufashwa. Isabelle Kamariza yashimwe kubera ikigo ciwe 'SolidAfrica', kigemurira abarwayi badashobora kwifungurira mu bitaro bine mu Rwanda. Yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera, atangura amubaza uko yakiriye ako gashimwe (umviriza aho hejuru).

headline: Espérance Mukashema uzwi kuri Radio Ubumwe yapfuye azize uburwayi mu Buholande
text: Umupfasoni Espérance Mukashema asanzwe azwi mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda yapfuye azize indwara aho yari yarahungiye mu Buholande. Uyu mupfasoni ari mu barokotse Jenoside yo mu Rwanda yari umwe mu basaba ko Abanyarwanda bose bumva ko bakozweko n'iyo Jenoside. Espérance Mukashema n'umugabo wiwe bompi bari abatutsi. Umugabo wiwe wa mbere yishwe n'abahutu b'intagondwa, avuga ko umuhungu wiwe nawe yishwe n'abasirikare ba FPR/RPF b'ico gihe. Mukashema asize yanditse agatabo yise "Bishe Umumalayika", karimwo igishingantahe c'ivyabaye muri ubwo bwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa mu mwaka wa 1994 mu Rwanda. Muri ako gatabo, avuga ingene imfura yiwe yari ifise imyaka umunani yishwe n'abasirikare avuga ko bari aba FPR. Ati: "Bishe umumalayika, ni ukuvuga ngo bishe umwana yari ataramenya ubwenge, wicaye ku bibero vya Musenyeri Gasabwoya, abasirikare b'inkotanyi bari bayobowe na Fred Ibingira, baraza bamurasa mu mugongo, acikamo kabiri". "Kuba umumalayika rero, ntabwo yabonye ko ari abagizi ba nabi, ntabwo yari azi ivy'ari vyo. Ni ukwica umuntu utabarwanya, utazi ikibi n'iciza, ari umwana mutoyi". Umupfasoni Mukashema yasaba Abanyarwanda kwiyubaka, bakirinda inzika n'inzangano. Avuga mu gihe co kwibuka umwana wiwe, yagize ati: "Ibibazo vyabaye iwacu vyabaye kuri buri Munyarwanda wese, Umunyarwanda wese afite ibikomere, yarakomeretse, Umunyarwanda wese yarababaye. "Icabivura ni uko twese twafatana mu mugongo, tukabona ko ikibazo atari icumwe, ariko ko ari ica twese nk'Abanyarwanda". Mukashema yumvikanaga anenga ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda kuri radio ikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi yitwa Ubumwe. Yagiye ifatwa ko ari iy'urunani MRCD-Ubumwe rw'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mu Rwanda yose ikorera mu mahanga, ruvugwa mu rubanza rwa Paul Rusesabagina n'abandi bantu 20 rubandanya mu Rwanda.

headline: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: 20-26 Ukwezi kw'umunani 2021
text: Amwe amwe mu mafoto meza cane muri Afrika n'ahandi. Amafoto yose afitiwe uruhusha rwo kuyakoresha.

headline: Reggae: Ivyo kumenya kuri The Wailers ubwo uwanyuma muri bo yashengeye
text: Bunny Wailer niwe yari aramvye cane mu bo bashinze hamwe umugwi The Wailers, abandi babiri, Bob Marley na Peter Tosh barapfuye, uwa mbere muri 1981 ahitanywe na cancer ku myaka 36, uwa kabiri mu 1987 agandaguwe n'abasuma ku myaka 43. Bunny Wailer w'i Kingston, yakuranye na Bob Marley. Bafatanije bararimvye indirimbo zabaye rurangiranwa mu makungu nka Simmer Down na Stir Up, imbere y'uko Wailer afata inzira yo kuririmba ukwa wenyene mu 1974. Ntiyahagaritse gutera imbere kuko yararonse incuro zitatu zose agashinmwe gakomeye cane mu muziki Grammys aranambikwa ikidari ca Jamaica ca Ordre de Merite mu 2017. Yapfuye ku wa kabiri mu gitondo, ariko icateye urupfu rwiwe nticamenyekanye n'ubwo yari mu bitaro kuva agize AVC mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020. Nta nkeka, abashimagiza uwo muririmvyi bashwaye imbuga hwaniro bakimenya urupfu rwiwe, abanyamuziki nkawe nabo bavuga ko yari "harabaye". Umuririmvyi azwi mu gutamba cane aririmba Shaggy yanditse kuri Facebook ati: "Iki ni kimwe mu bihe bibi muri kahise k'akaranga kacu. Waduteye kwishima mwami. Ruhuka neza." "Oh yemwe, Imana ihezagire Bunny Wailer," uwo nawe n'uwo muri Redd Hot Chili Peppers avuza guitare bass, Flea. Andrew Holness ministre wa mbere wa Jamaica ntiyatanzwe mu gushimagiza uwo muririmvyi, yavuze ko urupfu rwiwe ari "agahombo kanini kuri Jamaica na reggae". Bunny Wailer izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ryari Neville O'Riley Livingston. Yari yavutse ku wa 20/4/1947, amara imyaka yiwe ya mbere mu kigwati ca Nine Miles aho yarezwe na se Thaddeus yacuruza imangazini y'ivyo kurya. Aho niho yahuriye ubwa mbere na Bob Marley, ivyo bitambambuga badatevye baca baba abagenzi bakomeye, bakorana umuziki wabo ubwa mbere bari kumwe kw'ishure ry'intango n'iryisumbuye rya Stepney. Se wa Bob Marley amaze gupfa mu 1955, nyina, Cedella, yaciye abana na se wa Livingston. Abo bahungu bakuze barezwe nk'abavukana na cane cane aho cedella na Thaddeus bavyariye umukobwa, Pearl. Bamaze kwimukira Trenchtown muri Kingston, baciye bahura na Peter Tosh baca bashinga umugwi wo kuririmbira hamwe witwa The Wailing Wailers - kuko, nk'uko Bob Marley yabivuze: "Twatanguye dusemerera." Aho baba harangwa n'ubukene n'ubukozi bw'ikibi. Livingston mu nyuma yibutse ingene yakoze igitari ciwe ca mbere akoresheje "imigano, imirya akuye mu ntsinga z'amatara, n'igikopo kinini cavuyemwo sardines". Ariko umuririmvyi Joe Higgs batazira "the Godfather of Reggae" (umuhagarikizi wa reggae), yaba hafi yaciye ashira abo bahungu mu kwaha kwiwe. Abafashije, baciye  banonosora umuziki wabo, bongeramwo ijwi rya Junior Braithwaite n'abaririmvi basasira Beverly Kelso na Cherry Green imbere y'uko bagabanya izina ry'umugwi wabo ugasigara witwa The Wailers. Mu kwa 12 mu 1963, uwo mugwi wagiye muri Studio One ya Coxsone Dodd gufata amajwi y'indirimbo Simmer Down, indirimbo Bob Marley yari yanditse asaba amahoro mu ma quartiers y'abakene ya Kingston. Iyo ndirimbo ntiyatevye gukundwa, iraduga gushika ku nomero ya mbere muri Jamaica. Baciye bayikurikiza Duppy Conqueror, imbere y'uko basohora  urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere (album) The Wailing Wailers, mu 1965. Bidatevye mu nyuma y'aho, hari akaciyemwo mu mugwi, aho Bob Marley amariye kurongora akimukira muri Amerika, nawe Livingston akamara umwaka mu munyororo kubera gufatanwa urumogi. Ariko barashoboye gusohora single (urukurikirane rw'indirimbo zitarenga 3) 28 hagati ya 1966 na 1970 imbere y'uko basohora album yabo ya kabiri, Soul Rebels. Izina rikomeye mu makungu barironse imyaka itatu inyuma y'aho kuri Catch A Fire  -indirimbo ya mbere bakoreye inzu yo gusohora indirimbo ya Chris Blackwell, Island Records. The Wailers bari  bamaze igihe baremesha ibiterambo mu Bwongereza bari kumwe na Johnny Nash, mu nyuma babura amafaranga yo kuriha ama tike yo kubasubiza iwabo. Blackwell aca yemera kubaha contrat ya Island, aca abaha ingurane (avance) yo kugura ama tike n'ayo gukora album muri Jamaica. Ariko ntibanezerejwe n'ingene indirimbo zabo zongeye guhingurwa kugira zihabwe akabirya ku bazumva mu makungu. Ariko iyo album ntiyaguzwe cane haba mu Bowngereza canke muri Amerika naho yahavuye ifatwa nk'imwe muri rurangiranwa. Mbere ikinyamakuru Rolling Stone Magazine ubu vuba cayigize iya 140  ku rutonde rwaco rwa albums 500 zirengeye ibihe (albums of all time) gifatiye ku ndirimbo zayo Concrete Jungle na Slave Driver. Ikibanza ciza kw'isoko caciye gikurikira na Burnin' yo mu 1973 ku ndirimbo nka I shot the Sheriff, Small Axe hamwe na Get Up Stand Up. Ariko niyo yabaye album ya nyuma ya The Wailers isohowe n'abatanguye uwo mugwi bari kumwe bose. Ukutumvikana kwari kwatanguye igihe Island yagurisha indirimbo zabo kw'izina rya Bob Marley and The Waliers, hamwe n'ikirangaminsi co kuzunguruka baririmba catumye Livingston amara igihe atari kumwe n'umuryango wiwe. Yaciye agenda mu 1973, avuga ko ubuzima bwo kuzunguruka budahuye n'ukwemera kwiwe kw'umu Rasta - avuga nko kurya indya zihinguwe hamwe no kuririmba mu bibanza bitabereye. Mu nyuma yavuze ko kumenyekana cane ari umwansi wo kwiyumvira ibishasha. "Umuziki uhagaze ku kugira ico ufatiyeko, iyo rero uri ahantu uri epfo na ruguru, aha na hariya, n'umuziki wawe niko uzokwumvikana," niko Livingston yabwiye The Los Angeles Times mu 1986. "Abantu baratwarwa no kuba rurangiranwa kandi ivyo bitandukanye no kuba umwanditsi, umunyamuziki, uwufasha abandi gutunganya umuziki wabo n'uwushira umuziki mu buhinga mwiza." Amaze kuva muri uwo mugwi, yaciye atangura gukora kuri album ya wenyene , Blackheart Man, yarimwo indirimbo zizwi nka Dreamland na Fighting Against Conviction, yiyumviriye igihe yari mw'ibohero. Yabandanije asohora album zakunzwe cane harimwo Rock 'n' Groove yo mu 1981 na Bunny Wailer Sings The Wailers yo mu 1980, aho yasubiyemwo zimwe mu ndirimbo bari bararirimbanye n'abandi mu mugwi. Mu myaka ya 1990 yaronse Grammy award ya album za reggae za mbere nzinza kurusha izindi incuro zitatu, aho hose akaba yagumye akomeza kandi agumya iragi rya Bob Marley na Wailers: iyo mu 1991, Time Will Tell: A Tribute to Bob Marley; iyo mu 1995, Crucial! Roots Classics; n'iyo mu 1997, A Tribute to Bob Marley's 50th Anniversary (guhimbaza imyaka 50 y'isabukuru ya Bob Marley). "Ndanezerezwa no kumenya ko ndiko ndafasha inzira yo gushikana reggae aho igeze. Ndashimishwa no kubigiramwo uruhara'', ivyo yabibwiye Washinton Post mu 2006.

headline: MISS KAYANZA: Neilla Mutoniwimana niwe yatsinze, imbonekarimwe ku Batwa mu Burundi
text: "Ni iteka rinini kuri jewe nk'umukobwa w'umutwakazi kubona narashoboye gutsinda ihiganwa rya Miss Kayanza, ibitari bimenyerewe mu gihugu ko ubwoko bw'abatwa buja mu mahiganwa nk'ayo". Uyo ni Neilla Mutoniwimana, umwigeme w'umutwakazi yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Miss Kayanza, aho avuga ko yiteguriye no kuja mu yandi mahiganwa ku rwego rw'igihugu. Miss Kayanza ni ihiganwa rihuza abigeme bo mu ntara ya Kayanza ryatanguye kuva mu mwaka wa 2012 rikaba ritegurwa n'umurwi Umuco w'aba SCOUT. Yatowe mu bandi umunani bari muri iryo higanwa rigize icenda ryabaye ku wa 01 /01/2020, inyuma y'amezi atatu yose bari bamaze bitegura. Kubwo ishirahamwe ryateguye uyo mwigeme, intsinzi ya Neilla Mutoniwimana, ni amateka adasanzwe muri kahise k' u Burundi. Neilla Mutoniwimana ni umutwakazi yiga mu mwaka wa 12 kw'ishure ryisumbuye rya Muhanga avuka ku mutumba wa Gashibuka, ya zone na komine Muhanga  mu ntara ya Kayanza. Avugana na BBC, umwigeme Mutoniwimana ahanura abandi bigeme b'abatwakazi kureka kwikumira bakaja hamwe n'abandi, maze bashobore kugira uruhara mu kintu ico ari co cose giteguwe mu Burundi. Kubw'iwe, iyo wikumiriye, n'abandi baragukumira. Ati: "Narerekanye neza ko na twebwe dushoboye mu bintu vyose. Jewe sinikumira, iyaba narikumiriye sinari gushobora kuja muri iri higanwa. Nagize umwete kugira ngo nshobore kuvyifatamwo neza". Ku bateguye ihiganwa, uyo mwigeme yerekanye ubukerebutsi budasanzwe. Gilbert Biziyaremye arongoye  umuhari wa SCOUT mu ntara ya Kayanza ariwo wateguye iryo higanwa avuga ko vyabanezereje kuko bwari ubwa mbere babonye umwigeme w'umutwakazi asumbije abahutukazi n'abatutsikazi bari basanzwe batsindira iryo higanwa. Ati: "Mu gihe turiko turabategura twabona umengo ntavyo azoshobora, vyabonetse ko yari yibitse, maze ibintu bikomeye cane aca avyerekanira imbere y'abarorerezi". "Nivyo ko hahora hatsinda abahutukazi n'abatutsikazi gusa, ariko abibaza ko twoba twashize imbere ivyo ubwoko kugira ngo nabo baserukirwe sivyo na gato, yarabasumbije". Neilla Mutoniwimana yateguwe n'ishirahamwe Fondation FEMIDEJABAT risanzwe ririko rirategura ihiganwa MISS INAKARANGA  rizohuza abigeme b'abatwakazi mu gihugu cose. Nk'uko bivugwa na Isaac Bakanibona, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wa FEMIDEJABAT akaba kandi ariwe ahagarariye MISS INAKARANGA, iryo higanwa rifise intumbero yo guhimiriza abigeme b'abatwa no kubategura kugira ngo bazoshobore kwitabira ihiganwa rya MISS BURUNDI. Bwana Bakanibona  yabwiye BBC ko ari ibintu bihimbaye kubona umwana bateguye ashoboye guhiganwa n'abandi mbere akanabatsinda. Ati: " Twaramuhimirije twongera turamurungika kuja guhiganwa n'abandi bigeme bo mu Kayanza, arashikiriza imigambi y'imbonekarimwe yatangaje abari aho bose ku buryo yabonetse ko ari intwari n'incabwenge idasanzwe". Ahimiriza Abarundi n'amakungu ko boshigikira abigeme b'abatwakazi, eka n'abandi bigeme bose baboneka ko basigaye inyuma mu mateka kugira ngo nabo bashobore gufashwa, maze batere intambwe bashike ku rugero abandi bariko. Ati: "Kuko birerekana neza ko ata muntu n'umwe, iyo ashigikiye canke afashwe mu mugongo, atoshobora ikintu ico ari co cose". Mutoniwimana yarushije abariko bahiganwa nawe mu migambi yashikirije yo guteza imbere abigeme b'abatwakazi hamwe n'abandi bigeme muri rusangi, mu kubahimiriza kuja hamwe n'abandi, bakaja mu mashure bakirinda imbanyi z'ishushu zituma abigeme bamwe batabandanya amashure. Bwana Bakanibona avuga ko muri rusangi abigeme b'abatwa bakwije ibisabwa vyose muri ayo mahiganwa ahuza abigeme, ariko ko igikenewe ari ukubafata mu mugongo. Ati: "Twebwe nta bwoba dufise, no mw'ihiganwa rya MISS BURUNDI, ni ryategurwa neza, turizeye neza ko abo bana bacu tubandanya dutegura bazovyifatamwo neza bagatahana ikibanza ciza". Mu Burundi, Abarundi bo mu bwoko bw'Abatwa ni inkehwa zari zaribagiwe mu buzima bw'igihugu kuva imyaka itari mike, bamye bikumira, aho wasanga no mu kugabangana ubutegetsi bataharurwamwo. Hagati aho, amasezerano y'amahoro yateweko igikumu mu mwaka wa 2000 agatuma intambara yari yari yadutse hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi mu 1993 igaharara, yarategekanijwe ibibanza vy'Abatwa mu bisata bitandukanye bigize ubuzima bw'igihugu. Haranatangujwe mbere n'amashirahamwe afise intumbero yo guhimiriza Abatwa kugira ngo bikangure baje hamwe n'abandi. Hagati aho, n'aho bamwe bariko barajijuka, haracibonekeza abatari bake bikumira, bakabona ko bobo atari nk'abandi barundi bagenzi babo b'Abahutu n'Abatutsi.

headline: Lil Uzi Vert: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika yihomye mu gahanga diyama ya miliyoni 24 $
text: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika Lil Uzi Vert yavuzweko vyinshi ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi inyuma yo gukoresha amadolari imiliyoni 24 mu kugura ubutare bupima kara 11 yahomye kuruhanga rwiwe. Inkuru zitangwa na BBC igisata ca Pidgin, zivuga ko yaguze ubwo butare mu nzu y'ubudandarizo ya Elliot Eliante ku madolari imiliyoni 24. Lil Uzi Vert yatumye haba amajambo menshi y'abakunzi biwe kw'isi yose igihe yerekana video y'ingene ubu asa, agaca anandika ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi ya Instagram ngo " Ubwiza burababaza" (Beauty is Pain). Izina nyaryo rya Lil Uzi Vert ni Symere Bysil Woods, umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika w'umudiho wa Rap, akaba n'umwanditsi w'indirimbo. Yavutse itariki 31 mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 1994 mu buraruko bwa Philadelphia i Francisville muri Amerika. Ikintu gituma uwo muririmvyi atandukana n'abandi, n'ibicapo afise ku mubiri (Tatoo), n'ingene yagiye aritobora mu maso, ingene agenda ahindura uko yisokoza n'inyambaro ya kera. Lil Uzi yamenyekanye cane inyuma yo gushira ahabona ururirimbo rwiwe rwa Luv is Rage mu mwaka wa 2015. Izindi ndirimbo zatumye aba rurangiranwa ni nk'ururirimbo rwiwe  Money Longer yaririmvye mu 2016, You was Right, Gucci Mane, Bad na Bouje iza mu kibanza ca 100 kuri Billboard muri Amerika hamwe na Tour Life rwatumye ahabwa agashimwe ka MTV k'ururirimbo rwa mbere mu gihe c'ubushuhe. Bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yoba afise ubutunzi bushika ku miliyoni 16 z'amadolari, ariko ko hagati y'umwaka wa 2017 na 2018 yoba yararonse imiliyoni 20 avuye mu ndirimbo aririmbira ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi hamwe n'ibiteramo vyiwe.

headline: Tanzania: Basaba ko Diamond Platnumz akurwa mw'ihiganwa rya BET kubera avugira Magufuli
text: Abantu barenga 18.000 muri Tanzania bateye igikumu ku rwandiko (petition) rusaba ko wa muririmvyi rurangiranwa Diamond Platnumz akurwa ku rutonde rw'ihiganwa rya Amerika, bamwagiriza ko "yakingira ikibaba" uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu. Diamond, umwe mu baririmvyi rurangiranwa muri Afrika, ari ku rutonde rw'abahiganirwa agashimwe gahabwa abanyatugenegene bakomeye kw'isi kiswe Best International Act, gatangwa n'imboneshakure BET (Black Entertainment Television). Ariko abateguye uru rwandiko bagereranya uyu muririmvyi mu buryo butabereye n'abaherutse gutahukana ihiganwa rya BET bo muri Nigeria Davido na Burna Boy, abaririmvyi bazwi cane muri ico gihugu. Ku bw'aba bateguye uru rwandiko, aba baririmvyi babiri "bakoresha inguvu zabo bafise n'ubuhangange bwabo mu gutera amashurwe akarenganyo" muri ca gihe c'imyiyerekano yitiriwe #EndSARS mu mwaka uheze yari ifise intumbero yo gusaba ko reta ifuta ca gipolisi citswe SARS. Ikinyamakuru NairobiNews co muri Kenya, candika ko Diamond Platnumz yari ashigikiye cane uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania, John Pombe Magufuli, kandi ko umwe mu miziki yiwe wakoreshejwe n'umugambwe CCM uri ku butegetsi mu gihe c'imyiyamamazo y'umwaka uheze. Gisubiramwo ivyanditse muri uru rwandiko, iki kinyamakuru candika kiti: "Diamond Platnumz ni umuririmvyi rurangiranwa wa Tanzania azwi cane kw'isi yakoresheje ukumenyekana kwiwe n'ubuhinga bwiwe mu kuvugira no gukingira ikibaba itoteza ribi cane ry'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu yatwaza umukazo John Magufuli n'ubutegetsi bwiwe". "Diamond kandi ni incuti pfa mpfe kandi akorana urudandaza na Paul Makonda yahoze ari umukuru w'igisagara ca Dar-es-Salaam yatoteje ku mugaragaro kandi akanahiga buhongo abahuza ibitsina babisangiye (LGBTI)". Magufuli, yasandavye mu kwa gatatu haciye imisi mike ashikirijwe amabanga yo kurongora Tanzania mu kiringo kigira kabiri, yaragirijwe ko yahonyanga uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyiyumviro no gutoteza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwiwe. Iki kinyamakuru  gikorera ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi candika ko n'abo bimeze uko, hari n'imiburiburi umushingamateka umwe - Nusrat Hanje - yamuguye inyuma aramuvugira, ati "turamusengera kugira ngo atahukane aka gashimwe".

headline: Andy Mwag: Ivyo ndirimba muri 'Nisaidie Papa' vyambayeho
text: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Andy Mwag, aheruka gusohora indirimbo ziryoheye ugutwi, avuga ko mu vyo aririmba harimwo ubuzima bubi yaciyemwo. Ni indirimbo zivanzemwo ikirundi, ikinyarwanda igifaransa, icongereza hamwe n'igiswahiri, vyumvikana ko zitondewe muri studio wumvirije ingene zivuga. Andy Mwaga, asanzwe yitwa Ndabaneze Andre, yatanguye kuririmba mu mwaka w'2007. Kuri ubu aba mu gihugu c'u Rwanda kuva mu 2015 akaba yubatse afise n'abana babiri. Igihe yatangura kuririmba, yatanguriye mw'isengero, hanyuma nk'uko avyivugira aca aja muri "bands zisanzwe", n'ukuvuga imigwi y'umuziki itaririmba indirimbo z'Imana. Wumvirije neza indirimwo za Andy Mwaga, nk'indirimbo Get There canke Amarira, wumva umudiho ukwibutsa abaririmvyi ba rurangiranwa nka Lokua Kanza wo muri Kongo canke Ismael Lo wo muri Senegal. Kanatsinda Andy Mwag we nyene arivugira ko Lokua Kanza ari mu baririmvyi bamuhaye ingoga zo kuririmba, anafatirako mu kwandika ibihangano vyiwe. Wumvirije indirimbo nyinshi zisohoka muri iki gihe yaba mu Burundi canke mu Rwanda, usanga ahanini zibanda ku mudiho utambika, indirimbo za Andy Mwaga ziruhura amaguru kuko uca wumva ushaka kwicara ukumviriza, zigashika ku mutima. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Andy Mwaga avuga ko indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe Nisaidie Papa, yayanditse afatiye ku buzima bwiwe bwite. Nta vyinshi yabivuzeko ariko ababaye mu Burundi mu mpere y'imyaka y'1990, baribuka ko hibonekeje abana benshi bo mw'ibarabara ahanini kubera intambara. Ico gihe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura haradutse abana benshi baza barasaba mw'ibarabara uwo bahuye nawe wese, bavuga mu giswahili bati "Nisaidie papa" bisigura mu kirundi ngo "mfasha papa". Si kenshi mu karere haza abaririmvyi baririmba bigashika ku mutima, bazi umuziki (kuvuza ivyuma bitandukanye) kandi bafise igihagararo n'igikundiro. Niyabandanya ku murindi ariko, abakunzi b'umuziki nabo bakemera kumutiza ugutwi, nta nkeka ko Andy Mwaga ari mu bahagarariye kazoza keza k'umuziki wo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi.

headline: Sylvana Ntiyibagira, azwi ku ndirimbo yiwe izwi cane WIBUKE USHIME yitavye Imana
text: Sylvana Ntiyibagira, azwi ku ndirimbo yiwe izwi cane WIBUKE USHIME yaritavye Imana mw’ijoro ryo ku wa kane rishira ejo ku wa gatanu. Indirimbo yiwe yaramenyekanye cane mu myaka ya 1980, akaba yararirimbanye n’abaririmvyi batandukanye bo mu murwi rurangiranwa witwa AMABANO. Hagati aho, nk’uko bivugwa n’umwe mu baririmvyi amuzi, Sylvana Ntiyibagira ntiyigeze aja muri iyo mirwi y’abaririmvyi yari ikomeye nka za AMABANO, NAKARANGA, n’iyindi. Yari mu baririmvyi bakunda kuririmba ari bo nyene (solo). Sylvana yavukiye mu Kabezi mu ntara ya Bujumbura mu mwaka wa 1965, akaba yatanguye kuririmba mu murwi w’abaririmvyi ba paroisse kubera yavuka mu muryango w’abakirisu, mu gasengero ka Irtyazo Sylvana ahanura abaririmvyi ba kino gihe kwitonda bagategura neza indirimbo zabo kugira ngo koko bashobore gutanga inyigisho kubera, nk’uko yabivugiye mu kiganiro yari yahaye Radio Isanganiro ikorera mu Burundi, indirimbo za kino gihe usanga ata kanovera zigifise. Sylvana asize aban batatu. Umviriza indirimbo yiwe  WIBUKE USHIME

headline: Kubera iki Esther Nish yaririmvye indirimwo "Kavorivori"?
text: Umuririmvyi w'umurundikazi azwi nka Esther Nish yaganiriye na BBC Gahuzamiryango mu kiganiro c'abakenyezi. Kiretse kuvuga ku kuntu yatanguye umuziki hamwe n'aho umushikanye ubu, yanavuze ku ndirimbo yiwe nshasha Kavorivori. Iyo ndirimbo naho irimwo amajambo asanzwe akoreshwa mu bihozo abavyeyi b'abarundikazi baririmbira abana babo, kuri we inafise insiguro yihariye.

headline: Khadar Ahmed: Ingene uwabuze aho yiga gukora film ubu ariko aratahukana udushimwe no gukundwa na benshi
text: Film 'The Gravedigger's Wife' (umugore w'umwimvyi w'imva), yatahanye agashimwe, wogira ngo yatunganijwe n'umuntu abifisemwo uburambe, ariko niyo film ya mbere ya Khadar Ahmed. Ingene igenda, umwanya imara n'ubwiza bwayo vyerekana ukwiyemera gufiswe n'uwo mugabo w'imyaka 40 atagira uburambe muri uwo mwuga. Yahunze n'umuryango wiwe  intambara yo muri Somalia amaherezo baruhukira muri Finlande afise imyaka 16 - kandi ntiyigeze ahonyoza ikirenge mw'ishure ryo kwiga gukora no gutunganya film (cinema). Yabwiye BBC ati: "Imana yonyene niyo izi kangahe nasavye ishure ryo kwiga film ariko nkaba ntigeze ndarironka." Ariko guteza imbere film ziri mu rurimi rw'igi-Somali yabigize ihangiro - kugira yerekane akaranga n'amamuko vyiwe abicishije muri film. Ku bwa Ahmed, kubona yatahanye agashimwe ka mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Afrika ry'ama film Fespaco mu kwezi guheze, vyerekana ko inkuru mu rurimi rwiwe zishobora  gukundwa n'ahandi. Bitandukanye na Bollywood The Gravedigger's Wife ni inkuru y'urukundo irimwo hamwe hamwe hababaje ariko mu buryo butwenza y'aho umuntu ashobora gushika kugira arokore ubuzima bw'uwo akunda. Uwo mwimvyi w'imva - Guled, akinwa na Omar Abdi - yicaye imbere y'ibitaro ari kumwe na bagenziwe,  afise igipawa, arindiriye ko hagira umurwayi apfa. Aho bibabarije, n'uko kugira  Nasra,  umugore wiwe arwaye, abandanye kubaho,  Ahmed ategerezwa kuronka  amafaranga, ayo nayo akaboneka ari uko hagize abapfa. Uwo mugore akinwa na Yasmin Warsame, ari ku mpfiro kubera amafyigo yiwe atagikora. Kubera amafaranga menshi akenewe kugira   abaganga bamwiteho abandanye kubaho, bisaba Guled gufata ingingo zikomeye cane. Iyo nkuru ata  bintu vyinshi vyo kuyiryohora birimwo, yakorewe amasanamu arimwo ibice vyinshi ata  majambo wumva n'ibirere vyagutse cane, ntaho ihuriye n'inkuru Ahmed yakuriyemwo. Yibutsa film za Bollywood ziba zirimwo umuziki, ugutamba n'ukurangira mu kanyamuneza.   Ahmed avuga ati: "Ntaco nari nzi kuri izo film, nta film nari mfise kugira ndabireko mu gukora iyi. "Gutyo rero nayikoze uko jewe nyene binjemwo n'uko ndabibona". Mu vy'ukuri, ntaho yibuka yoba yarabonye film y'igi-Somali ikozwe hakurikijwe ubuhinga nyabwo bw'umwuga. Nyina wiwe yagumye  akorora amasozi  mu mwanya wose bamaze bariko bararaba The Gravedigger's Wife ubwa  mbere mw'ihiganwa rya sinema rya Cannes mu kwezi kw'indwi.  Ahmed avuga ati nyina "yararengewe. Hari benshi batigeze baronka urweze n'amahirwe yo kwibona muri film. N'ivyo nashaka gushikako." 'Kwumva wishimye' The Gravedigger's Wife ibera, kandi amasanamu yayo yafatiwe ku rubuga, muri Djibouti, bihana urubibe na Somalia, ariko ntirerekanwa muri ivyo bihugu. Avatar yongeye kuba film yinjiza cyane ku isi Abantu benshi b'aba-Somali, n'abandi bafise amamuko yo muri Somalia, barabonye iyo film mu kwezi kw'icenda mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'ama film i Toronto muri Canada. Ahmed avuga ko "bose bumvise bishimye. Vyari biryoshe kubaraba ingene baryohewe no kuyiraba hanyuma bagaca banzako". Uwo atunganya ama fiml avuga ko inzira yaciyemwo mu gukora iyo film ishobora gutanga icitegererezo. Ntiyigeze aja mw'ishure ryigisha ivya film, nta n'aho yigeze aronka uwumwigisha ivyo gutunganya ama film, nta na film y'uwundi muntu yari bwigere akorako. Yatanguye urugendo rwiwe rwo gutunganya iyo film mu myaka 10 iheze igihe yandika integuro yayo. Yari afise ishaka ryo kuba ariwe ubwiwe yoyitunganiriza mu gi-Somali ku buryo yabanje kubika  iyo nteguro  kugira yige ingene bikorwa mu kurabira ku ma film yakunda. Amaze kuraba Bollywood, yaciye azunguruka amazu y'ama cinema kw'isi, harimwo muri Korea y'Epfo na Iran. Ariko izamutereye ivyiyumviro cane ni fim zakorewe muri Afrika. Arakunda cane cane igikorwa c'umunya-Mauritania Abderrahmane Sissako, yari umukuru w'umugwi w'abatanga udushimwe twa Fespaco uyu mwaka. Umunya-Chad  Mahamat-Saleh Haroun nawe ari mu bo Ahmed yafatiyeko, akaba yibuka ingene yatangariye ubwiza bwa film yiwe yo mu 2010, A Screaming Man. Amaze  kwiga izo film akagerageza kwuva ubuhinga bw'ingene zikorwa, yaciye atunganya film zibiri ngufi mu  hanyuma yandika mu ki-Finlande imbere y'uko akora  The Gravedigger's Wife. Ubu rero aribaza niba iyo aba yaragiye kw'ishure ryo kwiga ingene film zikorwa  hari ico kuba  vyahinduye mu nzira mbi canke nziza. "Nshaka gutera intege abanya-Afrika bakiri bato bakora film, abadasanganywe amahirwe menshi, gufata camera hanyuma bakore film zabo, bandike inkuru zabo, bafate amasanamu yabo kandi bavyikorere bo nyene, kuko si bose baronka basanganywe ubushobozi bwinshi." We nyene avuga ko afise ishaka ryo kubandanya akora ama film muri Afrika: "Namuka muri Afrika kandi nemera ko kazoza k'ama film ari muri Afrika. Hari inkuru nyinshi zidashobora gukinirwa mu bihugu vya Buraya."

headline: Tanzania: Sentare ivuga ko inyandiko zo kuraga itunga ryose Jackline Ntuyabaliwe zitakurikije amategeko
text: Umupfakazi wa nyakwigendera Reginald Mengi, Jackline Ntuyabaliwe, yerekanye akababaro kiwe ku ngingo ya sentare nkuru ya Tanzania yerekeye uwohagarikira itunga ryasizwe n'umugabo wiwe. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Kirakwiye... icegeranyo co kwa muganga ca Dr Reginald Mengi cerekanywe nk'icemezo. Ukuri ku bantu bakunda ukuri. Umugabo wanje yamaze ubuzima bwiwe yubashwe, akerebutse kandi yafashije ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abatanzania." Ntiyari umukehabwenge! Ushobora kuvuga ivyo ushatse vyose, ufate ivyo ushatse, ariko kuri ivyo, nzomuvugira gushika mpfe. Jackline yanditse kuri urwo rubuga hwaniro ashirako n'icegeranyo ca muganga wiwe, yanditse ivyerekeye amagara yiwe, ko ingwara yamufashe ya AVC itatumye atakaza ubwenge. Mu misi iheze, mu gusoma urubanza rw'impapuro 72, umucamanza Mlyambina yavuze ko inyandiko zo kuraga za nyuma za nyakwigendera Dr Mengi zanditswe itariki 17 z'ukwezi kw'umunani mu 2017 zitakurikije amategeko agenga kuraga. Muri urwo rubanza, abana ba Dr Mengi bariko bariyamiriza izo nyandiko zo kuraga bivugwa ko zasizwe na nyakwigendera se wabo, n'umukono wari kuri izo nyandiko nta ho bisa bisana n'izindi ziwe, kandi muri ico gihe se wiwe nta nguvu yari afise zo kwandika kubera ingwara yari afise kuva mu 2016. Abana bakuze ba nyakwigendera bavuga ko izo nyandiko zo kuraga zabirengagije, iragi ryose rihabwa Jackline Ntuyabaliwe n'abana biwe b'amahasa, rero ko izo nyandiko zitakurikije amategeko  kubera zashize ku ruhande abandi bana ata mpamvu. Jackline Ntuyabaliwe azwi kw'izina ry'ubuhizi rya K-Lynn muri BongoFleva yamenyekanye cane mu ndirimbo Nalia Kwa Furaha. Bahuriye n'umugwizatunga w'umutanzania Reginald Mengi mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza mu 2010. Mu 2014 ikinyamakuru candika ku butunzi ca Forbes canditse ko uwo mugabo yari afise imitahe mu bimenyeshamakuru no mu mashirahamwe yimba ubutare, yari afise ubutunzi bungana na miliyoni 560 z'amadolari. Bari bubakanye mu 2015 mu bugeni bwabereye mw'izinga rya Maurice, Dr Reginal Mengi akaba yarusha umupfasoni wiwe imyaka 36. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ari i Dubai afise imyaka 75  itariki 2 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 2019, mu gihe Jackline Ntuyabaliwe yari afise imyaka 39.

headline: Indyane hagati ya Britney Spears na murumunawe zigeze kure, aho baryanira ku mbuga hwaniro
text: Britney Spears na mushikiwe we Jamie Lynn bamaze imisi baterana amajambo biturutse ku kiganiro giheruka ku mboneshakure hamwe no ku mubano wabo wo muri kahise. Uyu muririmvyi yagiriza murumunawe ko yaciye ku kiganiro co ku wa gatatu mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe "akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga ko Jamie Lynn ata "kintu na kimwe yigeze akora" kandi umuryango "ukunda kunyononera no kumbabaza". Jamie Lynn avuga ko amajambo ya Britney ari "ibinyoma vyeruye" kandi ko igihe cose yamye hafi ya mukuruwe. Uyu mugore w'imyaka 30 avuga ko buri gihe yama ariko agerageza gusigurira abana biwe "igituma umuryango wacu ubandanya uterwa ubwoba bwo kwicwa, nk'ingaruka y'amajambo yandikwa na inasenge wabo yo kuwagiriza ibintu bidafashe, cane cane mu gihe tuzi ko yetegerezwa kuvugisha ukuri". Britney amaze igihe anegura umuryango wiwe ku kungene wamufashe mu myaka 13 wamaze ari wo ujejwe amatungo yiwe, igihe amafaranga n'ubuzima bwiwe vyari mu minwe ya se wa Jamie. Urubanza rwagiye kurangirira muri sentare mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Jamie Lynn Spears avuga iki? Uyu mutoyi wa Britney yatanze ikiganiro ku mboneshakure ABC mu kiganiro Good Morning America (twogereranya na Mwaramutse Amerika) mu ntango z'iyi ndwi turiko turangiza asigura igitabo ciwe Things I Should Have Said (mu kirundi twovuga tuti: Ivyo nategerezwa kuba navuze). Iki gitabo kivugwa ko gisigura ubuzima bwiwe, harimwo n'isanganya umukobwa wiwe yagize rigahakwa kumutwara ubuzima mu 2017, imigenderanire yiwe na Britney hamwe n'ikibanza yari afise mu kubungabunga umutungo w'uyu muririmvyi. Muri ico kiganiro, Jamie Lynn yiyise "umufasha wa mushikanje akomeye cane" hanyuma avuga ko "yafashe ingingo zo gufasha" guhagarika ivyo kumubikira umutungo. Ariko nk'uko bivugwa na ABC, yavuze ko inyifato ya Britney muri kahise "itari itomoye", "irangwa n'ubwoba butagira ishingiro"  kandi ko yari "mahindagu". Yabwiye iki kiganiro ati: "Igihe hafatwa ingingo yo kumubikira amatungo yiwe, jewe nari mfise imyaka 17, nari hafi yo kwibaruka, rero jewe sinatahura ivyariko biraba, kandi sinavyitaho". Jamie Lynn abandanya avuga ko mushikiwe yamwegereye akamusaba nimba "yoshobora kumukurikiranira abahungu biwe bakaronka ivyo bakeneye", ivyo yamwemereye. Abandanya ati: "Ariko, urazi ko maze kumenya ko abikiwe umutungo, numva umengo sinashaka kubigiramwo uruhara gushika kumbure aho azobiviramwo. Rero si jewe namucungira amafaranga yiwe canke ibintu nk'ivyo, rero nimba vyari bimeze uko harabaya ukutumvikana, ariko gusa uko vyoba vyaragenze kwose, nta ngingo nafashe yo kuvyinjiramwo". Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Britney yanditse ati: "Naravye muri terefone nca mbona ko mushikanje yatanze ico kiganiro mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe. "Ibintu bibiri vyambabaje mushikanje yavuze ni ingene avuga ko inyifato yanje yari iy'ubutabanga. "Ntiyigeze aba hafi yanje mu myaka 15 iheze ico gihe... none mbega ni kubera iki twobizana atari uko ashaka kugurisha igitabo ciwe akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga kandi ko akibabajwe n'ingene Jamie Lynn aherutse gusubiramwo indirimbo ziwe zamamaye. Uyu muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa pop w'imyaka 40 yanditse ati: "Ndazi ko abatari bake bashobora kuvyumva nk'ibitagira mvura, ariko nanditse indirimbo zanje nyinshi kandi mushikanje yari akiri uruhinja. Nta kintu na kimwe yari ashoboye gukora. Yama ahabwa ibintu vyose". "Namye ndi umuntu mukuru. Vyose barabikoze barankinisha, nkiyicarira aho hanyuma nkabifata uko". Yongerako ati: "Jamie Lynn, ndibaza ko ibintu ari vyiza n'igitabo cane". Jamie Lynn Spears nawe yahavuye yishura ku nyishu yatanzwe wa Britney, aho abwira abamukurikirana ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "N'ukuri, mvugishije ukuri, ibintu bivugwa nta kuri na gutoya kurimwo". Avuga ko igitabo ciwe kiterekeye Britney gusa, ariko akongerako ati: "Gusa sinohava mpakana ngo mvuge ko ntari mwene Spears, kandi ko bimwe mu vyo nzi mushikanje abifisemwo uruhara". Jamie Lynn, yamenyekanye canke mu rukurikirane rw'ibiganiro All That and Zoey 101 vy'imboneskakure Nickelodeon akaba yaranasohoye indirimbo yiwe, agaruka ku buzima bwiwe avuga ko bwabayemwo ibibazo bikomeye igihe kitari gito. Yandika ati: "Namye nkorana umwete udasanzwe kuva mbere nkiri umuyabaga, kandi narashoboye kwubaka umwuga wanje n'aho nitwa ko ndi mutoya wa mushikanje. "Si ndiko ndiyemera canke nishira hejuru, ariko ndiko mvuga ukuri kwanje kugira ngo nkire ibisebe mfise ku mutima, kugira ngo ibi bintu birangire hanyuma mbandanye nja imbere, kandi nipfuza ko na mushikanje yokora uko".

headline: Umunyamuziki Neil Young, yitwariye Trump kubera akoresha umuziki wiwe atabimusavye
text: Neil Young yitwariye abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Donald Trump ariko yiyamamariza ikindi kiringo kubera bakoresha umuziki wiwe batamusavye uruhusha. Uyo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa rock avuga ko uyo mukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yahonyanze amategeko akingira umuziki mu gukoresha indirimbo ziwe mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Uyo mucuraranzi akomoka muri Canada yanse ko babandanya bakoresha indirimbo ziwe Rockin' in the Free World na Devil's Sidewalk kubera ico yise "isekeza ry'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Trump ntaco barashikiriza kuri ivyo birego. Young yavuze ko yitwariye Bwana Trump amwagiriza ko yakoresheje umuziki wiwe kuva mu 2015, ariko akinumya "n'ibigirankana". Uyo mucuraranzi, ubu afise ubwenegihugu bwa Amerika inyuma yo kuba muri iki gihugu imyaka iharurwa muri za mirongo, arasaba indishi y'amadolari agera ku 150.000 aho hose bagiye bakoresha umuziki wiwe. Aha harimwo ikoraniro rya Trump i Tulsa mu ntara ya Oklahoma mu kwa gatandatu, hamwe n'urugendo Trump yagize kuri Mount Rushmore mu kw'indwi. indirimbo ijanye n'icivugo Muri ino dosiye bashize ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'uyu mucuraranzi, abunganizi ba Young banditse bati: "Uru rubanza ntirufise intumbero yo gusuzugura uburenganzira n'ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu ba Amerika kuko ni uburenganzira bwabo gushigikira umukandida bipfuza". "Hagati aho, nyene kwitwara ntashobora kwemerera ko umuziki wiwe ukoreshwa nk'  'indirimbo y'icivugo' mu ntumbero yo kubiba amacakubiri, 'ingendo y'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Uyu mucuraranzi w'imyaka 74 siwe munyamuziki wenyene ashavuriye Perezida Trump kubera akoresha indirimbo ziwe. Mu kwezi guheze, umurwi The Rolling Stones wo mu Bwongereza waragabishije Perezida Trump ko ashobora kwitwarirwa mu butungane mu gihe yobandanya akoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo yiwe. Abanyamuziki Mick Jagger na Keith Richards baragiye hamwe n'abandi banyamuziki barimwo Aerosmith na Elton John mu gutera igikumu ku rwandiko bandikiye abanyapolitike babahamagarira kubanza gusaba uruhusha imbere y'uko bakoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Ishirahamwe rishinzwe guharanira uburenganzira muvyo umuziki, BMI, rivuga ko impusha zitangwa ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ry'umuziki mu biteramo n'ayandi makoraniro, zitaraba amakoraniro ya politike. Abakora imyiyamamazo ya politike bategerezwa gusaba uruhusha rusabwa n'amashirahamwe ya politike (Political Entities Licence) rubaha uburenganzira bwo gukoresha indirimbo zishika imiliyoni 15. Rero abajejwe imyiyamamazo ba Trump urwo ruhusha ntarwo bafise. Ariko abacuraranzi bafise uburenganzira bwo gukura indirimbo zabo kuri urwo rutonde. The Rolling Stones barabikoze, ariko Young ntatomora nimba nawe yoba yarabikoze.

headline: Dolly Parton: ‘Nivyo, ubuzima bw’abirabure ni kirumara”
text: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa country music, Dolly Parton, nawe yifatanije n'abandi mu gushigikira isekeza Black Lives Matter (ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), mu gihe yariko ashikiriza aho ahagaze ku bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, ibidakunze kuba. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru c'utugenegene Billboard ati: "Mbega burya wibaza ko aba bazungu bacu ari bo bonyene bafise akamaro? Oya". Uyu muririmvyi aasanzwe afise  abakunzi mu mpande zose, asanzwe adakunda kugira ivyo avuga ku bijanye na politike. Aya majambo yiwe aje mu gihe igihugu cose kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe mu bijanye n'umubaho hagati y'abadasangiye ubwoko vyagize ingaruka mu bice vyose vy'ubuzima muri Amerika, harimwo na country music. N'aho umupfasoni Parton atashoboye kuja mu myiyerekano muri rya sekeza rya Blakc Lives Matter, avuga ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'abiyamiriza ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yabwiye ico kinyamakuru ati: "Ndatahura neza ko ari uburenganzira bw'abantu guserura akari ku mutima no kwumvirizwa". Urupfu rwa wa mwirabure George Floyd hamwe n'imyiyerekano yaciye ikurikira vyaragize ingaruka mbi mu bisata bitandukanye, haba mu nkino canke no mu muziki, ivyatumye abanyamuziki bamwe baja muri iyo myiyerekano, abandi nabo biba ngombwa ko basubiramwo bakihweza ibijanye n'imigenderanire yabo n'abandi badasangiye urukoba. Perezida Donald Trump wewe abona ukundi iyo myiyerekano, aho afata abari muri yo nk'abagumutsi, mbere yiyamiriza bikomeye abari bafashe ingingo yo gupfukama igihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa mu kwerekana akababaro kabo. Umupfasoni Parton yashikirije ayo majambo mu gihe imyiyamamazo mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu yimirije yashushe, ingendo itandukanye n'iyo yari afise mu myaka ine iheze aho  yirinda cane kunegura Bwana Trump igihe yahiganwa na Hillary Clinton. Eka no mu 2017 yashimye kutagira ico avuze mu gihe we na bagenziwe Emmys, Lily Tomlin na Jane Fonda bari mu giteramo, aho aba bandi bobo bafashe akanya ko kwiyamiriza Perezida Trump. Ubu bwa vuba naho ati: "None nimba wanka urunuka umukuru w'igihugu, kubera iki tutomusengera?" Sibwo bwa mbere uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 74 - aboneka nk'umwe mu bashigikiye abagore bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'ukwigenga (feministes) akaba kandi anashigikiye abahuza ibitsina babisangiye - ashigikira abipfuza ko ibintu bihinduka. Mu 2014, yarashigikiye abubakana badahuje ibitsina, umwaka umwe imbere y'uko itegeko ribirekura mu gihugu cose. Hagati aho, ariyubara cane muvyo ashikiriza mu ntumbero yo kwirinda uko bishoboka kugira uwo ababaje, akenshi akama ahanura abantu "kwirinda gucira abandi imanza kugira ngo nabo ntibahave bacirwa izindi".

headline: Ntahokatarondererwa: Josiane Kwizera yahisemwo gufotora, abavyeyi bashaka ko yiga kuvura
text: Uwo mwigeme w'imyaka 27 yahejeje amashure yisumbuye mu gisata c'ubumenyi (scientifique), abavyeyi biwe bipfuza ko abandanya mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu ariko we ahitamwo kwiyigisha gufotora. Avuga ko yakunze umwuga wo gufotora kuva akiri umwana. Ati: "Kuva nkiri umwana narakunda gufotora. Narakina ibintu vyo gufotora nkoresheje telefone canke ibindi bikoresho". Josiane avuga ko ahejeje amashure yisumbuye yinginze abantu benshi ngo bamwigishe uwo mwuga ariko benshi baramwankira. Umwe gusa ni we yamwemereye mu 2018. Josiane Kwizera avuga ko yatanguye kubikora nk'umwuga mu 2019, n'aho abavyeyi biwe bo bipfuza ko yokora umwuga wo kuvura abantu. Agira ati: "Abavyeyi bashaka ko mbandanya kwiga ivyo kuvura, ariko jewe nahisemwo gufotora kuko ari vyo nkunda. "Ubu ndaronka amasoko yo gufotora abana, mu manza z'isabukuru n'iz'ubugeni. "Ndaniyigisha nkoresheje inyabwonko kandi maze kumenya vyinshi." Kwizera avuga ko ubu, afashijwe n'uwo mwuga wo gufotora, hari vyinshi atakizera ku bavyeyi. Agira ati: "Ubu ndirihira inzu nkoreramwo, nariguriye camera-foto yo mu bwoko bwa Canon izimvye cane, ndagura akamoto n'inyabwonko. "Ndafasha n'abavukanyi banje nanje nkifasha ntarinze kugora abavyeyi." Josiane Kwizera ahanura urwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu ngo bironderere akazi. Ati: "Ubu si nka kera aho abavyeyi bacu baheza ishure basanga akazi kabarindiriye, akazi n'ukukarondera. "Ugaye akazi, ntuba uzi ico ushaka gukora."

text: Amwe mu mafoto meza yo muri Afrika n'ahandi: Amafoto yose afitiwe uruhusha

headline: Tanzania-Dr Philip Mpango:Video y'umushikiranganji abeshuza ko yapfuye yaneguwe cane
text: Video ibabaje y'umushikiranganji  wa Tanzania ajejwe ikigega ari imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru kubeshuza ibihuha vy'uko yapfuye yaneguwe cane, benshi bakavuga ko bitari bikenewe kandi  ari ukumugirira nabi. Ku ndwi iheze prezida John Magufuli yari yebeshuje ivyo bihuha , avuga ko Dr Philip Mpango akiriho kandi ariko aratora mitende. Ku wa kabiri, Dr Mpango, ahagatiwe n'abakozi bo kwa muganga babiri , batambaye udufukamunwa, yasomye itangazo imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru mu bitaro vyitiriwe Benjamin Mkapa ku murwa mukuru Dodoma. Yarakoroye   aranahagirika kenshi  kugira abashe gusubira guhema neza igihe yariko arasoma iryo tangazo. Ntibizwi indwara agwaye iyariyo ariko yavuze ko yari afise "ingorane zo guhema" kandi ko yari akeneye  umwuka(oxygene). Yavuze kandi ko yakize. Uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Tundu Lisu yaneguye abategetsi baretse ngo iryo tangazo rigenewe abamenyeshamakuru risomwe. Ati: "Ninde yaretse umuntu arwaye ngo akore ivyo, yarakorora kandi ntiyari yambaye agafukamunwa. Yategerzwa kuba ariko araruhuka  anavurwa.'' Lissu yongeyeko ati uko "n'ukwigira sindabibazwa'' Dr Mpango yageze ahantu ikigumbagumba kiramufata igihe yariko arahoza ababuze yongera asaba imbabazi ko atashoboye  imigirwa yo gusezera icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar Sef Sharif Hamad, yapfuye ku ndwi iheze ahitanywe na Covid-19,n'umunyamabanga mukuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu John Kijazi n'uwahoze ari umukuru wa banki nkuru y'igihugu Prof Benno Ndulu. Dr Mpango ati: "Narababaye kubona  ata n'umwe nashoboye guherekeza ariko ndabifuriza amahoro adashira." Hamaze kuvugwa impfu nyinshi zifatiye kuri Covid-19 muri Tanzania ariko ntizigeze zemezwa icese canke naho vyavuzwe ko umugera wa corona atari wo waziteye. Ariko ubu Tanzania  ubu bwa vuba yarahinduye imvugo, ubu abategetsi ntibakivuga koi co gihugu ata Covid-19 ikirangwamwo ahubwo bagahamiriza abanyagihugu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kwikingira harimwo kwambara agafukamunwa.

headline: Sengazi, umuhinga wa mbere mu gutwenza w'i Burundi n'i Rwanda' aronse 'RFI Talent du Rire'
text: Michael Sengazi niwe muhinga wa mbere mu gutwenza mu Burundi no mu Rwanda ubu yatsindiye igihembo citiriwe 'RFI Talent du Rire' gitanzwe ku ncuro ya gatanu. Sengazi ni umuhinga mu gutwenza yavukiye i Gitega mu Burundi kuri se w'Umurundi na nyina yavukiye i Burundi ariko akomoka mu Rwanda. Igihembo RFI Talent du Rire catangujwe n'umuhinga mu gutwenza yitwa Mamane akomoka muri Niger, asanzwe kandi ategura amakuru y'ugutwenza kw'iradiyo y'abafaransa RFI Gondwana. Ni igihembo kironswa umuhinga muvyo gutwenza yabaye uwa mbere mu bandi. Iki gihembo kijana n'ama €4 000 azokironswa mu kwezi kuza kwa umi na kabiri. Bwana Sengazi ati: "Kano gashimwe rero kuri jewe ni ikintu gikomeye, cerekana ko babonye kandi bemeye ko akazi kanje ndagakora neza, kandi ko nshobora n'ukugera kure gusumba ng'aha". Muri Afrika, aka gashimwe gatanzwe ku ncuro igira gatanu, Michael Sengazi rero akaba ariwe yatowe ku rwego rwa Afrika yose. Bwana Sengazi yize amashure y'intango mu Burundi n'ayisumbuye kuri Michel Archange i Bujumbura, yiga amategeko muri Kaminuza ya ULK i Kigali mu Rwanda. Ahejeje ivyigwa yahisemwo gukora umwuga wo gutwenza. Ati: "Nacaguye gukora ibijanye na comedie kuko nabona ko ariyo mpano Imana yampaye". Avuga ko hari abantu badatahura ko uyu nawo ari umwuga. Ati: "Ndabumva cane kuko ni ibintu batamenyereye, badasanzwe bakora canke babona". Michael yinjiye neza na neza muri ico gisata mu 2010 akina theatre, mu nyuma ahura na bagenzi we baciye batanguza umugambi w'ugukora ivyo gutwenza i Kigali. Agitangura abavyeyi biwe nabo ntibavyumva ariko mu nyuma baramufata mu mugongo. "Umuvyeyi yumvise ko mvuye mu vy'amategeko ngiye gukina ivyo gutwenza, yaciye abona ko ngiye kwonona amafaranga y'ishure yantangiye" - Bwana Sengazi. "Ku muvyeyi, kugira ngo umuntu atere imbere ni uko akora akazi nyene k'abantu bakomeye, bwa buzi nyene buzwi n'abantu benshi. Ako kazi gashasha rero gashasha ntibashoboye kugasobanukirwa canke ngo bakumve, ariko naragerageje kubibumvisha". Michael atera akamo abandi bavyeyi gushigikira abandi bana bashobora kuba bafise intumbero bashaka kujanamwo ubuzima bwabo, mu gihe atari ikintu kimwicira ubuzima canke gituma amera nabi. Agira ati: "Ni ukumuba hafi kuko ni yatsitara ni wewe uzohangayika kuko ni umwana wawe".

headline: Africa na internet: ni ibihe bihugu vyayiciye,vyabikoze gute?
text: Nta Facebook, Twitter canke WhatsApp. Ivyo bimaze kuba ibintu bimenyerewe mu bihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika aho ama reta yagiye arugara ku kiringo runaka internet canke imbuga hwaniro. Uganda nico gihugu ca vuba kibikoze buca haba amatora ku wa 14 uku kwezi kwa mbere. Abaharanira uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bwo guhanahana ubutumwa bavuga ko ari ukubuza ubwisanzure, ariko ama reta yo avuga ko bifasha mu kwubahiriza umutekano. Ukuzibira imihora bigenda gute? Reta ishobora kuzibira imihora mu gutegeka ibigo bitanga internet ngo vyime inzira abanywanyi bavyo. Mu ntango, ibi bishobora gukora mu kwugara imbuga zisanze zikoreshwa cane. Ariko hari igihe hafatwa ingingo zikomeye gusumba aho reta itegeka ibigo bitanga internet kwugara amayira yose. Ibihugu bimaze kwugara internet ni ibihe? Igitigiri c'ibihugu bimaze kwugara internet kiguma kiduga. Uganda yategetse ibigo bitanga internet kwugara imbuga hwaniro zose hamwe n'uburyo bwo guhanahana ubutumwa. Abakoresha ubwo buryo bari basanzwe bidoga ko bagize iminsi bibagora gushikira bumwe muri ubwo buhinga n'imbuga zimwe zimwe. Tanzania yazibiye imihora ya internet mu matora aheruka mu kwezi kw'icumi. Mu kwa gatandatu mu mwaka uheze, Ethiopia yetegetse ko internet yugarwa mu kiringio camaze hafi ukwezi biturutse ku ruhagarara rwakurikiye iyicwa ry'umuririmvyi rurangiranwa w'umu Oromo anaharanira agateka ka zina muntu Hachalu Hundesa. Zimbabwe, Togo, Burundi, Chad, Mali na Guinea navyo nyene vyarazibiye internet canke imbuga hwaniro mu bihe bitandukanye mu mwaka uheze. Mu 2019 vyagaragaye ko habaye iyugarwa rya internet ku rugero canke burundu agashika 25 mu gihe kari 20 mu 2018 na 12 mu 2017, nk'uko bimenyeshwa na Access Now, ikigo cigenga kibikurikirana. Ico kigo kivuga ko mu 2019, ibihugu indwi muri 14 vyugaye internet bitari vyarabikoze mu myaka ibiri yari iheze. Ibihugu bishasha vyabaye Benin, Gabon, Eritrea, Liberia, Malawi, Mauritania na Zimbabwe. Ni ingendo yibonekeza n'ahandi kw'isi aho ibihugu vyugara imihora ya internet biguma biba vyinshi, mu gihe yugawe agashika 213 uyu mwaka mu 2017 kari 106 gusa. Ico kigo kivuga ko muri Africa akenshi iyugarwa riba ku gihugu cose aho kuba ku ntara zimwe zimwe canke ku migwi runaka y'abantu. Mu 2019, ku gashika 21 kuri 25 internet yugawe, ico kigo casanze vyakwiye igihugu cose canke ibice binini vyaco. Sudan na Ethiopia nivyo vyonyene vyugariye ibice runaka. Mu gihugu kimwe kimwe, ikigo ca internet cose nico kimenya ingene gishira mu ngiro amabwirizwa yo kuzibira imihora. Bumwe mu buryo bikorwa n'ukuzibira gushikira ico bita URL. Ako ni nk'akayunguruzo kabuza gushikira urutonde rw'imbuga zimwe zimwe ziba zabujijwe. Uwarasanzwe azijako aronka ubutumwa butandukanye nk'ubuvuga ngo ''uru rubuga rwarugawe n'uwubijejwe''. Ubundi buryo bwitwa ''throttling''(kuniga). Ubwo ni uburyo bwo kugabanya cane umuhora uja ku mbuga zimwe zimwe, bigatuma umengo ni internet yikwega, gutyo abantu bagacika intege zo kuja kuri izo mbuga. Ubwo buryo rero butuma bigora kumenya niba koko amayira yugawe canke niba ari internet iba itameze neza. Ingingo ya nyunma ishobota kuba iyo gutegeka abatanga internet kwugara ntihagire n'umwe ashobora gukora icarico cose. None abatanga internet barashobora kwanka? Ubushobozi bw'ama reta bwo guhagarika internet buvana n'ubushobozi aba afise bwo kugenzura ibigo vyo gutumatumanako. Bene ivyo bigo bihabwa impusha n'ama reta, bisigura ko bishobora gucibwa ihadabu canke gufutirwa amasezerano(contrat). Ivyo bigo birashobora kwitwara mu ma sentare, ariko ni gake babikora. Mu 2019, ama sentare muri Zimbabwe yarategetse ko internet yugururwa n'aho reta yari yataze itegeko ko ihagarikwa. Ariko reta nayo yaciye ishirahako amategeko ayiha uburenganzira bwo kugenzura ikoreshwa rya internet. Hari n'aho vyoroshe gukora nko muri Ethiopia aho  hari umuryango umwe gusa ujana ku muhora wa interenet, nawo ukaba uri mu minwe y'ikigo ca reta. Ariko iyo internet itugawe burundu, haraba inzira zindi zo gucamwo. Uburyo buzwi cane n'ubwo bita VPNs(Virtual Private Networks). Izo nzira ntizorohera ibigo bitanga internet kuzugara. Reta zirashobora kwugara n'izo VPN ariko akenshi ntibihuta kubikora kuko bibangamira abaserukira ibihugu vyabo n'ibigo binini binini bazikoresha. Ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyo muri Africa vyitwaza ko hari amakuru y'ibinyoma aca ku mbuga hwaniro na internet mu gusigura iyugarwa ry'iyo mihora. Ariko bamwe mu bihweza ibintu n'ibindi n'abatavuga rumwe n'ama reta babona ko ico ari icitwazo co gucecekesha abanegura izo reta akenshi baheza bakabikorera ku mbuga nka Facebook. Bikorwa akenshi imbere n'inyuma y'amatora.

headline: DRC: Delcato Idengo yafatiwe i Butembo n'abajejwe umutekano
text: Umuririmvyi akunzwe muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo, Delcato Idengo, yafashwe yagirizwa guhamagarira abantu kugirira nabi abajejwe umutekano Uyu munyamuzika yafashwe ejo kuwa mungu ari mu muji wa Butembo uri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko. Abakunzi biwe bakoze imyiyerekano basaba yuko yorekurwa. Igipolisi cavuze yuko Idengo azoshinjwa ivyaha vyo kugomorera abantu kugirira nabi abapolisi n'abasirikare. Ariko uyu munyamuzika ntararenguka imbere ya sentare. Indirimbo za Idengo kenshi zinegura abajejwe intwaro, cane cane ingene bananiwe kugarukana umutekano mu buseruko bwa Kongo. Yarigeze kwagiriza igipolisi kuba ata na kimwe gikora ngo gihagarike ubwicanyi.

headline: Tiwa Savage na Burna Boy ntibazoja muri Afrika y’Epfo kubera ubwicanyi ku banyamahanga
text: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa w'umunya Nigeria, Burna Boy, yarahiye ko atazosubira guhonyoza ikirenge muri Afrika y'Epfo, eka na mugenziwe Tiwa Savage ahagarika igiteramo yari afiseyo. Mu butumwa yacishije mu rubuga rwa Twitter, Burna Boy avuga ko yaheruka muri ico gihugu mu 2017, kandi ko atazosubirayo gushika leta ya Afika y'Epfo yisubiyeko. Tiwa Sawage nawe avuga ko ibiriko biraba bikomeye kandi ko atawungukira mu kumeneka kw'amaraso. Ati "kwica uwariwe wese w'umunyafrika bimuraba". Igipolisi c'ico gihugu carahagaritse abantu batari bake bari muri iyo migumuko imaze iminsi mu bisagara vya Johannesburg, Pretoria n'ahandi. Abantu bashika batanu baramaze kwicwa. Umukuru w'ico gihugu, Cyril Ramaphosa, n'abandi bakuru b'ibihugu vya Afrika bariyamiriza ivyo bitero. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, yarungitse intumwa muri Afrika y'Epfo itwaye "ubutumwa bwo kwerekana akababaro ku kuntu abanyagihugu baco bafashwe nabi". Umuririmvyi akomoka muri Nigeria azwi cane no muri Afrika, Tiwa Savage yanditse kuri Twitter ko yiyamirije yivuye inyuma ubwicanyi ku bantu b'iwe muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ati: "Kuri iyo mvo, sinshobora kuririmba mw'isabukuru rya DSTV ryimirije i Johannesburg ku wa 21 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda". Tiwa azwi cane mu ndirimbo nka "Eminado" na "All Over" amenyesha ko "kwica uwariwe wese w'umunyafrika bimuraba atarindiriye kuba umunyanigeria gusa". Mugenzi wiwe Burna Boy nawe akomoka muri Nigeria avuga ko ubwicanyi bushingiye ku rwanko ku banyamahanga buteye kubiri n'ivyo yarwaniye. Avuga ko Afrika yashigikiye abanya Afrika y'Epfo igihe bariko barwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango y'abazungu ya Apartheid kuva mu myaka ya 1960  gushika mu 1994 irangira. Burna Boy yanditse ati: "Ndatahura ko abanya Afrika y'Epfo bataye umutwe kubera imyaka bamaze bacurwa bufuni na buhoro, ku buryo basigaye bafata nk'abansi abantu babafashije mu gihe bariko bacurwa bufuni na buhoro, ahubwo  bagashimagiza ababahohoteye". Yongeyeko y'uko hari abanya Afrika y'Epfo "bameze neza, bafise ivyiyumviro birashe, n'aho atari benshi". Ishavu ryavuye kuri iyo migumuko ryatumye ishami rimwe ry'ikigo c'ubudandaji ca Afrika Afrika y'Epfo, Shoprite, giterwa kikanyagwa urukombamazi muri gisagara ca Lagos.

headline: Britney Spears: Se yasavye guhagarika guhagararira inyungu ziwe zose
text: Se wa Britney Spears yatanze impapuro muri sentare ya Los Angeles asaba kurangiza ubuhagarikizi yari amazemwo imyaka 13 bwatuma akurikirana ubuzima n'amatungo vy'umukobwa wiwe. Jamie Spears yanditse ko Britney "afise uburenganzira ko iyo sentare yokwihweza yitonze ko ubwo buhagarikizi butagikenewe". Britney yaragerageje kumwaka ubwo burenganzira incuro zibiri zose mu myaka ibiri iheze. Uwo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wa Pop yavuga ko imigenderanire bafitaniye yari iyo "agacinyizo" aranahagarika kuremesha ibiteramo igihe yari akimuhagarariye. Se wiwe yandikiye sentare inyuma y'amezi abiri uwo muririmvyi afata ibiyayuramutwe atangiye ubuhamya bukarishe muri sentare, asaba ko ubwo buhagarikizi burangira vuba na bwangu. Muri izo mpapuro zarungikiwe sentare nkuru ya Los Angeles handitswe ngo:" Ibiherutse kuvuga kuri ubwo buhagarikizi bwazanye ikibazo co kumenya nimba icatumye buhaba carahindutse ku buryo bitagikenewe ko bubandanya?" Urwo rwandiko rurabandanya, avuga ko umukobwa wiwe yipfuza kwikurikiranira ibibazo vyo kwa muganga hamwe n'ivyerekeye amahera. Rubandanya rugira ruti "Nk'uko Spears atahengeshanije kubivuga, ico ashaka gusa n'icobera ciza umukobwa wiwe." "Niyaba Britney Spears ashaka kurangiza ubwo buhagariki kandi akaba yumva ko ashobora ashobora gufata mu minwe ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, se wiwe Spears avuga ko akwiye guhabwa ayo mahirwe." Britney Spears yigeze kuvuga ko se wiwe amufata nabi cane kandi ko yigeze kumutera ubwoba ko azomubuza kuraba abana biwe mu gihe atokwemera ivyo amusaba. Mu kwezi kw'indwi, yabwiye umucamanza ko yipfuza kwitwarira se wiwe, w'imyaka 69, ko yakoresheje nabi ububasha bwo guhagarikira inyungu ziwe. Twashitse aha gute? Ubuhagarikizi bwategetswe gushirwaho mu 2008 igihe hari amakenga ku magara yo mu mutwe y'uwo muririmvyi. Sentare yahaye uburenganzire Jamie Spears kugenzura inzu y'umukobwa iwe hamwe n'ibindi bintu bijanye n'ubuzima bwiwe. Ubwo buhagarikizi bwari mu bice bibiri. Kimwe kubijanye n'inzu hamwe n'amahera, ikindi cerekeye umukobwa wiwe ubwiwe nk'umuntu. Spears yatanze imihoho mu bijanye no gukurikirana umukobwa wiwe mu 2019 kubera ubugwayi yari afise, ariko abandanya kuraba ivyerekeye ibikorwa vyiwe bimwinjiriza amahera.

headline: Abanyagihugu ba Bujumbura bazindukiye mu myiyerekano biyamiriza umurwi w'abatimbo bari mu Rwanda
text: Abatimbo b'abarundi bavuga ko biyamiriza u Rwanda bakarwagiriza ko rwabivye ingoma zagiye kuvugirizwa mw'ihiganwa "East Africa's Got Talent" mu gihugu ca Kenya. Mu myiyerekano yatumweko n'umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura kuri uyu wa gatandatu, abari muri yo bagiriza ico gihugu ko civye akaranga n'imico vy'Uburundi. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, umurwi witwa Himbaza Club ugizwe n'Abarundi bahungiye mu Rwanda bari kumwe na bamwe mu banyarwanda basanze bazi kuvuza ingoma,  wabonetse uri muri iryo higanwa uvuza ingoma z'Uburundi. Abatunganije iryo higanwa bavuga ko abaryitavye bataserukiye igihugu na kimwe, ko ahubwo bagiye ku gatwe kabo. Abari muri iyo myiyerekano  barenga 50.000, bari bitwaje ivyandiko vyiyamiriza u Rwanda. Bimwe biti: "Twebwe abatimbo turiyamirije umurwi w'igihugu c'Urwanda wivye ingoma z'Uburundi ukongera ukaja kuzivugiriza mu mahiganwa hahonyanzwe amategeko ndangakaranga". Abatimbo bo mu Burundi batazoshobora kwihanganira umuntu uwo ari we wese canke igihugu ico ari co cose kizoshaka kwiyitirira ingoma z'Uburundi habanje guhonyangwa amategeko azigenga. Dunia Abedi yaserukiye abatimbo bari muri iyo myiyerekano, avuga ko uyo murwi utitavye iryo higanwa ufise intumbero y'ukwerekana ishusho y'Uburundi biciye mu migirwa ijanye n'ingoma z'Uburundi, haba mu nyambaro no mu bindi bijanye. Bwana Abedi avuga ko umurwi wagiye kuvuza izo ngoma wagiye k'uwuserukira u Rwanda, aho guserukira Uburundi. Leta y'Uburundi yagirije igihugu c'u Rwanda ko ryarungitse uyo murwi hatisunzwe amategeko agenga ingoma z'u Burundi. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'umushikiranganji w'inkino n'imicokama, Pelate Niyonkuru, leta ivuga ko ingoma z'u Burundi ari itunga kama  ryitirirwa Uburundi, "ridatizwa canke ngo rigurishwe" kandi ko "ata n'umwe arekuriwe kugerageza kuryiyitirira ndetse ngo yihe ububasha bwo kurikoresha mu nzira zidahuye n'imico n'imigenzo y'abarundi". Hagati aho, Alphonse Rugambarara yigeze kuba umushikiranganji w'inkino n'imicokama, avuga ko ivyo vyatumwe n'ingorane za politike, akavuga mu bihugu vyose birimwo Abarundi benshi usanga hariyo imirwi y'abavuzi b'ingoma nk'iyo. Abatunganije ihiganwa East Africa's Got Talent bavuga ko bafashe nka nkama umubabaro werekanywe n'Abarundi kuri uyo murwi w'impunzi z'Abarundi bavugije umurisho w'ingoima w'ico gihugu muri iryo higanwa. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe na Clouds Media International FZ LLC rihagarikiye iryo higanwa, hamwe na Rapid Blue iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko iryo higanwa ryari ryugururiwe uwo ari we wese aba mu bihugu vya Kenya, Uganda, u Rwanda na Tanzania bataravye ibihugu bavamwo. "Abo batimbo babaye mu Rwanda hakurikijwe amategeko, rero bakaba bemerewe kwinjira muri iryo higanwa". Iryo tangazo rivuga ko imirwi yinjira muri ku gatwe kayo, kandi ko bemeza neza y'uko ata gikino na kimwe cigeze gikinwa ku gatwe k'igihugu kanaka.

headline: DR Congo: Umunyamuziki General Defao yapfuye
text: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo muri Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya Congo Lulendo Matumona azwi kw'izina rya General Defao yapfuye. Defao, yari afise imyaka 62, yapfiriye aho yari asanzwe arwariye mu bitaro vya Laquintinie i Douala, muri Cameroun ejo ku wa mbere. Uyu munyamuziki yavutse mu 1958 azwi mu ndirimbo n'intambo zaryoheye abakunzi b'umuziki batari bake. Abaririmvyi Ferre Gola na Fally Ipupa bari mu banyamuziki ba mbere batanze ubutumwa bw'akababaro, bavuga  ko uru rupfu ari uruhombo runini kuri Afrika. General Defao yavukiye i Kinshasa ku wa 31 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri 1958, akaba yatanguye kuririmba mu 1978 mu murwi wa Suka Movema. Yararirimvye mu gihe gito mu mirwi Fogo Stars na Somo West imbere y'uko yinjira muri  Grand Zaiko Wawa, mu nyuma akaba yagiye kwimukira mu murwi Choc Stars wari watangujwe mu 1983 n'abaririmvyi Ben Nyamabo hamwe na Bozi Boziana, ari naho yerekaniye ubuhinga bukomeye aranamenyekana cane. Defao yahavuye ava mu murwi Choc Stars mu mpera za 1990 aca atanguza umurwi Big Stars ari kumwe na Djo Poster. Hagati aho, ibintu ntivyagenze uko yavyipfuza, biba ngombwa ko arondera abandi baririmvyi Djo amaze kugenda. Defao yari yashitse muri Cameroun mu ndwi iheze akaba mbere yaragiye mu myimenyerezo y'igiteramo ciwe c'Umwaka Mushasha, ari naho yatanguye kwumva atameze neza, nk'uko amakuru ava i Douala abivuga. Defao yahavuye asimbanwa ku bitaro Laquintinie ari naho yahavuye asandabira.

headline: Kerala: Menya uyu muhindikazi atereka ubwanwa
text: Ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mugore wo mu Buhindi atereka ubwana bwiwe arashimirwa ariko kandi akanegurwa n’abantu. Ariko wewe avuga ko adahungabanywa n’ibivugwa vyose ku bwanwa bwiwe. "Ndakunda ubwanwa bwanje," Shyja w’imyaka 35 niko yanditse kuri WhatsApp, musi y’ifoto yiwe. Yama abazwa – n’abantu babona amafoto yiwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook canke bahura nawe amaso mu yandi – igituma atereka ubwanwa. Avuga ati: “Ikintu conyene novuga ni uko gusa ndabukunda. Cane”. Shyja, izina ryonyene akoresha, aba mu karere ka Kannur  mu ntara yo Kerala iri mu bumanuko bw’Ubuhindi. Nk’uko bimeze ku bagore batari bake, yaramaze imyaka itari mike atsiba ubwana bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu gihe yama amwa ingohe ziwe, Shyja avuga ko atigeze yumva ko akeneye kumwa ubwanwa bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu myaka itanu iheze, bwatanguye kuba bwinshi buboneka neza kandi Shyja arabureka abinezererewe cane. Ati: "Ubu si mbona ko noshobora kubaho ntabufise. Igihe ikiza ca Covid gitangura, naranka kwambara agapfukamunwa igihe cose kubera kanzibira isura”. Abantu benshi bamubona bamusaba ko yokwikurako ubu bwanwa bwo hejuru ariko Shyja ntavyumva. "Sinigeze numva ko ndi mubi kubera ndabufise canke ko ari ikintu ntategerezwa kuba mfise”. Abagore bama babwirwa ko imishatsi yo kw’isura atari myiza kuri bo, ko rero botanga amafaranga kugira ngo bayibakure – canke bakayigabanya – igihe cose. Amahinguriro akora imiti yo kubuza imishatsi kumera aregeranya amamiriyaridi n’amamiriyaridi y’amadorari mu gukora amavuta, inzembe n’ibindi bishobora kurandurana n’imizi imishatsi, bigurwa n’abagore bashoboye kubigura. Ariko muri ino myaka ya vuba, abagore benshi bahisemwo kwemera mbere no kwishimira ubu bwanwa. Mu 2016, Harnaam Kaur aharanira ukwiyemera kw’umuntu uko aba ameze kwose (Body positive body positivity) yabaye umugore wa mbere akiri muto kw’isi yose yameze ubwanwa ku munwa wose no kw’itama nk’umugabo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo Guinness World Records. Mu biganiro yagiye atanga, yamye avuga ukungene ukwemera ubwanwa bwiwe kwabaye igihe gikomeye co kwiyemera imbere y’abamuzomera. Ku bwa Shyja, gutereka ubwanwa si ikintu umuntu afatira, ni kimwe mu bigize ubuzima bwiwe. Ati: "Jewe nkora ico nshatse. Iyaba nari mfise ubuzima bubiri, kumbure bumwe nari kububamwo uko abandi bashaka”. Kimwe mu vyatumye afata iyi ngendo ni ibibazo vy’amagara yahanganye navyo mu myaka itari mike. Shyja baramubaze  incuro zitandatu mu myaka cumi – rimwe kwari ukugira bamukure ikivyimba mw’ibere, irindi naryo kwari ukumukura utuvyimba mu gasaho k’imbuto. Aho aherukira kubagwa, kwari ukumukuramwo igitereko, haraciye imyaka itanu. Ati: "Igihe cose baheza kumbaga, naguma nizeye ko ntari gusubira muri ico cumba c’ibagiro”. Kubona yashoboye kurengana ibi bibazo vyose vy’amagara vyakomeje ivyiyumviro vya Shyja  ko ari ngombwa ko abaho mu buzima bwiwe bumuha umunezero. Shyja avuga ko akiri umwana yari afise isoni. Ni gake abagore mu kigwati ciwe bashobora kuboneka hanze inyuma y’isaha cumi na zibiri z’umugoroba. N’aho Kerala ari imwe mu ntara z’Ubuhindi zigenda zibaho ubuzima bwa none, kandi zifise ibimenyetso bikomeye vy’iterambere, mu turere twinshi umugabo ni we afise ijambo rya nyuma, kandi abagore bama babuzwa gufata ingendo canke kwibana. Igihe arongorwa akimukira mu ntara ya Tamil Nadu ihana urubibe n’iyo yavukiyemwo, Shyja avuga ko yaryohewe no kubona ubundi bwisanzure bushasha. Avuga ati: "Umugabo wanje yarashobora kuja ku kazi akagaruka atevye. Rero narashobora kwicara hanze ku mugoroba, rimwe na rimwe nkaja no kw’iduka ndi umwe mw’ijoro iyo hari ico nkeneye. Nta n’umwe yavyitaho. Igihe niga gukora ibintu jenyene, vyankomereje ukwiyemera”. Avuga kandi ko ariko aragerageza kuvyigisha umukobwa wiwe w’umuyabaga. Umuryango wa Shyja n’incuti ziwe bamye bamushigikira kuri buno bwanwa bwiwe. Umukobwa wiwe amubwira ko bumubereye. Ariko Shyja avuga ko yabwiwe amajambo y’ubwoko bwose avugwa n’abantu iyo bamubonye kw’ibarabara. Ati: "Abantu barantwenga bavuga ngo ‘abagabo bonyene nibo bamera ubwanwa, kubera iki umugore yobumera’?” Mu myaka itari mike, ni kenshi yagiye avugwa mu binyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, nk’uko abivuga, yarabonye amajambo y’agahemo yanditswe ku nkuru yamuvuga yari yacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook n’ikinyamakuru co muri ico gihugu. Umuntu umwe yabajije igituma atari gufata urwembwe akamwa ubwanwa bwiwe bimaze kuboneka ko ingohe ziwe yari yazimoye. Ati:"Ariko si ikibazo kijanye n’ivyo nshaka – none ngumye iki hanyuma nikureko iki?” Abagenzi ba Shyja akenshi bishurana agashavu kuri ano majambo yandikwa kuri Facebook, ariko avuga ko ivyo ataco bimubwiye na gato. "Mu bisanzwe, kenshi ndabaraba nkabatwenga”.

headline: Ivana Trump, umugore wa mbere wa Donald Trump, yapfuye ku myaka 73
text: Ivana Trump, umugore wa mbere wa Donald Trump akongera akaba na nyina w’abana biwe batatu, yasandavye ku myaka 73. Aciye ku rubuga hwaniro rwiwe bwite, Truth Social, Trump yanditse ti: “Yari umugore w’intore, mwiza kandi atangaje, yabayeho mu buzima bukomeye kandi bwigisha”. Ivana Trump, umugore yavukiye mu citwa République tchèque, yarongowe n’uyu yahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Amerika mu 1977. Bagiye kwahukana inyuma y’imyaka 15 mu 1992. Bavyaranye abana batatu - Donald Jr, Ivanka na Eric Trump. Igipolisi kivuga ko ashobora kuba yahitanywe n’isanganya, nk’uko vyandikwa n’ikinyamakuru Assiciated Press. Amasoko yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko umupfasoni Trump yatowe yataye ubwenge ku ngazi i muhira iwe mu gisagara ca New York, bikavugwa ko yoba yaguye. Donald na Ivana Trump baramenyekanye cane mu myaka ya 1980 na 1990, mbere ukwahukana kwabo kwaravuzweko vyinshi. Bamaze kwahukana, Ivana yaciye atanguza urudandaza rwiwe rw’ibimoga, impuzu n’ibisharizo vy’umubiri (bijoux). Mu gitabo ciwe co mu 2017 yise Raising Trump, Ivana arishimira kuba yarareze abana babo, akavuga ko "yafashe ingingo ku bijanye n’indero yabo, ibikorwa vyabo, ingendo, mu kubitaho no kubaha ivya nkenerwa” gushika muri kaminuza. Muri iki gitabo, avuga ko ubucuti bwiwe na Trump bwiyongereye cane kuva bahukanye, akavuga ko yama avugana nawe rimwe mu ndwi. Mw’itangazo wasohoye, umuryango wa Trump wamukengurukiye mu kuvuga ko yari “inguvu mu bikorwa, umunonotsi wo ku rwego mpuzamakungu, ubwiza bw’agahorurore, umugenzi, akaba n’umuvyeyi yitaho umuryango”. “Ivana Trump ni umucikacumu. Yahunze ubutegetsi bw’igikomunista ahungira muri iki gihugu ”, niko itangazo rivuga. “ Yarigishije abana biwe ubutwari n’ubwira, kugira impuhwe no kudacika intege”. Umwana wiwe mukuru, Ivanka avugwa ko yari yegereye cane nyina wiwe, yanditse mu butumwa bwiwe yacishije ku rubuga rwa Instagram ko ababaye cane. Yanditse ati: "Mama yari incabwenge, afise igikundiro, afise ishaka kandi atwenza cane. Yarerekanye inguvu, ubutwari n’ishaka mu bikorwa vyiwe vyose. Yabayeho ubuzima bwuzuye - ntiyigeze atakaza amahirwe yo gutwenga no gutamba ”. Donald Trump yabaye umugabo wiwe wa kabiri. Uwa mbere, Alfred Winklmayr, yari umunya-Autriche yigisha urukino rwa ski n’umugenzi wiwe, akaba yari yemeye kurongorwa nawe kugira ngo aronke ubwenegihugu bwa Autriche. Ibi vyamufashije kuva mu gihugu ciwe ca gikomunista  - ico gihe kikaba citwa Tchécoslovaquie  - atari uko yari ahunze. Igihe yaba muri Canada mu myaka ya 1970, yakoze nk’umwigisha w’urukino rwa ski akongera akaba n’umunyamideri. Igihe yari mu rugendo rw’akazi mu gisagara ca New York mu 1976, yabonanye na Trump ari mu murwi w’abanyamideri. Baciye barongorana mu mwaka wakurikiye, ubwo nyene baca batangura kuvugwa cane mu binyamakuru. Igihe yari akiri kumwe na Trump, Ivana yaranguye amabanga atandukanye mw’ishirahamwe rya Trump (Trump Organization), harimwo no kuba umukuru w’ihoteri Plaza Hotel i Manhattan. Ariko bivugwa ko Trump yamwugaraniye hanze y’ibiro vyiwe kuri iyo hoteri mu 1990 bivuye ku kutumvikana ku bintu bine vyari mu masezerano bagiriraniye imbere y’uko barongorana. Igihe bahukaniye, Ivana yarongowe incuro zibiri, ubwa mbere n’umurwizatunga w’umutaliyano Riccardo Mazzucchelli, kuva 1995-97;  hanyuka kandi n’umukinyi w’amareresi w’umutaliyano nyene Rossano Rubicondi, kuva 2008-09. Umukenguzamateka w’umu Repubulika Lindsey Graham, incuti ya hafi cane ya Donald Trump, ati : “ Yarabayeho mu buzima bw’ikinyamerika ”. Mu 2017, Ivana yabwiye ikiganiro ca ABC, Good Morning America, ko atagomvye gutera ubwishime umugore wiwe w’ubu Melania amuhamagaye muri Maison Blanche/White House. Yavuze ati : “ Ni jewe ndi umugore mukuru wa Trump. Uravyumva ? Ni jewe ndi First Lady ”. Ni amwe mu majambo menshi akomeye uyu yahoze ari umunyamideri yasubiwemwo. Mu gakino yagizemwo uruhara mu 1996 kiswe The First Wives Club, yabwiye abagore bari bahukanye ati: "Bapfasoni, mutegerezwa kwihagararako kandi mukigenga. Kandi mwibuke, ntimushavure, rondere vyose”.

headline: Aliko Dangote na Mohammed Dewji bari mu batunzi ba mbere muri Afrika mu 2021
text: Nk'uko biri mu kinyamakuru ca Forbes co mu 29021, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga 18 bo kuri uyu mugabane bwiyongereye imiriyaridi 4.1 z'amadolari, n'ukuvuga ku bice 12 kw'ijana gusumba mu mwaka uheze. Mu myaka cumi yikurikiranya, Aliko Dangote wo mur Nigeria ni we muntu atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, akaba afise ubutunzi buharurwa ku miriyaridi 12.1 z'amadolari. Ubwo butunzi bwiyongereyeko amadolari imiriyaridi 2, ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze bivuye kw'iduga gushika ku bice 30 kw'ijana vy'igiciro c'isima ya Dangote nk'uko vyandikwa na Forbes. Umuntu agira kabiri mu butunzi muri Afrika ni Nassef Sawiris wo mu Misri, ubutunzi bwiwe  bwinshi ni ibice bitandatu kw'ijana y'umutahe afise muri Addidas. Mu kibanza ca gatatu haza Nicky Oppeheimer wo mu gihugu ca Afrika y'epfo, yarazwe umutahe wo muri kompanyi  ya Debeers, akaba yari anahagarariye iyo kompanyi gushika mu mwaka wa 2012 aho yaca agurisha ibice 40 kw'ijana vy'umutahe w'umuryango wiwe kuri kompanyi yimba ubutare ya AngloAmerican ku miriyaridi 5.1 z'amadolari. Uwundi yatunze cane muri uyu mwaka ni umudandaza wundi w'isima, Abdulsamad Rabiu. Imitahe yiwe muri kompanyi ikora isima ya BUA PLC, yashizwe ku rutonde kw'isoko ry'abagurisha imitahe muri Nigeria mu kwezi kwa mbere, yaduze igiciro biteye ubwoba mu kiringo c'uyu mwaka uheze. Vyatumye ubutunzi bwa Rabiu bwongerekana ku bice 77 kw'ijana, gushika ku miriyaridi 5.5 vy'amadolari. Ikintu gikomeye cane n'uko Rabiu n'umwana wiwe bafise ibice 97 kw'ijana vy'iyo kompanyi bagaca batuma imenyekana cane. Umuvugizi w'isoko ry'imitahe muri Nigeria yabwiye Forbes ko ikompanyi y'isima ya BUA  ishitse ku ntambwe ya kabiri - ko Forbes igabanya agaciro k'imitahe mu gihe iyo mitahe yagurishijwe ku banyagihugu ifise agaciro kari muri y'ibice 5 kw'ijana. Umugwizatunga wenyene ava mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika ari kuri urwo rutonde rwa Forbes ni umudandaza wo muri Tanzania, Mohammed Dewji, aza mu kibanza ca 13. Dewji afise ubutunzi bufise agaciro k'imiriyaridi 1.6 z'amadolari, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ico kinyamakuru c'ubutunzi ca Forbes. Urutonde rw'abantu batunze cane kw'isi mu mwaka wa 2021: 1. Aliko Dangote     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 12.1 $ 2. Nassef Sawiris     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8.5  $ 3.  Nicky Openheimer  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8  $ 4.
