Johann Rupert  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 7.2  $ 5. Mike Adenuga   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 6.7  $ 6. Abdulsamad Rabiu  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 5.5  $ 7. Issad Rebrad afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 4.8  $ 8. Naguib Sawiris   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3.2  $ 9. Patrice afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3  $ 10. Koos Bekker afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 2.8  $ Mu gihe bamwe bongereje ubutunzi bwabo ku miriyaridi n'imiriyaridi, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga babiri bari ku rutonde rwo mu mwaka wa 2020, bwaragabanutse gushika baje musi y'umuriyaridi umwe. Abapfasoni babiri bonyene ni bo bari ku rutonde rw'abatunzi bakomeye mu mwaka wa 2020, ubu bakorotse ntibakiri kuri urwo rutonde. Nk'uko bivugwa na Forbes, ubutunzi bwa Folonrusho Alakija wo muri Nigeria, afise ikompanyi yo kwimba igitoro bwaramanutse musi y'umuriyaridi umwe kubera igiciro c'ibitoro camanutse. Isabel dos Santos, kuva mu 2013 yari umupfasoni atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, ubutunzi bwiwe bwaragabanutse kubera ingingo nyinshi zitandukanye zitumbereye ivyo atunze muri Angola na Portugal. Abo bagwizatunga batunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika bava mu bihugu indwi bitandukanye. Afrika y'Epfo na Misri bifise abagwizatunga batanu, bigakurikirwa na Nigeria ifise batatu hamwe na Maroc ifise babiri.

headline: Umuntu ashaje gusumba abandi i Buraya yarokotse Covid imbere y'isabukuru y'imyaka 117
text: Umubikira w'umufaransa, umunyabulaya ashaje gusumba abandi bose kuri uwo mugabane, yarokotse Covid-19, mu gihe hasigaye imisi mike ngo ahimbaze isabukuru y'imyaka 117 amaze avutse. Lucile Randon, yiswe izina ry'ikibikira rya Mama Andre mu 1944, yamenyekanye ko yanduye coronavirus ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere ariko nta bimenyetso na bimwe yagaragaje. Yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ko ata n'uko yari azi ko yayanduye. Yaciye yitaramura mu nzu y'abakukuruke iri ahitwa Toulon mu bumanuko bw'Ubufaransa, ariko ubu aboneka ko yakize neza. Mama Andre, ubu akaba atabona kandi agendera kw'igare y'abamugaye, ariko yitegurira guhimbaza ivuka ryiwe ejo ku wa kane - n'aho azohimbaza uwo musi ari kumwe n'abantu bake cane, gusumba uko vyahora. Umuvugizi w'ikigo c'abakukuruke ca Sainte Catherine Labouré, David Tavella, avuga ati: "Yaragiriwe amahirwe menshi". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Var Matin ati: "Ntiyambajije ibijanye n'amagara yiwe, ahubwo yambajije ibijanye n'imibereho yiwe. Nk'akarorero, yaripfuje kumenya nimba amasaha yo gufungura no kuryama bigiye guhinduka". "Ntiyigeze yerekana ko atinya iyi ndwara. Ahubwo yari afitiye impungenge abandi basanzwe babana muri ico kigo". Mamar Andre yavutse ku wa 11 z'ukwa kabiri mu 1904. Mu gihe azwi ko ari we muntu wa mbere ashaje ku mugabane wa Buraya, azwi kandi nk'umuntu agira kabiri ashaje kw'isi yose, nk'uko biri ku rutonde rw'ikigo Gerontology Research Group's (GRG) gisanzwe gikora ubushakashatsi bwo kurondera abantu bashaje kw'isi. Abajijwe n'ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa BFM nimba yari afise ubwoba bwo kuba yaranduye Covid, Mama Andre yishuye ati: "Oya, nta bwoba nari mfise, kubera ntatinya gupfa". "Ndanezerewe no kuba kumwe na mwe, ariko nipfuza ko mba ndi ahandi hantu - kumwe na mukuru wanje, sokuru wanje na nyokuru wanje".

headline: Uganda: Udukingirizo imiliyoni 4 tudakwije ibisabwa bagomba ko tuvanwa mu bantu
text: Abategetsi ba Uganda bategetse ko udukingirizo duherutse gutangwa incuro zibiri n'ishirahamwe Marie Stopes Uganda rijejwe irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza dukurwa mu bantu. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe na muganga Carole Sekimpi, arongoye Marie Stopes, avuga ati: "Turazi ko Life Guard ikwije ibisabwa n'amategeko. Ariko, izatanzwe ku ncuro zibiri ziheruka ntizikwije ivyo dusaba". Arashimangira ariko y'uko iyo ngingo yerekeye iziherutse gutangwa kuri izi ncuro zibiri za nyuma. Ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor kivuga ko utwo dukingirizo tungana n'imiliyoni zine. Ikigo kijejwe imiti muri Uganda (NDA) casohoye urwandiko mu kwezi guheze kivuga ko ibipimo vyerekana "udutoboro n'ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko utwo dukingirizo dushobora guturika". Muri urwo rwandiko, Victoria Nambasa, ajejwe kugenzura ko imiti ikwije ibisabwa n'amategeko muri ico kigo yanditse ati: "Tubahaye indwi zibiri kugira ngo mutwereke ingene muzoba mwazikuye mu bantu n'abakiriya bazoba bazisubije". Ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y'abantu muri Uganda bivuga ko udukingirizo hafi imiliyoni 800 ari two dukenewe ngo birinde imbanyi batipfuza, SIDA n'indwara ziciye mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.

headline: Afghanistan: Abana bashonje bahabwa imiti yo gutora itiro hakanagurishwa ingingo z'umubiri
text: Na Yogita Limaye BBC News, Herat A﻿banya-Afghanistan basigaye baha imiti abana babo kugira babasinzirize - abandi bagurisha abakobwa babo n'ingingo z'umubiri kugira babe baramaze kabiri. Ku gihe  c'imbeho (hiver/winter) kigira kabiri kuva aba-Taliban bagarutse ku butegetsi hanyuma imfashanyo ziva hanze zigahagarikwa,  abaharurwa muri za miriyoni bugarijwe n'inzara. A﻿bdul Wahab avuga ati: "Abana bacu baguma barira, kandi ntibasinzira. Nta vyo kurya dufise." "﻿Duca tuja kuri farumasi, tukazana ibini tugaha abana bacu kugira bashobore gutora itiro." U﻿wo mugabo aba mu nkengera za Herat, igisagara kiza ubugira gatatu mu bunini muri ico gihugu, mu kigwati  c'utuzu duto duto tw'ivyondo cagiye kiraguka kuva mu myaka iheze, kikuzura abantu bomowe n'intambara n'ibindi biza vyizana. A﻿bdul ari mu mugwi w'abantu hafi 10 baje begera aho turi. Twarababajije, tuti ni bangahe baha imiti abana babo kugira babasinzirize?  Nabo bishura bati: "Benshi, twese". Ghulam Hazrat  yaciye akora mu mufuko wiwe asokorora agapfungo k'ibinini.  Vyari ibinini vya  alprazolam - ibinini ku bisanzwe bihabwa abantu baba bafise ingorane z'umwitwarariko mwinshi. Ghulam afise abana batandatu, umuto muri bo afise umwaka umwe. Ati: "Nawe nyene ndamuha". Abandi batweretse ibinini vya escitalopram na sertraline bavuze ko baha abana babo. Ivyo navyo ku bisanzwe vyandikirwa abayinze n'abafise umwitwarariko mwinshi. A﻿baganga bavuga ko iyo ihawe abana bakiri bato kandi bataronka ivyo kurya bihagije, imiti bene iyo yonona igitigu (umwijima mu kinyarwanda), igatera 'izindi ngorane nyinshi nko kwama ufise uburuhe, n'ihungabana ryo gusinzira n'inyifato. K﻿uri farumasi imwe, twasanze ushobora kugura ibinini bitanu vy'iyo miti ikoreshwa ku ma Afghani (amafaranga yo muri Afgnistan) 10, (nka 200 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi), ayagura ikimanyu c'umukate. Myinshi mu miryango twahuye yasangira ibimanyu bikeye vy'imikate buri munsi. Umugore umwe yatubwiye ko bari bariye umukate wumye mu gitondo, mw'ijoro naho bakuwudumba mu mazi kugira worohe. O﻿NU ivuga ko ubu "akaga" kariko karaba muri Afghanistan. Abagabo benshi mu karere kari ku nkengera ya Herat bakora ibikonkwano vyo ku munsi mu mirima. Bamaze imyaka babayeho ubuzima bugoye. Hagati aho, igihe aba-Taliban bafata ubutegetsi mu kwezi kw'umunani, ariko reta yabo ntiyemerwe n'amakungu, amafaranga yaja muri Afghanistan avuye hanze yaciye ahagarikwa, bituma ubutunzi butembagara, gutyo bituma abagabo benshi kenshi bakabura  ico bakora. K﻿u munsi bagize igihamana bakaronka akazi, baca nk'ama Afghani 100 (ni ibihumbi bibiri birenga gato mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). A﻿ho twagiye hose twasanze abantu bafata ingingo zikomeye cane kugira imiryango yabo ntiyicwe n'inzara. Ammar (siryo zina ryiwe ry'ukuri) yavuze ko yabazwe kugira bamukuremwo ifyigo haraheze amezi atatu aca aratwereka n'inkovu ndende y'aho babaze - n'ahaciye inyuzi hagitukura - kuva mu kaziba k'inda utera uja mu mugongo. A﻿ri mu myaka ya 20, yategerezwa kuba  ari mu myaka iryoshe y'ubuzima bwiwe. Twanyegeje umwidondoro wiwe kugira tumukingire. Y﻿avuze ati: "Nta kundi nari kugira. Numvise ko ushobora kugurisha ifyigo ku bitaro vya hano. Nca ndajayo hanyuma ndababwira ko nshaka [kurigurisha]. Haheze amayinga make, naciye nvumva bampamagaye bansaba kuja ku bitaro." "﻿Barakoze ibipimo bikeya, hanyuma bantera umuti watumye ntasubira kumenya ubwenge. Naragize ubwoba ariko nta kundi nari kugira." Ammar bamuhaye ama Afghani hafi 270.000 (arenga miriyoni 6,2 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) kuri iryo fyigo, amenshi akaba yagiye mu kuriha amafaranga yari yaguranye kugira asumire ivyo kurya umuryango wiwe. "﻿Iyo turiye muri iri joro, irikurikira ntiturya. Maze kugurisha ifyigo ryanje, numva umenga nsigaye ndi umuntu adakwiye. Numva nihebuye. Hamwe ubuzima bwobandanya gutya, numva nzohava mpfa," niko avuga. K﻿ugurisha ingingo z'umubiri si ikintu gishasha muri Afghanistan. Vyahora bikorwa n'imbere y'uko aba-Taliban bafata ubutegetsi. Ariko n'iyo abantu bafashe ingingo nk'iyo ibabaza cane, n'ubundi basanga badashobora kuronka uburyo bwo kubaho. M﻿u nzu ata na kimwe kirimwo, yuzuye imbeho, twahasanze umugore avuga ko hari haheze amezi indwi agurishije ifyigo ryiwe. Bakoresheje ayo mafaranga mu kuriha ideni - amafaranga bari baguranye ngo bagure ubusho bw'intama. Ariko izo ntama zaciye zipfa zihitanywe n'imyuzure mu myaka iheze, gutyo baca baratakaza aho bahora bakura uburaro n'uburamuko. A﻿ma-Afghani 240.000 (miriyoni hafi 5,5 mu marundi) yaronse kuri iryo fyigo ntakwiye. "﻿Ubu nta kundi turi bugire atari ukugurisha umwana wacu w'umukobwa w'imyaka ibiri. Abatuguranye amafaranga batwamizako induru, batubwiye ngo duhe umukobwa wanyu niba mudashoboye kutwishura," niko avuga. "﻿Ndamaramazwa cane n'aho tugeze. Rimwe na rimwe numva ari vyiza gupfa kuruta kubaho gutya," ivyo navyo bivugwa n'umugabo wiwe. Kenshi cane, twarumvise inkuru z'abagurisha abakobwa babo. Nizamuddin ati: "Naragurishije umukobwa wanje w'imyaka itanu ku ma Afghani 100.000." A﻿yo ntashika ayo ifyigo rigurwa, nk'uko twabibonye. U﻿bu agateka k'abantu b'aha mu kubaho karatabagajwe n'inzara. A﻿bdul Ghafar, umwe mu ndongozi z'aho ati: "Turumva ko biteye kubiri n'amategeko ya Islam kandi ko dushira ubuzima bw'abana bacu mu kaga, ariko nta yindi nzira ihari."  M﻿u rugo rumwe twahasanze Nazia, akana k'agakobwa k'imyaka ine kariko karakina kagira utugugu na Shamshullah, musazawe w'amezi 18. S﻿e wiwe, Hazratullah, ati: "Nta mafaranga dufise yo kugura ivyo kurya, none aho nari ku musigiti natangaje ko nshaka kugurisha umukobwa wanje." N﻿azia yaragurishijwe ngo arongorwe n'umuhungu wo mu muryango wo mu ntara yo mu bumanuko ya Kandahar. Ku mwaka 14 azoca arungikwa. Gushika ubu Hazratullah amaze kwakira kabiri amafaranga yo kumugura. Hazratullah avuga ko menshi muri ayo mafaranga yakoreshejwe mu kugura ivyo kurya, ayandi imiti y'umuhungu wiwe muto. A﻿ti: "Murabe, arwaye indwara zo kurya nabi" aho akaba yaciye aduza ishati yiwe ngo atwereke ingene akada kiwe gafoye. Urugero runini rw'abana batarya ibidakwiye ni ikimenyetso c'ingaruka inzara iriko iragira ku bana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu muri Afganistan. Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) ivuga ko igitigiri c'abana bazanwa ku mavuriro yayo yitaho abana barwaye kubera kurya nabi mu gihugu ciyongeye gushika ku 47% uyu mwaka ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze. I﻿kigo ca MSF gitanga ingaburo muri Herat nico conyene gifise ivya nkenerwa bikwiye, ariko ntigifasha abo muri ico gisagara gusa, cakira kandi abo mu ntara bihana urubibe za Ghor na Badghis aho abafise izo ngorane biyongeye gushika ku 55% mu mwaka uheze. K﻿uva mu mwaka uheze, barongereje ibitanda kugira bashobore kwakira abana bakeneye kuvurwa. Ariko n'ubu ico kigo cama kirengewe. Uko iminsi ihera, niko abana bazanwa usanga bakeneye kuvurwa indwara zirenga imwe. O﻿mid, ku mezi 4, apima ibiro 4 gusa. Abaganga batubwiye ko umwana asanzwe kuri ayo mezi aba apima nibura ibiro 6,6. Nyina, Amana vyabaye ngombwa ko agurana amafaranga kugira afate urugendo rwo gushika ku bitaro aho aboneye ko atanguye kudahwa cane.  T﻿wabajije Hameedullah Motawakil, umuvugizi wa reta y'intara ya Herat ico bakora kugira bahangane n'ikibazo c'inzara. A﻿ti: "Ibi bintu vyatumwe n'ibihano mpuzamakungu vyafatiwe Afghanistan hamwe no gufatira amatungo ya Afghanistan. Reta yacu iriko iragerageza guharura abakeneye gufashwa ingene bangana. Benshi barabesha ingene bamerewe kuko bibaza ko baca bafashwa." Ni insiguro yagumye ahagazeko n'ubwo twamubwiye ko twari twabonye ibimenyetso vyeruye vy'ingene ibintu bimeze nabi cane. Y﻿avuze kandi ko aba-Taliban bariko baragerageza kugwiza ubuzi. "﻿Turiko turagerageza kwugurura ibirombe vy'ubutare bwa fer hamwe n'umugambi wo kwubaka umuringoti utwara gaz." N﻿tibisa n'uko ari ibintu bizoba ubu vuba. A﻿bantu batubwiye ko bumva barahebwe na reta y'aba-Taliban hamwe n'amakungu. I﻿nzara ni rwica-ruhoze, ingaruka zayo ntizama zica zigaragara buno nyene. K﻿ure y'amaso y'amakungu, urugero rw'akaga kariko karaba muri Afghanistan rushobora kutamenyekana, kuko ata n'umwe ariko araharura.

headline: Covid-19: indwi barapfuye inyuma yo guterwa AstraZeneca muru UK, biteye amakenga
text: Abantu indwi nibo bamaze gupfa mu Bwongereza kubera ivura ry'amaraso ryabaye inyuma y'aho baterewe urucanco rwa AstraZeneca, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo kijejwe imiti muri ico gihugu. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho habonekeye abantu bakeya bagize ikibazo c'amaraso avura bamaze guterwa uwo rucanco. Gushika ku wa 24 z'ukwa gatatu, mu bantu bangana na miriyoni 18 bari bamaze guhabwa uru rucanco, 30 muri bo nibo bagize iki kibazo c'ivura ry'amaraso. Hagati aho, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO hamwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya rijejwe imiti, yompi avuga ko inyungu z'uru rucanco zisumba kure ingaruka rushobora kugira. Umuvugizi wa AstraZeneca avuga ati: "Amagara y'umurwayi nico kintu tubandanya dushira imbere". Abahinga hamwe n'abajejwe kwihweza imiti kw'isi bariko barihweza nimba uru rucanco ari rwo koko rutera iri vura ry'amaraso, urugero bishobora kuba, n'inkurikizi ku mugambi wo gucandaga. Aya makenga niyo yatumye ibihugu bimwe bimwe harimwo Ubudagi, Ubufaransa, Ubuholande hamwe na Canada, bifata ingingo y'uko uru rucanco ruhabwa abatama n'abatamakazi gusa. Ibiharuro vyashizwe ahabona n'ikigo kijejwe kwihweza imiti mu Bwongereza MHRA vyerekana ko abantu 22 aribo bagize ibibazo vy'ivura ry'amaraso mu bwonko, kizwi nka thrombose du sinus veineux cérébral (canke cerebral venous sinus thrombosis,CVST). Hari abandi umunani nabo nyene basanze bafise ibimenyetso bishobora gutuma amaraso yabo avura. Mu butumwa muravyo (e-mail) ikigo MHRA carungikiye BBC, camenyesheje ko "abantu indwi bapfuye". Iyi ngorane kandi iramaze kwibonekeza no mu Budagi, aho abantu 31 ari bo bagize ikibazo c'amaraso kuvura, icenda bakaba barapfuye, ku bantu imiriyoni 2.7 bahawe urucanco rwa AstraZeneca, abenshi muri bo bakaba ari abagore bakiri bato. Iki nico catumye ku musi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi reta ifata ingingo yo kubangira kurutera abakiri bato. Gushika ubu, ntibiratomoreka. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, ikigo kijejwe imiti ku mugabane wa Buraya (EMA) cavuze ko ata kivyemeza ariko ko bishoboka. Iki kigo kiriko kirihweza nimba iri vura ry'amaraso ari inkurikizi ry'uru rucanco canke nimba ari ikintu cari gisanzwe cobaye bigaca bihurirana. Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kuko iyaba vyari ibintu bishobora gushikira nk'umwe mu bihumbi cumi, aha vyaca bigaragara neza koko ko ari inkurikizi. Hagati aho, umuhinga mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu, Prof. Linda Bauld wo kw'ishure kaminuza rya Edinburgh, yabwiyte BBC  ko iki kibazo ari "ikintu kidahuse kiribonekeza" agashimangira ko gushika ubu ata "cemeza nimba koko ari ingaruka z'uru rucanco". Ahanura abantu kubandanya bitabira incaco, akongerako ati: "Covid yonyene ubwayo irashobora gutuma amaraso avura, kandi bishoboka ko ibi ari bimwe mu biriko bituma tubona ibi bintu". Muri kino gihe, isi yose ibandanya isuzuma neza aya makuru, ariko insobanuro nyayo ishobora gufata igihe kitari gito.

headline: Umuti wa mbere wa SIDA uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire wemejwe
text: Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barwaye umugera wa SIDA bagiye guhabwa umuti uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire, maze bagahagarika vya binini bama bafata buri musi. Abagiraneza bishimiye cane uyu muti mushasha wemejwe n'ikigo kijejwe ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza NHS. Uyu muti utuma umugera ugabanya inguvu, ukaba ukora co kimwe na vya binini vyo gupfupfahaza bisanzwe bifatwa buri musi. Vyitezwe ko mu Bwongereza abantu bababa 13.000 bashobora guca bahindukirira uyu muti. Imiti Cabotegravir (uzwi kandi kw'izina rya Vocabria ukaba wahinguwe n'ikigo ViiV Healthcare) hamwe na rilpivirine (uwu nawo ukaba uzwi kandi nka Rekambys wahinguwe na Janssen) ni imiti iterwa incuro zibiri rumwe rumwe ukwarwo rimwe mu mezi abiri. Hagati aho, uwu muti ugirira akamaro gusa barya bantu bageze ku rugero rw'aho umugera utakiboneka mu maraso inyuma y'igihe bariko barafata vya binini. Abahinga bavuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugirira akamaro abantu benshi. Umwigisha wa kaminuza Chloe Orkin, akaba ari umuhinga mu bijanye n'umugera wa SIDA kuri kaminuza ya Queen Mary i Londres/London, avuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugabaniriza abarwayi umuzigo wo kwama bafata vya binini buri musi, kuko wowo bazowuterwa incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka. Muganga Sanjay Bhagani, arongoye ishirahamwe European Aids Clinical Society, avuga ati: "Iki ni ikintu gikomeye cane". "Kunenwa ni ikibazo gikomeye cane ku banduye umugera wa SIDA, kandi abatari bake ntiboroherwa no gufata ibinini imisi yose. Ibi rero bizotuma abenshi baronswa uwu muti uterwa mu rushinge". Alex Sparrowhawk w'i Manchester, asanzwe akora mw'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya SIDA rizwi nka Terrence Higgins Trust. Haciye imyaka 12 yanduye umugera wa SIDA, kuva ico gihe akaba ari ku binini vya  ART imisi yose. Avuga ko ari ikintu kiryoheye ugutwi kwumva ko hari uwundi muti ushobora kugabanya uwu muzigo. "Iyi nkuru ni ikintu abantu benshi bari bamaze igihe kirekire barindiranye igishika. "Iciyumviro co guterwa umuti incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka hagufata imiti ya misi yose ni ikintu gishimishije cane. Kwibuka ko wama ufata imiti ya SIDA  buri musi vyama bwikwibutsa ko urwaye SIDA  kandi ntibishobora kukuvamwo. "Hari abantu bashobora kuba babana n'abandi batazi ko banduye canke batanduye umugera, canke usanga bakora mu buzi bubatuma bazunguruka irya n;ino kw'isi, ibi bigashobora kuba inzitizi ku kwama umuntu afata imiti imisi yose". Kubw'iwe, abakwiye gushirwa imbere mu kuronswa uwu muti ni abo bose bawukeneye cane gusumba abandi, nk'akarorero abasanzwe bahura n'ikibazo co kunenwa.

headline: Ebola: DR Congo yatanguje isekeza ryo gucandaga i Butembo
text: Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo yatanguje isekeza ryo gucandaga abanyagihugu bo mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu inyuma y'aho ikiza ca Ebola gisubiriye kwibonekeza muri ako karere nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. DR Congo itangaza ko abantu bane ari bo bamaze kwanduka Ebola kuva gisubiriye kwibonekeza ku wa 07 z'ukwa kabiri  mu karere ka Butembo. OMS ivuga ko abakozi bo ku kigo c'ubuvuzi muri ako karere habonetsemwo umuntu wa mbere yayanduye ari bo bahereyeko gucandaga. Aya makuru aje haciye umusi umwe gusa igihugu ca Guinée kiri mu burengero bwa Afrika gitangaje ko catewe  n'iki kiza. Ikiza ca Ebola muri DR Congo cari catangajwe ko carangiye mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze wa 2020. Cari cahitanye abantu 2.287 kuva mu kwa munani 2018. Doze zishika 8.000 z'urucanco rwa Ervebo, zari zasigaye igihe iki kiza gitangazwa ko carangiye, nizo ziriko  ziratangwa muri rino sekeza, nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamakuru wa BBC akorera i Kinshasa Emery Makumeno . Ervebo ni rwo rucanco rwa Ebola rwemejwe ubwa mbere n'ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe imiti n'imfungurwa (FDA) mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2019. Ku wa Mungu, Guinée yatangaje ko ikiza ca Ebola casubiye gutera muri ico gihugu, inyuma y'aho habonekeye abantu indwi banduye hamwe na batatu cahitanye. Batanguye bacibwamwo, badahwa kandi bava amaraso inyuma y'aho bitabiriye igikorwa co gufuba umubikira hafi y'igisagara ca Nzérékoré kiri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP risubiramwo Alfred George Ki-Zerbo, aserukira OMS muri Guinée aho avuga ati: "OMS iri maso kandi iriko iravugana n'ihinguriro ry'urucanco kugira ngo haboneke doze zikenewe kugira ngo tukirwanye amazi atararenga inkombe". Hagati ya  2013 na 2016, abarenga 11.000 nibo bahitanywe n'ikiza ca Ebola mu burengero bwa Afrika cari catanguriye muri Guinée nyene. Umukuru w'igihugu wa Liberia George Weah yasavye abajejwe amagara y'abantu kumera magabo kugira ngo ico kiza ntigihave kibinjirana. Umunyamakuru wa BBC muri Sierra Leone, Umaru Fofana, avuga ko mu gihugu abanyagihugu bafitiye ubwoba Ebola gusumba Covid-19. Avuga ko kuba hari incanco nshasha bibaha umwizero  - ni mu gihe hari doze 500.000 zategekanijwe mu runani mpuzamakungu rw'incanco, Gavi. Ibi bihugu bitatu bifise abantu baharurwa muri miriyoni 22,5, ibitera impungenge ko abahingura izi ncanco bashobora kutaronka umwanya uhagije wo gukora izindi ncanco mu gihe zokenerwa kubera ubu hagezweho incanco za Covid, nk'uko uyu munyamakuru abivuga. Ebola ni iki?

headline: Russia: habonetse abantu ba mbere banduye umugera H5N8 w’akamangu k’inkoko
text: Uburusiya bumenyesha ko abantu ba mbere banduye umugera wa H5N8 utera indwara y'akamangu (ibicurane) k'inkoko. Abategetsi bavuga ko abantu indwi bakora mw'iyororero ry'inkoko riri mu bumanuko bw'ico gihugu banduye uwu mugera wadutse mu kwa cumi na kabiri kw'umwaka uheze. "Aba bantu bose indwi …bameze neza", ibi bikavugwa n'umuganga akaba n'umuhanuzi mu vyo amagara y'abantu mu Burusiya, Anna Popova. Avuga ko haciye hafatwa ingingo zikenewe kugira ngo ntihagire abandi bantu bandura. Umupfasoni Popova avuga ko ata kintu na kimwe cerekana ko iyo ndwara yashobora kwinjira mu bantu, akavuga ko bamaze kubimenyesha mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. Arashimira laboratoire Vektor yo muri ico gihugu yashoboye gutora uwo mugera muri abo bakozi. Popova ati: "Kubona uwu mugera watowe hakiri kare utarashobora kugira ububasha bwo kuva mu muntu uja mu wundi, biduha, twese kw'isi yose, akaryo ko kwitegura neza kugira ngo dushobore guhangana nawo". Avuga ko abahinga b'Uburusiya ubu baca batangura kwiga ingene bashobora gupima abantu. Hari ubundi bwoko bw'ibicurane vy'inkoko bwandukira abantu rimwe na rimwe mbere abapfa bagapfa - ariko ubu nibwo bwa mbere uwu mugera wa H5N8 wasimvye ukinjira mu kiremwa muntu.

headline: Abanganga bateye ifyigo ry'ingurube ku muntu umubiri wiwe ntiwaryanka
text: Abanganga babaga muri Amerika bavuga ko bashoboye guha ifyigo ry'ingurube umuntu mu gikorwa gikomeye co gutera umuntu ingingo zikomotse ahandi bizigiye ko kizofasha gutorera inyishu ubukene bw'ingingo zikekenewe na benshi. Uwo yatewe iryo fyigo ubwonko bwiwe bwari bwamaze gupfa, bisigura ko bifashisha imashini zo kugumiza ibice bimwe kubandanya ari bizima ariko ata mahirwe y'uko umuntu wese yari gusubira kuba muzima. Iryo fyigo ryavuye mu ngurube yahinduriwe bimwe muri kamere kayo (génétiquement modifié/genetically modified) kugira babuze ko "rimenyekana nk'irinyamahanga" hanyuma ngo umubiri uryanke. Ico gikorwa ntikirihwezwa n'abandi baganga canke ngo gisohoke ku mugaragaro ariko bitegekanijwe ko ivyo bikorwa. Abahinga bavuga ko ariryo gerageza rya mbere riteye imbere cane muri ico gisata gushika ubu. Ibipimo nk'ivyo vyari bimaze gukorwa ku bikoko bitari abantu, ariko gushika ubu nta muntu yari bwageragerezweko. Ariko gukoresha  ingingo zivuye ku ngurube si icuyumviro gishasha. Uduce tw'umutima twitwa valves dusanzwe dukoreshwa cane ku bantu. Kandi ingingo z'ingurube zirahura neza cane n'izo abantu ku vyerekeye ubunini. Ico gikorwa co kubaga camaze amasaha abiri n'inusu mu kigo c'ubuvuzi ca kaminuza ya New York University Langone. Abo baganga bafatanije iryo fyigo ry'ingurube n'inzira z'amaraso z'uwo muntu yari yamaze gupfa ubwonko kugira barabe ko ryokora hamwe boritera umuntu canke ko umubiri woryanka. Ku minsi ibiri n'igice ikurikira baciye bakurikiranira hafi iryo fyigo, basuzuma cane banakora ibipimo vyinshi. Umushakashatsi yari arongoye abandi Dr Robert Montgomery yabwiye BBC ati: "Twabonye ifyigo ahanini ryakoze nk'ifyigo ryatewe rivuye mu wundi muntu, ivyo vyagaragaye nk'ibihuye co kimwe n'uko vyagenze no ku bindi vyose vyokorwa n'ifyigo ry'umuntu risanzwe. "Ryarakoze uko bisanzwe, kandi ntavyabonetse ko umubiri waryanka". Abo baganga babaga bateye kandi agace k'iyindi ngingo y'ingurube yitwa glande thymus hamwe n'iryo fyigo. Bibaza ko iyo ngingo ishobora gufasha guhagarika ko umubiri w'umuntu amaherezo wokwanka iryo fyigo mu gukukumba uturemangingo two kwigwanira twoba twagiye ku ruhande ubundi  dushobora kurwanya iyo ngingo ivuye ku ngurube. Umuntu nawe asanzwe yaratewe uwundi mutima, Dr Montgomery avuga ko hakenewe vyihuta ko haboneka uburyo bwo kurondera ingingo zo guha abantu bari ku rutonde rwo kurindira kuzironka, n'ubwo yemera ko igikorwa ciwe kidahurizwako. "Ic'uko nk'uko vyamye kuva kera hari uwubanza gupfa kugira uwundi muntu abeho ntikizokwigera gitanga inyishu ikwiye. "Nta nkeka ko numva impungenge, kandi ico novuga ni uko gushika ubu 40% abantu barindiriye guterwa ingingo bapfa batarazironka. "Ingurube turazirya, turakoresha ingurube mu buvuzi - ku duce tw'umutima bita valve, ku miti. Nibaza ko no kuri ivyo bidatandukanye cane." Yavuze ko ubushakashatsi bukiri mu ntango ko rero hakenewe gukorwa ibindi vyigwa vyinshi, ariko yongerako ati: "Biduha, uko ndavyibaza, icizere ko ata kibazo mu minsi tubijanye  mu bitaro". Umuryango w'uwo yagiriweko ibipimo, yari asanzwe yarifuje ko yotanga ingingo, waratanze uruhusha rw'uko abo baganga bakora ico gikorwa. Urwego rwa Amerika rugenzura bene ivyo bikorwa FDA narwo rwaremeye ko hakoreshwa ingingo y'ingurube yahinduriwe kamere  mu  bushakashatsi nk'ubwo. Dr Montgomery yizeye ko mu myaka cumi,  izindi ngingo z'ingurube - imitima, amahaha n'ibitigu (imyijima) - bishobora kuzohabwa abantu bakeneye  guterwa ingingo. Dr Maryam Khosravi, umuganga w'amafyigo no gukurikirana abantu bategerezwa kwitabwo cane mu bitaro (intensive care) akorera urwego ruvuza abantru mu Bwongereza, NHS, avuga ati: "Gutera abantu ingingo z'ibikoko n'ibintu tumaze imyaka myinshi twiga, kandi ni vyiza kubona abo bantu bateye iyindi ntambwe imbere muri iyo nzira." Ariko ku karangumutima k'ibirekurwa n'umwugwa gukorwa avuga ati: " Kuba twobishobora ntibisigura ko dutegerezwa kubikora. Nibaza ko umuryango w'abakora muri ico gisata ariwo utegerezwa kwishura ivyo bibazo." Umuvugizi w'igisata c'amaraso n'ugutera ingingo zivuye ahandi, avuga ko gutanga ingingo zivuye ku bandi bantu arivyo bishirwa imbere gushika ubu. "Haracari inzira ndende imbere y'uko ingingo bene izo zija mu buzima bwa minsi yose. "Mu gihe abashakashatsi n'abavura tubandanya dukora ibishoboka vyose kugira twongereze amahirwe y'abarwayi bakeneye kuronka ingingo, turacakeneye ko umwe umwe wese mu batanga ingingo afata icemezo co kubikora hanyuma akamenyesha umuryango wiwe ico yifuza ko coba hamwe ibihe vyo gutanga ingingo vyoshoboka."

headline: Japan yabonye uducafu twirabura mu rucanco rwa Moderna
text: Ubuyapani bwabaye burashira ku ruhande intekera (lot/batch) y'urucanco rwa Covid -19 kubera  agacupa gatowemwo uducafu. Umuhinga w'imiti (pharmacien) yabonye utuntu twinshi twirabura mu gacupa kamwe k'izo ncanco mu ntara (prefecture) ya Kanagawa, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Abantu bashika 3.790 bari bamaze guterwa urucanco rwo muri iyo ntekera.  Izari zisigaye muri yo zabaye zirashirwa ku ruhande. Ivyo bishitse ata n'indwi iheze Ubuyapani buhagaritse ikoreshwa ry'incanco zirenga umuriyoni n'ibihumbi 600 za Moderna kubera zarimwo ubucafu. Uwo muhinga w'imiti yabonye utwo ducafu twirabura ariko arasuzuma ko ata bintu birimwo  ataho bihuriye n'izo ncanco imbere y'uko zikoreshwa. Uwusanzwe akwiragiza izo ncanco mu gihugu yaciye atwara ako gacupa gashobora kuba karimwo ubucafu. Ibinyamukuru vyo mu gihugu bivuga ko gushika ubu ata cemeza ko hari ingaruka mbi zihari  ku buzima bw'abantu ziturutse kuri urwo rucanco rushobora kuba rurimwo utwo ducafu. Takeda Pharmaceutical, ikigo kigurisha kikanakwiragiza urwo rucanco mu Buyapani, ku ndwi iheze cari cashize ku ruhande intekera  zitatu z'urwo rucanco inyuma y'aho bigaragariye ko zarimwo "ibintu ataho bihuriye narwo" mu ducupa tumwe tumwe tw'intekera yarimwo uducupa hafi ibihumbi 560. Ikigo ca Rovi co muri Espagne, arico gishira urwo rucanco mu ducupa, cavuze  mw'itangazo ko umurongo w'ihinguriro aho muri Espagne ushobora kuba ariwo wateye iyo ngorane. Congeyeko ko kiriko kirakora amatohoza. Ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji w'Ubuyapani ajejwe amagara y'abantu yavuze ko uducafu twatowe mu ncanco mu ntara yo mu bumanuko ya Okinawa twavuye ku nshinge zinjizwa ukutariko mu ducupa. Ubuyapani busanzwe buhanzwe n'ukwiyongera kw'abandura   indwara ya Covid mu gihe ico gihugu kiriko kiraberamwo inkino za Olympic z'abagendana ubumuga (Paralympic). Ibikorwa vyo gucandaga mu Buyapani bisa n'ivyikweze, gushika ubu urugero rw'abamaze kuronka incanzo zuzuye rungana na 40%b na 50% bamaze kuronka urwa mbere gusa.

headline: Uko abahinga babaze umwana akiri mu mbanyi, nyina wiwe yamwise 'Igitangaro'
text: "Ikintu ico ari co cose kibi gishobora gushika, ariko rero kubona nashoboye gukora (kubaga) uyu mwana, nibaza ko ari co kintu ciza nashoboye kumukorera. Mu mutwe wanje, nta kundi vyari kugenda - nategerezwa kumubaga". Inyuma y'incuro indwi zose bagerageza kumutera urubuto rwamaze guhura n'intanga (fécondation in vitro, IVF), Helena yari yamaze kwihebura ko ata wundi mwana wa kabiri azigera aronka. Ariko rero ku ncuro igira indwi, yashoboye gusama imbanyi mbere ibintu bibandanya neza gushika ku ndwi igira 20 aho bamupima bakabona ko hari ikibazo. Ico gihe, Helena yabwiwe ko umwana wiwe w'umukobwa yari yibungenze yari afise ikibazo c'uruti rw'umugongo (spina bifida). Avuga ingene bamubwiye, Helena avuga ati: "Yari afise intoboro nini ku mugongo kandi igice c'uruti rw'umugongo cari hanze. Bambwiye ko yari afise igihamana kibi co kumugara, ntashobore kwifata mu gusohora umwanda mukuru na muto, akaba kandi inyuma y'aho yategerezwa guterwa akaringoti ko kuvoma amazi yaboneka mu bwonko". "Narataye umutwe bambwiye ingaruka zose zishobora kumubako kubera izi ngorane, igihe cose nama mu marira". "Bamwiye ko amahirwe yo gutambuka yari make , make cane rwose - numva n'inguvu zose zimperanye". Mu misi yakurikiye, Helena yarungitswe ku bipimo bamwemerera ko bashobora kumubaga. Amaze indwi 23 yibungenze, yarungitswe ku bitaro vy'abahinga mu Bubirigi, bikorana n'ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu c'Ubwongereza, NHS. Umurwi w'abahinga ugizwe n'abantu hafi 25 nibo bakoze ico gikorwa kidasanzwe kandi kigoye, bashobora kubaga uyo mwana yari mu nda barakora urwo ruti rw'umugongo banazibira intoboro yari mu mugongo wiwe. Helena ati: "Nari nzi ko ni batambaga ubuzima bwiwe buzoba ukundi". Umwigisha wa kaminuza Anna David, akaba n'umuhanuzi ku bijanye n'amagara y'impinja kw'ishure kaminuza y'ubuvuzi ya Londres (University College Hospital), avuga ati: "Mu myaka iheze, uru ruhinja rwari gutegerezwa kubagwa kugira rusanasanwe rumaze kuvuka - ariko rero kubera ubu dushobora kubaga umwana ari mu nda ya nyina, iyo ntoboro twashoboye kuyizibira hakiri kare cane, bisigura ko ata ngorane nyinshi uruti rw'umugongo ruzogira". "Ibi biha amahirwe menshi uyu mwana gushobora gutambuka akanagenzura gusumba uruhago n'urura vyiwe". Haciye amezi atatu akozwe, Helena yahavuye yibaruka umukobwa wiwe Mila - impfunyapfunyo ya milagro, bisigura igitangaro mu rurimi rw'iki espangol - ku bitaro vyegukira iri shure kaminuza rya Londres. Mila aracafise uruziruzi mu bwonko, ariko gushika ubu ibimenyetso vyerekana ko abandanya akura neza. Helena ati: "Arashobora kuzungagiza amaguru we nyene, kandi umukoze ku mano aravyuma neza, n'ukuri ni ibintu bitangaje cane". "Nshimira cane aba baganga bakoze iki gikorwa co kumubaga kuko iyo bitagenda uko, ubuzima bwiwe bwari kuba ukundi". Iyi ndwara Spina bifida y'uruti rw'umugongo ikaba ifata abana bari mu mbanyi bashika hafi 1,500 ku mwaka mu Bwongereza, ituma uruti rw'umugongo rudakura neza. Ishobora gutera ubumuga, canke ibibazo vy'uruhago, urura n'amafyigo. Ariko iyo abaganga bashoboye kumubaga imbanyi imaze indwi hagati ya 22 na 26 hakurindira avutse, umwana ashobora kubaho neza. Iki gikorwa gisanzwe gikorwa n'abahinga bo mu bitaro vy'ishure kaminuza ya Londres (University College London), ibitaro vy'abana Great Ormond Street Hospital, hamwe n'ibitaro vyegukira Ishure kaminuza ya Louvain mu Bubirigi. Impinja 32 ziramaze gukorwa muri ubu buryo kuva mu kwa mbere 2020. Prof Stephen Powis, arongoye igisata c'ubuvuzi mu kigo NHS c'Ubwongereza, avuga ko aka ari akarorero kamwe mu buhinga bugezweho mu vyo ubuvuzi bikorwa n'ikigo NHS. "Hampande yo kurwanya ikiza karanda gihanze isi, NHS irabandanya ibi bikorwa bidasanzwe no kwitaho abarwaye". Kate Steele, arongoye ikigo Shine gifata mu mugongo imiryango yashikiwe n'iyi ndwara spina bifida ifata uruti rw'umugongo, hamwe n'indwara yo kuvyimba umutwe (hydrocéphalie), avuga ati: "Turizeye ko umuryango uwo ari wo wose ushobora gukenera ubu buhinga bwo gukora uruhinja ruri mu mbanyi uronswa akaryo ko gutahuzwa ko iyo nzira ari yo nyayo kandi bakabona ko bafashwe mu mugongo, nk'uko vyabaye kuri Helena".

headline: Incanco za Covid: Unicef isaba ibihugu vya G7 gutanga incanco kugira ntizizopfe ubusa
text: Unicef igabisha ko miriyoni z'incanco za Covid zishobora gutabwa hamwe ibihugu bitunze vyorungikira ibihugu bikenye  ica rimwe izo bizoba bisigaje. Ubwongereza n'abandi baremeye gutanga incanco zirenze ku zo bakeneye - ariko basabwa gutanga nyinshi hakiri kare. Ivyamamare birimwo Billie Eilish na David Beckham bashigikiye ako kamo ka Unicef. Abo rurangiranwa bashize umukono kw'ikete bandikiye umugwi w'ibihugu indwi vya mbere bitunze cane kw'isi G7 - birimwo Ubwogereza - babisaba gutanga 20% y'incanco zavyo gushika mu kwezi kw'umunani. Beckham yavuze ati: "Ikiza ntikizorangira na hamwe gushika kirangiye hose." Abandi muri abo rurangiranwa bashize umukono kuri iryo kete barimwo Andy Murray, Olivia Colman, Ewan McGregor, Liam Payne, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Orlando Bloom, Katy Perry, Gemma Chan, Whoopi Goldberg, Claudia Schiffer na  Chris Hoy. Uwurongoye umugambi w'incanco muri Unicef Lily Caprani yabwiye ikiganiro BBC Newsnight ko ibihugu bikeneye guha urucanco abanyagihugu bavyo igihe kimwe co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu. Yavuze ati: "Hazogera igihe, aho nta nkeka, aho tuzokenera guha incanco abafise munsi y'imyaka 18, "Ariko ikiza imbere muri iki gihe n'uko abantu bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo kwandura bobanza bakaronka incanco. "Nico gituma tuvuga ko ibihugu nk'Ubwongereza na G7  bikeneye gutanga incanco zavyo ku bihugu bikenye ubu, mu gihe bibandanya gutanga incanco ku banyagihugu bavyo." Ariko ku ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu Matt Hancock yavuze ko gucandaga  abana mu Bwongereza bizoshirwa imbere  yo  kurungika incanco hanze. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bihugu, Ubwongereza ntiburavuga  incanco butegekanya guha umugambi wa Covax ingene zingana, gusa bwemeza ko buzotanga izizoba zirenzeko. Ku wa gatanu Hancock yavuze ko Ubwongereza ubu ata ncanco zirengako bufise. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi abantu 100 bahoze ari abashikiranganji ba mbere , abakuru b'ibihugu n'abashikiranganji  b'imigenderanire basavye abakuru b'ibihugu vya G7 gutanga 2/3 vya miriyaridi hafi 66 z'ama dollars zo gutanga incanco za Covid mu bihugu vy'amikoro make. Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere Tony Blair yavuze ati: ''uko ibintu biri" n'uko ama reta "ategereza kubanza kwitaho abanyagihugu bayo" gutyo akazokwama abanza gutanga incanco mu bihugu vyayo ubwa mbere. Ariko yongeyeko ati:  "Ntushobora kuba ntabanduka kuri ico, hari incanco zishobora kuba zirarungikwa". Uwundi yahoze ari umushikuranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, Gordon Brown, yavuze ko G7 n'ibindi bihugu bitunze "bitegerezwa gutanga intererano yavyo" kugira bifashe ibice vya Afrika na Asia. Madame  Caprani  wa Unicef yasavye ibihugu vya  G7 gutangura gutanga incanco ubu kandi bibandanye mu ci gushika umwaka uhere. Yavuze ati: "Ibihugu  vy'uburyo  buke bikeneye incanco ziguma ziza  zishika ubwo nyene zigaca zishikira mu minwe y'abakozi bo mu buvuzi". "Ingaruka atawifuza yo kuvuga ko izo ncanco zose zizozira icarimwe  igihe ca Noheli n'uko ibihugu bitazoshobora kuzakira no guca bizikoresha  zose ubwo nyene gutyo zihave zicika impfagusa. Dushobora gusanga miriyomi z'incanco zidakoreshejwe hanyuma zigata igihe, kandi ako  koba ari akaga." Muri iryo lkete, abo  rurangiranwa bavuze ko Unicef isanzwe yaratanguye gutanga incanco mu gihugu bikenye - ariko ko iryo shami rya ONU n'ub u rikibuze incanco zingana na miriyoni 190. Iryo kete ryavuze ko ibihugu vya G7 - Ubwongereza, Canada, Ubufaransa, Ubudagi, Ubutaliano, Ubuyapani na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika -  vuba bigiye kuzoronka izikwiye kugira bitange 20% y'incanco zavyo hagati y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu n'ukwa munani ata  ngaruka nini bigize ku mugambi wavyo mu bihugu hagati, ivyo bibaye umugambi Covax wo gusaranganya incanco woca uronka izishika miriyoni 150. Iryo  kete ryandikiwe ibihugu vya G7 rivuga riti: "Umugera uracariko urakwiragira mu bihugu vyinshi, kandi wihinduranya mu  bwoko bushasha ku buryo ushobora gutuma twese dusubira aho ku ntango. Bamwe muri abo rurangiranwa nk'umukinyi wa tennis Murray basaba kandi abantu mu Bwongereza gutanga intererano ku mugambi wa Unicef wo guterereza imfashanyo yo kurwanya Covd, VaccinAid Appeal. Mu nama ya G7 mu mpera z'iyi ndwi, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yitezwe gusaba ko hashingwa ihangiro ryo kuba isi yose yaronse incanco gushika mu mpera za 2022. Abaharanira ko incanco zisaragwanywa kw'isi n'abaraba ibintu n'ibindi hamwe n'umugwi w'abashingamateka -  bavuga ko hakenewe icokorwa ubu kandi ko Ubwongereza bukwiye  kugaba urucanco rumwe kuri rumwe rwose ruba rwinjiye muri ico gihugu. Ubwongereza buramaze guha Covax intererano y'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 775 z'ama dorari, incanco zingana n'igice c'umuriyoni za AstraZeneza nazo zikaba zaratumweko n'ibindi bihugu kugira bizirungike hanze. Abarongoye ibihugu vy'umugwi wa G7 bazohurira mu nama i Cornwall mu Bwongereza mu mpera z'iyi ndwi. Amerika, Ubufaransa,  Ubudagi, Ubutaliano n'Ubuyapani vyose vyaramaze kumenyesha igitigiri c'incanco bizoha Covax. Co kimwe n'Ubwongereza, Canada nta gitgiri iramenyesha muri uwo mugambi wo gutanga.

headline: 'Tanzania ntiyirukira urucanco rwa Corona' - Prezida Magufuli
text: Prezida wa Tanzania John Pombe Magufuli yagabishije abajejwe amagara y'abantu ku kuzana incanco za Covid-19 - baterekanye ivyemeza - kuko zishobora kubangamira amagara y'abanyagihugu. Magufuli yavuze ati: "Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu ategerezwa kuhagabira, bashobora kwirukira izo ncanco hadakozwe ubushakashatsi, si incanco zose ari nziza kuri twebwe, dutegerezwa kwivyitondera. "Incanco si nziza. Iyaba umuzungu yashobora gutora incanco, yobaye yaratoye urucanco rwa Sida, Cancer na TB." Prezida wa Tanzania, John Pombe Magufuli yagabishije kuvyerekeye urucanco rwa Covid-19 rumaze gutangura gutangwa mu bihugu bitandukanye vy'isi. Igihe yariko arugurura icese iterwa ry'ibiti mw'ishamba mu karere ka Chato mu ntara ya Geita, yagize kandi ico avuga ku kungene ingwara ya Corona yifashe mu gihugu, aca ahamagarira abanyagihugu  kubandanya gusenga no kwiyubikira. Yagize ati: "Tubandanya kwiyubara, no kwiyubikira hamwe no gusenga, mu gihe tubandanya n'akazi ka misi yose, murye neza muhage Corona inanirwe kwinjira mu mibiri yanyu." Na yo kuvyerekeye ko hariho ubundi bwoko bwa Corona, Magufuli yavuze ko hariho aba Tanzania baja gucancwa hanze y'igihugu ariko bakagaruka bazanye ubundi bwoko bwa Corona. Prezida Magufuli yagize ati: "Ndazi ko hariho aba Tanzania bamwe bamwe bavuye muri kino gihugu baja hanze gucancwa, bahejeje bagaca baza batuzaniye iyindi Corona y'ubundi bwoko." "Ntituze turirukira incanco incanco, si buri rucanco rutugirira akamaro, ni ngombwa ko aba Tanzania tuba maso, tugabe, tuzogeragezwa, tubandanya gusenga Imana yacu kandi tubandanye kwinengesera." Ivyo prezida Magufuli abivuze mu gihe Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaraye isohoye itangazo aho igabisha ko ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus n'abicwa na Covid-19 bigenda vyiyongera, ihamagarira abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira.

headline: Coronavirus: Boris Johnson, Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, araremvye cane
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yashizwe mu gisata c'abaremvye cane kwa muganga nyuma y'aho ibimenyetso vya coronavirus yari afise vyunyukiye. Umuvugizi yavuze ko yimuriwe muri ico gisata ku mpanuro z'umugwi w'abaganga kandi ko ariko araronka ubuvuzi "bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru". Bwana Johnson yasavye umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire Dominic Raab ngo amusubirire "aho bikenewe", nk'uko uwo muvugizi yabandanije avuga. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson w'imyaka 55, yinjijwe ibitaro i London afise "ibimenyetso vy'urutavanako" ku wa mungu. Urwandiko rwo mu biro vyiwe rwagize ruti: "Kuva kuwa Mungu mw'ijoro, umushikiranganji wa mbere ariko aravurwa n'abaganga ku bitaro vya St Thomas, i London, nyuma yo kwakirwa afise ibimenyetso vy'urutavanako vya coronavirus. "Ku muhingamo wose w'uno munsi, umushikiranganji wa mbere yabandanije kuremba kandi, ku mpanuro y'umugwi w'abaganga, yimuriwe mu gisata c'abaremvye cane muri ibi bitaro." Urwo rwandiko rwabandanije ruti: "Umushikiranganji wa mbere ariko araronka ubuvuzi bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru, kandi agashimira abavuzi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi NHS, ku kazi gakomeye bariko barakora hamwe no kwitanga kwabo." Umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutunzi, Rishi Sunak, yavuze ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyerekeye umushikiranganji wa mbere hamwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe yibungenze, Carrie Symonds, kandi ko Bwana Johnson "azosimba iyi manga aze akomere gusumvya." Umukuru w'umugambwe mukuru utavuga rumwe na leta, Labour, Sir Keir Stamer yavuze ko ivyashikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere ari "amakuru y'incamugongo." Bwana Johnson yabanje gutwarwa kwa muganga gupimwa bisanzwe nyuma yo gufatwa na coronavirus haraciye iminsi 10. Ibimenyetso yari afise vyarimwo kugira umuriro hamwe no gukorora.

headline: Abagore bashika 50 bo muri Afrika y’Epfo 'bagizwe ingumba kubera barwaye umugera wa SIDA'
text: Amatohoza yakozwe muri Afrika y'Epfo yerekana ko abagore bashika 50 basanzwe baranduye umugera wa SIDA bagizwe ingumba ku nguvu imbere y'uko bibaruka mu bitaro bitandukanye muri ico gihugu. Umurwi ujejwe uburinganire hagati y'abagabo n'abagore muri ico gihugu (CGE) uvuga ko ibitaro vya leta vyahonyanze agateka k'abakenyezi mu gihe "ubugumba batewe ku nguvu butuma bafatwa nabi bakabaho mu gatotezo". Ayo matohoza yashizwe ahabona ejo ku wa mbere yatanguye gukorwa mu 2015 igihe amashirahamwe abiri aharanira agateka k'abagore yitura uyo murwi afise amazina y'abantu 48 bavugwa ko bagizwe ingumba ku nguvu, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Uwo murwi waciye utangura kwegeranya ivyemezo kuri abo bagore bavugwa ko batewe ubugumba. Uwo murwi wasanze abaganga bo mu bitaro bimwe bimwe vya leta batera ubugumba abagore bategerezwa gukorwa mu kuvyara, bababwira ko abanduye umugera badategerezwa kuvyara abana, ngo kandi ko bashobora gupfa mu gihe bosubira kuvyara. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "Rimwe rimwe, mu gihe bari mu bubabare burenze urugero bari ku bise, abo bagore bategekwa gutera igikumu ku nguvu ku rwandiko bagiye kumenya mu nyuma ko rwari urwo kwiyemeza ko batanze uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uburyo bwose kugira babatere ubugumba". Abakoze ayo matohoza basanze hari abaganga muri ivyo bitaro batera ubwoba abo bagore ko mu gihe batotera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko badashobora kubafasha kuvyara. Ubwo bubisha buvugwa muri ico cegeranyo bwakozwe hagati ya 2002 na 2015. Uwo murwi kandi wagiriza abo baganga ko barenze ku "masezerano biyemeje yo kuvura abantu". Ico cegeranyo cashikirijwe ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwa Afrika y'Epfo. Uwo murwi umenyesha ko vyabaye ibintu bigoye kurangiza ayo matohoza kubera amafishe y'abo bagore "yari yatakaye" mu bitaro. Umukuru w'uwo murwi, Tamara Mathebula, avuga ko "bitaboneka neza ingene ico kibazo cifashe muri Afrika y'Epfo, ariko turizeye ko ivyo twasavye bizotuma imiryango yuguruka maze ibinyegejwe bikamenyekana". Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Zwelini Mkhize, yasavye umubonano wihuta n'umupfasoni Mathebula  kugira ngo bavugane kuri ico cegeranyo, nk'uko bivugwa na Reuters isubiramwo ivyavuzwe n'ubwo bushikiranganji.

headline: Yataye ibiro 89 mu myaka ibiri... akiza amagara yiwe
text: Yataye ibiro 89 mu myaka ibiri... akiza amagara yiwe, mu gihe abaganga bari bataye icizere kuko ubunini bwiwe bw'ikirenga bwari bwamuteye indwara nyinshi.

headline: Umushikiranji w'amagara muri Kongo yasezeye kubera ukutumvikana mu kurwanya Ebola
text: Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo yatanze imihoho mu kwiyamiriza ingingo ya leta yo mu ndwi iheze yo kwifatira mu minwe kurwanya ebola mu buseruko. Olly Ilunga yanditse ikete ryo gutanga imihoho aho yavuze yuko hari ukwivanga gukabije mu gutunganya ibikorwa vyo guhangana n'iki kiza, ca kabiri muri kahise kimaze guhitana benshi. Yiyamirije kandi igitsure co hanze catumye hakoreshwa urikingo rwa kabiri rwa Ebola rukigeragezwa, kandi yari yasavye ko rutokoreshwa. Kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani abantu barenga igihumbi n'amajana indwi baramaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Mu ndwi iheze ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, ryavuze ko ico kiza ubu kimaze gufatwa nk'ikibazo mpuzamakungu.

headline: Uganda- Covid: Batonze imirongo barondera urucanco
text: Abantu amajana n'amajana batonze imirongo ku biro vy'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara kugira baterwe urucanco rwa Covid - 19 mu gihe Uganda  ubu yinjiye mu musuniranyo wa kabiri w'ico kiza. Ibibanza bitanga urwo rucanco bivugwa ko  ata  rwari rusigaye isaha indwi z'umururango mu masaha yo muri Uganda. Abakoresha imbuga hwaniro bamye bahanahana inkuru z'ingene bavuye mu kibanza kimwe baja mu kindi barondera aho boterwa urucanco. Umuyobozi mukuru um bushikiranganji bujejwe amagara , Henry Mwebesa, yavuze  ko vyafashe iminsi itanashika 10 kugira umusumiranyo  wa kabiri ushikire urugero rw'ikiza. Yanavuze ko incanco zari  zarungitswe mu gihugu hagati zizovanwayo zigarukanwe  ku murwa mukuru Kampala n'uturere tuwegereye aho abazishaka ari benshi cane. Igihugu catanguye isekeza ryo gutanga incanco mu kwezi kwa gatatu inyuma yo kuronka incanco 840.000 za AstraZeneca mu mugambi wa Covax. Abakozi b'ubuzi butuma bagira ivyago vyinshi vyo kwandura nk'abakora mu buvuzi, abigisha, abajejwe umutekano n'abantu bose barenza imyaka 70 bari mu bashizwe imbere. Ariko ivyo vyahavuye bisubirwamwo kugira bashiremwo abafise canke barenza imyaka 50, ariko abantu ntibitabiriye cane kwiteza urucanco. Gushika ubu abantu barenga gato 550.000 nibo bamaze kurwiteza. Hagati aho reta ya Uganda iriko  iribaza gufata  ubugira kabiri ingingo z'ukugabanya canke guhagarika uruja n'uruza kugira   ihagarike ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuga ko ubwoko bwa corona bwandukira cane, na cane cane ubwo mu Buhindi, Nigeria, Ubwongereza na Afrika y'Epfo, aribwo bwatumye hongerekana ibitigiri vy'abandura muri iyi minsi. Muganga Diana Atwine wo mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara yavuze ati: "ibice bimwe bimwe vy'igihugu bitegerezwa  kuja mu ngingo z'uguhagarika uruja n'uruza kiretse abantu bemeye kwubahiriza ingingo ngenderwako zihasanzwe. Yavuze ati: "ahandi ho amavuriro yacu azorengerwa hanyuma dusange turi mu bihe nk'ivyo twabonye mu bindi bihugu bimwe bimwe". Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko reta nayo yagize uruhara mw'iyongerekana ry'ibitigiri vy'abandura kuko yatezuye ku ngingo zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'iyo ndwara inyuma y'amatora yo mu kwezi kwa mbere. Gushika ubu ibitigiri bizwi icese vy'abamaze kwandura corona muri Uganda ni 44.594, n'abo imaze kwica  361. Uganda haharuwe abanduye coronavirus barenga 800  mu mashure gusa muri uku kwezi , bituma abanduye mu gihugu cose  bashika hafi 1.000  mu gihe mu yandi mezi batarenga mirongo ku munsi.

headline: OMS/WHO igabisha ko Africa ihanzwe n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rigabisha ko Afrika iri hafi yo guhura n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid-19, ko rero ari nkenerwa kwongereza incanco. Igitigiri c'abamaze kwandura iki kiza carenze imiriyoni zitanu mu gihe ibihugu bishika indwi vy'uwu mugabane ata ncanco bigifise. Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ati: "Afrika irakeneye amamiriyoni yandi y'incanco muri kino gihe". Afrika y'Epfo, Maroc, Tunisia, Ethiopia na Misiri nivyo bihugu bifise abanduye benshi gusumba ibindi ku mugabane wose. Uganda na Namibia birahanzwe n'igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Covid kiriko kiriha inkumbi, aho buri musi gihitana abatari bake. OMS ivuga ko abantu 136.000 bamaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza mu bihugu bitandukanye vya Afrika. Ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus bwiswe Delta buramaze kwibonekeza mu bihugu 14, mu gihe ubundi nabwo bwiswe Beta bwatanguye kwibonekeza muri Afrika y'Epfo, bumaze kugera mu bihugu 25. OMS ivuga ko gushika ubu ata kirangamisi c'ingene izindi ncanco zizobonekera, ariko ko zikenewe mu buryo bwihutirwa.

headline: Umuyobozi wa Bujumbura agabisha ko CHOLERA yateye igisagara ca Bujumbura
text: Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura, Freddy Mbonimpa, aragabisha ababa muri ico gisagara ko indwara ya CHOLERA yamaze kubashikamwo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 05 z'ukwa munani, Bwana Mbonimpa amenyesha ko abantu 126 bamaze kwandura iyo ndwara. Avuga ati: "Gushika ubu ama zone abangamiwe kurusha ayandi ni KANYOSHA, BUYENZI, BUTERERE, na CIBITOKE". CHOLERA yandukira mu kunywa amazi canke gufata imfungurwa zandujwe n'amazirantoke arimwo imigera yayo. Bwana Mbonimpa agabisha ko "hari ibibanza bikoraniramwo abantu benshi bitubahiriza isuku, nk'amazu y'uburiro n'ubunywero ...". Avuga ko ku munsi ku munsi "hibonekeza abarwayi  bashasha bane canke batanu". Umukuru w'igisagara atangaza ingingo zafashwe mu ntumbero y'uguhangana n'iyo ndwara. Muzi izo ngingo harimwo guhagarika: "Ubunywero n'uburiro bikorera mu masoko, mu ma parking y'imiduga, iruhande y'amabarabara canke ku miserege y'amazi". Meri ya Bujumbura kandi yahagaritse "uruja n'uruza rw'amasorori arimwo imfungurwa, urudandazwa rw'abatembereza amazi yo kunywa ari mu ma sachets, imitobe n'izindi mfungurwa ku ma parking n'ibindi bibanza vy'ihuriro". Meri kandi yabujije kuvoma no gukoresha amazi y'inzuzi canke y'imiserege. Freddy Mbonimpa asaba ko ahantu hose hugawe hatokwugururwa abajejwe intwaro n'amagara y'abantu batabonye ko hakwije ibisabwa  mu vyo isuku. CHOLERA ni indwara yandukira cane kandi yica ningoga mu gihe umurwayi atavuwe hakiri kare.

headline: Swiss bemeje kubuza kwamamaza itabi inyuma cane y'ibihugu bibanyi
text: Aba-Swisse batoye bemeza kubuza kwamamaza itabi ahantu hose abakiri bato bashobora kubibona. Mu vy'ukuri, kuba Ego ariyo yiganje muri ayo matora ya kamarampaka mu gihugu cose bizotuma kwamamaza itabi bicibwa burundu. Ivyo bizotuma Swisse ija ku murongo w'ibindi bihugu bibanyi vy'i Buraya, vyinshi vyashitse ku ngingo zikomeye zibuza canke zigabanya kwamamaza itabi haraheze imyaka itari mike. N'ubwo ari igihugu gisanzwe kizwi neza ku bijanye n'amagara meza n'ugukingira ibidukikije, Swisse yari igifise amwe mu mategeko yerekeye itabi  yoroshe cane i Buraya. Mu gihe haheze imyaka myinshi kunywera itabi mu nzu z'uburiro n'ubunywero vyari vyaraciwe mu Bwongereza, mu Bufaransa, canke mu Budagi, muri Swisse bari bakihanywera itabi. Mu masoko ya kijambere (supermarches/supermartkets), abariko barasuma hari igihe bakirwa n'abagore bakiri bato babamwenyurira mu gihe babaha imponjo za gusa z'itabi riba riherutse gusohoka. Mu gihe ivyo haheze imyaka bibujijwe, kwamamaza itabi vyari bikibandanya. Ashima ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa mungu, umushingamateka w'umu-social democrat  Flavia Wasserfallen yakeje igikorwa c'amashirahamwe y'abaganga n'abigisha bakoze isekeza ryo guca ivyo kwamamaza itabi. Yabwiye television ya Swisse ati: "Abantu barakoze cane kugira haboneke  poritike yo gushira imbere ineza y'abakiri bato". Ingingo z'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS zijanye n'itabi  - Framework Convention on Tobacco Control- zimaze imyaka hafi 20 zishitsweko mu gisagara ca Geneve. Swisse yarazishizeko umukono, ariko ntiyari bwazemeze mu mategeko -kikaba arico gihugu ca Buraya co nyene cari gisigaye - kuko gushika habe amatora yo ku wa mungu, amategeko y'ico gihugu yerekeye kwamamaza, ntiyisunga izo ngingo. Ugereranije no mu bindi bihugu vy'i Buraya, itabi muri Swisse rirazimbutse kandi 27% y'abantu bakuze muri ico gihugu baranywa itabi - urugero ruri hejuru y'urw'i Buraya muri rusangi. Ni kenshi amategeko agamije kugabanya canke guca kwamamaza itabi yari amaze kunanirwa kurengana mu nama nshingamateka. N'igihe abagira isekeza baba baronse imikono ikwiye yo gusaba ko haba amatora kamarampaka yo guca kwamamaza, reta yaca ibwira abanyagihugu gutora Oya. Abashigikiye ko kwamamaza bicibwa, bavugako ivyo biterwa n'uko muri ico gihugu hariyo amwe mu ma kompanyi akomeye cane kw'isi mu rudandazwa rw'itabi. Philip Morris, British American Tobacco na Japan Tobacco yose afise ivyicaro vyayo bikuru muri Swisse. Urudandazwa rw'itabi bigereranywa ko rwinjiriza ubutunzi bwa Swisse amafaranga arenga miriyaridi 6 z'amadorari ku mwaka, rugakoresha abantu 11.000 muri ico gihugu. Imbere y'uko amatora aba vyaragaragaye ko -nk'uko benshi bavyikeka - ko ama kompanyi y'itabi yahora asuka amafaranga mw'isekeza ryo gutora Oya. Abagwanya ko hacibwa kwamamaza, bavuga ko kubuza kwamamaza ikintu cemewe n'amategeko bidakwiye kwemerwa, kandi ko ivyo vyokwugururira imyango  ingingo ku bindi bicuruzwa, nk'isukari n'inzoga, navyo bibonwa nk'ibibangamira amagara y'abantu. Ivyapa biriko  zimwe mu mfungurwa aba-Swisse bakunda cane - vyerekanywe vyandiseko amajambo y'igabisha rikomeye ngo "ibi ni vyo bizoca bikurikira". Ariko abitavye amatora ivyo ntaco vyababwiye. Muri Swisse haharurwa abantu bashika 9.000 bapfa buri mwaka bahitanywe n'indwara zifatiye kw'itabi kandi  igisata c'amagara y'abantu gisohora amafaranga menshi yo kuvura bene izo ndwara. Biduza kandi amafaranga y'ubwishingizi, uwariwe wese ategerezwa gutanga, yaba anywa canke atanywa itabi. Imbere y'uko amatora aba, ibiharuro vyo kugereranya amajwi vyerekana ko 60% bari gushigikira  guca kwamamaza. Amaherezo babaye 56%, ariko n'ubundi bagumanye ubwiganze buhagije. Stefanie de Borba wo nw'ishirahamwe rya Swisse ryo kurwanya cancer yabwiye AFP ati: "Abantu baratahuye ko amagara ahambaye kuruta inyungu z'ubutunzi." Ubundi muri Swisse iyo abatora badatahura neza ico bahamagariwe gutora, baca bakurikiza impanuro ya reta. Ku yandi mategeko abiri bari bahamagariwe kwerekana aho bahagaze co kimwe no kuri iryo ryo guca kwamamaza itabi, reta yari yabahanuye gutora Oya, yamara yaratsinzwe. Ubu  abagize reta bakeneye akanya ko kwisuzuma niba bakiri ku murongo umwe n'abatora. Nk'uko umwe mu bandika uko babona ibintu aho muri Swisse yabivuze ku wa mungu: "Hageze guhitamwo hagati y'ubwigenge bw'ubutunzi n'amagara, abatora benshi bahisemwo ico ca nyuma…Haba uguca ukwamamaza, guca kunywa itabi canke itabi rizimvye, kunywa itabi ubu ntibigifise uruvugiro mu banyagihugu -bitandukanye no mu banyeporitike."

headline: Kenya igiye guhererwa n'inkingo za Covid-19
text: Uwujejwe umugambi wo gukingira ikiza ca Covid-19 muri Kenya yabwiye BBC ko ububiko bw'inkingo Kenya yahawe buzoba bugaragara mu ntango z'indwi iza. Dr Willis Akhwale yavuze ko Kenya yari yaronse inkingo zirenga umuriyoni mu nkingo imiriyoni 3,5 za AstraZenea ico gihugu cari casavye umugambi Covax (ujejwe kuronsa inkingo ibihugu). Yagize ati "twateye incanco abanye Kenya bashika hafi 940.000, rero nta zindi nkingo dusigaranye." Ibi bisigura yuko abanye Kenya bari munsi ya 2% ari bo baronse urukingo rwa mbere. Abajejwe ivy'amagara bari bizigiye gutangura gutanga urukingo rwa kabiri kuva mu ndwi yambere y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu, ariko iyo gahunda isa n'iyitagikunze. Guhagarika kurungika hanze inkino vyagizwe n'Ubuhinde mu gihe bugeramiwe n'ikiza ca Covid-19, kwabangamiye imigambi yo gukingira hirya no niho kw'isi, cane cane mu bihugu vyikora ku rukingo rwa AstraZeneca. Dr Akhwale yavuze ko Kenya yari yatumije inkingo imiriyoni 30 za Johnson & Johnson bikaba vyitezwe ko zishika mu kwezi kwa munani. Abahinga bagabisha yuko kubura inkingo zikwiye mu bihugu vyo muri Afrika bishobora kuzotuma coronavirus yihindukiranya, hakaza ikibazo gikomeye nk'icibonekeje mu Buhinde. Dr Akhwale yavuze ko gusabikanya inkingo ku buryo bungana "bitegerezwa kuba". Yongeyeko ati "'ntushobora gutekana gushika abandi bose batekanye' kigomba kuguma ari icivugo ngenderwako".

headline: China: Umukuru w’igihugu aragabisha ko wa mugera corona ukwiragira cane
text: Inyuma y'inama y'abashikiranganji ku munsi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha mu Bushinwa, umukuru w'ico gihugu Xi Jinping  aragabisha ko wa mugera ruhonyabantu corona uriko urakwiragira bidasanzwe. Perezida Xi yabwiye abategetsi bakuru ko igihugu ciwe "kiri mu gihe kidasanzwe". Umugera corona gushika ubu, umaze guhitana abantu 56  abandi nabo bashika 2000 baramaze kuwandura kuva wadutse. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe abashakashatsi b'abongereza bagabisha ko Ubushinwa bushobora kunanirwa no kurwanya uwo mugera. Mui bisagara bimaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera, hari amategeko yafashwe yo kugabanya uruja n'uruza. Kuva uno munsi ku wa Mungu, amamodokari y'abigenga ntiyemererwe kuja mu gisagara ca Wuhan aho uwo mugera watanguriye. Ibirori vy'umunsi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha vyatanguye ejo ku wa gatandatu vyarahagaritswe mu bisagara bitari bike. Hagati mu gihugu, ingenzi zitegerezwa kubanza gupimwa ubushuhe, mu gihe ingendo z'amatereni mu bisagara bitari bike zahagaritswe. Mu ntara ya  Hong Kong imaze igihe iri mu migumuko ikomeye hatangajwe ibihe bidasanzwe, ikiringo c'uburuhuko bw'abanyesure naco kirongerezwa. Hari n'ibihugu bimaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera, aho abanduye bashizwe mu bibanza vya bonyene kugira ngo bavurwe. Uwo mugerawa corona uri mu muryango w'imigera itera ibicurane bisanzwe, ariko ukabangamira cane ibihimba vy'ihemero. Mu kumenya ko umuntu yafashwe, atangura kwumva amenetse umutwe, mu nyuma agakorora cane, inyuma y'indwi agatangura kugira ingorane zo guhema. Gushika ubu nta muti canke urucanco rurashobora kuboneka. Abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bikeka ko uyo mugera woba wanduwe uvuye ku bifungurwa vyo mu kiyaga vyinjijwe mu kinyegero. Uwo mugera urateye umutima uhagaze abahinga bavuga ko bishobora kugorana ko igihugu c'Ubushinwa  kuwuhagarika. Abahinga bo mu kigo MRC bo mu Bwongereza kijejwe kwihweza indwara zandukira kw'isi kivuga ko umuntu yawanduye ashobora kuwandukiza abantu hafi batatu. Ico kigo kirashima utwigoro abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bariko barakora mu guhangana n'uwo mugera, ariko bakavuga ko hakenewe ko uwo mugera ubu urwanywa gushika ku bice 60% kugira ngo bashobore kuwuhagarika. Ibihugu vya Thailand, Singapore, Ubuyapani, Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Koreya y'Epfo, na Nepal biramaze gutangaza ko bifise abanduye uwo mugera. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, Australia yatangaje ko abantu bane bamaze kwandura, mu bisagara vya Melbourne na Sydney. Eka no ku mugabane wa Bulaya uramaze gushikayo, aho u Bufaransa bumenyesha ko umaze gufata abantu batatu. Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nazo nyene ntiziri kure kuko zivuga ko abantu babiri bamaze kuwandura, harimwo umukenyezi ari mu myaka 60 wo muri Chicago yawanduye avuye mu karere ka Wuhan.

headline: Coronavirus: OMS ifise impungenge ko Afrika ishobora kuba ikiririmbiro rishasha
text: Umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO uragabisha ko umugabane wa Afrika ushobora kuba ikiririmbiro rishasha rya wa mugera w'icaduka coronavirus. Abategesti ba ONU bamenyesha kandi ko ico kiza gishobora kwirahira abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi 300 muri Afrika, nayo abashika imiliyoni 30 bagashobora gusigara mu kangaratete. Mu ndwi iheze, ibiharuro vy'abanduye coronavirus kuri uyo mugabane vyariyongereye bidasanzwe. Gushika ubu, hafi abashika 1000 baramaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera, mu gihe abashika ku 19.000 bamaze kuwandura, ibitigiri biri hasi cane ugereranije n'ibirangwa mu bice bimwe bimwe vya Bulaya na Amerika. Umurwi wa ONU ujejwe ibibazo vy'ubutunzi muri Afrika - ari nawo wagabishije ko abashika ibihumbi 300 bashobora gupfa - wasavye ko hotegurwa amafaranga ashika imiliyoni 100 y'amadorari yo guha uwo mugabane, harimwo kandi n'ingingo yo guhagarika amadeni yo hanze. OMS ivuga ko uwo mugera usa n'uwuriko urakwiragira hanze y'ibisagara. Ivuga kandi ko uwo mugabane ubuze ibikoresho nyamukuru, nk'ibikoresho bifasha abarwaye guhema. Abarenga ica gatatu c'abanyagihugu ba Afrika nta mazi meza bafise, mu gihe hafi ibice 60% vy'ababa mu gisagara baba begeranye cane - ivyo navyo bigatuma umugera ushobora kukwirakwira cane. Gushika ubu abashika 19.000 baramaze gutangazwa ko banduye  coronavirus muri Afrika nzima, nayo abashika 970 bakaba aribo bamaze kumenyekana ko yabahitanye kuri uyo mugabane wose utuwemwo n'abantu hafi umuliyaridi 1.3. Akarere ka Afrika y'uburaruko niko kabangamiwe . Alijeriya, Mirisi na Maroke bifise kimwe kimwe cose abarenga 2000 bamaze kwandura, hamwe n'imiburiburi 100 bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Alijeriya nico gihugu kimaze kubura benshi, abashika 348. Mu bundi burere, Afrika y'Epfo nayo nyene ifise abarenga 2000 bamaze kuyandura, hamwe na 48 bamaze gupfa, mu gihe igihugu gifise abantu benshi gusumba ibindi muri Afrika, ari co Nijeriya, kimaze guharura abantu 442 bamaze kuyandura hamwe na 13 bamaze gupfa ku banyagihugu bashika imiliyoni 200. Raba ikarata y'ingene coronavirus yifashe muri Afrika Uwuserukira OMS muri Afrika Dr Matshidiso Moeti yabwiye BBC ko ingendo mpuzamakungu zifise uruhara rukomeye mw'ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Avuga ati: "Uravye urugero rw'abantu bafata ingendo, Afrika ifise abantu bake cane bafata ingendo mpuzamakungu". Hagati aho, mu gihe uwo mugera wamaze gushika muri Afrika, avuga ko umuryango aserukira uriko ukora utiziganya kuko uzi ko uwo mugera ushobora gukwiragira ku muvuduko munini cane gusumba ahandi. OMS iramaze kubona ko uwo mugera uriko urakwiragira uva mu bisagara binini uja hagati mu gihugu mu bihugu vya Afrika y'Epfo, Nijeriya, Cote d'Ivoire, Kameruni na Ghana, nk'uko bivugwa na Dr. Moeti. Hari ibihugu bishika 15 vya Afrika uwo mugera utarashika kure gushika ubu, akizera ko mu gihe ivyo bihugu vyofata ingingo zikomeye zituma abantu bareka kwegerana, vyoshobora gutuma ivyo bihugu biwuhagarika. OMS ifise ubwoba ko mu mezi atatu gushika kuri atandatu ari imbere abarenga imiliyoni 10 bashobora kwandura uwo mugera, ariko ivyo biharuro bikaba bidafatira ku ngingo zijanye n'isuku zigenda zirafatwa. None vyogenda gute mu gihe uwo mugera worandagara hagati mu gihugu muri Afrika? Mu gihe Covid-19 yoshinga imizi kuri uwo mugabane, inkurikizi zoba umurengera gusumba izibonekeza i Bulaya na Amerika, nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamakuru wa BBC mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu. OMS ivuga ko mu bihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika usanga hari ibitanda hafi bitanu gusa vyo kuvurirako indembe ku bantu umuliyoni wose, igitigiri kiri hasi cane rwose ugereranije n'I Bulaya, aho hari ibitanda 4000 ku bantu umuliyoni. Dr. Moeti avuga ko OMS ishira imbere ugukinga uwo mugera hakurondera kuvura, kubera ibihugu vyinshi va Afrika bidafise ubushobozi bwo kuvura abarwayi benshi ba coronavirus. Ati:"Dushaka ko ibitigiri vy'abakenera kuvurirwa mu bibanza vy'indembe biguma hasi, kuko tuzi neza ko mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika ubu buryo atabwo bifise". Dr. Moeti avuga ko "imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru" ibihugu vya Afrika bifise ari ubukene bwa vya vyuma bifasha guhema abariko baravurwa uwo mugera. Ku barwaye Covid-19 baremvye, kubura ivyo bikoresho ni nk'urupfu. Mu gihe indembe zidashobora guhema neza zo nyene ukwazo, ivyo vyuma nivyo vyinjiza impwemu nziza (oxygène) mu mahaha bigasohora impwemu mbi (gaz carbonique) mu mubiri. Umwe mu bantu bahitanywe n'uwo mugera ubwa mbere muri AFrika yari umumenyeshamakuru wa Zimbabwe Zororo Makamba, hari mu kwa gatatu. Abategetsi b'umugwa mukuru Harare, bavuga ko vyatumwe n'uko batari bwaronke ico cuma co kumufahsa guhema kugira ngo bashobore kumuvura. Dr. Moeti avuga ko ibintu nyamukuru vyokorwa muri ivyo bihugu ari: Ibihugu bitari bike biramaze gufata ingingo zo kugabanya uruja n'uruza. Mu bihugu bimwe bimwe, nk'amashure yarahiduwe ibibanza vyo gufashirizamwo abanduye, aho bashobora kugumizwa ukwabo mbere no kuvurwa bakavurirwamwo. Amahinguriro ahingura impuzu yarasabwe gufasha mu guhingura ibikoresho vyo kwikingira nka ya makanzu yambarwa n'abaganga. Ikigo kijejwe gukinga indwara muri Afrika kimenyesha ko kigiye gutanga ibikoresho vyo gupima coronavirus bishika ku muliyoni kugira ngo bizibire "igihengeri kinini" cibonekeza kuri uwo mugabane.

headline: Coronavirus: Prezida Jair Bolsonaro wa Brazil yayanduye - amakuru avugwa n'ahandi
text: Inyishu z'ibipimo vyafashwe ejo ku wa mbere ku mukuru w'igihugu ca Brazil Jair Bolsonaro zerekana ko yamaze kwandura umugera  wa coronavirus. Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa kabiri niho hari hitezwe inyishu z'ivyo bipimo inyuma y'aho yumvise ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara. Bwana Bolsonaro azwi ko yafashe minenerwe uwo mugera mu gihe Brazil ari co gihugu kiza ubwa kabiri kw'isi mu bihugu bifise abawurwaye benshi. Wewe yivugira ko kubona yarashoboye gusimba urupfu igihe aterwa ari mu myiyamamazo mu 2018, "adashobora guterwa ubwoba n'ako gacurane gato". Ejo ku wa mbere yahagaritse ingingo yategeka Abanyabrazil kwambara udupfukamunwa mu mabohero arimwo abapfungwa benshi. Mu Bwongereza, ibice bitatu vya bine vy'abantu - 78% - nta bimenyetso vya coronavirus berekana kandi bapimwe bagasanga baranduye, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro bitangwa n'ikigo kijejwe rusansuma. Ivyo biharuro, vyabonetse inyuma y'aho bapimiye abantu mu kivunga babasanze mu mihana yabo muri ico gihugu. Mu ndwi zibiri ziheze ibiharuro vy'abandura vyasubiye kwiyongera mu gisagara ca Melbourne, ivyatumye batekerwa n'ubwoba. Mu kwikingira, abanyagihugu baciye batangura guhagarika ingendo mu zindi ntara, bavuga bati "ni vyiza ko twobanza tukarindira kugira ngo turabe". Imbere y'aho, abayagihugu ba Australia bari biteze ko bashobora kurandurana n'imizi ico kiza, inyuma y'aho bamariye ikiringo c'ukwezi kwose atawusohoka. Ariko, ku ncuro ya mbere muri ico gihugu, biboneka ko iriko ikwirakwira mu kibano. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, abanduye bararenze 100, uno munsi naho hafi abagera ku 200 ni bo banduye. Ku muhingamo w'uno munsi niho ingingo ya guma mu rugo yasubira gutangazwa, inyuma y'indwi nkeya basubiye mu mwidegemvyo. Ubu ikiriho, ni uko abaja gusuma bariko bacanacanako. Babona ko iyi ngingo izobakorako cane, haba mu mubereho canke mu butunzi. Ikibabaje gusumba ni uko ico gisagara ari co conyene gikozweko n'iyo ngingo kuko ibindi bice vy'igihugu bisa n'ivyanesheje coronavirus canke umurindi ukagabanuka bimwe biboneka. Amategeko mashasha asaba ko abantu bari mu mazu y'ubunywero n'ayo uburiro batandukana n'imiburiburi imetero yatanguye gushirwa mu ngiro muri Suède. Imbere y'aho, abarongoye igisata c'amagara y'abantu ntiberekana neza ingene abantu bakwiye gutandukana, n'aho abari bafise ibibanza baranguriramwo imirimo bahimirizwa kwigisha abantu gutandukana no kwirinda kuja mu kirwi. Abategetsi ba Suède baraneguwe kubera batari bashoboye gutanga neza impanuro z'ingene abantu bakwiye gutandukana. Kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri rero, abategetsi b'uburere bahawe itegeko ryo kwugara ayo mazu atazoba yakurijie ingingo yo gutandukana n'imiburiburi imetero imwe. Mu minsi iheze, abagenduzi b'igisata kijejwe ibidukikije barazungurutse mu bisagara bikuru bikuru baraba ko abantu bakurikiza ingingo yo gutandukana. Barugaje vy'agateganyo amazu arangurirwamwo imirimo ashika 40 kubera ukurundana kw'abantu vyatera impungenge ko vyari gutuma banduzanya. Abanduye umugera wa coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo uno munsi barenze 200,000. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'ico gihugu, Zweli Mkhize, avuga ko intara zine zishobora kubona ibitigiri birenze - akongerako y'uko zishobora gufatirwa ingingo za guma mu rugo. Intara zibangamiwe cane ni Gauteng, Western Cape, Eastern Cape hamwe na KwaZulu-Natal. Ku munsi ku munsi abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi ni bo bandura mu gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu avuga ko ibintu vyari kwunyuka iyo ico gihugu kidafata ingingo za guma mu rugo. Afrika y'Epfo iriko igenda itezura ingingo yafashe mu ntumbero yo kuzibira ikwirakwira rya coronavirus, zimwe muri zo zikaba zijanye no gusubira kwugurura amashure. Ico gihugu kiri mu bindi biriko birageragereza ku bantu urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwakorewe kuri Kaminuza ya Oxford mu Bwongereza. Hafi imiliyoni 11 z'abanyeshure b'Abashinwa batanguye mu bwoba bwinshi ibibazo vy'iminsi ibiri muri ico gihugu bitanga uburenganzira bwo kuja kuri kaminuza, inyuma y'uko vyungurujwe mu kiringo c'ukwezi kubera coronavirus. Ivyo bibazo bifise kugora cane kubera amashure mu gihugu cose yari yugawe igihe uwo mugera wizizira ico gihugu mu ntango z'uno mwaka. Ibinyamakuru vya leta bivuga ko zimwe mu ngingo zafashwe muri ico kiringo c'ibibazo ari ukwongereza ivyumba vyo gukoreramwo kugira ngo abanyeshure bashobore gutandukana bikwiye, gupima abigisha n'abahagarikizi, hamwe rero no gupima abanyeshure. Abanyepolitike n'abigisha baranegura ingingo yo kwaka uburenganzia bwo kuba muri ico gihugu ku banyeshure b'abanyamahanga inyuma y'ingingo yo kwigishirizwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Igisata kijejwe uruja n'uruza muri Amerika (ICE) kivuga ko hari abantu bashobora gusubizwa iwabo kiretse  bimukiye ku mashure yigishiriza mu masomero. Hari amashure atari make muri ico gihugu ariko yihweza ingene mu mwaka w'ishure uza bokwigishiriza ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi kubera coronavirus. Ntibiboneka neza igitigiri c'abanyeshure bazokorwako n'iyo ngingo. Ayo makuru atangajwe ku munsi nyene ishure kaminuza rya Havard ritangarijeko ko ivyigwa vyose bizokwigishirizwa ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi mu mwaka uza, harimwo mbere no ku banyeshure bakeya basanzwe bemerewe kuba mu ndaro. Umukenguzamateka Elizabeth Warren wo mu mugambwe w'aba Democrates ati: "Kwirukana abanyeshure b'abanyamahanga muri kino gihe c'ikiza gihanze isi yose ni uguhohotera abanyeshure". "Nta shingiro bifise, ni ubukozi bw'ikibi kandi bwerekana urwanko ku banyamahanga". Eka na Samantha Power yahoze aserukira ico gihugu mw'ishirahamwe ONU ni uko nyene, aho avuga ko iyo ngingo ata shingiro ifise kandi ko kwigishiriza ku buryo ngurukanabumenyi bitazokunda ku mashure hafi yose. Umunyamakuru Elizabeth Spiers, asanzwe yigisha kw'ishure kaminuza rya New York, avuga ko iyo ngingo itazokwohoreza benshi bari basanzwe barihirwa n'amaleta yabo, kubera ubutandukanye bw'amasaha hagati ya Amerika n'ibihugu bakomokamwo.

headline: China yanse umugambi wa OMS/WHO wo gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko ya Covid
text: Ubushinwa buriyamiriza ibisabwa n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, vyo gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko y'ikiza-karanda ca Covid-19. Umukuru wa OMS Muganga Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus yateye akamo Ubushinwa ko bwokwifatanya n'abazokora ayo matohoza mu kurondera kumenya ingene uwu mugera watanguye, harimwo n'ubugenzuzi ku ma laboratoires. Zeng Yixin, icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, avuga ko ibi  vyerekana "agakengere n'agasuzuguro mu bijanye n'ubuhinga". Avuga ko uwu mugambi ufise intumbero za poritike, rero ko Ubushinwa budashobora kuwihanganira. Mu kwa mbere uno mwaka, OMS yashoboye kurungika umurwi w'abahinga i Wuhan - igisagara catowemwo ubwa mbere uwo mugera mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2019 - kugira ngo bihweze amamuko y'iki kiza. Amatohoza yabo yerekanye ko hari amahirwe make cane y'uko coronavirus yoba yacorotse iva muri laboratoire, ariko abantu babandanya bibaza uko. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, Dr Tedros yashikirije integuro y'aya matohoza agira kabiri asabwa, harimwo gukora umwihwezo ku bigo bijejwe ubushakashatsi mu bijanye n'ubuhinga mu turere twatowemwo uwo mugera ubwa mbere. Asaba Pékin/Beijing "gukorera mu muco, kudahisha na kimwe no gufashanya" n'abajejwe amatohoza kandi igatanga amakuru atatanzwe mu matohoza ya mbere ku barwayi ba mbere . Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu wa kane, Zeng yavuze ko aguye mu gahunwe yumvise ibisabwa na OMS kubera yibanda ahanini ku bivugwa ko Ubushinwa bwahonyanze ingingo ngenderwako zijanye n'ibikorwa vya laboratoire. Avuga ko Ubushinwa "budashobora" kwemera ibisabwa, yongerako kandi y'uko igihugu ubwaco catanze urutonde rw'ivyokorwa  ku bijanye n'amahotoza ku nkomoko y'uwu mugera. Reuters yasubiyemwo amajambo ya Zeng aho yavuga ati: "Twizeye ko OMS izokwihweza neza ivyiyumviro n'intumbero vyashikirijwe n'abahinga b'abashinwa hanyuma igakora amatohoza ku nkomoko ya Covid-19 yisunze ubuhinga, ikikurako abanyaporitike bagomba kuyinjirira". Yuan Zhiming, umukuru wa National Biosafety Laboratory yo ku kigo ca Wuhan cihweza ibijanye n'imigera, Wuhan Institute of Virology, nawe nyene yari muri ico kiganiro n'abanyamakuru. Yavuze ko uwu mugera ufise amamuko kama (origines naturelles), anashimangira ko atari umugera wacorotse laboratoire kandi ko ata mukozi wabo yigeze yandura kuva itangura mu 2019. Abantu barenga imiriyoni zine kw'isi yose baramaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza kuva cadutse, amakungu akaba abandanya asaba OMS gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko y'uwu mugera. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika na we nyene yategetse abajejwe igendereza muri ico gihugu "kwongereza" inguvu mu twigoro twabo two gutohoza ibijanye n'iki kiza.

headline: Madagascar: umuti Covid-Organics w'umukuru w'ico gihugu nturashobora guhagarika Covid-19
text: Ibitaro vyo muri Madagascar bivuga ko biriko birarengerwa n'ibitigiri vyabandura Covid-19, mu gihe umukuru w'ico gihugu wewe abandanya ahimiriza umuti utaremezwa, avuga ko ushobora gukiza iyo ndwara, n'aho ishami rijejwe amagara kw'isi OMS rigabisha kw'ikoreshwa ry'imiti itaremezwa. Ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus vyaraduze incuro zine mu kwezi guheze muri ico gihugu co mw'ibahari Indiano, aho abarenga 13.000 banduye, abarenga 162 nabo barapfa kubera coronavirus yakwiragiye mu ntara zose kiretse imwe gusa. N'aho ivyo bitigiri bigenda biduga, umukuru w'igihugu Andry Rajoelina abandanya yizigiye uwo muti ukozwe mu biti kama wiswe Covid-Organics, umuti watanguye gukwiragizea mu kwa kane. Uhingurwa n'ikigo ca Madagascar kijejwe ubushakashatsi mu giterwa citwa artémisia - igiti gisanzwe gihingurwamwo imiti ya malaria- hamwe n'ibindi biti vyo muri Madagascar. Ni ikinyobwa kiriko kiradandazwa nk'umuti wo kuvura no gukinga - mu gihe kuva amezi ane aheze gihabwa abana mu mashure. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi igihe yariko atanga imfashanyo igizwe n'umuceri, amavuta, isukari n'ibindi nkenerwa kuri ba ntahonikora ku mugwa mukuru Antananarivo, umukuru w'ico gihugu yaboneyeho no kubaha uwo muti, Covid-Organics. Yaraneguwe bikomeye igihe yakoranya abanyagihugu mu gihe igihugu cari mu ngingo za guma mu rugo, ariko wewe akaba yabandanije afise icizere aho avuga ati: " Iki kiza ntikizokwamaho, tuzoruhira kugitsinda". Yavuze kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abandura bitari umurengera mu burere bw'igisagara bwari buherutse kuronswa uwo muti ku buntu. Ishirahamwe OMS rivuga ko ryakiriza yompi utwigoro two kuvura iyo ndwara hakoreshejwe uburyo kama, ariko rigasaba ivyemezo bivuye mu bushakashatsi imbere y'uko imiti kama ikoreshwa. Gushika ubu nta nyishu ziratangwa ku bipimo vyakozwe, ariko ico nticabujije ko uwo muti uhabwa ibihugu biharurwa muri mirongo vya Afrika. Leta ya Madagascar yoyo ibandanya yishigikira imbere y'abayinegura, haba mu gihugu canke mu makungu. Rinah Rakotomanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu ati: "Si uko dufise udukingirizo ko twoca twijajara imbere ya SIDA kandi ntibivuga ngo SIDA yaraheze! Nico kimwe". "Abenshi mu bafashe uwo muti ata zindi ndwara z'ivyuririzi bafise barakize neza, turishimiye uwo muti. Ni mu mico yacu gukoresha imiti kama nk'iyi. Mu gihe bigenda neza, nta bindi vyo kugerageza uwu muti bikenewe". Hagati aho, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu burinengesera, bugahanura ibitaro guha uwo muti aberekana ibimenyetso bito bito kandi ata zindi ndwara basanzwe bafise nk'igisukari. Ni ngombwa kandi ko n'abarwaye babanza kuvyemera. N'aho umukuru w'ico gihugu wewe yerekana ko afise ivyizigiro, abapfa bahitanywe na coronavirus bama bapfa umunsi ku munsi. Mu kwezi guheze, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yarateye akamo amakungu ngo abafashishe ibikoresho, kuko yari afise amakenga ko ibitaro vyariko birarengerwa, ivyatumye ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bimugabisha. Mu nyuma y'aho, ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwaciye butera akamo ko kurondera abaganga n'abaforoma bofata mu mugongo ikigo co kuvura uwo mugera kiri ku kibuga ca  Mahamasina i Antananarivo. Ico kigo cuguruwe mu ntango z'uku kwezi kikaba kimaze kwakira abarwaye batari bake. Bimwe mu bitaro vyarengewe n'abarwayi ni ibitaro vya kaminuza vya Andohatapenaka i Antananarivo - vyakira indembe gusa za coronavirus cane cane abanduye basanzwe bafise n'izindi ndwara. Ishirahamwe rihurikiyemwo abaforoma n'abakirizi rivuga ko akakozi bo mu gisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu baharurwa muri mirongo banduye Covid-19. Ubwo bwoba bwagiye kwiyongera igihe leta ihagarikiye ingingo za guma mu rugo zari zimaze amezi atanu mu ntara ya Analamanga, isanzwe irimwo umugwa mukuru. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije kuri televiziyo y'ico gihugu, umukuru w'igihugu Rajoelina yavuze ko izo ngingo zitari kubandanya kuko zifise ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'abanyagihugu. Yavuze ko iyi ndwara yari yahagaritswe kandi ko abandura bagabanutse ku mugwa mukuru. Hagati aho, intara ya Analamanga iriziziwe cane n'iki kiza kandi kibandanya gikwirakwira mu zindi ntara z'iryo zinga.

headline: Covid-19: Amerika ihanura kwirinda kuja muri 80% vy'ibihugu
text: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bugiye guha inama Abanyamerika yo kwirinda 80% vy'ibihugu vyo kw'isi kubera ikiza ca coronavírus. Mu rwandiko rugenewe ibimenyeshamakuru ku mpanuro zijanye n'igihe ku vyerekeye ingendo hanze, ubwo bushikiranganji bwavuze ko ico kiza gikomeje ''gutera ingeramizi zitari bwigere zibaho ku bantu bafata ingendo". Gushika ubu impanuro yo kwirinda ibihugu bimwe bimwe  yari yerekeye ibihugu 34 ku bihugu 200. Covid-19 ubu imaze kwica abantu barenga miriyoni 3 kw'isi - abarenga ica kabiri c'umuriyoni muri abo bakaba ari abo muri Amerika. Ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi (OMS) ryagabishije ko isi iriko ''iregereza urugero rwa mbere runini rwo kwandura" gushika ubu, n'ubwo hatangujwe umugambi w'isi wo gutanga incanco. Ubuhindi - muri iki gihe bwugarijwe n'umurindi ugira kabiri - bugiye gutangura gutanga urucanco ku bantu bose barenza imyaka 18 mu ntumbero yo guhagarika  ukwiyongera kw'ibitigiri vy'abandura. Ubushikiranganji bwa Amerika bujejwe imigenderanire buvuga ko ingingo yo gusubiramwo iyo nama yabwo ari ukugira bujane n'iyigirwa n'ibigo vyo kurwanya no kugenzura indwara (CDC) ''bitavuze ko ari  ugusubiramwo kuraba ingene ibintu vyifashe mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu  mu gihugu kanaka". Ariko, buvuga ko iyi ngingo "izotuma hiyongera ibihugu biri ku rugero rwa 4 (Level4): Do Not Travel (ntimufate ingendo),  kuri hafi 80% vy'ibihugu vyo kw'isi". Ibibanza bitatu vyonyene kw'isi ni vyo bifatwa nk'ibiri hasi cane y'ibindi ku ngero zine z'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire - "Mwiyubare bisanzwe". Ni Macau, Taiwan na Nouvelle Zelande. Na ho na Antarctic iri ku rugero rwa kabiri -Mwiyubare cane" - mu gihe Ubwongereza buri ku rugero rwa gatatu- "Subiramwo umugambi wanyu w'urugendo" - hakongerako kwongereza kwiyubara kubera igishobora gushika bivuye kw'iterabwoba. CDC zigira inama abanyamerika kwirinda kugira ingendo hagati mu gihugu gushika bahejeje kuronka incanco zose, zikanagabisha ko ingendo mpuzamakungu zongereza ukugeramirwa no ku baba baracandazwe. N'ubwo hari  incanco miriyoni 860 za coronavirus zimaze guterwa mu bihugu 165 kw'isi, ibihugu vyinshi biracahanzwe no gushobora guhagarika  ukwiyongera kw'abandura uwo mugera. Brezil imaze gufata ikibanza ca gatatu ku bantu benshi banduye, na ho ku bantu 368.749, ikaza ubugira kabiri ku bantu benshi bamaze gupfa. Canada na yo  muri iyi misi yaragize iyongerekana ry'abandura, na yo Papouasie Nouvelle Guinee ikaba igihugu giteye impungenge. Mu gihe ibihugu -  nk'Ubwongereza  na Israel- bimaze guha incanco abanyagihugu bavyo benshi, ibindi bihugu vyinshi biracarindiriye incanco vyatumyeko ko zishika.
