Ivyo bituma haba ukugabisha  kw'iyongerekana ry'ubusumbasumbane mu kwicandagisha - incanco zidasabikanywa neza hagati y'ibihugu bitunze n'ibikenye.

headline: US: Babona ko ihinduka ry’itegeko rijanye no gukorora inda 'rizorokora ubuzima bwa benshi muri Africa'
text: Abarongoye ibisata vy'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza bakiranye igishika inkuru ivuga ko umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Joe Biden, yafuse itegeko ryari ryahagaritse imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu yafasha canke akagira inama abipfuza gukorora inda. Amavuriro amwe amwe yigisha ibijanye n'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza muri Afrika vyabaye ngombwa ko yugara inyuma y'aho mu 2017, uwari umukuru w'igihugu ico gihe Donald Trump ahagarikiye imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe yafasha abantu mu bijanye n'ukudasama imbanyi batipfuza hamwe n'ugukorora inda. Nelly Munyasia, arongoye ikigo c'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza muri Kenya (Reproductive Health Network Kenya) avuga ko iyi ngingo ya Amerika yiswe "global gag rule" yatumye ishirahamwe ryiwe rinanirwa no gufasha abakenyezi muri ino myaka mikeya iheze. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Abagore n'abakorwa barahasize ubuzima nk'inkurikizi z'iyi ngingo - barya barwaye umugera wa SIDA hamwe na kanseri  batari bagishoboye gukurikiranwa, canke abatari bagishoboye kuronswa uburyo bwo kwirinda imbanyi batipfuza hamwe n'impanuro ku bijanye n'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza,  wasanga bagiye gukoresha uburyo butabereye bwo gukorora imbanyi. "Guhindura iyi ngingo bizorokora ubuzima kandi ni ingingo yategerezwa kubandanya". Moses Mulumba wo mu kigo citaho ubuzima, uburenganzira bwa muntu n'iterambere muri Uganda, yavuze ko iyi ngingo yerekanye ingaruka z'ingingo z'agahotoro ku bindi bihugu n'ingaruka zagize ku banyagihugu bo mu bihugu bikenye. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Nk'ingaruka ya 'global gag rule', vyabaye ngombwa ko ishirahamwe ryanje … rihagarika ibikorwa vyaryo mu kiringo c'imyaka ine iheze, rihagarika umugambi wafashwa na USAID waharanira amagara meza, n'aho ryariko rirakora ibikora inka". Kuvanaho iyi ngingo bivuga ko abagore benshi bazokwitabwaho mu vyerekeye irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza, harimwo kuronswa uburyo bwo kuzibira imbanyi batipfuza, be no gupimwa umugera wa SIDA na kanseri hamwe n'ibindi.

headline: Tanzania: Prezida Samia Suluhu yemeje ko hariho igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona
text: Prezida wa Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan yemeje ko  hari ibimenyetso vy'igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona muri  ico gihugu. Avugira mu gisagara ca Dar Es Salaam mu nama yagiranye n'abagize inama y'abasenyeri ba Katolika muri Tanzania (TEC), prezida Samia yavuze ko hari ibimenyetso hagati mu gihugu ko ico kiza kiriho. Yagize ati:"Nk'uko tubizi ubu kw'isi yose yariho igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona, twavuye mu gihuhusi ca mbere muri Tanzania cagiye kirahera buke buke, tuja mu ca kabiri, ubu naho twinjije mu gihuhusi ca gatatu." Prezida Samia yavuze 'ibimenyetso hagati mu gihugu vyatanguye kwibonekeza, tuza dufise abagwayi bamaze guhura n'iki gihuhusi ca gatatu'. Yasubiye kwibutsa urugendo yagize ku bitaro vya Mwananyamala mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. "Nimwaba mwibuka umusi nagendera ibitaro vya Mwananyamala, hari icumba umuganga yanyinjijemwo ambwira ko harimwo abagayi bafise ingorane yo guhema, ndamubwira nti dudurirako, ni Covid? "Aca ambwira ati ego ni Covid, mu gihe abafata amasanamu bari bamaze kwinjira, nca ndabahamagara nti nimuveyo n'ingoga." Uretse kuvuga ko hari igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona, prezida Samia, yasavye ko hoba ukwiyubara kuri ico kiza candukira cane ca corona.

headline: Burundi: leta itangaza ko hari abandi 21 banduye Covid-19
text: Leta y'Uburundi itangaza ko hari abandi barwari 21 bashasha banduye wa mugera karanda wa coronavirus. Mwitangazo ryasohowe nijoro n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, abo 21 batowe mu bantu 202 biketswe ko banduye bapimwe hagati yo ku wa 27 gushika ku wa 30 z'ukwezi guheze kwa gatandatu. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu barwayi 54 bari basanzwe bariko baravurwa, batatu muri bo ari bo bapimwe bagasanga nta migera bagisigaranye. Umukuru w'igihugu aherutse gutangaza ko agiye kwitwararika gusumba kurwanya iki kiza, akaba mbere yaranatangaje ingingo zitandukanye mu ntumbero yo guhangana naco. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 191 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 118 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 72 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Ubushikiranganji bubandanya busaba abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zo kuzibira kwandura canke kwandura, izo nazo zikaba zirimwo gukaraba n'amazi meza n'isabuni canke arimwo umuti wica imigera. Ubwo bushikiranganji busaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kuramukanya no guhoberana, kwirinda kwasamurira mu bandi, kwambara udupfukamunwa ku bavuzi, abarwaye covird-19 n'abamaranye umwanya b'abarwaye. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu ata mategeko ruhasha vyafashe agamije kurwanya ikiza coronavirus, bikaba mbere vyaratumye bwiyamirizwa henshi mu makungu. Hagati aho, umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye aherutse kumenyesha ko atanguje urugamba rwo kurwanya ico kiza karanda. Mw'ijambo aherutse gushikiriza inama nshingamateka ku musi wo kuzahiza leta nshasha ku wa 30/06/2020, Perezida Ndayishimiye yatangaje ingingo zitari nke mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ico kiza. Yagize ati: "Turasavye umurundi wese, hamwe n'umunyamahanga ari muri iki gihugu guhaguruka kuko akatavuga ntigahenda akavuga". KLeta y'u Burundi iherutse kwirukana abaserukiye ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS biturutse ku kutabona kumwe ikibazo ca coronavirus. Hari n'abavuga ko leta yoba inyegeza ibitigiri nyavyo vy'abanduye uwo mugera, ivyo abategetsi b'u Burundi bamirira kure.

headline: Coronavirus: Ubuhamya bw'umuganga yayirwaye akayikira
text: 'Umusirikare ntatinya gusubira ku rugamba ngo n'uko yahakomerekeye', ayo ni amajambo ya muganga Jean Claude Minani, umwe mu bantu bambere banduye ingwara ya Covid-19  igishika mu Butaliyano, kimwe mu bihugu vyakozweko cane kandi mu minsi ya kare n'iki kiza kicaduka. N'ubwo nawe ubwiwe yayirwaye, ngo ntiyatevye gusubira gutabara abarwayi agitora intege. Yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera kuri ivyo bihe yaciyemwo.... (umva aho hejuru).

headline: Covid: WHO/OMS igabisha ko ikiza kizobandanya gushika kure mu 2022
text: Ikiza ca Covid "kizobandanya mu kiringo c'uwundi mwaka kitari ngombwa" bitewe n'uko ibihugu vy'amikoro make bitariko biraronka incanco bikeneye, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS/WHO. Dr Bruce Aylward, umwe mu bayobozi muri OMS, avuga ko akaga ka Covid "gashobora rero  kubandanya mu gice kinini c'umwaka wa 2022". Abantu badashika 5% muri Afrika nibo bamaze kuronka incanco, ugereranije na 40% ku yindi migabane myinshi. Mu ntango, umugambi wa Covax wo gusabikanya ata buryarya incanco kw'isi, wategekanya ko ibihugu vyose vyoronka incanco biwuciyeko, harimwo n'ibikize cane. Ariko ibihugu vyinshi vy'umugwi w'ibikize cane G7 ntivyabaye bigica muri iyo nzira kuva bitanguye kwumvikana kimwe kimwe ukwaco n'ama kompanyi akora incanco. Incanco nyinshi za Covid zahavuye zikoreshwa rero n'ibihugu vyifise. Afrika gushika ubu iharurwa kuba imaze gukoresha 2.6% y'incanco zose zimaze  gutangwa kw'isi. Uwo mugwi w'amashirahamwe y'ubugiraneza urimwo Oxfam na UNAids, unegura kandi Ubwongereza na Canada kuronka incanco ubicishije muri Covax, umugambi ushigikiwe na ONU wo gusabikanya no gukwiragiza  incanco kw'isi atawusizwe inyuma. Ibiharuro vyerekana ko muri uyu mwaka Ubwongereza bwaronse incanco za Pfizer 539.370 mu gihe Canada nayo yafashe hafi umuriyoni wa Astra-Zeneca. Dr Aylward yasavye ibihugu bitunze  guhebera ibibanza vyavyo ku murongo w'abarindiriye kuronka incanco kugirango ama kompanyi akora incanco ahubwo ashire imbere ibihugu vy'amikoro make. Avuga ko ibihugu bitunze bikwiye kwikora ku bubiko bifise kugira vyuzuze inshingano vyiyemeje mu nama ya G7 i St Ives mu ci riheze. Yavuze ati "Nobabwira ko tutari mu nzira nziza". "Vy'ukuri dukeneye kwihuta, canke naho murabizi? Iki kiza kizobandanya ikiringo c'uwundi mwaka kandi bitari ngombwa." People's Vaccine - urunani rw'amashirahamwe y'ubugiraneza - rwasohoye ibiharuro vyerekana ko rumwe (doze imwe)  ku  ncanco indwi zemewe n'ibigo bizikora hamwe n'ibihugu bitunze arirwo rushika iyo rugenewe mu bihugu bikenye kurusha ibindi. Umujenama wa Oxfam ku bibazo vy'amagara  ku rwego rw'isi, Rohit Malpani, aremera ko Canada n'Ubwongereza vyari bifise uburenganzira bwo kuronka incanco biciye muri iyo nzira kuko vyari vyaratanze amafaranga muri Covax, ariko yavuze ko "bitoshigikirwa  nk'ibikwiye gukorwa" bivanye n'uko vyompi vyari vyaronse miriyoni z'incanco biciye mu masezerano yavyo n'amakompanyi azikora. Yavuze ati: "Ntivyari kuba vyaronse incanco biciye muri Covax". "Ntaho bitaniye n'amayeri yo kuronka incanco mu nzira zibiri, ivyo rero bigaca bisigura ko ibihugu bikenye kurusha ibindi vyari bisanzwe biri inyuma  ku murongo wo kurindira amaherezo bizotegerezwa kubandanya birindiriye ikindi gihe kirekire." Reta y'Ubwongereza yavuze ko buri mu bihugu vyatumye Covax itangura gukora mu mwaka uheze mu kuyiha ayangana na miriyoni 548 z'amafaranga y'Abongereza (miriyoni zirenga 750 z'ama dorari). Reta ya Canada yo yihutiye kuvuga ko  ubu yahevye gukoresha incanco zivuye muri Covax. Covax mu ntango yari yiyemeje kuba yatanze miriyaridi zibiri gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, ariko gushika ubu imaze gukwiragiza incanco zingana na miriyoni 371 gusa.

headline: Uganda - Covid-19: Abantu babiri bahagaritswe kuko batanze incanco za magendu
text: Abantu babiri badandaza magendu bafatiwe muri Uganda bagirizwa gutanga icanco za Covid-19 za magendu. Uwundi umwe aracaronderwa. Bivugwa ko abo bantu babiri bari bamaze gutera izo ncanco abantu 800 bakora muri kompanyi yigenga, yari yasabiye incanco abakozi bayo. Igisata kijejwe gukurikirana ivyo amagara y'abantu mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu kivuga ko caronse inkuru ivuye ku bategetsi bo hasi ko abo bagabo babiri baguma batembera mu micungararo ya Kampala, bavuga ko ari abakozi bo mu buvuzi bo muri bimwe mu bitaro bisanzwe vyo muri ico gisagara. Dr Warren Namara wo muri ico gisata avuga ko hataramenyekana neza ibiri muri urwo rucanco bateye abantu, ariko ico gisata ngo kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku birugize. Guterwa urucanco rwa Covid-19 muri Uganda ni ku buntu, zikaba zishobora kuboneka mu bigo vya reta n'ivyigenga bijejwe gucandaga. Abantu barenga 856.000 baramaze gucandagwa. Uganda ihanganye n'umufunda wa kabiri w'ikiza ca Coronavirus, aho abantu benshi baguma bandukirwa hakaba hari n'abamaze gupfa.

headline: Coronavirus: New York ifise ibitigiri bibini vy’abanduye gusumba ibihugu vyose kw’isi
text: Intara ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri kino gihe ifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye coronavirus gusumba ibihugu vyose kw'isi uretse ico gihugu. Iyo ntara yamenyesheje ko abamaze kwandura Covid-19 gushika ejo ku wa kane bageze kuri 159.937. Iyo ntara ikaba isumbije ibihugu vyari bizwi ko ari vyo bifise abanduye benshi nka Espanye (153,000 ) hamwe n'Ubutaliyano (143,000). U Bushinwa, aho uwo mugera watanguriye mu mpera z'umwaka uheze, bufise igitigiri ca 82.000 c'abantu bose hamwe banduye. Amerika imaze kugera kuri 462.000 banduye uwo mugera hamwe n'abashika hafi 16.500 bahitanywe nawo. Kw'isi yose, abashika umuliyoni 1.6 nibo bamaze kwandura, nayo 95.000 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. N'aho New York ariyo ifise igitigiri kinini c'abanduye coronavirus kw'isi, ico abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera (7000) kiri hasi y'ica Espanye (15.500) n'ico Ubutaliyano (18.000), n'aho gisumba incuro zirenga zibiri ico abahitanywe nawo mu Bushinwa. Hari amasanamu yerekanywe y'abakozi bambaye imyambaro yo kwikingira impanuka bariko barahamba abapfuye mu kinogo kimwe mu gisagara ca New York. Amasanamu yafashwe na za ndege zitagira umudereva, drones, yerekana abakozi bariko bamanuka mu kinogo kirekire bakoresheje ingazi,  aho amasandugu y'ibiziga yariko arashingurwa. Ayo masanamu yafatiwe mu karere kitwa Hart Island, kigeze gukoreshwa n'abategetsi b'ico gisagara imyaka 150 iheze mu guhamba abapfuye batagira ab'iwabo, canke abo mu miryango itari ishoboye kwihambira abayo. Ibikorwa vyo guhamba kuri iryo tongo ry'abapfuye vyariyongereye kubera ico kiza, biva ku munsi umwe mu ndwi bishika ku minsi itanu mu ndwi, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'igisata kijejwe amabohero. Abapfungwa bo mw'ibohero rya Rikers Island nibo mu bisanzwe bakora ico gikorwa, ariko kubera barengewe, vyabaye ngombwa ko barondera abandi bakozi babikora. Umukuru w'igisagara ca New York, Bill de Blasio yavuze mu ntango z'iyi ndwi ko iryo tongo ry'abapfuye rishobora kwikorwako mu guhamba abahitanywe na kino kiza. Igitigiri c'abahitanwa na coronavirus i New York cariyongereye gushika kuri 799 ku wa gatatu, igitigiri kinini kitari bwahebo ku munsi ugira gatatu. Ariko buramatari w'intara ya NewYork, Andrew Cuomo, yagize icizere kinini inyuma y'aho  igitigiri c'abinjijwe ibitaro kubera covid-19 mu mavuriro ya New York cagabanutse ku ncuro igira kabiri, gushika kuri 200. Avuga ko ivyo vyerekana ko ingingo yo kwirinda kwegerana yazanye akarusho. Avuga ko iki kiza ari "ikibombe kiriko kirakwiragira mu bantu kidacagura, ikibi gisa n'ico twabonye ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda 2000". Icizere cabonetse kandi ejo ku wa kane aho ibitigiri vyari vyitezwe kurwego rw'igihugu vyagabanutse. Dr Anthony Fauci, umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye bagize umurwi wo kurwanya coronavirus washinzwe n'ibiro vy'umukuru w'iguhugu wa Amerika. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru NBC co muri Amerika ko ibiharuro vyerekana ko Abanyamerika bashobora kuzohitanwa na Covid-19 "bashobora kuba muri 60.000". Mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, uyo Dr. Fauci yari yavuze ko "abari hagati ya 100.000 na 200.000" aribo baboneka ko bashobora guhitanwa n'uwo mugera. Ico gitigiri ca 60.000 gishobora kungana n'ic'abahitanywe n'indwara y'ibicurane hagati y'ukw'icumi 2019 n'ukwa gatatu 2020 muri Amerika, nk'uko ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubutegetsi bivyerekana. Hagati aho, icegera c'umukuru w'ico gihugu Mike Pence ashimangira ko covid-19 yandukira gusumba indwara y'ibicurane hafi incuro zitatu. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vyarerekanye ubwoba ko abashika imiliyoni 2.2 z'Abanyamerika bashobora guhitanwa na coronavirus mu gihe atacokorwa ngo uwo mugera uhagarare.

headline: Coronavirus - Burundi: Leta imenyesha ko hari abandi 20 banduye
text: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu n'ukurwanya SIDA mu Burundi bumenyesha ko hari abantu 20 babonywe ko banduye umugera coronavirus. Mw'itangazo bwaraye busohoye, ubwo bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko abo 20 bari mu bantu 98 bapimwe uwo mugera kuva ku wa 01 gushika ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu. Ibi biharuro bishasha bitangajwe inyuma y'aho ishirahamwe OLUCOME rimenyeshereje amakenga yaryo ku bijanye n'amakuru ashikirizwa na leta y'u Burundi kuri mugera uriko urakora ibara kw'isi yose. Nk'uko vyama, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu ntibutanga umwidondoro w'abo bantu bashasha banduye iyi ndwara ya Covid-19. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu bari basanzwe bakirwaye iyo ndwara bashika 29, 12 muri bo bapimwe bagasanga barakize, kandi ko baronkejwe uruhusha rwo gusubira mu miryango yabo. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 83 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 45 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 37 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Gushika ubu, nta ngingo zirafatwa na leta y'u Burundi mu ntumbero yo kuzibira ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera nk'uko vyagenze mu bindi bihugu vyo mu karere. Hari bamwe babona ko amakuru atangwa na leta ku vyerekeye iyo ndwara yoba atajanye n'ukuri ku kungene yifashe mu gihugu. Ishirahamwe ryigenga OLUCOME ryiyemeje kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'ubutunzi bwa leta, riherutse gusohora itangazo aho rinegura leta ko ititayeho uko bikwiye ikiza ca Covid-19. Olucome yibaza ko amakuru atangazwa ashobora kuba ari kure y'ukuri kw'ivyo Abarundi bibaza, ikanasaba leta y'u Burundi kureka kwizimagiza imbere y'iki kiza kiriko kiriha inkumbi kw'isi. Mu minsi iheze hari amakuru yakwiriye ku mbuga ntangamakuru ko hari bamwe mu bategetsi muri leta y'u Burundi boba baranduye iyi ndwara, ibihakanwa n'umuvugizi wa leta. Ayo makuru akaba yakwiragiye inyuma y'aho umutambukanyi w'umukuru w'igihugu, Denise Nkurunziza agiriye muri Kenya kuvurwa indwara itaramenyekana gushika ubu. Vyaravuzwe cane ko yagiye i Nairobi kwivuza uwu mugera, ariko ayo makuru akaba yarahakanywe n'umwe mu bakozi bo mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu BBC yabajije ariko atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana . Umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kumenyekana mu mpera z'umwaka uheze mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa, ubu ukaba ubarizwa kw'isi yose. Ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu niho leta y'u Burundi yatangaza umuntu wa mbere yanduye uwo mugera.

headline: République tchèque: Abantu ibihumbi bakoze ibirori vyo gusezera coronavirus
text: Mu gihe ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS muri ino ndwi ryagabishije ko ikiza ca coronavirus kitariko kirahera ubu bwa vuba, mu gihugu ca Repubulika ya tchèque hoho bari mu minsi mikuru yo kugisezera. Abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi bakoraniye ku meza ipima uburebure bwa metero 500 ku kiraro Charles Bridge kiri ku mugwa mukuru Prague ku wa kabiri banywa bongera bafungura ivyo baje bitekereye. Abari batumiwe muri ico kirori basabwa gusangira n'abo begeranye kandi na ya ngingo yo gutandukana ntibayikurikije, ivyo ababa mu bihugu bikigendera kuri ya ngingo ya guma mu rugo babona nk'umugani. Muri ico gihugu kirimwo abantu bangana n'imiliyoni cumi, abashika hafi 12,000 ni bo banduye iyo ndwara, abashika 350 nabo irabahitana. Uwateguye ivyo birori yavuze ko vyashobotse kubera ata bakerarugendo bakiri muri ico gisagara kizwi ko kiri mu bisagara biteye igomwe. Amasanamu yava muri ivyo birori yerekana abari muri vyo bicaye hamwe, banywa bongera barorera abariko bakora ibikino. Ondrej Kobza, asanzwe afise inzu y'uburiro akaba ari nawe yateguye ivyo birori, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ati: "Twashatse kwigina ko coronavirus yaranduranywe n'imizi mu gutumira abantu kugira ngo basubire baramukanye kandi berekane ko badatinya kuramukanya, ko batanatinya no gusangira umukate n'abagenzi". Ibibanza vyari vyateguwe vyose vyari vyuzuye. Repubulika ya tchèque yihutiye gufata ingingo za guma mu rugo hakiri kare ikaba yarashoboye kugabanya ubukari bw'ico kiza kitarasasika inganda. Mu ndwi iheze, leta yararekuye amakoraniro y'abantu bashika 1,000. Ibibanza vy'ubwogero, amazu ndangakaranga, ibibanza vy'iyororero ry'ibikoko n'amazu y'amakoraniro ubu arashobora kwugururwa akakira abantu bose bashoboka. Amazu y'uburiro n'ay'ubunywero arashobora kwakira abakiriya mu kiringo c'ukwezi. Ikiboneka ni uko abanyagihugu b'Aba-tchèque bashoboye guhangana n'ico kiza kubera ububangutsi mu gufata ingingo ruhasha. Hagati aho, nivyo ko gutezura ingingo za guma mu rugo kutatumye ibitigiri vyiyongera; ariko hariho mu burere bwa kure cane uvuye ku mugwa mukuru Prague hakiboneka abandura, mu gihe muri ico gisagara hibonekeza abatarenga 15 gusa bandura ku munsi.

headline: Ghana yemeje abantu ba mbere banduye umugera wa Marburg wica cane
text: Ghana yemeje abantu babiri ba mbere banduye umugera wica cane Marburg kandi wandukira cane, ukaba uri mu muryango w’umwe utera Ebola. Iki gihugu kivuga ko aba barwayi babiri bompi baherutse gupfira mu bitaro vyo mu karere ka Ashanti kari mu bumanuko. Ibipimo vyari vyafashwe kuri aba bantu vyagarutse vyerekana ko bari banduye uwu mugera mu ntango za kuno kwezi, bikaba vyarapimwe biremezwa na laboratoire yo muri Senegal. Abajejwe amagara y’abantu muri ico gihugu co muri Afrika y’Uburengero bavuga ko abantu 98 bataramuwe inyuma yo kwikekwa ko boba barakoranyeko n’aba banduye. Nta muti gushika ubu urashobora kuboneka wo kuvura uwu mugera wa Marburg – ariko abaganga bavuga ko kunywa amazi menshi no kuvura ibimenyetso bizwi bishobora guha umurwayi amahirwe menshi gukira. Uwu mugera wandukira abantu uvuye ku buhungarema burya ivyamwa, ugakwirakwira uva ku muntu n’uwundi mu mazimazi y’uruhu. Ni indwara mbi cane kandi yica, ikaba ifise ibimenyetso birimwo kumeneka umutwe, umuriro, kubabara imitsi, kudahwa amaraso no kuva amaraso. Abategetsi bagabisha abanyagihugu ko bokwirinda kwegera amasenga kandi bagateka neza ibintu vyose bikomoka ku nyama imbere y’uko babifungura. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi OMS/WHO rivuga ko ivyaduka vyigeze kwibonekeza muri Angola, Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, Kenya, Afrika y’Epfo na Uganda.  Icaduka ca Marburg cabonetse ubwa mbere mu Budagi mu 1967 aho abantu indwi bapfuye. Uwu mugera wahitanye abantu barenga 200 muri Angola mu 2005, iki kikaba ari co kiza kimaze guhitana abantu benshi kw’isi gushika ubu, nk’uko bivugwa n’iri shirahamwe rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi.

headline: Kwibaruka umuvyeyi abanje gukorwa 'akenshi ni yo nzira nziza' ku bakozwe muri kahise
text: Ubushakashatsi bushasha bwerekana ko ukwibaruka babanje gukorwa (cyangwa kubagwa mu Kinyarwanda) bavyiteguriye bushobora kuba ari bwo buryo bwiza ku bagore baba bari bamaze gukorwa muri kahise. Kuri abo bavyeyi, ukugerageza kwibaruka mu buryo busanzwe vyabonetse ko bifise ingaruka atari nziza ugereranije n'ukwibaruka babanje gukorwa ('césarienne'), nkuko biri muri ubu bushakashatsi bwatangajwe mu kimenyeshamakuru c'ubushakashatsi mu vy'ubuvuzi, PLOS Medicine. Abahinga bavuga ko vyiza ari uguhitishamwo igihe bishoboka - umuvyeyi agahitamwo kwibaruka mu nzira zisanzwe, canke akabanza gukorwa. Iperereza riherutse gukorwa n'ikiganiro Victoria Derbyshire ca BBC, rirerekana ko ivyo bidahuta birashika, kuko abavyeyi benshi basaba ko babanza gukorwa ariko ntibavyemererwe. Umukenyezi kwibaruka abanje gukorwa akenshi biba igihe habaye ingorane, canke iyo bibonetse ko hashobora kuba ingorane mu gihe yogerageza kwibaruka mu nzira zisanzwe. Hagati aho, hariho n'abavyisabira. Mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, abagore barenga ica kane bibaruka babanje gukorwa. Muri abo, igice cabo ni mu gihe haba habaye ingorane, ikindi gice naco ni abagore bavyihitiramwo canke baba babiteguye. Muri rusangi, ukwibaruka ntibishobora kubura ingaruka mbi, haba igihe bibaye mu nzira zisanzwe, canke umuvyeyi abanje gukorwa. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwakorewe mu gihugu ca Écosse (Scotland) bwagereranije ingaruka ziba iyo  ku ruhande rumwe, umuvyeyi yibarutse akozwe yavyisabiye canke bisanzwe biteguye, ku rundi ruhande, umuvyeyi yibarutse mu buryo busanzwe yarigeze kwibaruka abanje gukorwa muri kahise. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwasanze : Nk'uko ikigo c'abahinga mu vyerekeye irondoka co mu Bwongereza (Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists) kibivuga, ni vyiza ko buri gihe abagore bohitishwamwo uburyo bwo kwibaruka butobateza ingorane. Muri rusangi, abakenyezi batatu kuri bane bamaze gukorwa incuro imwe, iyo bagerageje kwibaruka mu buryo busanzwe birakunda, ariko ica kane cabo babigerageje baruhira gukorwa mu buryo bwihuta. Abavyeyi bakwiye kumenya ko iyo bibarutse babanje gukorwa batari bavyiteze, akenshi birabagirira ingaruka mbi, gusumba iyo baba bavyiteguriye imbere y'igihe. Iyo umuvyeyi yibarutse abanje gukorwa, birashobora gufata igihe kirekire kugira ngo ashobore gukira. Ashobora n'ukuhandurira indwara canke agatakaza amaraso menshi cane. Iyo umuvyeyi akozwe, arakira ariko agasigarana inkovu mu gitereko, ivyo navyo bigashobora kuzomutera ingorane muri kazoza mu gihe asamye iyindi mbanyi. Abahinga bavuga kandi ko n'umwana hari igihe ashobora kugira ikibazo c'uguhema mu kiringo gito, canke ugasanga baramukevye batabibonye (ivyo birashika ku bana babiri ku bana ijana, ariko kenshi akira ningoga kandi ata zindi ngorane zihabaye). Iyo umuvyeyi yibarutse mu nzira zisanzwe, bisigura ko ataguma mu bitaro umwanya muremure, agakira ningoga agaca asubira ku bikorwa vyiwe vya minsi yose, kandi biratuma atanarinda gukorwa muri kazoza. Hagati aho, birashobora gutuma atabuka umubiri uri hagati y'igihimba c'irondoka n'ikibuno (périnée/perineum). Vyongeye, ku bagore bigeze kwibaruka bakozwe: Si vyiza ko umugore amaze kwibaruka abanje gukorwa nk'incuro zitatu canke zine yorondera kwibaruka mu nzira zisanzwe, nkuko bivugwa n'ikigo c'abahinga mu vyerekeye irondoka co mu Bwongereza. Muganga Pat O'Brien, umuhinga mu vy'irondoka akaba n'umuvugizi w'ikigo kijejwe irondoka, avuga ati: "Abagore bohumurizwa ko igihe cose bishoboka kandi ari vyiza kwibaruka mu buryo busanzwe, canke akitegura kwibaruka akozwe iyo aheruka kwibaruka abanje gukorwa". "Ni vyiza ko haba ibiganiro bikwiye hagati y'umuvyeyi n'uwumukurikirana kugira ngo ashobore guhitamwo neza uburyo yokwibarukamwo, kandi abahinga bakanamuba hafi".

headline: Kenya: Hari amashirahamwe asaba ihagarikwa ry'amategeko yo gukumira Covid
text: Amwe mu mashirahamwe ataho yegamiye muri politike muri Kenya yakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza amategeko yo gukumira ikiza Covid-19. Mu ndwi iheze, prezida Uhuru Kenyatta yarahagaritse uruja n'uruza mu ntara zitanu zivugwa ko zirimwo ibitigiri binini vy'abantu bandura iyo ngwara harimwo n'igisagara ca Nairobi. Iyo ngingo ikaba ari iyo guhagarika ikwiyongera kw'ikiza Covid-19. Prezida Kenyatta kandi yarahagaritse ububare bw'inzoga muri utwo turere twashizwemwo umukwabu, anategeka ko abafise amazu y'uburiro badandaza indya abantu batahana muhira gusa. Amashirahamwe Bunge la Mwananchi na Muungano wa wananchi wa Citizen Alliance avuga ko izo ngingo zigira ingaruka mbi ku banyagihugu basanzwe, mu gihe ibikorwa vya politike ari vyo vyatumye ico kiza "gikwiragira".

headline: Covid: Afrika y’Epfo ihamagarira abagabo kwicandagisha ku bwinshi
text: Afrika y'Epfo itera akamo abagabo ko bokwitabira ku bwinshi igikorwa co kwicandagisha Covid kuko ibitigiri vyabo biri hasi ugereranije n'ivyabagore. Hafi ibice 60% vy'incaco nivyo bimaze guhabwa abagore, nk'uko bivugwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu kuri uwu wa gatanu mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ku  vyerekeye utwigoro twa reta two kurwanya iki kiza. Ibi bibaye mu gihe reta ifise intumbero yo kuzoba yacandaze n'imiburiburi ibice 70% vy'abanyagihugu b'ico gihugu gushika mu kw'icumi na kabiri. Nicholas Crisp, umutegetsi wo muri ubwo bushikiranganji, avuga ko kugira ngo bashike kuri iyo ntumbero, abantu imiriyoni 28 nibo bazotegerezwa kuba bamaze gucandagwa, mu gihe gushika ubu hamaze kwicandagisha imiriyoni zine gusa. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Joe Phaahla, ntarota atezura ingingo zafashwe mu number yo kuzibira ikwirakwira rya covid n'aho ibitigiri vy'abandura "biriko biragabanuka". Avuga ko urugero rw'ubwandu rukiri hejuru kandi ko ibitaro bigifise ibibazo kubera ubwinshi bw'abanduye. Afrika y'Epfo gushika ubu imaze kugira abantu 2.568.511 banduye ikiza karanda ca Covid, kikaba kimaze guhitana ubuzima bw'abantu 76.243. Nico gihugu ca mbere gifise igitigiri kinini c'abanduye ku mugabane wa Afrika.

headline: Covid-19: Uganda yatumyeko incanco imiliyoni zibiri
text: Uganda yatumyeko incanco zirenga imiliyoni zibiri za covid mu gihe abandura iyo ngwara baguma bongerekana muri ico gihugu, ubu bakaba bashitse ku 25.000. Inkuru ziva ku rubuga rwigenga zisubiramwo uwurongoye ibikorwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri Uganda,Henry Mwebesa, avuga ati:" Ubushikiranganji bwasavye incanco za covid-19 za AstraZeneca buciye mw'ishirahamwe Global Vaccine Alliance (GAVI), ico gikorwa kikaba giteye ku ntambwe ya nyuma." Dr Mwebesa yongeyeko ati:"Uru n'urucanco  (AstraZeneca)  reta izi neza ko rwagenzuwe n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS riranarwemeza… Birahambaye kumenya ko incanco zonyene zemejwe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu hamwe na WHO ari zo zonyene zoshobora guhabwa abanyagihugu ba Uganda." Uganda yiteze kugabirwa incanco imiliyoni zibiri n'ishirahamwe GAVI mu ntango z'umwaka wa 2021 ariko "iriko iregeranya amahera yo kugura nyinshi z'abanyagihugu bose". Igitigiri c'abandura ku musi kiguma ciyongera, mu gihe ico gihugu kiriko kiritegurira amatora rusangi azoba itariki 14 z'ukwezi kwa mbere mu 2021. Bamwe mu banyepolitike baragirijwe ko banse gukurikiza amategeko yo kwikingira mu gihe c'imyiyamamazo.

headline: Jane n'umugabo wiwe Donah Omondi bamaze imyaka 12 bubakanye, nta mwana bararonka
text: Uravye indirimbo ziwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ntushobora na gato kwibaza ko Jane Aller ari mu bibazo bingana ukuraha mu buzima bwiwe. Kuva bubakanye, we n'umugabo wiwe Donah Omondi ntaco batakoze kugira ngo bikunde baronke ikibondo. Ariko hageze neza ko Imana ibahezagira, umugisha ukabaca mu myanya y'intoke. Jane avuga ko uru ari urugendo abagore benshi bagira mu gacerere ntibubahuke kubivugira hejuru. Jane, umuririmvyi w'indirimbo zo guhayagiza Imana muri Kenya, avuga ko yafashe kuvugira ku mugaragaro amageragezwa ahura nayo kugira ngo atere intege abandi. Jane Aller amaze imyaka 12 yubatse. Imyaka ine ya mbere yaranzwe n'ibigeragezo  bidasanzwe. Ati: "Maze umwaka umwe gusa, narasamye inda, ngira umunezero udasanzwe, co kimwe n'umugabo wanje. Ariko rero ku gihamana kibi, iyi mbanyi yarikoroye yo nyene imaze amezi atatu gusa". Kubera vyari bibaye ubwa mbere, yibajije ko ryari isanganya risanzwe, nta mutima wasimvye. Yari azi ko umwanya n'umwanya yari gusama iyindi mbanyi kandi akibaruka. Mu bijanye no gusama imbanyi, mu bisanzwe igi ry'umugore rihura n'urubuto rw'umugabo mu karingoti nyabavyeyi (trompe de Fallope), maze rigaca rija mu gitereko. Nibwo umwana aba atanguye kubaho. Ariko rero kuri Jane, ivyo gusama imbanyi ya kabiri vyabereye hanze y'igitereko. Inda nk'izo zizwi nka ectopique canke extra-utérine. Ati: "Ku munsi ugira kane natanguye kuva amaraso mu gitereko, aho si nari nzi ko imbanyi yanje yari yononekaye kandi ko ndi ku manga y'urupfu". "Muri iyo minsi ine yose numva mfise ububabare butagira izina. Kubera ko umuganga yari asanzwe ankurikirana atari ho yari ari, vyabaye ngombwa ko ndindira mpaka agarutse". "Muri ico gihe cose, sinari nzi ko umwana yari yamaze gupfa, kandi ko igitereko canje cari cuzuye amaraso yari yafatanye". Vyabaye ngombwa ko uyu mugore ashirwa mu bitaro akabagwa kugira ngo bashobore kurokora ubuzima bwiwe. Avuga ko iki cabaye igihe c'ububabare budasanzwe, atari ku mubiri gusa, ariko n'umwikomo mwinshi cane kubona abuze umwana wiwe ku ncuro ya kabiri. Jane ati: "Imbere y'uko banjana mu cumba co kubaga, vyabaye ngombwa ko muganga amfata amaraso kugira ngo ampime bisanzwe. Aho rero niho yambaza ingene nari nkiri muzima mu gihe amaraso yanje yari yavuze". Ico gihe, Jane yaciye atangura kwibaza ibibazo vyinshi cane, yuzura umwikomo mwinshi abaza Imana igituma yemeye ko aca muri ayo mageragezwa. Jane avuga ko basubiye muhira ata mwana bafise. Haciye umwanya yarasubiye arasama iyindi mbanyi, ariko yoyo nta mwanya wahaciye idakorotse. Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko n'aho yari umukozi w'Imana, we n'umugabo wiwe harageze igihe bashavura cane, nawe yuzura umubabaro mwinshi. Nta nyishu baronse ku bibazo vyiwe, mbere n'abaganga nta nyishu bamuhaye kuko igihe cose yabwirwa ko igitereko ciwe ata ngorane n'imwe gifise. Ati: "Igihe imbanyi yanje ya gatatu ikoroka, nari mu bikorwa vyo kuririmba, hanyuma kubera nari nabazwe, umushono watanguye kugira ibibazo ndiko ndaririmba nyene". "Muri uwo mwanya sinatahuye igituma nariko nca muri ayo marushwa kandi ndi umukozi w'Imana, ndiko ndirimbira Imana". Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko atumva ingene Imana yamukoresha gukiza imibiri n'imitima y'abantu aciye mu kuririmba, mu gihe wewe yabandanya abura abana igihe cose asamye imbanyi. Nico gituma ico gihe, arinze afata mikoro aririmba, yari amarira gusa, amosozi akamurenga. Avuga ati: "Aho rero ndiko ndarira abantu bibaza ko nari mu mpwemu, ntibari bazi ko ndiko ndira kubera amarushwa yo kubura abana banje". Rero igihe asama imbanyi igira kane, yumvise umunezero, ariko Jane n'umugabo wiwe bahisemwo kuja kwa muganga kugira ngo bamupime barabe ko ata ngorane afise. Inyishu zavuye mu bipimo bamukoreye zarabaciye intege. Muganga yamubwiye ko imbanyi yayisamiye mu mutsi, kandi ko mu gihe uwo mutsi wosaduka, ubuzima bwiwe bwoba bugiye mu kaga. Yagiriwe inama rero ko ari ngombwa ko bakurayo iyo mbanyi kugira ngo ntapfe. "Maze gukorora imbanyi ya kane, ibintu ntivyanyoroheye, nararize iminsi myinshi cane, mbere sinshake no kuraba impuzu nagira ngo nguriye abana  banje.  Hanyuma kandi nkaguma nibaza nti kubona maze gukorora inda zine zose, ubwo uyu mugabo wanje aracankunda"? Jane avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubereye urutare, kuko yamugumye iruhande igihe cose yagiye agira ibibazo vyo kubura abana biturutse ku mbanyi zakoroka. Bamaze kubura umwana wabo agira kane, Jane yaciye amara imyaka itari mike adasubiye gusama iyindi mbanyi. Mu mwaka uheze, niho yasubiye gusama imbanyi igira gatanu. Iyi mbanyi imaze amezi atatu gusa, yaciye ikoroka. Ikintu kidasanzwe nk'uko Jane we nyene avyivugira, ni uko bwa bubabare yagira ubwa mbere ubu atabwo yumvise. Avuga ko yaciye abona ko ata kundi ategerezwa kubifata uko biri, maze yizera ko igihe ni cagera Imana izomuha umwana. Jane Aller nk'umuririmvyi, umugabo wiwe niwe ategura akamufasha no gutunganya indirimbo ziwe. Ubuvugabutumwa be no gukunda kuririmba, ibi nivyo vyashoboye kubanywanisha. Uretse ko ari umugabo n'umugore, biyumvirira hamwe ibijanye n'ibikorwa vyabo vya minsi yose ibi navyo bikaba ari ukuririmba. Uyu mugore avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubereye inkingi nyamukuru mu buzima bwiwe cane cane muri aya makuba y'imbanyi ziwe zikoroka. Ikibazo nyamukuru kuri we cabaye ingene ababanyi bafata ibimubako, ariko Jane avuga ko incuti ziwe za hafi nk'akarorero inabukwe wiwe yamubaye hafi cane. Kandi iyo ariko atanga impanuro ku bantu baca mu bibazo nk'ivyo acamwo abasaba kudacika intege. Ati: "Ico womenya ni uko hari abantu bahukanye kubera kubura abana, kandi n'igihe basubiriye kwubakana  gushasha bongera guhura n'ivyo bibazo nyene". "Ni nkenerwa ko abantu baca mu bibazo nk'ibi bihangana, bagakomeza urukundo rwabo bakabandanya bihanganiranira". Jane avuga ko ubuzima ari nk'ukugendesha igari, kugira ngo ntuyumbayumbe utegerezwa kubandanya urinyonga. Rero ibintu bizima biza ku bantu babandanya bizeye mu gihe ataco bafise bishimikiza mu kwizera. Jane Aller n'umugabo wiwe Donna babandanya bizeye ko umunsi umwe bazoterura umwana wabo mu maboko. Imbanyi gukoroka ni ikintu gikunze kwibonekeza cane ku bagore benshi kw'isi yose. Hari igihe ivayo hakiri kare cane mbere ugasanga n'umugore ntiyari bwamenye ko yari yaramaze gusama. Kwandura indwara zica mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, ihahamuka, ibibazo vyo mu mutwe, ibi ni bimwe mu bishobora gutuma inda zikoroka hakiri kare. Imbanyi kandi irashobora gukoroka kubera umugore yibungenze yagumye hafi y'isumu canke imiti kanaka irimwo isumu. Si ibintu vyoroshe igihe cose kumenya igituma inda zikoroka, ariko vyinshi mu bituma birashobora kwirindwa. Ingorane zo gukorora inda zirashobora gutorerwa umuti mu kuvura abagore bafise ico kibazo indwara zibibatuma, canke mu kubafasha kwirinda kwegera ahantu hari isumu canke hatameze neza. Hagati aho, hari abandi bagore inda zama zikoroka buri mwanya mbere ugasanga igituma ntikizwi. Abagore bafise ico kibazo c'imbanyi gukoroka igihe cose bategerezwa gupimwa, bakavurwa n'abahinga banonosoye ivy'izo ndwara, kugira ngo bashobore kurondera igituma biba, hanyuma bakabafasha kwibungenga gushika bashikane.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Coronavirus: Yoba ifitanye isano n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere?
text: Muganga Leonard Nduwayo akorera mu Bufaransa arasubiza ikibazo ca Shema Olivier, abaza ati "mbe Covid-19 yoba ifitaniye isano n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere?"

headline: UK mw'itohoza kw'ishure ryapfiriyeko abana batewe imiti ifise imigera, harimwo n'uwa SIDA
text: Abajejwe amatohoza batanguye kwumviriza abahoze ari abanyeshure kw'ishure ry'abamugaye mu Bwongereza inyuma y'aho abana barenga 120 kuri iryo shure bapfiriye mu ciswe ikiza kitari bwigere kibaho muri kahise k'ikigo kijejwe ivy'amagara mu gihugu (NHS). Kuva mu 1974 gushika 1987, abo bana baravuwe indwara yitwa haemophilia kw'ishure ryisumbuye rya Treloar's College. N'imiburiburi abana 72 barapfuye batewe umuti urimwo imigera ya SIDA n'indwara y'igitigu(canke umwijima mu Kinyarwanda). Imbere y'uko yumvirizwa, Richard Warwick yahoze yiga kw'iryo shure riri mu karere ka Hampshire mu mpera z'imyaka ya za 70, mu nyuma akaba yagiye gupimwa agasanga yaranduye SIDA, yabwiye BBC ati: "Twaraburiye abagenzi benshi kw'ishure rya Treloar kandi ni ibintu vy'incamugongo". Iri tohoza ry'ingene hakoreshejwe amaraso yanduye ryatanguye ku wa mbere igihe humvirizwa abantu bafitaniye isano n'iryo shure. Uwahoze arirongoye, Alec Macpherson,  ni umwe mu bategerezwa kwisigura. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Vyarateye agahinda kenshi n'umujinya mwinshi abo bahungu". "Vyabashizemwo uburakari - kubera iki jewe, kubera iki ibi vyambayeko, kubera iki nafashwe n'iyi ndwara iteye ubwoba?" Lord Mayor's Treloar's College ryari ishure ry'indaro ry'abana bafise ubumuga bw'umubiri rikaba ryari rifise ikigo kidasanzwe cegukira NHS, catwarwa n'umurwi w'abaganga b'abahinga. Hagati mu myaka ya 1970, umuti mushasha wo kuvura haemophilia wari uzwi nkafactor VIII/IX, warabonetse ubwa mbere. Uwu muti washobora gufasha abo bose bari bafise ibibazo vyo mu maraso kubaho mu buzima busanzwe ata ngorane yo kuvirirana. NHS nta plasma y'amaraso ikwiye yari ifise kugira ngo ishobore guhingura uwo muti, bikaba vyari ngombwa ko iyigura mu mahanga, cane cane muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Amaraso menshi yaguzwe yari yandujwe imigera y'igitigu (hépatite/hepatitis) co mu bwoko bwa A, B na C, mu nyuma asangwamwo umugera wa SIDA, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abafise iyi ndwara ya haemophilia mu gihugu cose bakaba barandujwe iyi migera. Ade Goodyear yinjiiye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar mu 1980 afise imyaka 10. Avuga ko ubuzima bwari "buryoshe cane" kubera abigisha, abaforoma n'abagenzi bamwitaho cane. Kumwe n'abandi banyeshure batari bake kw'iryo shuri, na we yahawe umuti factor VIII kugira ngo umugabanirize kuvirirana. Ati: "Ntewe urushinge rwa mbere gusa, naciye nandura igitigu baca banshira ukwa jenyene mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri". Mu 1985 yajanywe mu biro bitoya ari kumwe n'umurwi w'abanyeshure maze abwirwa ko yanduye umugera wa SIDA - umugera wari uherutse gutorwa ico gihe, ata muti wariho kandi wica ningoga. Ati: "Muganga yarashavuye adutuma urutoke avuga ati, urawufise, hanyuma ati ntawo ufise. Naciye nsubira mw'ishure isaha indwi n'iminota 50 [13h50]. Nta n'uko naruhutse ku mutaga". "Umwe mu bagenzi yafashe agakono k'amashurwe akamena ku ruhome rw'inyubakwa y'ikigo ca haemophilia. Wari umusi mwiza, mu ci, ndibuka ukuntu naharura imisi y'akazuba nari ngiye kumara". Bakuru ba Ade babiri bahavuye bapfa inyuma yo guterwa umuti factor VIII - Jason yahitanywe na SIDA mu 1997, Gary nawe apfa mu 2015 kubera ibibazo bijanye n'igitigu co mu bwoko bwa C (hépatite C). Ku bana nka Ade na Richard, vyasigura kubaho mu buzima buteye isoni kuba wanduye iyo ndwara itari izwi cane. Abamenyeshamakuru bakora mu binyamakuru bitandukanye barihereranije abanyeshure hanze y'ishuri, bose baguma babaza ibibazo ku bijanye n'uko boba baranduye SIDA. 32 kuri 122 bari bafise indwara ya haemophilia bize kuri iryo shure kuva mu 1974 gushika 1987 baracariho uno musi. Abandi hafi bose barafuye banduye umugera wa SIDA canke hépatite C. Abantu barizeye ko iri tohoza ririko rirakorwa rizoshobora gutanga inyishu ku bibazo vyibazwa ku bijanye n'ivyabaye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar no kuri ico kigo co kuvura iyi ndwara ya  haemophilia cegukira NHS. Imiryango yaburiye kuri iryo shure ishaka kumenya igituma itamenyeshejwe izi ngorane zashobora guterwa n'umuti factor VIII imbere y'igihe hamwe n'igituma vyafashe imyaka myinshi imbere y'uko babanza guteka iyi miti kugira ngo bice imigera yarimwo. Stephen Nicholls yahoze yiga kw'iryo shuri akandura hépatite C inyuma yo guterwa uwo muti avuga ati: "Ivyabereye kw'iryo shuri vyama bigaruka kuduhahamura imisi yose gushika ubu". "Ntituzigera twibagira namba ivyabaye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar n'ivyatubayeko vyose". Ni indwara idakunze kuboneka cane, aho amaraso adatembera neza. Akenshi ikunze gufata abagabo. Abantu bafise iyi ngorane ntibaronka indemamubiri (protéines) zitwa factor VIII na  IX zituma amaraso atembera neza. Muri ino ndwi, abahoze biga kw'iryo shure hamwe n'abavyeyi bahaburiye abana babo bariko batanga ivyemezo. Ikigo co kuvura haemophilia kuri iryo shure cari kirongowe n'abaganga hamwe n'abaforoma begukira NHS, ntibari abakozi begukira iryo shure n'ubu rikibandanya ryakira abana bafise ubumuga gushika ubu. Iri shure ryasohoye itangazo aho rivuga riti: "N'aho gushika ubu ata n'umwe aravuga ko ishure rya Treloar rifise amakosa, ni ikintu kibabaje cane muri kahise kacu". "Carabaye, kandi n'ubu kiracari igihe kibabaje cane ku banyeshure bahoze biga ng'aha, imiryango yabo n'abakozi b'ico gihe". "Turashigikiye cane iri sekeza kugira aba banyeshure bahoze biga hano bamenye ukuri, baronke inyishu ku bibazo vyabo bongere batunganirizwe".

headline: Iran-USA: Igitigiri c’Abanyamerika bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko mu gitero ca Iran congerekanye
text: Amerika ivuga ko igitigiri c'abasirikare bayo bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko (traumatic brain injuries, TBI) kubera ca gitero ca Iran ku ngabo za Amerika muri Iraq mu kwa mbere kigeze kuri 109. Ico gitigiri kirengeye kure cane n'igitigiri ca 64 caheruka kumenyeshwa n'ibiro vyo kwivuna abansi bwa  Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Pentagon. Mu ntango, Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika wewe yari yamenyesheke ko ata Munyamerika n'umwe yigeze agira ikibazo muri ico gitero. Bwana Trump yamenyesheje ivyo ashaka gusigura igituma Amerika itasubije ico gitero co ku wa 08 z'ukwa mbere. Ico gitero cakozwe na Iran mu kwihora igandagurwa ry'umujenerali w'ico gihugu ryakozwe n'igisirikare ca Amerika. Itangazo ryasohowe na Pentagon rivuga ko hafi ibice 70% ry'abasirikare bagize ibibazo basubiye ku kazi kabo. Mu kwa mbere, Pentagon yavuze ko igituma ibitigiri vy'abagize izo ngorane zo mu bwonko biguma biduga ari uko ibimenyetso bimwe bimwe bifata umwanya muremure kugira ngo vyibonekeze. Ejo ku wa mbere, umushingamateka wa Amerika Joni Ernst wo mu mugambwe w'abarepubulikani yasavye izindi nsiguro. Ati: "Ni ngombwa ko haba integuro yo kuvura aba basirikare bagize ibibazo". "Nasavye Pentagon ko ubuzima bw'ingabo zacu zarungitswe muri Iraq bwokurikiranwa kubera  zishobora guhura n'ibitero vy'amabombe". Mu kwezi guheze, Perezida Trump yafashe ko ibibazo vyo mu bwonko izo ngabo zagize nk'inkurikizi y'ico gitero ari ingorane nto cane. Ati: "Narumvise ko hari abari bamenetse umutwe, bagira n'ibindi bibazo bimwe bimwe, ariko mvuga nti, kandi ndavyemeza, si ibintu bikomeye". "Si mfata ko ari ububabare bukomeye mfatiye ku bwo nabonye muri kahise". Igisirikare ca Amerika kivuga ko ibibazo vyo mu bwonko ku basirikare bari mu karere k'intambara ari ibintu vyama vyabaye. Ikigo ca gisirikare kijejwe kwitaho abahuye n'ibibazo vyo mu bwonko kivuga ko ingorane zo mu mutwe ku basirikare bari ku rugamba ziva ahanini ku bibombe baterwa. Abasirikare barenga 400.000 barahuye n'ivyo bibazo kuva mu mwaka wa 2000 nk'uko bivugwa na leta ya Amerika.

headline: Covid-19: Tanzania ivuga ko idakeneye incanco za corona ubu, ihimiriza imiti kama
text: Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Tanzania Muganga Dorothy Gwajima, avuga ko iki gihugu ata mugambi gifise wo gutumako incanco za coronavirus. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ku mugoroba wo ku wa mbere ku mugwa mukuru Dodoma, umushikiranganji Gwajima yavuze ko muri Tanzania ata Covid-19 iriyo, akaba yasavye abanyagihugu gufata ingingo zo kwikingira harimwo no gukoresha imiti kama. Ati: ''Muri uno mwanya ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu nta mugambi wo kwakira urucanco rwa corona canke Covid-19, ruvugwa ko rumaze kuboneka rukaba ruriko rurakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu". Aya majambo ayashikirije mu gihe icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar, Maalim Seif Hamad Sharif, umugore wiwe hamwe na bamwe mu bafasha biwe banduye coronavirus. Avuga ko reta iciye mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu ifise inzira yayo ikurikiza iyo ishaka kwakira ibidandazwa ivyo ari vyo vyose mu gisata c'ubuvuzi. Ari kumwe n'icegera ciwe hamwe n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'imiti kama wo mw'ishirahamwe rikora ubushakashatsi ku miti muri Tanzania, National Institute for Medical Research (NIMR), umupfasoni  Gwajima yerekanye ingene uwu muti kama utegurwa hakoreshejwe tangawizi, ibitunguru, indimu hamwe n'ipiripiri. Umushikiranganji Gwajima avuga ko igihugu gitekanye ariko agatera akamo abanyagihugu gufata ingingo zo kwikingira bivanye n'uko iki kiza kibandanya gikwirakwira mu bihugu bibanyi. Ati: " Rero ico ngomba kuvuga,igihugu cacu kiratekanye; turumva ko mu bihugu bibanyi hari ingorane, nturindire ngo iyi ndwara ive ku mubanyi yinjire iwawe kuko dusanzwe tugenderanira, rero twebwe turiteguye". Yongerako ati: "Iki nico kirwanisho utegerezwa gukora hanyuma ukanywa, ukinonora imitsi, ukanywa amazi menshi, ukaruhuka, ubuvuzi kama". Mu misi iheze, umushikiranganji w'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu, Selemani Jafo, yavuze ko iki gihugu cari cimirije gutanguza isekeza ryo kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'umugera wa coronavirus guhera  ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 01/02/2021. Ahawe ijambo mu rugendo yarimwo ari kumwe n'umukuru w'ico gihugu John Pombe Magufuli mu ntara ya Tabora, yavuze ko iki kiza ata kibanza gifise mu gihugu kandi ko abanyagihugu bazobandanya batakambira Imana. Aya majambo ashikirijwe mu gihe havugwa ubundi bwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo no mu Bwongereza, uriko urakwirakwira mu bihugu vya Afrika. Ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze, umuvugizi wa reta ya Tanzania, Hassan Abbas, yavuze ko igihugu kibandanya gikurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira iki kiza, cane cane muri kino gihe isi ihanganye n'umurindi wa kabiri w'iki kiza. Avugana n'iradiyo EFM iri mu gisagara ca Dar es salam, Abbas yavuze ati: "Twebwe muri Tanzania duhagaze ha handi nyene, turazi ko hari ikibazo kw'isi, kandi isi iri mu rugamba rutoroshe, ariko ica mbere Abatanzania batsinde ubwoba, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwaratanze amabwirizwa ngenderwako". Umusi umwe inyuma y'aho Perezida Magufuli asabiye ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu kwihoza izi ncanco za corona, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi ryahamagariye iki gihugu kwitegurira urucanco rwa corona nk'ibindi bihugu vyo kw'isi. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru hifashishijwe ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Muganga Matshdiso Moeti , avuga ko ari ngombwa ko Tanzania ifata aka kanya habonetse urucanco ku nyungu z'abanyagihugu n'akarere kose ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko. Ati: "Twatanguye kuvugana n'abategetsi bo hejuru, kandi tubandanya dutanga intererano yacu nk'uko vyari bimeze kuva kera, kandi dushaka gukorana na Tanzania kw'izina ry'abanyagihugu ba Tanzania, ibihugu bibanyi n'isi yose muri rusangi". "Kimwe mu vyo tubwira Tanzania ni ukwibutsa reta ko ibi ari ibiri mu masezerano mpuzamakungu ajanye n'amagara y'abantu, aho ibihugu biri muri iri shirahamwe vyiyemeje vyose hamwe kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'indwara". Muganga Moeti avuga ko OMS yamye itanga intererano yayo ikanavugana na reta ya Tanzania kuva iki kiza karanda ca corona kigitangura. Iri shirahamwe kandi rirashimangira ko ari ngombwa ko Tanzania yama itanga ibiharuro vy'ingene corona yifashe mu gihugu kugira ngo vyorohe guhangana nayo no kuzibira kugira ngo ntihagire abandi bantu bandura. Muganga Moeti ati: "Kimwe mu vyo ibihugu bihurikiye muri iri shirahamwe vyumvikanyeko ni ugutanga ibiharuro vy'ingene iyi ndwara yifashe, iki nacibukije reta ya Tanzania kandi ndafise urwandiko rwerekana neza ko bategerezwa gukurikiza aya masezerano. Turizeye ko ivyo twumvikanye ku bijanye n'incanco bizokurikizwa kugira ngo turwanye uwu mugera".

headline: Covid-19: umushikiranganji wa mbere wa France avuga ko Omicron igenda nk'umuravyo
text: Ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19, buzwi kw'izina rya Omicron buriko "burakwiragira ku muvuduko w'umuravyo" i Bulaya, kandi buboneka ko ari bwo bugiye kwiganza mu Bufaransa gushika mu ntango z'umwaka uza, nk'uko umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubufaransa Jean Castex agabisha. Aya majambo yayashikirije ku wa gatanu hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo Ubufaransa bufate ingingo zo kuzibira ingenzi zinjira zivuye mu Bwongereza. Gushika ubu, Ubwongereza nico gihugu ca mbere kibangamiwe gusumba ibindi mu karere, aho ejo ku wa gatandatu, abashika hafi 25.000 ari bo bamenyekanye ko banduye Omicron. Ku mugabane wose, abajejwe amagara y'abantu bahanganye bikomeye n'igihuhusi c'abandura ku bwinshi. Ingingo zindi ziramaze gufatwa mu Budagi, muri Irlande no mu Buholande, mu gihe abategetsi b'ibi bihugu bariko bita ku rutare ngo bahagarike iki kiza. Abarenga imiriyoni 89 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye Covid-19 i Bulaya nayo imiriyoni 1.5 bakaba bamaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro vya vuba i Bulaya. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ubudagi Karl Lauterbach yabwiye abanyamakuru ko igihugu "gitegerezwa kwitegura guhangana n'ikiza tutari bwigere duhura", mu gihe igisata c'amagara y'abantu camaze kumenyesha ko Ubufaransa, Norvège  na Danemark ari "ibihugu bibangamiwe cane" kubera ibitigiri vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera cane muri vyo. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, abashikiranganji bajejwe amagara y'abantu ku rwego rw'uturere basavye reta ya Berlin gufata ingingo ruhasha ku binjira bavuye mu Bwongereza kubera ibitigiri vy'umurengera vy'abandura Omicron muri iki gihugu. Ubwongereza bwatangaje ibitigiri binini gusumba vy'abandura Covid ku musi ugira gatatu bwikurikiranya - aho abarenga 93.000 banduye - abenshi muri bo bakaba banduye Omicron. Ku wa gatanu, Ubufaransa bwarugaye imbibe zabwo ku ngenzi ziva mu Bwongereza. Si co gihugu conyene kiriko kirafata ingingo ruhasha zo kuzibira. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi turiko turangiza, Ubutaliyano, Ubugiriki na Portugal vyatangaje ko ingenzi ziva mu bihugu vy'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya zishitse zitegerezwa kwerekana ibipimo vyerekana ko batanduye  - baba mbere n'abakingiwe. Mw'ijambo yashikirije imbere y'uko izi ngingo nshasha zitangura gushirwa mu ngiro, umushikiranganji Castex yavuze ko izi ngingo zerekeye ingenzi ziri mu zindi nyinshi zafashwe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iki kiza. Zimwe muri zo harimwo kugabanya umwanya uri hagati y'urucanco rwa kabiri n'urwa gatatu, gutegeka amazu y'uburiro ko abinjira muri yo bategerezwa kuba baricandagishije mu buryo bwuzuye, hamwe no gutandukana mu modoka zunguruza abantu. Vyongeye, ibirori vyose bijanye no guhimbaza umwaka mushasha vyarahagaritswe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu avuga kandi ko reta igiye gutangaza ingingo nshasha mu mwaka uza ku bagihigimanga kwicandagisha, akavuga ko ari ibintu "bidashobora kwihanganirwa ko imiriyoni nkeya z'Abafaransa banka kwicandagisha bata ubuzima bw'igihugu cose mu kaga". Ejo ku wa gatandatu, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ubufaransa Olivier Veran yavuze ko gushika kuri 10% vy'abanduye mu gihugu  banduye ubu bwoko bwa Omicron. Nk'uko ibiharuro bitangwa n'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya coronavirus muri ico gihugu kivyerekana, Ubufaransa bufise urugero rw'abandi bashasha bandura barenga 48.000 ku musi. Hagati aho, mu Buholande, abahinga mu vyo amagara y'abantu bavuga ko igihugu ari ngombwa ko gifata ingingo "ruhasha" za guma mu rugo, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mark Rutte avuga ko Omicron ari bwo bwoko bushobora kuba bwiganje mu gihugu gushika mu kwa mbere, nk'uko bimeze mu Bufaransa. Kuva mu mpera z'ukwa cumi na rimwe, ububare, amazu y'uburiro hamwe kandi n'amaduka hafi yose vyategetswe kwugara gushika isaha cumi n'imwe z'umugoroba gushika isaha cumi n'imwe z'agatondo. Iyi ngingo yategerezwa gukurikizwa gushika imbere ya Noweli/Noheli, ariko ikazotegerezwa kubandanya gushika ku wa 14 z'ukwa mbere. Igisata c'ingenzi muri Irlande kivuga ko kibabajwe n'amategeko mashasha agiye gushirwa mu ngiro kuva ku wa mbere avuga ko ububare, amazu y'uburiro, amazu y'ibikino na za sinema, vyose bizotegerezwa kwugara isaha zine z'ijoro. Iyi ngingo iranegurwa na bamwe mu banyaporitike barongoye igihugu, bakavuga ko aya mabwirizwa mashasha ashobora gutuma haduka amakoraniro abera mu mihana y'abantu. Ibigo vyo kwinonora imitsi bitegerezwa kwakira 50%,  ibibuga navyo vyakire abatarenga 5000. Ibirori vy'ubugeni ntibizorenga isaha zitandatu z'ijoro - bikazotegerezwa kwitabirwa n'abatarenga 100.

headline: Ashley ati: ‘Nari nzi ko SIDA ari indwara ifata abakiri bato’
text: Igihe Ashley, umugore w'imyaka 59, yinjizwa ibitaro afise ingorane y'urura, yaba we canke abaganga nta n'umwe yibaza ko wari umugera wa SIDA. Mu vyo yibuka, avuga ati: "Bambwiye ko ata ngorane n'imwe mfise, ariko ko nari mfise umugera - gusa sinamenye ko nari mfise umugera ukomeye ushobora kubaho". Haciye imyaka itatu Ashley apimwe bagasanga yaranduye umugera wa SIDA,  inyuma y'aho akoreye imibonano mpuzabitsina atikingiye. Ariko kubona bawutoye baratevye bivuga ko uwo mugera wari wamaze gutangura kwonona ubushobozi bw'umubiri bwo gushibira kwikingira indwara. Ivyashikiye Ashley si ibintu bidasanzwe kuko abantu batandatu kuri cumi bafise imyaka irenga 50 banduye umugera wa SIDA ni abagiye kumenya ko banduye batevye mu 2018, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, PHE. Abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu hamwe n'amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza bavuga ko kubera batitabwaho, kandi bagafatwa ko atamibonano mpuzabitsina bakora, bituma batamenya ko banduye. Ashley ati: "Abantu barengeje imyaka 50, canke abahukanye, bobo bibaza ko badashobora kwandura". "Kubera bazi ko badashobora kwibungenga, bavuga bati 'nta ngorane' canke bati 'izi ni indwara z'abakiri bato'. Ariko sivyo, uwo ari we wese arashobora kuyandura". Ibiharuro bitangwa n'ikigo PHE vyerekana ko igitigiri c'abanduye indwara zifatira mu bihimba vy'irondoka kuva ku myaka 45 kuduga vyiyongereye gushika hafi ku bice 35% mu myaka itanu iheze. Icigwa casohowe mu kinyamakuru c'amagara yabantu The Lancet mu 2017, cerekana ko umuntu umwe kuri batandatu bagendana umugera wa SIDA i Bulaya ari kuva ku myaka 50 kuduga, kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abawandura vyaduze mu bihugu 16 vy'i Bulaya mu myaka cumi iheze. Norah O'Brien, umuhinga mu bijanye n'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza mu kigo PHE, avuga ko abafise imyaka yitereye na bo nyene ubwabo bibaza ko badashobora kwandura. Nivyo vyari mu mutwe wa Karen Norton w'imyaka 63, yanduye umugera mu myaka mike iheze muri Afrika. Ati: "Abenshi twibaza ko ivyo kwandura bidashobora kudushikira". "N'abaganga basa n'abibaza ko umuntu arenza imyaka 50 adashobora kwandura uwu mugera". "Twese dusa n'uko twiyumvira gutyo ku bantu barenza imyaka 50. Ntushobora kwibaza ko nyoko wawe canke so wawe ashobora kuwandura - ariko ni ikintu gishoboka cane". Vyafashe igihe kirekire kugira ngo Karen yimenyekanishe ko yanduye, kuko yatinya ko bohava bamucira urubanza. Ati: "Wumva umengo wikoreye umucafu utegerezwa kunyegeza". "Mu gihe ukoze imibonano mpuzabitsina utikingiye, ushobora kwandura. Akarorero ni jewe". Mu kwezi guheze, ibiharuro vyerekanye ko igitigiri c'abanduye umugera wa SIDA mu Bwongereza cagabanutse bimwe biboneka kuva mu 2012 - cane cane mu bantu bahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza ryo mu Bwongereza, Terrence Higgins Trust, rivuga ko igikenewe ubu ari uko igice c'abantu batitaweho, nk'abo barengeje imyaka 50, bokwitabwaho gusumba. Aled Osborne nawe wo mw'ishirahanwe Brigstowe ryo mu Bwongereza nyene avuga ko abantu bafise imyaka yitereye bagifise mu mutwe ivyavugwa ku mugera wa SIDA mu myaka ya 1980 na 90, akabona ko bashobora kuba batashoboye kuronswa amakuru nyayo kuva ico gihe. Ati: "Kugendana umugera wa SIDA si igihano c'urupfu nk'uko vyari bimeze mu myaka ya 80 na 90. Ubu imiti ikora neza iriho". "Abantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA ariko basanzwe bafata iyo miti ntibashobora kwanduza uwo mugera". Imyaka yo kubaho ku bantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA ariko basanzwe bafata iyo miti nico kimwe n'iy'abandi bose muri rusangi. Hagati aho, ugereranije n'abatanguye kuyifata bakimenya ko banduye uwo mugera, amahirwe si menshi ku bacerewe kuyifata. Ashley vyaramugoye kuko yagiye kumenya ko yanduye yatevye. Ati: "Jewe nta ngorane vyantera kugendana umugera wa SIDA. Nta ngorane bintera n'ukuri. Gusa kubona batashotse bawutora, vyatumye nteba kubimenya". " Vyafashe igihe kirekire…kandi umubiri wanje warononekaye - numva bimbabaje".

headline: Abagore babiri barwaye kanseri y’ibere batanguje ishirahamwe ry’ugufasha abandi barwayi nkabo
text: Abagore babiri barwaye kanseri y'ibere idakira bashinze ishirahamwe bise Secondary Sisters kugira ngo bafashe abandi, ni inyuma y'aho baronkeye ibipimo vyabaciye umutima. Abongerezakazi Nicky Newman na Laura Middleton-Hughes, bompi b'imyaka 31, bafise kanseri igeze ku rugero rugira kane. Bisigura ko igeze ku rugero rwo gukwiragira mu bindi bice vy'umubiri nk'amagufa, amahaha, igitigu (canke umwijima mu Kinyarwanda) canke ubwonko. Igihe Nicky wo mu karere ka Guildford yabwirwa ko kanseri yiwe idashobora gukira kubera yari igeze ku rugero rwo hejuru, avuga ko vyatumye agira "ubwoba budasanzwe". Abo bagore bompi bizeye ko iryo shirahamwe ryabo rikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rizofasha abandi bazoronka inkuru mbi nk'iyi guhangana nayo. Laura ava i Norwich avuga ko gushinga iryo shirahamwe vyabahaye "akaryo keza k'ukuganira ku vyerekeye kanseri yacu". Ati: "Twempi tubona ko dufise kazoza kadatomoye, ariko turafise kazoza kandi tuzobaho uko nyene". "Rero mu gihe twoshobora gufasha n'umuntu n'umwe gusa kwumva amahoro, akumva ko ari umuntu nk'abandi, ico kirahagije". Abo bagore bompi, bakorana n'umugambi wiswe Stand Up To Cancer. Ni umugambi w'isekeza ry'ukwegeranya amahera watunganijwe n'ikigo co mu Bwongereza ca Cancer Research UK kijejwe kurwanya kanseri, hamwe na televiziyo Channel 4. Nicky yagiye kumenya ko afise ikivyimba mw'ibere igihe yari yagiye kwivuza ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe. Avuga ko yari yavyiketse n'imbere y'uko abimubwira, aravye ingene muganga yahindutse mu maso. Mu gihe yariko arapimwa, yavuze ko yumva ababara mu mugongo, ariho yaca arungikwa ku muhinga afotora mu mubiri. Ati: "Umuganga yambwiye ati: 'Sha nta kundi, ntaco nshobora kugufasha'. Vyaciye bintera ubwoba bwinshi". Ariko, yaciye amuha umuti witwa Palbociclib wari uherutse kwemerwa n'ikigo NHS kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza. Imiti bariko barafata ishobora kuba yaratumye iyo ndwara itabandanya ikwiragira mu mubiri, ariko ikaba yatumye batazigera bavyara. Nicky avuga ko igihe yava kwa muganga, yari ababajwe cane n'uko atazoronka akaryo ko kwitwa umuvyeyi gusumba kurwara kanseri. Mugenziwe Laura yagiye kumenya ko arwaye kanseri yo mw'ibere mu mwaka wa 2014 mu gihe yari mu karuhuko bakamutora ikivyimba. Baciye bamukura ibere rimwe baranamuvura, kandi arakira neza. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane 2016, niho yumva ububabare ku rutugu i buryo bwaguma bwongerekana, baca bamurungika gucishwa mu cuma agapimwa. Niho basanga afise ikivyimba ku mutwe w'igufa bita 'humerus' rifatanya urutugu n'inkokora. Ati: "Nagize ubwoba budasanzwe, 2016 wambereye umwaka mubi, umwaka mubi n'ukuri!" Laura afise ibimenyetso vya kanseri y'amabere vyakwiragiye mu ruti rw'umugongo, mu magufa afatanye narwo no mu gice c'urukenyerero n'amayunguyungu. Avuga ati: "Hagati aho, ndashima ko imiti ndiko ndafata iriko iramfasha kubandanya mbaho".

headline: DR Congo: Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ifise impungenge kuri M23
text: Abagize Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kw’isi basubiriye gushikiriza impungenge bafise kw’ivyuka ry’umuhari w’inyeshamba wa M23 n’iyindi mirwi y’inyeshamba irangwa mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Mw’itangazo iyo Nama yaraye isohoye, yasubiye kwiyamiriza yivuye inyuma imirwi y’inyeshamba ikiyogoza muri ico gihugu, yaba iyo hagati mu gihugu canke iyiva hanze. Amakuru ava mu karere k’Ubuseruko bwa Congo avuga ko intambara zibica bigacika hagati y’ingabo za Congo (FARDC) n’umuhari M23 mu micungararo ya Rutshuru no mu bindi bisagara. Abagize iyo Nama basaba imirwi yose  yitwaje ibirwanisho guhagarika ubugizi bwa nabi idatevye hanyuma imihari y’inyeshamba  ya Congo nayo ikitabira, ataco irinze gusaba, umugambi wo gusubiza ibirwanisho no gusubira mu buzima busanzwe. Isaba kandi imirwi y’inyeshamba iva hanze gushira ibirwanisho hasi idatevye hanyuma igasubira mu bihugu yaje ivamwo. Basubiye kumenyesha ko bashigikiye « ubwigenge, ubumwe n’ubusugire bw’igihugu ca Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo ». Ni mu gihe intambara zibica bigacika mu turere tw’intara ya Kivu, aho amakuru avuga ko intambara zabandanije mu gatondo ko kuri uno wa gatandatu mu micungararo y’igisagara ca Rutshuru na Kiwanja mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru, nk’uko vyandikwa n’iradiyo Okapi y’aho muri Congo. Isubiramwo ababibonye bavuga ko izo ntambara zibera kw’ibarabara No 2 rihuza Rutshuru n’igisagara ca Goma ritakirengana kuva ejo ku wa gatanu kubera intambara. Abasirikare bavugwa ko babonywe bariko basubira inyuma bava mu gisagara ca Kiwanja, mu gihe abanyagihugu bafise ubwoba ko ico gisagara gishobora kuba camaze gufatwa n’umuhari M23, ibitarashobora kwemezwa gushika ubu n’abategetsi. Gushika ejo ku wa gatanu, nk’uko vyandikwa na Radio Okapi, M23 yari yamaze kwigarurira uturere hafi twose twa Busanza, Jomba, Bweza et Kisigari, hamwe n’ibigwati bimwe bimwe vy’akarere ka Rugari, kari ku birometero 30 mu buraruko bw’igisagara ca Goma. G﻿ushika ubu, ntaco abategetsi ba gisirikare barashikiriza ku kungene ibintu bimeze kuri uno wa gatandatu muri Rutshuru.

headline: Misire yo gucungera ikirere ya Syria yaguye hafi y'ikigo ca nikleyeri ca Israel
text: Igisasu ca misire gikorora indege ca Syria caturikiye mu bumanuko bwa Israel, ku birometero 30 gusa uvuye ku kigo c'ibanga ca nucléaire. Amahona yo gutabaza (sirènes) yatanguye kwumvikana imbere y'uko ico gisasu giturika mu karere ka Dimona. Nta wakomeretse kandi nta vyononekaye. Igisirikare ca Israel kivuga ko iyi misire ari imwe mu yandi atari make yatewe imbere y'aho ku ndege ya Israel. Nayo yaciye yihora mu gutera ibirindiro bitari bike muri Syria vyo gucungera ikirere. Igisirikare ca Syria kimenyesha ko izo misire za Israel zaguye hafi y'ibigo biri hafi y'umugwa mukuru Damas/Damascus. Igisirikare ca Syria kivuga kandi ko nyinshi muri izo misire zategerewe mu kirere zikamanurwa, ariko ko abasirikare bane bakomeretse, kandi ko hari "ibintu bimwe bimwe vyononekaye". Ishirahamwe rikurikiranira hagufi ibijanye n'agateka ka muntu muri Syria, Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, rifise icicaro mu Bwongereza, rivuga ko misire za Israel zatewe ku kirindiro co gucungera ikirere mu gisagara ca Dumayr kiri ku birometero 40 mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Damas. Ako karere kazwi ko ari bwo bubiko bw'ibirwanisho vy'abarwanyi bashigikiwe na Iran basanzwe barwana ku ruhande rw'igisirikare ca reta ya Syria mu ntambara iri muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, hari amakuru yavuga ko ibirindiro vyo gucungera ikirere vya Israel biri hafi ya Dimona hamwe no ku kivuko ca Eilat kiri ku kiyaga gitukura (Red Sea) vyongerejwe inguvu mu kwicungera mu gihe hoba igitero c'abarwanyi bashigikiwe na Iran muri ako karere, harimwo n'abari muri Syria. Icuka kibandanya kiba kibi hagati y'ibi bihugu bisanzwe birabana ribi, Iran ikagiriza Israel ko ari yo iherutse gukora igitero ku kigo ca Natanz gihingura ubutare bwa uranium mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Israel ntiyigeze ivuga ko ari yo yakoze ico gitero. Ikigo ca nucléaire ca Dimona muri Israel  kivugwa ko cahinguye ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Israel ntihakana canke ngo yemeze ko ifise ibirwanisho vy'ubumara.

headline: Imvo n'imvano iganira na bamwe mu barundi ku matora yo ku wa 20.05.2020 mu Burundi
text: Muri kino kiganiro Imvo n'imvano, Prudent Nsengiyumva aganira na bamwe mu banyagihugu b'Abarundi ku vyerekeye amatora yo ku wa 20.05.2020 mu Burundi.

headline: Ubumwe bwa Afrika - AU - bwahagaritse igihugu ca Guinea kubera kudeta
text: Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika, canke AU, ryahagaritse mu banyamuryago igihugu ca Guinea nyuma y'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi nk'uko bigaragara mu butumwa bwa twitter. Prezida Alpha Condé yatembagajwe n'umugwi w'abasirikare bayobowe na Col Mamady Doumbouya ku munsi wa Mungu uheruka. Iyo kudeta yariyamirijwe n'abarongozi b'akarere co kimwe n'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika, umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU hamwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ishirahamwe ry'akarere Ecowas ryahagaritse Guinea kuwa gatatu nayo abashikiranganji bajejwe imigenderare bo mu karere k'uburengero bwa Afrika bakaba barashitse i Conakry ngo baganire n'abatembagaje ubutegetsi. Abariko abarongozi ba gisirikare bakirijwe impundu n'isinzi ry'abantu mu mabarabara ku murwa mukuru Conakry. Benshi bavuga yuko bari baraseserejwe na Prezida Condé, yari mu kiringo kigira gatatu c'ubutegetsi, bakidogera kandi igiturire, ubutunzi bwifashe nabi hamwe n'intwaro mbi.

headline: Lalibela- Ethiopia: Inyeshamba za Tigray ntizumva akamo ko kuva mu gisagara zafashe muri Amhara
text: Inyeshamba zo muri Tigray banse kwumvira akamo ka Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ko kuva mu ntara zihana urubibe n'iyabo, umunsi umwe inyuma y'aho zifatiye ikibanza kiri mu mirage y'isi ya ONU mu ntara ya Amhara. Abo bagwanya reta ya Ethiopia bo mu ntara ya Tigray ku wa kane  bigaruriye igisagara ca Lalibela, umurage w'isi wa Unesco mu ntara ya Amhara ihana urubibe na Tigray. Lalibela, ahabarizwa amasengero yo mu kinjana ca 13 asaruwe mu mabuye, ni ikibanza cerenda ku bakristu b'aba Othodoxe baharurwa muri za miriyoni. Abahaba bari bamaze igihe bahunga umusugerezo w'inyeshamba, nk'uko abategetsi b'aho babibwiye BBC. Abantu ibihumbi baramaze kwicwa kuva intambara yadutse mu kwezi kwa 11. Ubu intambara iriko irakwira mu ntara za Amhara na Afar, iyindi ntara ihana urubibe na Tigray. Abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni nabo baramaze guteshwa izabo. Zaba inyeshamba za Tigray, zaba n'ingabo za reta mpuzantara ya Ethiopia n'abazishigikiye, izo mpande zompi ziraregwa ibikorwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara. Icegera c'umukuru w'igisagara ca Lalibela, Mandefro Tadesse, yabwiye BBC ko igisigara kigenzurwa n'inyeshamba zo muri Tigray. Yavuze ko ata rusasu rwigeze ruraswa, ariko ko abanyagihugu bariko barahunga igisagara kandi ko afise amakenga y'ayo masengero mbonekarimwe. Hari amasezengero 11 yasaruwe mu masenga y'amabuye mu binjana vya 12 na 13. Yubatswe nk'ayo gusubirira Ihanga Ryeranda, abakora urugendo rweranda batashobora gushikamwo ico gihe. Mandefro yavuze ati: "Uwu n'umurage w'isi, kandi duteregerezwa gufashanya kugirango iryo tunga rikingirwe." Iyo ntambara iriko irakwira izindi ntara ikurikiye ukwigarurira uturere inyeshamba za Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) zagize mu kwezi ka gatandatu, harimwo gufata umurwa mukuru w'intara ya Tigray Mekelle inyuma y'aho ingabo za Ethiopia zihaviriye  hanyuma zigantangaza zonyene ihagarikwa ry'intambara. TPLF niyo yari irongoye reta y'intara ya Tigray gushika yirukanywe n'ingabo za Ethiopia mu kwezi kwa 11. Reta ya Ethiopia yayise umugwi w'iterabwoba. Ariko izo nyeshamba zivuga ko arizo reta yemewe y'intara ya Tigray. Muri iyi ndwi, umu jenerari wo muri izo nyeshamba yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise intumbero yo kugondoza reta kuvanaho ukwugarana iyo ntara no kwemera inyishu ya poritike  kuri ico kibazo. Reta irahakana kuba yarugaranye iyo ntara kandi ivuga ko ata biganiro bizoba. Ariko kubona TPLF igeze muri Amhara na Afar vyatumye amakungu anegura ibiriko biraba, ONU na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bakaba basavye impande zose  guhagarika intambara. Reta ya Ethiopia ivuga ko abantu ibihumbi 300 bateshejwe izabo muri Amhara na Afar. Hagati aho ONU yo ivuga ko amakamyo 175 arimwo imfashanyo yashitse muri Tigray. Ariko umukuru w'ishami rya ONU riraba indya kw'isi (PAM/WFP) yagabishije avuga ko hakenewe amakamyo arenga 100 ku munsi kugira hagarukirwe abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni bakeneye imfashanyo. Abakozi b'amashirahamwe afasha bafise ikibazo co gushika mu  gice kinini ca Tigray kubera ikibazo c'umutekano n'izindi ntambanyi zo kuronka impusha.

headline: North Korea: umukuru w'iki gihugu Kim Jong-un aragabisha ko 'ibintu bitoroshe'
text: Umukuru wa Koreya y'Uburaruko Kim Jong-un asaba abanyagihugu ko bokwitegurira ibihe "bitoroshe", inyuma y'aho abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bagabishirije ko igihugu gihanzwe n'ubukene bw'imfungurwa mu gihe ubutunzi butifashe neza. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mw'ikoraniro ry'umugambwe, Kim yagereranije ingene ibintu vyifashe ubu n'amapfa yo mu myaka ya 1990 yihaye inkumbi. Koreya y'Uburaruko yarugaye imbibe zayo kubera ikiza karanda ca coronavirus. Vyatumye urudandaza hagati y'iki gihugu n'Ubushinwa ruhagarara mu gihe rwari bwo buraro n'uburamuko bw'ubutunzi bwaco. Ibi vyaje vyiyongera ku bihano vy'ubutunzi iki gihugu cafatiwe n'amakungu kubera umugambi waco wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara. Mu majambo atamenyerewe kuri we yo kwemera ko hari ibihe bigoye biri imbere, uyu mutegetsi yateye akamo ejo ku wa kane abategetsi b'umugambwe "kwitegurira urundi 'Rugendo Rutoroshe' (Arduous March/Marche Ardue)  kugira ngo abanyagihugu bacu baronke agahengwe n'akanya na gato". Ijambo  Arduous March (Urugendo Rutoroshe) ni ijambo risanzwe rikoreshwa n'abategetsi ba Koreya y'Uburaruko bagomba kuvuga urugamba rw'iki gihugu mu gihe c'amapfa yo mu myaka ya 1990 yihaye inkumbi, igihe icahoze ari Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abasoviyeti casambuka, Koreya y'Uburaruko igasigara yifumbereje. Bivugwa ko hafi abantu imiriyoni zitaru ari bo bapfuye muri ico gihe. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, Kim yaragabishije ko igihugu ciwe gihanzwe "n'ibihe bidasanzwe bitari bwigere bibaho" hamwe "n'ingorane nyinshi mu buryo butari bwigere bubaho". Haciye amezi atari make haba ukugabisha ko abanyagihugu ba Koreya y'Uburaruko bari mu ngorane. Amakuru avuga ivy'ubuzima bugoye asa n'ayava cane cane mu bisagara biri hafi y'urubibe iki gihugu gihana n'Ubushinwa, aho abatari bake bari babeshejweho n'urudandaza rwa magendo. Igiciro c'ibigori, imfungurwa nyamukuru ku banyagihugu batari bake ba Koreya y'Uburaruko baba mu misozi, kivugwa ko caduze cane gushika n'aho ikiro kimwe c'ibigori cagurwa igiciro kirenga umushahara w'ukwezi. Lina Yoon, umushakashatsi mw'ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch, mu cegeranyo giheruka asubiramwo ibivugwa n'abantu atavuze umwidondoro, yavuze ko "haheze hafi amezi abiri bisa n'uko ata mfungurwa zinjira mu gihugu zivuye mu Bushinwa". "Hari benshi basigaye babeshejweho no gusegerereza, abantu bamwe barapfuye bishwe n'inzara mu karere k'umupaka, kandi nta sabune, nta muti w'amenyo, canke amabeteri". Mu kwezi guheze, itumwa idasanzwe ya ONU mu murwi wa Koreya y'Uburaruko ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu, Tomás Ojea Quintana, yasohoye icegeranyo agabisha ko "hari ikibazo gikomeye c'ubukene bw'imfungurwa" cariko gitera indwara z'ugufungura nabi n'inzara. "Hari amakuru avuga ko hari abapfuye bahitanywe na kigoyi, kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abana n'abatama basigaye babeshejweho n'ugusegerereza vyiyongereye, kubera imiryango yabo itagishoboye kubatunga". Kubera iki Koreya y'Uburaruko iri mu bibazo? Ubutunzi bwa Koreya y'Uburaruko buri mu butunzi bwugaranywe cane kw'isi kandi buvugwa ko budahagaze neza, ni mu gihe busanzwe bugenzurwa bikomeye na reta. Ibikorwa vy'ugukomeza inzego za gisirikare n'iz'umutekano  bituma abanyagihugu basanzwe ba Koreya y'Uburaruko basigara bifumbereje. Ibihano vy'ubutunzi Koreya y'Uburaruko yafatiwe n'amakungu mu ntumbero yo kuyitera igitsure ngo ihebe umugambi wayo wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara vyarunyuye ibintu, co kimwe n'ingingo ya reta yo kwugara imbibe z'iki gihugu mu ntumbero yo kuzibira coronavirus. Kuva mu ntango za 2020, urudandaza hagati y'iki gihugu n'Ubushinwa, ari rwo buraro n'uburamuko bw'abanyagihugu, rwarahagaze. Koreya y'Uburaruko ivuga ko iyi ngingo yo kwugara imbibe yatumye Covid-19 idashika mu gihugu, n'aho abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafise amakenga kuri aya makuru.

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Umukenguzamateka wa US yarakaje Abarusiya inyuma y'aho asabiye ko Putin yicwa
text: Umukenguzamateka wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika asaba ko mu begereye Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya  hogira umwe muri bo amwica. Lindsey Graham avuga ko inzira yonyene yorangiza igitero Uburusiya bwakoze kuri Ukraine ari uko hoboneka umuntu "agakuraho uyu mugabo". Mw'itangazo yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, uyu mukenguzamateka wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika azwi ko atarya umunwa abaza nimba hatoboneka umuntu nka "Brutus" mu bantu ba Putin akamwirahira maze intambara igaca ihagarara. Aya majambo yarakaje uwuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika. Umukenguzamateka Graham aserukira intara ya Caroline du Sud, yanditse ati: "Woba ukoreye igikorwa kidasanzwe igihugu cawe n'isi yose". "Nta mu Brutus mu Burusiya? Nta Colonel Stauffenberg yoba ari mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya?" Brutus yari umunyaporitike w''icahoze ari ingoma y'Abaromani (Empire Romain/Roman Empire) yishe Julius Caesar, mu gihe Koroneri (Colonel) Claus von Stauffenberg wo mu gisirikare c'Ubudagi azwi cane ko yagerageje kwica Adolf Hitler mu 1944. Anatoly Antono aserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika avuga ko aya majambo "ari mabi cane kandi adashobora kwihanganirwa". Avuga ko ata "muntu yari yiteze urwanko nk'uru ku Burusiya muri Amerika". "Ni ibintu bitumvikana kwumva umukenguzamateka w'igihugu gishira imbere ko imico myiza ari yo ikwiye kuba 'inyenyeri' imurikira isi yose ashobora kwiyumvira ko iterabwoba ari yo nzira ya Washington yo gushika ku nyungu zayo ku rubuga mpuzamakungu". Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika ariyamiriza igitero c'Uburusiya kuri Ukraine mbere akaba yarafatiye ibihano abanyaporitike harimwo na Perezida Putin we nyene ubwiwe. Avuga ko Amerika izokingira ibihugu vya OTAN/NATO ariko akaba atazorungika ingabo muri Ukraine. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche/White House Jen Psaki yashimangiye ko amajambo ya  Graham adasigura na gato "aho reta ya Amerika ihagaze kandi ko atari amajambo ushobora kwumva mu kanwa k'umuntu uw'ari we wese akorera ubu butegetsi". Amajambo y'umukenguzamateka  Graham yashavuje kandi umuvugizi wa Kremlin Dmitry Peskov. Igihe yatera akamo Abarusiya bose kuba umwe, yavuze ati: "Ni vyo, muri ino misi hari abantu bashobora kuvuga ibisunitswe n'impemu, si bose bashobora kugira ubwenge buri ku murongo".

headline: RD Congo: Intambara zasubiye kwaduka muri Minembwe, abantu bataye izabo
text: Mu karere ka Minembwe muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo haravugwa ingwano zongeye kwaduka abantu benshi barata izabo bahunga. Gad Mukiza arongoye ako karere, avuga ko izo ntambara ziri hagati y'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho y'abanyamulenge ku ruhande rumwe, n'abo mu bwoko bw'Abafulero, Ababembe, n'Abanyindu ku rundi ruhande. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko zatanguriye muri Segiteri ya Tombwe iri muri 'Territoire ya Mwenga,  hari kw'igenekerezo rya ndwi uku kwezi kw'icenda. Ubu zikaba zasubiriye. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko Leta yarungitse ingabo muri ako karere kugira ngo zigarukane ituze, akibaza ko mu minsi mikeya abahunze bashobora gusubira mu zabo. Umunyamakuru wa Radio Televiziyo y'igihugu ca Congo, Mahoye Madiba Issa, ari mu karere ka Fizi, avuga ko izo ntambara zari zacureshe. Ibi vyabaye inyuma y'aho abategetsi batari bake, harimwo abaserukira MONUSCO bagendeye ako karere kugira ngo basukemwo mabisi. Ingwano ariko avuga ko zasubiriye busha muri iyi minsi n'abantu bakaba bataye ivyabo barahunga. Aka gace kama mu ruhagarara rushingiye ku moko kuva mu myaka ya 1960. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko kuva kera ubutegetsi butashoboye guhagarika izo ntambara. Ati: "Ni Abanyamulenge barwana n'abaturanyi babo b'Abafulero, Ababembe n'Abanyindu. Ni ikibazo kigenda kigaruka kigafata isura y'amoko". "Ibintu bija kwunyurwa n'abanyepolitike babironderamwo inyungu zabo ari nabo bateranya abanyagihugu bafatiye ku moko". Iyo mirwano yasubiye kwaduka yatumye abantu ibihumbi bahungira mu bice bitandukanye vy'igihugu, abandi nabo bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko ku mugwa mukuru wa komine Minembwe honyene habarizwa impunzi zingana na 49.500 ahanini bagizwe n'Abanyamulenge. Avuga ko hari n'igitigiri kitari gito kigizwe n'Abafulero, Ababembe  n'Abanyindu bahungiye mu karere ka Fizi. Avuga ko izo mpunzi ziri mu ngorane zikomeye kubera bigoye ko imfashanyo zibashikira kubera amabarabara atameze neza.

headline: Uganda Election 2021: Bariko baraharura amajwi y'amatora
text: Hatanguye guharurwa amajwi y'amatora yabaye kuri uyu wa kane muri Uganda mu mutekano wakajijwe cane kuva hasigaye isaha imwe ngo gutora birangire. Imodoka zzirimwo abasirikare zanyuragiye ku murwa mukuru Kampala, igipolisi naco n'banyagihugu bicungerera umutekano bakaba bariko barakizura. Mu bibanza bimwe bimwe gutira kwabandanije inyuma y'isaha ico gikorwa categerezwa  gugararariko. Amategeko agenga gutora avuga ko abantu bose basanzwe  ku mirongo barekuriwe gutora inyuna y'isaha yo guhagarika ico gikorwa. Prezida Yoweri Museveni amaze imyaka 35 atwara Uganda arondera ikindi kiringo kigira gatandatu c'ubutegetsi. Museveni w'imyaka 76 ahiganwa n'abandi 10, ukomeye cane muri bo akaba ari Robert Kyagulanyi azwi cane nka Boby Wine, umuririmvyi n'umunyepolitike w'imyaka 38. Imyiyamamazo yaranzwe n'intureka irimwo n'ubwicanyi vyatose cane cane abatavuga rumwe na reta. Ku munsi w'amatora ariko  ahanini nta ngorane z'umutekano zavuzwe. Ivyavuye mu matora bizomenyeshwa ku wa gatandatu. Internet n'imbuga hwaniro   vyarahagaritswe. N'uburyo bwo guhanahana amafaranga ku buhinga bushasha ntibwakora.

headline: Centrafrique: UN yisubije igisagara cari cafashwe n'abagwanyi
text: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU rivuga ko ryisubije igisagara ca Bambari co muri Republika ya Centrafrique (CAR) cari casubiye kwigarurirwa n'abagwanyi ku musi wa kabiri. Umuvugizi wa ONU yavuze ko ingabo zagiye kugarukana amahoro hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano b'ico gihugu ari bo bahagenzura, abitwaje ibigwanisho bakaba bahungiye mw'ishamba. Yavuze ko abasivire bari bahunze intambara batanguye kugaruka. Bitegekanijwe ko haba amatora rusangi muri ico gihugu ca Centrafrique ku musi w'Imana. Reta yagirije uwahoze arongoye ico gihugu, Francois Bozize, ko yishize hamwe n'imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho mu ntumbero yo gutembagaza ubutegetsi - ivyo we ahakana. Uburusiya n'Urwanda vyararungitse abandi basirikare baharurwa mu majana mu gufata mu mugongo reta, mu gihe abitwaje ibigwanisho bariko baragerageza gushika ku mugwa mukuru Bangui.

headline: US: Biden yateye igikumu ku mategeko asubiza hamwe imiryango y'abimukira
text: Umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden yateye igikumu ku mategeko atatu mu ntumbero yo gusubiza hamwe imiryango y'abimukira yari yatanye ku butegetsi bwa Trump. Yategetse kandi gusubiramwo integuro ijanye n'abimukira yasizwe n'uwo yasubiriye. Mu kugerageza kurwanya abimukira mu buryo buteye kubiri n'amategeko, ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump bwari bwatandukanije abakuze batagira ivya ngomwa n'abana babo binjiye baciye ku rubibe rwa Amerika na Mexique. Aya mategeko yateweko igikumu na Perezida Biden agiye gushiraho umurwi uzosubiza mu miryango yabo abana baharurwa hagati ya 600 na 700 batandukanijwe n'abavyeyi babo. Ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwaratandukanije abana n'imiburiburi 5.500 n'abakuze kuri urwo rubibe hagati ya 2017-2018. Abaharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu bavuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Barack Obama - Perezida Biden akaba yari icegera ciwe - na bwo bwatandukanije abana batari bafise ivya ngombwa n'abavyeyi kuri urwo rubibe, n'ubwo vyabaye gake cane. Rimwe muri aya mategeko ya Biden rizoshinga umurwi uhuriyemwo ibisata bitandukanye - ukazoba urongowe n'umunyamabanga mushasha w'umutekano w'igihugu Alejandro Mayorkas - kugira ngo ahagarikire ibikorwa vy'ugusubiza hamwe imiryango. Itegeko rya kabiri n'irya gatatu yateweko igikumu ma Biden ejo ku wa kabiri ategeka ko hasubirwamo politike y'abinjira n'abasohoka ya Trump yagabanije uburenganzira bwo kuronswa ubuhungiro, igabanya umuvuduko w'abinjira muri Amerika, kandi ihagarika intererano yahabwa ibihugu vy'amahanga. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, Biden yavuze ati: "Tugiye gukora kugira ngo dukureho iceyi twatewe n'ubutegetsi buheruka, tuvugishije ukuri, bwatandukanije abana bubavana mu minwe y'imiryango yabo, ba nyina na ba se babo, ku rubibe ata nteguro n'imwe yo kuzosubiza hamwe abana bakiri mu basho n'abavyeyi babo". Biden asaba kandi ko hashirwaho itegeko riha uburenganzira bwo kuba mu gihugu, rikaba n'inzira yo gushobora kuronsa ubwenegihugu abimukira badafise ivya ngombwa bashika imiriyoni 11 muri Amerika.
