Ariko, abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko uyu mukuru w'igihugu mushasha yirinze guhindura poritike igumye ya Trump yafashwe mu ntumbero yo kugabanya ibitigiri vy'abinjira mu gihugu mu buryo butemewe n'amategeko ku rubibe rwo mu bumanuko. Ejo kuwa kabiri, mu nama mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru Jen Psaki yavuze ko ubutegetsi bwiyemeje gushiraho integuro ishira imbere iteka ry'umuntu ijanye n'ubwimukira. Yavuze ariko ko mu gihe iyo nteguro itarajaho, si igihe "co kwinjira muri Amerika". Muri politike yo "kutihanganirana na gato" abimukira yemejwe mu kwa kane 2018, abimukira bakuze badafise ivya ngombwa binjiriye ku rubibe rwa Amerika na Mexique bafashwe nk'inkozi z'ikibi bacirwa urubanza barapfungwa. Imbere y'aha, ibi vyaha ntivyafatwa nk'ubukozi bw'ikibi. Kubera abana bari kumwe n'abo bapfunzwe batashobora gucirwa urubanza ngo bagirwe n'icaha, ntibemerewe gupfunganwa n'abavyeyi babo, maze bituma bashirwa mu bibanza vyo kubakurikiraniramwo. Amasanamu n'amareresi y'abana bari baryamye ku birago muri ivyo bigo vyari vyarengewe yarateye uburakari mu gihugu, bica bituma Trump ahagarika iyi poritike mu kwa gatandatu uwo mwaka. Mu ndwi iheze, igisata ca Biden kijejwe ubutungane carakuyeho iryo tegeko ku mugaragaro. Hagati aho, ivyo bigo bizibije iminyororo bisanzwe bipfungiwemwo abo bana vyari vyubatswe n'ubutegetsi bwa Obama. Abana baharurwa mu 60.000 bahagaritswe ku rubibe rwo mu bumanuko batari kumwe n'abavyeyi babo barapfungiwe muri ibi bigo mu ci ryo mu 2014. N'aho ibitigiri bidatomotse neza, abategetsi b'igihe ca Obama bavuga ko ivyo gutandukanya imiryango vyari ibintu bitari bikunze kuba mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwiwe, nk'akarorero, ni mu gihe wasanga hari abiketswe ko bariko bakora magendo. Uwari umuhanuzi mukuru wa Obama ajejwe abinjira n'abasohoka, Cecilia Munoz - akaba mu 2011 yashigikiye cane iyi poritike yo gutandukanya imiryango y'abimukira - yari mu murwi wa Biden wari ujejwe ibikorwa vy'uguhanahana ubutegetsi.

headline: None ko u Burundi n’u Rwanda bibandanya vyagirizanya, ivya vyo bizoherera he?
text: Leta y 'u Rwanda ivuga ko gushika ubu abavuga ko ico gihugu arico gihungabanya umutekano w'u Burundi bapfa kubivuga gusa ariko ata bimenyetso bafise. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru i Kigali ejo ku wa gatatu, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire y'u Rwanda n'ibindi bihugu, Dr. Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko ahubwo u Rwanda rwo rufise ibimenyetso vyose vyerekana ko abahungabanya umutekano warwo bavuye mu Burundi. Ku ruhande rwabwo, u Burundi ni uko nyene. Bwagiriza u Rwanda ko ari rwo nkwezi y'amarere mu bibazo burimwo. Kuva u Burundi bwinjira mu bibazo vya politike mu mwaka wa 2015, u Burundi n'u Rwanda vyamye vyagirizanya guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu n'ikindi mu guha indaro no mu gufasha abashaka guteza umudugararo mu gihugu n'ikindi. Igitero giherutse kuba muri komine Mabayi mu ntara ya Cibitoke kwabaye ugukoza agati mu ntozi, aho Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yemeje adakekeranya ko igihugu c'u Rwanda ariko cakoze ico gitero. Muri ico kiganiro c'ejo ku wa gatatu, Bwana Biruta yasubiye gushimangira ko u Rwanda ata ruhara na rumwe rufise muri ico gitero, eka mw'ihungabana ry'umutekano mu gihugu kibanyi c'u Burundi muri rusangi, akavuga ko ata n'ivyemezo biriho. Ati: "Mwarumvise mu minsi ishize ko twagiye duhura n'ibirego hirya no hino vy'u Burundi bivuga ko twabateye, ariko ntabwo ari vyo, u Rwanda ntirwigeze rutera u Burundi kandi n'ababivuga nta kimenyetso na kimwe bigeze berekana". "Ibi birego rero tugize iminsi duhura navyo ahantu hose iyo tugiye mu nama, ariko ntabwo ari ukuvuga gusa ngo u Rwanda rwarateye, bagomba n'ukwerekana ibimenyetso". Nk'uko bimenyerewe, yagirije ahubwo u Burundi ko ari bwo bucumbikiye inkozi z'ibibi zamye zitera u Rwanda, akavuga ko bafise n'abafashwe bavyiyemerera. Ati: "Ahubwo nagomba kubibutsa ko ku ruhande rwacu, hari ibikorwa vy'iterabwoba vyagiye biba mu gihugu cacu mu bihe bitandukanye kandi bikagaragara ko ababikoze ari abantu bari baturutse i Burundi cangwa se bahungiyeyo inyuma y'ugukora ivyo bikorwa igihe ingabo zacu zabarwanya". "Tukaba dufise n'abafashwe muri ivyo bikorwa bafunze kandi batanga ubuhamya bwose bw'ingene u Burundi bwabafashije mu gutegura ibikorwa vyabo no kubishira mu bikorwa". Ku ruhande rwiwe, mu kiganiro aherutse kugiriranira n'abamenyeshamakuru, Perezida Nkurunziza yumvishije ko u Rwanda kuva mu mwaka wa 2014 gushika ubu rwamye rurajwe ishinga no kudurumbanya u Burundi. "Tuvuze tuti abadutera baturuka mu Rwanda, abaza guhinyuza baraje mu Burundi barabona ko ivyo u Rwanda rwagiriza u Burundi atari vyo, hama natwe dusaba ko bogenda mu Rwanda kuturabira ko ivyo tuvuga atari vyo, ariko u Rwanda rwaranse". Hagati aho, inyuma y'igitero cabereye ku mutumba Marura ya komine Mabayi y'intara ya Cibitoke u Burundi bwemeza ko cakozwe n'igisirikare c'u Rwanda, vyabaye ngombwa ko Inama mpuzamakungu ijejwe akarere k'ibiyaga binini (CIRGL/ICGLR) ishinga umurwi wo gukora amatohoza  mu bihugu vyompi. Gushika ubu, icegeranyo cawo kiracarindiriwe. Ingingo ya Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'u Burundi yo kwitoreza ikiringo we avuga ko ari ica kabiri, abatavuga rumwe nabo bakavuga ko ari ica gatatu giteye kubiri n'ibwirizwashingiro be n'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha, yatumye u Burundi bwinjira mu ndyane za politike. Izo ndyane zatumye impunzi ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi harimwo n'u Rwanda, ruvugwa ko rucumbikiye izirenga 70.000. Kuva ico gihe, u Burundi, mbere n'ibihugu bimwe bimwe hamwe n'amashirahamwe amwe amwe mpuzamakungu, vyaragirije u Rwanda ko rwahaye imyimemenyerezo ya gisirikare zimwe muri izo mpunzi mu ntumbero yo kurzitegura kugira ngo zije gusenyura ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi. U Rwanda rwamye rwamirira kure ivyo birego. U Rwanda ntirufitaniye ibibazo n'u Burundi gusa. Haraciye umwaka urenga ico gihugu kidacana uwaka n'igihugu ca Uganda, ivyatumye mbere u Rwanda rwugara umupaka ruhana n'ico gihugu. Ariko hari icizere kinini ko ico cuka kibi gishobora guhera hagati y'u Rwanda na Uganda, na rirya hari ibiganiro bibandanya hagati y'abategetsi b'ivyo bihugu kugira ngo ibintu bisubire ku murongo. Hagati aho, siko bimeze mu migenderanire n'u Burundi, aho Bwana Riruta yerekana neza ko u Burundi butipfuza kuganira n'u Rwanda kugira  ngo bisubize hamwe. Avuga ati: "Ukurikije ivyagiye bivugwa, imyigaragamvyo yagiye ikorwa, ibitutsi bagiye badutuka, ibirego bagiye baturega bidafise ishingiro kuva mu mwaka wa 2015, vyagaragara ko atacofatirwako kugira tuganire". "Ariko twebwe turiteguye, igihe bazabishakira twebwe twaganira kuri ivyo bibazo vyose bikabonerwa umurongo wo kubikemura".

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: kubera iki Russia vyanse ko igumana izinga Snake Island?
text: Ukraine irishimira intsinzi ikomeye inyuma y’aho Uburusiya bukuriye ingabo zabwo mw’izinga ryitwa Snake Island (Izinga ry’Inzoka), zari zigaruriye ku musi wa mbere nyene zitangura igitero. Rishobora kuba ari akantu gato, ariko iri zinga ry’urutare rifise uruhara rukomeye muri ino ntambara y’Uburusiya muri Ukraine – aha wokwibuka inkuru y’ingabo za Ukraine kuri rino zinga zibwira n’agasuzuguro ubwato bw’intambara bw’Uburusiya ngo “vaho” – igihe bwazisaba kwishikana. Ubu, inyuma y’amezi arenga ane Ukraine itera amabombe y’urutavanako, ingabo z’Uburusiya zahevye iri zinga Snake Island, rizwi nk’izinga rya Zmiinyi muri Ukraine. Iri zinga ry’urutare riri ku birometero 35 uvuye ku nkengera y’inyanja muri Ukraine – intera ntoya ishobora gushikirwa n’ibisasu vya misire, vya muzinga n’ibitero vya za ndege zitagira abadereva (drones) bivuye ku butaka. Ingabo za Ukraine niko zakora, ibitero bikomeye kuri iri zinga hamwe no ku bwato ubwo ari bwo bwose buhirahiriye ngo bwegere. Uburusiya bwobwo buvuga ko bwavuye kuri ico kirindiro “ku gatima keza” kugira ngo bwerekane ko ata ntumbero bufise yo kuzibira ishorwa ry’intete, ariko Ukraine yoyo iriyamiriza ibi, na rirya Moscou ibandanya icucagira ibisasu ububiko bw’intete. Iri zinga Snake Island ni akarere kari ahantu ngirakamaro, hakaba hari haciye amezi atari make harangwa intambara. Iri zinga ry’urutare rito cane riri mu buraruko bushira uburengero  bw’Inyanja Yirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) ryari ryafashwe n’Uburusiya ku musi wa mbere w’igitero cabwo kuri Ukraine, kandi ryagize uruhara rudasanzwe muri ino ntambra kuva ico gihe. Iri zinga riroroshe guterwa uciye ku mpande zose, mu kirere no mu mazi, mu gihe ikirindiro gito cari kiricungereye – ubwa mbere cari ic’abanya-Ukraine hanyuma ic’Abarusiya – abahinga ba gisirikare bakaba barifata nk’akarere kirebanga, kadashobora gukingirwa. Mu kwa kane, inguvu z’Uburusiya zo kwivuna ibitero vy’indege mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw’inyanja Yirabura zaragabanutse cane igihe bwa bwato bw’intambara Moskva butwarwa. Kremlin yagumye igerageza kuraba ingene yogarukana ibirwanisho vyo guhangana n’ibitero vy’indege n’ibindi vyo kurwana intambara za elektroniki kuri iri zinga. Ariko vyabaye ivy’ubusa ku Burusiya, kuricungera biranka kubera ryari kure y’ibirindiro bikuru bikuru vyo mu Nyanja yirabura. Mu bitero vyose vyayo, Ukraine nta mato menshi ifise, ari co gituma itashoboye gutwara ingabo zayo kuri iri zinga. Umuhinga wa gisirikare w’umunya-Ukraine Oleh Zhdanov avuga ko gushinga ikirindiro c’ingabo kuri iri zinga ataco bimaze ku mpande zompi kuko vyoroshe guterwa. Zhdanov abona ko ahubwo igikenewe ari ukugira ubushobozi bwo gutera ikintu ico ri co cose cokwegera iri zinga. Ibi bishobora guha ubushobozi Ukraine bwo gukingira ikivuko cayo kinini gusumba ibindi vyose ku Nyanja Yirabura, hamwe no mu gace kose k’uburaruko bushira uburengero bw’inyanja Yirabura. Uburusiya ubu buragenzura akarere katari gato ka Ukraine ku nkengera y’Inyanja Yirabura, hamwe n’ikigwa ca Crimea be n’inyanja yose ya Azov. Mu kwigarurira iri zinga vyatumye Odesa yugaranwa burundu, ibisigura ko bitashoboka ko Ukraine ishora intete zayo hanze. Vyasigura kandi ko inkengera y’Inyanja Yirabura yashobora guterwa, abahinga ba gisirikare i Kyiv bakaba berekanye ubwoba bari bafise ko Uburusiya bushobora kuhashinga ikirindiro c’ibirwanisho birasa kure, nk’ibitera za misire zo mu bwoko bwa S-400. Uravye kw’isanamu, biboneka kandi ko Uburusiya kwigarurira iri zinga vyari bibangamiye umutekano wa Roumanie, umunywanyi wa OTAN/NATO – haba ku kivuko cayo ca Constanta  canke mu ngendo zo mu mazi y’uruzi Danube. Uretse ko iri zinga riri ahantu hakomeye cane, ni akarere gatunze igitoro hamwe na gaze. Iyi si intsinzi ikomeye kuri Ukraine, ariko ni intambwe ikomeye. Ku Burusiya, ni uruhombo ku rugamba rwabwo kandi ni ugutsindwa mu buryo buteye isoni. Ariko ibi ntibishobora gutuma intambara ihindura isura. Uburusiya ubu burajwe ishinga no kwigarurira akarere kose ka Donbas kari mu buseruko bwa Ukraine be no kugumana uturere bwigaruriye igihe butangura intambara. Izinga Snake Island rishobora kuba ari ikibanza gikomye cane mu Nyanja yirabura kandi hakaba n’ahantu heza ho gushinga ibirwanisho bikomeye birasa ibisasu vya misire, ariko ni akarere gato cane k’urutare. N’aho Abarusiya bahirukanywe, ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba Ukraine ishobora gusubira gushora intete hanze kugira ngo inagure ubutunzi bwayo bwishwe n’intambara. Ata mato afise ubushobozi ifise, hari igihamana gito, na rirya amato y’intambara y’Uburusiya ari yo yiganje mu Nyanja Yirabura. Andrew Wilson, umwigisha kw’ishure kaminuza rya Londres ku bijanye n’ibibazo vya Ukraine, avuga ati: "Mu bisanzwe hari ibintu cumi bikenewe kugira ngo ushobore gushora hanze izi ntete ata ngorane, hamaze kuba iki kimwe gusa”. Ukraine yamiriye kure ibisabwa n’Uburusiya ko bwoherekeza amato y’intete avuye i Odesa kuko bisaba ko ibisasu vya mine hanze y’ikivuko bibanza gutegurwa. Turukiya iriko irakora uko ishoboye mu guhuza impande zompi kugira bashike ku masezerano ariko ibi bisa n’ibikiri kure nk’ukwezi. Indwi nkeya ziri imbere zifatwa ko ari ikiringo gikomeye cane ku rudandazwa rwo hanze rwa Ukraine – kubera isarura ryimirije ritangura muri kuno kw’indwi.

headline: Saudi Arabia: Abagore n'abagabo ubu bemerewe guca mu muryango umwe wa 'restaurants'
text: Leta ya Arabia Saoudite itangaza ko ico gihugu kitazosubira gusaba amazu y'uburiro kugira ubwinjiriro bubiri ku bagabo n'abagore. Imbere y'aho, hari ingingo itegeka ko abagore bari kumwe n'abana binjirira mu muryango wabo, abagabo nabo bakinjirira mu wundi. Ayo mategeko asa n'ayariko aribagirwa buke buke, kuko wasanga amazu atari make y'uburiro n'ayandi ahurirwamwo n'abantu benshi atari akiyashira mu ngiro. Haheze igihe hafatwa amategeko ajanye n'uguhindura ibintu mu mibereho y'abantu muri Arabia Saoudite, aherekejwe n'igingo zo guhasha abatayashigikiye. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, umwami yarasohoye itegeko ryemerera umukenyezi gutembera mu bihugu vyo hanze ataruhusha arinze gusaba umuntu w'igitsina-gabo. Mu mwaka uheze, ico gihugu kandi carakuyeho itegeko ryari rimaze imyaka ishika cumi ryabuza abagore kugendesha imodokari. Hagati aho, abarwanira agateka k'abakenyezi bavuga ko hakiri amategeko akumira abakenyezi. Bavuga kandi ko hari abaharanira agateka k'abakenyezi babandanya bapfungwa mu gihe leta ibandanya ifata amategeko ajanye n'uguhindura ibintu mu mibereho y'abantu. Ejo ku wa Mungu, umushikiranganji ajejwe ibisagara yatangaje ko atari ngombwa ko amazu y'uburiro agira imiryango itandukanya abagabo n'abagore. Gushika ubu, hagati mu mazu y'uburiro hari uruhome rutandukanya abagore bari kumwe n'abana ku ruhande rumwe, abagabo bonyene ku rundi ruhande. Kuva Mohammed bin Salman abaye igikomangoma mu 2017, yagiye afata ingingo zihindura amategeko akandamiza abanyagihugu muri ico gihugu. Izo mpinduka zakiriwe neza n'amakungu ariko zica ziherekezwa n'ingingo z'uguhasha abatumva umugambi. Iyicwa ry'umumenyeshamakuru yari azwi cane, Jamal Khashoggi mu 2018 mu biro vy'ubuserukizi bw'ico gihugu muri Turukiya ryariyamirijwe bikomeye n'amakungu. Ariko abategetsi b'ibihangange kw'isi, harimwo na Donald Trump wa Amerika, babandanya bashigikiye Arabia Saoudite. Abategetsi b'ico gihugu bavuga ko Khashoggi yishwe mu "gikorwa c'uguhiga inkozi z'ikibi". Hagati aho, abanegura leta siko babibona, mbere n'umuhinga w'ishirahamwe ONU akaba yatangaje ko ubwo bwari "ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane".

headline: Russia yoba iriko irategura gutera Ukraine? Ni kimwe mu bibazo
text: Ingabo z'Uburusiya zoba ziriko zitegurira intambara muri Ukraine? Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yiteze ibikorwa kanana vya gisirikare. Uburusiya bushaka ko ibihugu vyo mu Burengero bibwemerera ko Ukraine itazokwinjira mw'ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe OTAN/NATO, ariko rero n'aho impande zompi ziri mu biganiro, ibi ntibizoshoboka. Ivyoba mu nyuma birashobora gushira mu kaga umutekano w'umugabane w'Uburayi wose. Uburusiya burahakana ko ata gitero buriko butegura, ariko imbere y'aha bwarigaruriye ubutaka kwa Ukraine kandi bwaregeranirije ku rubibe rwayo ingabo zababa 100.000. Uburusiya bumaze imyaka itari mike burwanya ko Ukraine yinjira mu nzego za Bulaya, cane cane muri OTAN. Ukraine isangiye imbibe n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya (EU) hamwe n'Uburusiya, ariko, nk'icahoze ari Repubulika y'aba Soviet, ifise ubucuti budasanzwe n'Uburusiya mu bijanye n'imico n'imigenzo, kandi ururimi rw'ikirusiya ruravugwa cane muri ico gihugu. Igihe Abanya-Ukraine babogoza umukuru w'igihugu yari yegamiye ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya mu 2014, Uburusiya bwaciye bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea kari mu bumanuko, buca bufata mu mugongo inyeshamba zirondera kwiyonkora zigaruriye uturere tutari duto mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Kuva ico gihe, izi nyeshamba zihanganye n'igisirikare ca Ukraine mu ntambara imaze guhitana ubuzima bw'abantu barenga 14.000. Uburusiya buvuga ko ata mugambi bufise wo gutera Ukraine: mbere n'umukuru w'ingabo Valery Gerasimov  yaraniyamirije ko ibivugwa ko hari igitero cimirije ari ikinyoma. Ariko icuka kibi ni cinshi mbere Perezida Vladimir Putin aragabisha ko "azotegerezwa gufata ingingo za gisirikare zikenewe zo kwihora" mu gihe ivyo yita ingedo y'agasotoro y'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero yobandanya. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN aragabisha ko intambara imota, mbere na Perezida Biden abona ko Uburusiya buzoruhira gutera.. Amerika ivuga ko izi neza ko Uburusiya butegura kwongereza ingabo hafi ya Ukraine mu mwanya muto. Amerika ivuga ko Uburusiya budasigura igituma bwarungitse inabo hafi ya Ukraine - mu gihe ingabo n'ibimodoka vy'intambara vy'Uburusiya vyagiye muri Belarus mu myimenyerezo. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya agereranya ingene ibintu bimeze muri iki  gihe n'ikibazo ca misire za Cuba  (missiles de Cuba/Cuban missiles) mu 1962 igihe Amerika n'Ubumwe bw'aba Soviet bihatswe kwinjira mu ntambara ya nikleyeri. Igendereza ryo mu bihugu vyo mu Burengero ryerekana ko Uburusiya bushobora gutera umwanya kanaka muri ino ntango ya 2022. Uburusiya buvuga ko iki ari "igihe c'ukubwirana ukuri" mu migenderanire yabwo na OTAN: "Kuri twebwe ni ugukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo Ukraine, ntihirahire ngo ibe umunywanyi wa OTAN", ibi bikavugwa n'icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire Sergei Ryabkov. Moscou/Moscow (umugwa mukuru w'Uburusiya) yagiriza ibihugu vya OTAN "kurundarunda" ibirwanisho muri Ukraine Amerika nayo ko ikokeza indyane. Perezida Putin avuga ko Uburusiya "ata handi bufise buja - bibaza ko tuzokwicara tukarera amaboko?" Mu vyo ukuri, Uburusiya bushaka ko OTAN  isubira ku mbibe zayo imbere ya 1997. Busaba ko ivyo kubandanya isatira uburengero bihagarara kandi igahagarika ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu buseruko bw'Ubulaya. Ibi bisigura ko imirwi y'abasirikare biteguriye intambara barungitswe muri Pologne no mu bihugu vya Estonie, Lettonie na Lituanie mu karere ka Baltique bavanwayo, kandi ko ata misire zosubira kurungikwa mu bihugu nka Pologne na Roumanie. Uburusiya kandi busaba ko hoba amasezerano na Amerika abuza ko hosubira kuba ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri birungikwa hanze y'imbibe zavyo. Uburusiya bwarigaruriye Crimea mu 2014, buvuga ko aka karere kari akabwo kuva muri kahise.  Ukraine yari imwe mu bihugu vyari bigize Ubumwe bw'aba Soviet bwagiye gusambuka mu kwa cumi na kabiri 1991, ivyo Putin avuga ko ryabaye "isambuka ry'Uburusiya bwo kuva muri kahise". Ikimenyetso c'ico Perezida Putin yiyumvira kuri Ukraine cagiye kwibonekeza mu nkuru ndende yasohotse mu mwaka uheze, aho yavuze ko Abarusiya n'abanya -Ukraine bagize "igihugu kimwe". Yavuze ko abategetsi ba Ukraine ba kino gihe bafise "umugambi wo kurwanya Uburusiya". Uburusiya kandi burababajwe n'uko ishirwa mu ngiro ry'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Minsk yo mu 2015 ku bijanye n'ubuseruko bw'Ubulayi riri kure nk'ukwezi. Nta n'integuro zihari zo gutegura amatora mu turere dushaka kwiyonkora. Uburusiya burahakana ivyo bwagirizwa ko ari bwo buri inyuma y'indyane zibandanya. Perezida Vladimir Putin aramaze kuvugana incuro zitari nke na mugenziwe wa Amerika Joe Biden kandi ibiganiro vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru birabandanya, ariko abategetsi b'Uburusiya  baragabisha ko kubona Uburengero bwaranse ibintu nyamukuru iki gihugu gisaba biriko "vyica ibiganiro". Ikibazo ni ukumenya aho Uburusiya buzogarukira. Perezida Biden agabisha ko mu gihe hoba igitero ceruye muri Ukraine Uburusiya bwobona ibara. Ariko kandi, yongeye avuga ko mu gihe hoba igitero gito, ibihugu vyo mu burengero "vyokwisanga mu mpari ku co vyokora", amajambo yateye impari. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika Maison Blancher/White House bishimangira ko mu gihe hoba ivogerwa ry'imbibe rya Ukraine vyofatwa nk'igitero - ariko bikavuga ko Uburusiya bufise ibindi birwanisho, harimwo ibitero nyabwonko hamwe n'amayeri yandi ya gisirikare. Pentagon (ibiro vyo kwivuna abansi vya Amerika) yagiriza Uburusiya ko buriko butegura igitero c'ikinyoma, ko abantu babwo bajejwe igendereza biteguye gukora ibikorwa vyo gutoba ku nyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zigomba kwiyonkora, kugira ngo kibe inyendamuvano y'ingene bwokwinjira. Uburusiya burahakana ibi. Uburusiya kandi bwaratanze ibitabo ndangamuntu 500.000 mu turere turi mu minwe y'inyeshamba, rero mu gihe bwobura ivyo burondera, bushobora kwitwaza iki mu gukora igitero ico ari co cose bugasigura ko bushaka gukingira abanyagihugu babwo. Hagati aho, nimba intumero yonyene y'Uburusiya ari ukwigiza inyuma OTAN ngo ntiyegere ku mbibe zabwo, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko buzobishobora. Ibihugu 30 bihurikiye muri OTAN birarahira bikarengwa ko bidashobora kwemerera muntu n'umwe yogerageza kubibohera amaboko imugongo ku bijanye na kazoza kavyo. Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa reta wa Amerika Wendy Sherman, ati: "Ntituzigera twemerera umuntu n'umwe kwugara imiryango ya OTAN yugururiwe uwo ari we wese". Ukraine iriko irarondera igihe ntarengwa co kwinjira, mu gihe OTAN ivuga ko Uburusiya budashobora guhagarika, kandi ko ata burenganzira bufise bwo kuzibira uwu mugambi. Mbere n'ibihugu vya  Suède na Finland bitari no muri OTAN biriyamiriza Uburusiya mu mugambi wabwo wo kugerageza kubizibira mu nteguro zavyo yo gutsimbataza ubucuti n'iri shirahamwe. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Finland ati: "Ntiturota duhagarika umugambi wacu". Uburengero buzogera he ku kibazo ca Ukraine? Amerika iratomora neza ko ata mugambi ifise wo kurungika ingabo zija kurwana muri Ukraine, ariko ikaba yiyemeza gufasha ico gihugu gukingira "ubusugire bw'ubutaka" bwaco. Pentagon yateguye ingabo zigera ku 8600 zimeze magabo, zishobora kurungikwa mu bihugu vya OTAN mu buseruko bwa Bulaya mu kanya isase. Ikirwanisho nyamukuru mu bihugu vy'Uburengero gisa n'uko ari ibihano hamwe n'imfashanyo ya gisirikare igizwe n'abahanuzi hamwe n'ibirwanisho. Perezida Biden aragabisha umupuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya ko ashobora kufata ingingo "atari bwigere abona" mu gihe Ukraine yoterwa. None izi ngingo zoba zirimwo ibiki? Igihano nyamukuru kijanye n'ubutunzi coba ico gukura amabanki y'Uburusiya mu buhinga mpuzamakungu bwo guhanahana amafaranga (Swift). Iyi yamye ibonwa ko yoba ingingo yofatwa ubwa nyumamu gihe izindi zose zanse, kandi hari amakenga ko ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane ku butunzi bwa Amerika na Bulaya. Perezida Biden aragabisha kandi ko ashobora gufatira ibihano Vladimir Putin ku giti ciwe, mu gihe Uburusiya bwotera Ukraine. Ubundi bwoba buhari ni ihagarikwa ry'iyugururwa ry'umuringoti w'Uburusiya Nord Stream 2 wa gaze mu Budagi, igisata c'amasoko ntanganguzu c'Ubudagi kikaba kiriko kiriga iyi ngingo. None ibihugu vy'Uburengero vyoba bivuga rumwe ku cokorwa? Umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika avuga ko ko we n'abategetsi ba Bulaya "bavyumva kumwe bose" ku kibazo ca Ukraine, ariko hari ukutumvikana hagati ya Amerika n'Ubulaya. Abategetsi ba Bulaya bashimangira ko Uburusiya na Amerika bidashobora gufata ingingo vyonyene kuri kuri kazoza. Ubufaransa bwobwo bwanasavye ko abanyabulaya bokorera hamwe muri OTAN hanyuma bakagiranira ibiganiro ukwabo n'Uburusiya. Umukuru w'igihugu wa ukraine asaba ko hoba inama mpuzamakungu kugira ngo hatorwe umuti w'iki kibazo, yoba irimwo Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi biri kumwe n'Uburusiya.

headline: Ukraine-Russia: Ukraine iriko iratera intambwe ku rugamba iyiha icizere
text: I﻿gisirikare ca Ukraine cemeza ko gihagaze neza ku rugamba mu ntumbero yo kwisubiza uturere cambuwe n'Uburusiya. A﻿riko ayo makuru nta buryo bwigenga BBC ifise bwo kuyemeza mu gihe abanyamakuru batemerewe gushika ku rwasiro rw'urugamba.

headline: Ethiopia: Antony Blinken wa reta ya US baganiriye na Abiy Ahmed ku kibazo ca Tigray
text: Umunyamabanga wa  reta ajejwe imigenderanire wa Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yaganiriye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia ku kibazo ca Tigray. Antony Blinken yerekanye amakenga ku kungene ibintu vyifashe mu karere ka Tigray mu biganiro bagiranye na Abiy Ahmed. Blinken yahamagariye Abiy kureka imfashanyo zigashika muri ako karere mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ko abantu baguma bapfa. Yanavuze ko Amerika ishigikiye ibikwiye guhinduka muri Ethiopia hamwe n'amatora. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia yashimiye umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika "kuba bashigikiye ibiriko birahinduka muri Ethiopia kandi bakaba babibandanya ata kudebukirwa". Ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Abiy yagize ati: "Icipfuzo co gutsimbataza demokrasi no kwubaka igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro n'iterambere kuri bose, bishoboka biciye mu gutsimbataza ubucuti hagati ya Ethiopia na Amerika." Abasirikare bo mu karere ka Tigray batanye mu mitwe n'aba reta ya Ethiopia mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barahunze iyo ntara hanyuma amashirahamwe na yo atanga imfashanyo ntarashobora gushika muri ako karere.

headline: Kardinali Fridolin Ambongo wa Kinshasa agabisha ko hari umugambi wo kwikebera agace ka DR Congo
text: Musenyeri mukuru wa Kinshasa muri DR Congo aragabisha ko hari umugambi wo gushaka kwikebera agace k'ico gihugu uriko utegurwa n'abantu barondera amaronko muri ico gihugu. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'urugendo yakoze mu karere k'Ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu mu ndwi iheze, Kardinali Fridolin Ambongo, avuga ko igice cegwa n'uyo mugambi ari igice kiva muri Bunia, ukagenda muri Beni, Butembo, Goma gushika mu misozi ya Fizi. Kardinali Ambongo avuga ko hari ibihugu bifise uruhara muri uyo mugambi, ariko ntabidomako urutoke. Ahamagarira abanyagihugu bose guhaguruka bakiyamiriza abo bantu bagomba kwikebera agace k'igihugu cabo biyise abakongomani. Muri ico kiganiro, Kardinali Ambongo aremeza ko hari abakongomani bakomoka mu bihugu bibanyi nk'u Rwanda na Uganda basanzwe banavuga indimi zivugwa muri ivyo bihugu baje bavamwo. Aravuga abitwa aba Nyamulenge basanzwe baba mu karere ka Fizi na Rutshuru bakomoka mu Rwanda; Abanande baba mu burere bwa Beni  na Butembo, hamwe n'aba Hema baba mu karere ka Ituri, bompi bakomoka muri Uganda. Ku bwiwe, abo bantu nta ngorane kuko babaye mu gihugu imyaka myinshi cane, akemeza ko ari abakongomani mu bandi. Ati: " Kuri aba bakongomani bavuye mu Rwanda no muri Uganda babaye ng'aha imyaka myinshi, nta muntu n'umwe yoharira ku bwenegihugu bwabo. Ingorane ni abandi baza biyongerako, bagaca bashaka kwiyita abakongomani". "Akarorero gaheruka ni abimukira b'abanyarwanda birukanywe muri Tanzania mu myaka iheze bakaruhira kurungikwa muri Congo, ivyo navyo bigatera amakenga n'ishavu, bikerekana kandi ko hari umugambi wo kwigarurira agace k'igihugu". Kardinali Ambongo avuga ko iyo ngorane yibonekeza no mu gisirikare. Ati: "Iyo muvuganye n'abasirikare, ubwo nyene uca utahura ko igisirikare cacu cinjiranywe n'abanyamahanga". Avuga ko ikibabaje ari uko usanga hari bamwe mu bakongomani bari ku butegetsi, haba mu banyepolitike bari ku butegetsi canke mu gisirikare, babibafashamwo. Asaba leta ya Kongo gukora ibishoboka vyose mu rwego rw'imigenderanire  hagati y'ibihugu kugira ngo "yumvishe ibihugu bibanyi, cane cane u Rwanda, Uganda n'u Burundi ko vyohagarika kurungika abantu bavyo muri Congo". Kuva ico gihugu cahoze citwa Zaire cadukamwo intambara mu 1996, sibwo bwa mbere cagiriza ibihugu bibanyi kugira uruhara mu ngorane zaco. Ivyo bihugu vyamye bivuga ko ata ruhara zifise mu bibera muri Congo, ko ahubwo ari ibibazo biraba abanye Congo ubwabo. Hampande y'ivyo, Kardinali Ambongo avuga ko n'imirwi isanzwe iriko irarwanira mu karere k'Ubuseruko bwa Congo nayo nyene iri muri uyo mugambi. Atanga akarorero k'umurwi ADF uzwi ko wavuye mu gihugu ca Uganda umaze igihe uriko uhigwa buhongo n'igisirikare ca Congo. Ati: "ADF y'ubu siyo ADF yo nyayo ya kera twari tuzi. Ni izina bita abo bantu bose bafise umugambi wo kwigarurira agace k'igihugu cacu. Muri abo twasanzemwo abanya Sudani, abanya Centrafique, abantu bava mu bihugu vyose duhana imbibe mu gice co mu buseruko. Kardinali Ambongo asaba abakongomani kurikanura kuko kubw'iwe, uyo mugambi ntushobora kuja mu ngiro badaciye ku bakongomani bo nyene ubwabo. Ati: "Nivyo ko hari amahanga harimwo n'ibihugu bimwe bimwe bibanyi bishigikiye uwo mugambi, ariko ntiwoja mu ngiro twebwe abakongomani ubwacu tutabishatse". "Amakungu ntiyigeze amenyeshwa ko tudashigikiye uyo mugambi. Ndibaza ko twebwe nk'ama congomani duhagurutse, tugafata mu minwe ikibazo co mu buseruko, tukereka ayo makungu ko tutarota dushigikira uyo mugambi, ntushobora kuja mu ngiro". Amenyesha ko yabonye neza ko abakongomani bo mu karere k'ubuseruko, avuga ko ariko gashaka kwigarurirwa, badashigikiye ko igihugu cabo gisamburwa. Ati: "Barasambuye Yougoslavie kubera uburere bwashaka kwigenga, baragabura Sudani, kubera Sudani y'Epfo yashaka kwikukira, ivyo navyo nta hantu na hamwe wobisanga muri Congo".

headline: Bujumbura: Abatwara moto, tuk-tuk n'amakinga bongewe iminsi
text: Abakora akazi ko kwunguruza abantu kuri moto, amakinga canke tuk-tuk mu gisagara ca Bujumbura mu Burundi bongewe ikiringo mu gihe itegeko ribabuza kuja mu bice bimwe vy'umuji ryagomba kuja mungiro kuri uyu wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatatu. Abajejwe intwaro mu Burundi bari batanze itariki yo gushika  kuri uyu wa gatanu ngo abanyonga ivyo vyuma ntibasubire kubicisha mu gice kinini c'umuji wa Bujumbura. Kiretse abanyonga ivyo vyuma babicisha amafaranga,  iryo tegeko ryaraba n'amakinga na moto vy'abiyunguruza ku giti cabo kiretse gusa moto ziriko imparati za leta. Ariko mu butumwa bwagaragaye ku rubuga twitter  ku wa kane ku muguroba, Mairie ya Bujumbura yatangaje  y'uko abatwara ivyo vyuma bahawe igihe c'ukudohorerwa. Ico gihe bahawe ni ico gushika itariki 21 Ntwarane (ukwa gatatu), ico kiringo ngo "kikazokoreshwa mu kwandika abatwara ivyo vyuma". Ubwo butumwa bwo kuri twitter kandi bunavuga yuko hafashwe ingingo yo kwugurura vya vyumba vyo kwiyubikira canke kwiyuka bita sauna hamwe n'umuziki w'ikibiriraho uzwi nka karaoke ngo kuko "ikiza ca Covi-19 cagabanutse bimwe biboneka." Mu gufata ingingo yo kubuza ivyo vyuma gushika mu gice kinini c'igisagara ca Bujumbura, ubushikiranganji bujejwe umutekano bwavuga ko ari ingingo yo kurinda umutekano w'abakoresha amabarabara bose. Ariko abo batwara ivyo vyuma bakavuga yuko ubuzima bugiye kugorana cane kuri bo, co kimwe no ku bavyikorako bibashikana hirya no hino mu gisagara mu buryo bworoshe. Kuva leta itangaje ko iyo ngingo izoja mu ngiro itariki 11/03/2022, hari haheze iminsi haba amanama yo gusigurira abo ingingo igiye gukorako igituma yafashwe n'akamaro kayo. Ariko bobo bavuga yuko abafahe iyo ngingo bari kubanza kubibamenyesha imbere yuko ifatwa bakagira ico bayivuzeko. Jado Nzitunga, umuyobozi w'ishirahamwe ry'abagendesha moto zunguruza abantu mu gisagara ca Bujumbura yabwiye BBC ko batagishijwe inama. Yagize ati: "Igihe iyo 'equipe technique' yabikora, yaba twebwe dusanzwe turongoye amashirahamwe, yaba abasanzwe biyunguruza kuri ayo mapikipiki, yaba abagendesha ayo mapikipiki n'ayo mabajaji, nta n'umwe bigeze barondera   kugira bicare hamwe barabe iyo ngingo, iciza canke ingaruka zayo". Ariko mu bushikiranganji bujejwe umutekano, bo bafashe iyo ngingo, bavuga yuko leta mu gufata icemezo kiraba ineza y'abanyagihugu iba yavyize neza. Umuvugizi w'igipolisi gikorera muri ubwo bushikiranganji, Désiré Nduwimana, yagize ati: "Ubutegetsi iyo bubona yuko hariho ikiriko kirononekara, mu kuramira abenegihugu ntubanza kubabaza ati mbega bigende gute. "Ugomba kugirira umutekano abantu ubakorera ibikenewe ntubanza kubagisha inama." Désiré Nduwimana abandaniya avuga yuko amasanganya mu mabarabara ya Bujumbura yari amaze kuba umurengera, kandi ko ivyo vyuma vy'amakinga, moto na bajaji canke tuk-tuk bibifisemwo uruhara runini. Hagati aho, abagendesha ivyo vyuma bagiye gukorwako n'iyi ngingo bavuga yuko amasanganya adatezwa gusa nabo, ko hari ikibazo c'amabarabara atameze neza hamwe n'ivyapa bibuze canke bitakigaragara neza. Uyu mukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abagendesha amapikipiki yunguruza abantu i Bujumbura avuga yuko ingaruka zigiye kuba nyishi cane. Jado Nzitunga yagize ati: "... mw'ishirahame ryacu ngaha i Bujumbura hari amamoto ari hagati y'ibihumbi bine n'ibihumbi bitanu, urumva ayo yari asanzwe atunze imiryango. "Ugasanga hari n'igihombo kizoba kuri aba basanzwe bafise amazu y'ama restaurant hamwe bafungurira, ndetse n'abo bantu bose bahora bayikorako bafise amikoro make bizobagora." Ku mbuga hwaniro haragaragaye amasanamu y'abatanguye kujana mu yindi mihingo y'igihugu ivyo vyuma vyabo, mu gutinya ko babibaka ingingo niyamara kuja mu ngiro. Kwiyunguruza na moto, ikinga canke tuk-tuk vyari bimaze  kumenyerwa cane, kandi naho koko ayo masanganya aba, benshi bashima ivyo vyuma kubera ukuzimbuka hamwe no gushika aho baja banyarutse kurusha imiduga.

headline: Russia ifise umugambi wo kwigarurira ubutaka bwa Ukraine – US
text: Uburusiya bufise umugambi wo kwigarurira ubundi butaka bwa Ukraine bukoresheje “amayeri” nk’ayo bwakoresheje mu kwigarurira akarere ka Crimea/Crimée, nk’uko Amerika ibivuga. Yisunze amatohoza ya Amerika, umuvugizi w’Inama nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano John Kirby avuga ko Uburusiya buriko burategura inzira yo kwigarurira ubutaka. Uturere twa Ukraine tumaze kwigarurirwa dushobora kubamwo amatora ya kamarampaka “y’uruhendo” yo kwegekwa ku Burusiya imbere y’ukwezi kw’icenda, nk’uko abivuga. Uburusiya bwarigaruriye Crimea buyonkoye kuri Ukraine mu 2014 inyuma ya kamarampaka yabonetse cane ko itari yemewe. Kirby yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Turashaka kubisigurira neza abanyagihugu ba Amerika. Nta n’umwe ashobora kwihenda. [Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya] ariko arakoresha amayeri yo mu 2014". Yagiriza Uburusiya gushira intwaro mu minwe y’abategetsi batemewe begamiye ku Burusiya mu burongozi bw’uturere twa Ukraine twigaruriwe, mu ntumbero yo gutegura amatora ya kamarampaka yo kwegukira Uburusiya. Kirby avuga ko ibizoba muri ano matora bishobora gukoreshwa n’Uburusiya mu “kugerageza gusaba ko ubutaka bwa Ukraine bubwegukira”. Uburusiya bwaramaze gushiraho abategetsi b’uturere babwo mu bice vya Ukraine bumaze kwigarurira. Crimea yigaruriwe n’Uburusiya mu 2014 inyuma y’amatora ya kamarampaka yateguwe gihutihuti - amatora amakungu yafashe ko ateye kubiri n’amategeko, aho abatoye bahisemwo kwegukira Uburusiya. Abenshi mu bari bashigikiye Kyiv baranse kuja muri ayo matora kandi n’imyiyamamazo ntiyabaye mu muco. Amatora asa n’ayo mu tundi turere twa Ukraine nta nkeka ko ashobora kuba nk’aya nyene, aho uwo ari we wese yorwanya umugambi wo kwegukira Uburusiya yorwanywa bikomeye. Kirby avuga ko ashize ahabona imigambi y’Uburusiya “kugira ngo isi imenye ko umugambi uvugwa wo kwigarurira ubutaka bwa Ukraine ari ikintu categuwe imbere y’igihe, kandi ko kitemewe n’amategeko”, mbere akaba yavuze ko Amerika n’incuti zayo bizotegerezwa kwihora vuba bwango. Avuga ko mu turere dushobora kwigarurirwa harimwo Kherson, Zaporizhzhia, Donetsk na Luhansk.

headline: Ukraine: Kyiv ivuga ko yateye intambwe ikomeye mu gihe Russia iriko iva muri Kherson
text: Igisirikare ca Ukraine kivuga ko cateye intambwe zikomeye ku musi w’ejo mu micungararo ya Kherson, inyuma y’aho Uburusiya butangarije ko buriko burakura ingabo muri ico gisagara co mu bumanuko. Ingabo za Ukraine zivuga ko zabohoje igisagara gikomeye ca Snihurivka kiri ku birometero 50 mu buraruko bwa Kherson. Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine) ivuga kandi ko iriko irasatira bikomeye ku mpande zibiri hafi ya Kherson, harimwo gutera intambwe y’ibirometero indwi mu turere tumwe tumwe. Uburusiya buvuga ko bwatanguye kuva muri ico gisagara – igisagara gikomeye cane bwari bwigaruriye muri ino ntambara – ariko iki gikorwa gishobora gufata amayinga. Itangazo ryo ku wa gatatu ryabonetse nk’inzitizi zikomeye ku ntambara ya Moscou muri Ukraine, n’aho abategetsi ba Ukraine bari bagifise impungenge – bagabisha ko ayo ashobora kuba ari amayeri yo kubatega umutego. Nta cemezo cashotse kiboneka ko Uburusiya buriko burakura ingabo ku bwinshi muri Kherson. Ejo ku wa kane, umukuru w’ingabo za Ukraine, Valeriy Zaluzhny, yavuze ko adashobora kwemeza canke guhakana ivyo kuva muri Kherson – ariko akavuga ko ingabo ziwe zateye intambwe. Jenerari Zaluzhny avuga ko ingabo ziwe zateye intambwe zikomeye ku mpande zibiri ku ruhande rw’uburengero bw’uruzi Dnipro – akarere karimwo Kherson – mu kwigarurira ibibanza 12. Ejo ku wa kane nyene, yavuze ko akarere k’ibirometero indwi kabohojwe “muri uno musi uheze”, mu gihe ingabo zariko zisatira amaja ku ruhande rwo mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko hamwe no ku ruhande rw’uburengero. Amashusho ya videwo yerekana abanyagihugu bariko baramutsa abasirikare mu kibanza c’ihuriro, bigaragara ko bari bahejeje kwinjira mu gisagara ca Snihurivka. Snihurivka iri ku masanganzira y’amabarabara akomeye kandi ni igituro ca gari ya moshi c’intara ya Mykolaiv, ihana urubibe na Kherson mu buraruko no mu burengero. Ubutegetsi bw’intara ya Mykolaiv bwacishije ubutumwa ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Telegram buvuga buti “amakuru menshi meza uno musi”. Bwaciye butuma haba ibihuha vyinshi mw’ijoro ry’ejo ku wa kane vyavuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zashitse mu nkengera za Kherson. Iki cafashwe nk’ikimenyetso c’uko ingabo zishobora kuba zari zashitse mu kigwati ca Chornobayivka kiri mu micungararo ya Kherson. BBC ntivyayishobokeye guhinyuza aya makuru y’uturere twabohojwe n’utwatakaye – ariko aya makuru aje inyuma y’amayinga ingabo za Ukraine zivuga ko zari zimaze zisatira. Kherson ni wo mugwa mukuru wa mbere kandi wonyene w’intara waguye mu minwe y’Uburusiya kuva butanguye igitero kuri Ukraine ku wa 24 ruhuhuma (2). Kuva mu mpera z’ukw’icenda, yafatwa na Kremlin nk’Ubutaka bw’Uburusiya  - inyuma y’iciswe “amatora ya kamarampaka” mu turere twa Ukraine twigaruriwe n’Uburusiya, amatora yiyamirijwe cane n’amakungu. Ku wa gatatu, Moscou yavuze ko bitari bigishoboka gukorera muri ico gisagara, ikavuga ko yategerezwa kwimuka ikava mu burengero bw’uruzi Dnipro - uruzi rucamwo kubiri Ukraine. Jenerari Zaluzhny, umukuru w’igisirikare ca Ukraine, avuga ko ata kundi Uburusiya bwari kugira atari uguhunga, inyuma y’aho amayira yo gushikana uburyo asenyuriwe, uburyo bwo kurongora urugamba nabwo bukononekara. Mu masaha yitereye y’ejo ku wa kane, umushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe kwivuna abansi yavuze ko bizofata n’imiburiburi indwi yose kugira ngo Uburusiya bukure ingabo zabwo zose muri Kherson kandi ko bitoroshe kumenya ivyo umwansi ategekanya. Jens Stoltenberg, umukuru w’urunani rwa gisirikare OTAN/NATO ruhurikiyemwo ibihugu vy’Uburengero, avuga ko biboneka ko Uburusiya “buri ku gitsure gikomeye” ariko ko bikenewe kuraba “ingene ibintu bigenda ku rubuga”. Umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza wo kwivuna abansi, Ben Wallace, avuga ko Uburusiya buriko busa n’ubwubaka uruzitiro rwo kwivuna umwansi ku rundi ruhande rw’uruzi Dnipro bukoresheje ibikoresho bikomeye. Avuga kuri iyi ngingo yo gusubira inyuma, Wallace avuga ko "amakungu adategerezwa gushimira Uburusiya ko buriko burasubiza amatungo bwanyaze”. Umuhanuzi wo mu biro vya perezida wa Ukraine avuga ko hakiri kare kwigina  - akagiriza umwansi wiwe ko ariko ashaka guhindura Kherson akayigira “igisagara c’urupfu” mu gusiga ateragiye ama mine no mu gutegura kuyitera amabombe ari kure. Ibi bishobora gutuma igitigiri c’abagwa muri ino ntambara ciyongera, mu gihe imaze guhitana canke gukomerekeramwo abasirikare 100.000 kuri buri ruhande n’abasivire 40.000, nk’uko biherutse gushikirizwa mu biharuro ngereranyo  bitangwa n’intwazangabo yo mu gisirikare ca Amerika. Mu yandi makuru, Amerika yatangaje iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare igenewe Ukraine ifise agaciro k’imiriyoni 400 z’amadorari y’amanyamerika – harimwo ubuhinga bwa Avenger bwo gucungera ikirere hamwe n’ibisasu vya misire vyo mu bwoko bwa Hawk. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko yavuganye kandi n’umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubwongereza Rishi Sunak ku vyerekeye imfashanyo bwoha Ukraine mu rwego rwo kwivuna umwansi.

headline: Ethiopia : Indyane z’amoko zahitanye abantu barenga 200 mu ntara ya Oromia
text: Abantu barenga 200 nibo bishwe mu ntambara z'amoko mu burengero bwa Ethiopia. Umurwi w'igihugu ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Ethiopia uvuga ko inyeshamba z'umuhari Oromo Liberation Army (OLA) zishe abantu hafi 150. Abategetsi b'akarere babwiye BBC ko abarwanyi bo mu moko y'aba Oromo n'aba Amhara batanye mu mitwe mu kiringo c'imisi ibiri mu ndwi iheze mu karere ka East Wollega ko mu ntara ya Oromia. Umwe mu babibonye yabwiye BBC ko babonye ibiziga mu ruzi ruri hafi mu nyuma bigahambwa. East Wollega irarwiriyemwo abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bw'aba Amhara kandi ikaba ifise isi y'akanovera yamye iteza indyane hagati y'aya moko abiri. Umurwi w'igihugu ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Ethiopia uvuga ko ico gitero cari gishingiye ku moko, ukagiriza umuhari OLA ko ari wo wateje izi ndyane. Uwu murwi umenyesha ko abo mu bwoko bw'aba Amhara nabo baciye bihora, bakica abantu hafi 60. Abategetsi babwiye BBC ko abarwanyi b'aba Oromo n'aba Amhara ari bo bakoze ivyo bitero muri ako karere. Bivugwa ko abantu batari bake bataye izabo amazu atari make nayo nyene agasamburwa. Umuhari OLA uvuga ko urondera ubwigenge bw'abanyagihugu b'aba Oromo, urahakana ko ata basivire wishe, ukavuga ko wowo wariko urakingira abanyagihugu kugira ntibaterwe n'abarwanyi bitwaje ibirwanisho. Bivugwa ko intambara zibandanya mu karere ka East Wollega mu gihe ingabo za reta ziriko ziragerageza gusubiza ibintu mu buryo. Umuhari OLA ukorera cane cane mu burengero bwa Oromia, aho abajejwe agateka ka zina muntu bagiriza inyeshamba zawo ko muri kahise bamye batera abasivire. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, uwu muhari waratangaje ko wishize hamwe n'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) uri mu ntambara na reta mu buraruko bw'igihugu, ivyateje impungenge ko intambara ishobora gukwira igihugu cose. Kuva mu 2018,  indyane z'amoko zagiye ziyongera muri Ethiopia - izatumye abantu barenga imiriyoni zibiri bata izabo.

headline: AC-Génocide ivuga ko icegeranyo ca CVR ari 'ikinyoma'
text: Emmanuel Nkurunziza arongoye ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya ihonyabwoko, AC-Génocide, ariyamiriza icegeranyo c’umurwi CVR, akavuga ko ari "ikinyoma".

headline: Abantu bashika 30 bahitanywe n'ibisasu hirya no hino muri Afuganisitani
text: Abantu bashika 30 bahitanywe n'urukurikirane rw'ibisasu vyaturikiye mu mpande zitandukanye z'igihugu ca Afuganisitani. Abashika ku munani baguye ku murwa mukuru Kabul, igihe ibisasu bitatu vyaturika bikurikirana mu mwanya muto. Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati bwavuze ko mu gitero kimwe, umwiyahuzi yagereye ibisi yari itwaye abakozi ba leta. Mu ntara ya Takhar, mu buraruko bwa Kabul, igitero c'aba Taliban kuri bariyeri zibiri cahitanye abapolisi batandatu, nayo i Nangarhar, abandi bantu indwi bahitwanywe n'igisasu caturikiye mu mpande z'ibarabara. Abahinga mu vy'umutekano bavuga ko ibitero vy'aba Taliban bigenda biraba vyinshi kugira biyongere igihagararo mu gihe bari mu biganiro na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.

headline: U﻿muyagankuba wacitse muri Ukraine na Moldavie kubera ibitero vya misile
text: Mu gisagara cose ca Lviv kiri mu burengero bwa Ukraine nta muyagankuba ukiharangwa inyuma yo kuvugwa ko habaye ibitero hirya no hino mu gihugu - harimwo n'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. I﻿gihugu kibanyi ca Moldavie na co nyene kivugwamwo ibura ry'umuyagankuba "hose", n'aho kitatewe co ubwaco. Umukuru w'igisagara ca L﻿viv yasavye abantu kwinyegeza, mu gihe uwurongoye akarere ka Kyiv kose  avuga ko inyubakwa za nkenerwa n'amazu yo kubamwo vyatewe. U﻿burusiya buherutse kwongereza ibitero vyabwo ku bibanza bitanga umuyagankuba muri Ukraine. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere Andrei Spinu akaba yanditse kuri Twitter ati:"I﻿gice kirenga ca Moldavie ntikigira amatara." Yagize ati:"Umwijima henshi muri Moldavie inyuma y'ibitero vy'uyu musi vy'Uburusiya ku bibanza bitanga umuyagankuba muri Ukraine." Imbere y'uko haba ibitero, inzamba zo kugabisha ibitero vyo mu kirere zavuze muri Ukraine hose, zica zikurikirwa n'inkuru zerekeye ibitero vyakozwe mu bibanza bimwe bimwe. U﻿mukuru w'igisagara ca Lviv, Andriy Sadovy, yavuze ko abana n'abigisha bajanywe mu kibanza co kwikingira - aca asaba abavyeyi kutaza kubatora imbere y'uko inzaba zo kugabisha ibitero zinuma. G﻿ato imbere yo kumenya ivyabaye i Kyiv na Lviv, abategetsi bavuze ko ubumanuko bwa Ukraine bwasubiye kandi guterwa. U﻿mukuru w'intara ya Mykolaiv yagabishije "ku rufaya rwa rokete" ruriko rurava mu bumanuko no mu buseruko. M﻿u karere kahegereye ka Zaporizhzhia, umwana w'uruyoya yishwe igihe misile yagwa ku bitaro vy'abana, nk'uko vyamenyeshejwe n'abajejwe ibikorwa vyo gutabara. I﻿bitero vyagirijwe Uburusiya ariko nta co buravuga ku bitero vyo kuri uyu wa gatatu. I﻿bura ry'amatara ritunganijwe canke ritari ku kirangamisi risigaye ari irisanzwe mu turere twinshi twa Ukraine inyuma y'ibi bitero vya vuba. U﻿turere twinshi twa Ukraine twatewe kuri uyu wa gatatu twegereye ibihugu bibanyi, harimwo Lviv kari ku birometero 50 uvuye muri Pologne, aho igisase gitegera misile zo mu kirere cahitanye abantu babiri mu ndwi iheze. I﻿bisagara vya Chervonohrad na Yavoriv na vyo vyegereye urubibe Ukraine ihana na Pologne, na ho nta matara aharangwa. I﻿bitero vy'Uburusiya vyarononye hafi igice c'ibibanza bitanga umuyagankuba muri Ukraine, abantu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni bakaba batagira umuyagankuba mu gihe ibipimo vy'ubushuhe bibandanya bimanuka muri iki gihe c'imbeho. Mu misi iheze, umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryigenga ritanga umuyagankuba muri Ukraine yavuze ko abantu bategerezwa kwitegurira kuva mu gihugu kugira bagabanye abakenye umuyagankuba mu gihugu.

headline: Russia: abarenga 3000 bahagaritswe mu myiyerekano yo gushigikira Navalny yabaye mu gihugu cose
text: Igiporisi c'Uburusiya cahagaritse abantu barenga 3000 mu gihe bariko bararwanya imyiyerekano yo gushigikira wa munyaporitike atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, Alexei Navalny, nk'uko bivugwa n'abagenzuzi. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi birengagije igiporisi cari cameze magabo maze biha amabarabara mu myiyerekano minini itari iherutse yo kwiyamiriza Perezida Vladimir Putin. Ku mugwa mukuru Moscou, igiporisi kijejwe gutuza imigumuko cerekanywe kiriko kirakubita kinaburuta abari mu myiyerekano. Navalny, umunyaporitike anegura cane Perezida Putin, yarahamagariye imyiyerekano amaze guhagarikwa ku wa Mungu uheze. Yahagaritswe atahutse i Moscou avuye i Berlin mu Budagi aho yari amaze igihe kirekire avurirwa inyuma y'aho aherewe isumu mu Burusiya mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze. Ubwo nyene acururuka, yaciye ajanwa mu gasho yagirizwa ko yarenze amategeko ajanye no kurekurwa vy'agategano. Avuga ko ari irementanya kugira ngo bamuzivye. OVD Info, ishirahamwe ryigenga rikurikiranira hafi ibijanye n'imyiyerekano, rivuga ko abantu hafi 3100 ari bo bahagaritswe, abarenga 1200 bakaba bahagaritswe i Moscou. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, Kremlin, ntaco biratangaza. Iyi myiyerekano itari yemewe yabaye mu bisagara hafi 100 mu Burusiya bwose, kuva mu buseruko na Siberia gushika i Moscou na St Petersburg. Abari muri yo ni kuva ku banyeshure bakiri bato gushika ku batama basaba ko Navalny arekurwa. Abashika 40.000 bagiye muri iyo myiyerekano hagati muri Moscou, ibiharuro bigereranywa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Ariko umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati avuga ko ari 4000 gusa. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi, bavuga ko igitigiri c'abitavye iyi myiyerekano mu gihugu cose kitari bwabeho, nayo iyabereye ku mugwa mukuru ikaba ari yo minini cane mu kiringo c'imyaka hafi icumi. Mu kibanza citiriwe Pushkin ku mugwa mukuru, abari mu myiyerekano baririmba bati "Rekura Navalny" hamwe na "Putin, tuvireho!" Umugore umwe yabwiye BBC ko yafashe ingingo yo guhamvya abandi muri iyo myiyerekano kubera "Uburusiya bwahindutse ibohero". Sergei Radchenko, umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano i Moscou afise imyaka 53, yabwiye Reuters ati: "Ndarambiwe n'ukwama ndi mu bwoba.  Si naje kubw'iwanje no kubwa Navalny, ariko kubwo umuhungu wanje kubera ata kazoza kari muri kino gihugu". Lyubov Sobol, umufasha akomeye wa Navalny amaze gucibwa ihadabu kubera guhimiriza Abarusiya kuja muri iyo myiyerekano, yacishije ireresi kuri Twitter yerekana abaporisi bamuburuta mu gihe bariko bamubuza kugiriranira ikiganiro n'abanyamakuru. Umugore wa Navalny, Yulia, nawe yahagaritswe umwanya muto igihe yari muri iyo myiyerekano. Bamwe mu bari muri yo bashitse kw'ibohero Navalny apfungiwemwo kandi risanzwe ricungerewe cane, benshi muri bo bakaba bahagaritswe. Imbere y'uko iyo myiyerekano itangura, abategetsi b'Uburusiya bari bagabishije ko bayituza n'inguvu zabo zose.  Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, abatari bake mu bafasha ba hafi cane ba Navalny, harimwo n'umuvugizi wiwe, umupfasoni Kira Yarmysh, barahagaritswe. Abanywanyi biwe bahamagarira iyindi myiyerekano mu mpera z'indwi iza. Hari amakuru avuga ko ejo ku wa gatandatu amaterefone na internet vyahungabanijwe, n'aho bitazwi nimba iki cari gifitaniye isano n'iyi myiyerekano. Urubuga hwaniro TikTok rwaruzuye amareresi yahamagarira imyiyerekano hamwe n'ubutumwa bwakwiragijwe cane bwerekeye Navalny. Mu kwishura, ikigo kijejwe ibinyamakuru mu Burusiya, Roskomnadzor, yasavye TikTok gufuta ubutumwa ubwo ari bwo bwose "buhimiriza abana gukora ibitajanye n'amategeko", kigabisha ko gishobora kuyitoza ihadabu rinini. Umushikiranganji w'indero yabwiye abavyeyi ko  batokwemerera abana babo kuja mu myiyerekano iyo ari yo yose. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubwongereza, Dominic Raab, ariyamiriza "ikubagurwa ry'abari mu myiyerekano bitekaniye hamwe n'abanyamakuru" ejo ku wa gatandatu, asaba abategetsi kurekura abahagaritswe. Ubunyamabanga bw'imigenderanire bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika buriyamiriza ico bwise "amayeri mabi" akoreshwa ku bari mu myiyerekano n'abanyamakuru, bukavuga buti: "Dusavye abategetsi b'Uburusiya kurekura abo bose bahagaritswe bariko bakora ivyo bahabwa n'amategeko, hanyuma barekure Aleksey Navalny ubu nyene kandi ata kirinze gusabwa".

headline: Tanzania: Imvo n'Imvano kw'iragi rya Prezida John Magufuli
text: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze muri iki kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 27 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2021. Iki kiganiro cerekeye urupfu rwa Prezida John Pombe Magufuli wa Tanzania aherutse kwitaba Imana mu mpera z'indwi iheze, kikaba kibaye inyuma y'umusi umwe ashinguwe ku mavuko yiwe mu karere ka Chato mu ntara ya Geita. John Pombe Magufuli, umuhungu yavutse ku murimyi-mworozi mu nyuma agatorerwa kuba Prezida wa Tanzania mu mwaka wa 2015, yitavye Imana afise imyaka 61. Reta yaciye isohora itangazo ivuga ko azize ingwara y'umutima. Imbere yo kuba Prezida, Magufuli yari yataziriwe izina rya 'Tingatinga' - mwene vya bimodoka bikora amabarabara - kubera ibikorwa vyiwe vyo kwubaka amabarabara igihe yari umushikiranganji w'ibikorwa vya reta. Azwi cane kandi mu bikorwa vyo kugwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu. Ibikorwa vyiwe vyari bigamije gutanga umwimbu uboneka, vyabonetse nk'akarorero gashobora gukurikizwa no mu bindi bihugu vya Afrika nk'umuti uyu mugabane ukeneye mu guhangana n'ikibazo c'intwaro ibereye. Muri bimwe mu bikorwa yakoze, harimwo kwugarura amahera yahembwa abakozi batabaho, kwirukana abakozi barya ibiturire canke badatanga umwimbu ushimishije ku mugaragaro rimwe na rimwe ku mboneshakure, anafuta imisi mikuru harimwo uwo kwikukira, ahubwo asaba ko haba umusi wo gukora ibikorwa rusangi. Magufuli kandi yarahagaritse ingendo zose z'abategetsi baja mu bindi bihugu, kandi na we ntiyakunda kugira ingendo mu makungu. Mu kiringo ca mbere c'ubutegetsi bwiwe, izo ngingo yagiye arafata zatumye akundwa cane. John Pombe Joseph Magufuli yarakunzwe cane kubera ingene atarya umunwa, ariko mu gihe ciwe ca nyuma hari abamunegura na cane cane ku vyerekeye ikiza ca coronavirus. Aha yigeze kuvuga ko ico kiza caranduranywe n'imizi muri Tanzania, ahandi agahimiriza abantu gukoresha imiti kavukire. Igihe yitoreza kuba umukuru w'igihugu mu kiringo ca kabiri mu 2020, abo batavuga rumwe bamwagirije kwiba amajwi kandi ko yaguma abatera ubwoba. Nka Prezida, yaragirijwe guturubika abatavuga rumwe na reta no kubangamira uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyiyumviro n'itangazamakuru. Ubutegetsi bwa Magufuli bwarahagaritse ibinyamakuru bimwe bimwe. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu Amnesty International ryavuze ko abanyamakuru batewe ubwoba. Mu 2017, umushingamateka Tundu Lissu, yaje guhangana na Prezida Magufuli mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu yo mu 2020, yararashwe ari imbere y'umuhana wiwe, arakomereka bikomeye. Lissu yagirije reta ko ari yo yagerageje kumwica kuko yavuga ko ari reta y'umukazo. Reta ariko yarabihakanye. Ariko n'abo batavuga rumwe hari bimwe bashimira Prezida John Pombe Magufuli, nk'uruhara yagize mw'iterambere rya Tanzania mu gushira imitahe mu migambi myinshi nko mu mabarabara y'indarayi azohuza ico gihugu n'ibihugu bibanyi, kwagura amabarabara hamwe n'inzira z'imodoka zunguruza abantu zihuta mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Yongereje kandi umuyagankuba yongera agarukana kompanyi y'indege Air Tanzania. None vy'ukuri Prezida Magufuli asize irihe ragi? Kugira tuganire kuri ibi vyose, ku murongo wa telephone turi kumwe na Baraka Marembo ari mu gisagara ca Tabora ashigikiye ivyiyumviro vy'abakebura reta ya Tanzania. Turi kumwe kandi na Alfred Bishundu  ashigikiye umugambwe uri ku butebetsi wa CCM ari mu gisagara ca Kahama mu ntara ya Shinyanga. Iki kiganiro mwagiteguriwe kandi murakigezwaho na Cyriaque Muhawenayo ari muri studios za BBC i Nairobi muri Kenya.

headline: US: Bane bapfuye mu migumuko y'abashigikiye Trump ku ngoro ya Capitol
text: Abantu bane bapfuye mu myiyerekano y'abashigikiye Perezida Donald Trump batera ingoro y'inama nshingamateka, Capitol. Umugore umwe yarashwe n'abapolisi, abandi bantu batatu bapfuye kubera kutaronswa "ubutabazi bwihutirwa". Uyo mugore yarashwe ibinyamakuru muri Amerika bivuga ko yahoze ari mu ngabo za US Air Force, akaba yari mu bantu bari imbere binjira ku nguvu mu cumba abashingamateka bateraniramwo. Abandi bapfuye bivugwa ko ari abagabo babiri n'umugore umwe. Igipolisi kivuga ko capfunze abantu 52  - muri bo 47 bazize kurenga ku mategeko y'umukwabu. Vyabaye ngombwa ko inama rusangi y'abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka ibanza guhagarara inyuma y'aho abashigikiye Perezida Trump batereye ingoro y'inama nshingamateka. Igiporisi gikorera kuri Capitol cabujije uruja n'uruza ico gihe maze gisaba abari mu ngoro bose "kwinyegeza". Imbere y'uko ibi biba, Perezida Donald Trump yari yashikirije ijambo hanze y'ibiro vyiwe maze abatera intege ngo babandanye imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivyavuye mu matora.

headline: South Africa: ingene abanyagihugu bashavuriye abanyamahanga
text: Igipolisi ca Afrika y'Epfo kirameze magabo mu gihe horamuka hasubiye kwaduka imishamirano mu karere ka Alexandra no ku bandariza ku mabarabara mu gisagara ca Johannesburg. Alexandra ni kamwe mu turere dukenye cane mu gihugu ariko ababa mu tuzu twako bashobora kubona amazu maremare cane ya  Sandton, kamwe mu turere tw'ubucuruzi dutunze cane ku mugabane wose, ku birometero bikeya gusa. Ibi rero bituma abanyagihugu bava mu turere dutandukanye twa Afrika y'Epfo no mu bihugu bibanyi bisukira ku bwinshi muri aka karere kurondererayo ubuzima. Hari imihari ibiri itabonwa kumwe ifise intumbero yo kurwanya abanyamahanga badafise vya ngombwa iherutse kuvuka - uwa mbere witwa Alexandra Dudula Movement uwa kabiri nawo Operation Dudula -  kandi ikaba igenda ishigikirwa cane n'abanya Afrika y'Epfo babona ko bakumiriwe. Hari ubwoba ko ibikorwa vyayo bishobora gutuma haduka izindi ndyane zo kurwanya abanyamahanga muri ico gihugu. Ubukene nibwo ntandaro y'icuka kibi kubera abanya Afrika y'Epfo bazi ko - biba vyo canke atari vyo -  abanyamahanga ari bo batumye baba mu ngorane. Dudula ni ijambo ryo mu rurimi rw'ikizulu risigura "gusubiza inyuma"  - ibi birerekana ico bashaka neza na neza. N'aho iyi mirwi itandukanye, yose iharanira ikintu kimwe - yose yibaza ko ishobora gusubiza abanyamahanga b'abanyafrika badafise ibibaranga iwabo. Yibaza ko mu gukora ibi ishobora gutuma ubuzi n'ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji bishobora kuja mu minwe y'abanya Afrika y'Epfo. Umuhari Alexandra Dudula Movement washinzwe mu mwaka uheze. Abanywanyi bawo bavuga ko abanyamahanga babaye mu mazu ya reta mu buryo budaciye mu mategeko mu karere ka Alexandra, gafatwa ko ari aka ba nyarucari. Ariko iri sekeza ryarageze kure gushika aho babuza abimukira b'abanyafrika badafise ibibaranga gukora urudandazwa muri Alexandra. Mu kwezi guheze, uyu muhari warugaye utuzu tw'idandarizo twose twegukira abanyamahanga batashoboye kwerekana impapuro z'ukuri zibaha uburenganzira bwo kudandaza kandi bakaba bafise igitabo c'inzira kitarata igihe. Baciye bafata utu tuzu baduha abanya Afrika y'Epfo, nka Wendy Sithole aba aho nyene i Alexandra, yaciye atangura kudandaza imboga aho abanyamahanga baburijwe kuhadandariza. Uyu mugore yabwiye BBC ati: "Twebwe nk'abanya Afrika y'Epfo turashomye kandi turashonje. Ico dushaka kandi ni uko turonka ubuzi. None bashaka tubeho gute mu gihugu cacu?" Ivyo uyu murwi ukora vyose ntibiciye mu mategeko, abategetsi bakaba bariko barakora amatohoza ajanye n'utugeza imvururu n'ugutera ubwoba. Umuhari Operation Dudula ufise icicaro mu karere ka Soweto muri Johannesburg  - ku birometero birenga 25 ku rundi ruhande rw'igisagara. Inyuma yo gushingwa na Nhlanhla Lux Dlamini w'imyaka 33, uyu muhari wagiye kumenyekana cane mu ka gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze igihe abanyagihugu baba i Soweto bagira imyiyerekano muri aka karere basaba ico bita ibikorwa vyo "gukura umwanda". Barwanya abikekwa kudandaza ibiyayuramutwe hamwe n'abantu baba mu nyubakwa za reta bidaciye mu mategeko. Ariko nk'uko vyagenze i Alexandra, uyu muhari nawo nyene warageze kure mu  vyo uharanira. Abanywanyi bawo ubu bashaka ko abanyamahanga bafise amaduka muri Afrika y'Epfo kandi bakaba ari benshi bugara kandi bakava mu gihugu. Bashaka kandi ko abadandaza bato bato, nk'abacuruza mu mazu y'uburiro n'amaduka, bakoresha abanya Afrika y'Epfo gusa. Ibi bitumwa n'uko bene gukora uru rudandazwa binuba abanya Afrika y'Epfo, bagashima gukoresha abanyamahanga badafise ivya ngombwa kubera bashobora kubaha agahembo kari musi y'ako bategerezwa kubahemba. Abategetsi bavuga ko atari ikibazo gikwiye mu gihugu cose, ko ahubwo ari ikibazo gishobora kuba cibonekeza mu turere tumwe tumwe. Iyi mihari yose irahakana ivyo yagirizwa ko yanka abanyamahanga, ko ahubwo ishaka gusa gukingira imibereho y'abanya Afrika y'Epfo, ibakavuga ko reta y'umugambwe African National Congress (ANC) iriko irananirwa kubikora. Yompi ivuga ko ata mugambwe n'umwe yegamiye. Abanyamahanga bobo bavuga ko bahamwa bahorwa ibibazo vyinshi. Sam Manane, umunya Mozambike amaze imyaka cumi acuruza imfungurwa muri Alexandra yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta kazi k'umuntu n'umwe twiba, vyose turavyironderera, nta munya Afrika y'Epfo tubuza gukora nk'ivyo dukora". "Baraduhohotera gusa". Reta y'ico gihugu ntaco iragira ariko umukuru w'intara ya Gauteng, ari nayo igisagara ca Johannesburg kirimwo, David Makhura wo mu mugambwe ANC, avuga ko ahagaritswe umutima n'iyi migumuko yo kurwanya abanyamahanga i Alexandra. Asaba amashirahamwe adaharanira ivyicaro vya poritike gukorana na reta mu gutsimbataza amahoro no gukomeza ukwihanganiranira. Ariko imigambwe imwe imwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi iriko igerageza gukamisha iki kibazo. Uumugambwe utavyorosha na gato ni uwuherutse gushingwa witwa Patriotic Alliance (PA) urongowe n'uwahoze ari impfungwa, Gayton McKenzie. Uyu mugambwe PA usanzwe ufise abahanuzi mu nama mpanuzwajambo y'akarere ariko ukaba utaritoza ku rwego rw'igihugu, ushaka ko abimukira bose badafise ivya ngombwa bava mu gihugu. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, abanywanyi b'umugambwe Economic Freedom Fighters utavuga rumwe n'uruwi ku butegetsi waragendeye giturumbuka amazu y'uburiro muri Johannesburg kugira urabe abanyamahanga bayakoramwo wongere utere igitsure abadandaji guha akazi abanya-Afrika y'Epfo benshi. Ku kijanye n'indangamuntu, reta ivuga ko iriko irakora uko ishoboye kugira ngo abantu bagire ivya ngombwa vy'ukuri - ariko ibi bizofata igihe kitari gito. Si bwo bwa mbere haduka urwanko ku banyamahanga muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu 2008, harabaye ibitero bitari bike mu gihugu cose ku mpunzi no ku bimukira - aho abarenga 60 bavugwa ko bishwe, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi nabo barata baromoka. Mu 2015 harabaye ibi bitero ku banyamahanga, cane cane mu bisagara vya  Durban na Johannesburg, ivyatumye reta igomora ingabo kugira ngo zibuze ntihaduke iyindi migumuko. Haraciye imyaka itatu kandi habaye ibindi bitero ku banyamahanga vyatumye abanya Nigeria amajana n'amajana bava mu gihugu. Ntibiramenyekana igitumye iki kibazo gisubira kuvyuka ariko ibibazo indiri n'indiri vy'ubutunzi muri Afrika y'Epfo vyarunyuwe n'ingingo zo kuzibira ikiza ca Covid-19 zatumye abantu badaharurwa batakaza ubuzi maze ubuzima nabwo buca burushirizaho kuzimba.

headline: Pierre Nkurunziza: Umutambukanyi wiwe yashimye ibikorwa vyiwe n'iherezo ryiza
text: Umupfasoni Denise Nkurunziza asizwe na Pierre Nkurunziza yahoze arongoye u Burundi yagize inkomezi zo kuvuga ijambo mu kumusezera ubwa nyuma kuri uyu wa 26/06/2020 mu kibuga Ingoma c'i Gitega, avuga ko umugabo wiwe aherekejwe n'imirimo myiza yakoze. Umupfasoni Nkurunziza mu kwezi guheze yari yajanywe muri Kenya kuvurwa indwara itatangajwe agaruka mu gihugu haciye umunsi umwe leta imenyesheje ko umutambukanyi wiwe yashengeye mu ndwi zibiri ziheze. Ku kibuga ingoma cuzuye abantu ibihumbi, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Tanzania Kassim Majaliwa eka n'umutambukanyi wa perezida wa Zambia mu bashitsi bakuru, Madamu Nkrunziza yabashije kugira ico ashikirije mu izina ry'umuryango. Yavuze ko ijambo ryiwe ari "ugukengurukira Imana ku gitangaza yadukoreye inyuma y'uko tubuze, ubwanje umukunzi, abana bakabura umuvyeyi". Yashimye Imana ko yabahaye inkomezi kuko ari igitangaza mu bihe bigoye nk'ivyo barimwo. Ati: "Kubura umuntu mu mwanya mutoya wari ugikunze kubana nawe ntibiba vyoroshe, ariko mu muryango Imana yaduhaye inkomezi zo guhagarara muri bino bihe". Yashingiye ku majambo yo muri Bibiliya avuga aho bakuye inkomezi, avuga ko iki cari igihe ciwe co kugenda akaba mbere asaba buri wese gutegura nawe igihe ciwe. Umupfasoni Nkurunziza yasubiyemo amajambo yavuzwe na Bwana Nkurunziza ati: "Yakunze kuvuga ko ikibi atari ugupfa ahubwo ari ugupfira igihugu nabi umuryango ukawupfira nabi". Ati: "Nimureke dushime Imana kuko agiye atigeze aduhemukira kandi ntiyahemukiye n'igihugu, kuko iyo ahemukira igihugu twari kuba hano ariko kandi tumaramaye...". Abanenga ubutegetsi Bwana Nkurunziza hamwe n'abaharanira agateka ka muntu, bakunze kunenga ubutegetsi bwiwe babwagiriza guhonyanga bikomeye uburenganzira bwa muntu. Umupfasoni Nkurunziza yavuze ati: "Indi dushimira Imana  uko arangije amahoro, atapfuye urupfu rw'agashinyaguro...ikindi naco yapfiriye mu mwami, yarangije neza". Yavuze ko Bwana Nkurunziza yakoze ibikorwa vyiza vyinshi bimuherekeje, eka mbere ko yagize n'urupfu mu mahoro. Umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko we n'Abarundi bose bazokwama bakurikiza iragi abasigiye, ryo gukunda igihugu nk'uko nawe yabikoze, yishimikije abamutanguriye. Ati: "Ntituzokumaramaza. Tuzogumiza ikirenge mu makanda ywe. Kurya nawe wagumye mu makanda y'abatuboneye izuba nka Ntare Rushatsi, Mwezi Gisabo, Rwagasore, Ndadaye n'izindi mfura z'u Burundi". "Jewe ubwanje ndahomvye, umuhanuzi mukuru, umwe abazwa vyose, akaba azi n'akari mu nda y'ingoma nk'uwayikanye, wa wundi amenya icasongoye ihwa". Bwana Kassim Majaliwa yagarutse ku bikorwa avuga ko vyakozwe na Perezida Nkurunziza, cane cane "mu kuvukanisha ibi bihugu vyompi". Yagarutse ku gikorwa yagiye atarangije kijanye n'ukwinjiza u Burundi mu muryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika y'ubumanuko, SADC. Bwana Majaliwa yagize ati: "Kimwe mu bikorwa yatanguye ariko agiye atarangije, ni igihe avugana n'umukuru w'igihugu John Pombe Magufuli wa Tanzania, umukuru w'umuryango wa SADC, asaba ko u Burundi nabwo bwokwinjira muri uyo muryango". "Turababaye kubona yigiriye iki gikorwa atakirangije". Yijeje Bwana Ndayishimiye ko Tanzaniya izomufasha kugira ngo "u Burundi nabwo bube kimwe mu bihugu bigize umuryango wa SADC. Inyuma y'imihango yabereye mu kibuga Ingoma, ikiziga ca Nkurunziza gishingurwa mu irimbi ry'umwihariko rimaze iminsi ricubakirwa aha i Gitega. Namara gushingurwa uyu munsi amabendera y'ibihugu vya Kenya, Rwanda, Tanzania na Uganda arongera kuduzwa gushika hejuru inyuma y'indwi zibiri aduzwa gushika mu ca kabiri mu kwifatanya n'u Burundi mu kigandaro.

headline: Ukraine: amabi y’Uburusiya yatumye ibihugu vya OTAN vyegerana gusumba
text: By Katya Adler Umwanditsi ku mugabane wa Bulaya Ishirahamwe OTAN/NATO ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe ryumva ko ryishimiye ukubaho kwaryo muri kino gihe. Ni vyo, iyo uvuganye n’abategetsi i Buruseri (Bruxelles/Brussels) mu Bubirigi, ahari icicaro ca OTAN, nta n’umwe avuga ko anezerejwe n’ingene ibintu bimeze i Bulaya inyuma y’aho Uburusiya butanguriye igitero cabwo kuri Ukraine. Ariko bose bihutira kukubwira ingene batangara kandi bafise n’ishaka, kandi ko iri shirahamwe rishize hamwe “cane". Bakubwira kandi ukungene amakungu, mu bwitonzi bwinshi, afatanye mu nda mu gufatira ibihano Uburusiya. Ibi siko vyamye na gato. Umutegetsi wa Amerika i Buruseri yambwiye ati: "Iyo umbaza mu kwa kabiri, canke mu mezi atandatu aheze, sinari gushobora kubona ubumwe dufitaniye muri kino gihe”. None ni igiki gitumye ibihugu vy’Uburengero bishira hamwe gutya? Iyumvire amakuru atagira igitigiri twasoma yerekana ko ibihugu vy’Uburengero bishobora gucanamwo kubera iyi ntambara. "Ukuruhishwa na Ukraine" kwaravuzwe mu ci riheze, inyuma y’amezi atanu intambara itanguye. Inyuma y’ivyo, ubuzima buzimvye n’iduga ry’ibiciro vy’umuyagankuba kubera igitero c’Uburusiya vyaboneka ko bishobora gutuma abategetsi b’Uburengero bagabanya imfashanyo baha Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine). Mu gihe Uburusiya ari bwo bufise ububiko bunini kw’isi yose bw’ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri, hari abibaza ko ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari gushima kwitandukanya na Ukraine bitinya ko Moscou (umugwa mukuru w’Uburusiya) ishobora kubikorerako. Ariko uko siko vyagenze. Umwe mu bategetsi bakuru ba OTAN  atashimye ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana yambwiye ati: "Icemezo gikomeye tubona ubu co kwifatanya na Ukraine catumwe n’amabi akorwa n’Uburusiya – mu gutera abasivire n’ibigo vya gisivire. "Ivyaha vyo mu ntambara bikorwa buri musi vyabaye akamenyero, ayo masanamu twama tubona ku mboneshakure umusi ku musi. Ibi biragoye kwiregangiza”. Uburusiya bwama buhakana ko ata vyaha vyo mu ntambara bukora. Abategetsi b’Uburengero bavuga ko ibiharuro vya Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu w’Uburusiya)  vyagenze nabi. "[Moscou] iragerageza gutyoza canke kwifatira mu gahanga ibihugu bishigikiye Ukraine ikoresheje amajambo ngo ‘turashobora kukubabaza’”, nk’uko umutegetsi umwe w’igihugu kinini ca OTAN  yambwiye. "Ariko ivyo vyose nta na kimwe vyashitseko. Kurya nyene Uburusiya bwananiwe no kuzimya ubutwari bw’abanya-Ukraine mu gukorera amabi atavugwa igihugu cabo imisi yose”. Ivyo Vladimir Putin yama avuga ko icateye iyi ntambara ari uko OTAN iriko itera yiyagurira akarere amaja mu buseruko vyamuhindukiriye. Suède be na Finland, igihugu kibanyi c’Uburusiya,  vyahisemwo kwinjira muri uru runani rwo kwivunira umwansi hamwe, inyuma y’imyaka mirongo vyari bimaze bitegamiye ku ruhande na rumwe, iyi ikaba ari ingaruka y’ibikorwa vya Kremlin. Abenshi kandi babona ko intambwe itari yitezwe y’igisirikare ca Ukraine yashobotse kubera imfashanyo ikomeye y’Uburengero. Ibihugu vya OTAN  biriko biraraba imwe mu nzira zibiri zo gufasha Ukraine: mu bikorwa no muri poritike. Inzira y’ibikorwa yerekeye cane cane gukora ku buryo inganda zobandanya zihingura zongera ziha ibirwanisho Ukraine. Abategetsi ba OTAN bavuga ko imfashanyo ihabwa Ukraine yigwa neza kandi ikaba ari iyo igihe kirekire muri kino gihe gusumba mu ndwi zibiri za mbere z’igitero c’Uburusiya zarangwa n’ubwoba. Ariko uru runani rurashiraho umurongo hagati y’imfashanyo ya gisirikare ruha abanywayi barwo n’iyo ruha Ukraine, aho ingingo yo gufasha iki gihugu ifatwa n’amareta y’ibihugu biri muri OTAN kandi akaba ari yo nyene yitanga iyi mfashanyo, hako iba OTAN yo nyene iyitanga. Kremlin ntiyemera iri tandukanirizo, ariko ni ngirakamaro kuri OTAN mu gihe ibandanya ikora uko ishoboye kugira ngo ntihave yinjira mu ntambara amaso mu yandi na Moscou, ivyohava bituma ibintu biyangara gushika aho haba intambara ya nikleyeri n’Uburusiya. Rero, OTAN  yarakomeje ibisata vyo kwivuna abansi mu bihugu vy’ubuseruko vyegeranye n’Uburusiya, gusa uru runani ruvuga ko ata gikorwa gisanzwe giteguye co gukorera muri Ukraine. Nta ngabo za Ukraine ruriko rurigisha canke ngo habe imfashanyo ya gisirikare rwo nk’urunani ruriko ruratanga. Inzira ya poritike mu gushigikira Ukraine ni ikintu gitegerezwa gukorwa biciye mu nama nshingamateka n’abanyagihugu bo mu bihugu vya OTAN. Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi bavuga ko igiciro c’imfashanyo ihabwa Ukraine ari nto cane rwose ugereranije n’uburyo bwakoreshejwe na Amerika canke ibihugu vya Bulaya nk’Ubufaransa canke Ubwongereza muri Iraki na Afghanistan, ariko ni ukubirabira mu biharuro ngereranyo biherutse mu Budagi, mu Bufaransa no mu Butaliyano. Ibi biharuro vyerekana ko abanyagihugu bashigikiye ibihano vyafatiwe Uburusiya bigenda bigabanuka (28% gusa mu Bufaransa no mu Budagi hamwe na 26% gusa mu Butaliyano, nk’uko biri mu cigwa cakozwe n’ikigo  c’igendereza Morning Consult ) kubera bigira ingaruka mbi ku giciro c’ubuzima. Hagati aho, abategetsi basa n’abatarota bacika intege mu gufasha Ukraine. Ahubwo ubiravye ubu bashikamye gusumba mu misi ya mbere y’intambara. Bitandukanye na ca giye c’intambara yo mu Kigobe. Ico gihe, Ubudagi n’Ubufaransa ntivyahigitanije mu kwiyonjorora, bitumwe n’uko abanyagihugu bavyo batari bashigikiye intambara. None ubu ni ibiki biriko biraba? Birasanzwe: ku mugabane wa Bulaya, igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine gifatwa nka ca gitero c’iterabwoba co ku wa 11 Nyakanga (9) 2001 kuri Amerika, nk’uko bivugwa na Camille Grand ari mu gisata kijejwe imigenderaire mu Nama nkuru y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Yambwiye ati: "[Igitero c’Uburusiya] cabaye akamo gakomeye ku vyerekeye umutekano no kwivuna abansi. Igihe gikomeye, cahinduye ibintu, aho intambara yashitse ku mipaka yacu”. Uko vyogenda kwose muri Ukraine, abona ko ibintu bizoguma bigoye ku mugabane wa Bulaya mu kiringo c’imyaka itari mike iri imbere. Umutegetsi wa Amerika i Buruseri wewe aragera kure: "Ivyo Uburusiya bwakoze vyatumye haba impinduka kw’isi yose mu migambi ijanye n’umutekano”. Si OTAN  yonyene yabibonye uku, nk’uko abivuga. N’ibindi bihugu nk’Ubuyapani, Nouvelle-Zélande, Korea y’Epfo na Australia  na vyo nyene bibona ibikorwa vya Vladimir Putin nk’akaga ku ntwaro rusangi kw’isi. Bibona ko mu gihe bomureka “agashika ku vyo yipfuza” muri Ukraine, nta n’umwe yoba agitekaniwe. Gusa si bose babibona uku kw’isi yose. Uburengero n’incuti zabwo bagirizwa uburyarya na ka mwana wa mama uravye ingene baciye bihutira gufasha Ukraine canke kwiyamiriza Uburusiya ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara bukora, mu gihe ingabo z’Uburengero zagirizwa guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n’ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Iraki , nk’akarorero. Hanyuma kandi ingene bakiriye impunzi zo muri Syria zinjiye i Bulaya mu 2015 biratandukanye cane n’ingene bakiriye iza Ukraine muri uno mwaka. Ariko, dusubiye inyuma mu kwa kabiri kuri OTAN, ubwoba bwatewe n’igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine – hamwe nimpungenge ku ngaruka zikomeye zoba mu gihe bokwihoza ivyo Kremlin iriko irakora – vyatumye Amerika iva ku ntego yari ifise yo kwibanda ku Bushinwa n’akarere ka Indo-Pacifique. Yaciye isubiza amaso ku gisata co kwivuna abansi ca Bulaya – n’aho vyaboneka ko bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi kuri Joe Biden mu matora aheruka ( n’aho ivyayavuyemwo bisa n’uko bitamuhungabanije). Nta gukekeranya ko ingingo ya Amerika, hongeyeko ibikorwa vy’Uburusiya muri Ukraine, yahinduye imbono y’ibintu mu butegetsi bw’Ubufaransa, Ubudagi n’Ubutaliyano  - ibihugu vyaboneka ubwa mbere y’uko bitashaka kwiteranya n’Uburusiya. Berlin (umugwa mukuru w’Ubudagi) na Roma (umugwa mukuru w’Ubutaliyano) vyari bifise imigenderanire ikomeye cane na Moscou mu vyo ubudandaji n’amasoko ntanganguvu. Nayo kuri Perezida Emmanuel Macron, abamunegura babona ko yariko arahendwa n’icaboneka ko ari ubugenzi bwihariye yaboneka ko afitaniye na Vladimir Putin. Umuvuduko wariyongereye ubu, gushika n’aho Ubudagi bwahora buboneka ko butinya buza mu kibanza ca kane mu bihugu biha imfashanyo Ukraine, n’aho iya Amerika isumba kure n’iyo imfashanyo itangwa n’Ubulaya. Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ku rwego rw’igihugu no ku rwego rw’urunani bwakoze uko bushobye kwose kugira ngo bureke kwama buzera uburaro n’uburamuko ku Burusiya mu vyerekeye amasoko ntanganguvu, kandi na Macron muri ino misi ntarya umunwa iyo hageze ikibazo ca Moscou. "Ivyaha vyo mu ntambara bidashobora kugenda gutyo nyene bidahanywe” niko aheruka kuvuga muri ino ndwi ku bitero bibandanya ku basivire no ku bigo vya gisivire. Ibi bitero vyatumye 75% vy’umugwa mukuru Kyiv bibura amazi n’umuyagankuba. Gute naho ku biyago vya terefone hagati y’umukuru wa reta y’Ubudagi Olaf Scholz na Perezida Macron ku ruhande rumwe, hamwe na Vladimir Putin, kandi bibandanya binegurwa? "Imirongo ya terefone [ya Amerika] kandi iguma yuguruye hagati ya Washington na Moscou. Si ukugira bavugane kuri kazoza ka Ukraine – iki ni ikibazo c’abanya-Ukraine bo nyene – ahubwo ni ukugira ngo bavugane ibindi bibazo, nk’ikibazo c’ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vya nikleyeri”. Jewe ndibaza ico bizozana kuri kazoza. Rimwe na rimwe bisa nk’aho Paris (umugwa mukuru w’Ubufaransa) na Berlin vyibaza ko mu gihe intambara ya Ukraine izoba irangiye bizoshoboka ko ibintu “bibandanya nk’uko vyamye” hagati yavyo n’Uburusiya. Umutegetsi umwe wa Amerika avuga ko ahafitiye amakenga. Ariko ntiwoba wihenze ubajije nimba bishoboka ko hovugwa kazoza ka Bulaya n’ikibazo c’umutekano ubanje kwigizayo burundu Uburusiya. Mu gihe Ubulaya butekewe n’ubwoba bwinshi cane ko butera buja mu gihe c’ubukonje bukanye kurenza ko vyari bimeze imbere y’intambara, nta kimenyetso na kimwe cerekana ko hoba hari ibihugu bikomeye vya OTAN vyoba vyiyumvira inzira y’ibiganiro yorangiza intambara hagati y’Uburusiya na Ukraine. Ico bahurizako bose ni uko Uburengero bwemera ko bahatiye Ukraine mu biganiro n’Uburusiya bitayereye mu 2014, mu nyuma Moscou ikagaruka mu 2022 irondera ibindi vyinshi. Abaserukira ibihugu vya OTAN bifasha Ukraine mu vya gisirikare bavuga ko ubu babona uruhara rwabo mu gufasha Kyiv kugira ngo ikore neza gisirikare, mu ntumbero yo kuyifasha guhagarara neza mu gihe vyoshika hakaba ibiganiro n’Uburusiya. Ariko iki ni ikintu Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko kitari mu mutwe ubu bwa vuba. Ariko kandi, n’aho woba uriko uravuga ubumwe burangwa muri OTAN, kwoba ari ukwirengagiza ibintu ubibona mu gihe wovuga ko ata bintu bidahuriweko n’incuti za Ukraine. Ubwongereza bukunzwe kwagirizwa ko bufise umutima “w’ubukoko” kuri Moscou, co kimwe n’ibindi bihugu vya OTAN vyegereye Uburusiya canke bifise kahise kababaje kuri bwo – nk’ibihugu vy’akarere ka Balte hamwe na Pologne. Ubudagi muri ino misi buvugwa ko ari “umufatanyabikorwa ntirumveko”, atanga agaca yinumira . Amerika ifatwa nk’uko iriko igerageza gukinira hose, hagati mu runani no hanze, kugira ngo yirinde imishamirano ya gisirikare amaso mu yandi na Moscou. Gusa ubu budasa hagati y’ibi bihugu gufatwa ko ari “utuntu duto cane” muri kino gihe. Umuhinga mu vyo kwivuna abansi Camille Grand avuga ko ata muti woroshe w’iyi ntambara. Ariko gusa ico bose bipfuza ni kimwe, ko Uburusiya butsindwa. None ubwo Moscou yovyifatamwo gute? Ikibazo nyamukuru ku bihugu vyose bifise uruhara muri ino ntambara ni ingene yorangira mu buryo bwiza. Uko vyogenda kwose.

headline: Malawi: Ishavu kubera ikigongwe ku bategetsi bariye ibiturire
text: Umushikirizamanza mukuru muri Malawi yagirijwe gukingira abanyaporitike bo muri ico gihugu inyuma yo gutangaza  ikigongwe ku bantu bivye reta  canke bariye ibiturire. Thabo Chakaka-Nyirenda  yavuze ko mu mezi abiri ari imbere umuntu wese azokwemera ko yivye canke yariye igiturire/ruswa atazojanwa mu bucamanza mu gihe azoba yasubije amafaranga yagirizwa. Ivyo bishitse um gihe ibiro vya Malawi bigwanya ibiturire biriko biragerageza gufata umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutaka, Kezzie Msukwa, kubera ubusuma buvugwamwo amafaranga aharurwa muri miriyoni z'amadorari  burimwo umugwizatunga w'umwongereza  aba muri Malawi, Zuneth Sattar. Abo bagabo bompi  bavuga ko ata caha bakoze. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Malawi ca Demokrasi n'iterambere ry'ubutunzi, Sylvester Namiwa, yavuze ko gutangaza ico kigongwe vyerekanye ko uwo mushikirizamanza mukuru yitesheje agaciro ka poritike aca amusaba gutanga imihoho. Amaze kubona ko ariko aranegurwa cane, uwo mushikirizamanza mukuru yahaye ikiganiro abamenyeshamakuru avuga ko ico kigongwe kitazoba cerekeye ibintu vyoze bijanye no kwiba canke n'ibiturire.

headline: Burundi – US: Prezida Joe Biden yavanyeho ibihano vyari vyarafatiwe Uburundi
text: Umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden ku wa kane yafashe ingingo-tegeko ivanaho ibihano ico gihugu cari cafatiye Uburundi mu 2015 gishingiye  k'uko ibintu vyari vyifashe muri ico gihe. Ingingo itavugwako rumwe ya Prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yo kwitoreza ikiringo ca gatatu c'umukuru w'igihugu mu 2015 yakurikiwe n'intureka ziturutse ku myiyerekano yo kuyanka hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'inzego z'umutekano vyo kuyitesha. Abantu amajana barishwe abandi ibihumbi barahunga igihugu. Prezida Biden avuga ko iyo ngingo yafashe ku wa kane ishingiye ku bimaze guhinduka mu nzira nziza kuva hashitse ku butegetsi umukuru w'igihugu mushasha. Prezida Biden avuga ko ibintu mu Burundi ''vyahinduwe cane n'ivyabaye mu mwaka uheze" harimwo guhererekanya ubutegetsi inyuma y'itorwa rya Evariste Ndayishimiye mu 2020, ukugabanuka kw'intureka, hamwe no "kubandanya impinduka mu bisata bitandukanye". Ku butumwa yanditse kuri Twitter, umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evaritse Ndayishimiye yakiriye neza iyo ngingo y'umukuru wa Amerika yo kuvana ibihano ku gihugu arongoye. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Ibihano ku Burundi  vyari vyafashwe ku ntwaro ya Prezida Obama mu 2015. Ico gihe hari abantu bane bari bafatiwe ibihano ku giti cabo. Barimwo Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni, ubu asigaye ari umushikiranganji wa mbere muri reta ya Evariste Ndayishimiye. Mu 2015, Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni yari umushikiranganji ajejwe umutekano. Bamwe mu bari mu nzego z'umutekano bagirijwe uruhara mu mahano atandukanye muri ico gihe c'intureka. Uwundi mutegetsi mu nzego z'igihugu yari Godefroid  Bizimana yari icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru ajejwe igiporisi. Bandi babiri bari abaza kw'isonga mu bashatse gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu 2015: Jenerari Godefroid Niyombare n'umuhisi Jenerari Cyrille Ndayirukiye. Harongeweko n'abandi mu nyuma. Barimwo  Gervais Ndirakobuca ubu ajejwe ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati , umutekano n'iterambere rusangi.  Hari na  Joseph Mathias Niyonzima azwi cane mu rwego rw'iperereza mu Burundi. Harinwo kandi  Alexis Sinduhije na Leonard Ngendakumana ku ruhara  mu guteza umutekano muke mu Burundi. Ntibari bemerewe guhabwa uruhusha rwo kwinjira muri Amerika, amatungo yabo nayo yari yarafatiriwe. Iyo nkuru nziza kuri reta y'Uburundi Amwe mu mashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu  ashobora kutayakira neza. Ni mu gihe avuga ko Prezida Ndayishimiye ataco arakora gifadika ngo agateka ka muntu kubahirizwe, akavuga ko ivyaha birimwo kwica, kunyuruza no kwica rubozo n'ubu bikibandanga mu gihugu na cane cane ku batavuga rumwe n'iyo reta. N'ishirahamwe rya Buraya ryarafatiye ibihano Uburundi kubera ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu  ryandurutse kuri izo ntureka za poritke. Iryo shirahamwe na reta y'Uburundi bamaze umwaka urenga baganira ingene ivyo bihano vyovaho. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya rivuga ko bigeze ku "ntambwe ikomeye". Mw'itangazo, icegera c'umukuru w'urwego rw'imari muri Amerika Wally Adeyemo avuga ko "Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zibona impinduka nziza ziriko ziragirwa na prezida Ndayishimiye mu gihe zibandanya guhimiriza Uburundi guteza imbere ibijanye n'agateka ka zina muntu mu gihugu n'uko abakora amabi babibazwa."

headline: UK: Abanye-Kenya bariko barashaka kwitwara kubera amabi bakorewe ku bukoloni
text: Umugwi w'abanye-Kenya bitwariye reta y'Ubwongereza muri sentare y'agateka ka zina muntu ya Buraya (ECHR) ku mabi bakorewe mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Muri yo harimwo kwibwa amatongo, n'ubu akirimwamwo n'amakompanyi y'icayi. Iyo miryango yemeza ko kunanirwa gutorera inyishu ico kibazo mu gutanga impozamarira bihonyanga amasezerano ya Buraya yerekeye agateka ka zina muntu. Ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire bw'Ubwongereza bwabwiye BBC ko "atari vyiza kuvuga ku rubanza ruri mu matohoza".
