Abaserukira imiryango y'aba Talai n'aba Kipsigis, bakomoka mu karere ka Kericho, bavuga ko bagerageje guhura n'umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2022 ariko ko batavyemerewe. Umuryango w'aba Talai uvuga ko abawugize birukanywe mu matongo amera mu mitumba ihanamye muri Rift Valley kugira bahashire imirima y'icayi. Aba Talai baragwanije cane  ko abanye-Buraya baza muri ako karere. Mu kubahana, umuntu wese wo muri uwo muryango yatwawe ku nguvu mw'ibohero mu karere kagwiriyemwo imibu n'isazi yitwa tse-tse (mouche tse-tse) kegereye ikiyaga ubu citwa Victoria. Bivugwa ko aho ibintu vyari vyifashe nabi cane ku buryo benshi muri bo bahasize ubuzima, imbanyi z'abagore na zo zaguma zikoroka. Ibitungwa na vyo vyabo vyarahahoneye ku bwinshi. Igihe Kenya yikukira mu 1963, abarokotse baciye bava mw'ibohero basubira ku butaka bwa ba sokuru babo. Ariko ntibigeze babusubirana. Bavuga ko kuva ico gihe baba mu micungararo y'imirima y'icayi ata ruhusha babifitiye. Uwuburanira abareze yabwiye radio BBC igisata ca Focus on Africa ko bashaka "impozamarira" muri ako karere ingana na miliyaridi 200 z'amadolari, no "gusaba imbabazi" hanyuma hatangure imigenderanire mishasha ifatiye "ku kwubahana". Joel Kimutai Bosek agira ati: "Ayo mabi yatanguye mu 1902 arabandanya gushika 1962." Yabandanije agira ati: "Turiko turavuga ivyerekeye gutandukanya imiryango. Abantu bamwe barazimiye ntibasubira kuboneka. Turiko turavuga ivyerekeye guturira amazu, turiko tuvuga ivyerekeye gukura abantu ku butaka bwa ba sokuru babo." Abaserukira aba Kipsigis n'aba Talai bavuga ko uko kwitwara ari "intambwe ikomeye" n'"inyishu ku myaka myinshi yari ihaciye hageragezwa ko hoba umubonano na reta y'Ubwongereza imbona nkubone kugira haboneke inyishu ya kivandimwe" uhereye mu 2019. Ukwitwara muri ECHR ntibisigura ko iyo sentare izoburanisha urwo rubanza, ariko izofata ingingo ko ishobora kurwakira imbere yo gufata ingingo. Umwe mubakorewe amabi, Kibore Cheruiyot, yari afise imyaka 10 igihe umuryango wiwe wirukanwa ku nguvu, ari kumwe n'abandi bantu bo mu muryango wiwe bimurirwa kure y'aho baba. Agira ati: "Ubuzima bwari bumeze nabi cane. Narokotse ku bw'Imana. Mwenewacu nta mahirwe yagize. Yakomowe n'inzoka  aca arapfa. Abantu indwi bo mu muryango wanje na bo barapfuye." Yabandanije avuga ati: "Hari isazi zitwa tse-tse zarya abantu n'ibikoko, abandi benshi barapfuye." Ugushingisha urwo rubanza muri ECHR si ubwa mbere ko ivyabashikiye bivugwa ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Mu 2021, abajejwe amatohoza ya ONU/UN baranditse itangazo berekana "amakenga ku bivugwa vyo kutabazwa no kudatora inyishu ku bakoreye amabi aba Kipsigis n'aba Talai bo mu karere ka Kericho". Mu nyishu, reta y'Ubwongereza yavuze ko yamaze gusaba ikigongwe ku mugaragaro iranatora inyishu mu 2013 y'ivyasabwa n'abakenya babaye muri ivyo bihe bitoroshe hamwe n'imigumuko y'aba Mau Mau, kuva mu 1952 gushika mu 1963, igihe Kenya yikukira. Ariko abo mu bwoko bw'aba Kipsigis na Talai bemeza ko ivyo reta y'Ubwongereza ivuga muri iyo nyishu, bidasa n'ivyabo. Hagati aho, hari ivyagiriji vyo guhonyanga bikomeye agateka k'abantu bo muri iyo miryango, harimwo ubwicanyi bw'indengera butungane, amabi afatiye ku gitsina, gusinzikaza ubuzima hamwe no gupfunga bidakurikije amategeko hamwe no gutuza abantu mu vyabo. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu uyu mwaka, umugwi w'abanye Kenya barenga 100.000 bo mu bwoko bw'aba Talai barandikiye Prince William  basaba ko haba gusaba imbabazi hamwe n'impozamarira.

headline: DR Congo: Tshisekedi yababariye abagabo babiri bagize uruhara mw'iyicwa rya Perezida Laurent Kabila
text: Abagabo babiri bagiriwe n'icaha co kwica uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, Laurent-Désiré Kabila haraciye imyaka 20, bahawe ikigongwe. N'aho Perezida Kabila yarashwe n'uwamucungerera ubuzima, babiri mu bategetsi biwe bo hejuru, Koroneri Eddy Kapend na Georges Leta, baragize uruhara mw'iryo gandagurwa. Mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze, Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yagabanije igihano c'urupfu bari baciriwe. Iki kigongwe gitanzwe mu gihe hari ukutumvikana hagati ya Perezida Tshisekedi n'uwo yasubiriye, umuhungu wa Laurent Kabila ari we Joseph Kabila. Joseph Kabila yafashe ubutegetsi inyuma y'urupfu rwa se wiwe mu 2001, akaba yarongoye DR Congo mu kiringo c'imyaka 18 imbere y'uko Perezida Tshisekedi atsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2018. N'aho bwari bwo bwa mbere habaye uguhererekana ubutegetsi mu mahoro kuva mu myaka hafi 60 yari iheze, abatari bake mu bafise uruhara mu buzima bwa politike ya Congo bariyamirije ivyavuye muri ayo matora. Hari benshi bazi ko uyu mukuru w'igihugu mushasha yagiranye amasezerano yo mu mpisho na Joseph Kabila, gushika n'ubu agifise inguvu nyinshi mu gihugu. Giscard Kusema, umwe mu bajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko Koroneri Kapend hamwe na bamwe mu bo bapfunganywe "baronse ico kigongwe c'umukuru w'igihugu..ikaba ari ingingo iraba benshi ata nkunzi". Koroneri Kapend yari umwishikira cane kwa Perezida Laurent Kabila. Sentare yasanze ari we yateguye igandagurwa ryiwe, afatanije n'abandi bari bajejwe umutekano w'uyo yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, harimwo mbere n'uwari ajejwe ibiro vy'igendereza ico gihe,  Georges Leta. Bompi barahakana ko ata ruhara babigizemwo. Iki kigongwe gitanzwe inyuma y'indwi nkeya Perezida Tshisekedi asambuye ihuriro ryiwe n'umugambwe wa Kabila usanzwe ari wo wiganje mu nama nshingamateka, inyuma y'umwaka wose barabana urunuka. Muri kino gihe, Perezida Tshisekedi ariko arondera urundi runani rwomutuma agira inguvu zikwiye mu nama nshingamateka. Laurent-Désiré Kabila yari yafashe ubutegetsi ku wa 17 z'ukwa gatanu 1997, atembagaje intwaro ya Mobutu Sese Seko Kuku Ngbendu Wa Za Banga mu ntambara yamaze amezi hafi indwi, afashijwe n'ingabo cane cane z'u Rwanda, Uganda na Angola, maze  yomora uyu mukuru w'igihugu citwa Zaire ico gihe yari amaze imyaka ishika 32 agitwaza umukazo. Ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Kabila ntibworohewe kuko haciye imisi mike imigenderanire hagati yiwe na bamwe mu bamufashije gufata ubutegetsi, u Rwanda na Uganda, yaratitutse bituma haduka intambara ya kabiri mu 1998, intambara ivugwa ko yagizwemwo uruhara n'ibihugu icenda, harimwo Zimbabwe, Angola na Namibia vyagiye kumufasha kurwanya abari bateye igihugu ciwe. Yagiye kugandagurwa ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere 2001, amaze imyaka itatu n'amezi hafi umunani, maze inama nshingamateka ica yemeza ko umuhungu wiwe,  Joseph Kabila, yomusubirira. Joseph Kabila nawe yagiye kuva ku butegetsi atsinzwe muri ayo matora yo mu 2018, amatora yabayemwo impari, akiyamirizwa na bamwe mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwa Kabila, cane cane  Martin Fayulu avuga ko ari we yayatsinze ariko akanyarwa intsinzi.

headline: Amatora mu Burundi: Batandatu ku ndwi batanguye imyiyamamazo
text: Uno munsi abazokwitoza mu matora ategekanijwe ku wa 20 z'ukwa gatanu, niho batanguza ibikorwa vy'imyiyamamazo mu mihingo itangukanye y'igihugu. Mu bakandida indwi bazokwitoza ku rwego rw'umukuru w'igihugu batandatu muri bo bashoboye gutanguza ibikorwa vyo kwiyamamaza, umwe akaba amenyesha ko azotangura kwiyamamaza ejo ku wa kabiri. Evariste Ndayishimiye azokwitoza kw'izina ry'mugambwe CNDD-FDD yugururiye ibikorwa vyiwe muri komine Bugendana y'intara ya Gitega asanzwe avukamwo, imigambwe ishika kuri 27 yahisemwo gushigikira uwo mugambwe ikaba yari yagiye kumushigikira. Ku ruhanderwiwe, Agathon Rwasa azokwitoza kw'izina ry'mugambwe CNL yatanguriye ibikorwa vyiwe ku kibuga ca Muremera ku mugwa mukuru w'intara ya Ngozi nawe nyene asanzwe avukamwo. Leonce Ngendakumana azokwitoza kw'izina ry'umugambwe Frodebu hamwe na Dieudonné Nahimana azokwitoza kugiti ciwe batanguriye ibikorwa vyabo mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, muri Karitiye Kinama kuruhande rwa Frodebu hamwe no muri komine Muhakuri kuri Bwana Nahimana. Domitien Ndayizeye azoserukira urunani Kira Burundi yatanguje ibikorwa vyiwe mu ntara ya Muramvya, mu gihe Gaston Sindimwo azoserukira umugambwe Uprona yatanguriye imyiyamamazo yiwe muntara ya Mwaro. Uwitashoboye kwugurura ibikorwa vyiwe uno munsi ni Francis Rohero avuga ko azovyugurura ejo ku wa kabiri. N'aho ivyo bikorwa vyashoboye gutangura, hari ibibazo vyagiye vyibonekeza irya n'ino, vyagenda bibuza abanywwanyi b'abiyamamaza gukomeza ingendo zabo. Abo ni nk'abanywanyi ba CNL bari bafashe ibarabara rya Gitega - Ngozi bavuga ko bankiwe kubandanya urugendo rwabo bageze ahitwa Bitare muri komine Bugendana hariko habera ibirori vya CNDD-FDD, iyindi nzira bari gucamwo nayo basanga ikiraro cabomotse. Bivugwa ko ku mugwa mukuru w'intara ya Kayanza gushika mu masaha icenda hari hakirengana amamodokari menshi yo mu bwoko bwa Fuso yuzuye abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe aja i Ngozi kubera ivyo bibazo. Eka n'imodoka harimwo iyitwaye Agathon Rwasa azokwitoza kw'izina ry'uwo mugambwe, zagize ikibazo zigeze muri komine Matongo y'intara ya Kayanza, aho basanze ikamyo itwara igitoro yari yakikamye mw'ibarabara. Vyabaye ngombwa ko abanyagihugu bafasha mu kumucira inzira kugira ngo ashobore kurengana. Haravugwa kandi n'isanganya ry'imodoka  yari itwaye ivyuma vyongereza amajwi vy'umugambwe CNDD-FDD  yagize isanganya ivuye i Ngozi ija i Bugendana, bikavugwa ko hoba hari abantu babiri bahasize ubuzima,n'abandi bakomeretse. Iyo myiyamamazo yatanguye ikazobandanya gushika ku wa 17 z'ukwa gatanu hasigaye iminsi itatu ngo amatora nyezina abe.

headline: Aba-Taliban n'abagore: Umunyeshure wa kaminuza ya Kabul mu bwoba bwa kazoza
text: I Kabul, aya  mango abanyeshure ba kaminuza bategerezwa kuba bariko baritegurira gutangura igice/igihembwe gishasha. Ariko  ubu hari benshi bariko barata ikintu cose kigaragaza ingene babayeho muri  kahise mu guhe aba Taliban bariko barakizura hanze. Ku munyeshure umwe - umugore , akaba n'uwo mu bwoko bw'inkehwa buburabuzwa bw'aba-Hazara, abo muri bwo muri iyi myaka bahuye n'amabi yo kunyuruzwa no kwicwa n'aba Taliban - abo bagabo bari hanze bateye impungenge gusumba. Ngaha abwira BBC ingene ivyo yarota gushikako vyasubiriwe n'ubwoba bwo kuhakura agatwe mu minsi mike gusa. Ni ibintu ntabona amajambo nobivugamwo, ntabeshe. Ibintu vyose, vyose narota gushikako, ivyo nakoreye vyose. Agateka kanje, ukwiyumva kwanje, naho no kubaho kwanje nk'umukobwa, ubuzima bwanje - vyose birageramiwe. Ninde azi umwanya uzohaca kugira baze gusaka inzu ku nzu kugira batware abakobwa - kumbure banabasambanye ku nguvu. Nshobora no guhitamwo kwiyahura niyo baza mu nzu iwacu. Namye mvugana na bagenzanje, ivyo nivyo twese, twese, dutegekanya gukora. Urupfu ni rwiza gusumba gutwarwo nabo. Twese dufise ubwoba kandi dufise ubwoba gushika no mu musokoro w'amagufa. Nta n'amezi abiri aheze,  nta kindi niyumvira  atari urupapuro rwanje rw'umutsindo. Nariko ndategekanya ingene nzokwigira ibibazo vyimirije, ico gukora, ico kureka, nkora ikirangaminsi, ngerageza kuraba ko ibintu vyose vyokorwa neza. Abantu batandukanye batanguye kugira ubwoba igihe aba Taliban bariko barafata intara, ariko jewe n'abandi ntitwigeze twibaza ko vyoshitse bagafata Kabul. Ubuzima bwanje bwari busanzwe kugeza aho bafatiye Mazar-i-Sharif (igisagara kinini mu buraruko bushira uburengero bwa Kabul, cari gisanzwe kiterekwa aba Taliban). Hanyuma bashika Kabul. Harumvikanye amasasu hanyuma tuja twumva ngo aba Taliban bakwiye  mu bice vyose vy'igisagara. Kuva ico gihe, nta na kimwe casubiye kuba uko cahora. Abandi bose bo mu muryango wanje bagumye muhira. Imangazini zose zarugawe, ibiciro vyaguma biduga kw'isaha kw'isaha, n'urugero rwo kuvunja amafaranga rwaguma ruhindagurika vuba. Naciye nturira impapuro zanje zose zo kuri kaminuza. Naraturiye impapuro zanje zose zerekana amanota naronse. Nabikoreye kw'ibaraza. Nari mfise ibitabo vyinshi, ibitabo vyiza cane, nariko ndasoma. Vyose narabinyegeje. Narivanye ku mbuga hwaniro zose nariko. Nabwiwe ko vyari kumbera ikibazo kuba mfise ivyo nanditse canke nashize kuri izo mbuga canke kubandanya uri kuri zo. Aba Taliban bashobora kuba baraba ivyo twashizeko bakadutora. Facebook niyo yari ingorane ikomeye kuko nayijako cane. Nari mfise ivyo nari naranditse kera mvuga ko aba Taliban ataco bari kugira, ko nari kwihagararako imbere yabo, ko batashobora guhagarika uburenganzira bwanje bwo kwiga, ko batashobora kunyugaranira i muhira.Nabise abakora iterabwoba. Ivyo nari nanditse vyarabatyoza, nta nkeka. None vyose babikoze mu minsi mike gusa. Vyandengeye, biranteye ubwoba, birambabaje. Aba Taliban bamenyesheje ko abagore bokwambara mu buryo bw'ingene vyamye bikorwa kuva kera kandi bakambara hijab. Abantu bambara burka na hijab kubera ugutinya. Narumvise aho mu mashure amwe ya kaminuza usanga hari igitambara (rideau) hagati y'abanyeshure b'abahungu n'abakobwa. Imiryango imwe imwe ntireka abana bayo b'abakobwa ngo baje kw'ishure.  Kubera abantu bose bazi ko aba Taliban gushika ubu batarerekana isura yabo y'ukuri, ariko akaba ata nkeka ko bazoyerekana, abantu bashaka rero kwirinda ingorane niyo vyashika. Nararavye ikiganiro c'aba Taliban n'abamenyeshamakuru (ku wa kabiri -aho bemeye uburenganzira bw'abagore). Barabesha, ndazi neza ko babesha. Narasohotse  ku wa kabiri ndi kumwe na data tugiye kurondera umuti. Vyose vyari vyugaye. Nategerejwe kwambara hijab ifuka hose, hari n'abambara burka, n'abakobwa bafise hagati y'imyaka 13 na 14.Nta na hamwe bihuriye n'uko vyahora. Umenga igisagara carimutse. Aba Taliban bariko baratembera mu micungararo. Barakuraba  niyo woba wambaye hijab ikwiye hose - nk'uko umenga nturi  umuntu asanzwe, nk'uko umenga nibo baganza ubuzima bwawe, nk'uko umenga uru umucafu wo guta. Uko niko bakuraba mw'ibarabara. Igihe nari nciga, niyumvira gushika ku bintu vyinshi, imigambi n'intego z'ubuzima. Ubu none nibaza ko nzotegerezwa kuva muri iki gihugu , kuko ndi umu-Hezara. Muri kahise barateye amashure y'abakobwa b'aba-Hazara, bica amajana. Urumva nta nkeka bazotwica, kumbure badusambanye ku nguvu, batwice. Nk'umukobwa nkongera kandi mu  bwoko bw'inkehwa, nta kibanza mfise mu gihugu canje. Bose mu muryango wanje bafise ubwoba. Tuguma tugerageza kuva umunsi wa mbere aba Taliban binjira kugira turabe ingene twova muri iki gihugu, biciye mu mategeko canke bidaciye mu mategeko. Ikibuga c'indege cuzuyeko abantu benshi, nta bibanza bisigaye vyo guhungisha abantu, kandi ibihugu biriko biranka kutwakira, kandi abantu bose, bose baguma baraba nk'uko umengo nta kiriko kiraba. Ikintu gikuru  nosaba ama reta y'ibihugu vyo hanze n'uko bitokwemera aba Talaban nka reta ya Afghanistan. Kuko babikoze, tuzoba dupfuye, kumbure turi hasi kurusha abapfuye, ninde yobimenya. Ariko ikimbabaza cane kuruta kubona igisagara canje nkunda n'umutima wanje wose gifatwa - aha si ukuvuga ko ntwawe n'ikibabarwe - ariko ikimbaza gusumba n'uko amakungu ari mu gacerere. Abantu bose bibereye mu gacerere. Abo bantu bose ataco banezwe, bigira nk'uko umenga abanya-Afghanistan si abantu. Ivyo rero birambaza cane  ku mutima. Baravuga ngo , "Ubuntu ku bantu bose". Ariko nibaza ko ivyo bwikiye kuvugwa gutya, "Ubuntu kuri bose, kiretse abanya-Afghanistan".  Ariko sinigeze nibaza ko vyoshitse ngaha. Biravuna umutima kubona mu minsi mike gusa, ibintu vyose narota gushikako, ibintu vyose nibaza ko noronse, vyose vyayonze. BBC ntivuga izina ry'umugore nyene iyi  nkuru ku mvo z'umutekano wiwe

headline: Amatora ya Kenya: kurima urumogi no kugurisha ubumara bw’inzoka, imigambi ya George Wajackoyah
text: George Wajackoyah , umunyaporitike yahoze ari umwana wo mw’ibarabara muri Kenya, hanyuma akaja gukora akazi ko kwimba imva mu Bwongereza, yabaye igitangaza muri poritike ya Kenya mu kwiyamamariza ikibanza c’umukuru w’iki gihugu, aho yemerera abanyagihugu ko azokigira igihugu gikomeye gishora hanze urumogi, ubumara bw’inzoka hamwe n’amatengatwa y’imfyisi, n’aho hari ibibazo vyinshi ku kungene yoshobora gushira mu ngiro iyi migambi. Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza afise imyaka 63, akaba yize amategeko, yiyerekanye nk’umuntu atandukanye cane mu bakandida bane bariko biyamamariza iki kibanza c’umukuru w’ico gihugu co muri Afrika y’Ubuseruko mu matora ategekanijwe kuba ku wa 9 z’ukwezi kuza kwa Myandagaro (8). Ibiharuro ngereranyo biha amahirwe make cane uyu mukandida w’umugambwe Roots Party, mu kibanza ca gatatu – ibiharuro vya nyuma biheruka gusohoka ku wa 11 z’uku kw’indwi bikaba bimuha amajwi 4% gusa. Ariko abahinga babona ko nk’umuntu ari bwo bwa mbere yiyamamaje, ariko avyifatamwo neza kandi n’abakandida babiri bakomeye barafise ubwoba bwo gutakaza ijwi rimwe gusa ryohava rimwegukira, na rirya babona ko bitazokworoha hagati y’aba babiri, ibiharuro bigashira imbere uwahoze ari umunyaporitike akomeye atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi Raila Odinga ku majwi 43% hanyuma icegera c’umukuru w’igihugu nawe William Ruto agahabwa 39%. Macharia Gaitho, umunyamakuru yandika mu kinyamakuru Daily Nation ca Kenya, yandika ati: "Wajackoyah ariko yiyamamaza mu buryo atari ubw’igitangaza ku buryo abantu bo mu gisagara bashobora no kumutwenga, ariko ntagushidikanya ko ariko ahurumbirwa n’urwaruka rwinshi rurakaye, rutishimiye ubutegetsi haba mu bisagara canke ruguru mu mitumba ya kure muri Kenya, kuko arengera ibintu vyose bisanzwe bitandukanya abanya-Kenya nk’amoko, intara n’imigambwe”. Mu myiyamamazo, Prof Wajackoyah yiyambarira ibisanzwe, ipantaro yo kwinonora imitsi (tracksuit), agapira n’igitambara mu mutwe, hakwambara za kositime (costume) – kugira ngo yerekane ko atari mu banya-Kenya basanzwe bari ku butegetsi, aba nabo akaba abagiriza igiturire kirenze urugero. Yerekana intoke ziwe nk’uwuriko aranywa urumogi, agasarisha abantu bitabira amakoraniro yiwe mu gutamba umuziki wa reggae. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko aramutse atsinze azorekura ukurima no kwimbura urumogi kugira ngo rukoreshwe mu mahinguriro no mu buvuzi, mu ntumbero yo gutorera umuti zibiri mu ngorane nyamukuru za Kenya – ubushomeri n’amadeni y’umurengera. Avuga ko ashobora kwinjiriza Kenya imiriyaridi zirenga ibihumbi icenda vy’amashilingi ya Kenya  (ni ukuvuga imiriyaridi 76 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika) ku mwaka, kandi ko reta itazigera “isubira gusaba ingurane y’urufaranga na rumwe”. Yongerako ati: "Ibihugu vyo mu burengero vyaramaze gutanga uburenganzira bwo kwimbura urumogi, kubera iki tweho tutobikora?” N’aho ata bushakashatsi yishimikiza mu vyo avuga, kurekura ukurima n’ukwimbura urumogi kugira rukoreshwe mu mahinguriro no mu buvuzi nico imyiyamamazo yiwe ihagazeko. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw’ikigo Africa Check ruvuga ko imigambi yiwe idatomoye. Hagati aho, ibi vyamutumye avugwa cane ku mbuga hwaniro, mbere n’urwaruka rwinshi ruhanzwe bikomeye n’ubushomeri rukaba rumwirukira. Mu gihe imigambi ya Prof Wajackoyah yoshirwa mu ngiro, Kenya yoba yinjiye ku rutonde rw’ibindi bihugu vya Afrika - harimwo Lesotho, Afrika y’Epfo, Zambia na Zimbabwe – biriko biradodora kw’isoko ry’urumogi abahinga babona ko gushika mu 2028 rizoba rigeze ku miriyaridi zababa 70 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko atarigera anywa urumogi, ariko ko mu gihe rwokwemerwa n’amategeko, ko yoba uwa mbere mu kurunywa. Ati: "Nta kibi na kimwe kirimwo mu kurunywa iyo rwemewe n’amategeko kandi inzego zibijejwe zikemeza ko rushobora kunyobwa”. Ivyiyumviro vya Prof Wajackoyah biriyamirizwa na Ekleziya Katorika muri Kenya, aho ivuga ko kunywa ibiyayuramutwe vyokwunyuka mu gihe amategeko yorekura urumogi. Musenyeri James Maria Wainaina  avuga ati: "Imiryango irahanzwe n’ibiyayuramutwe biyitera gusambuka, indyane n’impfu rimwe rimwe”. Prof Wajackoyah yemereye kandi abanyagihugu gusubiramwo amasezerano yose reta ya Perezida Uhuru Kenyatta yahaye amakompanyi y’Abashinwa. Mu madeni Kenya ifitiye ibihugu n’amashirahamwe yo hanze, Ubushinwa bufisemwo 21%, ivyateje induru mu gihugu, na cane cane ko ibiri muri aya masezerano – amenshi akaba ari ay’ibikorwa remezo, nko kwubaka amabarabara hamwe n’indarayi – bitashizwe ahabona. Prof Wajackoyah abona kandi ko kworora inzoka ari irindi soko rikomeye ry’ubutunzi bwa Kenya. Avuga ko ubumara bw’inzoka – aho avuga ko “buzimvye cane gusumba inzahabu” – buzokwimburwa mu ntumbero yo kubukoresha mu buvuzi, mu gihe inyama y’inzoka nayo izoshorwa mu bihugu vyo hanze nk’Ubushinwa, aho ifatwa nk’imfungurwa ikomeye. N’aho adatanga ivyemezo ivyo ari vyo vyose, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ati: "Turashobora kwinjiza umuriyaridi w’amadorari buri mwaka tugakomeza ubutunzi bwacu”. Avuga kandi ko Kenya ishobora gushora amatengatwa y’imfyisi asanzwe akoreshwa mu buvuzi mu Bushinwa, akavuga ko ashobora kwinjiriza Kenya amafaranga menshi gusumba urumogi. Amashirahamwe ajejwe amashamba be n’ihuriro ry’abaganga b’ibikoko muri Kenya baramwiyamiriza n’uburakari bwinshi. Iri shirahamwe ry’abaganga b’ibikoko basohoye itangazo bavuga bati: "Urudandaza rw’amatengatwa y’imfyisi hamwe n’inzoka ntirwemewe kandi rwotuma ibikoko vyo mw’ishamba bihahonera”. Iri tangazo ryongerako y’uko "vyotuma haduka ikindi kiza " kuko hoba imigera ikwirakwira ivuye mu mfyinsi no mu nzoka ikabangamira kiremwamuntu. N’aho abamunegura bamwagiriza kwiyemera mu myiyamamazo yiwe (populist), abanywanyi ba Prof Wajackoyah baramwishimiye kuko yashoboye kurengana ingorane nyinshi yaciyemwo mu buzima gushika aho yiyamamariza kuba umukuru w’igihugu. Yavukiye mu mitumba ya kure mu burengero bwa Kenya. Abavyeyi biwe bamaze kwahukana, yisanzwe asigaye aba mw’ibarabara ku mugwa mukuru, Nairobi. Yagiye gutorwa n’abasenzi bo mu rugensero rwa Hare Krishna bari basanzwe bagaburira abadafise aho baba. Prof Wajackoyah yabaye mu rusengero mbere aza kuba n’umupasitori wa Hare Krishna. Yahavuye aronka ubufasha arashobora kurangiza amashure yiwe yisumbuye mu nyuma yinjira mu gipolisi ca Kenya, agenda atera imbere gushika aho yinjira mu gisata kijejwe igendereza. N'aho adatomora neza, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko yahuye n'ikibazo inyuma yo kuronka amakuru akomeye kuri bumwe mu bwicanyi bukomeye muri Kenya, ubwakorewe umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire Robert Ouko mu 1990. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko yahagaritswe agakorerwa iyicarubozo, amaze kurekurwa aca arahunga afashijwe n’ibiro vy’ubuserukizi bwa Amerika i Nairobi. Igandagurwa rya Ouko ryagumye ari ikinyegezwa ku banyagihugu gushika aho amatohoza y’inama nshingamateka mu 2010 yerekaniye ko yagandaguriwe kuri umwe mu mihana y’uwari umukuru w’igihugu ico gihe, Daniel arap Moi. Amaze guhunga Kenya, Prof Wajackoyah yaronse akaryo ko kuja mu Bwongereza, aho yakoze ubuzi bubayabaye aca aronka akaryo ko kwiga ku ma kaminuza, Soas University of London, University of Warwick hamwe na University of Wolverhampton. Igihe yiga  i Wolverhampton yakora akazi k’ubuzamu, akazi ko kwimba imva no kwoza ibiziga (imirambo mu Kinyarwanda) kugira ngo aronke ubuzima. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Nation ko ubu buzi bwamuhaye "ukwicisha bugufi no gukura”. Avuga ko uku kwiga akora n’akazi vyatumye aronka amanota atari meza mu vyigwa vy’amategeko. Yagize uruhara mu masekeza ya poritike mu Bwongereza mu ntumbero yo guhimiriza impinduka mu turere dutandukanye tw’isi – akaba yaranakoranye n’uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Ghana Jerry Rawlings, yashitse ku butegetsi abanje gutembagaza ubwari buhari mu 1981 akaba yarongoye igihugu gushika mu 2000. Prof Wajackoyah yahavuye yimukira muri Amerika, aho yagiye kubonanira n’umugore wiwe w’umunyamerikakazi akomoka muri Afrika. Bavugwa ko bafitaniye abana batatu. Yarize kandi no ku makaminuza atandukanye muri Amerika, harimwo na Walden University ikorera ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, ari nayo  yaronkeyemwo urupapuro rw’umutsindo rwa Doctorat (PhD). Avuga ko afise impapuro z’umutsindo za kaminuza zigera kuri 17, nyinshi zikaba ari izo mu bisata vy’abimukira, amategeko mpuzamakungu n’ay’impunzi, ivyatumye Gaitho avuga n’agahemo ko afise “impapuro z’umutsindo nyinshi gusumba umwanya yategerezwa kwiga kugira yige ivyo vyigwa vyose”. Prof Wajackoyah yagarutse muri Kenya mu 2010 avuga ko yashaka kwiyamamariza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu. Ico gihe yaciye abivamwo, akaba asubiye kuvyura iciyumviro muri ano matora. Mu bindi bitabonwa kumwe yemerera abanyagihugu mu myiyamamazo yiwe, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko azoteza imbere ubuzima bw’abakozi mu gushiraho imisi ine y’akazi mu ndwi kugira ngo ahe umwanya wo gusenga aba-Islam kuwa gatanu, Abasabato ku wa gatandatu abandi bakritsu nabo ku wa Mungu. Prof Wajackoyah avuga kandi ko azogarukana igihano c’urupfu, kandi ko abo bose bazokwagirwa no kurya igiturire bazohitishwamwo kwicwa barashwe, canke kumanikwa “bahejeje kurya ubugari”.

headline: Interbank Burundi yagirizwa kurekura amahera $1.500.000 yo gufasha imirwi y'abarwanyi
text: Ubushikirizamanza bw'Uburundi buragiriza ibanki Interbank Burundi ko yoba ifasha mu buryo bw'amafaranga imirwi ihungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'aho abakozi b'ishami ry'ibanki Trust Merchant Bank riri Uvira muri Kongo bafatanywe amahera angana na 1.500.000 y'amadolari kw'ibarabara Bujumbura-Katumba mu ndwi iheze. Interbank Burundi yamirira kure ivyo yagirizwa. Mu rubanza rw''ikibiriraho rwabaye ejo ku munsi wa gatatu muri sentare y'iyungururizo ya Mukaza i Bujumbura, umushingwamanza yaragirije Interbank ko iriko ihungabanya ubutunzi bw'igihugu mu bikorwa vy'uguhanahana amafaranga y'agaciro na Trust Merchant Bank. Interbank Burundi yagirizwa ko ihonyanga amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ku biraba ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga y'agaciro mu gihugu. Ubushikirizamanza buvuga ko amakuru bufise yerekana ko amahera yafatiwe mu Gatumba yoba yari agiye gufasha imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho iri mu gihugu ca Kongo, ariko ko ari amakuru bagitohoza. Busaba ko iyo banki yotangishwa ihadabu y'imiliyaridi 44, ikongera igatanga n'indishi y'akababaro ingana n'imiliyaridi 50 z'amafaranga y'amarundi yohabwa leta y'Uburundi. Interbank Burundi irahakana ivyo birego, ikavuga ko igikorwa cayo ari kuba umuhuza hagati y'ibanki Trust Merchant Bank isanzwe iri i Kinshasa n'ishami ryayo riri Uvira. Ivuga ko ari igikorwa yari isanzwe ikora kuva mu mwaka wa 2014. Nayo kuvyo yagirizwa ko ihungabanya ubutunzi bw'igihugu, abunganirizi ba Interbank Burundi muvyo amategeko barabihakana, bakavuga ahubwo ko ivyo bituma igihugu kironka amafaranga y'agaciro. Vyitezwe ko urubanza ruzosomwa mu kiringo kitarenze iminsi cumi.

headline: Ukraine: Russia yatanze agahengwe mu bisagara bibiri kugira abahunga bahunge ariko ntikubahirijwe
text: Ingabo z'Uburusiya zabandanije zicucagira ibibombe mu gisagara ca Mariupol kuri uno wa gatandatu, mu gihe bwari bwemeye gutanga agahengwe mu masaha yo mu gitondo - ibi bikaba vyatumye ibikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu bihagarara. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya  bwari bwatangaje  ko butanze agahengwe kuva isaha zine mu masaha ya Moscou mu bisagara bibiri vya  Mariupol na Volnovakha  kugira ngo abasivire bashobore kuva muri ibi bisagara. Ni nyuma y'uko umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol asabiye ko botanga agahengwe ku banyagihugu mu gihe kibandanya kizingurijwe, hamwe n'ico yita ibitero vy'ubugome vy'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya buvuga ko iyi yari ingingo yumvikanyweko n'abategetsi ba Ukraine. Umwe mu baba muri iki gisagara ati: "Ubu ndi muri Mariupol, ndi kw'ibarabara, uko iminota itatu canke itanu iheze numva ibibombe". "Agahengwe katanzwe kugira ngo abantu bashobore gukura meza ntikubahirijwe. Mbona n'amamodoka y'abantu bari bagerageje guhunga ariko aragaruka. Ni akajagari gusa". Kari agahenwe katanzwe inyuma y'aho Vadym Boichenko umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol asohoreye itangazo n'umubabaro mwinshi asaba ko amayira y'iki gisagara yokwugururwa kugira abahunga bahunge kuko ata kundi bari bugire. Ati: "Mariupol si amabarabara n'amazu, ni abanyagihugu bayo". Niko gahengwe ka mbere nk'aka kari gatanzwe kuva Uburusiya butanguye igitero ku gihugu ca Ukraine haraciye imisi cumi. Uburusiya buvuga ko bwumvikanye kwugurura amayira hanze y'ibi bisagara. Boichenko ati: "Bivanye n'uko abaduteye babandanya baducucagira amabombe ata kigongwe, nta kundi turi bugire atari uko twoha abahaba … akaryo ko kuva muri Mariupol mu mahoro". Haciye amasaha atatu aka gahengwe kategerezwa gutangura isaha zine mu masaha ya Moscou gatangajwe, abategetsi ba Mariupol bahavuye batangaza ko igikorwa cari gitegekanijwe co guhungisha abantu cahagaze kubera ibibombe vyabandanije vyisukira. Itangazo basohoye rivuga riti: "Dusavye abantu i Mariupol gusubira mu mazu yabo, turabamenyesha ibijanye no kubahungisha ni vyakunda". "Kubera Uburusiya butariko burubahiriza agahengwe bukabandanya butera Mariupol no mu micungararo yayo, ivyo guhungisha abantu bibaye birabangira". Uburusiya ntaco buratangaza kuri ibi bivugwa, ariko umushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi butangaza ko abasivire batakoresheje amayira yari yuguruye kuva i Mariupol na  Volnovakha bwongera bwagiriza abategetsi ba Ukraine ko ari bo babujije abantu guhunga, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'Uburusiya. Mariupol ni igisagara kiri ku nkengera y'inyanja mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine gituwemwo n'abantu 450.000, kikaba kigoswe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya kakdn ikbandanya giterwa amabombe. Mu gihe coramuka gifashwe, koba ari akaryo Uburusiya buronse bwo kugenzura kimwe mu bivuko bikomeye vy'igihugu ca Ukraine kandi bugaca buronka umuhora ufatanya ya ntara ya Crimée/Crimea bwigarurira mu 2014 hamwe na twa turere twiganziwe n'inyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya mu ntara za Luhansk na Donetsk, Volnovakha yoyo ni agasagara gato kari mu buraruko bwa Mariupol kakaba karangwamwo intambara zikomeye kuva iki gitero gitangura.

headline: Aung San Suu Kyi: Uwo yatembagajwe ku butegetsi bwa Myanmar yaciriwe iyindi myaka ine yo gupfungwa
text: Sentare yo muri Myanmar yaciriye Aung San Suu Kyi yakuwe ku butegetsi iyindi myaka ine yo gupfungwa, mu rubanza rwa vuba muri nyinshi zimurindiriye. Yahamijwe icaha co gutunga no kwinjiza mu gihugu  bitemewe n'amategeko amaradiyo yo gutumatumanako (talkie-walkies) hamwe no kurenga ku ngingo za Covid-19. Madame Suu Kyi yagiriwe n'icaha ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa 12, aca acirirwa igihano kigufi  c'imyaka ibiri yo gupfungwa. Asanzwe apfunzwe kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri igihe igisirikare catembagaza ubutegetsi bwiwe ubu akaba ahanganye n'ibirego vy'ivyaha birenga 10, vyose akaba abihakana. Vyariyamirijwe cane nk'akarenganyo. Vyibazwa ko ivyaha vyo kuri uyu wa mbere vyavuye mu gihe abasirikare basaka inzu yiwe ku munsi haba itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ingabo zari zirongowe na jenerari  Min Aung Hlaing, uwo munsi akaba ariho bavuze ko batoye ivyo ibintu muri iyo nzu. Urubanza rwo kuri uyu wa mbere ku murwa mukuru Nay Pyi Taw nta binyamakuru vyemerewe kurukirira, abacamanza ba Madame Suu Kyi nabo bakaba barabujijwe kuvugana n'abamenyeshamakuru. Ico gihano ca vuba giciye kimushikana  ku myaka itandatu yo gufungwa. Mu kwezi guheze uwo yatsindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel yahamijwe  guhamagarira abantu kutumvira ubutegetsi no kurenga ku mategeko ya Covid-19, mu ciyamirijwe n'umukuru w'urwego rwa ONU  rw'agateka ka zina muntu Michelle Bachelet nk'"urubanza rw'akamaramaza". Human Rigjhts Watch  nayo  yavuze ko izo manza ari "ikinamico ya sentare y'imanza zo mu kinyegero ku vyaha vy'irementanya… kugirango (Aung San Suu Kyi) azohere mw'ibohero". Itangazo ry'icegera c'umuyobozi w'iryo shirahamwe muri Asia, Phil Robertson, ryagirije kandi igisirikare "kumuhamya ivyaha muri sentare ijejwe kumuhezayo ku birego bidafashe kandi bishingiye ku mvo za poritike", rivuga ko "cirengagiza uburenganzira bw'abantu bose, kuva kuri Suu Kyi… gushika ku mihari y'abatayoboka ubutegetsi  mu mabarabara." Ifatwa ry'ubutegetsi n'igisirikare muri Myanmar (kizwi kandi nka Birmanie/Burma) mu kwezi kwa kabiri ryabaye haheze  amezi umugambwe wa San Suu Kyi, National League for Democracy (NLD), utsinze urukombamazi amatora yo mu kwezi kwa 11 mu 2020. Igisirikare cavuze  ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ariko abakurikirana amatora bavuze ko muri rusangi yagenze neza. Itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi ryakiriwe n'imyiyerekano mu gihugu cose, igisikare ca Myamar kikaba kitihanganiye abitaba iyo myiyerekano basaba demokrasi, abaharanira uburenganzira hamwe n'abamenyeshamakuru. Madame Suu Kyi ni umwe mu bantu barenga 10.600 bafashwe n'igisirikare kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri, mu gihe abandi barenga 1.303 bishwe mu myiyerekano nk'uko bivugwa n'umugwi ubikurikirana, Assistance Association for Political Prisoners.

headline: Afghanistan: Uwahoze atwara igihugu Ashraf Ghani yasavye imbabazi z'uko yahuze
text: Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Afghanistan Ashraf Ghani yasavye imbabazi abanya-Afghanistan inyuma yo kuva mu gihugu akaja mu buhungiro muri Emirats Arabes Unis (United Arab Emirates). Yavuze ari : "Kuva muri Kabul niyo yabaye ngingo ya mbere  igoye cane mu buzima bwanje," aca yongerako ko asavye imbabazi kuko "ntabona ukundi ryari kurangira". Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Ghani yahunze Afghanistan ubutarariye igihe aba-Taliban bari basugereje umurwa mukuru Kabul ku wa 15 ukwezi kw'umunani. Avuga ko atifuza guheba abanyagihugu ariko ko "yari yo nzira yonyene". Mw'itangazo yashize no kuri  Twitter ku wa gatatu, Ghani yavuze ko ata kundi yari afise yari kugira atari ukuva mu gihugu kugira ntihabe intureka mu gihugu cose. "Nahavuye ndabisabwe n'bajejwe umutekano ku kirimba, bangiriye inama ko kugumaho vyotuma haba intambara yo mu mabarabara nk'uko vyagenze mu gisagara igihe c'intambara yo hagati mu gihugu mu myaka ya 1990", abandanya avuga ko yabikoze kugira "akize   Kabul n'abantu imiriyoni 6 bayibamwo". Yavuze ko yari amaze imyaka 20 yitanga kugira Afghanistan kibe igihugu kirangwa na "demokrasi, kiroraniwe kandi cigenga". Uyo yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu yongeye guhakana "ibitagira aho bishingiye" bivugwa ko yahunganye amafaranga angana na miriyoni 169  z'ama dorari (hafi miriyaridi 338 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 72, yaneguwe cane n'abandi banyaporitike bo muri Afghanistan kubera guta igihugu, yavuze ko azosigura "ingene ibintu vyagenze gushika aho ata akagenda"  mu minsi mike iri imbere. Mw'ijambo ry'ikibiriraho kuri Facebook ku wa 18 ukwezi kw'umunani, Ghani yavuze ko "yahatiwe" kuva muri Afghanistan n'abamucungerera umutekano kuko "hari ivyago vyinshi ko nashobora gufatwa nkicwa". Yavuze ko igihe aba-Taliban binjira ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu i Kabul, "batanguye kundondera icumba ku kindi". Ahakana ibivugwa ko yagiye atwaye amafaranga menshi mu guhunga igihugu, Ghani yavuze ko "atemerewe no gukura isandari ngo yambare ibirato". Muri iyi ndwi, aba-Taliban bamaze indwi zitatu bafashe  igihugu,  baratangaje abagize reta ata mugore n'umwe arimwo. Ku wa gatatu, abagore baharurwa mu mirongo muri Kabul no mu ntara ya Badakhshan yo mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Afghanistan baragize imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo reta nshasha bavuga ko batazokwemera reta itagiramwo   abashikiranganji b'abagore.

headline: Amasasu ku murwa mukuru wa Somalia mu myiyerekano y'amatora
text: Amasasu menshi yasiranye ku murwa mukuru wa Somalia mu gihe  indongozi z'abatavuga rumwe na reta barenze ku ngingo ibuza amakoraniro y'abantu benshi mu kugira imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ugucereza amatora. Ikiringo c'umukuru w'igihugu caheze ku ndwi iheze ariko hadatowe uwumusubirira bituma Sonalia ija mu mayirabiri ya politike. Mw'ijoro, reta yavuze ko abantu bitwaje ibigwnisho bateye ibirindiro vy'ingabo za reta i Mogadisho hafi y'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu. Menshi mu mabarabara yo muri ico gisagara yugawe, ingabo zidasanzwe nazo ziragomorwa. Prezida Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed, azwi kandi nka "Farmajo", yitezwe kugira  inama n'abakuru b'intara zitanu zigize Somalia mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kurangiza izo ngorane. Indege ziva mu bindi bihugu zigana ikibuga gikuru c'indege ca Mogadishu zahagaritswe kujayo kubera amasasu na vya muzinga vyasirana mu micungararo y'ico kibuga, nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamakuru wa BBC Bella Hassan ari muri ico gisagara. Imyiyerekano y'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi yariko irabera kw'ibarabara rikuru ry'ikibuga c'indege igihe ayo masasu yaduka. Amakuru avuga ko abajejwe umutekano barashe mu kirere kugira bashwiragize abari mu myiyerekano. Umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano Farah Omar yabwiye Reuters kuri telephone ati: "Ingabo nyinshi zaduteye, ubu nubitse inda mu kayira." Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryavuze ko rihagaritswe umutima cane n'imishamirano hagati y'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi n'inzego zijejwe umutekano mw'ijoro ryakeye no ku wa gatanu mu gitobndo. Ryasavye ko haba "'ituze n'ukwifata ku mpanse zose" n'uko "amayira yo kuvugana aguma yuguruye kugira icuka kibi kigabanuke".

headline: Tanzania uko ndayibona: Ivyo Prezida Samia amaze gushikako mu mwaka umwe
text: Mu makete y'abamenyeshamakuru b'abanya-Afrika, Sammy Awami arasubiza amaso inyuma ku kugene Tanzania yahindutse mu mwaka umwe kuva Samia Suluhu Hassan abaye umugore wa mbere abaye ategetse ico gihugu inyuma y'urupfu rwa prezida John Pombe Magufuli. Iyo igipimo c'umunezezo canke ukwishima gifatwa mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, cari kwerekana ko aba-Tanzania bari mu bantu ba mbere banezerewe kw'isi, nk'uko bivugwa n'aba-Tanzania bamwe bamwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu mayinga make aheze, prezida Samia Suluhu Hassan, azwi cane gusa nka Mama Samia, yarabonanye na babiri mu ndongozi z'umugambwe uza imbere mu yitavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, Chadema, Tundu Lissu na  Freeman Mbowe, ibintu atawari gushobora gucisha mu mutwe haraheze umwaka. Lissu aba mu buhungiro inyuma yo kuraswa amasasu 16 mu 2007 mu kugerageza kumwica vyafashwe ko vyari bifise imvo ya poritike. Mbowe aherutse kuva mu munyororo, aho yari apfungiwe kuva afashwe yagirizwa ivyaha vy'iterabwoba mu kwezi kw'indwi igihe yari yiteguriye kugirisha ikoraniro ryo gusaba ko hagira ibihindurwa mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro. Umunyamategeko akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira cane Fatma Karume yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "NDAKWISHIMIYE, SSH [Samia Suluhu Hassan]. Lissu nawe nyene arakwishimiye." Haraheze umwaka, Tanzania cari ikindi gihugu. Ico gihe prezida John Pombe Magufuli yabona ko abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ari ibikoresho vy'inyungu z'abanyamahanga. Ururimi rwiwe ku batavuga rumwe na reta zari inguvu, kandi yari yihaye ihangiro ryo kuzimanganya poritike ishingiye ku migambwe myinshi. Kuba ibintu vyarahindutse nta n'umwe atavyemera mu mice yose ya poritike. Lissu avuga ati: "Si ndi umuntu agenda arakoma amashi, [ariko] hari ibintu Mama Samia yatanguye gukora neza. Kandi kubera yatanguye gukora ibintu neza, tuzomushigikira abikore neza gusumba." Ikidahurizwako n'ukumenya niba prezida Samia ivyo ariko arahindura akwiye kubishimirwa vyose. Tanzania yabaye igihugu gitwazwa igitugu ku mugambwe n'ubu ariwo utwara, Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM), ubu arongoye. Yari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu muri reta yakoze uko ishobora ngo izimanganye ukutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi no guta abantu mu munyororo ku mpamvu zo kuyinegura gusa. Kunyuruza abantu, kubura abandi irengero, ku mvo bivugwa ko ari iza poritike, vyarakozwe kuri reta yazamwo ubwa kabiri mu butegetsi bwayo. Hari n'ikibazo co kumenya niba ashaka gushira mu mategeko impinduka ziriko ziraba. Nyinshi zisa n'izishingiye ku gushaka kw'umukuru w'igihugu ubwiwe gusa. Nk'akarorero, mu gihe kubonana n'abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ari intambwe nziza mu kwubaka icizere, amategeko agenga imigambwe adahurizwako ntarahinduka. Ivyo biha urwego rujejwe imigambwe ububasha bwagutse kandi budatomoye neza bwo gufuta umugambwe no guha igihano co gupfungwa gushika ku mwaka uwo ariwe wese yihaye igikorwa co kwigisha ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, nko gushishikariza abanyagihugu kwiyandikisha kugira bazokwitabe amatora. Ni nk'uko, n'ubwo ibihano ku binyamakuru vyinshi vyavanyweho, itegeko ryo 2016 rigenga ibimenyeshamakuru, iryo mu 2018 rigenga ibinyamakuru vyo ku mbuga hwaniro n'iryo mu 2015 rigenga ivyaha biciye mu kwinjira mu mashini (Cybercrimes), ayo yose ntarahinduka mu gihe ariyo yakomeje ukubuza ibinyamakuru gukorera mu bwigenge akanabikwegera ibihano nko guhagarikwa canke kwugarwa. Ico prezida Samia yakoze ubu n'uguhagarika umuhindimuko wo gushika ku ntwaro y'igitugu idateye amazi. Yasubije igihugu mu gihe c'imbere ya 2015, ariko nta kinini arakora kugira ahindure amategeko yatumye uwo yasubiriye akandamiza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi. Ariko ivyo amaze gukora mu nzira ya poritike yihanganira abandi vyerekana ko umukuru w'igihugu ashaka kugira ivyo ahindura. Ariko vyerekana kandi ko ari mu mayirabiri hagati yo kubandanya impinduka no kugumiza umugambwe arongoye ku butegetsi.  Nk'akarorero, abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutetegetsi babonanye n'ubu ntibarekuriwe gukoresha amakoraniro. Ariko birasa n'uko ibiriko birahinduka bizorama. Ico cizere kiva mu kwibaza ko prezida Samia ubu yamaze gufata mu minwe umugambwe uri ku butegetsi. Mu mezi ya mbere Magufuli agipfa, yategerezwa kwama ariko aributsa abamwumva ko n'umukuru w'umugore ategerezwa kwubahwa no kwizerwa. Ico gihe abashikiranganji basa n'abashaka kwubaha ivyo bishakiye mu mategeko yabaha. Kimwe mu bishobora kugagaza kuba ubutegetsi bwiwe buguma bukomera n'ifungurwa rya Mbowe - inyuma y'urubanza rwiwe rwamaze amezi umunani kandi ata vyagiriji, abantu nabo badasiba gusaba ko urubanza rwiwe rwofutwa. Vyibazwa ko rwahebwe kuko yihagazeko imbere y'abasigaye bakiri ku ngendo ya Magufuli baterekwa impinduka ziwe. Bamwe bagereranya ibiriko birahinduka nko ku gihe ca prezida Jakaya Kikwete, umwe mu bo Samia yafatirako akaba ari nawe  yatwaye imbere ya Magufuli. Uburyo bwiwe bwo gutwara bwari ubwo gushira abantu hamwe,  amatati ya poritike n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi akenshi yakemurirwa mu biganiro ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu bariko barasangira icayi n'utwuzango. Ivyo vyatuma reta isa n'iyidakoresha amategeko acinyiza. Aho umuntu afatira icizere n'uko hanagarutse poritike z'ubutunzi ziha ikibanza abikorera ku giti cabo. Abanyamitahe b'abanyamahanga bariko barareshwa cane, ibihugu vya Buraya bisigaye birabwa nk'ivyo gufashanya mw'iterambere aho kuba ibishaka kwiganza canke kuba "mabeberu," ni ukuvuga amasuguru (impfizi) y'impene - ijambo ry'akagaye ryakoreshwa na Magufuli. Hamwe na kahise ke ko guharanira agateka ka zina muntu binyuze mu gukorera hamwe, n'amamuko yiwe yo muri Zanzibar aharangwa umuco wo kwicisha bugufi no kwakira abandi, nta gitangaje ko agira ingendo itandukanye mu gutwara. Ariko ashobora guhura n'abatavyuma kumwe na we bakomeye cane muri CCM, hamwe, nk'akarorero, yokwemera ko haba amatora kamarampaka ku mpinduka mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro, ikintu abatavuga rumwe na reta n'abashigikiye demokrasi baguma basaba, kuko vyogabanya ububasha bw'umugambwe wiwe ku butegetsi. Prezida Samia yashitse ku butegetsi mu bihe  vy'igitangaza, mu gihugu n'ingendo ya poritike vyiganziwe n'ijwi ry'abagabo  vyatejwe imbere cane n'uwo yasubiriye. Umunsi umwe mw'ijambo imbere y'abanyagihugu, uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu umuhisi Magufuli yavuze atebura ingene abagore bihagararako bakubitwa, mu rindi naho akekeza mu buryo bujanye n'igitsina umugore w'umushingamateka kubera inzobe y'urukoba rwiwe. Aho hompi yarakomewe amashi cane. Inyuma y'umwaka umwe, prezida Samia yashoboye kuvyura icizere c'intango nshasha. Ariko igipimo kizogaragaza ko ishaka ryiwe ryo gukora impinduka zirama kiri ku muvuduko n'aho azogarukira mu guhindura amategeko ari nayo  yoshimangira iragi ryiwe ariko kandi akanakingira ukwishira n'ukwizana kw'abanya-Tanzania, akanabera inkinzo igihugu ku bategetsi b'igitugu bozokwinjira ingoro y'umukuru w'igihugu muri kazoza.

headline: US: Umushingamateka Lauren Boebert yarahiye ko azotwara inkoho mu nama nshingamateka
text: Umugore aherutse gutorwa mu bushingamateka yiyemeje gutwara inkoho yo mu ntoke y'ubwoko bwa 'pistolet' mu kiringo azoba ari mu nama nshingamateka i Washington DC. Muri video yasohotse ku wa mungu, uwo mu republicain Lauren Boebert aboneka ariko arashira amasasu mu nkoho yiwe imbere yo gutembera mu gisagara. Muri iyo video imaze kubonwa incuro zirenga miliyoni zibiri avuga ati: "Nzotwara inkoho yanje i Washington mu nama nshingamateka''. Ariko umukuru w'igipolisi muri ico gisagara avuga ko afise umugambi wo kuvugana na Madame Boebert ku vyerekeye amategeko akomeye yo kugendana ibigwanisho bicira umuriro. Madame Boebert afise inzu y'uburiro (restaurant) yitwa Shooters Grill mu gisagara ca Rifle muri Colorado aho abakozi bashishikarizwa kugendana ibigwanisho bicira umuriro. Ikibazo c'uburenganzira bwo gutunga ibigwanisho cagize ikibanza kinini mu myiyamamazo yiwe mu matora yabaye mu kwezi kwa 11. Madame Boebert w'imyaka 34 yatorewe guhagararira intara ya Corolado, avuga muri iyo video yashizwe kuri Twitter ku wa mungu ati:  ''N'ubwo ubu ngiye gukorera muri kimwe mu bisagara vyubahiriza cane ivyiyumviro bitandukanye muri Amerika, ndahakanye guheba uburenganzira bwanje. "Nico gituma nk'umugore wa 1,5m z'uburebure n'ibiro 45 mpitamwo kwikingira jewe nyene uko ndabirekurirwa n'amategeko kuko ntawonkingira kurusha uko jewe ubwanje nikingira'' Ariko igipolisi nticatevye kugira ico kibivuzeko, umukuru w'igipolisi muri Washington DC Robert Contee III yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: ''Urya mushingamateka azotangishwa ihadabu nk'iritangishwa uwundi muntu wese afatanywe ikigwanisho mu mabarabara ya Washinton DC''. N'aho ibwirizwa nshingiro rya Amerika riha abantu uburenganzira bwo gutunga no kugendana ibigwanisho, amategeko abigenga ntameze co kimwe hose. Abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka bararekuriwe gutunga ibigwanisho mu biro vyabo no kubijana i Washington DC ariko bitarimwo amasasu. Ariko, harakenewe uruhusha rwo kugendana inkoho mu mabarabara y'ico gisagara kandi ibigwanisho bivuye mu zindi ntara bitegerezwa kubanza kwandikwa n'abategetsi b'ico gisagara. Mu kwezi guheze, umugwi w'abakenguzamateka b'aba democrate washikirije integuro yo gukaza amategeko ahasanzwe ku bagize inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka.

headline: Tanzania ivuga ko itazongera guha impunzi z’Abarundi ubwenegihugu mu kivunga
text: Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati wa Tanzania abwira Abarundi bahungiye muri ico gihugu ko Tanzania itagisubira gutanga ubwenegihugu ku mpunzi nk'uko vyagenze mu myaka mike iheze. Ivyo biri mu butumwa umushikiranganji George Simbachawene ariko ahereza impunzi z'Abarundi ziri mu makambi ya Tanzania mu rugendo arimwo mu ntara za Kigoma, Tabora na Katavi basanzwe batuyemwo. Uyu munsi kuwa kabiri, igihe yagendera ikambi y'impunzi ya Mtendeli iri muri District ya Kakonko, Bwana Simbachawene yashoboye kwibonera impunzi zariko zitekera imigizo yazo kugira ngo zitahuke. Avugana n'Abarundi basanzwe baba mw'ikambi ya Nyarugusu iri muri District ya Kasulu ejo ku wa mbere, bwana Simbachawene yabibukije icatumye bahungira muri Tanzania mu 2015, ko wari umutekano muke warangwa mu gihugu. Abibutsa inzira zitatu zo kurangiza ikibazo c'impunzi izo nazo zikaba ari ugutahuka mu gihugu c'amavukiro, uguhabwa ubwenegihugu iyo wahungiye, canke guhabwa ubuhungiro mu kindi gihugu kigira gatatu. Ahimiriza izo mpunzi guhitamwo uguhunguka bagasubira mu gihugu cabo, Bwana Simbachawene yumvikana avuga ati: "Muri izo nzira zitatu rero, wewe ufise ubwenge, uzi ko wipfuza gutegura imigambi ya kazoza kawe, uzi ko kuba mu mahanga hari uburenganzira uba udafise, ukabandanya uri umwana muto arindirije kugaburirwa, utazi ingene uzobaho ejo, ni vyiza ko wiyumvira ugahitamwo inzira ibereye". Yongerako ati: "Nobasaba ko mwiyandikisha muri benshi kugira muje kwubaka igihugu canyu, kuko kuguma ng'aha ni uguta umwanya, n'aho mwoba mu munezero umeze gute". Asigura ku bijanye n'uguhabwa ubwenegihugu mu gihugu wahungiyemwo, Bwana Simbachawene yibukije ko hari impunzi zahunze mu 1972 zirenga ibihumbi ijana bahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Tanzania, ariko ko "ivyo bitazigera bisubira". Ati: "Leta ya Tanzania ku bushake bwayo hariho abo yahaye ubwenegihugu, ariko hari n'abatarashobora kuburonka gushika ubu". "Nagomba ndababwire, ibi ntituzobisubira. Birya vyo gutanga ubwenegihugu mu kivunga ntibizigera bisubira, kuko n'abo twahaye ubwo bwenegihugu ntibashoboye kuja kuba hamwe n'abandi banyagihugu, bagumye mu makambi". Mu gihe muri izo mpunzi hari abipfuza kuronswa ubuhungiro bugira gatatu, cane cane mu bihugu vya Bulaya, Bwana Simbachawene abahanura ko ivyo bobivana mu mutwe "na rirya n'ikiza ca coronavirus atawuzi ngo kizohera ryari". Ku ruhande rw'u Burundi, leta imenyesha ko ibandanya yakira abahunguka bavuye mu makambi atandukanye muri Tanzania. Kuri uyu wa kabiri, Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, umutekano n'iterambere ry'amakomine bumenyesha ko bwakiriye abashika 376 batashe mu gihugu baciye muri komine Gisuru mu ntara ya Ruyigi mu buseruko bw'igihugu.

headline: DR Congo-M23: Umuriro wongeye kwaka
text: Intambara yongeye kwaduka hagati y'ingabo za reta ya Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo n'izo umugwi witwaje ibigwanisho wa M23, iminsi ibiri gusa abategetsi ba Congo n'Urwanda bahuriye i Luanda muri Angola mu nama yo guhosha iyo ntambara. Muri iyo nama bahujwe n'umukuru wa Angola João Lourenço , prezida Paul Kagame na prezida  Félix Tshisekedi  basavye ko haba guhagarika  kurwana n'uko ubwo nyene M23 iva mu birindiro yafashe ubu vuba mu buseruko bwa Congo. Congo n'Urwanda birabana ribi kuva M23 isubiye kurwana n'ingabo za reta muri aya mezi makeya aheze. Congo yagiriza Urwanda gushigikira umugwi M23 ariko Urwanda rukabihakana. Urwanda na rwo rwagiriza ingabo za Congo, FARDC, n'iza ONU zo mu rwego rwa Monusco gukorana n'abagwanyi bo mu mugwi FDLR usanzwe ugwanya reta y'Urwanda. Icuka hagati y'ivyo bihugu carabaye kibi gushika aho Congo ifata ingingo zirimwo kubuza kompanyi y'indege y'u Rwanda,  Rwandair,  gusubira kuja muri Congo. Inama ya Luanda umukuru wa Angola, João Lourenço,  yari yayitumyeko ngo hahoshwe ico cuka hongere haronderwe inyishu kuri iyo ntambara. Amakuru ava muri ONU avuga ko M23 yateye ku wa kane ibirindiro vy'ingabo za reta ahitwa Kanyabusoro, ku birometero bitanu uvuye ku makambi ya gisirikare ya Rumangabo na Kazuba. Umunyamakuru ari muri ako karere avuga ko intambara zakomeje kandi ku wa gatanu mu gitondo ahitwa Rusenge , ku  10km uvuye kw'ibarabara rikuru rija mu gisagara ca Goma. Abantu benshi bahunze ingo zabo. Kuri twitter, umushikiranganji w'Urwanda ajejwe imigenderanire, Vincent Biruta, yanditse ko amakuru atari yo no kwiyerekana neza imbere y'abanyagihugu bibangamira utwigoro two kurondera amahoro muri Congo n'akarere. Yatomoye ko mu nama yahuje abakuru b'ibihugu bitatu i Luanda ku wa gatatu  ata masezerano canke kwumvikana guhagarika intambara vyigeze bishikwako. Muri iyo nama, abakuru b'Urwanda na Congo bumvikanye ku bikeneye gukorwa kugira hahoshwe ico cuka kibi hanyuma abahunze bashobore gusubira iwabo. Avuga kuri iyo nama ya Luanda, umuvugizi wa M23 yabwiye BBC ko ivyo biganiro bitazorangiza intambara mu buseruko bwa Congo. Mu kwezi guheze, intumwa idasanzwe ya ONU muri Congo, Bintou Keita, yagabishije ko umugwi M23 uriko uraba nk'igisirikare gisanzwe, ko usigaye ufise ibigwanisho bikomeye kandi ko ushobora kugeramira ingabo za ONU ziri aho muri Congo kugarukana amahoro no gufasha gukingira abanyagihugu basanzwe.

headline: Ingabo za Ukraine i Kharkiv ziriko zisubiza inyuma ingabo za Russia
text: Ingabo za Ukraine mu gisagara kigira kabiri c'iki gihugu zasubije inyuma Aburusiya ku buryo vya muzinga vyabwo bidashobora kuzishikira, nk'uko umunyamakuru wa BBC uriyo abivuga. Muri iyi ntambara, ingabo z'Uburusiya zari zimaze imisi 70 yose zicucagira Kharkiv amabombe y'urutavanako, mu gihe zoba zasubijwe inyuma iki gisagara coba cinjiye mu gahengwe. Agace ka nyuma kabohowe ni ikigwati ca Pytomnyk, nk'uko vyaraye bitangajwe n'igisirikare ca Ukraine. Hagati aho, ingabo z'Uburusiya ntiziriko zirasubira inyuma - nk'uko vyagenze mu micungararo ya Kyiv. Zivugwa ko ziriko ziriyegeranya, aho ingabo zirwanira ku butaka ziva mu mabatayo (bataillons) atari make ziriko zirahamvya abandi. Nayo mu ntara ya Donbas, igisirikare ca Ukraine congeye gutangaza ko casambuye ibiraro vyakoreshwa n'ingabo z'Uburusiya mu kujabuka uruzi ruri mu karere ka Luhansk mu buseruko bw'igihugu ahamaze imisi habera intambara zikomeye. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Ukraine yasohoye amasanamu avugwa ko ari ibifaru vy'Uburusiya n'ibindi bimodoka vyasambuwe mu kigwati ca Bilohorivka, hafi y'igisagara ca Lysychansk kiri mu minwe ya reta ya Ukraine. Umukuru w'akarere ka Luhansk Serhiy Haidai avuga ko Bilohorivka ari "ikirindiro ntamenwa" cari "gihanganye n'igitigiri kinini" c'ingabo z'Uburusiya - nk'uko bimeze i Mariupol. Igisirikare c'Uburusiya ntaco kiravuga kuri ibi bivugwa na Ukraine, bitaremezwa n'uruhande rwigenga. Inyuma y'aho bunaniriwe no gufata umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Kyiv, mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'igihugu mu  ndwi za mbere z'iyi ntambara, Uburusiya bwavuze ko bugiye gushira inguvu zose mu buseruko kugira bwigarurire uturere twa Luhansk hamwe na Donetsk. Gushika ubu, Moscou ntirashobora gushika kuri iyi ntumbero. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w'Ubwongereza Ben Wallace avuga ko Uburusiya buzova muri iyi ntambara muri Ukraine bwatakaje inguvu ugereranije n'aho bwari bugeze imbere y'igitero cabwo. Avugana n'abanyamakuru i Washington - aho yabonaniye n'umushikiranganji wa Amerika ajejwe kwivuna abansi Lloyd Austin - Wallace yavuze ko Vladimir Putin ari we wenyene "ashobora kumenya iyo azoshikana igihugu". Ati: "Impera n'imperuka ategerezwa kwemera ko yataye umutwe. "Uko vyogenda kwose, reka tuvuge ko Ubusuriya ari igihugu giciriritse gusumba uko cari kimeze imbere y'iki gitero". Wallace avuga kandi ko igisirikare c'Uburusiya "gishaje" kandi ko gishobora kugira ingorane zo gusubira kwiyubaka kubera ibihano ruhasha igihugu cafatiwe. Vyongeye, Wallace avuga ko yemera ko Ubushinwa bugenda butinya ibiriko bikorwa n'Uburusiya, bukabona ko atari vyiza mu bijanye n'ubudandaji. Ati: "Si incuti yo kwizera. Ntushobora kumwizera ngo uherezeko".

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Ni bande bari mu karwi gatoya ka Putin karongoye intambara?
text: Vladimir Putin aboneka umengo arirebanga, mu gufata ingingo yo gushora Uburusiya mu ntambara ya gisirikare ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bw'igihugu ciwe butembagara. Ntiyari bwigere aboneka yirebanga nk'incuro zibiri ziherutse, aho yabonetse ari kumwe n'akarwi kiwe, yicaranye n'abahanuzi biwe ariko hagati ya we na bo hari intambwe nini. Nk'umugaba w'ingabo, niwe abazwa iki gitero, ariko yamye yiheka cane ku bantu bamwegereye kandi bamuyoboka cane, abenshi muri bo bakaba batanguriye amabanga yabo mu nzego z'Uburusiya zijejwe umutekano. ikibazo ni ukumenya ni nde amuhanura muri kino gihe kitoroshe c'ubutegetsi bwiwe. Nimba hariho n'umwe, ni uyu mwizigirwa wiwe w'igihe kirekire cane Sergei Shoigu, ari we yama ariko arasubiramwo amajambo ya Putin yerekana intumbero yiwe yo gusambura igisirikare ca Ukraine be no gukingira Uburusiya abansi babwo bo mu bihugu vy'Uburengero. Uyu ni umuntu yama ajana na Perezida iyo agiye guhiga canke kuroba mu ntara ya  Sibérie iri mu buseruko bw'igihugu, muri kahise akaba yaboneka ko yari we ashobora kumusubirira. Vera Mironova,  umuhinga mu bijanye n'intambara za gisirikare , ati: "Shoigu yategerezwa gufata Kyiv; ni umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi kandi yategerezwa gutsinda intambara". Azwi ko ari we yafashe ka karere ka Crimea mu 2014. Niwe kandi yari arongoye ishami rijejwe igendereza rya gisirikare, GRU, ryagirizwa ibitero bibiri vy'isumu  - ica mbere co mu 2018 cahitanye umuntu i Salisbury mu Bwongereza, ikindi cahatswe kugandagura wa munyaporitike arwanya ubutegetsi bwa Putin, Alexei Navalny, muri Sibérie mu 2020. Umwanditsi w'umurusiya Andrei Soldatov akongera akaba n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'umutekano yemeza ko uyu mushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi ari we muntu wa mbere avuga rikijana kwa Perezida Putin. "Shoigu uretse ko ari we ajejwe igisirikare, ni nawe ajejwe inyigisho (ideology) ku rugero rutari ruto - hanyuma inyigisho mu Burusiya zishingiye cane cane kuri kahise, niwe ategura vyose". Nk'umukuru w'ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare, yari afise igikorwa co gutera Ukraine kandi akarangiza intambara ningoga na ningoga, aha rero aboneka ko atararangura igikorwa ciwe. Afise uruhara rudasanzwe mu bikorwa vya gisirikare vya  Vladimir Putin kuva igihe yari arongoye ingabo muri ya ntambara ya Chechnya mu 1999, akaba mbere yari imbere mu gutegura iyi ntambara ya Ukraine, anahagarikiye imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri Biélorussie/Belarus mu kwezi guheze. Umuhinga w'umurusiya Mark Galeotti avuga ko, nk'umuntu "adatwenga kandi w'iminkanyari", Jenerali Gerasimov yagize uruhara rudasanzwe mu ntambara yo kwigarurira akarere ka  Crimea. Hari amakuru avuga ko ubu yoba ashirwa ku ruhande kubera uguhigimanga kwiwe mu gutanguza igitero ca Ukraine be n'amakuru avuga ko igisirikare gifise intege nke. Ariko Andrei Soldatov abona ko ibi ari ivyipfuzo vya bamwe. Ati: "Putin ntashobora kugenzura hose n'ingabo zose, rero iki ni co gikorwa ciwe". Avuga kandi ko n'aho akunda kwambara umwambaro wa gisirikare, nta nyigisho za gisirikare afise ari co gituma ari ngombwa kuri we kwiheka ku bahinga. Ben Noble, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Londres yigisha poritike y'Uburusiya, avuga ati: "Nikolai Patrushev ni we muntu wa mbere akokeza intambara, kubera yiyumvira ko ibihugu vy'Uburengero bimaze imyaka n'imyaka bihiga Uburusiya". Ni umwe mubayoboke batatu ba Putin bakoranye na we kuva mu myaka ya 1970 i St Petersburg, igihe iki gisagara kigira kabiri c'Uburusiya cari kicitwa Leningrad. Abandi babiri basigaye ni Alexander Bortnikov arongoye igisata c'umutekano hamwe na Sergei Naryshkin arongoye igisata kijejwe igendereza ryo hanze. Abari muri aka karwi k'abegereye Putin bose bazwi kw'izina rya siloviki, ariko aba batatu nibo bari hafi yiwe gusumba. Ni bake cane bafise ijambo rikomeye ku mukuru w'igihugu nka Nikolai Patrushev. Uretse ko yakoranye na we muri KGB mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gikomunista, niwe yamusubiriye mu rwego rwayisubiriye, ari rwo FSB, kuva mu 1999 gushika 2008. Mu mubonano w'inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano w'Uburusiya yabaye hasigaye imisi itatu ngo igitero gitangura, Patrushev yageze kure mu kuvuga ko "intumbero nyayo" ya Amerika ari ugusambura Uburusiya. Abakurikiranira hagufi Kremlin bavuga ko umukuru w'igihugu yemera inkuru ahawe n'inzego z'umutekano gusumba izindi zose, Alexander Bortnikov afatwa nk'umwe mu bantu begereye cane Perezida Putin. Nk'uwundi yakoranye na we muri KGB i Leningrad, niwe yahawe uburongozi bw'urwego FSB asubiriye Nikolai Patrushev. Aba bompi bazwi ko begereye cane umukuru w'igihugu, ariko nk'uko Ben Noble abivuga: "Ntitwovuga ko ari bo bonyene bafise ibintu mu minwe kandi ko ari bo bonyene bafata ingingo zose". Nk'uwungirije aba batatu bahoze ari abakozi ba Leningrad, Sergei Naryshkin ari kumwe n'umukuru w'igihugu mu gihe kitari gito amaze arangura amabanga yiwe. Arongoye urwego rujejwe igendereza ryo hanze (SVR). Sergei Naryshkin yamaze igihe kirekire ari kumwe na Putin, i St Petersburg mu myaka ya 1990, hanyuma no mu biro kwa Putin mu 2004 gushika n'aho aba umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Mu mwaka uheze yahaye ikiganiro umunyamakuru wa BBC i Moscou Steve Rosenberg aho yahakanye ko Uburusiya ata bitero ku nyabwonko n'ibindi vy'isumu bwakoze, kandi ko butivanga mu matora y'ibindi bihugu. Imyaka 18 yose ayimaze ari we mutegetsi mukuru ajejwe imigenderanire y'Uburusiya, ashikiriza aho Uburusiya buhagaze n'aho afatwa nk'uko ata ruhara runini afise mu gufata ingingo. Sergei Lavrov w'imyaka 71 , ni ikindi cemezo gikomeye c'uko Vladimir Putin yiheka cane ku bantu bakomeye bakoranye muri kahise. Ni umuhinga afise amayeri menshi: mu kwezi guheze yarashatse kumaramaza umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss mu kumubaza ivyo azi ku ndondagihugu y'Uburusiya, hanyuma mu mwaka uheze naho ashaka kumaramaza umukuru w'igisata kijejwe imigenderanire y'umuryango w'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Josep Borrell. Ariko, yamye ashirwa kure ku kintu cose cerekeye Ukraine, kandi n'aho azwi ko ari umuntu agumye, yabandanije ashira imbere ibiganiro ku kibazo ca Ukraine, bituma Perezida Putin amwihoza. Bisa n'uko ataco vyamubwiye igihe abenshi mu bagize Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu biyonjorora igihe yariko agerageza gusigura ingingo y'Uburusiya yo gutera Ukraine, hari mw'ijambo yariko ashikiriza hifashishijwe ubuhinga bwa videwo. Ari mu bagore bake cane begereye Putin, akaba ari we yahagarariye amatora mu nama nkenguzamateka yo kwemeza irungikwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya hanze, ivyaciriye inzira igitero kuri Ukraine. Valentina Matviyenko ni uwundi muntu ayoboka cane Putin yakoranye na we i St Petersburg akaba na we nyene yaranagize uruhara runini mu kwigarurira Crimea mu 2014. Ariko ntafatwa ko ari mu bantu bari imbere mu gufata ingingo. Nk'uko bimeze ku bandi bagize inama y'igihugu ijejwe umutekano, uruhara rwiwe ni urwo kwerekana ko ingingo ifashwe yaciye mu mwumvikano n'aho biba biboneka ko bisa nk'aho umukuru w'igihugu aba yamaze gufata ingingo. Nk'uwahoze ari we amucungereye ubuzima, ni we arongoye igisata ca gisirikare kijejwe umutekano w'igihugu kizwi nka, Rosgvardia,  cashinzwe na Perezida Putin nk'igisirikare ciwe bwite, haraciye imyaka itandatu gusa. Mu kurondera abajejwe umutekano biwe bwite, yashatse ko aronka abamuyoboka koko, Viktor Zolotov akaba yarongereje igitigiri cabo gushika ku 400.000. Vera Mironova yemeza ko integuro ya mbere y'Uburusiya kwari ugufata ubutegetsi bwa Ukraine mu misi mike cane, hanyuma bimaze kugaragara co igisirikare cariko kirananirwa, izi ngabo nizo zaciye zifata ibintu mu minwe. Ingorane gusa ni uko umukuru w'iki gisata ata nyigisho za gisirikare afise, kandi kubera ingabo ziwe ata bifaru zifise zirakunzwe guterwa bikomeye. Ni abahe bantu bandi bumvirizwa na Putin? Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mikhail Mishustin afise igikorwa kitoroshe co kunagura ubutunzi bw'igihugu ariko nta jambo rinini afise ku ntambara. umukuru w'igisagara ca Moscou Sergei Sobyanin hamwe n'umukuru w'igiko c'igihugu gicukura igitoro Rosneft, Igor Sechin, nabo nyene ni abantu begereye umukuru w'igihugum, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuhinga mu vya poritike Yevgeny Minchenko. Abatunzi ruhebwa babiri bavukana  Boris na Arkady Rotenberg, abantu bakuranye n'umukuru w'igihugu kuva mu bwana, ni abantu bamye ari abizigirwa kuri we. Mu 2020, ikinyamakuru Forbes cavuze ko ari wo muryango utunze gusumba iyindi yose mu gihugu cose c'Uburusiya.

headline: Acat-Burundi: Germain Rukuki yasohotse ibohero inyuma y'imyaka irenga ine
text: Germain Rukuki kuva ku mugoroba wo ku wa gatatu araye yidegemvya inyuma yo gusohoka ibohero rya Ngozi aho yari apfungiwe kuva agifatwa mu 2017, nk'ukwo vyemezwa n'umwe mu bashingwamanza biwe Maitre Ildephonse Congera. Germain Rukuki yari umukozi w'ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu ACAT Burundi, yari yakatiwe gupfungwa imyaka 32 mu 2018 ku vyaha vyo guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu no kugarariza. Germain Rukuki yagumye ahakana ivyo yagirizwa kuva agifatwa. Yarekuwe hashizwe mu ngiro ingingo ya sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Ntahangwa yavanye igihano yari yaraciriwe c'imyaka 32 mu 2018 na sentare nkuru ya Ntahangwa ikagishira ku mwaka umwe gusa. Hari haheze iminsi icenda sentare iciye urwo rubanza, amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba yari amaze gutangura gushikriza amakenga yo kuba atarekurwa ngo asohoke ibohero kandi sentare yamurekuye. Inyuma y'impari n'intureka vyakurikiye ingingo y'umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yo kwitoza ubugira gatatu kurongora Uburundi mu 2015, amashirahamwe menshi adaharanira inyungu za poritike harimwo ayo agateka ka zina muntu yarahagaritswe canke arafutwa. Muri izo harimwo Acat-Burundi, Aprodh, Ligue Iteka, Focode, Forsc, Olucome, na Parcem. Iryo rya nyuma ariko ubu riherutse kwemererwa gusubira gukora. N'ibiro vya ONU bikurikirana agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi vyarugawe burundu. Kuva ku myaka 32 gushika ku mwaka umwe Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu mwaka uheze urubanza rwiwe sentare gasamburamaza yararusambuye ica irusubiza mw'iburanishwa. Yari yasanze hari amategeko ajanye n'iburanishwa ry'imanza atari yubahirijwe igihe rwacibwa. Sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Bujumbura yaciye isubira kuruburanisha, irushira mu mwiherero mu kwezi  kwa gatatu. Yaciye urubanza rwo kugabanya igihano ciwe kuva ku myaka 32 gushika ku mwaka umwe gusa muri uku kwezi kwa gatantatu.

headline: Itegeko rya Sharia ni iki? Rivuze iki ku bagore bo muri Afghanistan?
text: Aba Taliban bavuga ko bazotwara Afghanistan hisunzwe ata guhesha ingingo z'amategeko  ya Islam zizwi nk'itegeko rya Sharia. Uwo mugwi washikiriye intsinzi umaze gufata umugwa mukuru Kabul, gutyo urangaza  imyaka hafi 20 y'uruhara rw'ingabo mpuzamakungu zari zirongowe na Amerika uri ico gihugu. Hariko haba iki muri Afghanistan? Mu kiganiro ca mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma yo gufata Kabul, umuvugizi w'aba Taliban yavuze ko ibibazo bimwe bimwe nk'ivyerekeye ibinyamakuru n'uburenganzira bw'abagore bizokwubahirizwa hisunzwe "itegeko rya Islam", ariko uwo mugwi nturasigura ico ivyo bizoba bivuze mu ngiro canke mu bikorwa. Uwatsinzindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel Malala Yousafzai - yarashwe n'aba Taliban afise imyaka 15 ahorwa guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakobwa bwo kuja mu mashure muri Pakistan - yagabishije ko ingene aba Taliban batahura itegeko rya Sharia bishbora kuba akaga ku bakobwa n'abagore muri Afganistan. Yabwiye BBC ati: " Nararonse akaryo ko kuvugana na bamwe mu baharanira uburenganzira muri Afghanistan, barimwo abo mu mashirahamwe y'abagore, nabo barafise ayo makenga ko batazi ico ubuzima bwabo bugiye kuba." "Benshi baribuka ivyariko biraba mu 1996-2001, gutyo bakaba bafise amakenga menshi ku mutekano wabo, uburenganzira bwabo, ugukingirwa [no] gusubira kuja mu mashure." Igijhe aba Taliban baheruka ku butegetsi  abagore ntibari bemerewe gukora akazi canke kuja mw'ishure. Kuva ku myaka umunani, abakobwa bategerezwa kwambara burka, abagore nabo bakaba bari barekuriwe kuja ahabona  ari uko baherekejwe n'umuntu w'umugabo wo mu muryango. Abagore babirenzeko barakubitwa abantu barorera. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe intwaro yo hagati Madame Priti Patel, avuga ku migambi ya reta yo kwakira impunzi 20.000 z'abanya-Afghanistan mu Bwongereza, yavuze ko atizeye ukwizeza kwatanzwe [n'aba Taliban]. Yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise kahise ko gukandamiza abagore, kandi ko "ivyo bitagiye guhinduka buno nyene". Itegeko rya Sharia n'indinganzizo y'amategeko ya Islam. Riva muri Koran, inyandiko shingiro ya Islam, hamwe na fatwa - imanza ziba zaciwe n'inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam. Sharia ubundi risigura  "inzira igaragara, icamwo abantu benshi igana ku mazi". Itegeko rya Sharia rikora nk'igitabo c'ingingo zigenga ukubaho aba Islam bose bategerezwa kwisunga, harimwo amasengesho, kwisonzesha no gufasha abakene. Rigamije gufasha aba-Islam gutahura ingene bategerezwa kwigenza mu kintu icarico cose c'ubuzima bwabo hisunzwe ingene Imana ibishaka. Sharia rishobora guha insiguro icarico cose kijanye n'ubuzima bwa minsi yose  bw'umu-Islam. Nk'akarorero, nk'umu-Islam atazi neza ico yokora aronse ubutumire bw'abo bakorana kugira bajane mu kabare inyuma y'akazi  ashobora kuraba inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam kugira amugire inama maze akore ibijanye n'amategeko y'idini ryabo. Ibindi bice vy'ubuzima bwa minsi yose aho aba-Islam bashobora kubaza inzobere ingene bovyifatamwo n'amategeko agenga umuryango, amafaranga hamwe n'imirimo y'ubugwizatunga. Sharia ishira ivyaha mu migwi mikuru mikuru ibiri: ivyaha vya ''hadd", biba ari ivyaha bikomeye cane bifise n'ibihano bizwi, hamwe n'ivyaja vya ''tazir'' aho igihano gishingwa n'umucamanza. Ivyaha vya ''hadd'' birimwo ukwiba, gushobora guhanishwa guca ikiganza c'uwagiriwe n'ico caha, hamwe n'ubusambanyi bw'abarenze ibigo, bushobora guhanishwa kwicishwa amabuye. Amwe mu mashirahamwe ya Islam avuga ko hari inzitizi  nyisnhi hamwe n'umurundo w'ivyemezo bikenerwa mw'ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ibihano vya hadd. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryariyamirije kwicisha  amabuye, rivuga ko ari ''iyica rubuzo canke ubundi buryo bwo gufata canke guhana umuntu  bunyamaswa, ata buntu, butesha agaciro ko rero bubujijwe". Si ibihugu vyose vya Islam bishira mu ngiro  ivyo bihano vya hadd  kandi amatohoza amaze kwerekana ko  aba-Islam babona mu buryo butandukanye cane  ibijanye n'ibihano ruhasha. Apostasy, canke uguta ukwemera, n'ikibazo kitavugwako rumwe cane mu ba-Islam kandi abahinga bavuga ko inzobere nyinshi mu vyigwa vya Islam zivuga ko ico caha gihanishwa urupfu. Ariko hari umugwi muto w'incabwenge z'aba Islam cane cane abakorana n'ibihugu vya Buraya, bavuga ko ukuri kw'isi ya none gusigura ko ''igihano'' gikwiye kurekerwa Imana - kandi ko Islam ubwayo itageramiwe n'uguta ukwemera. Na Koroan ubwayo ivuga ko ''ata guhata'' mu bijanye n'idini. Nko ku yandi mategeko yose, Sharia rirazitanye kandi kurishira mu ngiro bihagarara ahanini ku bwiza n'ubumenyi bw'abahinga. Abanyamategeko b'aba-Islam batanga intumbero n'ingingo bashinze. Intumbero ifatwa nk'urubanza rwaciwe yitwa fatwa. Hari amashure atanu  atandukanye y'itegeko rya Sharia. Hari inyigisho zine za Sunni: Hanbali, Maliki, Shafi'i na Hanafi, hamwe rero n'inyigisho imwe ya Shia, yitwa  Shia Jaafari. Izo nyigisho zitanu zitandukanye ku buryo   zisobanura, ijambo ku rindi, inyandiko itegeko rya Sharia rikomokako.

headline: Papa Francis yemeye ko yananiwe kwihangana akubita urushi umukenyezi yariko amukwega
text: Papa Francis yasavye imbabazi  inyuma y'aho akubitiye urushi ku kuboko umwe mu bakirisu bari mu rugendo rweranda bakoraniye ku kibanza citiriwe umweranda Petero i Roma. Papa yariko aramutsa abana n'abandi bari bakoraniye muri ico kibanza hanyuma agize ngo aragiye, umukenyezi umwe muri bo amukwega ukuboko n'inguvu nyinshi gushika n'aho ahakwa kumugwisha hasi. Ivyo vyatumye Papa ahindukira agerageza kumwikura vyanka, aca amukubita urushi ku kuboko ashavuye abona kumurekura. Niho mu nyuma Papa yemera ko vyanse ko yihangana aremera ko nawe nyene acumura nk'ikiremwamuntu nk'abandi. Ati: "Kenshi biranka ko twihangana. Naje birashobora kunshikira. Nico gituma nsavye imbabazi ku vyashitse nijoro". Ivyo vyatangaje benshi kuko imbere y'aho, mu gihe yashikiriza ijambo ry'ukwipfuriza umwaka mushasha abakirisu, yariyamirije ihohotera rikorerwa abakenyezi.

headline: Itegeko rya Islam Sharia rirabuza umuziki, kubera iki? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
text: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia.

headline: Ghana: Igiporisi cabujije ihishurwa ry'Umwaka Mushasha ritera ibibazo
text: Dickens Olewe BBC News Igiporisi muri Ghana cagabishije abarongoye ukwemera n’amashengero ko batokora ihishurwa basanzwe bakora ku Mwaka Mushasha kuko hari abo ritera ubwoba, abandi umwitwarariko, mbere abandi bagapfa. Uburenganzira bwo gusenga ntibutegerezwa kurengera uburenganzira bw’abandi, nk’uko igiporisi cavuze mw’itangazo. Abanegura iyo ngingo bavuga ko iteye kubiri n’uburenganzira butangwa n’ibwirizwa shingiro mu kwishira no kwizana ku bijanye no kwemera  ko rero iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Aba-Kristu baharurwa muri za miriyoni akenshi barakoranira mu masengero kugira bumve ivyo  abapasitori  babahishurira ku vyo beretswe ku bizobashikira mu mwaka mushasha. Hari abahishurirwa ivyiza bibarindiriye ariko hari n’abagabishwa ko barindiriwe n’ivyago. Iyo ngingo y’igiporisi yatanguye gusohoka mu mwaka uheze igihe abantu bari barengewe n’ukugabishwa kw’impfu n’akaga, nk’uko ikinyamakuru co kuri internet My Joy Online kivyandika. Mw’itangazo, igiporisi casavye amadini atandukanye”gafashanya” na co no “gukoresha uburyo bwemewe n’amategeko um gushurira ivyo beretswe”. Ariko umunyamategeko Sammy Sarko yavuze ko  iyo ngingo y’igiporisi “iteye kubiri n’amategeko.” Yanditse ati: “Ntikeneye no kubanza kwihwezwa na sentare ya mbere nkuru muri Ghana. Nta tegeko muri Ghana riha igiporisi ububasha bwo kugenzura ingene ivyahishuwe bimenyeshwa mu gihugu”. Yongeyeko ati : “Ubwisanzure bw’idini burenze ubwisanzure bwo gusenga muri sinagoga, isengero canke umusigiti. Bisigura ko abantu badategerezwa guca kubiri n’ivyo bemera kugira bisunge umuco canke reta kiretse buteye kubiri n’itegeko  iri canke irindi.” Igiporisi cavuze co cashinze itariki ya 27 Kigarama (12) nk’umunsi wo gutangura kwubahiriza ingingo zijanye no kumenyesha ivyahishuwe. Iryo tangazo ryavuze riti: “Uyu munsi ni uwo kutwibutsa twese, gukora ibikorwa bijanye n’ukwemera hatarenzwe akarimbi k’amategeko kugira hubahirizwe  ituze ridahungabanywa n’umwitwarariko uvuye ku mburi y’ibibi canke urupfu bigiye gushika”.

headline: Nigeria: Uyu mupatiri yiyemeje gukingira ibigirwamana vy'aba Igbo biriko biraturirwa
text: Mu gihe abavugabutumwa bo mw'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu buseruko bwa Nigeria bagenda baturira ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyo muri kahise babona ko ari ibigirwamana, umupatiri umwe w'umukatorika wewe abandanya avyegeranya. Ibi bibumbano bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu madini kama yo muri ako karere kabamwo abo mu bwoko bw'aba Igbo, basanzwe babifata nk'imana zabo kandi bemera ko bifise ubushobozi ndengakamere. Gusa abanywanyi b'aya madini kama bagenda bagabanuka kubera idini rya Gikristu - ahanini rigizwe n'amashengero ya Pentecote - rigenda ryigarurira abatari bake. Abanyamakuru ba BBC Igbo Chiagozie Nwonwu na Karina Igonikon barerekana utwigoro tw'uyu mupatiri two gukingira kahise kariko karatokombera kubera ibikorwa vy'abavugabutumwa bamwe bamwe. N'aho bamwita "umuriro waka", nta kintu giteye ubwoba kuri Patiri Paul Obayi arongoye inzu ndangamurage ishinguwemwo ibigirwamana mu gisagara ca Nnsuka kiri mu buseruko bwa Nigeria. Iyi nzu ndangamurage y'ivyumba bitatu iherereye mu kigo c'Isengero nkuru ya Katorika yitiriwe umweranda Tereza (Saint Theresa), irimwo amajana n'amajana y'ibigirwamana bitandukanye, ikibumbano c'intambwe hamwe n'ibishusho vy'imana z'aba Igbo. Iyo hagize abava inyuma y'izi mana kama, cane cane kubera inyigisho z'amashengero ya Pentecôte bamwe mu bavugabutumwa baca baturira ibi bibumbano, bavuga ko biteye kubiri n'ukwemera gushingiye ku Mana imwe, kandi ko ari "impwemu mbi zitera imikoshi". Rimwe na rimwe, hari n'abemera izo mana kama bo nyene ubwabo bavyituririra bishimikije umugani wo mu migenzo y'aba Igbo uvuga ngo: "Iyo imana ibangamye cane, icika urukwi rwo guturira". Ariko Patiri Obayi wewe yafashe iyindi nzira mu gukingira izo mana n'imanakazi, akavuga ko akoresha ububasha ahabwa n'Imana kugira ngo azake izo nguvu ndengakamere. Ibi vyamutumye bamutazira Okunerere - "umuriro uturira ibigirwamana muri mutima". Ari kuri iyo nzu ndangamurage, yavuze ati: "Naramaze gusambura izi mpwemu". "Iki ubona hano ni ikibarara. Nta kintu na kimwe kirimwo". Patiri Obayi avuga ko ahanini yigiye ku mazu ndangamurage yo mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi biriko biraterwa igitsure kugira ngo bigarukane ibibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni, aho atanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Benin Bronzes/Bronzes du Bénin (ibibumbano vy'ivyuma birenga igihumbi vyari bishashije ingoro y'umwami w'icitwa Ubwami bwa Benin, ari yo Nigeria ya kino gihe). "Naragendeye amazu ndangamurage yo mu burengero nca nsangayo ibi bibumbano, harimwo mbere n'ivyavuye muri Benin, ariho naca nigira inama yo kubibungabunga". Uwurongoye iyi sengero nkuru, Patiri Eugene Odo, arashigikiye aka kigoro kiwe, aho agereranya iyi nzu ndangamurage n'iyindi yegukira Katorika mu Butaliyano. Ati: "I Roma nk'akarorero, hari inzu ndangamurage ibitsemwo ibintu vyahinguwe mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gipagani bw'Abaromani, kandi ingenzi zama zigendera iyo nzu mu ntumbero yo kwiga ingene umuntu yagiye atera imbere". N'aho iyi nzu ndangamurage ibitse ibi bigirwamana yakira ingenzi ziva kure mbere n'i Lagos, irakeneye kugarukirwa. Ibibumbano, bimwe mbere bimaze ibinjana, bisanzaye irya n'ino hasi muri iyo nzu, vyuzuye inkungugu. Hari mbere n'ivyamaze kuribwa n'umuswa. Ibi vyose ni ivyo yegeranije mu "butumwa amaze akora mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20 aho agenda yigisha mu bisagara no mu mitumba itandukanye mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. Ati: "Abantu barandikira isengero ryanje bansaba ko ngenda kubakuriraho ibi bigirwamana bibabujije amahoro". Ni itunga rikomeye ryerekana imana z'aba Igbo z'ubwoko bwinshi. Ariko iyikomeye muri izi zose ni Adaada leja, ikigirwamana cambitswe inkofero y'injishano yasengwa n'abarondera kuvyara. Patiri Obayi avuga ko iyi imaze imyaka hafi 200. Odinani, idini kama ry'aba Igbo, ryariho imbere y'umuzo y'idini rya Gikristu n'ubukoloni.  Ni uburyo bwo guterekera aho abantu basenga umuzimu userukiwe n'igishusho kizwi kw'izina rya chi, kugira ngo ubasabire kuri Rugira Vyose, bita Chukwu. Izindi mana basenga harimwo: Si benshi bagisenga izi mana kama, kandi abenshi barahamwa cane n'abakirisu basanzwe ari na bo benshi. Imisi mikuru yabo irasuzuguritse, kandi n'imigirwa imwe imwe isa no kubandwa ibonwa nabi mbere birashika n'utuzu tw'indaro tugaterwa mu bikorwa bijanye n'ubukristu. Muri kino gihe, abenshi mu bakigendera muri aya madini kama ni abatama, n'aho ubu hari bamwe mu rwaruka bagenda bagarariza ubukristu bagashira imbere imigirwa barazwe n'abakurambere. Chinasa Nwosu, umusenyeri w'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu rusengero rwa Royal Church ruri mu gisagara Port Harcourt kiri mu buseruko, ararwanya bikomeye uku kwemera kama. Musenyeri Nwosu yatanguye kumenyekana mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990 igihe yasambura utuzu tw'indaro, aturira ivyitwa ibigirwamana, anarandura ibiti avuga ko vyari "ibiti vya shetani/satani". Ibi biti, bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivya kera cane, bizungurutswe hasi n'ibitambaro vy'amabara atukura canke yera, bigafatwa nk'ivyeranda ku bayoboke bavyo babisenga bakanabitambira. Hari bimwe usanga biri ku mihana y'abantu ariko vyinshi biri mu mashamba. Ati: "Imana ntishaka ko dusenga ibigirwamana. Idini kama rya Afrika akenshi rishingiye ku gusenga ibigirwamana". Asubiramwo amajambo yo muri Bibiriya, yongerako ati: "Imihezagiro uyironka mu gihe utaye ivyo bintu vyavumwe". Avuga ko ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni mu burengero bwa Nigeria ubu bikaba bibarizwa mu mazu ngandamurage yo mu bihugu vy'uburengero, bitirirwa Imana iyo ari yo yose, akaba ashigikiye ko bigarukanwa mu gihugu. Hagati aho, aragabisha reta ya Nigera ko mu gihe yogarukana ibibumbano bishobora kuba vyaragizwe ibigirwamana, agatanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Ikenga biri mu nzu ndangamurage y'Ubwongereza, ko bikwiye guturirwa. Ibi vyiyumviro birarwanywa bikomeye na Patiri Obayi yiyemeje gukingira ibi bibumbano mu nzu yiwe ndangamurabe. Ati: "Ibi ni ibibumbano abana bacu bazokwigirako kugira ngo batahure neza ingene abakurambere babo bari babayeho".

headline: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
text: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo.
