Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

headline: DRC: umutegetsi mukuru wa Isilamu yaraye yishwe arashwe i Beni
text: Umwe mu bategetsi bakuru b'idini rya Isilamu yaraye agandaguwe, arashwe n'abantu bataramenyekana mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC). Sheikh Ali Amini yarashwe amasasu menshi mu gihe yari arongoye amasengesho y'ejo ku mugoroba mu musigiti mukuru w'igisagara ca Beni mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Ubu bwicanyi bwabaye haciye amasaha make Perezida Félix Tshisekedi w'ico gihugu atangaje ko intara zibiri zigoswe kuva ku wa gatanu. Iki gitero cakozwe mu gihe c'Ukwezi Kweranda kwa Isilamu, Ramadan, cateye ubwoba bwinshi mu bantu. Nta murwi n'umwe uriyitirira ubu bwicanyi, ariko vyinshi mu bitero nk'ibi bimenyerewe bikorwa n'inyeshamba z'umurwi ADF zirwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda. Umurwi Etat Islamique (IS) nawo wariyitiriye bimwe mu bitero vyayo, ariko gushika ubu ntibiratomoreka neza imigenderanire ufitaniye na ADF. Imbere y'uko iki gitero kiba, ibigwati bibiri vyo muri ako karere vyari vyatewe n'abikekwa ko ari izo nyeshamba za ADF, umurwi umaze igihe ukiririmbira muri ako karere, kuva mu myaka ya 1990. Ibi bibaye mu gihe abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bafise impungenge ku ngingo ya Perezida Tshisekedi yo gutangaza ko intara zibiri - Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri - zigoswe n'ingabo z'igihugu. Bafise ubwoba ko igisirikare kigiye kwongererezwa ububasha mu gihe kivugwa ko gifise amateka mabi cane y'ihohotera.

headline: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
text: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

headline: Umusunikano muri Israel: Ababibonye baravuga ingene abantu 'batererwa mu kirere'
text: Abantu bari ahabereye umusunikano waguyemwo abantu benshi mu rugendo rw'idini baravuga ingene ''batwawe n'umukuba w'abantu, abandi nabo batererwa mu kirere". Nibura abantu 44 bapfuye abandi benshi barakomereka mu rugendo rwo guhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Lag B'Omer ku mucamo w'umusozi Meron. Igiporisi cabwiye ikinyamakuru Haaretz ko uwo musunikano wabaye kubera  bamwe mu bari muri urwo rugendo  banyereye ku ngazi, bituma abandi batemba. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari bitavye urwo rugendo rweranda. Umugabo yatanze izina ryiwe nka David yavuze ko yari yinjiye kuraba ingene batsa igicaniro/icoto bunonyene haza ''umupfunda uvuye hanze". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ynet ati: ''Batumijuye. Abantu banuzwe mu kirere - abandi  barahonyorwa'' ''Hari umwana yagumye yumiye ku kuguru kwanje, agwanira ubuzima. Twarindiriye gutabarwa iminota 15-20 muri uwo musunikano uteye ubwoba". Umwe mu barokotse yajanywe mu bitaro yabwiye television ya reta  Kan ati "Nta n'umwe yari azi ico ari bukore". "Intango n'ukubera abantu benshi cane. Hejuru yanje hari abantu benshi. Nanje nari ndamye hejuru y'uwundi atari agishobora guhema. Hari amaborogo, urudubi. Nabonye abana bari munsi yanje. Icanciye mu mutwe gusa kwari uko umwana wanje atoba impfuvyi". Uwundi yari ahari yavuze ko abantu bazungazunga iburyo n'ibubamfu. ''Inyuma y'iminota 20 nibaza ko abantu bari batanguye kutabasha guhumeka neza gutyo barondera gusohoka, ariko nta n'umwe yashoboye gusohoka. Munsi yanje hari abanrtu batari bagihema. Hari amaborogo menshi y'abavuga ngo "birasanse ko mpema". Uwundi yari ahari, Shlomo Katz,  yavuze ko yari arindiriye abagenzi biwe aca abona abaforoma biruka kandi bongera bagerageza  guhembura abana. Ati: "Ambulance zaguma zinjira zongera zisohoka". Dov Maisel, akora mu rwego rw'abatabara vyihuta rwa United Hatzalah Emergency Services yavuze ko abantu bari ''barundanyeko nk'ipaki y'ikarata''. Avuga ko abakora mu nzego zo gutabara nabo vyabaye ngombwa ko bahabwa inama zo kudahahamuka. Dov Maisel yagize ati: "Abantu benshi bakomeretse., abandi bapfuye ngaha. Abakorerabushake mubona ngaho bakoranijwe bakorerwa inama yo kubafasha kudahahamuka, - kuko babonye ibintu bigoye" Umwe mu bari bahari  yafashije abakomeretse yabwiye Haaretz ati: "Nari nicicaye ngira mfungure nca numva amaborogo. Twaciye twiruka gufasha hanyuma tubona imivyimba. Ubwa mbere bari nka 10, none ubu ni benshi".

headline: Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri UK arasaba imbabazi ku ruhara rw'Ishengero mu bucakara
text: Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasavye imbabazi inyuma y’aho amatohoza yerekaniye ko ikigega c’imitahe y’Ishengero rya anglicane mu Bwongereza gifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Aya matohoza yakozwe asabwe n’ishami ry’iri shengero, Church Commissioners, rijejwe amatungo yaryo, yerekana ko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 100 iki kigega cashize amafaranga menshi cane mw’ikompanyi yari ijejwe gutwara abantu mu bucakara. Ico kigega cari kizwi mu kinjana ca 18 kw’izina rya Queen Anne’s Bounty, cahavuye gihinduka ikigo c’imitahe ishika ku miriyaridi 10,1 z’amapawundi. Musenyeri mukuru Justin Welby avuga ko yababaye cane kwumva ishengero arongoye rifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Ikigega Queen Anne's Bounty cashinzwe mu 1704 mu ntumbero yo gufasha abakozi b’Imana bari bakenye. Itohoza ku makonte yaco mu 1739 ryerekana ko umutahe  w’amapawundi 204.000 (ubu yababa imiriyoni 443 y’amapawundi nyene) washowe mw’ikompanyi South Sea Company yagurisha abacakara b'abanye-Afrika. South Sea Company yari ifise amasezerano yihariye yo kuvana abacakara muri Afrika ibatwara mu bihugu vyatwarwa na Espagne muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 kuva mu myaka ya 1710. Yatwaye ibihumbi mirongo vy’abacakara, amatohoza akerekana ko hafi 15% yabo bapfiriye mu nzira. Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza ryabandanije rishora imitahe muri South Sea Company gushika mu kinjana ca 19. Uyu musenyeri mukuru avuga ati: “Uru rudandaza rw’agahomerabunwa rwafashe abagabo, abagore n’abana baremwe mw’ishusho y’Imana rubaka agateka kabo n’ubwigenge bwabo. “Birateye isoni kubona hari bamwe mw’Ishengero bashigikiye bikomeye bakegeranya amatungo muri uru rudandaza. “Inzira yonyene yo gukira koko kunywanisha – ari yo Yezu Kristu/Yesu Kristo aduhamagarira gufata – ni uko duhangana n’uku kuri kubabaje hanyuma tugafata ingingo”. Ku ruhande rumwe, Ishengero ry’Ubwongereza ririshimira uruhara ryagize mu guhagarika ubucakara, rigafatira ku ruhara umuvugabutumwa wa Anglicane, William Wilberforce, yagize. Ku rundi ruhande, ni ngombwa ko ryemera ko ryagiye ryungukira mu bucakara. Mu myaka iheze, Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza riherutse gusaba imbabazi ku bakozi baryo batari bake babonetse ko bari bafise abacakara. Ryasavye imbabazi kubera ishami ryaryo rijejwe ubutumwa, The Society for the Propagation of the Gospel (twogereranya mu kirundi tuti “Umuryango wo gukwiragiza Inkuru nziza”), ryari rifise itongo ahitwa Barbados, maze rishira ikimenyetso ku bacakara ryakoresha mu gikiriza cavuga ngo SOCIETY (twogereranya n’ijambo UMURYANGO). Ubu rero, ku matohoza yaryo ryo nyene, ryemeye ko mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo ikigega caryo cashoye imitahe y’amafaranga hafi yaryo yose – hampande y’ayo ryakoresheje mu kugura amatongo – mw’ikompanyi yari ifise uruhara yiharije rwo gutwara abacakara muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko. Mu gihe abarenga inusu y’abanywanyi b’Ishengero rya Anglicane kw’isi yose bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, iyi nkuru ishobora kutorosha ibintu. Ishengero rya Anglican mu Bwongereza ryatanguje aya matohoza mu ntumbero yo gushira ahabona kahise karyo rikavuga ko hagiye gutumwako umurwi wo kwiga inyishu ikwiriye. Ariko umuvugizi ntazi nimba ibi bisigura ko hagiye kuba ayandi matangazo n’amasengesho, canke nimba hashobora kubamwo n’ibiganiro ku bijanye n’indishi y’akababaro mu buryo bw’amafaranga. Aya matohoza yerekana kandi ko iki kigega cahawe intererano z’abantu bungukiye canke bafitaniye isano n’ubu bucakara bwabaye hagati y’imigabane hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’ubutunzi bwari bushingiye ku burimyi muri uru rudandaza rw’abantu. Uyu musenyeri mukuru yongerako ati: “Ndasabiye abo bose bakozweko n’iyi nkuru kandi nibaza ko dushobora gukorera hamwe tukihweza iyindi nzira twofata”.

headline: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
text: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

headline: Kenya: Umupasitori yishe umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero
text: Umupasitori wo muri Kenya yatangaje abakirisu igihe yacumita umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bari gusenga ejo ku wa Mungu, mu rusengero bafatanije gushinga mu gisagara ca Mombasa. Abakirisu bari muri urwo rusengero babwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko Elisha Misiko yari yicaye mu kibanza c'imbere, igihe umugore wiwe nawe, Ann Mghoi, yari kuri arutari ariko arasigura. Niho umugabo wiwe Misiko yamusangayo n'imbugita yari yanyegeje mw'ishati yari yambaye amucumita mu mugongo. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfa uburongozi bw'urwo rusengero rwitwa 3 G (Grounds for God's Gospel). Umwe mu bakirisu basengera muri urwo rusengero ati: "Twebwe twibaza ko cari ikintu yari agiye kumubwira, kumbe yari agiye kumucumita imbugita". Uwundi ati: "Uyu mugabo yari yarubakanye n'uyu mupfasoni arongoye uru rusengero, ariko bari barahukanye. Yari amaze kumutera ubwoba incuro nyinshi, kandi yari yanavuze ko azokora ivyo yakoze uno munsi". Ahejeje kumucumitaniho  nawe yaca yicumita mu nda, agerageza no kwikata izosi, mu gihe abakirisu bari bagiye gutabara. Uyo mugabo yaciye apfa ubwo nyene, mu gihe umugore wiwe yagiye gupfira mu bitaro. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bari baratandukanye bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero, aho umwe wese yashaka kuba ari we mukuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Daily Nation. Rwari rusigaye ruyobowe n'umugore, ivyo Pasitori Misiko, umugabo wiwe, atashaka kwumva.

headline: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Katolika, Papa yagenye umugore muri sinodi y'abepiskopi
text: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Ekleziya, Papa yagenye umugore nk'icegera c'umunyamabanga w'inama nkuru y'Abeposkopi. Umubikira Nathalie Becquart, ava mu Bufaransa, azoba afise uburenganzira bwo gutora muri iyo nama, isanzwe ihanura Papa kandi ikaganira ku bibazo bimwe bimwe nkoramutima muri Ekleziya Katolika. Umubikira Becquart yari asanzwe akorana n'iyi sinodi y'Abepiskopi (inama nkuru y'abasenyeri yiga ibibazo nkoramutima vya Ekleziya Katolika) kuva mu 2019 nk'umujenama. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'iyi nama nkuru, Kardinali Mario Grech avuga ko iri genwa ryerekana ko "umuryango wuguruye". Avuga ko iyi ngingo yerekana ko Papa yipfuza ko "abagore bagira uruhara runini mu gufata ingingo muri Ekleziya". Umunyamakuru wa BBC John McManus avuga ko iyi ngingo iterekana ko abagore bashobora kwatirwa mw'ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti, n'aho bamwe mu badashima iyi ngingo babona ko ari yo ibintu bitera bija. Luis Marín de San Martín, umupatiri wo muri Esupanye, na we nyene yagenywe kuba icegera c'umunyamabanga w'iyi nama. Muri ino myaka iheze, Sinodi y'Abepiskopi yaraganiriye ku bibazo nkoramutima bijanye n'ukwemera kw'Ekleziya, harimwo ikibazo c'ingene bakwiye gufata Abakatolika bubatse n'abapfakaye. Iyi ngingo ije haciye ikiringo kidashika ukwezi Papa Francis ahinduye itegeko rya Ekleziya kugira ngo yemerere abagore gusangiza no kurangura amabanga ya Arutari, n'aho iri tegeko rishimangira ko ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti ribandanya kuba iry'abagabo gusa. Hagati aho, mu mwaka uheze, Papa yaragenye abagore batandatu mu nama nkuru ijejwe gukurikirana ikigega ca Vaticano.

headline: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
text: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

headline: Rwanda - Coronavirus: Katolika yafashe ingingo zijanye no gukinga ico kiza
text: Ekleziya Katolika mu Rwanda ihamagarira abakirisu gukurikiza amategeko atangwa n'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus, yiswe Covid-19. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na Antoine Kambanda, Umwepiskopi mukuru wa Diyoseze nkuru ya Kigali akaba n'icegera c'Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, aho amenyesha ingingo zafashwe mu makoraniro zizofasha abakirisu babo kudakoranako ngo bahave bandukizanya. Ibihugu bishika umunani ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze gutangaza ko uwo mugera wamaze kubishikamwo, leta z'u Burundi n'u Rwanda zikaba ziherutse gutangaza ingingo zafashe mu ntumbero yo kwirinda no gukinga uwo mugera. Mw'iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda isaba abakirisu "guhana amahoro ya Kristu ku mutima gusa ata guhana ibiganza canke guhoberana". Isaba kandi ko "mu gihe co gusangira (guhazwa mu Kinyarwanda) ari ugutega ibiganza, atagutega ururimi". Iyo nama yafashe kandi ingingo yo gukura "amazi y'umugisha" (amazi ahezagiye mu kirundi) mu twombo yashirwamwo mw'isengero, maze abakirisu bakaja barayakoramwo mu kugira urumenyetso rw'umusaraba. Basaba abakirisu kudasubira gukora aho yahora ashirwa kuko atakirimwo "kugeza igihe ikibazo kizoba gikemutse". Muri iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepisikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, yemereye abakirisitu ko izobandanya ikurikirana uko bimeze, ikazofata n'izindi ngingo zo kwikingira ni vyaba ngombwa. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, ibihugu vya Togo, Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya, Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon nivyo bimaze guterwa n'uwo mugera. Mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera, ibihugu vy'u Rwanda n'u Burundi biherutse gutangaza ingingo vyafashe mu ntumbero yo gukinga ko ishika muri vyo. U Burundi  bwatangaje ko ingenzi zivuye mu bihugu vy'u Bushinwa, Koreya y'epfo, Iran, Ubutaliyani, Ubudage, Ubufaransa, Ubuyapani na Espanye zizobanza gushirwa mu kibanza categuwe ukwazo nyene mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Nayo mu Rwanda, leta isaba abanyagihugu "kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa" mu bihugu birangwamwo coronavirus, yongera kandi itangaza n'ingingo zitandukanye harimwo n'izo isuku, kugira ngo birinde kwandura.

headline: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
text: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

headline: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
text: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

headline: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
text: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

headline: Burundi: 'Turiyamirije abatwitiranya n'umugambwe' - Abepiskopi gatolika
text: Inama y'Abepiskopi b'i Burundi imenyesha ko ibabajwe n'uko hari bamwe bashaka kuyitiranya n'umugambwe biturutse ku gikorwa bakoze mu matora aheruka nk'indorerezi, mbere bakanashikiriza amahinyu bayabonyewo. Biri mw'itangazo ryasomwe n'umukuru w'iyo nama musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye atanga umuco ku ruhara rwayo muri ayo matora. Iyo nama imenyesha ko itishimiye ingene sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yavuze ivyo yashikirijwe "nk'uko yoba yaritwaye ku vyerekeye amatora". Ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, iyo sentare niho yashikiriza ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa 20/05/2020, aho yanavuze ko utunenge twashikirijwe n'inama y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, co kimwe n'ibirego vyatanzwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ata shingiro bifise. Mw'iryo tangazo, musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye  arongoye inama y'abepiskopi amenyesha ko itigeze yitwara muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingio. Ati: "Ico yakoze kwabaye ukugira ico ishikirije icese ku vyerekeye igikorwa c'uburorerezi yari yaronkeye uruhusha". Abasenyeri b' i Burundi bavuga ko ata mvo n'imwe yari ihari y'uko bitwara ngo kuko uruhara rwabo muri ayo matora cari igikorwa c'umurorerezi kandi bakagendera ku ngingo ngenganyifato y'abarorerezi b'amatora. Avuga ko igikorwa c'abarorerezi kwari ukwandika n'ukugumya gusa amahinyu y'ivyabaye yiboneye n'amaso yiwe gusa. Musenyeri Ntahondereye ati: "Turababajwe n'uko Inama y'abepiskopi yafashwe mu buryo butumvikana nk'uko yoba yaritwaye , ivyo navyo bigatera agapfungu mu mitima y'abantu". "Turanse ko twitiranywa n'umugambwe canke n'umuntu uwo ari we wese yahiganywe mu matora". Inama nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, CECAB, yararungitse abarorerezi bayo barenga 2,700 mu makomine yose bashoboye kuja mu tuzu tw'amatora bahisemwo, nk'uko babivuga mw'itangazo ryabo ryo ku wa 26/05, iminsi ine inyuma y'ayo matora. Mw'iryo tangazo bari bamenyesheje ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twari gushobora gutuma ivyari gutangazwa ko vyayavuyemwo bishobora kutizigirwa. Inyuma y'iryo tangazo, hari bamwe babonye ko Ekleziya Gatorika mu Burundi itari yishimiye ivyari vyaraye bitangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko ari vyo vyavuye mu matora. Hagati aho, inyuma y'aho Evariste Ndayishimiye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi atangarijwe burundu na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ko ari we yatsinze ayo matora, iyo nama y'abepiskopi yaranamukeje mw'itangazo ryayo ryo ku wa 05/06, inamusaba kuba "umukuru w'igihugu wa bose".

headline: Nigeria: Umupasitori atangisha 700$ kugira yereke abantu 'irembo ribashikana mw’ijuru’
text: Umuvugabutumwa muri Nigeria ari mu yabira inyuma yo kubwira abantu ko azi irembo ribashikana mw'ijuru riri mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'ico gihugu, ariko ko kugira aribereke bategerezwa gutanga amafaranga. Pasitori Ade Abraham yarezwe mu gipolisi n'umwe mu banywanyi biwe avuga ko uyo mu pasitori yamutangishije 310.000 y'amanaira (amafaranga yo muri Nigeria), angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 750, kugira ngo bashobore kubona iryo rembo avuga ko riri mu gisagara ca Araromi-Ugbeshi, mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu muvugabutumwa yemereye BBC ko koko yabwiye abantu ivy'iryo rembo, akavuga ko ari "Imana akorera" yarimweretse mu ntumbero yo kuraba aho abanyashengero biwe bageza mu kwemera kwabo, ariko akavuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aramuha amafaranga. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu muri Nigeria ryasohoye itangazo ryikurako uyo mupasitori Ade Abraham, igipolisi co mu ntara ya Ekiti naco kikaba cegeranije inzandiko z'abanywanyi b'ishengero ryiwe, kikaba catanguye amatohoza. Ishengero rya Pasitori Ade Abraham ryahora rifise icicaro mu ntara ya Kogi, mu nyuma ryimukira mu ntara ya Kaduna, imbere y'uko ryimukira amaja mu bumanuko n'abanywanyi baryo, mw'ikambi yubatse mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu munyashengero yamureze ku gipolisi yaciye yisubirira muhira iwe i Kaduna kuva ico gihe, ariko umugore wiwe yaranse kumukurikira, akavuga ko "igihe c'umunezero" cari kigiye gushika vuba. Ariko uyu mugabo n'umugore badashaka ko amazina yabo amenyekana babwiye BBC ko babandanya bavugana kuri terefone umusi ku musi. Pasitori Ade, azwi kandi kw'izina rya Noah Abraham (Nowa Aburahamu), aherutse kwerekanwa mw'ireresi yazungurutse cane, aho yariko asaba abasenga Imana gutera akamo incuti zabo ziri mu mahanga gutanga intererano y'amafaranga mu rusengero rwiwe.

headline: Mu mafoto: Umusi mukuru wa Christmas hirya no hino kw'isi
text: Abantu hirya no hino kw'isi bariko barahimbaza kimwe mu biringo vyeranda ku kirangamisi c'abakristu. Ariko inkuka z'imisa n'imisi mikuru vy'uyu mwaka vyitabwe n'abantu bake cane kubera ikiza ca coronavirus. Ukutegerana no kwambara agapfukamunwa ni vyo bintu bishasha bitegerezwa kwubahirizwa. headline: Germany: Igarariza rya Katolika mu guhezagira ababana basangiye igitsina, n'abagore basoma misa
text: Ng'izo inkengeri ziravuze, inanga ziratangura gusamirana, maze Patiri Jan Korditschke na we araduga kuri Arutari kugira ahereze inkuka y'imisa. Vyose bisa nk'uko vyahora bimeze iyo hageze imisa ku wa Mungu muri Katolika. Ariko muri ako kanya nyene, hari ikintu kidasanzwe kiri mu mitima ya bamwe kandi kibateye impungenge. Ikintu kigomba kibe ni ikidasanzwe na gato. Patiri Korditschke arafashe ijambo, ati "uwo wese yipfuza umuhezagiro w'Imana ni ahaguruke". Hafi abari mw'isengero bose barahaguruka, harimwo n'abatari bake basanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina. Ng'ako akaririmbo karatanguye, patiri na we aregera, maze abaza umwe umwe ico yipfuza gusaba Imana mu bisabisho vyabo. Hanyuma niko kuganzura ibiganza yubika ku mitwe yabo asengera umwe umwe. Hari benshi bakoroye amosozi. Aba rero si abandi, ni ba bandi bubakanye basangiye ibitsina, inyuma y'imyaka itari mike nibwo bwa mbere bakiriwe ukuri kwamye muri Ekleziya. Umwe muri bo Sangha, umukatolika kuva avuka ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye, Frieda kuva imyaka 25 yose, ati: "Ni ibintu bibabaje cane kandi ubu niho mbonye ingene nakomerekejwe ku mutima". "Mu myaka 49 yose, sinigeze nakirwa. Ariko rero impera n'imperuka, abantu baratanguye kuvuga bati: 'kuba uri ng'aha nta ngorane'". Ku bwa Matthias, na we nyene yavutse ari umukatolika akaba yaronse uwo muhezagiro ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye Thomas, kuja mu misa ntiyigeze iba ingorane. Ariko avuga ko amajambo ashikirizwa n'abategetsi ba Katolika yamutumye yiyumvira guhindura idini. Ati: "Igihe cose namye nibaza nimba ari ngombwa ko nguma mw'idini ritanyemera. Ariko rero, Ekleziya 'nyayo' hano ku rubuga, irongeye kugarura ukwemera kwanje". Mu buryo bw'agahemo, ijambo nk'iri rishikirizwa n'abategetsi ni ryo ryatumye iyi misa igenda uko yagenze. Mu kwa gatatu, Vaticano yasohoye itangazo rikomeye rivuga ko ukwubakana hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ari "icaha", rinashimangira ko abapatiri bose bazohirahira bagahezagira abubakana basangiye igitsina bashirwa ku ruhande. Iki ni ikintu abapatiri bo nyene ku giti cabo bakora - ariko ni gake biba ku mugaragaro. Iri jambo rikarishe rya Vaticano ryashavuje abakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Mu kwishura, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abapatiri, ababikira n'abakirisu baciye batanguza isekeza bise Liebe gewinnt (Urukundo Ruratsinda/l'Amour Triomphe/Love Wins), kugira bemeze ku mugaragaro ko ababana basangiye ibitsina bemewe mu masengero yabo. Patiri Korditschke ati: "Narashavuye numva n'isoni kubera nibaza ko ari ijambo ribabaje cane". Ni umwe mu bapatiri hafi  120 bo mu Budagi bafashe ingingo yo kugarariza ku mugaragaro iri tegeko rya Vaticano. Mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa abapatiri baremesheje ibisabisho mu masengero ya Katolika mu gihugu cose c'Ubudagi bahezagira abantu abo ari bo bose babisavye, harimwo n'abubakanye mu buryo Vaticano ibona ko ari icaha, nk'abubakanye n'abahukanye, hamwe n'abubakanye basangiye igitsina. Umunyamakuru wa BBC abajije Patiri Korditschke ingene asigura igituma aja kubiri n'itegeko rya Vaticano, yishuye akorora amosozi. Guhezagira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina biri mu bintu bigenda vyiyongera mu bakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka k'abagore, nka Maria 2.0, nayo nyene asaba uburenganzira bungana muri Ekleziya. Haciye umusi umwe inyuma y'iki gisabisho ca Patiri Korditschke i Berlin, abagore baragiye ku ruhimbi basigura ijambo ry'Imana mu masengero ya Katolika 12 atandukanye y'Ubudagi - na vyo nyene Vaticano ikaba itavyemera. Ulrike Göken-Huismann umugore yashikirije ijambo mw'isengero asengeramwo mu karere ka Düsseldorf, avuga ati: "Ekleziya yahora itwigisha ko Isi iringaniye kandi yatwigisha ko twategerezwa kuvyemera uko. Ariko rero vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya ihindura. Canke kandi wibuke ko wategerezwa kwemwera ko Adamu na Eva ari abantu babayeho. Ntibivuga y'uko Ekleziya idategerezwa guhindura ivyo yigisha". Abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika mu Budagi ntibahuza: hari uruhande rumwe rw'abasenyeri  rushigikiye ko ibintu bihinduka, mu gihe urundi ruhande rw'abarongoye Ekleziya ruryumako, rukaba rushigikiye intumbero ya Vaticano itarota iva kw'izima . Hagati aho, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko hari abakatolika ku giti cabo mu Budagi bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka. Icigwa kimwe cakozwe n'amashure kaminuza yo mu bisagara vya Berlin na Münster cerekana ko ibice 70% vy'abakatolika mu Budagi bashigikiye ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bahezagirwa, 80% nabo bakaba ata ngorane babona ku bantu babanye batarahezagirwa, hanyuma 85% nabo bakaba babona ko abapatiri nabo bokwemererwa kurongora. Inyuma y'igisabisho co guhezagira abubakanye basangiye igitsina i Berlin, abantu baharurwa mw'ijana baciye bakoranira hamwe hanze y'isengero biha agacupa mu buryo bwo kwigina kuri iyo ntambwe. Ariko kw'irembo ry'isengero, abantu bashika cumi bakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyi ngendo, bafise icapa canditseko ngo "Imana ntihezagira icaha". Nta mishamirano iri hagati y'izi mpande ariko zompi zigizwe n'abantu bakomeye muri Ekleziya Katolika badahuriza hamwe. Amwenyura, Patiri Korditschke  wewe yivugira ati "ivyo na vyo ni sawa." Papa avuga iki ku bijanye n'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye? Mu kw'icumi 2020: Papa Francis yabwiye umuhinga akora amareresi ko abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina "bokwemererwa imbere y'amategeko".  "Abahuza ibitsina babisangiye ... ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango. Nta n'umwe yokwirukanwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico". Mu kw'icumi  2014: Ikoraniro ry'abasenyeri b'Ekleziya (synod) bahakanye ivyipfuzo vyari bishigikiwe na Papa ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bokwemerwa. Mu kw'indwi  2013: Ari mu ndege ari ku rugendo, Papa yabwiye abanyamakuru ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye batokumirwa ahubwo ko boshirwa mu muryango. Yavuze ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye basanzwe bari mu barongoye Ekleziya bogirirwa imbabazi, ivyaha vyabo bigaharirwa. 2013:Mu gitabo On Heaven and Earth (Ku vyerekeye Ijuru n'Isi), Papa avuga ko gufata ku rugero rumwe abahuza  ibitsina babisangiye n'abubakana badasangiye ibitsina kwoba "ari ugusubira inyuma nk'ibirenge". 2010: Igihe yari musenyeri mukuru wa Buenos Aires yariyamiriza ko amategeko yemerera abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina ariko agashigikira ko abasanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokingirwa n'amategeko ku rugero kanaka.

headline: Anglican ya UK yabujije umukobwa wa Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo gushingura
text: Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza ryabujije umukobwa w’umuhisi Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo guhamba kubera yubakanye n’umugore nka we. Mpho Tutu van Furth ni umupasitori mw’ishengero Anglican muri diyoseze ya Washington, akaba yari yasabwe kuyobora imisa yo guhamba uwari umuvyeyi wiwe w'ibatisimu, Martin Kenyon, ahitwa Shropshire mu Bwongereza ejo ku wa kane. Tutu van Furth yabwiye BBC ko kumwankira “bisa n’ubugome kandi bibabaje”. Diyoseze ya Hereford ivuga ko vyari "ibintu bitoroshe". Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza (Church of England) ntiryemerera abavugabutumwa baryo ko barongorana n’abo basangiye ibitsina kuko inyigisho ritanga ari uko ukwubakana biba hagati y’umugabo n’umugore. Hagati aho, ishengero rya Anglican rigenzi ryaryo muri Amerika, rizwi nka Église épiscopalienne des États-Unis /The Episcopal Church, riremerera abavugabutumwa baryo kwubakana n’abo basangiye ibitsina. Itangazo rya Diyosezi ya Hanoford rivuga riti: "Hatanzwe impanuro hisunzwe aho inama y’Abepiskopi ihagaze ku bijanye n’abarongorana basangiye ibitsina”. Uwahoze ari musenyeri wa Liverpool, Paul Bayes asanzwe ari mu bahimiriza ko ishengero rihindura aho rihagaze ku bijanye n’igitsina, avuga ko “atari vyiza kuvuga ngo ibintu ntivyoroshe”. "Ni ngombwa ko vuba bwango kami ka muntu, umwitwarariko mu butumwa, hamwe n’urukundo, bihabwa ikibanza”. Umuryango wa Kenyon umaze kubwirwa iyi ngingo y’Urusengero, waciye wimura igisabisho co gusezera ikivana kw’isengero St Michael ikijana kuri All Angels ahitwa Wentnor, hafi y’ikigo ca Musenyeri, ahantu hazwi cane, hafi y’aho uyu muvugabutumwa aba kugira ngo umupfasoni Tutu van Furth ashobore guhagarikira iki gisabisho avuge n’ubutumwa. Tutu van Furth  yabwiye BBC ati: "Birababaje cane. Vyumvikana ko ari ingingo y’abategetsi ba ruburakigongwe." Kenyon yari incuti ya hafi cane n’uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru muri Afrika y’Epfo umuhisi Desmond Tutu. Tutu van Furth yategetswe guhagarika ivyo kuvuga ubutumwa nka pasitori muri Afrika y’Epfo inyuma y’aho yubakaniye n’umugore nkawe, Marceline van Furth, umwigisha wa kaminuza wo mu Buholande, mu 2015. Se wiwe Desmond Tutu - yitavye Imana muri Kigarama (12) 2021 - yaratsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel mu 1984 kubera  uruhara yagize mu kurwanya ya ntwaro y’ivangura ya apartheid muri Afrika y’Epfo. Nawe nyene yararwaniye uburenganzira bw’abahuza ibitsina babisangiye yongera ashigikira ukurongorana hagati y’abasangiye ibitsina. Mu 2013 yavuze ati: Nopfuma mpeba kuja mw’ijuru ryanka abatinganyi. Oya, novuga nti mbabarira, nshaka kuvuga ko nopfuma nja mu kindi kibanza. “Sinosenga Imana yanka abatinganyi kandi uku niko ndavyumva cane”. Yongeyeko ati: " Muri rino sekeza, mfise ishaka nk’iryo nari mfise mu kurwanya apartheid. Kuri jewe, bimeze co kimwe”.

headline: Tanzania: Perezida Magufuli yirukanye umukozi wa leta yatabuye Ikorowani
text: Perezida John  Magufuli wa Tanzania amenyesha ko yirukanye burundu mu kazi umukozi wa leta yatabuye igitabo ceranda c'Ikorowani, maze akwiragiza isanamu ku mbuga hwaniro ariko arayitabura. Yatangaje iyo ngingo uno munsi mu gihe yari mu birori vyo kwugurura ibiro vy'akarere ka Kigamboni mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Ati: "Nyakwubahwa Jafo, hirya y'ejo niho numva, ko hari umuntu hariya i Kilosa yatabuye igitabo ceranda". "Ndagushimiye cane kubona warafashe ingingo yo kuba uramuhagarika, ariko jeho ndamwirukanye burundu. Mwandikire ikete ko yirukanywe burundu". "Atsinda urubanza canke atsindwa, uyo ntakiri umukozi wa leta, ntidushobora kubandanya dukorana n'abakozi b'ibijuju nk'abo muri ino leta". Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutegetsi bw'intara n'amakomine, Selemani Jafo, yategetse ko umukozi w'ibiro vy'akarere ka Kilosa mu ntara ya Morogoro, Daniel Elimringi, ahagarikwa, ku caha co gutabura igitabu c'idini rya Isilamu, Ikorowani. Jafo ati: "Ni ukuri, iki kintu cakozwe n'umukozi nk'uyu nta ciza kizanira igihugu cacu kubera abanyagihugu bacu mu madini yose basanzwe babanye mu mahoro kandi bubahana mu butandukane". Iyo ngingo ya Jafo yafashwe inyuma y'aho isanamu yerekana uyo mukozi wa leta mu gisata c'ubudandaji mu biro vy'akarere ka Kilosa ariko aratabagura ico gitabo, ikwiragijwe ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye. Ikinyamakuru Mtanzania co muri ico gihugu kimenyesha ko uyo mukozi yamaze kurengutswa muri sentare, kandi ko yankiwe kuburana yidegemvya. Ico kinyamakuru gitangaza ko urwo rubanza ruzosubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 20 z'uku kwa kabiri.

headline: Papa Francis yagenye abakardinali bashasha: Harimwo Umunyarwanda Antoine Kambanda
text: Papa Francis ahejeje gutangaza amazina y'abakardinali bashasha 13 muri bo hakaba harimwo Musenyeri mukuru wa Kigali, Antoine Kambanda. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda ni we Munyarwanda wa mbere agenywe kuba umukardinali. Muri abo 13, icenda bari munsi y'imyaka 80, bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu murwi w'abakardinali bashobora gutora umusubirizi wa Papa mu gihe yokwitaba Imana canke agatanga imihoho. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda afise imyaka 61, yavukiye mu Bugesera, mu 2018 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize Musenyeri mukuru (Arkepiskopi) wa Kigali canke umukuru wa Ekleziya Gatolika mu Rwanda. Kambanda yize amashuri mato n'ayisumbuye mu Burundi, muri Uganda no muri Kenya imbere yo kurangiza  ivyigwa vya Tewolojiya muri Seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda mu Rwanda. Inyandiko za Ekleziya mu Rwanda zivuga ko mu kwezi kwa cenda mu 1990 aribwo Papa Paul II yamugize umupatiri. Kuva mu 1993 yagiye kwiga i Roma aho yavanye impamyabushobozi y'ikirenga muri Tewolojiya. Inyuma y'amashuri yiwe, igihe kinini yari umwigisha muri seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda, aza no kuyiyobora kugeza mu 2013. Muri uwo mwaka wa 2013 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kibungo kugeza mu 2018 ahabwa amabanga yo kuyobora kiliziya mu Rwanda. Kardinali ni rwo rwego rukuru rwo mu butegetsi bwa ekleziya umuntu ashobora kugerako imbere yo kuba Papa, umuyobozi wa Ekleziya Gatolika kw'isi. Ekleziya Gatolika yari isanzwe ifise abakardinali 219, muri abo 29 gusa ni bo bo muri Africa, mu gihe igihugu nk'Ubutaliyano conyene gifise abakaldinali 41. Ibihugu vya Africa bisanzwe bifise abakardinali ni: Aba bakardinali bashasha 13 batowe na Papa Francis bazemezwa kuri iyo mirimo kw' igenekerezo 28 z'ukwezi kwa 11 nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ya Vatican. Muri bo harimwo uwitwa Mauro Gambetti yari asanzwe ari umupatiri. Urwego rw'abakardinali rumeze nka reta ya Papa. Bamwe bakorera i Vatican abandi baguma bakorera mu bihugu vyabo bakajayo igihe batumijwe. Amategeko abagenga avuga ko Abakardinali igikorwa cabo ca mbere ari ugutora umu Papa mushasha iyo uwusanzwe ahari apfuye canke avuye mu mirimo. Gusa muri bose, 120 ni bo baba bagize inama itora Papa mushasha. Bashingwa kandi iyindi mirimo itandukanye harimwo gukurikirana ibikorwa vy'abasenyeri, guhagararira amashuri ya Ekleziya, ivugabutumwa, eka bakagira n'inteko ijejwe sentare zitatu za ekleziya. Abakardinali ariko kandi baba bajejwe guhagararira diyoseze n'imiburiburi zibiri canke zirenga mu bihugu bakomokamwo. Abakardinali bambara ibara ry'umutuku kuvyo amategeko ya katolika asobanura ko baba "biteguye kumena amaraso yabo mu gukorera uwo basubiriye intumwa Petero."

headline: Umupfakazi wa TB Joshua mu rugamba rwo kurongora ishengero yasize muri Nigeria
text: Evelyn Joshua yabaye umurongozi w'imwe mu mashengero akomeye y'abarokore muri Afrika, ariko uwo mupfasoni w'imyaka 52 ahanganye n'ikibazo co kubungabunga iragi ry'umugabo wiwe. Urupfu rwa Joshua rwabaye giturumbuka mu kwezi kwa gatandatu afise imyaka 57 rwatumye hatangura intambara yo kumusubirira yamaze amezi n'amezi kugira ironke inyishu. Ariko imiryango y'iryo shengero ryiwe rya Synagogue Church of All Nations (SCOAN), iri mu gisagara kinini cane muri Nigeria, yasubiriye kwugurugwa kugira yakire abayoboke baryo ubwa mbere mu mezi atanu. Yari rurangiranwa kubera imburi ziwe n'inyigisho, vyatumye ahurumbirwa n'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abayoboke bavuye hirya no hino kw'isi baja Lagos, harimwo n'abanyepolitike bakomeye bo muri Afrika na Amerika y'epfo. Ni gake haba ibiganiro vy'isubirizwa mu mashengero y'abarokore muri Nigeria mbere kenshi uburongozi buca buhabwa umupfakazi w'uwuba yarashinze ishengero. Ariko muri SCOAN, umupfasoni wa Joshua, yari umupasitori yatiwe, ahanganye n'abandi kubera atari mu rwego rukuru rurongoye iryo shengero. Ibi bifatwa n'abo bahanganye ko ari ikimenyetso c'uko umugabo wiwe atigeze amufata nk'uwushobora kumusubirira. Bitandukanye n'abandi bagore b'abapasitori  bo muri Nigeria, ntiyiyerekana cane mu myaka irenga mirongo itatu bari bamaze bubakanye. TB Joshua afatwa n'abayoboke ba SCOAN nk'"intumwa", yakorana n'umugwi  umwegereye cane yita "inararibonye" - umwe muri bo bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko ari we azomusubirira. Ariko inyuma y'urupfu rwiwe, abari begereye umupfasoni wa Joshua barahawe uburenganzira na sentare bwo kumugira umwe mu bagize urwego nshingwantwaro, bica vyorosha kugera ku ntambwe yo gushika kuri ayo mabanga. Iryo shengero ryaciye rimenyesha ko umupfasoni wa Joshua  abaye umurongozi mushasha "Arongowe n'Imana", ivyababaje ayandi mashami ari muri iryo shengero ku kungene bitabaye mu muco. Cane cane umugwi uzwi kw'izina rya Global Congress of SCOAN Members (GCSM), vyitwa ko ushigikiwe n'abayoboke bo mu rwego rwo hejuru, warerekanye amakenga kuri iyo ngingo. Ariko nta madidane yabaye ku mukuru yari kurongora amasengesho ubwa mbere ya SCOAN itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe kuva umugabo wiwe apfuye. Bivugwa ko atahemye kugira yerekane ubutegetsi bwiwe muri iryo shengero, mu gukoresha amezi make ya nyuma mu gusukura iryo shengero. Hari ama Video yagiye ahabona y'abayoboke, benshi b'abanyamahanga, bamaze imyaka baba  muri urwo rupangu runini, bariko baravayo bariko barabazomera. Umwe mu bayoboke yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo ko "cari icigwa". Abakuwe muri ico kibanza vyavuzwe ko bari abadashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'umupfasoni wa Joshua. Patrick Iwelunmor, yahoze ajejwe kumenyeshamakuru ku muhisi Joshua, yabwiye BBC ati:"Inyuma y'urupfu rw'intumwa, bamwe mu bamugendanira ntibavugisha Evelyn mu rupfasoni." Hari n'inkuru kandi yerekeye igiturire, mbere igisata ca Nigeria kijejwe kugwanya igiturire, EFCC, cemereye BBC ko kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku bivuga ko habaye ubusuma muri iryo shengero. Ntibiramenyekana nimba ibi ari vyo biriko biragirwako amatohoza, kuko ikinyamakuru co muri Nigeria The Punch cari canditse ko iki ari co gituma bamwe mu bayoboke b'iryo shingiro boba banyegeye. Ubu ikigiye kugora cane umupfasoni Joshua n'ugukora ku buryo abayoboke ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakunda umugabo wiwe biyumvamwo ukwemera kwiwe. Baje kubera igihagararo ciwe n'ubwitonzi hakaba ata co biteze ku mutegetsi mushasha. Gbenga Osinaike, arongoye uruganda rw'abamenyeshamakuru mu kinyamakuru Church Times Nigeria, aremeza ko igenwa ryiwe ryaje giturumbuka. Yabwiye BBC ati:"Yahora asengesha rimwe na rimwe arik TB ntiyigeze amuha icizere." Ariko nk'umuntu atigeze yitabwaho  na benshi, "harimwo n'umugabo wiwe", umupfasoni Joshua yarerekanye " inguvu n'ubushobozi afise mu gutwara iryo shengero." Yaranse ko ahabwa icubahiro c'umugabo wiwe ca " uwujejwe gucungera vyose", avuga ko ari we akibarongoye, ko gusa "atanguriye urugendo aho data yashikanye inkino". Kandi TB Joshua aracafise ikibanza gikomeye muri iryo shengero, amafoto yiwe amanitse hose mu nzu, inyigisho ziwe na zo ziguma zica ku mbuga hwaniro ziwe. Bisa kandi n'uko umupfasoni Joshua yasigaranye iragi ry'ingene umugabo wiwe yigisha - aho yaguma acishamwo indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana - aho n'umudiho usa n'uwo umugabo wiwe aho yariko arahereza inkuka ari wenyene. Ko ari babiri bahuye ubwa mbere mu 1990 aho yamutangaza mu kumubwira ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, yandika n'izina ryiwe ku rupapuro ata jambo na rimwe amubwiye. Bamaranye iminota 45 incuro ya mbere babonana, aho inyuma y'aho yaciye amusaba ko bokwubakana. 'Impano yo kunywanisha' Ni ihasa akaba n'imfura mu muryango w'abana indwi, yakuriye i Okala Okpuno mu ntara ya Delta mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. N'aho atatanguye ari umupasitori, yaramenyerejwe hanyuma arabuhabwa n'umugabo wiwe. Mu 2009, yavuze ko ari umuntu afise impano zidasanzwe mu kunywanisha - "imigenderanire y'abavyeyi n'abana, abubakanye n'ibindi bintu nk'ivyo." Abasitori bakuru muri Nigeria kenshi bavuga ko baronse umuhamagaro uva muri bibiriya - nk'abahanuzi Samuel na Paul - kugira bakorere Imana. Nk'uko bivugwa na Joshua, umuhamagaro wiwe waje igiye yerekwa mu kiringo c'imisi itatu aho yumva ijwi rigira riti:"Ndi Imana yawe. Ndaguhaye ubutumwa bweranda bwo kugenda gukora igikorwa ceranda c'Imana." Umupfasoni Joshua ntaravuga ko yaronse umuhamagaro nk'uwo, ariko kuri bamwe, kuba bakorana n'umugabo wiwe birakwiye. Iwelunmo agira ati:"TB Joshua yari intumwa kuva avuka, ariko umugore wiwe yamubaye kubera we. Umugabo n'umugore babaye umwe, kubera ubwo bumwe yaciye na we asigwa amavuta." N'aho bamwe mu bapfakazi b'abakuru b'amashengero muri Nigeria, nka Janet Onaolapo wa Abundant Life Gospel Mission na Margaret Idahosa wa Church of God Mission International , barongoye neza amashengero yabo, s'ibintu bisanzwe. Amashengero y'abapantekoti muri Nigeria yubakiye ku gihagararo c'abayashinze, akaba asambuka bamaze gupfa. Osinaike avuga ko ivyo bishobora gushikira na SCOAN. Avuga ati:"Iyo hageze ku bibazo vy'ishengero, abantu baza kurondera inyishu, kurondera ibitangaro, kuraba uwoba yareretswe ibiberekeye. "Icuka gitegerezwa kuzosubira hasi."

headline: Uwahoze ari Pope Benedict ntaco yakoze kw'ihohoterwa, biri mu cegeranyo gishasha
text: Uwahoze ari Papa Benedicto XVI yarananiwe  no kugira ico akoze ku mabi yo guhohotera abana igihe yari akiri musenyeri mukuru i Munich , nk'uko bivugwa n'amatohoza yo mu Budagi ku bijanye na Ekereziya Katorika. Papa Benedicto, ico gihe yari azwi nka  Josef Ratzinger, yari muri ico kibanza hagati ya 1977 na 1982. Yarahakanye ko ivyo vyabaye. Ariko icegeranyo gishasha ku mabi avugwa ko yakozwe muri kahise cakozwe n'ikigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi kiragiriza uwo yahoze ari umwungere mukuru. Ihohoterwa ryarabandanije igihe yari musenyeri mukuru, nk'uko bivugwa, kandi abapatiri bagirizwa bagumye mu mabanga bari bafise mu masengero bakoramwo. Uwo yahoze ari papa, ubu afise imyaka 94, yabaye indongozi ya mbere ya Ekereziya yatanze imihoho (yeguye)  mu myaka irenga 600 mu 2013, avuga ko arushe. Kuva ico gihe, abayeho mu buzima buhwekereye i Vaticano aho azwi nka papa 'emerite'. Ico cegerenyo gishasha c'ico kigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi citwa Westpfahl Spilker Wastl  casabwe na Ekereziya Katorika. Umunyamategeko Martin Pusch  ashikiriza ico cegeranyo yavuze ati: "Habiri  muri aho vyabaye  vyakozwe  ku gihe ciwe hanyuma birenzwako amaso na reta." "Kuri vyompi, ababikoze bagumye bakora amabanga y'ubupatiri yo kwitaho abantu." Hari hamwe bivugwa ko yari azi umupatiri yagirizwa guhohotera abana b'abahungu yimuriwe muri diyoseze yiwe, ariko abandanya gukora amabanga yo kwitaho abakristu  - aho hakaba harimwo rimwe na rimwe kugendera no gushigikira  abantu mu kibano iwabo. Uwo yahoze ari Papa bivugwa ko yarungitse impapuro nyinshi z'inyishu ku bibazo vy'ico kigo, aho yerekanye ko ashigikiye iryo tohoza ariko agahakana kuba yarigeze amenya canke yanka kugira ico akoze kuri iryo hohoterwa rivugwa. Ico cegeranyo, yamara, kirimwo  inyandiko zisa n'izerekana bikomeye ko yari ari mu nama aho ico kibazo cavuzwe. Vaticano yavuze mw'itangazo ko izokwihweza ido n'ido ry'ico cegeranyo niyo camara gusohoka. Vaticano yongeyeko iti: "Nk'uko twongeye guterwa  isoni n'ukwicuza twatewe n'amabi yakorewe abana bakiri bato n'abapatiri, Icicaro Ceranda kirashikirije ko gishigikiye abahuye n'ayo mabi bose kandi kiremeza inzira yo gukingira abatarakura n'uko haba ibibanza vy'aho ata kibi bashobora gukorerwa". Icegeranyo caheruka ku mabi yakozwe muri kahise mu Budagi cerekanye ko abantu bashika 3.600 mu gihugu cose bari barakorewe amabi n'abantu bo mu mu nzego za ekereziya  hagati ya 1946 na 2014. Benshi mu bayakorewe bari abana bakiri bato kandi bakora nk'abahungu b'abakorezi kuri arutari. Ico cegeranyo gishasha cibanze ku turere twa Munich na Freising  catoye vyihariye ko nibura abantu 497 bakorewe ihohoterwa kuva mu 1945 gushika mu 2019. Uretse uwo yahoze ari papa, ico cegeranyo kiranegura abandi bantu bo muri  ekereziya, harimwo umusenyeri mukuru w'iyo ntara muri iki gihe, Cardinal Reinhard Marx. Abakoze amatohoza basanze nawe hari aho ataco yakoze ku hantu  habiri havugwa ihohoterwa. Uwo mu karidinari aramaze gusaba  Papa François gutanga imihoho mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2011 avuga ko akwiye kwumva nawe hari ico yobazwa ku "kaga" k'ihohoterwa riguma rishirwa ahabona. Papa François ariko yaranse ubusabe bwiwe bwo gutanga imihoho. Imbere yaho, papa yari yahinduye amategeko ya Vaticano ajanye n'ivyaha, aho yakajije cane aho ekereziya ihagaze ku vyerekeye ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.

headline: Vatican: Kardinali Becciu yategetswe gutanga imihoho, ibitari bimenyerewe
text: Umukardinali yari mu bari bafise amabanga akomeye i Vaticano kwa Papa, Giovanni Angelo Becciu, yatanze imihoho giturumbuka ariko akavuga ko yategetswe na Papa Francis. Avuga ko yiketswe gukoresha umutungo wa Ekleziya yihera benewabo, agahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Kardinali Becciu yari umwe mu begereye cane Papa, akaba yarigeze kuba ajejwe amabanga mu bunyamabanga bwa leta ya Vaticano. Yagiye kugira uruhara mu masezerano yateye impari yo gushora imitahe mu nyubakwa nziza ya Londres mu mafaranga ya Ekleziya. Iki gikorwa kuva ico gihe kiriko kirakorwako amatohoza. Ntibikunze kuboneka aho abantu bo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Vaticano batanga imihoho, kandi na Vaticano nta vyinshi yabivuzeko mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa kane. Ariko uyu mu kardinali w'imyaka 72 yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Domani co mu Butaliyano ko yategetswe gutanga imihoho kuko yiketswe ko yahaye benewabo amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Avuga ati: "Nta n'urufaranga na rumwe jewe nigeze niba. Nta matohoza ndiko ndakorwako, ariko ari nka hamwe bonshira imbere y'ubutungane, nokwisigura". Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagiye gushikiriza mu nyuma, uyu mukardinali avuga ko ibogozwa ryiwe ryabaye giturumbuka. Avuga ko na Papa "atari agononokewe" igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru. Ati: "Ni ibisigabwenge. Gushika ejo…niyumvira ko nari umugenzi pfa mpfe wa Papa, intumwa yiwe y'umwizigirwa". "Mu nyumn rero niho Papa yambwira ko atakinyizeye kuko yaronse amakuru yahawe n'abacamanza bamubwira ko nakoze icaha co kunyuruza umutungo". Kardinali Becciu ashimangira ko habaye "ukutumvikana", akongera kandi ati: "Nditeguye gusigurira Papa vyose. Nta caha na kimwe nakoze". Uyu mukardinali Giovanni Angelo Becciu ni umutaliyano yamaze imyaka ya mbere akora mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Vaticano. Papa Francis niwe yamugize umukardinali mu 2018, igihe aherewe amabanga mashasha yo kurongora igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'ubweranda. Yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano avuga ati: "Ni uruhombo kuri jewe, umuryango wanje, abanyagihugu b'igihugu canje. Navyemeye ku bugamburutsi n'urukundo mfitiye Ekleziya na Papa". N'aho mu vyo yagirijwe harimwo ibijanye n'amasezerano ajanye n'inyubakwa ya Londres ivugwa ko yaguzwe mu mutungo wa Ekleziya, Kardinali Becciu wewe siko abibona. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, uyu mukardinali yavuze ko Papa yamwagirije ko yakoresheje nabi umutungo wa Ekleziya akawushira mu ma koperative n'urucuruza vya benewabo. Ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano kandi bivuga ko Papa atanezerejwe n'ingene imperezwa yo gufashisha abakene yiswe Peter's Pence yagiye gukoreshwa mu bindi bitari biyigenewe. Kardinali Becciu azobandanya afise iki giti n'aho yatanze imihoho. Hagati aho, nta ruhara azogira mu gutora uwundi mu Papa.

headline: France: Cardinali Ricard ari mu basenyeri 11 bagirizwa guhohotera abana
text: Umu cardinali w’Umufaransa Jean Pierre Ricard yavuzwe izina na Ekleziya Katolika nk’umwe mu basenyeri 11 bagikorera canke bigeze gukorera iryo shengero bagirizwa guhohotera abana Mw'itangazo, uyo mu cardinali yanditse ko yahohoteye  umwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 igihe yari akiri padiri kw'iparuwase haraheze  imyaka mirongo 35,  kandi ko ubu ashobora gukura meza mu mabanga yiwe. H﻿araciye umwaka, umugwi washinzwe utoye ivyemeza ko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bashurashuza abana, bakorera mw'ishengero Katolika ry'Ubufaransa mu myaka irenga mirongo ibiri. Uko   bagirizwa ari 11 bose barashengejwe mu butungane canke bahabwa ibihano na Ekleziya Katolika. I﻿bi vyagiye ahabona mu gihe mu gihe hariko haraba inama y'abepisikopi b'Ubufaransa i Lourdes, mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'Ubufaransa. Musenyeri mukuru Eric de Moulins-Beaufort yabariye abamenyeshamakuru ko muri abo 11 harimwo Musenyeri wa Creteil Michel Santier yagiye mu karuhuko ko muzabukuru mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo kwagirizwa ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina mu myaka  mirongo ibiri iheze. Bamwe bariko bakorwako amatohoza ajanye n'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina  mu gihe abandi bagirizwa kubinuma. Musenyeri mukuru yasomeye ku mugaragaro ikete rya Cardinali Ricard, aho yavuze ko yitwaye nabi "mu buryo bukwiye guhanwa" ku mwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 kandi ko  mu vy’ukuri imyitwarire yiwe yagize ingaruka mbi kandi  zitazopfa zibagiwe kuri uwo mwana w'umukobwa. Mu gihe ubu ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru inyuma y'imyaka 18 ari musenyeri wa Bordeaux, uwo mu cardinali w'imyaka 78 yavuze ko yamusavye ikigongwe kandi asaba n'imbabazi ku bantu bose yababaje. M﻿usenyeri ahari ubu, Jean Paul James, yavuze ko yifatanije umubabaro n'abakorewe icaha, aca asubira gutera akamo uwo ari we wese yoba yarahohotewe muri iyo diyoseze kubivuga. Umukuru w'imana y'abepisikopi yavuze ko kiretse uwo mu Cardinali na Michel Santier, abasenyeri batandatu bagirijwe n'ubutungane canke ishengero kandi ko  umwe aza yaramaze gupfa. Yongeyeko ati:"A﻿bandi bahoze ari abasenyeri bariko baragirwako amatohoza n'ubutungane mu gihe uwundi wa gatatu amaze kwitaba abashikirizamanza." Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kwezi kwa 10 mu 2021 , akanama kigenga kashizweho na Ekleziya Katolika yo mu Bufaransa kasanze abana ibihumbi 216 barahohotewe kuva mu myaka ya 1950, benshi muri bo bakaba bari abana b’ababahungu bari gahati y’imyaka 10 na 13. Umukuru w'ako kanama yavuze ko hari ivyemezo ko hari abakoze ihoterwa bashika 3.200 kandi ko ivyo vyemezo vyarahawe  abashikirizamanza mu mice 22 aho ingingo zo gukurikiranwa kuri ivyo vyaha zishobora gufatwa. U﻿bufaransa ni kimwe mu bihugu aho ibivugwa ko habaye ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina vyateye vyanyiganyije ishengero ya Ekleziya Katolika. Mu mwaka uheze, Papa Francis yarahinduye amategeko agenga ishengero Katolika kugira ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina, kwiyegereza abana ugamije kubashurashuza, gutunga ama film y’abana bariko barahuza ibitsina hamwe no gukingiranira ikibaba ku caha c'ihohoterwa, ko ari icaha gihanwa n'amategeko ya Vatikano. Mu butumwa yatanze imbere y'uko hatangura iyo nama y'abepisikopi i Lourde, Papa yavuze ko ishengero ryo mu Bufaransa ryaguye mu gahundwe kubera ihohoterwa ryakozwe na bamwe mu bungere baryo. I﻿yo nama yari ifise intumbero yo guteza imbere uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru no gukorera mu muco ku mabi y'ihohoterwa ishengero rifisemwo uruhara.

headline: DR Congo: Ekleziya Gatorika isaba abapatiri bavyaye kuva mu mabanga
text: Urwandiko rw'Inama y'Abepiskopi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, CENCO, rwanyereye rugashika mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru rusaba abapatiri bo muri Congo bavyaye abana gutanga imihoho mu mabanga yabo y'ubusaserdoti, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru RFI. Inama y'abepiskopi CENCO, itegeka ko kizira y'uko abapatiri barangura amabanga y'abubatse. Urwo rwandiko rusohotse mu gihe Papa Francis yimirije kugendera Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo muri Mukakaro (7) uyu mwaka. Muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 19 rwiswe "A l'école de Jésus-Christ. Pour une vie sacerdotale authentique" (ni ukuvuga: Kw'ishure rya Yezu/Yesu Kristu/Kristo. Ubuzima nyabwo bw'ukwihebera Imana), abasenyeri bavuga ko ubuzima bw'igipatiri budashobora kubangikanwa n'ubuzima bw'ukuba serugo. CENCO isaba uwihebeye Imana uwo ari we wese afise umwana "gusaba uruhusha Papa rwo kuva muri ayo mabanga", nk'uko bisubirwamwo na RFI. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko mu gihe hogira abihebeye Imana bovyanka, musenyeri ashobora kwitura Vaticano kugira ngo ifate ibihano vyo ku rwego rwa nyuma, ibi bigasigura kwirukanwa burundi muri Ekleziya. Hari igice kimwe muri uru rwandiko rwa CENCO kivuga ibijanye n'abana b'aba bapatiri hamwe na ba nyina babo. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi ivuga ko ishaka "gushira ibintu ahabona" ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze kuri bo, ikibutsa ko muri rusangi usanga "banenwa mu kibano". Ico gice kigira kiti: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima".i: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima". Ikibazo c'abihebeye Imana bavyara abana muri Ekleziya Gatorika ni ikibazo giteje impari no mu bindi bihugu vy'akarere no kw'isi. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze uwari Musenyeri mukuru wa Paris, Musenyeri Michel Aupetit, yasavye imbabazi aca atanga n'imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera "umubano udasanzwe n'umugore". Ico gihe kandi, Patiri Wenceslas Munyeshyaka w'umunyarwanda, yahagaritswe ku kuba padiri wa paruwasi ya Brionne mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko bimenyekanye ko yemeye mu nzego z'ubutegetsi ko ari se w'umuhungu yavutse mu kw'indwi 2010.

headline: Imvo n'Imvano ku musi mukuru wa Noheli abakristu kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu
text: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze mu kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 25 ukwezi kwa 12 mu 2021. Imvo n'Imvano y'uyu musi yerekeye umusi mukuru wa Noheli, aho abakristu hirya no hino kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu. Buri mwaka, abemera Kristu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni hirya no hino kw'isi barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli. Noheli y'uyu mwaka, ibaye mu gihe ikiza Covid kibandanya kuvugwa mu bihugu bitandukanye kw'isi no mu gihe haherutse kugaragara ubundi bwoko bita Omicron bwandukira ku buryo bwihuta. Muri kino kiganiro, twahisemo guha umwanya abakunzi b'Imvo n'Imvano bifuje kutubwira uko bariko barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli, ari na ko tugenda tubashikiriza uturirimbo dutandukanye two guhimbaza uyu musi. None Noheli yiteguriwe gute muri iyi misi ikiza coronavirus cakwiragiye kw'isi? Ababa mu karere k'ibiyaga binini n'abari mu bindi bihugu eka mbere n'abari mu makambi y'impunzi bariko bayihimbaza gute? Inyishu ni muri kino kiganiro. Mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo, muri studios za BBC i Nairobi.

headline: Ubuhinde: Uruhagarara rufatiye ku madini rurimonogoje
text: Iki gikorwa co gusambura inzu z'aba-Islamu cakurikiye imyiyerekano y'aba-Islamu biyamiriza kwifatirwa mu gahanga kw'umuhanuzi wabo Muhammad, kwagizwe n'abanyepolitike...

headline: Filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi Muhammad yahagaritswe mu Bwongereza
text: Ikigo cerekana za filime co mu Bwongereza, Cineworld, cahagaritse kwerekana mu mazu ya filime (cinema) yaco yose muri ico gihugu filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi w'idini rya Islamu, Muhammad, nyuma y'imyiyerekano yadutse hanze y'ama-cinema amwe amwe. Ico kigo ca cinema cavuze yuko cafashe iyo ngingo "ku bw'umutekano w'abakozi n'abakiriya bacu". Abantu barenga 120.000 bashize umukono ku nyandiko isaba ko filime yitwa The Lady of Heaven (Umudamu w'Ijuru) itokwerekanwa muri za cinema zo mu Bwongereza. Ihuriro ry'imisigiti, The Bolton Council of Mosques, ryavuze ko iyo filime ari sakirirego kandi irimwo amacakubiri afatiye kw'idini. Ariko umukenguzamateka Baroness Claire Fox yavuze ko iyo ngingo "ari icago ku bugenegene kandi ikaba ari mbi cane ku bwigenge bwo gushikiriza iciyumviro". Nayo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Sajid Javid, yavuze yuko "atewe umwitwarariko cane n'umuco wo kwiyamiriza uriko uragwirirana" mu Bwongereza. Iyo filime yakuwe mu bigo vya cinema vy'ikigo Cineworld nyuma y'amakuru y'imyiyerekano mu miji wa Bolton, Birmingham na Sheffield. I Bolton, abantu barenga ijana bagize imyiyerekano hanze ya cinema, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru caho, Bolton News. Mu butumwa bwa email bugenewe Cineworld bwashizwe ahabona na Bolton News, umukuru w'urwego Bolton Council of Mosques, Asif Patel, yavuze ko iyo filime "irimwo ingengabitekerezo y'amacakubiri afatiye ku dini" kandi yuko "ivuga ukutari ko kahise k'idini ikanasuzuguza icubahiro Islamu ihabwa n'amateka yayo". Igitangazamakuru cegamiye idini rya Islamu co kuri internet, 5Pillars, catangaje kuri Twitter amafoto y'abo cavuze ko ari aba-Islamu 200, bari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo filime imbere y'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Birmingham ku munsi wa Mungu. Video yahanahanywe kuri internet isa n'iyerekana umuyobozi w'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Sheffield ariko arabwira abari mu myiyerekano ko iyo filime yahagaritswe kwerekanwa, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Guardian. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Umuhinguzi mukuru (executive producer) ari mu bateguye iyi filime, Malik Shlibak, yabariye BBC ko abari mu myiyerekano bigenza "nk'amabandi arenganya abandi, bakisuka muri za cinema banatera ubwoba abahakora". "Ibi ni ibintu bitari bikwiye kwihanganirwa mu Bwongereza", nk'uko yabandanije avuga, aca agabisha yuko guhagarika kwerekana iyi filime bizoha ingoga abakoresha ukwiyamiriza nk'uko muri kazoza. Yabandanije agira ati "ibi birarengeye filime. Uno munsi hifatiwe mu gahanga filime Lady of Heaven, ejo harashobora kwiyamirizwa ikindi kigushika ku mutima kurusha". Yavuze kandi yuko abakora imyiyerekano batazoshobora kubuza kubaho kw'iyi filime.

headline: Ethiopia: Umusigiti wa mbere muri Africa, al-Nejashi, wasambuye n'ibibombe muri Tigray
text: Reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gusanura umusigiti wa kera cane wasambuwe mu kwezi guheze mu ntambara ya Tigray mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu. Umusigiti wa al-Nejashi uvugwa ko watewe ibibombe, ivyari muri wo biranyagwa, eka mbere n'imva z'abategetsi b'idini rya Isilamu bo muri kahise zirononekara. Reta ivuga ko n'urusengero rwasambuwe muri ico gihe c'intambara na rwo nyene ruzosanurwa. Abanyagihugu baba muri ako karere bazi ko umugisiti wa al-Nejashi wubatswe n'Aba-Isilamu ba mbere bimukiye muri Afrika mu gihe c'Intumwa Muhammad. Bari bahunze amabi bariko barakorerwa i Makka baca bahabwa ubuhungiro mu cahoze ari ubwami bwa Aksum. Aba-Isilamu bo muri ako karere bazi ko abasangirangendo 15 b'Intumwa Muhammad bahambwe muri izova zasambuwe . Bazi kandi  ko uwo musigiti ari wo wa mbere watanguye kwubakwa muri Afrika, n'aho hari abandi bavuga ko uwa mbere wubatswe muri Afrika uri muri Misiri. Uwo musigiti uri mu gisagara ca Wukro kiri ku birometero hafi 800 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa. Urusengero Emanueli Mweranda (Saint Emmanuel) rw'Abakristu b'idini rya Orthodoxe na rwo nyene rwarasambuwe ariko nta nsiguro zatanzwe. Mu mwaka wa 2015 hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Turukiya ryatanguje ibikorwa vyo gusanura uwo musigiti, rivuga ko ryashaka "kubungabunga uwo mutungo wo muri kahise", rigahindura ako karere kugira ngo gashobore kwirukirwa n'ingenzi. Uwu musigiti hamwe n'urusengero rwari hafi yawo vyasambuye mu bitero vya gisirikare vyamaze ukwezi kumwe  bifise intumbero yo kwomora ubutegetsi bw'umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) wari urongoye akarere ka Tigray. Ishirahamwe ryigenga ry'Ububirigi rikorera muri Afrika rivuga ko ku wa 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uwo musigiti wa al-Nejashi "wabanje guterwa ibombe mu nyuma unyagwa urukombamazi n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia na Eritrea". Iryo shirahamwe rivuga kandi ko ibinyamakuru vya Tigray vyatangaje ko abantu batari bake bishwe bariko bagerageza gukingira uwo musigiti. Reta ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo vyegeranyo vy'iryo shirahamwe. Ariko, reta za Ethiopia na Eritrea zompi zirahakana ko hari abasirikare ba  Eritrea bari muri Tigray gufasha mu ntambara yo kurwanya TPLF. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC igisata ca Amharic, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe gukingira umurage wo muri kahise, Abebaw Ayalew, yavuze ko ko komite idasanzwe izoshikanwa muri ako karere kugira ngo yige ingene uwo musigiti n'urwo rusengero vyasambuwe imbere y'uko ibikorwa vyo gusanura bitangura. Ati: "Ubu burere ntibuzwi gusa ku bijanye n'ugusenga, ariko kandi ni umutungo wo muri kahise kuri Ethiopia yose". Mu ntango z'ukw'icumi na rimwe, intambara yaradutse mu karere ka Tigray igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, yagomora ingabo mu ntumbero yo gutuza abarwanyi ba TPLF. Hari haciye amezi atari make hari ukutumvikana hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe wari urongoye Tigray.

headline: Nigeria: Uyu muvugabutumwa arindiriye kwumva ijwi ry’Imana kugira yugurure urusengero
text: Umuvugabutumwa azwi cane muri Nijeriya, Temitope Balogun Joshua, azwi cane mu mpfunyapfunyo nka TB Joshua, avuga ko akirindiriye "ijwi ry'Imana" imbere y'uko yugurura urusengero rwiwe mu gisagara ca Lagos. Abategetsi ba Lagos bamenyesha ko amasengero ashobora gusubira kwugurura ku wa Mungu, akakira igice c'abo yahora yakira, inyuma y'amezi atari make yari amaze yugawe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Mw'ireresi yashize ku rubuga rwa Twitter,  TB Joshua avuga ko "inyuma y'aho abategetsi baduhereye uruhusha, uru turindiriye ico Imama itubwira". Yongeyeko ati: "Ndabasavye mwizere ko nitwamara kwumva ijwi ry'Imana, tuzobamenyesha igihe ibikorwa vy'urusengero bizotangurira icese". Uyu muvugabutumwa yigize umuhanuzi yateje impari mu gihugu mu ntango z'uyu mwaka igihe atangaza ko coronavirus yategerezwa kuba yazimanganye imbere y'igenekerezo rya 27/03/2020, hasigaye iminsi itari mike ngo ubutegetsi butangaze ingingo zo guhagarika ibikorwa mu bisagara vya Lagos, Ogun n'umugwa mukuru Abuja. Ico gihe yatangarije ishengero ryiwe ati: "Imbere y'uko uku kwezi guhera, twemera canke tutemera, ata kuraba imiti izoba yahinguwe ngo bariko baravura, iyo ndwara izoba yazimanganye uko yaje". Igihe iryo genekerezo rya 27 rirenganiye, uyo muvugabutumwa yarazomerewe yagirizwa "ubuhanuzi bwiwe bw'ikinyoma". Hagati aho, yarisiguye - kandi mbere abanywanyi biwe bamukomera amashi - mu kuvuga ati: "Ico nashaka kuvuga kwari uko uwo mugera uzozimangana harya watanguriye, kandi i Wuhan (mu Bushinwa) umugera warahagaritswe". Ivyatangajwe n'uyo muvugabutumwa TB Joshua ntawe vyatangaje kuko niko abapasitori batari bake muri ico gihugu bameze. Hari bamwe bibaza ko uyo muvugabutumwa ashobora kuba yaramaze kwumva ijwi ry'Imana rimubwira nimba ashobora kwugururua urusengero kuri uyu wa Mungu, ariko abandi nabo bariyorohereza ko ivyo ata vyabaye.

headline: Kardinali Burke anegura Papa Francis ku vyo aherutse gushikiriza ku bubakana basangiye ibitsina
text: Umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye ba Ekleziya Gatolika aranegura amajambo Papa Francis aherutse gushikiriza ku vyerekeye abakundanye basangiye igitsina, akavuga ko ari ivyiyumviro vyiwe bwite bidashobora gukurikizwa n'Abagatolika. Kardinali Raymond Burke abonwa na benshi ko atava kw'izima ku mico ya Ekleziya Gatolika yavuze ibi mw'ijambo yashikirije haciye umunsi umwe Papa yerekanywe ariko ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa n'amategeko. Yari amajambo atari bwaje ku mugaragaro. Ku wa gatatu w'ino ndwi, niho Papa Francis yumvikanye ashikiriza ayo majambo. Bivanye n'aho umuntu ahagaze muri Ekleziya, Kardinali Burke ni ihwa kuri Papa, canke naho umwe muri bake bazovugisha ukuri ku butegetsi. Kurwanya Papa ku bijanye no gushigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bemerwa imbere y'amategeko ni ibintu bidatangaje, ariko amajambo yabivuzemwo niyo kumbure yotangaza.
