Mu gihe Raymond Burke avuga ko amajambo ya Papa Francis ari "iciyumviro ciwe bwite", yongera ko y'uko abagatolika badategetswe kwumvira uyu mukuru wa Ekleziya kuri iki kibazo, ariko ko abayobozi ba Ekleziya basanzwe bafise igikorwa co gukora ico yise 'gutanga umuco ukenewe'. Arongera agashimangira y'uko ibikorwa vy'abahuje ibitsina babisangiye 'biteye kubiri n'imico' ishingiye ku kwemera kwa Gatolika, akavuga ko amajambo yavuzwe na Papa adahuye n'inyigisho za Ekleziya kandi ko ziteye umubabaro. Mw'ireresi ivuga ku buzima n'ibikorwa vyiwe, Papa Francis yumvikanye ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakwiye kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko. Ati: "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Mu nyigisho za Gatolika, imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ifatwa 'nk'ukugoka'. Aya majambo yavuzwe na Papa yateye impari, aho hari bamwe bashigikiye ivyo yavuze, abandi nabo babirwanya cane. Gusa impungenge zibandanya zibonekeza ni ingaruka aya majambo ashobora kugira ufatiye aho Ekleziya Gatolika ihagaze kuri iki kibazo. Massimo Faggioli, umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye n'ivy'Imana akaba n'umwanditsi w'igitabo Pope Francis: Tradition, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta gushidikanya ko ivyo Francis yavuze ari ikintu gishasha muri Ekleziya. Hagati aho, ni ikibazo yagiye agarukako cane kuva muri ino myaka mike iheze".

headline: South Africa yashinguranye iteka Musenyeri Desmond Tutu
text: Abanya Afrika y'Epfo biriwe mu birori vyo gushingura wa musenyeri Desmond Tutu  yarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya Afrika y'Epfo, ibirori vyabereye mw'isengero nkuru ya Anglican  i Cape Town. Tutu, yagize uruhara rukomeye mu kurangiza intwaro y'ivanguramoko muri Afrika y'Epfo akanahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, yapfuye ku wa Mungu afise imyaka 90. Perezida  Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo ni we yashikirije ijambo rikuru muri ibi birori vyo gushingura uyu musenyeri kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori vyari vyitabiriwe n'abantu 100 gusa kubera amategeko yo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Ramaphosa  yavuze ko Tutu  ari "umuvyeyi w'imitima w'igihugu cacu gishasha". Kuva yitavye Imana ku wa Mungu uheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye kumwunamira kw'isengero  St George's Cathedral,  aho ikiziga ciwe cari. Tutu ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye barwanije cane intwaro y'amacakubiri n'ivanguramoko yashizweho n'inkehwa z'abazungu mw'ikubagurwa bakoreye nyarwinshi b'abirabure, kuva mu 1948 gushika mu 1991. Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko Tutu yari "umurwanyi mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ubwigenge, ubutungane, amahoro n'uburenganzira kuri bose. Atari muri Afrika y'Epfo honyene...ariko kandi no kw'isi yose". Ati: "Niba dushaka kumenya akarorero k'umuntu w'igihagararo kidasanzwe, w'imico idasanzwe kandi yitaho abantu, nta nkeka ko ari uyu mugabo turiko turashingura uyu musi". Mu bitabiriye ibi birori kw'ishengero rikuru rya Cape Town harimwo abagenzi, umuryango, abarongoye ishengero n'abanyaporitike. Tutu yari yasavye ashimitse ko mu kumushingura hatoba "ugusesagura canke gukoresha uburyo buhanitse", kandi bagakoresha "isandugu izimbutse ishoboka". Yasavye kandi ko amashurwe yonyene yoba ari mw'isengero yoba "urugori rw'amashure rw'umuryango wiwe", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibigo  Archbishop Tutu IP Trust hamwe na Desmond and Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation. Vyitezwe ko ibisigarira vyiwe bihambwa inyuma ya arutari mw'isengero nkuru St George's Cathedral - isengero nkuru yamaze imyaka 35 arongoye. Mu butumwa yatanze mu buryo bwa videwo, Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasiguye ingene Tutu "yamurikiye isi yose". Avuga ko icubahiro yahaye Tutu ari nk ' "imbeba yunamira inzovu". Umukobwa wa Tutu Mpho yavuze ko urukundo berekanye kuri se wiwe "rwatsimbataje imitima yabo". Ati: "Kubera twamusangiye n'isi, namwe muradusangije igice c'urukundo mwari mumufitiye". Igihe ikiziga ciwe cashirwa ahagaragara muri Cape Town, abantu benshi baraje kumusezera ubwa nyuma. Umugabo umwe, Wally Mdluli, yagenze ibirometero birengo 1000 kuva Bloemfontein gushika Cape Town agenda arasaba ko bamwunguruza kuri gusa (lift)  - aca mu ncuti n'abagenzi asaba ko bomufasha kugira ashobore gukora urugendo rwiwe, mbere akaryama muri station y'igitoro igihe yari ku rugendo. Yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC i Cape Tow ati: "Numva nuzuye umunezero inyuma y'aho mboneye isandugu y'ikiziga. Ni nk'uko umengo umutima wiwe uri muri jewe". Tutu yarakoresheje igihagararo ciwe mu kwiyamiriza agahotoro kakorerwa abirabure mu gihugu ciwe, akama avuga ko yabikora kubw'ukwemera atari ku mvo za poritike.

headline: Tanzania: Ekleziya Katorika iragabisha ko Covid-19 iriko iriyongera ku rugero ruteye ubwoba
text: Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaraye isohoye itangazo aho igabisha ko ibitigiri  vy'abandura coronavirus n'abicwa na Covid-19 bigenda vyiyongera, ihamagarira abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira. Iri tangazo ryo kugabisha ryasohowe n'umukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi Katorika muri Tanzania  (TEC), Musenyeri Gervas Nyaisonga ku wa kabiri. Ariko , ntirivuga nimba no muri Tanzania hariho abariko barandura bwa bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus, rigasaba abantu kuba maso bafatiye ku bivugwa mu zindi mpande z'isi. Iri tangazo rya Ekleziya Katorika rivuga riti: "Mu mwaka uheze igihugu cacu carashoboye kurwanya uwu mugera. Abandura baragabanutse  mu nyuma turizera ko twatsinze". "Ubu hari iyongerekana rishasha ry'abandura. Ibihugu bitari bike biremeza ko biri mu bihe bitoroshe aho corona iriko iriyongera abantu bagapfa. Igihugu cacu si izinga, ni ngombwa ko twikingira, tukaba maso, tugatakambira cane Imana kugira ngo iturinde". Ekleziya Katorika muri ico gihugu yagiye ifata ingingo zitandukanye kuva mu 2020 igihe iki kiza gitangazwa ko cinjiye muri Tanzania, iri tangazo rigasaba ko izo ngingo zibandanya zikurikizwa. Rishimangira riti: "Duhimirize intambara yo kurwanya umugera wa coronavirus mu gukoresha ibirwanisho vyose vy'umutima, umubiri, ubuhinga no mu kibano. Ntiturambirwe no guhimiriza igisabisho, kwirinda gukorakorana, gukaraba n'amazi n'isabuni igihe cose, gufata ingingo igihe cose twiketse ibimenyetso vyayo, tukirinda kandi no kwegerana". Umunyamabanga mukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi, Patiri Charles Kitima, yabwiye BBC igisata c'igiswahili ko vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya isohora iri tangazo ryo kugabisha mu gihe bakirindiriye insiguro z'abahinga zizotangwa na reta ku bijanye n'iki kiza karanda. Ati: "Duherutse kubona impfu ziyongera. Mu bisagara, twari tumenyereye kugira imisa imwe canke zibiri mu ndwi zo gusabira abapfuye, ariko ubu ni imisi yose. Hategerezwa kuba hari ikintu kitagenda neza". Abategetsi ba Tanzania babandanya bemeza y'uko ata mugera wa coronavirus uri mu gihugu. Inyuma y'iri tangazo, icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Dr Goodluck Mollel, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Mwananchi co muri ico gihugu ko abanyagihugu bobandanya batekanye mu kurindira amabwirizwa bahabwa na reta. Dr. Mollel ati: "Ibi bintu reka tubirekere abahinga. Mu gihe hoba ingorane, reta izobisigura. Abantu bobandanya n'ibikorwa vy'ukugwiza umwimbu". Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, ibinyamakuru vyo muri Danmark vyatangaje ko ingenzi zibiri zari zivuye muri Tanzania zatowe umugera mushasha wa coronavirus wadutse muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu ndwi iheze nyene, reta y'Ubwongereza yarafashe ingingo yo kubuza ingenzi zivuye nuri  Tanzania na Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya  Congo kwinjira muri ico gihugu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 bwatowe ubwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ibihugu bindi 12 nivyo bimaze guhagarikirwa ingendo muri ico gihugu hagati y'ukwa cumi na kabiri n'intango y'ukwa mbere.

headline: India: Ingene umwambaro wa hijab wambarwa n'abagore bo muri Islam uteje ibibazo
text: Intara yo mu Buhindi yugaye amashure yisumbuye na kaminuza biturutse ku kibazo c'umwambaro wa hijab kiriko gikurikiranirwa hagufi n'amakungu inyuma y'aho uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Malala Yousafzai yatsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel avyinjiriyemwo. Reta y'intara ya Karnataka iri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi yafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho abanyeshure bihereye amabarabara mu myiyerekano ishingiye ku bakobwa bambara uwu mwambaro wo mw'idini rya Islam, imyiyerekano yandurutsemwo imigumuko. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, sentare nkuru y'iyo ntara itegekanya kwiga ku rwandiko ruvugira abagore b'aba Islam. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho abanyeshure batandatu b'urwaruka bagiriye imyiyerekano imbere y'ishure ryegukira reta ku kibazo co kwambara hijab, imyiyerekano yaciye ikwiragira ku yandi mashure. Abanyeshure batari bake b'aba Hindu nabo baciye biha amabarabara bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ibara ry'ikimenyetso c'idini rya Hindu - mu kwiyamiriza abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umupfasoni Malala - umugore yarokotse igitero c'aba Taliban muri Pakistan afise imyaka 15 ahorwa ko yariko avugira abakobwa ko boronswa uburenganzira bwo kwiga  - yateye akamo abategetsi b'Ubuhindi ko bogira ico bakoze kugira "bahagarike inenwa abagore b'aba Islam bakorerwa". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 24 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Kubuza abakobwa kuja kw'ishure bambaye hijab zabo ni ibintu bibabaje. Ivyo gufata nabi abagore birabandanya - kubera uko bambaye". Mu Buhindi, uru ruhagarara rwongereje ubwoba n'ishavu mu nkehwa z'aba Islam bavuga ko ibwirizwashingiro ribaha uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ivyo bambara. Ejo ku wa kabiri, amareresi yakwiragiye cane yerekana umukobwa w'umu Islam ariko azomerwa n'ikirwi c'abagabo bakiri bato  bamuvugiriza induru, n'impari zikomeye hagati y'abanyeshure bambaye hijab n'abandi bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu bintu bidakunze kuba, umucamanza ariko arakurikirana uru rubanza yateye akamo abanyeshure hamwe n'abandi "kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano". Ikibazo catanguye kuja hejuru igihe abanyeshure batandatu biga kw'ishure ryisumbuye ryo mu karere ka Udupi mu ntara ya Karnataka batangura imyiyerekano kubera bari babujijwe kuja mw'ishure bambaye hijab. Udupi ni kamwe mu turere dutatu tugize intara ya Karnataka iri ku nkengera - ari naho higanje umugambwe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) w'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafata ko iyo ntara ari icicaro gitegurirwamwo poritike y'aba Hindu ari na bo benshi mu gihugu. Umugambwe BJP kandi ni wo urongoye iyi ntara ya Karnataka. Iri shure rivuga ko ryemereye abanyeshure kwambara hijab mu gihe bari mu kigo, ariko bagasabwa gusa kuzikura iyo bari mu masomero. Ariko abari mu myiyerekano  - bose bakaba bari mu mwambaro w'ishure - bavuga ko ari ngombwa ko bemererwa gupfuka imishatsi yabo mu masomero. Umwe muri aba banyeshure Almas AH, yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Turafise abigisha bakeya b'abagabo. Rero ni ngombwa ko dupfuka imishatsi yacu imbere y'abagao. Ni co gituma twambara hijab". Aba banyeshure barahakana ivyo bagirizwa ko bazambara babitegetswe n'umurwi Campus Front of India - ishami ry'umurwi w'abanyeshure ugendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam, Popular Front of India - ari na wo ubavugira. Si kenshi abagore bakunze kuboneka bambaye hijab na burka (umwitwikiro w'umubiri wose mw'idini rya Islam) mu Buhindi, aho kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'idini ku mugaragaro ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ariko umukuru w'iri shure avuga ko ari ngombwa ku mwigisha kubona abanyeshure mu maso, kandi ko umwambaro w'ishure utuma ata vangura riba mu banyeshure. Inama z'urutavanako hagati y'abanyeshure, abarongoye ishure hamwe n'abaserukira reta ntaco zashitseko. Ikibazo c'abanyeshure b'abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab carakwiye mu yandi mashure makuru makeya y'i Karnataka, ariko cagiye kurenga inkombe igihe amasanamu y'aba bakobwa bari mu myiyerekano i Udupi akwirakwirijwe. Ubwo nyene, abanyeshure b'aba Hindu mu yandi mashure amwe amwe baciye batangura kuza mu masomero bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ivyatumye abarongoye ishure bategeka ko iyi myambaro yompi itemewe mu bigo. Mu ndwi iheze, ireresi yafatiwe kw'ishure rikuru rya Kundapur mu karere ka Udupi yerekana abanyeshure bambaye hijab bankiwe kurengana bariyeri, yatumye ibintu biyangara. Imirwi y'abanyeshure b'aba Hindu  - abahungu n'abakobwa - nabo baciye batangura imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza bagenzi babo bigana bambaye hijab. Gusa nta mishamirano yari bwabe gushika ejo ku wa kabiri - hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo sentare itangure kwiga urwo rwandiko - aho baciye batangura guterana amabuye mbere baranaturira mu bisagara bimwe bimwe. Abategetsi b'abakere baciye bashira mu ngiro ingingo ya 144 (Section 144) - itegeko ryo mu gihe c'ubukoloni ryabuza abantu barenga bane gukoranira hamwe - mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iyi migumuko. Mu karere ka Shivamogga, umurwi w'abanyeshure b'abahungu bafashwe amashusho baduza ibendera ry'umutugutu kw'ishure ryabo, reta ica itangaza ko hagiye gukorwa amatohoza. Mu karere ka Mandya, ireresi yazungurutse cane yerekana umukobwa yambaye burka asugerezwa n'umurwi w'abagabo bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu gihe babandanya bamuzomera bavuga ngo Jai Shri Ram (twogereranya na 'Mana nziza'), nawe yarihagarayeko, ashira ijwi hejuru ati "Allah Akbar" (Imana ni yo nkuru) mu gihe abarongoye ishure bamuherekeza bamuvanaho. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Mu nyuma, uyo mugore azwi kw'izina rya Muskan yavuze ko umukuru w'iryo shure yamwemereye ko azomushigikira. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru The Indian Express ati: "Hari abandi bakobwa b'aba Islam na bo nyene bazomerewe nk'uku. Abarongoye ishure be n'umukuru waryo ubwiwe ntibigeze batubuza kwambara burka, none ni kubera iki nokwumviriza abo hanze?" Umutegetsi mukuru mu gipolisi yabwiye BBC Hindi ko ibi ari "ikibazo gito" kandi ko bafise ibintu mu minwe. Reta y'intara ivuga iki? Umushikiranganji w'indero w'intara ya Karnataka Nagesh ashigikiye abategetsi b'ishure bavuga ko, vyaba ibitambara n'ibisikafu vy'umutugutu, vyaba ibitambara vy'imyitwikiro, vyose ntivyemewe mu bigo vy'amashure. Avuga kandi ko aba banyeshure bagumuwe "n'inkozi z'ikibi". Afatiye ku kungene ishami rya poritike ry'umurwi Popular Front of India ririko rigerageza gushinga imizi mu karere ko ku nkengera, Nagesh yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Vyose bishingiye kuri poritike. Ibi vyose biriko biba kubera amatora yimirije mu mwaka uza". Sentare ivuga iki gushika ubu? Sentare yahawe inzandiko zibiri zivugira abari muri iyi myiyerekano. Rumwe ruvuga ko ibwirizwashingoro ry'Ubuhindi ritanga uburenganzira kuri buri muntu guhitamwo ivyo yambara. Urundi narwo rukarwanya itegeko riherutse gushingwa na reta y'intara ritegeka inyambaro yemewe mu mashure, ribuza ibitambara vyo mu mutwe n'ama hijab. Imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura kwigwa, igihe umushingwamanza yari asavye ko rwunguruzwa, umucamanza Krishna Dixit yaranse. Ati: "Ibishobisho vyose bigume hanze. Ibwirizwashingiro ni Bhagavad Gita (igitabo ceranda c'aba Hindu). Jewe nzokorera ku ndahiro nagize igihe ntangura akazi. Si vyiza ko abanyeshure baguma hanze". Uyu mushingwamanza aburanira abari mu myiyerekano avuga ko itegeko rya reta ribuza hijab riteye kubiri n'amategeko kandi ko rihonyanga ibwirizwashingiro - agasaba kandi ko sentare ifata ingingo mfatakibanza yokwemerera abanyeshure kubandanya biga imbere y'uko ibibazo bitangura.

headline: Coronavirus: Papa asaba ko urucanco n'imiti bishikira bose kw'isi
text: Papa Francis yateye akamo abategetsi bo kw'isi ngo bafashe kugira abantu bose bashobore kuronka urucanco rwa coronavirus ata nzitizi. Mw'ijambo rya Noheli yashikirije ku rubuga rwa internet ubwa mbere, Papa yagabishije kudashiraho "uruhome" kubakeneye imiti. Ico kiza catumye ubutumwa bwa Urbi na Orbi budatangirwa ku rubaraza rwa Bazelike St Pierre ku bantu benshi, nk'uko vyari bimenyerewe. Ahubwo Papa yatanze ubwo butumwa ari mu cumba i Vatikano. Uko kugabisha kwa papa kuje inyuma y'amakenga y'ingene ibihugu bitunze  bigura incanco zitagira uko zingana gusumba ibihugu bikenye. Yavuze ati:"Ese umwana w'Imana yogarukana mu bategetsi ba politike n'amareta agatima ko gufashanya n'amakungu, bahereye ku magara y'abantu, kugira ngo bose boshobore gushikirwa n'urucanco hamwe n'imiti. "Imbere y'iki kibazo kitagira imbibe, ntidushobora kwiyubakirako uruhome. Twese hamwe turi mu bwato bumwe." Papa yavuze ko ingaruka y'iki kibazo c'amagara y'abantu zerekanye ko ubumwe bw'amakungu bukomeye cane. "Muri iki gihe c'akahise, tugeramiwe n'ibibazo vy'ibidukikije hamwe n'ubusumbasumbane mu butunzi no mu mibano vyagiye kunyurwa n'ikiza coronavirus, birakenewe cane ko twemerana nka benewacu na bashiki bacu." Papa yateye akamo ngo habe umutima wo gufasha no gushigikira abakozweko n'ico kiza, adoma urutoke cane cane ku bapfasoni bahohotewe muri iki gihe abantu bugaranywe. Avuga ku zindi ngorane ziri kw'isi, yahamagariye abantu gukomeza ubumwe no gusubiza hamwe muri Syria, Yemen, Libya, Nagorno-Karabakh, Sudan y'epfo , Nigeria, Cameroun na Irak. Vyitezwe ko azogira urugendo muri Irak mu kwezi kwa gatatu, urugendo rushobora kuba rubaye urwa mbere rwa Papa mu gihugu cazahajwe n'intambara.

headline: Kenya: abatemera Imana basaba ko amasengesho mu mashure avanwaho
text: Ishirahamwe ry'abahakanyi muri Kenya ryandikiye umushikiranganji w'indero w'iki gihugu rimusaba kubuza ivyo gusenga mu mashure ya reta imbere y'uko ibibazo vya reta bitangura. Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko guhatira abanyeshure gusenga ari uguhonyanga agateka kabo. Amashure ya reta muri Kenya afise umugenzo wo gutegura amasengesho imbere y'uko abanyeshure batangura ibibazo vya reta. Muri ino ndwi, amashure yateye akamo abavyeyi ko bokwifatanya nayo muri ano masengesho  yamaze kuba nk'umugenzo kugira ngo abana babo bitegurire neza ibibazo. Muri uru rwandiko, havuga ngo: "Abanyagihugu ba Kenya benshi bari muri ano mashure ya reta aho ivy'amasengesho ari itegeko". Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko abana bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bo nyene bwo kwifatira ingingo ku bijanye n'idini.

headline: France: Umuriro wadutse mw’isengero nkuru rya Nantes
text: Isengero rikuru Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul  ryo mu gisagara ca Nantes mu Bufaransa ryatewe n'umuriro w'icaduka. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka barenga 60 nibo bashitse kuri iryo sengero kugira bagerageze kuwuzimya nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiyamakuru vyaho. Nta wuzi icateye uwu muriro. Amasanamu ava aho ivyo biriko biba yerekana umuriro n'umwotsi biva muri iyo nyukabwa. Uyu muriro wadutse haciye umwaka umwe gusa uwundi muriro ukoze ibara kw'isengero rikuru Notre-Dame mu gisagara ca Paris, rimwe mu mitungo ya kahise k'u Bufaransa. Televiziyo BFM TV, itangaza ko abapolisi muri ico gisagara ca Nantes kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'u Bufaransa batumweko hafi isaha imwe n'iminota 44 mu gatondo. Umwe mu babibonye avuga ko yashobora kubona uwo mucanwa ari muhira, hafi y'iryo sengero. Avuga ko yakanguwe n'urwamo rudasanzwe rw'inkengeri. Ati: "Ku vyo mbona, ni uko umwotsi utera wongerekana". Iryo sengero sibwo bwa mbere riterwa n'umucanwa. Mu 1972, umuriro warasambuye igisenge caryo, bituma ryugarwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu ririko rirasubirwamwo.

headline: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
text: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

headline: Theodore McCarrick yahoze ari kardinali muri US arahakana ivyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
text: Uwahoze ari kardinali wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arahakana ivyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 16 mu myaka ya 1970. Theodore McCarrick, 91, yarengutse imbere ya sentare i Massachusetts kugira yisigure ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu no gukubagura (coups et blessures) yagirizwa ko yakoze mu 1974. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Washington DC azwi ko ari we mutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Amerika yagirijwe ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Imbere y'aho yahora avuga ko atibuka ko hoba hari ivyo guhohotera yoba yarakoze. Mu rubanza rwashinzwe mu kw'indwi, McCarrick yaragirijwe ivyo gukwegakwegera uyo mwana w'umuhungu - ariko atavuzwe izina -  mu buhumbu, mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Uyu mugabo avuga ko yakorewe aya mabi yavuze ko igihe kimwe vyabaye mu gihe yari mu bugeni bwa mwenewabo kuri kaminuza ya Wellesley muri Massachusetts mu 1974. Nyene gukorerwa aya mabi avuga ko McCarrick yamukwegeye mu cumba kimwe co muri iyo kaminuza aca atangura kumukuyakuya. Inyuma yaho, uyo mupatiri avugwa ko yaciye abwira uyu mugabo kuvuga ibisabisho kugira ngo akire "ibicumuro". Muri sentare ku wa gatanu, McCarrick yategetswe kutavugana n'uyu nyene guhohoterwa canke n'umwana n'umwe. Yasabwe gutanga ingwati y'ibihumbi 5000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 28 z'ukw'icumi. Buri caha gishobora guhanishwa umunyororo wo gushika ku myaka itanu, kandi agategerezwa kwandikwa ku nguvu nk'umusambanyi (délinquant sexuel/sex offender) McCarrick ni umwe mu bategetsi ba Ekleziya Katorika bagirizwa gushurashuza abana mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Mu 2019, yarakuwe mu mabanga inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na Vaticano ku vyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu mu myaka itari mike. Yaragirijwe kandi ko yafashe ku nguvu umuyabaga i New York hagati mu myaka ya 1970, yongera ahatira abagabo kuryamana nawe mu rugo i New Jersey mu gihe bariko bigira ubupatiri. Icegeranyo c'impapuro 450 ca Vaticano casanze Papa Yohani Paulo wa kabiri yarabwiwe ivyerekeye ibi vyagirizwa McCarrick, ariko agahitamwo kwizera abepiskopi ba Amerika bamukingiye ikibaba. Casanze kandi Papa Benoit/Benedict XVI - yatanze imihoho mu 2013 - ashobora kuba yaranse iciyumviro co gukora amatohoza kubera ata "vyemezo vyari bihari" ku vyo yagirizwa.

headline: India: Umupatiri n’umubikira bakatiwe guherayo bagirizwa kugandagura uwundi mubikira
text: Umupatiri w'umugatorika n'umubikira bo mu Buhindi baciriwe umunyororo w'ubuzima bwose bagiriwe n'icaha co kugandagura uwundi mubikira, haraciye  imyaka irenga 28. Patiri Thomas Kottoorna hamwe n'Umubikira Sephy baciriwe urubanza ku wa kabiri bagiriwe kwica uwundi mubikira yari afise imyaka 21, Umubikira Abhaya mu 1992, maze baca bazimanganya ivyemezo vy'ubu bwicanyi. Aba bantu babiri bagandaguye uyu mubikira mu gihe yari abafashe bari mu busambanyi. Mu ntango, igiporisi cari cibajije ko uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yoba yariyahuye. Ariko haciye hatangura amatohoza yimbitse inyuma y'aho umuryango wiwe n'abaharanira agateka ka muntu berekaniye amakenga ku rupfu rwiwe. Sephy w'imyaka  55 ntaco aravuga kuri uru rubanza, ariko Patiri Kottoor ubu afise imyaka 69 ashimangira ko ari umwere. Ejo k uwa gatatu asomewe urwo rubanza, yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ici o gihugu ati: "Jewe nta caha nakoze. Imana iri kumwe nanje". Hari uwundi mupatiri agira gatatu, Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, na we yagirijwe n'abashikirizamanza ko yasambanije Umubikira Sephy. Yarahagaitswe mu 2008 kuri ubu bwicanyi ariko mu nyuma ararekurwa kubera habuze ivyemezo. Ikiziga c'uyu mubikira Abhaya catowe mu kinogo hafi y'uburaro bw'ababikira bwitiriwe umweranda Piyo mu gisagara ca Kottayam kiri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi. Sentare yavuze ko imbere y'uko yicwa, Abhaya yaravyutse mu gaturuturu ku wa 27 z'ukwa gatatu 1992, aja mu gikoni c'ubwo buraro bw'ababikira agiye gutora amazi yari muri firigo. Mu gihe yashika mu gikoni, yafashe mpiri Kottoor na Sephy. Sentare ivuga ko ku gutinya ko yohava abamenera ibanga, baciye bamwica hanyuma banyegeza ikiziga. Amatohoza ku rupfu rw'uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yarabaye ikibazo ngorabahizi mu Buhindi. Mu ntango, igiporisi c'akarere n'ic'igihugu vyari vyavuze ko yari yariyahuye. Ariko, mu 1993, ikigo c'Ubuhindi kijejwe igendereza (Central Bureau of Investigation, CBI) caciye gifata mu minwe iki kibazo, maze gisanga yarishwe, ariko nticashoka gitora abamugandaguye. Kw'itegeko rya sentare nkuru y'igihugu mu 2008, CBI yaciye isubira kwugurura amatohoza, irahagarika yongera iragiriza Kottoor, Sephy na Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, ariko mu nyuma bararekuwe batanze ingwati. Niho haca hakurikira urubanza rwamaze igihe kirekire. Jomon Puthenpurackal aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba ari mu baharaniye ko uwakoze aka kabi kabishe akubitwa intahe mu gahanga avuga ati: "Ubutungane burarenganuye Umubikira Abhaya. Agiye kwiruhukira mu mahoro".

headline: Sharia: kubera iki iri tegeko rya Islam ribuza umuzik? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
text: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia. Muri iri tegeko, hari vyinshi bibujijwe, kimwe muri vyo ni  umuziki. Mu ndwi iheze, umuvugizi w’aba Taliban Zabihulah Mujahid yabwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko umuziki ubujijwe mw’idini rya Islam. Mu gihe c’ubutegetsi  bw'aba Talibani mu myaka ya 1990, umuziki hafi ya wose, televiziyo n'amazu ya sinema vyari bibujijwe kandi kubirengako vyashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye. Iri tegeko Sharia ririmwo ibifatwa nk’indenzarugero. BBC yashatse kumenya ico iri tegeko rivuga n’uko Islam ifata umuziki muri rusangi, ikaba yavuganye na Haruna Nkunduwiga yigeze kurongora umuryango w’aba-Islam mu Burundi. Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga ko iri tegeko ari itegeko ngenderwako rikunze gukurikizwa mu bihugu vya Islam, ariko ridakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu nk’Uburundi kubera Islam iri kumwe n’ayandi madini. Fyonda aho hejuru wumvirize ingene Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga.

headline: Sudan y'Epfo:''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju''
text: Umu Karidinari ari mu kiruhuko c'izabukuru muri Ekleziya Katorika yaneguye ubushobozi bwa bamwe mu ndongozi za Ekleziya muri Sudan y'Epfo. Kardinari   Gabriel Zubeir Wako yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Khartoum yavuze ati: ''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju mw'isengero'', aho hari mu rugendo yagize mu gisagara ca Wau kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero. Yavuze kuri uyu wa mungu ati: ''Mu minsi maze ngaha i Wau, hariho abapatiri twabonanye ndumva ko benshi batazi indinganizo n'inyigisho zo mw'isengero,  bigisha ibintu bidafashe. Bakeneye gusumvya aho bageza ubu ". Uwo mu karidinari azokwiza imyaka 80 y'amavuko mu kwezi kuza, , arubashwe kandi arazwi cane mu kuba yarashigikiye amashure. Yaratewe iteka na reta ya Sudan y'Epfo mu 2016 kubera uruhara rwiwe mu gushigikira indero y'abana bangana na miriyoni zibiri bari barateshejwe izabo n'intanbara muri Sudan y'Epfo. Yaranarungitse abapitiri kubandanya ivyigwa i Roma no muri Kenya , kugira bace impamyabushobozi za masters na doctorat. Mu bo yarungitse kubandanya ivyigwa harimwo uwamusubuiriye Musenyeri Mukuru Dr Michael Didi, ubu arongoye diyosezi ya Khartoum , n'uwurongoye diyosezi nkuru ya Juba, Dr Stephen Ameyu.

headline: Uganda: Amadini n’abayoboke abangamye kandi abangamiwe
text: “Hari n’abica ku bwa Christ (Kristu)”, ni bimwe biri muri iri tohoza rya BBC Africa Eye. Peter MacJob agaragaza uturorero muri Uganda, aho n’abakiri bato bakoreshwa n’aba ‘pastors’ (abapasitori) bo mu madini atandukanye, n’abantu bakahasiga ubuzima.

headline: Greece: Umupatiri i Athens yafashwe inyuma y'uko ateye aside abasenyeri
text: Umupatiri yahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubugiriki Athens/Athènes inyuma yo gutera aside abasenyeri indwi bo mw'idini ry'aba Orthodox, nk'uko bivugwa n'igiporisi. Ibi vyabaye igihe uyu mupatiri w'imyaka 36 yariko yumvirizwa n'urwego rujejwe indero inyuma y'umutaga w'ejo ku wa gatatu, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'igiporisi. Abasenyeri batatu bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro kubera ubushe batewe n'iyi aside, bakaba bahiye mu maso. Umuporisi yirutse aja gutabara abo basenyeri, na we nyene ari mu bitaro. Uwagirizwa gukora aka kabi - umupatiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri iryo dini - yagirizwa ko afise uruhara mu rudandaza rw'ibiyayuramutwe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ANA. Nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bibitangaza, abo basenyeri bari bakoranye kugira ngo baganire ingene bomwirukana - bakamwambura ubupatiri - inyuma y'aho bivugiwe ko mu kwa gatandatu mu 2018 yafatanywe amagarama 1,8 y'urumogi. Ikinyamakuru Ta Nea kivuga ko uyo mupatiri yinjiye mu kigo c'ababihebeye Imana ca Petraki kiri i Athènes agiye kwumvirizwa, akaba yinjiranye "icupa rinini ririmwo iyo aside". Umuzamu yashoboye gufata uyo mupatiri ageze kw'irembo ry'ico kigo, na we nyene yaraturiwe n'iyo aside, akaba yaciye asimbanwa kwa muganga. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubugiriki Katerina Sakellaropoulou ariyamiriza iki gitero, nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Kyriakos Mitsotakis akaba yavuganye n'uwurongoye iryo dini mu Bugiriki, Musenyeri mukuru wa Athènes, Ieronymos II. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mitsotakis avuga ko ababajwe cane n'iki gitero, akaba yijeje uyu musenyeri ko "reta izokora uko ishoboye mu kuvura abakomeretse kugira bashobore gukira ningoga".

headline: Kardinari w'i Vatican Becciu mu rubanza rwo kunyonyeza miriyoni 412 z'ama dorari
text: Umukardinari  w'ishengero Katorika yigeze kuba akorana hafi cane na Papa François agiye gucirirwa urubanza i Vaticano, yagirizwa gukoresha nabi amafaranga y'ishengero mu kamaramaza kahombesheje amafaranga menshi mu mugambi wo kugura inyubakwa i Londres/London. Kardinari Angelo Becciu, w'imyaka 73, niwe mwubahwa  akomeye cane mu barongoye Ekereziya Katorika  mu bihe vya none agiye imbere y'ubucamanza  kubera gukekwako ivyaha bijanye n'amafaranga. Yagirizwa gusohora amafaranga y'amanyaburaya, Euro, angana na miriyoni 350 (arenga miriyaridi 800 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) y'ishengero mu mugambi utagenze neza  wo kugura inyubakwa  muri Chelsea watumye hatakara amafaranga menshi cane. Arahakana kuba hari icaha yakoze. Abandi bantu icenda bakurukiranwa muri urwo rubanza nabo bagirizwa ivvyaha birimwo kuronka amafaranga ku nguvu canke kw'iterabwoba, kunyuruza no gukoresha nabi ububasha bw'akazi. Kardinari Becciu yirukanywe mu kazi na Papa François mu kwezi kw'icenda igihe amakuru y'ugukoresha nabi amafaranga yaja ahabona. Amatohoza yamaze imyaka ibiri yerekanye ingene Vaticano yatakaje miriyoni z'ama euro, arimwo amashikanwa, inyuma yo kugura inyubakwa  yahora ari ububiko bwa Harrods kuri Sloane Square  Avenue muri Chelsea, mu 2014. Uwo mukardinari yahora  araba amashikanwa mu biro bijejwe amafaranga ya  Vaticano. Ivyaha akurikiranwako birimwo kurungika amafaranga mu rudandazwa rwari rurongowe n'abavukanyi biwe mu ntara y'amavukiro yabo muri Sardaigne. Urwo rubanza rwitezwe kumara amezi menshi. Intahe zibiri zizosasa muri iyi ndwi - ku bibazo  vy'ubuhinga - zishobora kwungururizwa mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abandi icenda bagirizwa barimwo: Abagirizwa bose barahakana kuba barakoze icaha. Hamwe bokwagirwa n'ivyaha, bashobora guhanishwa umunyororo canke ihadabu, canke vyompi. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko umuranzi  akorera Londres, Gianluigi Torzi,  yanyonyeje Vaticano mu gukoresha amafaranga yayo mu kugura imitahe yo muri iyo nyubakwa yo muri Chelsea yari guca isubirwawo ngo ivemwo amazu y'agaciro yo kubamwo. Torzi avuga ko ibivugwa bishingiye ku kwumva ibintu ukutariko. Ubutariyano buriko buragerageza ngo burabe ko  Ubwongereza bumubarungikira. Mu kwezi kwa kane Papa yafashe ingingo ko aba kardinari n'abepiskopi bagirijwe ivyaha bashobora gukurikiranwa n'abacamanza basanzwe - aho gucirirwa imanza n'aba kardinari nk'uko vyahora. Umukuru mushasha ajejwe amafaranga muri Vaticano, Juan Antonio Guerrero, avuga ko Vaticano iriko irashiramwo inguvu zitari bwigere ziboneka kugira ikorere ku mugaragaro mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Ku wa 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, ku ncuro ya mbere Vaticano yashize ahabona ido n'ido ry'imitahe yayo: amazu 4.051 mu Butariyano n'izishika 1.120 i Londres, Paris, Geneve  na Lausane. Furera Guerreo yagize ati: ''Twamenyereye gukorera mw'ibanga, ariko twamenye ko mu vyerekeye ubutunzi, gukorera ku mugaragaro bidukingira kurusha gukorera nw'ibanga."

headline: Umurwi Man Utd uvuga ko 'ubabajwe cane' n'ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe Paul Pogba
text: Manchester United ivuga ko iriko "irakora amatohoza kugira imenye" abakwiragije ku mbuga hwaniro inzandiko z'amacakubiri y'urukoba ku mukinyi Paul Pogba akina hagati muri uwo murwi. Pogba w'imyaka 26 yahushije penalty ejo ku wa mbere mu rukino rwahuje Man United na Wolves, ruza kurangira ari igitsindo kimwe ku kindi. Agize umukinyi wa gatatu mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa akorewe ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga hwaniro kubera yahushije penalty, inyuma ya Yakou Méïté wa Reading na Tammy Abraham wa Chelsea. Umurwi wa Man United uvuga ko "ubabajwe cane" n'iryo tyozwa kandi ko "uryiyamirije wivuye inyuma". Mw'itangazo wasohoye uvuga uti: "Abo bantu banditse ivyo baciye kubiri n'akaranga k'umurwi wacu rurangiranwa kandi urahimiriza abakunzi bawo ko bokwiyamiriza ivyo bintu ku mbuga hwaniro ari benshi". "Manchester United ntishobora kwihanganira na gato amacakubiri canke ikumira iryo ari ryo ryose kandi itanguje isekeza #AllRedAllEqual initiative rizomara igihe kirekire ry'ukurwanya ako kabi". "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira tumenye abo bose babigizemwo uruhara twongere dufate n'ingingo ruhasha zose zishoboka. Dusavye kandi n'amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro gufata ingingo muri iyi ntumbero". Ku munsi wa Mungu, umusatirizi Yakou Méïté wa Reading yariyamirije ityoza rifatiye ku rukoba yakorewe ku mbuga hwaniro inyuma y'aho ahushirije penalty. Uyo mukinyi akomoka muri Côte d'Ivoire w'imyaka 23, yinjiye ku munota wa 80 igihe Reading yahura na Cardiff aca ahusha penalty ku munota wa 91. Mu ndwi iheze, Chelsea yariyamirije "inzandiko z'urwanko" ku mukinyi Tammy Abraham inyuma y'aho uyo murwi utsindiwe na Liverpool mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Super Cup. Umumenyereza wa Chelsea  Frank Lampard avuga ko "yababajwe cane" n'ityozwa ry'uyo mukinyi w'imbere w'imyaka 21. Asaba amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ahagarike ingeso y'ukwifatira mu gahanga abakinyi. Eka n'abandi bakunzi ntibatevye kwiyamiriza ama tweet yarimwo amajambo y'amacakubiri yanditswe kuri Pogba - yari yaronse penalty kw'ikosa yakorewe mu nyuma arayihusha - ejo ku munsi wa mbere. Ama tweets amwe amwe yarafuswe, mu gihe n'ama "comptes" atari make nayo nyene yasa n'ayari yafuswe. Amategeko ngenderwako ya Twitter avuga ko "ishobora gufata ingingo ku nyifato y'ugutyoza abantu". Mu kwezi kw'indwi, ishirahamwe rirwanya amacakubiri y'urukoba, Kick It Out, ryarasohoye icegeranyo cerekana ko amakuru ajanye n'amacakubiri y'urukoba yiyongereye ku bice 43% mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, aho yabonetse incuro 274 ugereranije na 192 yari yabonetse mu mwaka waheruka.

headline: Mason Greenwood: Umusatiziri wa Manchetser United yarekuwe vy’agateganyo
text: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Mason Greenwood yarekuwe vy'agateganyo inyuma yo guhagarikwa yagirizwa gufata ku nguvu umugore. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 yahagaritswe kandi ku wa Mungu yagirizwa ihohotera, inyuma y'uko yagirijwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu nyuma yahagaritswe yagirizwa ko yafashe umuntu ku nguvu mbere agatera ubwoba bwo kwica umuntu ku wa kabiri. Manchester United yari yamenyesheje ko uyu musatirizi atari gusubira mu myimenyerezo gushika hafashwe izindi ngingo. Igipolisi ca Greater Manchester cavuze ko Greenwood yahagaritswe inyuma y'aho kimenyeye ko "hari amashusho n'amareresi yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'umugore yavuga ihohotera yakorewe". Iki gipolisi kivuga ko abacamanza bari bategetse ko aguma mu gasho gushika ku wa gatatu ariko ubu yarekuwe vy'agateganyo mu gihe ayandi matohoza akibandanya. Inyuma y'aho uyu musatirizi ahagarikiwe, ikigo EA Sports gikora udukino two kuri videwo cavuze ko Greenwood yakuwe mu dukino twa FIFA. Cavuze ko yari yakuwe mu gakino kitwa FIFA 22 aca akurwa no ku rutonde rw'abo gikoresha mu gakino FIFA Ultimate Team hamwe na Ultimate Draft. Ikompanyi ikora ivyambarwa vy'abanonotsi, Nike, yari yamenyesheje ko ihagaritse imigenderanire n'uyu mukinyi. Umuvugizi wayo yavuze ati: "Turababajwe cane n'ibi birego kandi tuzobandanya dukurikiranira hagufi iki kibazo". Amaze gutangura gukinira Manchester United mu kwa gatatu 2019, Greenwood yarateye igikumu mu kwa kabiri kw'umwaka uheze ku masezerano yo gukinira uyu murwi mu kiringo c'imyaka ine, amaze gutera intambwe nk'umwe mu bigishijwe n'uyu murwi. Ku wa Mungu, uyu murwi wavuze ko "udashobora kwihanganira ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose" kandi ko wari wamenyeshejwe ivyo uyu mukinyi yagirizwa, ariko ko ataco wari kuvuga imbere y'uko "ukuri kumenyekana ku vyabaye". Mu rindi tangazo ryasohowe ejo ku wa kabiri, uyu murwi washimangiye ko wiyamiriza wivuye inyuma ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose.

headline: Zambia yahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe na Afrika y’Epfo kubera ibitero ku banyamahanga
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Zambia (FAZ) ryahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe rwoyihuje na Afrika y'Epfo kuri uyu wa gatandatu ku mugwa mukuru Lusaka. Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'ibitero vyakozwe ku banyamahanga mu gihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo. Abanyagihugu ba Zambia baciye ku mbuga hwaniro barasavye ko iryo shirahamwe FAZ rihagarika urukino hagati ya Chipolopolo na Bafana Bafana nk'ukwerekana akababaro. Umukuru wa FAZ Adrian Kashala yemeje iyo ngingo, yongera ko y'uko urwo rukino rwungururijwe ku rindi genekerezo ritamenyekanye, inyuma y'aho babonaniye n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika y'Epfo, SAFA. Muri uwo mwanya nyene, leta ya Zambia yahanuye abadereva b'amakamyo ko bohagarika ingendo zabo muri Afrika y'Epfo gushika umutekano ugarutse muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'ukwunguruza abantu n'ibintu, Mutotwe Kafwaya, yasavye abadereva basanzwe bari muri Afrika y'Epfo ko bobika amamodoka yabo ahantu hatekanye gushika umutekano ugarutse. Ivyo bitero ku banyamahanga vyasubiye kwiyongera vyatumye amaduka y'abanyamahanga asahurwa urukombamazi, amamodoka araturirwa, eka n'amakamyo yagendeshwa n'abanyamahanga araterwa. Eka n'ishirahamwe rijejwe iterambere rihuza ibihugu vyo mu karere ka Afrika y'Ubumanuko, SADC, ririyamiriza ivyo bitero. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'iryo shirahamwe,  Stergomena Tax, avuga ko SADC iteye ivyatsi ubwo bukozi bw'ikibi butagira izina bukorerwa abanyamahanga muri Afrika y'Epfo, agasaba ko ico kibazo cotorerwa inyishu irama.

headline: Novak Djokovic: Singwanya kwicandagisha ariko nemeye guheba ibikombe haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco
text: Novak Djokovic  avuga ko yopfuma aheba gukinira ibikombe vyo muri kazoza haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco rwa Covid -19. Mu kiganiro cihariye na BBC, yavuze ko ataho ahuriye n'abagwanya incanco, ariko ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'umuntu bwo guhitamwo ico ashaka. Djokovic yabajijwe niba yohitamwo guheba amahiganwa nka Wimbledon na French Open haguheba aho  ahagaze ku vyerekeye incanco. Nawe ati : "Ego, ico nico kiguzi niteguriye kuriha." Uwo mukinyi amaze gutsinda Grand Slam incuro 20 yarirukanywe muri Australia mu kwezi guheze reta y'ico gihugu imaze gufuta  visa yiwe ku mpari zijanye no kuba aticandagishije. Djokovic, asanzwe ariwe wa mbere kw'isi  muri tennis y'abagabo, avuga ko yari yarasonse uruhusha rudasansazwe rwo kwinjira muri ico gihugu gukina mw'ihiganwa rya Australian Open kubera yari amaze iminsi aheruka gukira Covid-19. Ariko umushikiranganji wa Australia ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira , Alex Hawke, ubwiwe yaciye afuta visa y'uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 34, ku mvo z'uko kuba ari muri Australia vyari gushobora "kugumura" bigaha intege  agatima ko kugwanya incanco. Yabwiye BBC ati "Sinigeze ngwanya incanco", yemeza ko yatewe incanco akiri umwana, "ariko namye nshigikira uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ico ushira mu mubiri wawe." Mu kiganiro caciye irya n'ino ibibazo vyinshi, ica mbere kuva apfungiwe i Melbourne muri Nzero (ukwa 1), Djokovic yisiguye ku bijanyue n'igihe yatorwa ko yanduye umugera wa corona muri Kigarama (ukwa 12) hamwe n'ingene abona incanco. Djokovic  yavuze ko yizeye ko ingingo zijanye n'ukwicandagisha ku mahiganwa amwe amwe zizohinduka,  anavuga ko yizeye ko "ashobora kuzokina iyindi myaka myinshi". Ariko yanemeje kandi ko yiteguriye guheba amahirwe yo kuba umugabo wa mbere w'ibihe vyose muri tennis kubera uko yumva ibintu. Umukeba wa Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, amaze gutahukana intsinzi 21 za Grand Slam, gutyo akaba ariwe mugabo wa mbere afise intsinzi nyinshi za wenyene kurusha abandi bose. Abajijwe igituma, yishuye ati: "Kubera ica ngenderwako mu gufata ingingo ku vyerekeye umubiri wanje kirakomeye kuruta igikombe canke ikindi kintu ico arico cose. Jewe ngerageza gukurikiza ivyo umubiri wanje ushaka uko bishoboka kwose." Djokovic  yavuze ko yamye ari umuntu ashira imbere "kumererwa neza, amagara, kurya neza," kandi ko ingingo yiwe ku ruhande rumwe yatumwe n'ingaruka nziza ibintu bimwe bimwe nko guhindura ingene arya n'ingene aryama, vyagize ku bushobozi bwiwe nk'umunonotsi. Avuga ko aguma "ari maso" ku bijanye no gushobora kuzokwicandagisha muri kazoza "kuko  turiko turagerageza gutora, twese hamwe, inyishu nziza ishoboka yo kurangiza Covid". "Sinigeze ngwanya kwicandagisha. Ndatahura ko, kw'isi yose, abantu bose bariko baragerageza gushira inguvu mu kurwanya uwo mugera, kandi bizeye ko ugiye kurangira vuba." Umwihwezo w'umunyamakuru Fergus Walsh Incanco (doses) zirenga  miriyaridi 10 za Covid ziramaze guterwa kandi abantu hafi batandatu kuri 10 kw'isi yose baramaze kuronka nibura rumwe. N'ukuvuga ko hari amakuru menshi. Nko ku yindi miti myinshi, incanco za Covid zirashobora kugira ingaruka, ariko integuro yazo ku mutekano ni nziza cane. Zimaze gukiza ubuzima bw'abantu badaharurwa, zakingiye abantu kurwara bakaremba, kandi zishobora kubuza kurwara Covid igihe kirekire. Izi ncanco zakozwe mu mwanya muto cane, ubundi gukora urucanco bikunze guteba kubera ibibazo vyo kuronka uburyo. Abahinga bagize uruhara mu kugerageza incanco za Covid, hamwe n'inzego zijejwe  kuzemeza, bavuga ko ataco birengangije mu bijanye n'umutekano wazo. Hari ingaruka zishika gake cane zibonekeje hagitangura gutangwa izo ncanco ku bantu ama miriyoni, ari naco gituma abagenzura bama bariko barabikurikirana indwi ku ndwi. Biragoye kumenya ibindi Djokovic akeneye canke yifuza kumenya.  Avuga ko adafise amakuru akwiye ku "rucanco" nk'uko umenga hari rumwe gusa. Hari nyinshi.  Nk'umunonotsi,  ivyago vyo kurwara Covid ni bike. Ariko ntibingana n'ubusa. Kanatsinda amaze kuyirwara kabiri. Uruhusha rudasanzwe rwo kwemererwa kwinjira muri Australia kandi aticandagishije rwasabwe hatavuzwe uwurusavye uwari we, kandi rwemewe n'imigwi y'inzego zibiri zigenga zo muri Australia. Ariko hari n'urundi rupapuro rw'urugendo, rwagiyemwo ikosa. Djokovic aremera ko "vy'ukuri, iryo kosa ku rupapuro rwo gusaba visa ntiryakozwe ibigarankana." "Ryaremewe kandi riremezwa na sentare y'igihugu mbere n'umushikiranganji ubwiwe mu bushikiranganji bw'abinjira n'abasohoka muri Australia. "Ico abantu bashobora kuba batazi ni uko  ntirukanywe muri Australia ku mvo z'uko ntari naracandazwe, canke ko hari amategeko narenze canke ko nagize ikosa mu kwuzuza urupapuro rwo gusaba visa. Ivyo vyose vyaremejwe na sentare y'igihugu n'ubushikiranganji bw'abasohoka n'abinjira. "Igituma nirukanywe muri Australia n'uko umushikiranganji ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira yakoresheje ububasha bwiwe mu gufuta visa yanje agendeye ku kwibaza ko nshobora guha intege abafise agatima ko kurwanya incanco mu gihugu canke mu gisagara, ivyo navyo nkaba ntavyemera na gato."

headline: BAL2022: Umugwi New Star usaba urundi rukino inyuma yo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko Basketball mu Burundi FEBABU ryandikiye ishirahamwe ry'isi yose ry'urwo rukino FIBA risaba ko umugwi wa New Star urenganurwa ku ngingo wafatiwe zo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa kubera Covid. Umugwi wa New Star wahagaritswe mw'ihiganwa inyuma yo gusanga abakinyi bane b'uwo mugwi n'ababaherekeje babiri bafise umugera wa Covid-19. Mu rwandiko rwa FIBA ruvuga ko uwabanduje ari umukinyi yitwa Brian Kavakure. FIBA ikavuga ko, hishimikijwe amategeko y'iryo shirahamwe, abakinyi bose bategerezwa guca bashirwa mu kibanza ca bonyene. Banditse kandi ko "kubera abanduye bashobora kwanduza abandi ku kibuga, hafashwe ingingo ko umugwi wa New Star wirukanywe mw'ihiganwa." Urukino rwategerezwa guhuza New Star na Cape Town Tigers rwaciye rufutwa, New Star ica itsindwa impaga. Baba abarongozi b'umugwi wa New Star canke ba FEBABU ishavu riraniga, bavuga ko barenganijwe. Bagiriza umugwi wa Afrika y'Epfo, Cape Town Tigers, wari watsinzwe na New Star mu rukino rwa mbere ko ari wo woba uri inyuma y'uko kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa. New Star ntihakana ko ari abakinyi bayo basanganywe Covid ariko bagatangazwa n'uko umugwi wa Cape Town Tigers na wo wasanganywe umukinyi afise uwo mugera ata ngingo n'imwe wafatiwe. Aho ni mu gihe ari wo bategerezwa gutana mu mitwe. FEBABU iranibaza iti: "Bigenda gute ngo FIBA ivuge ko umukinyi wacu Brian Kavakure ari we yanduje abandi ariko akaba ata Covid bamusanganye, mbere akanahabwa n'uburenganzira bwo gutahana n'abandi mu Burundi?" Ikindi ishirahamwe rya Basketball mu Burundi rivuga n'ingene umugwi bari baraye bakinye na New Star wa Cobra Sport bawuretse urabandanya ihiganwa. New Star kandi, n'aho yari ibuze abakinyi bakomakomeye, yaratonze ku kibuga kugira bakine na Cape Town Tigers, ariko abo na bo ntibitaba. Ivyo ngo bikagaragara ko ari ivyari vyateguwe ko babakubita impaga babagiriza ko bamwe muri bo batowe Covid. Kubera izo mvo zose, FEBABU isaba ko New star yobandanya ihiganwa hisunzwe amanota iyo migwi ibiri yari imaze kuronka, canke hatunganywe urundi rukino rwobahuriza ku kindi kibuga.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Diaz, Ronaldo, Longstaff, Origi, Cantwell, Coutinho, Traore
text: Liverpool iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Porto, umunya Colombia  Luis Diaz, 24, ku miriyoni zirenga 81 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo, 36, ashobora kuva muri Manchester United mu ci riza mu gihe atokwishimira umumenyereza uyu murwi uzohitamwo burundu. (Star) Manchester United yemereye umukinyi wayo wo hagati Paul Pogba amasezerano mashasha y'igihe kirekire - ashobora kumuha umushahara w'ibihumbi birenga amajana 540 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku ndwi - kugira ngo uyu mufaransa w'imyaka 28 ntazohave agenda kuri gusa mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na'uyu murwi azoba arangiye.  (Sun) Newcastle yanse ivyo yemerewe na Everton ku mukinyi Sean Longstaff.  Uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 24 akina hagati azorangiza amasezerano afitaniye n'aba Magpies mu mpera z'iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka, bakaba bizeye ko bazokwumvikana ku masezerano mashasha.  (Shields Gazzette) Newcastle n'uwundi murwi wa Premier League nyene iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich Todd Cantwell, 23. (Sky Sports) Newcastle iripfuza kandi umukinyi w'inyuma wa West Ham umufaransa Issa Diop, 24, kandi iriko irategura imiriyoni zababa 13,5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo batangure urugamba rwo kumugura. (L'Equipe via Hammers News) Umusatiri wa Liverpool umubirigi Divock Origi, 26, hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Bournemouth umwongereza Dominic Solanke, 24, bari mu bakinyi bariko barakurikiranirwa hagufi na  Newcastle mu gihe iriko irondera uwosubirira Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Telegraph - subscription required) Imirwi ibiri yo muri Premier League iriko irarwanira kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho, 29, akaba yiteze gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe kuri uwu wa gatanu.  (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino ariteguye kwakira ico bomwemerera cose kugira ngo abe umumenyereza wa Manchester United. (Sun) Tottenham iriteguye gusubira gutangura urugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Wolves umunya-Espagne Adama Traore, 25. (Athletic - subscription required) Chelsea nta mugambi ifise wo gutanga amafaranga akenewe kugira ngo igumye burundu umukinyi wo hagati yatijijwe ava muri Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez, 27.  (Express) Manchester United ifise amahirwe make yo kugura umukinyi n'umwe muri kuno kwezi ariko ifise umugambi wo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati mu ci riza, igashobora kuzorondera Declan Rice, 22, wa West Ham.  (Talksport) Arsenal yemeye kuzotanga umukinyi azokwiyongera ku mafaranga yemeye gutanga kugira ngo ironke umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya-Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21. (Ben Jacobs - CBS) Watford yemeye kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool umwongereza Nathaniel Phillips, 24, yamaze kubwirwa ko afise uburenganzira bwo gusezera uyu murwi muri uku kwezi.  (Football Insider) Aba ba Hornets kandi bamenyesheje umukinyi wabo w'inyuma w'umwongereza Danny Rose, 31, ko atazosubira gukinira uyu murwi kandi ko afise uburenganzira bwo kwigira muri kano kadirisha k'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi. (Sky Sports) Leicester City n'iyindi mirwi itari mike ya Premier League izotegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni zababa 45 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika nimba ishaka kugura umusatirizi wa Club Bruges, Charles de Ketelaere, ariko yipfuza cane kwimukira muri Premier League muri uku kwa mbere. (Voetbal Nieuws - via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yotira umusatirizi wa Manchester United umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, harimwo n'umugambi wo kuzoshobora kumugura burundu mu mpera z'iri higanwa.  (Sport - in Spanish) Newcastle nayo nyene iripfuza gutira Martial kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira umusatirizi Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Times - subscription required) Barca kandi iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea umunya Danemark Andreas Christensen, 25. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Everton na Newcastle yahambije Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya Brésil Bruno Guimaraes, 24, asanzwe akina hagati muri Lyon mu Bufaransa.  (Standard) Umunyegori wa Liverpool  Loris Karius, 28, vyanse ko yimukira muri Greuther Furth, inyuma y'aho uyu murwi wa Bundesliga mu Budagi unaniriwe no kuronka amafaranga asabwa kugira ngo imukure i  Anfield. (Fussball Transfers via Daily Star) Umusatirizi wa Jamaica Michail Antonio, 31, yateye igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri  West Ham azomushikana mu ci rya 2025. (90 Min)

headline: Mboma na Masilingi bo muri Namibia bompi ntawuzokwiruka 400m muri olympic kubera testosterone nyinshi
text: Umukobwa w'umuyabaga wo muri Namibia  Christine Mboma - yaciye umuhingo wa metero 400 wari umaze imyaka 30 - mu batarenza imyaka 20 ku wa gatatu - yavuye mu bazohiganwa kuri uwo mwanya mu nkino za olympic za Tokyo kuko basanze umubiri wiwe ufise inkabuzo/umusemburo kamere wa testosterone uri ku rugero rurenze urwemerwa n'urwego ruraba izo nkino kw'isi,  World Athletics. Umwanya wari wagizwe n'uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 18 Mboma ku wa gatatu mu gisagara co muri Pologne ca  Bydgoszcz waza ubigira ndwi mu myanya mito ku 400m wirutswe n'umugore gushika ubu - ukaba wamuha amahirwe yo kuronka umudari w'inzahabu kuri izo metero i Tokyo. Ariko komite ya olympic ya Namibia (NNOC - CGA) yemeje ko abo bakobwa bompi batazoshobora guhiganwa kuri izo metero kubera amategeko ya  World Athletics ku bagore bari mu mugwi w'abafise  "Differences of Sexual Development", canke DSD, inyuma yo gupimwa n'urwo rwego. NNOC -CGA yavuze mw'itangazo ko  "bikenewe cane ko abantu bumva ko abo banonotsi bompi atawari azi ko afise ico kibazo. Nta n'uwo mu muryango yari abizi, naho n'umumenyereza wabo canke NNOC -CGA." Mboma yari amaze umwaka atera imbere bigaragara, agumya asumvya aho yari amaze kugera, anaca imihigo mu gihugu,  ku mugabane mbere no kw'isi ku metero 400. Umwanya wiwe w'amasekunda 48.54 -hafi ica cenda kuri cumi (9/10) wihuse kurusha umwanya wa mbere  mwiza wari uhari gushika ubu wagizwe n'umudagikazi wo mu buseruko  Gritt Breur mu 1991 - wari muto cane ku buryo ubwo nyene yaciye aba umwe mu bohiganiwe umudari w'inzahabu na cane ko muri iyo ndwi uwundi mukeba kuri izo metero, Salwa Eid Naser wo muri Bahrain, yari yafatiwe ibihano vy'imyaka ibiri kubera kurenga ku mategeko yo gufata imiti yongereza inguvu zo kwiruka. Ariko uko gutera imbere cane kwatumye World Athletics imukurikiranira hafi, ica isaba ko hasuzumwa  ibipimo vya mbere vyari vyakorewe muri Namibia. Ibindi bipimo vyaciye bikorwa mur iyi ndwi aho bompi Mboma na Masilingi bagirira imyimenyerero ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubutariano Roma, ''inyishu ikaba yaje ivuga ko abo banonotsi bompi umubiri wabo usanzwe ufise inkabuzo kamere za testosterone zirenze urugero". Itangazo ry'urwego rwa Namibia rujejwe inkino za olympic rivuga ko "NNOC -CGA n'umuganga wacu aguma avugana n'umuganga wa World Athletics ku vyerekeye ibigiye gukurikira kuri abo banonostsi babiri." "Tuzokwihweza inkuru zose. Turizeye kazoza kabo nk'abanonostsi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru. Christine na Beatrice bompi bazoshobora guhiganwa ku metero 100 na 200. "Umumenyereza ariteguye kubandanya akorana n'abo bakobwa kuri izo metero mu gihe tukiraba ikigiye gukurikira." Mboma na Masilingi bompi bazohiganwa ubwa mbere mu nkino za olympic i Tokyo mu Buyapani, aho izo nkino zitegekanijwe hagati y'itariki 23 ukwezi kw'indwi n'itari 8 ukwezi kw'umunani. World Athletics irabuza abagore bari mu mugwi wa DSD guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya metero 400 na mile imwe (1,6km) mu mugwi w'abagore kiretse babanje gufata imiti igabanya urugero rw'inkabuzo ya testosterone. Ni co cakuye  umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba, umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Caster Semenya n'umunya-Kenya Margaret  Wambui mw'ihiganwa ku metero 800 mu  nkino za Tokyo. Uko ari batatu nibo bari baronse imidari kuri izo metero mu nkino za Rio mu 2016. Francine Niyonsaba ubu azogeragaza amahirwe yiwe ku metero 5,000 mu gihe  Caster Semenya we vyamunaniye kuronka umwanya usabwa kugira aronke uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa kuri izo metero mu nkino za Tokyo. World Athletics ivuga ko urugero runini rw'iyo nkabuzo rwongereza  kutaruha no gukomera kw'imitsi bigaha amahirwe abafise ururi hejuru cane kurusha abandi. Caster Semenya amaze igihe  yarajanye urubanza muri sentare kugira iyo ngingo ivanweho, ubu akaba arugejeje muri sentare ya Buraya yubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu. Avuga ati: ''Iyo ngingo nta nsiguro igira. Nzoguma ngwanira uburenganzira bwanje."

headline: Icegeranyo kivuga ko Diego Maradona yapfuye kubera ugusamara kw'abaganga
text: Umurwi w'abahinga mu vyo buvuzi wemeje ko uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Argentine mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona "atitaweho kandi habaye urwangara" imbere 'yuko asandaba. Abashikirizamanza muri Argentina bari basavye uyo murwi gukora amatohoza ku bari bajejwe gukurikirana amagara ya Maradona inyuma y'aho apfiriye mu kw'icumi na rimwe umwaka uheze. Maradona yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima muhira iwe i Buenos Aires afise imyaka 60. Mu ntango z'ukwa cumi na rimwe yari yabazwe mu bwonko ikivyimba cari cavuye kw'ivura ry'amaraso, akaba yagomba abandanye avurwa ingaruka z'inzoga. Nk'umwe mu bakinyi babaye rurangiranwa mu bihe vyose, Maradona yahavuye agira ubuzima bubi bwaranzwe no kunywa ibiyayuramutwe n'inzoga nyinshi. Urupfu rwa Maradona yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina igihe iki gihugu gitahukana igikombe c'isi yose mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'umupira w'amaguru  mu 1986, rwababaje abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, bakaba bibajije vyinshi ku bijanye n'abari bajejwe kumuvura. Haciye imisi mike apfuye, abashikirizamanza baciye batangura amatohoza ku baganga n'abaforoma bari bajejwe kumuvura. Mu kwa gatatu, abo bashikirizamanza batumyeko abahinga 20 muvyo ubuvuzi  kugira ngo bihweze icatumye Maradona apfa bongere bihweze nimba harabaye urwangara. Ivyavuye mu matohoza y'abo bahinga vyatangajwe n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Argentina ku wa gatanu. Mu cegeranyo c'impapuro 70, uyo murwi werekana ko Maradona yasinzikaye cane hafi amasaha 12 imbere y'uko apfa. Muri iki gihe, "ntiyakurikiranywe bikwiye", nk'uko iki cegeranyo kibivuga. Gisubiramwo ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, ikinyamakuru Clarin co muri Argentina kivuga ko uyo murwi wagiriza abaganga bari bajejwe kuvura Maradona "bamutanye wenyene" Abo bahinga bavuga ko Maradona yari gushobora kuronka amahirwe yo gukira iyo ajanwa kuvurirwa kw'ivuriro hakumugumiza muhira, nk'uko ico kinyamakuru kibivuga. Uyo murwi uvuga ko abari bajejwe kuvura Maradona batamuvuye neza kandi baranzwe n'urwangara, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters naryo ryaronse ico cegeranyo. Umuganga bwite wa Maradona Leopoldo Luque w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'uwari ajejwe gukurikirana ubuzima bwiwe bwo mu mutwe, bari mu baganga bariko barakorwako amatohoza n'aho bashikirizamanza. Umurwi w'abahinga washikirije icegeranyo cawo, hasigaye ko abashikirizamanza bafata ingingo ku bijanye no kurengutsa abagirizwa. Ikinyamakuru Clarin kivuga ko bimwe muvyo bashobora kwagirizwa harimwo ubwicanyi. Uru rupfu rwakozweko amatohoza inyuma y'uko babiri mu bakobwa ba Maradona bitwaye. Bavuze ko bagize amakenga ku kungene se wabo yakurikiranywe amaze kubagwa mu bwonko. Muganga Luque wewe nta caha camwagiriye. Arahakana ko ataruhara yabigizemwo. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abanyamakuru akorora amosozi mu kwa cumi na rimwe, Muganga Luque yararize, avuga ko yakoze uko ashoboye kugira arokore ubuzima bw'umugenzi wiwe. Uyu muganga yavuze ko yakoze "ivyo yari ashoboye vyose gushika aho ananirwa".

headline: Lionel Messi: Barça yipfuza kunagura umurwi ishingiye ku mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi
text: Barcelona iracipfuza ko yosubira kwiyubaka ishingiye kuri kizigenza wayo Lionel Messi, ubu abarongoye uyu murwi bakaba bariko baragerageza kumwumvisha ko yowugumamwo, nk'uko bivugwa na Ramon Planes ajejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Barça. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Argentine yaratangarije uyu murwi ko yipfuza kuwusezerera. Uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro indwi zose niwe mukinyi wa mbere amaze gutsindira Barcelona ibitsindo vyinshi, bingana na 634. Planes ati: "Ivyabaye vyarabaye kandi intumbero yacu ni ukunagurira umurwi wacu ku mushinge w'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi". "Dushaka kwubaka uwundi murwi utsinda urongowe n'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi, uwa mbere mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi". "Barça na Leo ni nk'umugabo n'umugore, aho uruhande rumwe rwitangiye cane urundi, kandi bompi banezereje abakunzi. Nibaza ko kazoza ari keza. Ndafise viyizigiro". Messi - umukinyi amaze imyaka yose akina muri Barça - yipfuza kuja ahandi inyuma y'uko umwaka wose w'inkino urangiye ata gikombe na kimwe baronse, akamaramaza kakaba kabaye mu rukino rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ca Champions League rwagiye kurangira Bayern Munich yirahiye Barça ibitsindo 8-2. Amasezerano ya Messi na Barcelona azorangira mu 202, ariko umurwi umukeneye ukaba utegerezwa kumugura ku miliyoni 700. Planes ati: "Turakeneye abakinyi b'inararibonye nka Leo Messi, ariko kandi n'abakinyi b'integabizoza ku murwi. Turiko turita ku rutare kugira ngo imigenderanire hagati ya Messi na Barça ibandanye. Turiko turakora kugira ngo twumvishe Leo". "Barça yagiye yiyubaka incuro nyinshi muri kahise kandi yamye yivyukiranya ikaza ikomeye cane, rero muri kino gihe nivyo turimwo". Bamwe babona ko kugira ngo Messi ashobore kugondozwa ari uko umukuru wayo Josep Maria Bartomeu atanga imihoho, maze hakaba ayandi matora. Hagati aho, iki conyene gishobora kudatuma uyu murwi ugumana uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espanye incuro cumi zose hamwe n'ihiganwa rya Bulaya (Champions League) incuro zine.

headline: Caster Semenya yise abarongozi ba 'athletisme' muri Africa ba 'niryo' ku ngingo ya sentare ya siporo.
text: Uwigeze gutwara umudari wa olempike incuro zibiri n'uwo ihiganwa ry'isi yose incuro zitatu, Caster Semenya, yise abategetsi ba Afrika muvyo kwinonora imitsi, ba "niryo" kuba barananiwe guhagarara bakagwanira abanonotsi b'abapfasoni bahanganye n'ikibazo co gukurwa mu mahiganwa. Uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 31  yarakuwe ku rutonde rw'abahiganwa ku metero akunda gusiganwako 800 hisunzwe amategeko  agenga inkabuzo ya "testostérone" umuntu aba afise mu mubiri, y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi mu 2019. Abanonotsi bafise inkabuzo nyinshi za "testostérone" basabwa gukoresha umuti mu kuzigabanya kugira bashobore guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1500. Semenya yagize ati: "Nibaza ko, kuri uyu musi, dufise abategetsi ba 'niryo'". "Kuri uyu mugabane, abantu baranumye. Sintahura igituma batavuga. Ntibagwanira abanonotsi babo. "Mutegerezwa guseruka mugakora, mukagwanira abanonotsi banyu, gutyo abanonotsi ba Afrika bazoba beza cane. Ubu uko bimeze birababaje." Igihe BBC Sport Africa yabaza Maboum Kalkaba, prezida w'urunani rw'amashirahamwe yo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika (CAA), ivyerekeye ivyo Semanya avuga, n'uko abategetsi barongoye ishirahamwe ryo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika bakoreye ibikwiye abo barongoye, yishuye ati: "Nimundeke, nta nyishu mfise". Abanonotsi benshi bo muri Afrika barakozweko n'iyo ngingo, harimwo umunonotsi w'umurundikazi yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza mu nkino za olempike, Francine Niyonsaba, hamwe na mugenzi we wo muri Kenya bahiganwa ku metero 800. Mu mwaka uheze, abayabaga babiri bo muri Namibia, Christine Mboma na Beatrice Masilingi, barahatiwe kuva mw'ihiganwa rya metero 400, imbere y'imisi mike ngo habe inkino za olempike za Tokyo inyuma yo kumenyeshwa ko bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo za testostérone. Bompi Mboma na Masilingi batinze bahiganwa mu metero 200 mu Buyapani, aho Mboma yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza wa mbere wa olempike w'ico gihugu. Ariko Semenya, ubu ahiganwa ku metero 5000, yaranebaguye ingene abategetsi b'ishirahamwe rya Afrika riraba abanonotsi bitwaye kuri ico kibazo c'abo bayabaga co kimwe n'"agacerere" ku ngingo yafashwe yo kubabuza guhiganwa muri rusangi. Uwo munye Afrika y'epfo yagize ati: "Igihe nari mfise imyaka 18, sinashobora kuvuga. Ubu ndakuze bikwiye, ndashobora kuvuga. "Nimwiyumvire ivyaciye mu mitwe y'iyo miyabaga. Nta co bashobora gukora, ariko abategetsi bariyicariye gusa binezerererwa gusa n'uturusho bafise, mu bibanza biberamwo amanama. Umuyobozi mukuru wa CAA, Lamine Faty yavuze ko Semenya "afise uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyo yiyumvira" kandi ko ibibazo ku ngingo zatumye bakurwa mw'ihiganwa vyashikirijwe n'iryo shirahamwe "kera cane" kandi ko vyaganiriweko mu misi ya vuba mu kanama ka CAA  mu nama yabereye muri Ile Maurice. Impari kw'itorwa ry'abagore bagira uruhara muri siporo zabaye nyinhsi, na cane cane zikaba zashimikiye ku banonotsi bameze nk'abagabo kandi ari abakobwa. Mu ndwi iheze, prezida w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi, Seb Coe, yavuze ko iryo shirahamwe rishobora gukurikizako igisata co kwoga, mu kubuza abagore biyumva nk'abagabo kuja mw'ihiganwa, avuga ashimitse ko "kutarenganya bidashobora guharirwako". Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Tubandanya twiga, tugira ubushakashatsi ku bwinshi bw'inkabuzo ya testostérone ko ari kimwe mu bituma umuntu akomera gusumba , tukaba twarategekanije ibiganiro ku mategeko yacu mu kanama kacu mu mpera y'umwaka." Semenya, yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu ku metero 800 mu myaka ya 2012 na 2016 mu nkino za olempike, yari yunguruje ku ngingo zafashwe n'ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi, ariko aratsindwa muri sentare ica imanza z'inkino mu 2019. Yaratsinzwe kandi muri sentare y'iyungururizo no muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu mwaka wakurikiye, imbere yo kwitura sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu aho urwo rubanza rutarumvirizwa. Yagize ati: "Ntituzigera duhagarika uru rugamba." "Ubu ibi ntibiraba jewe gusa, biraba abana bakiri bato ubu bariko baravuka bazohangana n'iki kibazo. "Hari abana benshi bipfuza guhiganwa ku metero 400, 800 na 1500, ariko ntibashobora kubemerera. Bavuga ko siporo ari iya bose, ariko ubu si iya bose."

headline: CAN 1996: Intsinzi ya South Afrika n'uruhara yagize mu mpinduka z'inyuma ya apartheid
text: Ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika ryo mu 1996 ntiryari ryitezwe kubera muri Afrika y'Epfo. Kenya nico gihugu cari catowe ko cari kuritegura, ariko hasigaye amezi 14 yarakuyemwo akarenge, ivuga ko vyari kuyisaba uburyo busumba incuro zitandatu ubwari bwitezwe. Niho mu kwa cumi na rimwe 1994, ishirahamwe rya Afrika rijejwe umupira w'amaguru (CAF) ryaca rirondera ahandi iri higanwa ryari kubera. Mu ntango z'uwo mwaka, mu kwa kane, Nelson Mandela yari yatowe nk'umukuru w'igihugu mu matora ya mbere ya demokarasi muri kahise ka Afrika y'Epfo. Niho umurwi nserukiragihugu wari ucemererwa kwinjira mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu, usubijwe mu rwego mpuzamashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, inyuma y'aho hashingiwe ishirahamwe rishasha ry'umupira w'amaguru (FA) ry'ico gihugu rihurikiyemwo amoko atandukanye mu 1991, igihe bwa butegetsi mvanguramoko bwa apartheid bwari butanguye gusenyuka. Afrika y'Epfo niyo yatowe ngo itunganye iri higanwa. Ariko nta muntu yari yiteze ko bari kubishobora. Mu vy'ukuri, ibintu ntivyagenze neza mu ntango inyuma y'aho basubirijwe mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu mu 1991 gushika n'aho umunyamabanga mukuru wa FA Solomon Morewa yihaye iryosozi. Iri higanwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika (CAN/AFCON) ryagiye kuba ikindi kintu. Ivyabaye mu myaka ya 1990 bigahindura ibintu, maze bigasambura ubutegetsi bw'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo bwari bumaze ibinjana birenga bitatu, navyo vyarahinduye urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru wariko urakomera mu buryo budasubira inyuma. Hari ikintu kidasanzwe cari giherutse kuba muri ico gihugu, iki naco ni ugutsindira igikombe c'isi yose mu rukino rwa Rugby (Rugby World Cup) mu buryo butangaje mu 1995. Ariko, nk'uko bivugwa n'abaserukiye iki gihugu cari kivutse bushasha mu kwinjira mu ntwaro rusangi mu nkino za CAN 1996 catsindiye, iyi ntsinzi yagize ingaruka zikomeye gusumba. Cameroun niyo yahuye ubwa mbere na Afrika y'Epfo. Ku wa 13 Nzero/Mutarama, imirwi nserukirabihugu yavyo yaratanye mu mitwe ku kibuga Soccer City, hanze gato y'igisagara ca Soweto, hamwe habera ya myiyerekano y'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyeshure biyamiriza intwaro y'inkehwa z'abazungu, aho abaharurwa mu majana bagandaguwe n'igipolisi cariko kirwanya iyi myiyerekano, imyaka 20 yari iheze. Neil Tovey yari afise imyaka 33.  Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma yakinira umurwi wo muri ico gihugu Kaizer Chiefs, yatanguye gukina ku rwego mpuzamakungu mu kw'indwi 1992, inyuma y'isabukuru yiwe y'imyaka 30 y'amavuka. Uru ni rwo rwabaye urukino rwiwe rwa mbere mu murwi nserukiragihugu uhuriyemwo koko amoko menshi - rwawuhuje kandi na Cameroun ruza kurangira bayitsinze 1-0. Tovey yabwiye BBC ati: "Imbere y'iri higanwa, iyo ubaza abagize umurwi mbere na jewe nimba twari gushobora kuritsindira, sinzi nimba twari kwishura ko twari kubishobora". "Baba abafana, baba twebwe abakinyi, nta na bamwe bari bamenyereye amahiganwa mpuzamakungu y'umupira w'amaguru. Ariko uko ihiganwa ryagiye ritera imbere, niko igihugu cagiye gikomera". Umusi umwe imbere y'uko urukino rwa mbere rutangura, Perezida Mandela, kw'izina kama ryiwe nka Madiba, yaragendeye ubwa mbere uyu murwi mu ngendo zitari nke yagize muri uyu murwi. Lucas Radebe, ico gihe yakinira Leeds United, ni uwundi mukinyi yari mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Afrika y'Epfo. Ku bwiwe, kubonana na Mandela casa n'uko coba ari igikorwa c'Imana. Ati: "Igihe twari tugikura, ntitwigeze tumenya ngo yasa gute". "Twari dufise isanamu yiwe ya kera yamwerekana akiri muto, ariko igihe aza kuturaba aho twari turi mw'ikambi, aha niho twabonye  "Madiba Magic". Yari afise igihagararo kidasanzwe. Twarabuze ico tuvuga". "Uwo musi, n'iyo tugahura na Brésil twari kuyikubita. Uko rero niko twatewe intege. Umuzo wiwe wadushikanye ku rugero rwo hejuru cane, aho urukino rwose twakina, twabona ko turiko dukinira Madiba na Afrika y'Epfo". 'Madiba Magic' cari iciyumviro cari mu mitwe y'abantu ko Mandela yatera imigisha ku mirwi y'umupira w'amaguru. Ni iciyumviro cavutse ku wa 10 Rusama/Gicurasi 1994 - umusi Mandela yimikwa - ico gihe Afrika y'Epfo ikaba yatsinze Zambia ku ncuro ya mbere, umukuru w'igihugu mushasha ari ho ari. Vyasa n'uko iki ciyumviro cariko kirakora kandi. Cameroun yatsinzwe 3-0, iki kikaba cabaye ikimenyetso c'ivyari bigiye gukurikira. Umukinyi Phil Masinga wa Leeds niwe yateye ica mbere amaze amasaha 24 gusa avuye mu Bwongereza. Nk'uko bivugwa na Shaun Bartlett yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Charlton, igihe Afrika y'Epfo ifata ikibanza ca mbere mu murwi yarimwo maze ikinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, umurwi waciye umenyekana kw'izina rya Madiba's Boys (Abahungu ba Madiba). Ati: "Gushika n'ubu, kuvuga gusa izina ry'igihangange Mandela nca numva merereje. Igihe cose twabonanye na we, agukoze mu miwe gusa, wamengo hari ikintu aguhaye. "Ikintu kibi conyene gusa ni uko wategerezwa kuvyuka isaha cumi n'igice mu gatondo, kubera ni vyo bihe yari akirimwo vyo kuva igihe yinjira ibohero. Yavyuka mu gaturuturu agatembera. Rero twategerezwa kuvyuka kugira tubonane na we isaha cumi n'imwe z'agatondo".
