Ariko Afrika ntiyatsindiye iri higanwa rya Afrika ku kigumbagumba gusa, canke kumbure kubera yari ifise izindi nguvu ikuye ku yindi si. Umupira bari bawuzi, kandi bari bafise umumenyereza mwiza Clive Barker. Tovey, umukinyi yinjirije igihugu ciwe ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi mu nkino 29, avuga ati: "Yarabonye ubuhinga muri buri mukinyi wese aca arabukorerako mu kubagira abakinyi bakomeye abagira ico babaye". Imbere y'uko baja mw'ihiganwa, bari bamaze gukina inkino 13 badatsindwa, muri zo harimwo zibiri banganije n'Ubudagi hamwe na Argentina. Iciyongereye kuri izi nguvu, ni ubuhinga bw'abakinyi Radebe na Phil Masinga bakuye i Bulaya mu murwi wa Leeds, co kimwe n'umusatirizi wa Wolves, Mark Williams. Hariho kandi n'umukinyi w'inyuma Mark Fish yariko arakurikiranirwa hagufi na Manchester United, akaba muri uwo mwaka nyene yategerezwa kuja gukinira Lazio, imbere y'uko yijira muri Bolton mu 1997. Inyuma y'intsinzi idasanzwe y'umurwi wa rugby mu mwaka w'imbere y'aho, itsinzi y'umurwi wari ugizwe ahanini n'abazungu yashize hamwe igihugu, bari baronse ikindi bagenderako. Tovey ati: "Iyi yari imwe mu ntego twavuga". "Twari tuzi ko dufise kandi uruhara mu gusubiza hamwe igihugu, kandi Madiba yari azi ko mu gihe twari kuvyifatamwo neza vyari gutuma ubumwe butsimbatara mu gihugu. "Umunezero waranze intsinzi y'umurwi wa rugby wari 10% gusa w'uwari kubaho mu gihe twari kuramuka natwe dutahukanye intsinzi". Itsinzi itangaje yagize kuri Algeria mu kuyitsinda 2-1 mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, ivuye ku gitsindo ca John 'Shoes' Moshoeu ku munota wa 86, yatumye yinjira mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma aho yahura na Ghana. Iki gihugu nico cahabwa amahirwe, nk'umurwi wa mbere wa Afrika, umurwi umwe rudende utigeze utsindwa na rimwe muri iryo higanwa. Umurwi wa Ghana wari ukomeye cane kuko wari wishimiye umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayern Munich Samuel Kuffour, umukinyi wo hagati wa Torino Abedi Pele - se wa Andre na Jordan Ayew - hamwe n'uwundi musatirizi wa Leeds yariko araduga cane Tony Yeboah. Ariko aba banya Ghana batashe zirayoye muri uru rukino bakubiswe 3-0. Tovey ati: "Urukino rwa Ghana ni rumwe mu nkino zacu zari zikomeye gushika ubwo". "Harabaye uguhangana bikomeye hagati ya Lucas na Yeboah. Hose mu kibuga, umupira wari rwacu". Amakuru y'intsinzi muri uru rukino yaravuzwe cane mu binymakauru bukeye. Ikinyamakuru Business Day canditse kiti: "Igihe Afrika y'Epfo ikubitiye Ghana, uturere twari twiganjemwo abazungu twaritabiriye umupira w'amaguru ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho mu myaka 20 yose mu gihe c'amahiganwa yaba ay'igihugu canke aya Afrika". Buca haba urukino rwa nyuma, umutwe w'inkuru nyamukuru y'ikinyamakuru gikuru Beeld casohoka buri musi mu rurimi rw'iki afrikaans yari yanditswe mu kizulu ngo: 'Yebo Bafana Bafana!' (Yeah, The Boys! twogereranya mu kirundi tuti "Komera mwa bahungu mwe!") Bategerezwa guhura na Tunisia. Isinzi ry'abantu bangana na 80.000, harimwo Perezida Mandela, umwami w'abaZulu Goodwill Zwelithini hamwe n'uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brésil Pele, bari bakubise harazima mu kibuga ca Soccer City, amasaha atatu imbere y'uko urukino rutangura. Mandela yari yambaye agapira kanditseko inomero 9 yambarwa na Neil Tovey, mu gihe abafana benshi bari biyanditse ku bikiriza vyabo mu marangi atandukanye ubutumwa bwavuga ngo 'Make Madiba Magic'. Mu gice ca mbere c'urukino, uretse umupira watewe mw'igori na Bartlett ariko umunyegori wa Tunisia akawukurayo, umupira ntiwigeze urenga hagati mu kibuga. Ariko, mu vyaboneka ko bananiranywe, hagati mu gice ca kabiri, Williams yari yasubiriye Masinga yerekanye ubudasa. Uyu musatirizi yinjie ibitsindo bibiri mu minota ibiri nyene - ica mbere cari ic'umutwe, ica kabiri kiva mu mupira ukomeye yateresheje ibamfu - maze aha Afrika y'Epfo intsinzi idasanzwe. Ivyakurikiye wabaye umunezero utagira urugero. Radebe ati: "Ndacavyibuka neza nk'uko umengo ni ivyabaye nijoro. Mu gihugu cose nta muntu yakoza ukuguru hasi. "Ico wumva yari Soweto. Nta bantu wumva biruka, kiretse abafana hanze y'ikibuga barira, baboroga. "Igihe twariko tuva mu kibuga, twabona abantu bikubita hasi. Bamwe bari bafise ikirato, abandi nabo bafise ifi ikanura (mu kwigina 'Shoes' Moshoeu na Mark Fish). "Vyari ibintu koko bigoye kwumva. Nibaza ko ryabaye iteka ku gihugu cose". Mw'ijambo yavuze imbere y'uko apfa mu 2015 ku myaka 49 ihitanywe na kanseri yo mu mushishito, Moshoeu yibutse ingene yaturitse akarira igihe umufana w'umuzungu amusavye ko yomuterera igikumu (autograph). Afrika y'Epfo yari ikiri mu bibazo bikomeye cane, inkino zonyene ntizishobora gutorera umuti ibibazo vyose. Ariko Mandela yarizeye ubushobozi bwazo. Ati: "Inkino zirafise ubushobozi bwo guhindura isi. Zifise inguvu zo kwigisha. Zifise ubushobozi bwo gushira hamwe abantu gusumba uko ibindi vyose vyobikora. "Inkino zirafise ubushobozi bwo kuzana icizere ahahoze harangwa umwiheburo. Zisumvya inguvu reta mu gusambura imitego ishingiye ku moko". Radebe yabonye impinduka mu kanya isase. Ati: "Kwumva abazungu bavuga ngo 'uri incungu yanje, ni wewe gusa nibonamwo' vyantumye nkorora amosozi kuko nibuka ivyo twari duhitiyemwo muri iyo myaka yose. Iyi yari yo Afrika y'Epfo nshasha". "Ubwenge bwacu bwarugurutse. Amaso yacu yariko abona ibintu birengeye ivyo twari tumaze imyaka n'imyaka tubona. Vyari koko ibintu biteye igomwe. Kubera gusa umupira w'amaguru". Tovey avuga ko uwu munezero wabandanije gushika ku rugero rurengeye iyi misi yakurikiye yo kwigina intsinzi. "Kuva ubwo abazungu benshi baciye batangura kuja barinjira mu bibuga kurorera inkino z'imirwi ikomakomeye na mpuzamakungu. Abantu b'ingeri zose babandanije badufata mu mugongo uko bukeye uko bwije. "Ivyo twakoreye igihugu vyabaye ibintu bidasanzwe. Abanyagihugu 10% canke 12% bakunda rugby, ariko umupira w'amaguru wakundwa ku rugero rwa 95%. Eka n'abazungu kuva ico gihe baciye bamenya Bafana Bafana. "Ariko uku si ugukengera ivyo abakinyi ba rugby bakoreye igihugu. Ni bo babaye aba mbere kubikora mu 1995, kandi bakoze ibikorwa vyinsha cane bidasanzwe". Iragi umupira w'amaguru wasize ni ingene Afrika y'Epfo yashoboye kuronka itike yo kuja mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru c'isi incuro zibiri yikurikiranya. Mu mahiganwa abiri yakurikiye y'igikombe ca Afrika, Afrika y'Epfo yatahukanye ikibanza ca kabiri n'ica gatatu. Mu bajejwe gufata ingingo, uwari arongoye FIFA ico gihe Joao Havelange yari yemereye Afrika ko ari yo yari gutegura ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2006. Impera n'imperuka vyahavuye biba mu 2010 muri Afrika y'Epfo. Nayo ku vyerekeye Tovey, Radebe na Bartlett - bazokwama baboneka  nk'intwari ku banyagihugu b'igihugu cabo. Tovey yarahawe agashimwe na Mandela. Avuga ati: "Nk'umukinyi, ukora ivyo utegerezwa gukora. Ariko inyuma y'imyaka 26 ngeze kuri iyi ntambwe, uwu mwanya namaranye nawe wari udasanzwe, udasanzwe na gato". "Amasanamu yiwe mu kabare kanje. Ni ikintu kidashobora kwibagirwa muri kahise k'igihugu. "Ntitwari gupfa dushitse aho twashitse iyo atava mw'ibohero ngo adusubize ku rubuga mpuzamakungu rw'umupira". Kubwa Radebe, iragi riza mu mutwe ningoga ni ihadabu yatangishijwe na muri Leeds. Ati:  "Inyuma ya finale, umumenyereza wa Leeds Howard (Wilkinson) yarampamagaye ambwira ati 'nkeneye kukubona muri irya ndege'. Nshitse i Yorkshire, mu mbeho izura inzara yo mu gihe kibi c'ubukonje. Oh, Mana yanje". "Twategerezwa kuva twashitse bukeye. Naciwe ihadabu y'umushahara w'indwi yose kubera nashitse harenzeko umusi umwe. Maze gushika muri Leeds nkabona ku mboneshakure imodoka itugaye iriko irazunguruka n'igikombe, mvugishije ukuri narababaye cane". "Abakinyi bagiye ku kibuga ca Sun City bari kumwe n'abagore babo hamwe n'abakunzi babo, nanje ndiko ndakina muri Leeds mu mbeho y'ubugesera yo mu kwa kabiri izura inzara, ntivyanyoroheye. "Nari ndindiriye ko ici rishika kugira ngo ihiganwa riheze nanje nshobore kuja muhira nkigina intsinzi". Hagati aho, intsinzi yaronse mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika si yo yabaye iya nyuma yamushize hamwe na Mandela. 'Madiba' yari mu batumire ku bugeni bwiwe. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe twigeze tubwira ko yari kuza. Jewe gusa n'umugore wanje ni twe twari tubizi. Nibaza ko nari mfise umunezero gusumba uwo nagize igihe mbwira umugore wanje ko twokwubaka". "Umugore yashitse isaha icenda, ariko Mandela we yari yashitse isaha umunani n'iminota 45 kuko atashaka ko abashitsi bitaho we aho kwitaho umugore wanje. Uyo ni we mugabo, umugabo yama akora ibintu vyose mu bushingatahe, ibi ni vyo bintu bikeya nshobora kugumana mu buzima bwanje. "Aha nta nkeka ko ndamufise mu mafoto. Ntushobora kubwira abantu ngo yaraje ku bugeni bwawe hanyuma ngo ubure ivyemezo".

headline: Mesut Ozil avuga ko azoguma muri Arsenal gushika amasezerano arangiye mu 2021
text: Mesut Ozil, umukinyi wo hagati w'umurwi Arsenal, avuga ko azoguma muri uyo murwi "gushika ku munota wa nyuma" w'amasezerano yiwe ategekanijwe kurangira mu kwa gatandatu 2021. Kuva inkino za Premier League zisubiriye gutangura mu kwa gatandatu, uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 31 ubu - yigeze kuba ari mpuzamakungu w'Ubudagi -  ntiyigeze akinishwa n'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta, avuga ko ari ukubera "ibibazo bijanye n'urukino". Amasezerano afitaniye na Arsenal amuha umushahara w'amapawundi 350.000 ( amadorari y'abanyamerika 458,421) ku ndwi. Ozil yahakanye amakuru avuga ko uyu murwi woba uriko urondera kumwishura umushahara wose w'umwaka umwe asigaje muri ayo masezerano. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Athletic ati: "Nivyo ibintu vyaragoranye ariko ndakunda Arsenal. Nije nzohitamwo igihe nzogira, si abandi bantu bampitiramwo umunsi wo kugenda". Yongerako ati: "Nzokwitangira umurwi uko nshoboye kwose. Ibintu nk'ibi ntaco bizongira, ahubwo bimpa ingoga. Muri kahise narashoboye kwerekana ko nshobora kwivyukiranya kandi nzosubira ndavyerekane". Ozil, umukinyi yinjiye muri Arsenal mu 2013 aguzwe muri Real Madrid ku mapawundi imiliyoni 42.4, yaramaze igihe adakina igihe uyu murwi wamenyerezwa na Unai Emery, mu nyuma arasubira mu kibuga igihe wamenyerezwa vy'imfatakibanza na Freddie Ljungberg. Igihe Arteta afatiye ibintu mu minwe mu kwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze, Ozil yarakinishijwe mu nkino zose cumi za Premier League Arsenal yakinye imbere y'uko iri higanwa rihagarikwa vy'agateganyo mu kiringo c'amezi atatu kubera coronavirus kuva mu kwa gatatu. Hagati aho, mu nkino zose 13 za Arsenal ihiganwa risubiye kwugururwa, Ozil ntiyigeze akinishwa na rimwe. Mu kwa kane Arteta n'abakinyi biwe baremeye ko bakatwa ibice 12.5%, maze Arsenal nayo itangaza ko itegura guhagarika abakozi bayo 55 kubera ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyavuye ku kiza karanda ca coronavirus. Hagati aho, Ozil wewe ntiyemeye ko umushahara wiwe ugabanywa, akavuga ko abakinyi "bafashwe gihutihuti". Amenyesha ko iyo ngingo ishobora kuba ari yo yatumye ataronswa amahirwe yo kwinjira mu kibuga. N'aho yubaha ingingo ya Arteta yo kutamukinisha, Ozil abona ko yari kuba yarahawe akaryo ko kwerekana ivyo ashoboye mu kibuga. Ati: "Urashobora kudakina mu nkino cumi zose zikurikirana kubera urwaye, ariko atari kubera ko utabishoboye canke kubera ufise ingeso mbi". Avuga kandi ko atari we wenyene yanse gukatwa umushahara, ariko ko izina ryiwe ari ryo ryabonetse gusumba.

headline: Euro 2020 - France 1-0 Germany: Benshi barakomeretse mu myiyerekano y'uwakoroka mu mutaka
text: Abantu batari bake bari mu bitaro aho bariko baravurwa inyuma y'aho bakomerekejwe n'umugabo yariko akora imyiyerekano agendera mu mutaka hanyuma akorokera mu kibuga, hari imbere y'urukino hagati y'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi. Ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, UEFA, rivuga ko "abajejwe amategeko bazofata ingingo zikenewe" ku vyo ryise igikorwa "c'ugusamara kandi cateye akaga". Imyanda yaguye mu kibuga igihe uwo mutaka wafatwa n'intsinga zifata kamera yo hejuru. Mu kwururuka, uyu mugabo yituye hasi mu kibuga. Yari afise umutaka wanditseko amajambo ngo "Kick out oil Greenpeace", bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko abaganga babanza kumusuzuma imbere y'uko abajejwe umutekano bamusohora. Ishirahamwe riharanira ibidukikije Greenpeace rivuga ko ari ryo ryatunganije iki gikorwa. Mw'itangazo ryasohoye rikaba risaba imbabazi abo bose bakomeretse, rikavuga ko "habaye ingorane z'ubuhinga", ivyatumye uyu mugabo akorokera mu kibuga atabishaka. Benjamin Stephan wo mw'ishirahamwe Greenpeace avuga ko intumbero yari iyo "guca hejuru" y'ikibuga hanyuma akarekura umupira w'umuco ufise ubutumwa bwo gusaba ihinguriro ry'Ubudagi rikora imodoka Volkswagen "gusiramwo inguvu igakingira ikirere". Iri tangazo ryongerako y'uko "umutekano ari co kintu kiza imbere ya vyose mu bikorwa vya Greepeace" kandi ko rizoshigikira itohoza iryo ari ryo ryose. Stephan ati: "Turasavye imbabazi n'umutima wacu wose ku bantu bakomeretse, turizeye ko bagiye gukira vuba. Turasavye imbabazi kandi abakinyi n'abarorerezi vyateye ubwoba". " Mw'itangazo, UEFA ivuga ko ivyabaye ari "igikorwa kirimwo ugusamara kandi giteje akaga". Abarongoye UEFA bavuga bati: "Iki gikorwa kitabereye - igikorwa cari gushobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye ku bantu benshi bari bahari - cakomerekeje abantu benshi bitabiriye uru rukino ubu bari mu bitaro kandi abajejwe amategeko bazofata ingingo zikenewe". Ubufaransa bwatsinze uru rukino ku gitsindo kimwe cinjijwe na Mats Hummels w'Ubudagi yiyinjije mu gice ca mbere.

headline: Tokyo 2020: CNO- Burundi ivuga ko Francine Niyonsaba adafashwa kuko hari ivyo atakwije
text: Umunonotsi w'umurundi Francine Niyonsaba aridoga ko komite olempique y'Uburundi (CNO) idafasha abanonotsi kwitegura mu gihe hasigaye indwi zibiri ngo inkino olempique ya Tokyo zitangure. Mu butumwa yashize kuri Facebook, Niyonsaba avuga ati: "Mugabo ntibizontangaza kubona abaherekeza abanonotsi baba benshi kurusha abitanze kugira baserukire igihugu, none bazoba batugiye inyuma gukora iki?" Salvator Bigirimana umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNO wewe avuga ko Niyonsaba adafashwa kubera hari ivyo atujuje imfashanyo yahabwa igahagarikwa, ko abandi bari kwitegura bobo babafasha. Niyonsaba, umurundi wa kabiri mu mateka wahaye igihugu ciwe ikidari olempike mu gusiganwa ku maguru mu bagore, ntiyavuze birambuye ingene we ubwiwe canke abandi banonotsi badafashwa. Bigirimana avuga ko imbere y'amahiganwa olempike hariho imfashanyo abanonotsi baronka ku kwezi ku kwezi mu mezi 18 CNO ikayibaronsa ivuye muri Comité International Olympique, (CIO). Ariko ko iyo mfashanyo idahabwa abagiye mu mahiganwa olempike yabanje canke abamaze kubona minima zo kujayo. Ati: "Ni abandi baba bagikeneye kuja mu mahiganwa kugira ngo barabe ko nabo boshika kuri urwo rwego." Abanonotsi baronswa iyo mfashanyo Bigirimana avuga ko bategerezwa kugenda bakora ivyo basabwa bagatanga na raporo zavyo. Ati: "Mugabo ku rwego rwa Africa naho hari abaronka imfashanyo, kandi na Francine yarimwo, hanyuma kubera atakoze ibisabwa ngo aze aratanga raporo, ngo agende mu mahiganwa basaba, iyo mfashanyo yiwe barayihagaritse, no muri federation yiwe barabizi." Haraheze hafi amezi abiri Francine Niyonsaba abonye minima zo kuja mu nkino olempike. Bigirimana ati "azoheza aronke mubandi ivyo baba bateguye." Bigiramana avuga ko igitigiri c'abaherekeza abanonotsi mu nkino olempike atari igihugu kigishirako. Ati: "Hariho 'logiciel' ushiramwo abanonotsi bari qualifié igaca iguha igitigiri c'ababaherekeza, abo rero kandi si abo muri CNO ni abo muri federation y'iwabo. "Hari umunonotsi yoshika ku rwego urwo arirwo rwose atagira umumenyereza? Atagira president wa federation? Umuntu siwe yigira, umunonotsi agirwa n'urwego arimwo akagirwa n'umumenyereza, n'ubushobozi bwiwe." Francine Niyonsaba agaragaza ko ariko yitegurira izi nkino:

headline: Italy 0-1 North Macedonia: Giorgio Chiellini ati 'turasambuwe kandi turahonyanzwe'
text: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru mu Butaliyano Giorgio Chiellini yavuze ko abo bakinana 'bacitse intege' inyuma yo gutsindwa na Macedoine ya ruguru bakananirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi co mu 2022. Uwo mugwi usanganywe igikombe c'ihiganwa rya Buraya ntuzitaba inkino z'igikombe c'isi ubwa kabiri wikurikiranya inyuma yo kunanirwa kuja mu zabereye mu Burusiya mu 2018. Aleksandar Trajkovski yinjije igitego mu mwanya w'agasunuzo, yatumye haba ku ruhande rumwe umunezero ku rundi na ho amarira. Uwo mukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus yagize ati: "Igihengeri kinini kizoguma muri twebwe. "Nta hantu na hamwe baturushije muri iri joro kiretse ico gitego. Twaronse amahigwe menshi, ariko ku bw'Imana mbi, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza. Hari umwikomo munini. Kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda gushika ubu, twagiye dukora amakosa, none raba aradukozeko. "Ndishimiye uyu mugwi wakoze uko ushoboe. Nta nkeka ko twasambuwe turanahonyangwa. Nizeye ko iki gihengeri kizoduha inguvu kugira dusubire gutangura bushasha. Umumenyereza w'Ubutaliyano Roberto Mancini yashikanye igihugu ciwe ku munezero ukomeye i Buraya mu gutsinda Ubwongereza mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rya Buraya ryo mu 2020 mu kwezi kw'indwi, ivyashimiwe cane uwo mumenyereza umugwi wiwe utahabwa amahirwe muri iryo higanwa. Uwo mugwi Azzuri wari wahejeje mw'itsinda ari uwa kabiri inyuma y'Ubusuwise, ugutsindwa na Macedoine ya ruguru bikaba bisigura ko uwo mugwi ufise igikombe ca Buraya ugiye kumara imyaka 12 utagaragaye mu nkino zikomeye z'igikombe c'isi mu mupira w'amaguru. Mancini yagize ati: "Muri iri ci narishimye cane, ubu na ho n'akababaro gakomeye. Biragoye kuvuga. "Ndifadikanije n'abakinyi mu mubabaro. Ni umugwi wakinye neza kandi watsindiye igikombe ca Buraya mw'ici riheze kandi babikwiye. Ndababajwe no kuba batazoja mu gikombe c'isi ku ncuro igira kabiri. "Uwo ni wo mupira w'amaguru. Utsinzwe, utegerezwa kubabara mu gacerere, nta kintu ushobora gukora. "Biragoye kuvuga ku rukino twateye mw'igoli incuro 40 tutinjiza, hanyuma tugatsindwa igitego ku munota wa 92. N'uko bimeze." "Abakinyi bafise kazoza keza, barakomeye kandi bafise na kazoza mu mugwi nserukiragihugu. Ni ibihe bigoye, kandi no muri iyi misi igiye gukurikira ni ko bizoba bimeze. Ni yo mategeko y'umupira." Abajijwe kuri kazoza kiwe, Mancini yagize ati: "Ubu haracari kare kuvuga kuri kazoza. Turacari mu kigandaro. "Nk'umuntu, nshobora kuvuga ko nakunze aba basore uyu munsi gusumba igihe twatsinda mu kwezi kw'indwi. Akababaro ni kenshi." Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano akina muri Chelsea Jorgino yemeye ko bafise uruhara ku vyavuye muri urwo rukino, avuga ati: "Birababaje cane. Ndemeza ko twakinye neza, kuko twatembereje umupira neza kandi turanabarusha gukina, ariko ntitwashoboye kwinjiza. Nta we twotako umwikomo ariko ni ko kuri. "Mu nkino zike ziheze, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza kandi twagiye turakora amakosa yadukozeko, kuko abo twakina baronka igitego bateye mw'igoli gake. Biragoye kuko dutegerezwa kuvyakira. Ntitwashoboye gukora neza - ndabifisemwo uruhara kandi birababaje." Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano Marco Verrati yongeyeko ati: "Biragoye gutegera ivyashitse, kuko birababaje cane. Igitego cabo mu minota y'agasunuzo ni nk'indoto. Uyu mugwi wari ufise amahigwe yo kuja mu gikombe c'isi, rero biragoye gutahura ivyashitse muri iri joro. Twe turazi ko twitanze, ubu mu vy'ukuri ni igihe c'uko twibaza twebwe nyene ibibazo bimwe bimwe." Ubutaliyano bubaye igihugu kigira kane gitwaye igikombe ca Buraya ariko kikananirwa kuja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi, kikaba gikurikiye Tchécoslovaquie, le Danemark na Grèce.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Lukaku, Bernardo, Pogba, Coutinho, Messi, Kounde
text: Inter Milan yiteze ko Chelsea isubira kurondera umusatirizi w'umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28 yongereje amahera ishaka gutanga, igapfuma ishikana imiriyoni zababa 153 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, inyuma y'aho yankiye imiriyoni 118 z'amadorari kwongerako ukuminyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Marcos Alonso w'imyaka 30. (Mail) Mu gihe Jack Grealish yitezwe cane muri Manchester City, bishobora gutuma Bernardo Silva agenda, mu gihe Barcelona na Atletico Madrid yipfuza uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Portugal w'imyaka 26.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Aston Villa yitezwe kubandanya irondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich, umwongereza Todd Cantwell w'imyaka 23 mu gihe Grealish yoramuka yimukiye muri Manchester City ku miriyoni 139 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sky Sports) Atalanta yiteze kugiriranira ibiganiro na Chelsea mu mpera z'iyi ndwi kugira bumvikane ku musatirizi w'umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23. (Gianluca di Marzo) Paul Pogba azotangura umwaka w'inkino wimirije mu murwi Manchester United ariko akaba yiteze gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe imbere y'uko ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi kirangira, mu gihe PSG ikirondera uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa w'imyaka 28. (Telegraph - subscription required) Tottenham irashaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati muri rino ci, aho umwongereza Noni Madueke w'imyaka 21 akina muri PSV Eindhoven hamwe n'umunya Danemark akina ku ruhande Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 21 akina muri Sampdoria, bari ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa. (Standard) Umusatirizi wa Barcelona, umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 28, ari mu bakinyi baronderwa na Tottenham mu gihe yoramuka igurishije umusatirizi wayo Harry Kane w'imyaka 28. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Lionel Messi yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha na Barcelona mu mpera z'iyi ndwi. Amasezerano yari afitaniye n'uwu murwi yarangiye mu kwezi guheze, ariko uyu musatirizi wa Argentina w'imyaka 34 asa n'uwemeye ayandi masezerano mashasha y'imyaka itanu, ariko umushakara wiwe ukagabanuka gushika ku bice 50%.  (Sky Sports) Leicester City yanse amafaranga atangwa na Arsenal ikongerako n'umukinyi mu rugamba rwo kurondera umwongereza akina hagati James Maddison w'imyaka 24. Aba Foxes bavugwa ko badashaka abakinyi batangwa n'abo ba Gunners mu kubaguranya n'uyu mukinyi.  (Football Insider) Urugamba rwa Chelsea rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla Jules Kounde rwakwamye kubera mugenziwe w'umufaransa Kurt Zouma w'imyaka 26 bari biteze kugurisha kugira ngo ahe ikibanza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22, yanse kwimukira muri West Ham. (Guardian) Newcastle ivuga ko yipfuza kwakira umwongereza akina hagati Oliver Skipp w'imyaka 20 avuye muri Tottenham nk'intizo.  (Mail) Sheffield United iriteze ko Liverpool ishobora kuyitiza umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Ben Davies w'imyaka 25, mu gihe atarigera akinira uyu murwi kuva aguzwe avuye muri Preston mu kwa mbere.  (Goal) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Liverpool, umuswisi Xherdan Shaqiri w'imyaka 29 araronderwa n'umurwi wo muri Serie A,  Lazio, inyuma y'aho abwiriye abarongoye Anfield ko yipfuza gusezera uwo murwi wo muri Premier League. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Umumenyereza wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira avuga ko yagiriraniye "ikiganiro ciza" n'umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 28, kandi ko yizeye ko azobandanya akinira aba ba Eagles. (Sky Sports) Palace iriko irarondera ko Arsenal yoyitiza umusatirizi Reiss Nelson w'imyaka 21, kandi bikaboneka ko aba ba Gunners bashobora kumutanga kubera bigaragara ko ashobora gukinishwa gake cane mu mwaka w'inkino wimirije. (Sky Sports) Abaserukizi b'umukinyi wo hagati wa Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez bariko baragerageza kurondera ko yokwimukira muri Liverpool, ariko Anfield ntibona ko uyu mukinyi wa Espagne w'imyaka 26 yoba ashaka kwimukira muri uyu murwi.  (CaughtOffside) Southampton iri hafi yo kugura umusatirizi w'umwongereza Adam Armstrong w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akina muri Blackburn Rovers inyuma y'aho uwo murwi ugurishirije umusatirizi w'umwongereza Danny Ings w'imyaka 29 muri Aston Villa. (Football League World) Umukinyi wo hagati, umudagi Joshua Kimmich w'imyaka 26 yemeye amasezerano mashasha y'imyaka itanu n'umurwi  wiwe wa Bayern Munich watahukanye ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi Bundesliga.(Bild, via 90 Min)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya kuri uyu wa gatanu: Haaland, Milenkovic, Mbappe, Nketia, Flick
text: West Ham bizeye kuzana umukinyi w'imbere wa Arsenal, Eddie Nketiah, 21 mu mpera z'uyu mwaka. Manchester United iriteguriye kugura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umugwi wa Fiorentina na Serbie, Nikola Milenkovic, n'aho amahera asabwa kuri uwo mukinyi ari imiliyoni 38. (Sun) Imigwi ikomeye cane ya Espagne, Barcelone na Real Madrid ishobora kutagira ico bahanoba mu gushaka kugura umukinyi w'imbere akomeye cane wa Borussia Dortmund n'igihugu ca Norvege Erling Braut Haaland, w'imyaka 20. Uwo mukinyi yipfuza umushahara wa miliyoni 35 ku mwaka, umushahara ushobora gutuma Barca na Madrid babanza kwiyumvira. (Goal) Paris St-Germain bahamagarira umukinyi wabo akomeye cane w'imbere Kylian Mbappe, w'imyaka 22, gushira umukono ku masezerano mashasha, mu gihe uwo mukinyi adashaka amasezerano y'igihe kirekire.  (L'Equipe - in French) West Ham bizeye kuzana umukinyi w'imbere wa Arsenal, Eddie Nketiah, 21 mu mpera z'uyu mwaka. (Evening Standard) Wolves barashaka kugerageza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Benfica, Carlos Vinicius w'imyaka 26 mu mpera z'uyu mwaka inyuma y'aho Tottenham ifatiye ingingo yo kutamugura mu gihe yari yatijijwe muri uwo mugwi. (TVI24 - in Portuguese) Manchester United na Arsenal baranuganugwa ko bashaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Rennes, umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga w'imyaka 18, yamaze gufata ingingo yo kutongereza amasezerano n'uwo mugwi arimwo muri kino gihe. (Marca) Manchester United iripfuza uukinyi w'inyuma wa Danmark, Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 24, yatijijwe n'umugwi wa Lyon muri Fulham. (B.T - in Danish) Umumenyereza wa RB Leipzig, Julian Nagelsmann yabeshuje inkuru zivugwa ko yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Bayern Munich kugira asubirire Hansi Flick. (ESPN) Bayern iriko iriyumvira kuzana umumenyereza Massimiliano Allegri mu kibanza ca Flick. Allegri nta mugwi afise amenyereza  kuva avuye Juventus mu 2019. (Sport Mediaset - in Italian) Chelsea iracabandanya kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Uruguay na Atletico, Jose Maria Gimenez w'imyaka 26, ariko uwo yipfuza cane ni umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla, Jules Kounde w'imyaka 22. (La Razon - in Spanish)external-link) Barcelona ishaka kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Manchester City Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 32 agiye kurangiza ikiringo ciwe muri uwo mugwi mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, ariko Barca ifise ikibazo co gukwiza umushahara yemerewe na Juventus wa miliyoni 10 z'ama Euro. (Sport)external-link) Tottenham iriko iragerageza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w'imyaka 23 akinira umugwi wa Stuttgart. (Eurosport)external-link ) Manchester United inuganugwa ko ishaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Lazio Sergej Milinkovic w'imyaka 26. Uwo mukinyi kandi araronderwa na Real Madrid na PSG. (Gazzetta - in Italian)external-lin Juventus ifise umugambi wo kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelone Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka 23, amasezerano yiwe bafitaniye n'uwo mugwi arangiye mu 2022.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish)external-link

headline: Paris St-Germain: Mauricio Pochettino yasubiriye Thomas Tuchel nk'umumenyereza
text: Mauricio Pochettino  yahoze amenyereza Tottenham na Southampton yagenywe kuba umumenyereza w'umurwi wo mu Bufaransa, Paris St-Germain. Uyu munya Argentine w'imyaka  48 asubiriye Thomas Tuchel, akaba yateye igikumu ku masezerano yo gushika ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu 2022, ariko akaba amuha akaryo ko kwongereza ikiringo c'umwaka. Pochettino yigeze gukinira PSG hagati ya 2001 na 2003, nta kazi yari afise kuva yirukanywe na Tottenham mu kwezi kw'icumi na rimwe 2019. PSG iza mu kibanza ca gatatu mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira  w'amaguru mu Bufaransa, Ligue 1, ikaba izohura na Barcelona mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Buraya, hazoba ari mu kwa kabiri n'ukwa gatatu. Uyu mudagi Tuchel yirukanywe muri uyo murwi ku wa 29 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri guheze, inyuma y'imyaka ibiri n'igice yari amaze awumenyereza. Kuri uyu wa Mungu Pochettino niho atangura imyimenyerezo n'uyu murwi muri kino gihe abakinyi bari mu karuhuko k'urushana. Avuga ko anezerewe kandi ko ari iteka kuri we kubona ahawe aya mabanga, kandi ko uyu murwi yamye awufise ku mutima. Ati: "Ngarutse muri uno murwi mfise imigambi myinshi, kandi ndipfuza gukorana na bamwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange kw'isi". "Uyu murwi urimwo abantu bafise ubushobozi buteye igomwe, rero jewe n'abo turi kumwe tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira twubake Paris St-Germain ikomeye mu mahiganwa yose. Tuzokora kandi ivyo dushoboye vyose kugira ngo abakunzi bayo banezerererwe umurwi ukomeye kandi utsinda". Umukuru wa PSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi avuga ko Pochettino "ari we azoshika ku ntego" zabo, akongerako ati: "Ni ikindi kiringo kiryoshe ku murwi kandi ni umuntu nizeye ko azokundwa n'abafana". Pochettino yatanguriye ibikorwa vy'umumenyereza mu murwi wa Espanyol, akaba yamaze amezi 18 amenyereza Southampton imbere y'uko aja muri Tottenham mu kwa gatanu 2014. Mu mwaka wa mbere yashoboye gushikana uyu murwi mu rukino rwa nyuma  rw'igikombe c'ihiganwa (Coupe de la ligue/League cup)  anawushikana mu kibanza ca kabiri mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier league mu mwaka wa 2016-2017. Uyu yahoze aci cugazo c'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina yarashoboye kandi gushikana Tottenham mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Buraya, Champions League, mu 2019, urukino rwagiye gutsindwa na Liverpool. Haciye amezi atanu, yaciye yirukanwa vyanse muri Tottenham, aho uyu murwi wagiye kwisanga uri mu kibanza ca 14 muri Premier League, aca asubirirwa na Jose Mourinho. Urukino rwa nyuma rwa Tuchel nk'umumenyereza wa PSG ni urwayihuje n'umurwi Strasbourg, rwarangiye ku ntsinzi ya PSG, 4-0, hari ku wa 23 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri guheze, ivyatumye ija mu kibanza ca gatatu, inyuma ya Lyon ifise ikibanza ca mbere na Lille iza ubwa kabiri, ariko zompi zikaba ziyisumvya inota rimwe gusa. PSG iriko irondera ko Tottenham yoyitiza umukinyi Dele Alli muri uku kwa mbere, umukinyi asanzwe adakinishwa cane.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa gatandatu: Kane, Conte, De Gea, Van de Beek
text: Umusatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane w’imyaka 29, akaba na kizigenza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza yabaye arahagarika ibiganiro bijanye n’amasezerano mashasha gushika inyuma y’igikombe c’isi yose. Aba Spurs kandi baripfuza gushika ku masezerano mashasha n’umukinyi wo hagati wa Danemark Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg w’imyaka 27 be n’umwongereza Eric Dier w’imyaka 28 akina inyuma. (Evening Standard) Umusatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane araronderwa na Bayern Munich inyotewe ibitsindo vya Robert Lewandowski kuva yimukiye muri Barcelona mu ci. (Express) Juventus irashaka umumenyereza wa Tottenham Antonio Conte kuva mu ntango z’umwaka w’inkino uza inyuma y’aho uyu murwi umaze gutsindira ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano incuro 36 ikuriwe mw’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). Amasezerano Conte afitaniye n’aba Spurs azorangira mu mpera z’uno mwaka w’inkino ariko bakaba bafise akaryo ko kuyongerereza ikiringo c’umwaka. (Gazzetta dello Sport – mu gitaliyano) Newcastle United iripfuza umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Eguinaldo  w’imyaka 18 akina mu murwi Vasco da Gama wo mu cicaro ca kabiri. Mu masezerano afitaniye n’uyu murwi, harimwo umurongo uvuga ko umurwi womukenera utegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 26 z’ama pawundi. (Chronicle) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Eddie Howe arahakana ko ata biganiro bijanye n’amasezerano bariko baragiriranira n’umukinyi akina hagati Miguel Almiron w’imyaka 28. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus umunya-Brezili Arthur Melo w’imyaka 26 azobandanya akinira Liverpool yatijijwemwo gushika uno mwaka w’inkino urangire n’aho yavunitse. Melo amaze gukina iminota 13 yonyene kuva agiye muri Liverpool mu kw’icenda. (Mirror) Umunyegori wa Manchester United  David de Gea w’imyaka 31, ntazoja mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose muri Qatar bikavugwa ko umumenyereza wa Espagne atamushize ku rutonde mfatakibanza. (Mail) Newcastle iriko itegura guha amasezerano mashasha n’umunya-Brezili akina hagati Bruno Guimaraes w’imyaka 24, amasezerano azomutuma ahembwa amapawundi 200.000 ku ndwi, mu ntumbero yo kwigizayo Chelsea na Real Madrid imukanuriye maremare. (Evening Standard) Valencia na Inter Milan ishobora kurwanira umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umunya-Hollande Donny van de Beek w’imyaka 25, mu kwa mbere. (Todofichajes.com – mu ki Espagnol) Manchester United iri mu biganiro vyerekeye amasezerano y’igihe kirekire n’umukinyi wo kuruhande babonamwo amahirwe menshi cane, umunya- Argentina  Alejandro Garnacho w’imyaka 18. (Fabrizio Romano kuri Twitter) Umukinyi wa Chelsea ntazoshoka afata ingingo yo kuva muri uyo murwi gushika yumvise ko Barcelona iriko iramurondera. Uyu mukinyi wo hagati w’Ubutaliyano afise imyaka 30 ashobora kuzokwimukira mu murwi uwo ari wo wose atakirinze gusabwa mu mpera z’iri higanwa amasezerano afitaniye n’umurwi wiwe arangiye. (Sport – muki Espagnol) Arsenal, Newcastle na West Ham irarwanira umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Danemark Gustav Isaksen w’imyaka 21 asanzwe akinira  Midtjylland ariko imurwanira na AC Milan. (Calciomercato - mu gitaliyno) Leeds iriteguye gusubira kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa PSV Eindhoven umunya-Hollande Cody Gakpo w’imyaka 23,bakaba bamushaka mu ci riza. Gakpo yagize uruhara rukomeye igihe PSV yirahira Arsenal mw’ihiganwa Europa League ku wa kane. (Express) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa West Ham umwongereza Craig Dawson w’imyaka 32, arashaka kuva muri uyo murwi mu kwa mbere inyuma y’aho atakarije ikibanza mu bakinyi batangura mu kibuga. (Football Insider) Barcelona, Paris St-Germain na Real Madrid yose irarondera kugura umusatirizi wa Brezili  Endrick w’imyaka 16 asanzwe akina muri Palmeiras. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Brighton ifise icizere ko izoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa  Argentina Facundo Buonanotte w’imyaka 17, asanzwe akinira Rosario Central. (Fabrizio Romano kuri  Twitter)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Varane, Camara, Nagelsmann, Willock, Azpilicueta
text: Chelsea iri imbere ya Manchester United na Paris St-Germain mu rugamba rwo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid Raphael Varane ubu afise imyaka 28. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Guinee, Ali Camara w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina mu murwi Young Boys wo mu Buswisi, yateye amero imirwi itari mike yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League, harimwo Liverpool, Arsenal, Crystal Palace, West Ham na Norwich. (Team Talk) Bayern Munich yatanguye ibiganiro vyo kurondera umumenyereza wa RB Leipzig Julian Nagelsmann kugira ngo ayibere umumenyereza wayo mushasha. (Independent) Arsenal iri mu mayira abiri kuri kazoza k'umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21 ubu akaba akina muri Newcastle United iyo yatijijwe, ni mu gihe uyu murwi ukeneye kugurisha abakinyi kugira ngo ushobore kuronka amahera. (Football London) Arsenal kandi iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wayo w'inyuma Ainsley Maitland-Niles w'imyaka 23 ubu asanzwe akina muri West Brom, hamwe kandi na Eddie Nketiah w'imyaka 21 akina imbere. Abarashi bakeneye imiriyoni hafi 28 z'ama dodari y'abanyamerika kuri umwe umwe wese. (Sun) Arsenal ifise amakenga nimba koko umutunzi ruhebwa ajejwe ikompanyi y'umuziki Spotify ikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi umunya Suède Daniel Ek, ari mu kugura uyu murwi. (Times - subscription required) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola avuga ko umukinyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Eric Garcia w'imyaka 20 yiteguye kuja gukinira  Barcelona atarinze kugurwa mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe azoba arangiye mu ci riza.  (Metro) Umumenyereza wa Atletico Madrid Diego Simeone aripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umunya Espagne Cesar Azpilicueta w'imyaka 31. (El Gol Digital - in Spanish) Manchester United na Liverpool ziriko rirondera umusatirizi ariko ararwanirwa cane, umutariyano Andrea Belotti w'imyaka 27 asanzwe akina muri Torino, akaba kandi ariko aronderwa n'imirwi AC Milan, Roma na Inter Milan.Torinoyaramaze no kubona umukinyi w'imbere wa Cagliari, umunya Bresil Joao Pedro w'imyaka 29 nk'uwuzoca amusubirira. (Tuttosport) Wolves niwo wundi murwi winjiye ku rutonde rw'imirwi iriko irondera umusatirizi wa Chelsea, umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23. Aston Villa, West Ham na Leicester City nayo kandi iramwipfuza. (Football Insider) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Tottenham Harry Redknapp ariteze ko umusatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 ashobora kuguma muri uyu murwi n'aho hari ibihuha vyinshi bivuga ko ashobora kugenda. (Goal) Manchester City yatanguye ibiganiro n'umurwi Red Star Belgrade/Étoile rouge de Belgrade kugira ngo irabe yo yoronka umukinyi w'imbere wa Serbia, Andrija Radulovic w'imyaka 18 asanzwe akina mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'abatarenza imyaka 19. (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Espagne Alvaro Morata w'imyaka 28 avuga ko yipfuza kubandanya akinira  Juventus ariko ko atari we afata ingingo, ni mu gihe amasezerano y'intizo hagati y'uyu murwi n'umurwi wiwe, Atletico Madrid, ari hafi kurangira. (Sky Italia via Goal)

headline: M﻿ukansanga: Kuva mu Rwanda  gushika Qatar 2022 - 'kwugururira' abandi bagore
text: Umunyarwandakazi Salima Mukansanga yizeye ko kuba yatowe ngo ahagarikire inkino z'igikombe c'isi 2022 bizofasha kwugurura imiryango ku bandi bagore bo muri Afrika bavyifuza. Muri uyu mwaka, yabaye umugore wa mbere mu guhagarikira urukino rw'abagabo mu gikombe ca Afrika, mu gihe mu mwaka uheze yari yahagarikiye mu nkino za Olympic i Tokyo. Uwo mugore w'imyaka 34 yizigiye ko kuba ari mu bagore batandatu ba mbere b'imboneza -hamwe na bagenziwe batatu b'abahagarikizi Stephanie Frappart na  Yoshimi Yamashita hamwe n'abunganizi b'abahagarikizi batatu nyene - mw'ihiganwa ry'abagabo bizotanga amahirwe ku bagore benshi. Mukansanga yabwiye BBC Sport Afrika ati: "Ni iteka n'ibakwe kuko ntivyari bwigere biba". "Bivuze ko ugiye kuba uwa mbere kandi ugiye kwugurura umuryango ku bandi bagore, na cane cane abagore bo muri Afrika." "Uba wiremetse  vyinshi ku bitugu vyawe, kandi  utegerezwa kuvyiremeka neza, kugira abandi babone ko umuryango wuguruye ubu bashobora kuwucamwo. "Biraryoshe kandi ni amahirwe abagore baronse. Bisigura ko amahiwe ahari - ni twebwe rero dutegerezwa kuyafata hanyuma  tukayakoresha mu gutera imbere." Mukansanga asanzwe ari umumenyereza w'urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru kuva mu 2012, yavuye kure imbere yo gushika mu rwego rwa mbere rw'umupira w'amaguru  muri Afrika igihe yaja guhagarikira muri Cameroun. Akiri umukobwa muto, yabwiwe ko atari bwakure bihagije kugira aje mu mugwi w'igihugu w'abatarakwiza imyaka 17 muri basketball gutyo aca ahitamwo gushimikira ku mupira w'amaguru. Amaze akanya gato nk'umukinyi, yabonye itangazo ryo guhamagara abashaka kwiga ivyo guhagarikira - kandi nti bwari ubwa mbere -ati ivyo ntivyoncika. Yaciye yegera urwego rw'Urwanda rw'umupira w'amaguru (Ferwafa) asaba kuja mu cigwa c'uguhagarikira buno nyene agiheza amashure yisumbuye ariko baramwankira, naho nyene bashingiye ku myaka yiwe. Gutyo Mukansanga yacviye yiyigisha wenyene  ivyo guhagarikira, amategeko y'urukino, mu nyuma arahava arahabwa amahirwe na Ferwafa  yo kwigana n'abandi bashaka kuba abahagarikizi. Iyo nzira itamworoheye ubu yamuvanye guhagarikira inkino z'abagabo mu gihugu ciwe c'Urwanda, ashika  mu gikombe ca Afrika c'abagore co mu 2016, mu gikombe c'isi c'abagore mu 2019 hanyuma no mu nkino za Olympic zabereye Tokyo. Mu Buyapani yahagarikiye inkino z'abagore z'Ubwongereza na Chili  na Australia n'urwa Hollande n'Ubushinwa. Itariku 18 ukwezi kwa mbere  yanditse amateka  ari mu yatumye ashika ku ntabwe agezeko ubu. Niwe yari ahagarikiye mu kibuga hagati urukino rw'abagabo rwahuza Zimbabwe na Guinea mu gikombe c'isi ca Afrika  cabereye muri Cameroun. Mu gihe yari yabanje kwankirwa akatari gake hanyuma akakirwa ata gishika cinshi mu gisata gisanzwe ciganziwe n'abagabo, uwo munyarwandakzi yarahanganye n'intambamyi zijane n'uwo mwuga. Asigura ati: "Dutegerezwa gukora cane, cane cane mu gisata ciganziwe n'abagabo. Utegerezwa gukora incuro zibiri gusumba. "Hanyuma ukaba uvyiyumvamwo cane, kuko udafise kuvyiyumvamwo, uca uruha hanyuma ukabiheba. Ariko ntidushaka guheba. "Dutegerezwa kuba twateye intambwe imbere hanyuma tugakorera hamwe, tugakira ico dushitseko hanyuma uruganba tukarufatanya." Umwigisha mu vyo guhagarikira wo mu rwego rw'umupira muri Afrika (Caf) Jerome Damon yemeza ko Mukansanga aho ageze ahakwiye vy'ukuri, kuba yahagarikiye inkino za mbere zikomeye ku rwego rw'umugabane wose  haba mu bagabo canke mu bagore. Damon avuga ati: "Ni intambwe y'igitangaza- ari mu kibanza kimuha amahirwe ata wundi afise aho ari umwe muri bake bashobora kuja mu gikombe c'isi c'abakuze mu bagabo no mu bagore". "Ntivyari bwabe muri kahise, ivyo bivuga vyinshi kw'iterambere ry'uguhagarikira muri Afrika." Damon, yahagarikiye  mu  mahiganwa y'ibikombe bine vya Afrika, avuga ko abo bagore batandatu batowe  ubwa mbere muri kahise k'igikombe c'isi bashitse muri ivyo bibanza babikwiye -kandi hazorabwa cane ivyo bazokora kurusha ko ari ab'igitsinagore. Ashimika avuyga ati: "Dukeneye gutahura ko kuba abagore bashizwe mu mahiganwa bitabaye kubera ari abagore. Ni ukubera babishoboye, kuko ari abahagarikizi ku rwego rwo hejuru". Mukansanga azoba ari kumwe muri Qatar na  Frappart wo mu Bufaransa na Yamashita wo mu Buyapani, hamwe n'abunganizi b'abahagarikizi Neuza Back wo muri Bresil, na  Karen Diaz Medina wo muri Mexique hamwe  na  Kathryn Nesbitt wo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (US). Mukansanga ati: "Turashigikirana kuko tuva mu mihingo itandukanye ariko tugiye kuzokorera hamwe kugira abagore  bashobore ". "Umugore ashigikiye uwundi mugore, nta keka muzobona umusaruro. "Hari inzitizi, hari imitego hari ingorabahizi. Tugiye guhangana n'ivyo. Nta na kimwe dushobora kubikorako kiretse kuja kurugamba n'umutima uri hmwe, n'umwete hanwe no kwitanga - aho rero tuzoheza tubineshe." Mukansanga yahagarikiye urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru ahantu hambere hakirurutse ku musozi wa Kilimanjaro muri Tanzania haraheze imyaka itatu, arazi ko i Qatar azoba ahanzwe n'amaso menshi kurusha uravye ingene igikombe c'isi ari ihiganwa rya mbere rikomeye muri uwo mukino. "Abantu ntibashobora kwama bagushima, na cane cane uwutsinzwe. Wewe ico ukora rero ni ugukora ico utegerezwa gukora - kuguma ku murongo, ntuje inyuma y'ingene amategeko y'umukino ategerezwa gutahurwa, uyakurikize hamwe n'ico urukino rusaba. "Hanyuma , basubiye inyuma bakaraba, bazovuga bati, 'Ego, ivyo yakoze vyari vyo."

headline: Abantu 148 bapfunzwe mu migumuko yadutse nijoro PSG itsinzwe na Bayern
text: Igipolisi c'u Bufaransa kimenyesha ko cataye muri yompi abantu 148 inyuma y'imigumuko yadutse ku mugwa mukuru iturutse ku gutsindwa kwa Paris St-Germain mu rukino rwa nijoro. Nijoro ku wa Mungu, uyu murwi wo mu Bufaransa PSG watsinzwe igitsindo kimwe ku busa n'umurwi Bayern Munich wo mu Budagi mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi ybaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Champions League). Iyo mishamirano yadutse kw'ibarabara Champs-Élysées no mu micungararo yikibuga c'umupira ca PSG, Parc des Princes, ahari hakoraniye abafana b'uyu murwi baraba uru rukino kuri televiziyo nini. Muri iyo migumuko, amamodoka yaraturiwe amadirisha y'amaduka nayo aramenagurwa nk'uko bivugwa n'igipolisi. PSG yariko irondera gutsindira iryo higanwa ubwa mbere mu mateka yayo, ariko ntivyayikundiye. Muri urwo rukino, Kingsley Coman yahoze akinira uyu murwi nyene wa PSG niwe yawuhumiye ku munota wa 59 muri urwo rukino rutari rworoshe, mu kwinjiza igitsindo n'umutwe ku mupira yari ahawe na Joshua Kimmich. Mu gihe amaso yose yari ku bakinyi b'ibihangange babiri ba PSG, Neymar na Kylian Mbappe, umunyegori wa Bayern Manuel Neuer yarababereye ifuro ry'igiti mu guhagarika imipira yari igoye yaboneka ko yashobora kuvamwo ibitsindo.

headline: Tokyo Olympics: Umunonotsi w'umunya-Namibia avuga ati 'Ntushobora kumbwira ngo ubu sindi umugore'
text: Beatrice Masilingi  w'umunya-Namibia ariko aritegurira igihe ciwe ca mbere gikomeye cane mu mwuga wiwe w'inkino  ubwo amaze gusubiza umutina hamwe inyuma yo guhungabana cane. Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 18 avuga ko anezerewe cane no kuzohiganwa ku metero 200 mu bagore mu nkino za Tokyo 2020 aho isemo ya mbere yo kurobanura  iba kuri uyu wa mbere. Ariko kwiruka imetero 200 yabihisemwo ubugira kabiri yari asanzwe yiteguriye 400 aho yagaragara nk'umwe mu bohiganirwa umudari inyuma yo kugira umwanya wa gatatu wa mbere mwiza cane uyu mwaka ku ma sekunda 49,53. Ariko  akanyamuneza k'uko azokwitaba inkino Olympics ntikatevye kuko urwego ruraba inkino z'abanonotsi kw'isi World Athletics rwaciye rumumenyesha ko atazohiganwa kuri  400m kubera urugero rwiwe runini rw'inkabuzo (umusemburo) ya testosterone. Yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: ''Mu ntango vyarampungabanije cane. Ntushobora kuza ngo umbwire ngo ubu si nndi umugore. Birababaza cane kandi biranshavuza ariko ntaco turi bubikoreko muri uyu mwanya". "Vyaranciye intege, kandi vyari bibabaje cane. Nari niteguriye ihiganwa ryanje rya mbere rya Diamond Leagye igihe namenya iyo nkuru." "Ni akarenganyo kuko ntushobora kwitega ko abantu bose bamera kumwe, abantu bose ngo bagire ubushobozi bumwe, tuvuka dufise ubushobozi butandukanye, ntiduhobora kumera co kimwe, ntibigira umutwe n'amaguru". Masilingi yamenyeshejwe muri  kwezi kw'indwi na World Athletics ko urugero rwiwe rwa testosterone rurenze urwemewe ku bakinyi b'abagore bashaka guhiganwa ku birere  biri hagati ya 400m na mile imwe (1600m), kiretse bemeye gufata imiti  igabanya iyo nkabuzo  mu kiringo c'amezi atari munsi y'atandatu. Ariko n'uho vyamugendeye uko, uwo muyabaga  yiteguriye gukora ibishoboka vyose muri izo nkino za Olympics. Masilingi yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Ndaryohewe cane, n'ikintu nashaka gushikako cane ariko sinari niteze ko nogishikako ku myaka mfise". Kugira  icifuzo ciwe c'inkino za Olympic ntikumujane Masilingi na mugenziae Christine Mboma nawe yakozweko n'izo ngingo, baciye bafata ingingo yo kwitegurira guhiganwa kuri 200m n'ubwo hari hasigaye amayinga make gusa ngo inkino zibe. Umumenyereza w'abo bakobwa babiri Henk Botha avuga ati: "Birumvikana ko ivyo vyadusubije inyuma cane. Vyabaye ngombwa ko  dukora cane kugira tumenyere gushasha kandi tugerageze uko dushobora kwose kandi ndashima cane ingene abo bakobwa bariko baravyitwaramwo n'ingene bariko barakora". Masilingi ntashaka kuvuga ico yibaza kuzoshikako mu nkino za Olympic ariko aranezerewe cane no kuzohiganwa n'ubwo ivyashitse vyari vyabanje kumuca intege. Avuga ati: "Ndacafise ayandi mahirwe. Ndacafise 200m nshobora guhiganwako, urumva rero sinokwiyica ngo n'uko hari ihiganwa banyatse. Nditeguye nk'uko nari nitegeruiye 400m". "Ngerageza kutaja cane ku mbuga hwaniro kuko ndazi ko ivyo vyoza kundemera cane, ubu nkaba ngerageza kugabanya ivyo nkora vyose muri iki gihe kuko ata burambe nsanganywe bw'imgene novyitwaramwo."

headline: Ronaldo na Messi babaye abagenzi inyuma y'aho Van Dijk abakubitiye hasi
text: Rimwe na rimwe amatombora mu mupira w'amaguru canke iminsi mikuru y'ugutanga ubushimwe birashobora kutaryoha kubera amajambo menshi y'umwanya muremure, ugasanga abariko babikurikira bararambiwe. Ariko iyo ubonye babiri mu bihangange kw'isi - Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo - bemeye ubwa mbere gusangirira umukate hamwe, ni ibintu bidasanzwe. Kari akamwemwe gusa hagati y'umusatirizi wa Juventus Ronaldo na mugenziwe wa Barcelona Messi igihe bari bicaranye batebura eka banatwenga. Hari igihe batangaza ko Virgil van Dijk ari we atahukanye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza i Bulaya mu 2018/2019. Vyari ibintu bigoye kwiyumvira ko abo bantu babiri bigeze kuba ari abakeba mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda Ronaldo yamaze mu murwi Real Madrid, banarwanira umupira w'inzahabu, ubu bariko batebura. Ronaldo ati: "Twari tumaze imyaka 15 yose duhurira hano. Sinzi ko ivyo vyari bwigere bibabo mu myaka iri inyuma - abantu babiri bakama bahurira ng'aha igihe cose". "Nivyo ko dufise ubucuti bwiza. Ntiturigera dusangirira hamwe, ariko ndibaza ko bizotinda bigashika muri kazoza". "Twarahanganye cane muri Espanye. Naramuhenuye, nawe arampenura. Nico gituma biryoshe kuba mu bagize amateka y'umupira w'amaguru". Uravye ingene bari bakundanye muri ako kanya, ni nde yokwiyumvira ko hari ukutumvikana hagati y'abo? Igihe c'abo bakeba babiri c'ukwiganzira umupira w'amaguru gitera kirangira, aho muri iri joro ryakeye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Uefa, ryatangaje umwami mushasha w'umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Bulaya Uyo nawe si uwundi ni Virgil van Dijk, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Buholande yahawe agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza gusumba abandi i Bulaya mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2018/2019. Van Dijk yafashije Liverpool gutahukana igikombe c'igihanwa ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Liverpool yatsinze Tottenham ibitsindo 2-0 mu rukino rwa nyuma rwabereye i Madrid mu kwa gatandatu guheze. Van Dijk abaye umukinyi agize kabiri atsinze ivyo bihangange inyuma y'aho mu mwaka uheze, Luka Modric wa Real Madrid atahukaniye ako gashimwe ashize hasi Ronaldo na Messi. Van Dijk kandi niwe mukinyi w'inyuma wa mbere atsindiye ako gashimwe, katanguye guhiganirwa mu mwaka wa 2010/2011. Ati: "Si noreka gushimira bagenzanje dukinana, kuko iyo ataba bo sinari gushika ku ntambwe ngezeko. Rwabaye urugendo rurerure".

headline: 'Nobwira abigeme ko buri muntu afise ico ashoboye n'ico ashobora gushikako - Sada Nahimana
text: Sada Nahimana, umwigeme abaye rurangiranwa mu rukino rwa tennis, ahamagarira abandi bigeme b'Abarundi kumenya impano bafise bakaziharanira kugira ngo bashobore gushika nk'aho nawe ageze. Ni inyuma y'aho ku wa Mungu uheze atsindiye ihiganwa mpuzamakungu rya Tennis ITF ku ruhande rw'abagore (W15) ryabera muri Turukiya, atsinze urukino rwa nyuma rwamuhuje n'umunya Ukraine Soboleva Anastasiya. Ati: "Nobwira abigeme ko buri muntu afise ico ashoboye n'ico ashobora gushikako, ikiriho rero ni ukukimenya ukakirondera n'umutima wawe wose". Uyu mwigeme w'umurundi w'imyaka 20 niwe mwigeme wa mbere w'umurundi ageze kuri uru rwego muri iri higanwa. Yabwiye BBC ko ryari ihiganwa ritoroshe mbere ko vyamutangaje kubona yarashoboye gutahukana intsinzi ikomeye. Ati: "Sinibaza ko nshobora gutsinda iri higanwa, eka mbere n'ubu ntavyo ndemera. Mfise umunezero mwinshi kubona nshoboye guserukira igihugu canje, akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko eka mbere n'umugabane wose. "Ndazi ko ku mugabane wose wa Afrika ari jewe mukobwa w'umwirabure jenyene ndi kuri uru rwego, ibi bikantuma ngira intege zo kurondera gushika kure, nkagera ku rugero rw'ibihangange kw'isi". Sada avuga ko abigeme b'Abanyafrika badakunze gushika kure kubera batinya, bakibaza ko ataco bashoboye hamwe kandi no kubura uburyo bw'ingene bashobora kwerekana ivyo bazi, agatera akamo abanyafrika muri rusangi gushigikirana. Ati: "Nshaka ko abantu bamenya ko ari ngombwa ko Abanyafrika bo nyene ubwabo ari bo bategerezwa gufasha Abanyafrika bakagera kure". Sada abaye mu Barundikazi bake bageze ku rugero rukomeye ku rwego mpuzamakungu, hampande ya Francine Niyonsaba mu gutsindira amahiganwa mpuzamakungu, ivyo avuga ko bitera iteka igihugu. Ati: "Birandyohera iyo ndi mu gihugu kanaka nkaza numva ngo 'Ah kumbe uva mu Burundi? Urazi Niyonsaba'?". Mu gihe ikiza karanda ca Covid-19 cahungabanije ibisata bitari bike harimwo n'inkino, Sada avuga ko ata kintu kinini iki kiza camugize mu rugendo rwiwe, kuko "bagerageza kudufasha kugira ngo twumve y'uko dukina nko mu bihe bisanzwe". Avuga ariko ko ingorane nyamukuru yari uko basa n'abatamba birorera kubera ata barorerezi bari mu kibuga, kiretse abakinyi n'abamenyereza gusa, ibi navyo bigatuma urukino rutagira akanovera. Ati: "Nivyo ko iyo haba abarorerezi haci ico bifasha, ugasanga urukino ruraryoshe nawe ukumva inguvu zirongerekanye. Ariko twebwe nk'abakinyi tuba dushaka guhiganwa. Jewe nta ngorane vyanteye kuko nagumye ku ntumbero yanje". Ivanguraruhu - yirinda gutwarwa n'ishavu Sada yatanguye gukina tennis afise imyaka umunani, avuga ko igihambaye ari ukugumiza umutima hamwe, umuntu agashira imbere intumbero ashaka gushikako, hagutwarwa n'ishavu . Aremeza ko ivyo bibazo biriho ariko ko bo nk'abakinyi bisa n'aho batahuye navyo. Ati: "Jewe ntaco bimbwiye. Ndazi ko hari abafise ivyo vyiyumviro mu mitwe. Abitwaza ivanguraruhu ntaco bambwiye, ndabafata uko nyene kuko abantu bari uko bari, nta kundi. "Jewe naratembereye mu bihugu vyinshi; ikintu nyamukuru kuri jewe ni ukugumiza umutima hamwe, ugashira imbere urukino, nkirinda gutwarwa n'ishavu". Uyu mwigeme akomoka mu Buyenzi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura - ubu asanzwe aba mu Bufaransa - avuga ko intumbero yiwe ari ukubandanya aja imbere gushika ashitse ku rwego rw'ibindi bihangange vy'abakobwa/abagore kw'isi . Ati: "Ico nipfuza ni uko nogera ku rugero rwo guhiganwa n'ibihangange kw'isi nka Serena Williams n'abandi, ngatsindira ubushimwe bukomeye. "Si nshaka gusumba uwo ari we wese, nshaka gusumba uko nari ejo, nkabandanya nserukira Afrika".

headline: Francine Niyonsaba ntazoja mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu yo kwinonora imitsi yimirije
text: Peres Jepchirchir  yatahukanye ihiganwa rya Olempike mu kwiruka marathon ku ruhande rw’abagore, hamwe na Francine Niyonsaba ntibazoja mw’ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ryo kunonora imitsi (World Athletics Championships) muri kuno kwezi. Uyu munya-Kenya Jepchirchir yarahinyagaye mu mafyigo, na yo umurundikazi Niyonsaba yagize ikibazo mu kuguru. Jepchirchir yabwiye ikinyamakuru co muri Kenya The Nation ati: "Ndababara mu mafyigo no mu kuguru kwose”. Niyonsaba, umunonotsi yatahukanye umudari w’ifeza mw’ihiganwa rya Olempike mu gusiganwa ku metero 800 mu 2016, yimuriwe ku ntera za 5000 na 10000. Uyu murundikazi w’imyaka 29 yabujijwe kwiruka kuri izi ntera 800 yari amenyereye mu 2019 kubera ikibazo c’imisemburo ya testosterone iri ku rugero rwo hejuru. Jepchirchir w’imyaka 28, yaratahukanye umudari w’inzahabu i Tokyo mu mwaka uheze mu kwiruka ku mwanya w’amasaha abiri n’iminota 27 n’amasegonda 20, atsinda mugenziwe Brigid Kosgei n’umunyamerikakazi Molly Seidel. Uyu munonotsi yatsindiye amahiganwa mpuzamakungu ya marathon ku ruhande rw’abagore mu 2016 na 2020 yongerako ati: "Ndababaye cane ariko sinohava nunyura imvune na rirya tugifise irindi higanwa mu mwaka uza imbere y’uko nja kurwanira intsinzi yanje ya Olempike mu 2024 mu nkino zizobera i Paris”. Jepchirchir yatsindiye ihiganwa rya mbere rya marathon i Boston mu kwa kane akaba yaratevye gushirwa ku rutonde rw’umurwi w’abakenyakazi bane ba Kenya bazohiganwa muri marathon i Eugene. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Niyonsaba avuga ko ata kundi yari kugira atari ukuva muri iri higanwa rizobera muri Amerika. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram yanditse ati: "Haraciye hafi ukwezi kumwe ntanguye kwumva imvune yo mu kirenge. Jewe n’abo dufashanya twarakoze ibishobora vyose kugira nkire. "Ubu meze neza ariko sinashoboye kwimenyereza muri iki kiringo cose, rero uko meze ubu sinumva ko vyonshobokera guhiganwa uko ndavyipfuza”. Niyonsaba, Umurundikazi wenyene amaze gutsindira umudari wa Olempike, yarakoze birashimwa mw’ihiganwa Diamond League ryabereye i Doha mu kwa gatanu, aho yiruka imetero 3000. Mu mahiganwa ya Olempike y’umwaka uheze, yahejeje ari mu kibanza ca gatanu ku metero 10000 ku ruhande rw’abagore, akaba yaciye umuhigo, kuko yari ahejeje guhindura intera ahiganwako inyuma yo kubuzwa guhiganwa hagati y’imetero 400 na 1500 kubera imisemburo ya testosterone irenze urugero. Aya mahiganwa mpuzamakungu yo kwinonora imitsi (World Athletics Championships) azotangura ku wa gatanu akazorangira ku wa 21 Mukakaro (7).

headline: Ronald Koeman: Barcelona yirukanye umumenyereza mukuru inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vallecano
text: Ronald Koeman yirukanywe mu kazi nk'umumenyereza mukuru wa Barcelone inyuma y'amezi 14 i Nou Camp. Barca ifise amanota 15 yonyene mu nkino 10 mw'ihiganwa rya La Liga kandi imaze gutsindwa kabiri mu nkino zo gukuranamwo muri  uyu mwaka w'inkino (saison) wa Champion's League Ku rutonde iri mu kibanza c'icenda,  ikaba irushwa amanota atandatu na zibiri zirongoye urwo rutonde inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vellecano  ku wa gatatu. Ryabaye irya gatatu Barca itsindwa mu nkino  zine za vuba kandi  vyabaye ku  wa mungu naho yari yatsinzwe muri  Clasico na Real Madrid. Mw'itangazo, uwo mugwi wo muri Espagne wavuze uti: "Umukuru w'umugwi,  Joan Laporta, yamumenyesheje [Koeman] iyo ngingo inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vallecano. "Ronald Koeman aja gusezera abakinyi kuri uyu wa kane." Uwo munya-Hollande w'imyaka 58, yakiniye igihugu, Everton na Southampton, , we na Barca ntibarenze ikibanza ca gatatu muri La Liga muri saison iheruka. Ibibazo  vy'amafaranga muri Barca navyo ntaco vyafashije Koeman, vyatumye  Lionel Messi  ava  muri uwo mugwi  akaja muri Paris St-Germain mu kwezi  kw'umunani. Barcelone  ntiyashoboye kugura umukinyi n'umwe mushasha mu ci riheze,  Memphis Depay, Sergio Aguero na Eric Garcia  bakaba baje bataguzwe nawe rutahizamu Luuk de Jong aza nk'intizo avuye muri  Seville. Bamaze gutsindwa ku wa gatatu, Koeman yavuze ati: "Ibi bivuze ko tudahagaze neza". "Umugwi nta reme ugira mu bakinyi, waratakaje abakinyi bakomeye, biri n'ico vyerekana. Iyindi migwi yagiye iriyubaka gusumba, twebwe si uko vyagenze, n'ivyo biri n'ico vyerekana." Xavi, yabaye rurangiranwa muri uwo mugwi ubu akaba ari umumenyereza wa Al Sadd yo muri Qatar, ari mu bafise amahirwe menshi yo gusubirira Koeman. N'ubwa mbere kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda mu 1987 Barca itsindirwa hanze gatatu yikurikiranya kandi itinjije - igihe vyashika bikaba vyari vyatumye umumenyereza w'umwongereza Terry Venables  yirukanwa. Koeman yaratahukanye igikombe ca Copa del Rey mu mwaka wiwe wa mbere ariko Barca yahejeje ari iya gatatu muri La Liga n'amanota ya mbere make kuva mu 2008. Uwo yahora akinira Hollande mu kibanza c'inyuma hagati yakiniye Barca hagati ya 1989 na 1995, ayifasha gutsindira ibikombe bine vy'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne hanyuma yinjiza igitsinfo cahaye intsinzi uwo mugwi mu gikombe ca Coupe d'Europe co mu 1992. Yagarukanywe muri uwo mugwi mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020 nk'umumenyereza mukuru n'uwahoze ari umukuru wawo  Josep Maria Bartomeu. Ariko umukuru mushasha  Laporta, yaravuze kenshi ko uwo mugabo atariwe yamushizeho. Abo bagabo ntibabanye neza, gushika aho mu kwezi kw'icenda Koeman asohora itangazo avuga ko yohabwa umwanya wo gusubira kwubaka umugwi inyuma yo gutakaza Messi na mugenzi w'imbere  Antoine Griezmann mu ci. Inyuma yo gutsindwa  na Real Madrid ku wa mungu, imodoka ya Koeman yarakikujwe na bamwe mu bafana ba Barcelone,  Koeman mu nyuma akaba yabise "abantu batarezwe " Ni iki kitagenze neza muri  Barcelona? Kimwe mu bikorwa vya Koeman nk'umumenyereza kwabaye   guhamagara kuri terefone  Luis Suarez bitarengeje ama sekunda 40 aho yabwira uwo mukinyi w'imbere aturuka muri Uruguay ko atagikenewe afise umwidegemvyo wo kuva muri uwo mugwi. Iyo ngingo yari yafashwe n'uburongozi bw'umugwi kandi ubu birazwi ko vyavuye ku bibazo vy'amafaranga vyatumye bikura umukinyi w'imbere yari yatsinze ibitsindo 21 ku ncuro 29 yatanguye mu rukino muri saison yaheruka. Barca yaciye itangura gutakaza inguvu kuva ku mugwi wahora uhiganwa mu ya mbere i Buraya gushika aho bitaworohera kuronka ikibanza muri Champions League. Kuva ku murongo w'imbere ugizwe na Messi, Suarez na  Griezmann ukaja k'uwugizwe na  Depay, De Jong n'uwuriko arasaza Aguero vyerekana muri make akazi katoroshe  Koeman yari afise, kandi n'uwugiye kumusubirira niko kamurindiriye.

headline: Burundi: Francine Niyonsaba yakiriwe nk’intwari i Bujumbura ashikanye umuhigo w'isi
text: Francine Niyonsaba, umugore anyaruka cane kurusha abandi ku isi mu imetero 2,000 yatewe iteka n'abantu isinzi ubwo yari ashitse ku kibuga c'indege mpuzamakungu ca Bujumbura uyu munsi kuwa gatatu. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru yagize ati: "Ndumva yuko nakoze ibisadanzwe ... nanjye ubu ndavuga ko ntasanzwe ku isi." Nubwo haherutse kuvugwa ibitero ku kibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura, n'amagrenade yatewe ku wa mbere muri ico gisagara, abantu benshi cane baje gutera iteka Francine Niyonsaba ku kibuga c'indege no ku mabarabara ya Bujumbura. Mu ndwi iheze i Zagreb muri Croatia Niyonsaba yanditse amateka mu gusiganwa 2,000m aho yaciye umuhigo ku isi akoresheje iminota 5:21'56''. Francine Niyonsaba w'imyaka 28, ari mu banonotsi benshi babujijwe guhiganwa ku metero hagati ya 400 na 1,500 kubera ko baremanywe imisemburo (testosterone) myinshi. Abo mu ntara y'iwabo, ku kibuga c'indege bari bafise icapa canditseko ngo "Abanya Ruyigi n'Abarundi twese turaguhaye ikaze kandi turagukeje kw'iteka waraye uteye igihugu cacu n'intara". Niyonsaba yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Ni amateka, ni umugisha ku Burundi kuba mvuye mu mahanga aho nari maze iminsi guhiganwa mu bihugu bitandukanye". Yababariye uko yagiye asiganwa ahereye muri Amerika, mu Bufaransa, mu Bubiligi, mu Busuwisi, Croatia na Espagne. Ati: "Aho hose nagiye ndaca nongera ntsinda, kwari ukongera amanota ashobora kunshikana muri finale kugira mpiganirwe iki gikombe mubona natsinze mu 5000m [Diamond League i Zurich] akaba ari igikombe kidasanzwe. Ni igikombe gitashe ubwa mbere mu Burundi, ni umugisha ku muryango, ni umugisha ku gihugu ciwanje." Niyonsaba avuga ko atagarukiye aho kuko yagiye muri Croatia aho yaciye urya muhigo w'isi. Ati: "Ababonye uko nakoze ihiganwa barabonye yuko ubu umurundikazi ari we afise umwanya w'uwunyaruka kw'isi ku metero 2,000 mu minota 5 amasegonda 21 n'ibice 56. "Ivyo ntivyari bwabeho ngaha kw'isi, ni record mondial itashe mu Burundi kuva bwitwa Uburundi." Francine avuga ko vyamunezereye rwose kubona abarundi bo mu gihugu no mu makungu bose baranezerewe n'intsinzi yiwe. Ati: "Ivyo bikantera intege bikantera kwishima. Ndumva yuko nakoze ibidasanzwe kandi koko nyene ivyo nakoze ntibisanzwe, nanje ubu ndavuga ko ntasanzwe ku isi." Francine avuga ko ibi ari intango kandi bitumye agiye gukora gusumba kuko ashaka kwongera kunezereza abarundi umwaka uza. Ati: "Nozonezerwa cane umwaka uza ngarutse mfise igikombe nk'iki muri shampionat du monde izobera muri Amerika, nkashobora guha umunezero Abarundi".

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Alli, Pogba, Martial, Lingard, Milenkovic, Vlahovic, Castellanos
text: Newcastle yatanguye kubaza nimba yoshobora kuronka Dele Alli, kandi Tottenham iriteguye kwumviriza umurwi woza urondera uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 25.  (Teamtalk) Manchester United iriko irarondera abakinyi bo hagati bashobora gusubirira umufaransa Paul Pogba, 28, biboneka ko azosezera uyu murwi mu gihe amasezerano yiwe n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza.  (Telegraph - subscription required) Atletico Madrid iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umusatirizi wa Manchester United Anthony Martial 26 mu kugumuza n'uwundi. (Eurosport) Manchester United ntiyiteze ko Jesse Lingard azohava ava muri uyu murwi mu kadirisha k'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere, na rirya uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 28 asanzwe akina hagati ariko aregereza amezi atandatu ya nyuma mu masezerano yiwe.  (Manchester Evening News) Nyene umurwi wa Chelsea Roman Abramovich arababajwe n'ingene  Real Madrid yakajije akariro mu kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'uyu murwi wa Stamford Bridge, umudagi Antonio Rudiger, 28, kandi ashobora guhagarika umugambi wo kugarukana umusatirizi w'umubirigi Eden Hazard, 30, ubu akina muri uyo murwi wo muri Espagne. (El Nacional, via Mail) Barcelona iriko irihweza nimba yogura umusatirizi wa Gabon Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang yatswe ikibanza ca kizigenza muri Arsenal - ariko ikibazo kikaba umushahara w'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 32 usanzwe ari munini. (Independent) West Ham iriteguye kubandanya urugamba rwo kurondera umukini w'inyuma Nathaniel Phillips, 24, wa Liverpool mu kwa mbere, n'aho aherutse kuvunika.(Standard) West Ham kandi irafise icizere co kuronka  umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya Serbia Nikola Milenkovic, 24, asa n'uwuherutse kuvyumvikanako na nyene umurwi  wiwe wa Fiorentina, ibi bikumvikana ko ashobora kuba ari mu nzira agenda.  (Teamtalk) Fiorentina yashize igiciro c'imiriyoni 100 y'ama euros ku musatirizi wayo, umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21. (Gazzetta dello Sport - subscription required) Paris St-Germain, Barcelona, Liverpool, Manchester City na Tottenham yose ivugwa ko iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'umufaransa akina ku ruhande rw'ububamfu inyuma Rayan Ait-Nouri, 20, ariko Wolves ishobora kuzoronswa 50% gusa vy'ayotangwa kubera ingene umurongo werekeye igurishwa rwiwe uvuga.  (Mail) Barcelona iriko irategura ingene yokora igitero ku murwi Chelsea kugira ngo iwutware umukinyi wo kuruhande rw'ibubamfu inyuma, umunya Hollande Ian Maatsen, 19, asanzwe yaratijijwe mu kiringo c'umwaka w'inkino wose mu murwi wo mu cicaro ca kabiri wa Coventry. (Football Insider) Chelsea nta bushobozi ifise bwo kugarukana umukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza Conor Gallagher, 21, iyo yatijijwe muri Crystal Palace mu kwa mbere kubera mu masezerano y'intizo y'umwaka wose harimwo umurongo uvuga ko ibi bishoboka mu gihe yoba amaze gukina inkino ziri musi ya 50% muri uyu murwi wa Selhurst Park. (Times - subscription required) Real Madrid yaganiriye n'umukuru w'igisata co kwinonora imitsi wa Liverpool Michael Edwards yiteze kuva muri uyu murwi wa Anfield mu mpera z'iri higanwa, kugira no abandanye ico gikorwa nyene i Bernabeu. (Independent)

headline: Thomas Tuchel avuga ko hari igipfungu muri Chelsea kubera igitero ca Russia kuri Ukraine
text: Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Thomas Tuchel avuga ko "hari igipfungu cinshi ku kungene ibintu bimeze mu murwi wacu" inyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine. Uyu murwi uzwi nka The Blues wegukira umutunzi ruhebwa w'umurusiya Roman Abramovich, umushingamateka wo mu mugambwe w'Abakozi mu Bwongereza akaba yavuze ko reta ikwiye gufata amatungo yiwe. Tuchel yavuze ibi mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagize imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe ca Carabao Cup aho umurwi wiwe uzotana mu mitwe na Liverpool ku kibuga ca Wembley ku wa Mungu. Tuchel. ati: "Ntiduhave twibaza ko iki atari ikibazo. "Ibintu muri rusangi [muri Ukraine] kuri jewe n'abo dukorana, mbere no kuri bose i Cobham (ikibuga Chelsea isanzwe ikorerako imyimenyerezo), abakinyi, bimeze nabi cane. "Nta n'umwe yari yiteze ibi bintu. Ni ibintu bigoye gutahura, nk'uko nabivuze biradutesheje umutwe, biratubujije umunezero wacu mu rugendo rwose twakoze gushika kuri finale. "Kandi bidushira mu mazi abira, ariko bikaba ibindi bintu ku bantu bose n'imiryango yose muri kino gihe begwa n'iki kibazo kudusumvya. "Igikenewe gusumba ibindi, ni uko twifatanije nabo kandi tubipfuriza amahirwe. "Hanyuma kandi hari igipfungu cinshi ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze mu murwi wacu no mu Bwongereza, ariko ku kintu nk'iki, numva ntakwiye kukivugako vyinshi". Abramovich ni umwe mu batunzi ruhebwa mu Burusiya kandi azwi ko ari incuti ya hafi cane ya Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya. Umushingamateka wo mu mugambwe w'abakozi Chris Bryant yabwiye abashingamateka ko hari urwandiko yaronse ruva mu bushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ruvuga ko Abramovich adakwiye kwemererwa kuba mu Bwongereza. Downing Street  ishobora kuba itanezwe n'ivyavuzwe kuri Abramovich mu nama nshingamateka. Tuchel ati: "Turabizi, kumbure dufise kuba ata makuru menshi dufise kuri vyo nk'uko kumbure mufise kuba muvyibaza". "Ariko nibaza ko ari uburenganzira bw'umurwi, abakozi, na jewe nyene ndimwo, bwo kutagira uruhande twegamiye muri poritike, tugakora inkino gusa kandi tukibanda ku nkino gusa. "Si uko dushaka kwinyegeza, ni ikintu kiboneka, ibintu ntibimeze neza na gato, aho ntagushidikanya. Ni uko. "Kuri benshi, hari haciye igihe kirekire ata muntu yiyumvira intambara i Bulaya. "Reka turindire. Ariko ingaruka yoyo ntishobora kubura. "Ariko reka twihangane gato kandi turindire ingingo zizofatwa, hanyuma rero kumbure tuzoheza tuvyige tumenye n'ingene tuvyitwaramwo".

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ings, Kane, Sancho, Ramsey, Griezmann, Flick
text: Manchester United ishobora guhindukirira umusatirizi wa Southampton umwongereza Danny Ings w'imyaka 28 mu ci riza mu ntumbero yo gukomeza uruhande rw'abasatirizi b'uyu murwi wa Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. (Telegraph - subscription required) Wa musatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane abona ko umurwi umubereye ari Manchester City mu gihe abandanya akora ibishoboka vyose kugira asezere umurwi wiwe Tottenham mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uwu mwaka. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27 yemeza ko umukuru wa Tottenham yamaze kumwemerera  mu majambo gusa kuva muri uyu murwi uwu mwaka w'inkino urangiye igihe bavugana mu mwaka uheze akamugondoza ko yobandanya akinira Spurs mu kiringo c'uwundi mwaka, uwu nawo ukaba ugiye kurangira.  (Times - subscription required) Hagati aho, Manchester United irashaka gutanga umufaransa akina imbere Anthony Martial w'imyaka 25, hamwe n'umusatirizi w'umwongereza Jesse Lingard  w'imyaka 28 - asanzwe yaratijijwe muri West Ham - kugira ngo ishobore kuzana Kane muri Old Trafford. (Football Insider) Chelsea yateguye imiriyoni zababa 113 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo izane umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Borussia Dortmund umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21, ariko rero ikaba iriko imurwanira na Manchester United. (Sun) Imirwi itari mike ku mugabane w'Uburayi, harimwo Tottenham, Chelsea, Borussia Dortmund na AC Milan, iriko irikazanura kugira ngo ishobore kugura umunyegori w'umwongereza Dean Henderson w'imyaka 24 asanzwe ari muri Manchester United. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus hamwe n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Pays de Galles (Wales) Aaron Ramsey w'imyaka 30 arashimwa cane na Liverpool, nk'uko amakuru ava mu Butariyano abivuga. Liverpool ivugwa ko yoba iriko itegura amahera kugira ngo ishobore kugura uyu mukinyi yahoze akina muri Arsenal mu gihe ca gihe c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi kizoba gitanguye. (Tutto Juve - in Italian) Umurwi Chelsea urindiriye gukira urukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya (Champions league) uriko urakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo hagati wa Monaco umufaransa Aurelien Tchouameni w'imyaka 21. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Bayern Munich Hansi Flick w'imyaka 56 ariko abonwa ko ashobora kuja kumenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubudagi amaze gusezera umurwi wiwe, araronderwa cane na  Barcelona nk'uwushobora gusubirira umunya Hollande Ronald Koeman w'imyaka 58. (RAC1 - in Spanish) Barcelona iriteguye kwumviriza abo bose boba bipfuza umukinyi w'imbere w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann kugira ngo ishobore gukemura ibibazo vy'amafaranga biyihanze.  (Marca) Griezmann w'imyaka 30 ashobora gusubira muri  Atletico Madrid agujijwe n'umunya Portugal Joao Felix n'aho Barca itaremera neza.  (Sport - in Spanish) Umurwi Roma usanzwe umenyerezwa na Jose Mourinho ufise "amahirwe menshi" yo kuronka umusatirizi w'umutariyano Andrea Belotti w'imyaka 27 asanzwe akina muri Torino. AC Milan nayo nyene ibandanya irondera uyu mukinyi, ariko kandi ikaba iriko ikurikirana umukinyi w'imbere wa Chelsea umufaransa Olivier Giroud, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (Calcio Mercato - in Italian) Imigwi yaEverton na Arsenal ibandanya ishinze ijisho ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Betis  Emerson Royal. Uyu munya Brésil w'imyaka 22 yatijijwe na Barcelona ariko ashobora kwigira muri Premier League mu gihe gushirwa ku ruhande muri Barcelona.  (Sport - in Spanish) Leeds United na West Ham ivugwa ko ishobora guhangana na Inter Milan, Roma na Napoli mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Cagliari Nahitan Nandez afise agaciro k'imiriyoni 42 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu ci riza. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25 akomoka muri Uruguay afise amasezerano n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa Serie A ry'Ubutariyano azorangira mu 2024.  (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Newcastle United umufaransa Allan Saint-Maximin avuga ko uyu murwi ukwiye kugura umukinyi wa Arsenal umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21, asanzwe yatijijwe muri uyo murwi kugira ngo awegukire burundu.  (Sky Sports) Mu gihe Southampton ivugwa ko yoba iriko irondera uwundi munyegori, uyu murwi uvugwa ko woba uriko urakurikiranira hagufi umunyegori wa Lazio umunya Albania Thomas Strakosha w'imyaka 26 nk'umwe mu bo ushobora kugura. (La Repubblica, via Sport Witness)

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Messi, Gordon, Kante, Martinez, Pickford, Juranovic, Saka
text: Everton iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umukinyi wo ku ruhande umwongereza Anthony Gordon w’imyaka 21 kugira ngo Chelsea ntibandanye imwirondeza. (Telegraph) Umukinyi wo hagati w’Ubufaransa, N'Golo Kante w’imyaka 31 ariko arasatira kugira ngo arabe ko yokwimukira muri Barcelona igihe amasezerano afitaniye na Chelsea azoba aragiye mu ci riza, ibiganiro vy’intangamarara bikaba bigeze kure. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Paris St-Germain igiye gutangura ibiganiro n’umusatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi w’imyaka 35, inyuma y’ibikorwa bidasanzwe yakoreye mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n’uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (RMC iciye kuri Mail) Bayern Munich iripfuza kugura umunyegori wa Argentina na Aston Villa  Emiliano Martinez w’imyaka 30. (MediaFoot – mu gifaransa) Ariko umunyegori wa  Borussia Monchengladbach n’Ubuswisi Yann Sommer, w’imyaka 34 na we ari mu biganiro na Bayern Munich vyo kumugura inyuma y’aho Umudagi Manuel Neuer avunikiye ukuguru. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Carlo Ancelotti yitandukanije n’ibivugwa ko Brezili imukeneye, agashimangira ko yipfuza kuguma muri uno murwi uherutse gutahukana igikombe c’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (European champions). (Rai Radio 1 iciye kuri Mail) Kuri uno wa kabiri, umusatirizi w’Ubufaransa Kylian Mbappé w’imyaka 24 ashobora gutangaza mu kanya kari imbere ko azova muri PSG uno mwaka w’inkino urangiye, Real Madrid ikaba imwipfuza. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Barcelona iripfuza kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Celtic na Croatia Josip Juranovic w’imyaka 27,  ariko ikaba imurwanira na Atletico Madrid hamwe n’imirwi yo muri Premier League. (Sky Sports) Umukuru wa Napoli Cristiano Giuntoli yankiye Newcastle amahirwe yo kugura umusatirizi wa Georgia Khvicha Kvaratskhelia w’imyaka 21. (Sport Express, iciye kuri Fabrizio Romano) Tottenham iriko irihweza ingene yoronka umunyegori wa Everton,  umwongereza Jordan Pickford w’imyaka 28  nk’uwushobora gusubirira umufaransa Hugo Lloris w’imyaka 35. (Football Insider) Arsenal igiye gutangura ibiganiro n’umusatirizi wayo, umwongereza Bukayo Saka w’imyaka 21, mu “ndwi n’amezi ari imbere” mu ntumbero yo kumuha ayandi masezerano. (Caught Offside) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Zinedine Zidane ashobora gusubirira umufaransa mugenziwe Didier Deschamps nk’umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubufaransa inyuma y’aho butsindiwe na Argentina mu rukino rwa nyuma rw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. (Mundo Deportivo – mu ki Espagnol) Arsenal na Leeds yinjiye mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Brezili Matheus Cunha,w’imyaka 23, mu gihe Atletico Madrid iriko irategura kumugurisha. (Goal) Chelsea irafise icizere ko ishobora kuronka umukinyi w’inyuma wa RB Leipzig na Croatia Josko Gvardiol w’imyaka 20, n’aho izi ko hari umukeba amurondera. (90 min) Chelsea kandi iri mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umudagi Youssoufa Moukoko w’imyaka 18 mu kwa mbere. (Give Me Sport) Inter Milan iriko irihweza nimba yogura uwahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Watford Roberto Pereyra w’imyaka 31, igihe amasezerano y’uyu munya-Argentina afitaniye na Udinese azoba arangiye. (Fichajes – mu ki Espagnol) Uwahoze akina inyuma muri West Ham na QPR  Anton Ferdinand avuga ko yari kuba yaragiye gukinira Barcelona ariko ko uwahoze ari umumenyereza w’aba Hammers (West Ham ) Alan Pardew atamwemereye. (TalkSPORT)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Zaha, Pochettino, Martinez, Conte, Neves, Coutinho, Willian
text: Tottenham na Everton ziripfuza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Crystal Palace umunya Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 28 ku miriyoni zirenga 56.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino ariko arihweza nimba ari ngombwa ko yosubira mu murwi Tottenham yahoze amenyereza. (Sun) Hagati aho, Tottenham iri mu biganiro n'umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi, yahoze kandi amenyereza imirwi ya  Everton na Wigan  Roberto Martinez w'imyaka 47,  mu gihe igikorwa co kurondera umusubirizi wa Jose Mourinho kibandanya. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Inter Milan Antonio Conte yarafashije uyu murwi gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A, ariko uyu mugabo yahoze amenyereza Chelsea ategerezwa kuva muri uyo murwi mu masaha 48 ari imbere.  (La Gazzetta dello Sport, via Metro) Wolves iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Portugal Ruben Neves ku miriyoni hafi 50 z'amadorari kugira ngo ishobore kuronka amahera yo kwiyubaka ku muntu uwo ari we wese yosubirira umumenyereza Nuno Espirito Santo amaze kugenda. (The Athletic - subscription required) Wolves si ngombwa ngo igurishe uyu mukinyi Neves w'imyaka 24 ari muri uyu murwi kuva mu 2017, ariko izokwakiriza yompi abo bose bazomurondera mu gihe amafaranga bazoshaka gutanga yoba ashobora gufasha mu kwiyubaka.  (Express & Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Brazil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 28 azoba ari mu bakinyi 10 bari ku rutonde rw'abazogurishwa  n'umurwi Barcelona mu ci riza.  (Star) Barcelona na Manchester City ziri mu mirwi irondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Atalanta umudagi Robin Gosens w'imyaka 26. (Sport) Arsenal na Aston Villa igiye guhangana bikomeye mu kurondera kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa  Norwich City umunya Argentine Emiliano Buendia w'imyaka 24 . (Telegraph - subscription required) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Arsenal umunya Brazil Willian w'imyaka 32 aripfuza gusubira muri  Chelsea - inyuma y'amezi ari musi ya 12 avuye muri uyu murwi yari amazemwo imyaka indwi.  (Sky Sports) Chelsea ishobora kuba ishaka kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umwongereza Callum Hudson-Odoi w'imyaka 20, agashobora kuja mu murwi  Borussia Dortmund wo mu Budagi. Dortmund ishobora kandi kurondera umukinyi w'imbere wa  Leeds United umunya Brazil Raphinha w'imyaka 24. (Eurosport) West Ham iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa  Spartak Moscow wo muri République tchèque, Alex Kral w'imyaka  23 . (Sky Sports) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Villarreal umunya Espagne Pau Torres w'imyaka 24 yanse kuvuga ku bijanye n'amakuru avuga ko ashobora kwimukira muri Manchester United mu ci riza, imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa Europa League ruhuza iyi mirwi ibiri kuri uyu wa gatatu.  (Metro) Manchester United yashitse ku masezerano n'umunyegori wa Aston Villa umwongereza Tom Heaton w'imyaka 35 akazoshobora kuja muri uyo murwi mu kwezi kuza ataco urinze gutanga. (Express) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool umwongereza Rhys Williams w'imyaka 20, ashobora gutizwa mu mwaka w'inkino uza n'aho yari yashoboye gukina mu murwi mukuru w'uyu murwi mw'ihiganwa rirangiye rya 2020-21. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal umunya Uruguay Lucas Torreira avuga ko azofata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe inyuma y'inkino zo kurondera uburenganzira bwo gukinira igikombe c'isi yose mu kwezi kuza. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25 vyari amaze umwaka wose wa 2020-2021 akina muri Atletico Madrid aho yari yaratijijwe. (Express) Arsenal ishobora kuvyura urugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Lyon umufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 22. (Mirror) Roma irashaka kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande umwongereza Demarai Gray w'imyaka 24 yari yinjiye mu murwi Bayer Leverkusen mu kwa mbere mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi hakaba harimwo umurongo uvuga ko uwumukeneye ategerezwa gutanga imiriyoni zibiri z'ama euro.  (Roma Press, via Sky Germany) Umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga arashaka kuja gukinira umurwi Paris St-Germain, umurwi wiwe Rennes ukaba umushakako imiriyoni 100 z'ama euros , mu gihe amasezerano ifitaniye n'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 18 azorangira mu ci ry'umwaka uza. (RMC Sport)

headline: Tokyo Paralympics: Abanonotsi bagendana ubumuga ba Afghanistan bahungishijwe
text: Komite mpuzamakungu y'inkino z'abagendana ubumuga iremeza ko abanonotsi babiri b'abanye Afghanistan bahungishijwe igihugu cabo. Vyari bitegekanijwe ko abo banonotsi bakina taekwondo, Zakia Khudadad na Hossain Rasouli, bahiganwa mu nkino z'abagendana ubumuga i Tokyo zatanguye kuri uyu wa gatatu. Ariko abo babiri bari mu bantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi batari bwashobore kuva muri ico gihugu inyuma y'aho aba Talibani bafatiye ubutegetsi. Ibendera rya Afghanistan ryatwawe n'umukorerabushake mu birori vyo kwugurura izo nkino ku musi wa kabiri. Umuvugizi wa komite mpuzamakungu y'inkino z'abagendana ubumuga (IPC) Craig Spence yagize ati: "Harakozwe utwigoro kugira tubakure muri Afghanistan, ubu bari mu kibanza gitekanye". "Sinshobora kubabwira aho bari kuko ibi ntibiraba ukwinonora imitsi, ibi vyerekeye ubuzima bw'abantu no gukingira abantu.
