"Ni vyo baciye mu bihe bikomeye, barabandanya gukurikiranwa no gufashwa mu bibazo boba baragize mu mutwe. "Tuguma tumenyeshwa umwanya ku mwanya aho bari n'ingene ubuzima bwabo bwifashe". Khudadadi w'imyaka 23, yari kuba umupfasoni wa mbere aserukiye Afghanistan mw'ihiganwa ry'abagendana ubumuga, kandi yari yasavye ubufasha bwo guhunga inyuma y'aho abatalibani bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan.

headline: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi rikomeye kuri uyu mugoroba (19.08.2022)
text: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta yavuze ko umukinyi w'imbere ku ruhande w'uwo mugwi, Bukaya Saka, yimirije gushira umukono ku masezerano mashasha. Yagize ati:"Mfise icizere kinini ko uruhande rwacu n'urwa Bukayo tuvyumva kumwe - igisigaye n'ukubishira mu nyandiko", (Romano via Arsenal.com) Arteta yavuze kandi ko umugwi wiwe ushaka kwihweza neza abakinyi ufise ubu imbere yo kwiyumvira kugura abandi bashasha mu mwanya usigaye w'igura n'igurishwa. "Ategerezwa kuba umukinyi mwiza, dushaka kuzana umukinyi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru, atari kuba ari umukinyi gusa." Umukinyi wa Real Madrid, Casemiro muri iki gitondo yasezeye abo bahora bakinana muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo kwemera kuja gukinira umugwi wa Manchester United. Umumenyereza wa Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti yemeje mu gitondo ko uwo mukinyi yimirije gusezera ikibuga ca Bernabéu. (Skysport) Umuyobozi mukuru wa Borussia Dortmund Hans-Joachim Watzke yamiriye kure inkuru zivuga ko uwo mugwi ushobora ugura Cristiano Ronaldo. Bivuye ku nkuru z'ikinyamakuru BILD co mu Budagi cavuze ko Dortmund ishobora kuzana uwo mukinyi wa Manchester United. Watzke yagize ati:"Ndamukunda, kuvugisha ukuri n'iciyumviro ciza - kubona Cristiano akinira kuri Signal Iduna Park. Ariko nta masezerano n'amwe dufitaniye, kuri ivyo rero tureke kubandanya tubivuga." (Sky sport football) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Eddie Howe yabwiye Real Madrid ko yokwibagira kugerageza kugura umukinyi Bruno Guimaraes  bivuye ku nkuru zivuga ko bariko baragira inguvu zo kumugura. Uwo munye Brezil w'imyaka 24 yari yaguzwe amapawundi imiliyoni 40 mu kwezi kwa mbere mu mugwi wa Lyon, bamubona nk'uwushobora gusubirira Casemiro ariko arerekeza muri Machester United.

headline: Helen Nkwocha - umumenyereza wa mbere w'umugore w'ikipe ikomeye y'abagabo i Buraya
text: Helene Nkwocha yari afise ishaka n'ukwihagararako igihe yagurisha inzu yiwe agafata icemezo co kuba mu nzu y'ubwato kugira aronke amahera yo kuriha ishure ryo kuba umumenyereza w'umunyamwuga. Ariko nta na hamwe mu ndoto ziwe higeze habamwo ivy'uko yobaye umumenyereza wa mbere w'umugore w'ikipe y'umupira w'amaguru y'abagabo yo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Buraya. Tvoroyrar Boltfelag ni imwe mu makipe ya kera cane mu mazinga ya Faroe. Ariko mu gihe umwaka w'inkino utagenze neza wagomba uhere - mu gihe bari bamaze kuwuronkamwo amanota atatu gusa - biyambaje Nkwocha, yakora muri iyo kipe nk'umumenyereza w'abakiri bato, ngo ababere umumenyereza mu mikino itandatu isigaye. Uyu mudamu yavukiye i London yabwiye BBC Sport ati "Ntivyansavye kwiyumvira". "Uko abantu babifata ntibihuje na jewe kuko bobo batangazwa n'igitsina canje. Ariko kuba ndi umugore ndabimenyereye. Nta gishasha kirimwo kuri jewe. "Naho kuba nkorana n'abakinyi b'abagabo? Nakoranye n'abakinyi b'abagabo benshi kurusha abagore. Kuba nkora akazi kuri uru rwego, ego, ivyo ntibisanzwe. Ariko gukorana n'abakinyi b'abagabo ivyo kuri jewe nta gishasha kirimwo." Igihe BBC Sport yavugana na Nkwocha mu 2015 yari mu ntango y'urugendo rwamushikanye mu bihugu vyinshi, harimwo Ubushinwa na Amerika, arondera akazi. Uyu mudamu w'imyaka 45 agira ati "Vyari bigoye cane kuko akazi ko kumenyereza karahiganirwa cane". "Utegerezwa kuba umuntu atadebukirwa kandi kuba mu nzu y'ubwato bwari bwo buryo bwiza kuri jewe bwo kuziganya amahera nari nkeneye kugira mbeho, kandi nshobore kubona umwanya wo kumenyereza kuko ku rwego nk'urwo nta mahera menshi uronka. "Vyansavye ukwitanga kudasanzwe mu bijanye n'amafaranga hanyuma mu bijanye n'aho nategerezwa kuba ndi, naguma ngendagenda cane ndondera amahirwe yo kwiga no gutera imbere." Nkwocha yariko arakorera i Chicago igihe yumva ko hari akazi mu mazinga ya Faroe. Mu gihe Covid yagomba itangure guhagarika ubuzima, yararavye asanga ivyo ako kazi kari kumuzanira vyari bigoye kwivyiyumanganya. Ntiyari bwashike mu mazinga ya Faroe na rimwe. Agira ati "Ni nk'ahantu ho mu migani myiza. Ni heza cane, nibaza yuko ari ho hantu heza maze kubona. "Nta bantu benshi bahari - hatuwe n'abantu 2.000 - kandi nyinshi mu nkino dukina dutegerezwa gufata ubwato, hanyuma imodoka kugira dushike iyo dukinira. Kandi hari umuyaga mwinshi umupira nawo ukama uri mu kirere bisigura ko ari ahantu hagoye ku mupira w'amaguru." Mu nkino zibiri ari umumenyereza mfatakibanza, Nkwocha yarananiwe guhagarika gutsindwa kwa TB. Ariko mu mpera z'indwi batsinzwe 1-0 gusa, kandi hari umukinyi wabo yahawe ikarata itukura. Nkwocha azoguma akora uko ashoboye, yirinda kwiyumvira ivya kazoza ka nyuma y'impera z'umwaka w'inkino. Uko vyogenda kwose, nta n'umwanya ukwiye afise wo kwiyumvira cane ivya kazoza. Igihe BBC Sport yavugana nawe, yari ahejeje akazi kiwe k'uwo munsi - kumenyereza bamwe mu bakiri bato mw'ikipe ya TB. Namubwiye nti Pep Guardiola wa City ntategerezwa kwigisha incuke hamwe n'abakuze. Nkwocha yaciye afatwa n'agatwengo. Aca agira ati "Ntagiye mu vyo gutera inkuru, uravye uko imyimenyerezo igenda, urashobora kuvuga ko na Helen atavyo akora".

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Kane, Areola, Smith Rowe, Zouma, Coutinho, Damsgaard, Umtiti
text: Manchester United iri imbere ya Chelsea n'umukeba wayo Manchester City mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27, ariko Tottenham isaba imiriyoni 139 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hamwe n'abakinyi babiri bakina mu murwi A wa Man U. (Football Insider) Manchester City yavuganye n'umusatirizi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 akina muri Barcelona kugira ngo irabe ko yomugura. (Footmercato - in French) West Ham iri mu biganiro na  Paris St-Germain kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umunyegori w'umufaransa Alphonse Areola w'imyaka 28 yari amaze umwaka wose akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe. (Mail) Tottenham yahambije Arsenal, PSG na Atletico Madrid mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Lyon umufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 23. (Le10 Sport, via Metro) Arsenal  yongereje amafaranga kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23, aho yemeye ko ishobora gutanga imiriyoni 66.7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hamwe n'uturusho dushobora kwiyongerako duharurwa mu mamiriyoni umunani z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Emile Smith Rowe w'imyaka 20 amaze kutangirwa amafaranga incuro zibiri na Aston Villa ariko bikanka, ariteguye gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano y'imyaka itanu n'abarashi (Gunners). (Birmingham Mail) Napoli na Roma iripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umutariyano Emerson Palmieri w'imyaka 26, ariko iyo mirwi ikaba idashaka kurekura imiriyoni 20 z'ama euro zisabwa kuri uyu mukinyi afise amasezerano azorangira mu kwa gatandatu 2022.  (Calciomercato, via Football Italia) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Kurt Zouma w'imyaka 26  yiteze kuva muri  Chelsea muri rino ci, mu gihe  Everton, Tottenham na Roma ya Jose Mourinho yose imwipfuza, akaba aherutse kwanka kuja gukinira Wolves.(Telefoot on Twitter)ya Newcastle United, Tottenham, Wolves na Southampton iriko iregeranya amafaranga mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Schalke umunyamerika Matthew Hoppe w'imyaka 20. (90min) Sampdoria yiyemeje kugumya umusatirizi wayo, umunya Danemark  Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 21 n'imiburiburi mu kiringo w'uwundi mwaka, mu gihe Liverpool na Tottenham, co kimwe na Juventus hamwe na Barcelona iri mu mirwi itari mike imwipfuza.  (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe umupira w'amaguru ca Tottenham Fabio Paratici abona ko kimwe mu bikorwa nyamukuru ari uko agiriranira ayandi masezerano y'igihe kirekire n'umusatirizi Son Heung-min w'imyaka 29 akomoka muri Korea y'Epfo.  (90min) Manchester United ivugwa ko ifise umunoho mwinshi cane wo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, umufaransa Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka 27 mu gihe na Arsenal nyo nyene imwipfuza. (El Gol - in Spanish) Everton iri hafi kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma Ryan Bertrand ata mafaranga itanze, inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31 yankiye kubandanya akinira Southampton. (Fabrizio Romano, via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona na Tottenham zahambiije Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus umunya Argentina Cristian Romero w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Atalanta iyo yatijijwe. Ariko Atalanta nayo ifise uburenganzira bwo gushobora kumugura. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Tottenham na Manchester United iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'inyuma wa Lyon umunya Danemark Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 25, yari amaze umwaka akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe.  (Footmercato - in French) Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa  Manchester City, West Ham hamwe na Manchester United umunya Argentina Carlos Tevez w'imyaka 37, avuga ko ashaka kurangiriza umwuga wiwe w'umupira w'amaguru muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kandi akavuga ko amaze kuronka imirwi itatu imwipfuza, ni inyuma y'aho aviriye mu murwi  Boca Juniors wo mu gihugu ciwe mu kw'indwi.  (ESPN Deportes - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool  Ben Davies w'imyaka 25 ntashaka kuva muri uyu murwi n'aho aronderwa n'imirwi Celtic na Bournemouth. (Mail) Uwahoze akina ku ruhande mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa, Franck Ribery w'imyaka 38,avuga ko bibabaje kubona Fiorentina itashatse kumwongera ayandi masezerano ngo abandanye ayikinira inyuma y'aho ayo yari afitaniye nawe arangiriye mu mpera z'ukwa gatandatu akavuga ko yipfuza kugumua muri uwu murwi w'ihiganwa ry'Ubutariyano, Serie A.  (Toscana TV, via Football Italia)

headline: Diego Maradona: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru apfuye ku myaka 60
text: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ku myaka 60. Uyu yahoze ari rutahizamu wo hagati wa Argentine akanaba umumenyereza, yarabazwe ubwonko kandi bigenda neza, igihe yagira ikibumbe c'amaraso mu bwonko mu ntango za kuno kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe. Vyaciye bitangazwa ko azovurwa ku kibazo yari afise co kwihebera inzoga. Maradona yari umwe mu bakinyi bakomeye isi imaze kubona, akaba yarabaye kapitene wa Argentine igihe yatwara igikombe co mu 1986, akina ku buryo buteye igomwe kandi bucibukwa n'ubu. Mu rwandiko rwashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Argentine ryavuze ko "tubabajwe cane n'urupfu rwa rurangiranwa wacu", ryongerako riti: "Uzokwama mu mitima yacu." Maradona yakiniye Barcelona na Napoli mu gukinira amakipe kwiwe, atwara ibikombe vya Serie A mu Butariyano. Yinjije ibitsindo 34 mu nkino 91 za Argentine, ayiserukira mi bikombe vy'isi bine. Maradona yashikanye igihugu ciwe mu rukino rwa nyuma mu gikombe c'isi co mu Butaliyano mu 1990, igihe batsindwa n'Ubudage bw'Uburengero, imbere y'uko asubira kuba kapitene mu gikombe c'isi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 1994, ariko aza gusubizwa muhira kubera gufata imiti yongera inguvu. Mu muce wa kabiri w'ugukina kwiwe, Maradona vyaramugoye kwihanganira ikiyovyabwenge ca cocaine aranahagarikwa gukina amezi 15 nyuma yo gusanganwa mu maraso ico kiyovyabwenge mu 1991. Yagiye mu bukukuruke mu mupira w'amaguru mu 1997, ku munsi yakwiza imyaka 37 y'amavuko, mu kiringo ca kabiri akinira ikipe ikomeye yo muri Argentine, Boca Juniors. Nyuma yo kumenyereza igihe gito amakipe abiri muri Argentine igihe yari agikina, Maradona yagenywe kuba umumenyereza w'ikipe y'igihugu mu 2008 aca ava muri ako kazi nyuma y'gikombe c'isi co mu 2010, igihe ikipe yiwe yatsindwa n'Ubudage mu ca kane c'ihiganwa. Mu nyuma yaje kumenyereza amakipe muri United Arab Emirates na Mexique, anamenyereza Gimnasia y Esgrima, ikipe ikomeye cane muri Argentine, gushika ku gihe c'urupfu rwiwe.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Ndombele, Bergwijn, Fernandes, Digne, Schick, Mateta
text: Umukinyi wa mbere wa Tottenham amaze kugurwa amafaranga menshi gusumba abandi bose muri uyo murwi, umufaransa Tanguy Ndombele, 25, yaguzwe imiriyoni zirenga 73 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, arizeye ko ashobora gusezera uyu murwi muri uku kwa mbere. (The Athletic - subscription required) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Tottenham umunya Hollande Steven Bergwijn, 24, asa n'uwuri mu nzira ava muri uyu murwi, Ajax ikaba ari umwe mu mirwi imwipfuza. (Fabrizio Romano on Twitter) Umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 23, ashobora gutera akagere Real Madrid hanyuma agatera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri uno murwi w'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa.  (Le Parisien - in French) Umusatirizi wa Bayer Leverkusen Patrik Schick, 25, akomoka muri République tchèque avuga ko ata ngorane afise muri uno murwi wo mu Budagi n'aho hari  amakuru avuga ko ashobora kugenda muri uku kwezi.  (Bild - in German) Aston Villa iri mu biganiro vyo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Everton umufaransa Lucas Digne, 28, avugwa ko yipuza kwigira muri uyo murwi umenyerezwa na Steven Gerrard. (Sky Sports) Newcastle iramaze kuvugana na Burnley kugira ngo irabe ko yoshobora kugura umusatirizi Chris Wood, 30, akomoka muri Nouvelle Zelande. (Telegraph - subscription required) Newcastle yongeye ku rutonde rw'abasatirizi yipfuza muri kuno kwezi umunya Suisse Noah Okafor, 21, asanzwe akinira RB Salzburg. (Teamtalk) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umunya-Portugal Bruno Fernandes, 27, aramirira kure amakuru avuga ko muri uku kwa mbere ashobora kwimukira muri Barcelona, akabigereranya na vya bindi vy'itariki ya mbere z'ukwa kane ifatwa ko ari umusi wo kubesha (Sun via Instagram) Uwahoze ari umunyegori wa Newcastle Shay Given wo muri Irlande ahanura mugenziwe Caoimhin Kelleher, 23, kuva muri Liverpool muri uku kwezi kugira ngo ashobore kuronka akanya ko gukina. (Premier Sport via Liverpool Echo) Umusatiri w'umufaransa Jean-Philippe Mateta ari hafi yo gusezera Crystal Palace muri kuno kwezi. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 24 asanzwe yatijijwe muri Mainz yo mu Budagi, yiteguriye kuja gukina mu Bufaransa, mu murwi St Etienne. (Standard) Umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu wa Arsenal Sead Kolasinac yatanguye ibiganiro na Marseille kugira ngo arabe ko yokwimukira muri uyu murwi wo mu Bufaransa mu ci riza igihe amasezerano afitaniye na  Emirates Stadium azoba arangiye, na rirya adakunzwe gukinishwa. (L'Equipe via Sun) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Thomas Tuchel aripfuza ko umukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza Ross Barkley, 28, ashobora gutizwa mu wundi murwi muri kuno kwezi.  (90 Min) Newcastle iripfuza kugura umunya Côte d'Ivoire Ibrahim Sangare, 24, akina hagati, akaba asanzwe akinira PSV Eindhoven. (Mail) Newcastle kandi yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Monaco ku bijanye n'umukinyi w'inyuma Benoit Badiashile, 20, akaba ashirwa ku giciro c'imiriyoni zirenga 47 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Mail) Manchester United ntirigera ironka umurwi n'umwe ushaka umufaransa akina hagati Paul Pogba, 28, akaba yiteze kurangiza amasezerano afitaniye nayo mu ci riza. (Mail)

headline: Manchester United: Cristiano Ronaldo avuga ko yasubiye mu ruhongore, akabikesha Sir Alex Ferguson
text: Cristiano Ronaldo yasubiye muri Manchester United inyuma y'imyaka irenga icumi ayivuyemwo, akaba aje ava muri Juventus yo mu Butaliyano yahora akinira. United yatanze imiriyoni 15 z'ama euros - hamwe n'inyongera ishobora kuba igera ku miriyoni umunani - kuri uno mukinyi w'imyaka 36. Ronaldo yateye igikumu ku masezerano y'imyaka ibiri yo gukina muri uno murwi wa Old Trafford, akaba mbere ahabwa n'akaryo ko gushobora kwongererezwa uwundi mwaka umwe. Igihe yakinira ubwa mbere uyu murwi, Ronaldo, umukinyi yatahukanye agashmwe ka Ballon d'Or (umupira w'inzahabu) incuro zitanu, yinjije ibitsindo 118 mu nkino 292, imbere y'uko yimukira muri Real Madrid mu 2009, mu mwaka uheze naho akaba ari mukinyi yinjije ibitsindo vyinshi muri Serie A, aho yijiirije Juventus ibitsindo 29. Ronaldo ati: "Manchester United ni umurwi wamye ufise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu mutima wanje, kandi nararengewe n'ubutumwa bwinshi cane naronse kuva batangaje ko ngiye kugaruka". "Ndindiranye igishika cinshi co gukira i Old Trafford, ngasubira kubona abafana buzuye ikibuga. "Ndizeye gutangurana n'uyu murwi inyuma y'inkino mpuzamakungu, kandi ndizeye ko ibintu bizogenda neza muri uno mwaka dutanguye". Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ati: "Biragoye kuronka amajambo wokoresha mu gusigura Cristiano. Uretse ko ari umukinyi w'igihangange, ni umuntu akomeye cane". "Kugira ngo ushobore gukira ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihe kirekire nk'iki cose bisaba ko uba uri umuntu adasanzwe". "Nta nkeka mfise ko azobandanya kuvyifatamwo neza kandi ubuhinga bwiwe ni ngirakamaro ku bakinyi bakiri bato mu murwi". Ronaldo yaravuzwe cane ko yari kwimukira muri Manchester City ariko yahisemwo gusubira muri United, aho yamaze imyaka itandatu yose agatsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza (Premier League) incuro zitatu, ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (UEFA Champions League), ibikombe bibiri vya League Cup/Coupe de la ligue, hamwe na kimwe ca FA - ndetse n'igikombe ca Coupe du monde des clubs de la FIFA/ FIFA Club World Cup hamwe na Community Shield - ico gihe umurwi ukaba wamenyerezwa na Sir Alex Ferguson. Bivugwa ko yavuganye na Ferguson imbere y'uko asubira muri United. Ronaldo ashobora kuba mu murwi uzokwakira Newcastle United  ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda. Ronaldo yambara inomero indwi igihe yakina ubwa mbere muri United, ariko ubu iyo ifiswe na Edinson Cavani, kandi n'aho uyu musatirizi wa Uruguay yoshaka kuyimuha, amategeko ya Premier League ntiyemera kuguranya inomero mu gihe ihiganwa ryamaze gutangura kiretse ari igihe ata kundi vyogenda.

headline: Umunonotsi wa BBC w'umwaka muri Afrika: Ntando Mahlangu
text: Ntando Mahlangu ari mu bahiganirwa agashimwe ka BBC k'umunonotsi w'umunye-Afrika yenuriye abandi mu 2021. Ushaka gutora tugusavye kuja ngaha https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/africa/59089895 aho unasanga amategeko ajanye n'ubuzima bwite. Gutora bizohera kuwa Mungu itariki 19/12/2021 saa 23:59 GMT.

headline: Ikipe y’Intamba mu Rugamba ngo yiteguriye kwitanga ku rukino rwa kabiri
text: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ikipe y'intamba mu Rugamba, ivuga ko itazemera gusubira gutsindwa, mu gihe vyoshika izoca isezera igikombe ca Afrika 2019. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, umumenyereza Olivier Niyungeko ntiyacishije kure mu kwerekana akamaro urukino wo kuwa kane na Madagascar ufitiye Intamba mu Rugamba. U Burundi buhirahiriye bugatsindwa urwo rukino, nta nkeka bwoca busezererwa muri iri higanwa butarenganye umuce wa mbere, ariko iyo kipe ngo ntiyiteze gukorwa mu jisho kabiri. Bwana Niyungeko yagize ati: " Iyi ni finale (urikino rwa nyuma) ya kabiri tugiye gukina, kuko tutayitsinze bizoba biheze. "Iya mbere yari umukino na Nigeria, kuko bose bavuga ko iyo kipe iza kuduhamba, ariko nayo yadutsinze twarwanye kigabo". Ikipe ya Madagascar u Burundi buzohura nayo ntawoyigereranya na Nigeira mu bukomezi, ariko nayo yarerekanye ko atari iyo gupfa guta mu ndasa aho yakina na Guinea. Madagascar nayo ni ubwa mbere igiye muri iri higanwa, yarihagazeko inganya 2-2 na Guinea. Umukino wayo urimwo igikenya cinshi, ukaba utandukanye n'uw'Intambamu Rugamba. Aho Intamba zobonera akoyoko, ni uko umumenyereza wa Madagascar, Nicolas Dupuis, yavuze ko ikipe yiwe yakuye imvune n'umuruho mu rukino rwa Guinea. Ku rupapuro Intamba zisumvya gato amahirwe Madagascar,  gusa kuri ibi kizigenza w'Intamba, Saido Berahino, yavuze ko ivyo atariko babibona. Saido yagize ati: "Dutegerezwa kububaha kuko twarabonye ko ari abakinyi bakomeye. "Turiteguye neza mu mutwe no ku mubiri, kandi buri mukinyi arazi ingene uru rukino ruhambaye. Tuzoba twameze magabo kuva ku firimbi ya mbere". Nigeria, iri imbere mu mugwi B n'amanota 3/3, yagaragayemwo ibibazo aho bivugwa ko abakinyi uno munsi banse kwimenyereza bivuye ku gashirukabute kabo batarahabwa. Umumenyereza wa Nigeria, Gernot Rohr, yaje wenyene mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, abajijwe igituma ata mukinyi bazananye nk'uko vyategerezwa avuga ko hari abarwaye abandi nabo bakaba bari mu 'nama yihutirwa'. Ariko mu nyuma vyaje kumenyekana ko ari ikibazo c'imishahara abakinyi batarahabwa, ibintu vyashavuje abakunzi benshi ba Nigeria, berekanira ishavu ryabo ku mbuga hwaniro. Umugwi B ejo kuwa gatatu uzobamwo umukino hagati ya Nigeria na Guinea isaha 16h30, kuwa kane naho u Burundi buhure na Madagascar kuri ayo masaha nyene. Ushaka kumenye uko amakipe ahagaze mu migwi, uko ahura, uko atsindana hamwe n'amanota afise, urashobora kuja NGAHA.

headline: ‘Vyanka vyakunda’ Mohamed Salah azoguma muri Liverpool
text: Umusatirizi wa  Liverpool Mohamed Salah avuga ko "ivyo ari vyo vyose" mu mwaka w'inkino uza azoba ari muri Liverpool, ariko ko adashaka kujanwa mu mpari z'amasezerano mashasha. Amasezerano ya Salah azorangira muri Ruheshi (6) 2023, ibituma haduka amajambo menshi ko ashobora kugurishwa mu gihe atotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha kuko inyuma y'umwaka yoca yigira ahandi ata rufaranga na rumwe aguzwe. Abajijwe kuri kazoza kiwe imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rwa Ligue des Champions/Champions League ku wa gatandatu, avuga ati: "Si nshaka kuvuga kuri ibi bintu. "Ico nipfuza ni ukubona Hendo [Jordan Henderson] ateruye igikombe". Uyu musatirizi w'umunyamisiri w'imyaka 29 avuga kandi ati: "Sinitaho ivy'amasezerano ubu. Si nshaka kwigungirako. "Ivyo ari vyo vyose ndacari ng'aha mu mwaka uza w'inkino". Mugenziwe Sadio Mane, wewe avuga ko azoshikiriza ingingo ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma na  Real Madrid i Paris. Uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Sénégal  amaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo 120 mu nkino 268 amaze gukinira Liverpool, na we nyene mu kwa gatandatu yinjira mu mezi 12 ya nyuma y'amasezerano yiwe. Yabwiye imboneshakure Sky Sports News ati: "Iki kibazo [kuri kazoza kanje] nzocishura inyuma ya Champions League. Nimba nzoguma aha canke ntazoguma aha, nzovyishura inyuma ya Champions League". Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp ntabona ko ibizova mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu ari rwo fatiro ku bakinyi bamwe bamwe mu gufata ingingo yo kwongereza amasezerano canke kuyahagarika. Ati: "Oya, oya na gato. None, mu gihe twotsinda, boca bashaka kugenda ? Turiko turaganira n'abakinyi bose, ubu si igihe co kuvuga ibijanye n'ivyavuye muri ibi biganiro. Nta n'umwe azi ivyo turiko turategura. "Gusa nta mwanya uhari, buri misi itatu turakina. Abakinyi barabizi, turabizi, rimwe na rimwe turahuza, ikindi gihe ntiduhuze, hanyuma rero tugakorera hamwe. "Turazinanye kuva kera". Salah yinjiye muri Liverpool avuye muri Roma mu 2017 akaba amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo 156 mu nkino 253 amaze gukinira Liverpool. Yarafashije uyu murwi gutsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza (Premier League) mu 2019-2020, igikombe c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League) mu 2019, igikombe FA Cup hamwe n'igikombe c'ihiganwa (League Cup) uno mwaka w'inkino, igikombe c'isi yose gihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere  (FIFA Club World Cup)  be n'igikombe ca Uefa Super Cup mu kiringo amaze muri Liverpool. Mu kwa gatatu, Klopp yavuze ko Salah ari we wenyene azofata ingingo ku vyerekeye  gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. Uyu musatirizi yahoze akinira Chelsea aherutse kuvuga ko ashaka kuguma muri Liverpool, ariko ko kazoza kiwe kari mu minwe y'uyu murwi kandi ko atariko arasaba "ibitagenda". Ku wa Mungu, Liverpool yarangije ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza isumbijwe inota rimwe ritarenga ntirirenguke na Manhester City, ivyarangije ibizigizigi bari bafise vyo gutsindira ibikombe bine mu mwaka w'inkino umwe, ibitarigera bibaho mu Bwongereza. Urukino rwo ku wa gatandatu ruzoyihuza na Real Madrid i Paris mu Bufaransa ruzokwibutsa urundi rwa Champions League rwo mu 2018 aho uyo murwi wo muri Espagne watsinze 3-1, Salah akaba atarurangije kubera yavunitse mu gice ca mbere agonganye na Sergio Ramos mu buryo bwateje impari nyinshi. Salah yongerako ati: "Numva mfise ishaka, ishaka ryinshi cane, inyuma y'ivyabaye igihe giheze [mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa 2018], kandi ku wa Mungu - bose bafise ishaka kuri iki". "Iki turakirwanira kandi bose barabishashaye".

headline: Zinedine Zidane avuye muri Real Madrid ubugira kabiri nk'umumenyereza
text: Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid yatanze imihoho ubugira kabiri kuva atangiye ako kazi. Umugwi wa Real wananiwe gutahukana igikombe na kimwe muri uyu mwaka, ukaba uheruka gutwagwa igikombe ca La Liga n'umukeba wawo Atletico Madrid ku musi wa nyuma wa shampiyona wo ku wa gatandatu. Mw'itangazo ryayo, Real yavuze ko "bategerezwa kwubahiriza" ingingo ya Zidane. Bashimiye Zidane w'imyaka 48 ku "buhinga, ukwitanga n'urukundo yerekanye muri Real Madrid hamwe n'ico amariye uwo mugwi." Uwo yahoze ari umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa, yakiniye Real Madrid kuva mu 2001 gushika mu 2006, yatwaye igikombe ca Champions League  incuro zitatu yikurikiranya hamwe n'igikombe ca La Liga igihe yamenyereza ubwa mbere uwo mugwi hagati ya 2016 na 2018. Yavuye muri uwo mugwi mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2018, ariko aca agaruka inyuma y'amezi cumi, akaba yaciye anatwara igikombe ca La Liga co mu mwaka uheze. Real yavuze iti: "Zidane n'umwe muri rurangiranwa ba Real Madrid kandi iragi ryiwe riruta kure ivyo yashitseko nk'umumenyereza n'umukinyi mu mugwi wacu. "Arazi neza ko afise ikibanza mu mitima y'abakunzi ba Real Madrid kandi ko azoguma yisanga muri Real Madrid." Real yarangije ihiganwa irushwa na Atletico amanota abiri muri La Liga, ibura igikombe gutyo incuro ya mbere kuva mu 2009-2010. Bavuye mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe citiriwe umwami (Copa del Rey) kare cane bakuwemwo n'umugwi wo mu cicaro ca gatatu Alcoyano, banatsindwa na Chelsea mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa rya Champions League. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, Zidane, yari asigaje umwaka umwe ku masezerano yiwe, yarahakanye yivuye inyuma ivyavugwa ko yamenyesheje abakinyi biwe ko ashobora gukura meza mu mpera z'uyu mwaka w'inkino. Kazoza kiwe ni ko kaguma kagaruka mu bimenyeshamakuru vyo muri Espagne, bituma haba no guterana amajambo, aho Zidane yavuze ko we n'abakinyi biwe bakwiye icubahiro. Ni we mumenyereza wenyene amaze gutwara igikombe ca Champions League incuro zitatu, akaba yaranatwaye ibikombe bibiri vy'imigwi ya mbere kw'isi, bibiri vya UEFA Super Coupe na bibiri vya Super Coupe ya Espagne.

headline: Mikel Arteta yemejwe nk'umumenyereza mushasha wa Arsenal
text: Arsenal yagenye uwahoze ari umukinyi wayo wo hagati, Mikel Arteta, ngo ayibere umumenyereza/umutoza ku masezerano y'imyaka itatu n'igice. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 37 yatsindiye igikombe ca FA Cup kabiri mu myaka itanu yamaze akinira Gunners, akaba asubiriye umunye Espagne Unai Emery, yasezerewe mu kwezi guheze. Arteta yakora nk'umumenyereza w'icegera ca Pep Guardiola wa Manchester City, ikibanza yagiyemwo mu 2016 nyuma yo kuja mu zabukuru nk'umukinyi. Areteta yagize ati "dukeneye kuba turiko turahiganirwa ibikombe vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru muri uyu mukino. "Ivyo ni vyo namenyeshejwe neza na neza mu biganiro nagiranye na banyene ikipe Stan na Josh Kroenke hamwe n'abandi barongozi b'iyi kipe". Azotangura icese akazi nk'umumenyereza wa Gunners kuwa Mungu, areke Freddie Ljungberg abandanye nk'umumenyereza mfatakibanza mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu na Everton - iyindi kipe Arteta yakiniye. Arsenal ubu ni ya cumi muri Premier League n'amanota 22. Areteta yongeyeko ati "twese turazi ko akazi katurindiriye katoroshe kugira dushike ku vyo twivuza ariko ndizera ko tuzobishobora. "Sinshobora kwihenda ngo mvuge ko ari ibintu tuzoshikako mu munsi umwe, ariko ikipe dufise ubu irimwo abakinyi bafise impano kandi turafise urwaruka rwiza ruriko ruraduga mw'ishure ryacu."

headline: Arsenal 2-0 Man U: Intsinzi ya mbere y'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta
text: Mikel Arteta yaraye aronse intsinzi ya mbere kuva atanguye kumenyereza umurwi wa Arsenal mu rukino rwa nijoro rwari rugize gatatu akinishije uwo murwi kuva abaye umumenyereza wayo. Muri urwo rukino, Manchester United, yatanguye neza, ariko ibintu bikaba vyaje guhinduka mu nyuma kuva ku munota w'umunani, aho Nicolas Pepe yatsinda igitsindo ca mbere ca Arsenal ku mupira yari ahawe na Sead Kolasinac. Igice ca mbere cagiye kurangira biboneka ko Arsenal ariyo yiganziye cane umupira, ifise ibitsindo bibiri ku busa bwa Man U, kuko ku munota wa 42 , Sokratis Papastathopoulos yatsinze igitsindo ku mupira wari utewe na Pepe mu mfuruka z'ikibuga. Arsenal yari imaze gukinira ku kibuga cayo inkino indwi zose ariko ata na rumwe ishobora gutsinda, aho vyaboneka ko yari ifise ingorane. Kuva Arteta afashe uwo murwi mu minwe, biraboneka ko hari icahindutse kuva mu nkino zitatu amaze gukinisha, zibiri zose adashobora gutsinda, ivyatuma hari abibaza nimba koko ariwe mumenyereza yari akwiriye kumenyereza Arsenal. Ku munsi wa Mungu uheze, Arsenal yatsindiwe ku kibuga cayo n'umurwi wa Chelsea, mu rukino abatari bake babona ko yari gushobora gutsinda. Mu nkino zibiri z'imbere y'aho, yanganije n'imirwi ya Everton hamwe na Bournemouth, ariko mu rukino rwa Everton akaba yari umurorerezi gusa. Mu rukino rwa nijoro abakinyi ba Arsenal baraboneka ko bari bashashaye intsinzi imbere y'umurwi wa Manchester United. Eka na Mezut Ozil yari agize iminsi atavyifatamwo neza yakinye n'ishaka ridasanzwe, akaba mbere ariwe yagize ibirometero vyinshi gusumba abandi bakinyi ba Arsenal muri urwo rukino, aho yagize ibirometero 11.54. Mi gice ca kabiri ibintu ntivyoroshe kuri Arsenal kuko abakinyi ba Ole Gunnar Solskjær basatiriye bimwe biteye ubwoba Arsenal, ariko baravyifashemwo neza cane ntivyabagendera nk'ibiheruka igihe Chelsea ibakubita ibitsindo bibiri vyose mu minota indwi ya nyuma. Manchester United yakinye ibuze umukinyi wayo ruremesha Paul Pogba, aboneka ko atorohewe kubera imvune imutumye amara amezi atatu yose adatanguzwa mu kibuga. Urwo rukino ruheze, umumenyereza wa Manchester United yamenyesheje ko uyo mukinyi akomoka mu Bufaransa yakomeretse ku jisho ry'ikirenge bigashobora kumutuma amara ikiringo c'indwi hagati ya zitatu na zine adahonyoye mu kibuga. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2017 inyuma y'imyaka ishika 20, Arsenal ntirigera isubira kurangiza ihiganwa iri muri zine za mbere, bikayituma idashobora gukina mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Uefa Champions League). Ibizigizi abakunzi bayo bari bafise mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze vyaje kuvamwo amarira aho mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Europa League batsindiwe bikomeye na Chelsea 4-0. Uko gutsindwa kwarababaje cane abakunzi ba Arsenal kuko iyo ikaramuka itsinze urwo rukino iba iri muri Champions League. Mu gihe hasigaye inkino 17 ngo ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza rirangire, Arsenal izoshobora kurangiza iri muri zine za mbere mu gihe ubu iri mu kibanza ca cumi n'amanota 27 gusa?

headline: Sport: Abakuru b'imigwi y'inkino bifatanije n'abo mu mupira w'amaguru mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro imisi 4
text: Imigwi ikomakomeye y'umupira w'amaguru n'abakinyi bagiye kwifatanya n'inzego zirongoye inkino mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro mu kiringo c'imisi ine kuva ku musi wa gatanu mu ntumbero yo kugwanya ifatwa nabi n'amacakubiri. "Uko gushigikirana mu kugwanya amajambo mabi aca ku mbuga hwaniro" gufise intumbero yo gutera intege izo mbuga mu gufata ingingo ruhasha ku banyamacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba no ku gitsina. Amashirahamwe ya Rugby na Cricket baraza gushigikira abo mu mupira w'amaguru muri urwo rugamba. Uko kwinuba izo mbuga kwaniro biza gutangura isaha isaha 17:00 ku musi wa gatanu gushika isaha 1:59 ku masaha yo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Kick it Out, rigwanya amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba, Sanjay Bhandaru yavuze ati:"Uku kwinuba vyerekana agashavu kacu twese. "Mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro, twerekanye ikimeyetso kura abo babifitiye ububasha. Dushaka ko mufata ingingo. Dushaka mufashe guhindura ibintu." Abafashe ingingo yo kwinuba Twitter, Facebook na Instagram ni: Imigwi yo mu Bwongereza y'abasiganwa ku makinga, abasiganwa ku ndogobwe, Hockey hamwe n'ishirahamwe rya Tennis na bo bari mu bitavye ako kamo. Umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi mu gusiganwa n'imodoka Lewis Hamilton co kimwe n'umudereva George Russell na bo bari mu bagiye kwinuba imbuga hwaniro muri ico kiringo c'imisi ine.

headline: "Babigize ikinyegezwa, bihungabanya ubuzima bwanje, ngiye kubigwanya"
text: Peter Musembi B﻿BC Sport “Kuri twebwe  iwacu muri muri Tanzania, kari kuba kabaye akaga.” Se w’umunya-Tanzania wa mbere yaronse umudari wa Olympic mu kwoga ariko arayaga n’umukobwa wiwe, yemera ukuri, agerageza kumusigurira igituma yamuhishije ingorane y’amagara yishe nibura batanu bo mu muryango wabo. Iyo ngorane – kubera kudasuzumwa – yatumye kunyarukanwa kwa muganga mu mpera z’umwaka uheze, ico gihe havanwa  mu nda ya Magdalena Moshi  ibiro hafi bine (4kg)  vy’ibivyimba bita fibromes  inyuma yo gukorwa (kubagwa) vyihuta. Imisi y’ububabare yaciye ikurikira imyaka n’iyindi  yari amaze yama agenda yumva atamerewe neza kuva mu myaka ya mbere yiwe y’ubuyabaga, aho akaba yari afise iyo ngorane ata nkeka ko yahungabanije umwuga wiwe wo kwoga. None, kubera iki Alex, se wiwe, atigeze amubwira na kimwe ku bijanye n’ibivyimba vya fibromes mu muryango wabo? Ati: “Abantu barashobora guca batangura gutungwa urutoke ngo ni intavyara” imbere yo kwongerako ati: “Ni rumwe mu mpome z’Abanya-Afrika dukeneye kumenya ko zihari kugirango dushobore kuzisenyura.” Mu kugira ico akoze, Magdalena yiyemeje kurwanya umuco wo kutubahuka kuvuga ibibazo vy’amagara ajanye n’irondoka (santé  reproductive/ reporoductive health) mu gihugu ciwe za Tanzania. Kuko, bwabaye ubwa mbere, igihe yariko arakira inyuma yo kubagwa muri Australia iyo yari yagiye kwiga, amenya ko yari afise ingorane ya fibromes kandi yari  isanzwe iri mu muryango iwabo kuva kera, mu gihe kandi ishobora guhererakanywa mu muryango. N’ubwo yajanwa mu bitaro kenshi ku murwa mukuru Dar Es Salaam afise ingorane zijanye n’irondoka  mu myaka yiwe ya mbere y’ubuyabaga, ubwoba bwo gutungwa agatoki kubera fibromes bwatumye kuba Magdalena ashobora kuba afise iyo ngorane babimunyegeza. “Nibaza ko ata gice canje na kimwe kizokwigera kibabarira uwo muco wo gukora ivyo”, niko uwo mugore w’imyaka 32 yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ari i muhira iwe hashasha muri Adelaide, muri Australia. TURAGABISHIJE:  Iyi nkuru irimwo ifoto yerekana uko vyakabaye ibivyimba (fibromes) vyavanywe muri Magdalena Moshi. Magdalena yanyarukanywe kwa muganga muri Nyakanga/Nzeri (9) mu 2021 inyuma yo kwumva ububabare bw’umurengera mu ntantu igihe yari mu nzu yo kwinonora imitsi (gym). “Nibuka ikintu ca mbere numvise nikanguye n’uko umuganga asinziriza yariko aravuga  ngo ‘Kirya kivyimba cari kinini – cari cashitse mu mbavu!”’ nk’uko vyibukwa n’umugore ariko araca urupauro rw’umutsindo rwa PhD mu vyigwa vy’amagara. Nk’uko yahavuye abimenya ubwiwe, fibromes ni ibivyimba bitarimwo cancer biza mu gitereko canke iruhande yaco kandi kenshi bikaza mu myaka umukobwa aba ashobora kurondoka (ashobora kuvyara). Iyo ngorane ishikira abagore b’abanya-Afrika  kurusha abandi bose, umuganga wa Magdalena akaba yamubwiye ko amamuko yiwe y’ubunya-Afrika yatumye “ibivyimba vyiwe vyinshi vya fibromes vyagiye kumenyekana bitevye’. Muganga Tran Nguyen yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati :’’Abagore b’abamamuko ya Afrika bafise ivyago bingana incuro zibiri gushika kuri zitatu zo kugira fibromes kurusha bagenzi babo b’abazungukazi”. Amaze kuva mu bitaro, Moshi yaronse terefone ya se wiwe Alex, muri Tanzania, amuhishurira ko fibromes ari ingorane iri mu muryango hanyuma amubwira arira ko yicuza kuba yarabimuhishije. Aca yongerako ati: “Kwumva ko igituma umuryango wa data utavuga ico kibazo ari ukubera  fibromes zijanye no gutera kutavyara, gutuma inda zikoroka no kuvyara abana bapfuye - no kwumva ko bene ivyo bintu vyari kumbuza amahirwe yo gushobora kuronka umugabo. “Intumbero ni ukubinuma, bakurungike kurongorwa hanyuma ico kibazo uzomenye ingene ucifatanwo mu nyuma.” Ubu Moshi ariko aragirirwa ubuhinga bw’uko imbuto z’umugabo n’izo umugore zihurizwa hanze (In Vitro Fertilization, IVF), hanyuma zigaca zijanwa mu gitereko mu gihe be n’umuhungu bakundana bariko baragerageza kuronka umwana. Moshi yabaye umunya-Tanzania wa mbere akiri muto yaronse umudari wa Olympic igihe yawutsindira mu nkino za Beijing 2008  ku myaka 16. Yarahiganywe kandi mu nkino za 2012 na 2016 ariko ntiyigeze arenga intambwe ya mbere kuko uretse ko yarwana n’abakeba, yarwana kandi  n’ububabare bwo mu mugongo butahera. Avuga ati: “Mu nyuma niho nagiye kumenya ko kimwe mu bimenyetso bikomeye vya fibromes ari ukubabara umugongo.” “Ingene vyanyononeye umwuga wo kwoga, numva  mu mutwe `ntashaka no gusubira kuvyiyumvira kuko vyombabaza cane”. Igihe yariko arakira aho bamukoze, Magdalena – n’ubu acitaba amahiganwa yo kwoga – yarahamagaye se kuri video kugira bavugane ico kibazo. Mu gihe yari yarengewe n‘ivyashitse, yashaka kumenya igihe se yari amaze azi ko fibromes ari ingorane iri mu  muryango, igituma yakomeje kubimuhisha kandi Magdalena yaguma yerekana ibimenyetso  mu myaka ya mbere y’ubuyabaga hamwe n’ivyigwa umuryango ushobora kuvanamwo. BBC Sport Africa yemerewe gukurikira  ico kiyago.  Vyashotse bigaragara ko Alex yari amaze imyaka myinshi azi ko abantu ba hafi mu muryango bari barivuje ama fibromes, harimwo babiri babanje kubagwa nk’uko vyagendeye Magdalena. "Urumva ikibazo nari nsanzwe ndakizi, kandi nzi ko cama kijana no kuvyara. Mu nyuma narabuze abandi bavyara, mu nyuma ndamenya ko na mama yari afise ingorane nk’izo.” Abajijwe igituma ibibazo vya Magdalena bijanye n’irondoka mu gihe c’ubuyabaga no kwama ariko araja kwa muganga itabaye imvo ikwiye kugira bahishure ikibazo, Alex yishuye ati: “Hari ibintu bitavugwa hagati y’umukobwa na se.” “Mu mico yacu, ku bijanye no kurongorwa, abantu akenshi bagerageza guhisha aho bafise ingorane. Mu mibereho yacu, vyamye bimeze nk’ikibazo co kwigwanako – bisigura ko wama ugerageza kurondera uwo mwubakana akomeye neza cane bishoboka.” “Kubera izo mvo, vyinshi muri ivyo bintu mu mico yacu vyarahishwa. "Ku binyerekeye, nabaye nka ya nyoni bita autruche  - iyo autruche  ifise ingorane, inyegeza umutwe, ikibaza ko umutumba wayo wose ata ngorane uja kugira. Nibaza ko natwe bizotungendera neza. Ntivyigeze biba uko.”  Ivyashitse vyatumye Alex asubira kwibaza ico yokora kuri uwo muco wo guhakana no kuguma mu gacerere muri Tanzania. Ubu ibitahora bivugwa arabivuga akaba yarabwiye abakobwa n’abagore bose bakiri bato mu muryango wiwe kugenda kwipimisha barabe ko ata vyago bafise vyo kugira fibromes canke izindi ngorane zijanye n’irondoka. Ubwo butumwa yaranabushikanye  mu muryango iyo  avuka, ku mucamo w’umusozi Kilimanjaro mu buraruko bwa Tanzania. Igihe bariko barayaga, Alex yabwiye Magalena ati iyo apfa yari kuba ibaye ingaruka ya mbere mbi – ariko ko kudashora kuronka abana vyari kuba “akaga”. Mu nyuma Mgadalena aramubaza ati: “None wamerewe gute wumvise ko ubwa mbere , fibromes zagarutse hanyuma ubwa kabiri, ko bariko barankorera IVF  kubera ivyo?” “Amajambo yaramperanye.” Magdakena we ntiyamuheranye, kandi avuga ko azobandanya guharanira ko haba ibiyago ku magara ajanye no kurondoka muri Afrika. Inyuma y’ingorane ziwe, yararondeye adatevye abo mu muryango bashobora kuba bafise ingorane nk’izo, kandi nabo batubahuka kuzivuga. Yasiguye ati: “Narahamagaye  bavyaranje bose ndababira ko mfise ico kibazo kandi ndabumvisha ko bategerezwa kwipimisha.” “Ubutumwa bwanje ku bakobwa n’abagore bakiri bato muri Afrika y’Ubuseruko na Afrika yose  ni ubu: niba ufise ingorane z’amagara afatiye kw’irondoka, ntibituma ubugore bwawe bugabanuka, rero bivuge hanyuma urondere ubufasha.” Aho ashoboreye kuzibira ivyago vyari gushikira abo mu muryango wiwe batari bafise amahirwe nk’ayiwe, Magdalena ubu ariko atera iyindi ntambwe, yizigiye ko gutuma abantu bamenya ivyerekeye fibromes muri Tanzania no mu bindi bihugu bishobora gufasha abandi mu kuvanaho ivyo gutinya gutungwa agatoki. Gutinya gutungwa agatoki vyatumye yoga ukuboko kumwe gufashe mu mongongo, mu nkino no mu buzima. “Vyashize  amagara yanje ku gihe kirekire, ubuzima bwanje  n’ubushobozi bwanje bwo kuronka abana mu ngorane zikomeye”.

headline: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yaciye umuhigo ku metero 2000 mu mahiganwa ya Zagreb
text: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yanditse amateka mashasha ku metero 2000 mw'ihiganwa Continental Tour Gold ryabera i Zagreb mu gihugu ca Croatia. Ku mwanya yakoresheje w'iminota itanu n'amasegonda 21.56, yasumbije Genzebe Dibaba yaheruka guca umuhigo mu mahiganwa yo mu kibuga cugaye (indoors) mu 2017, akaba yamusize amasegonda abiri. Inyuma y'umudari w'ifeza kw'isi no muri Olempike ku metero 800, Niyonsaba ni umwe mu banonotsi batari bake babujijwe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1.600 kubera urugero rw'inkabuzo (umusemburo) ya testosterone ruri hejuru. Uyu munonotsi w'imyaka 28 avuga ko yahisemwo kubandanya amahiganwa kugira ngo abere akarorero abandi. N'aho ari mu murwi w'abanonotsi bategetswe guhindura ibisata bahiganwamwo ku ngingo yafashwe n'urwego mpuzamakungu rujejwe ukwinonora imitsi mu 2019, Niyonsaba ntaco yabaye kuko arabikora bigacika mu mahiganwa yo ku ntera ndende. N'akamwemwe kenshi, Niyonsaba ati: "Numva mfise umunezero udasanzwe. Si nari nzi ko nshobora kwandika amateka nk'aya kw'isi yose, kuko ni bwo bwa mbere nari nje hano. Naje hano gukora ivyo nategerezwa gukora". "Nabikoze. Ni vyiza kandi biraryoshe. Ndashimiye abo bose baje kudutera intege". Aya mateka mashasha yanditse, mbere akaba yanasumbije umunya Ireland Sonia O'Sullivan yari yaciye umuhigo mu mahiganwa yo hanze mu 1994, ayashitseko haciye indwi imwe gusa atsindiye ihiganwa ryo gusiganwa ku metero 5000 mu mahiganwa ya Diamond League yabereye i Zurich mu Busuwisi (Suisse). Mu nkino za Olempike ziheruka kubera i Tokyo mu Buyapani, yahejeje ari mu kibanza ca gatanu mw'ihiganwa rya nyuma (finale) ku metero 10.000, ariko imbere y'aho akaba yari yakuwe mw'ihiganwa ku metero 5000 yagirijwe ko yaciye mu nzira itari rwiwe. Yaheruka kandi kuba umunonotsi agize gatanu kw'isi avuduka cane ku metero 3000 mu rwego rw'abagore/abakobwa. Gusiganwa ku metero 2000 ntibirigera biba mu nkino za Olempike canke mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu (World Championships), ariko bikunze kuba mu mahiganwa asanzwe yo gusiganwa.
